  4606. public function SetLink($link, $y=0, $page=-1) { 
  4607.     $fixed = false; 
  4608.     if (!empty($page) AND ($page[0] == '*')) { 
  4609.         $page = intval(substr($page, 1)); 
  4610.         // this page number will not be changed when moving/add/deleting pages 
  4611.         $fixed = true; 
  4612.     } 
  4613.     if ($page < 0) { 
  4614.         $page = $this->page; 
  4615.     } 
  4616.     if ($y == -1) { 
  4617.         $y = $this->y; 
  4618.     } 
  4619.     $this->links[$link] = array('p' => $page, 'y' => $y, 'f' => $fixed); 
  4620. } 
  4621.  
  4622. /** 
  4623.  * Puts a link on a rectangular area of the page. 
  4624.  * Text or image links are generally put via Cell(), Write() or Image(), but this method can be useful for instance to define a clickable area inside an image. 
  4625.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4626.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4627.  * @param $w (float) Width of the rectangle 
  4628.  * @param $h (float) Height of the rectangle 
  4629.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink() 
  4630.  * @param $spaces (int) number of spaces on the text to link 
  4631.  * @public 
  4632.  * @since 1.5 
  4633.  * @see AddLink(), Annotation(), Cell(), Write(), Image() 
  4634.  */ 
  4635. public function Link($x, $y, $w, $h, $link, $spaces=0) { 
  4636.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $link, array('Subtype'=>'Link'), $spaces); 
  4637. } 
  4638.  
  4639. /** 
  4640.  * Puts a markup annotation on a rectangular area of the page. 
  4641.  * !!!!THE ANNOTATION SUPPORT IS NOT YET FULLY IMPLEMENTED !!!! 
  4642.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4643.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4644.  * @param $w (float) Width of the rectangle 
  4645.  * @param $h (float) Height of the rectangle 
  4646.  * @param $text (string) annotation text or alternate content 
  4647.  * @param $opt (array) array of options (see section 8.4 of PDF reference 1.7). 
  4648.  * @param $spaces (int) number of spaces on the text to link 
  4649.  * @public 
  4650.  * @since 3.0.018 (2008-08-06) 
  4651.  */ 
  4652. public function Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $text, $opt=array('Subtype'=>'Text'), $spaces=0) { 
  4653.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  4654.         // store parameters for later use on template 
  4655.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][] = array('x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'text' => $text, 'opt' => $opt, 'spaces' => $spaces); 
  4656.         return; 
  4657.     } 
  4658.     if ($x === '') { 
  4659.         $x = $this->x; 
  4660.     } 
  4661.     if ($y === '') { 
  4662.         $y = $this->y; 
  4663.     } 
  4664.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  4665.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  4666.     // recalculate coordinates to account for graphic transformations 
  4667.     if (isset($this->transfmatrix) AND !empty($this->transfmatrix)) { 
  4668.         for ($i=$this->transfmatrix_key; $i > 0; --$i) { 
  4669.             $maxid = count($this->transfmatrix[$i]) - 1; 
  4670.             for ($j=$maxid; $j >= 0; --$j) { 
  4671.                 $ctm = $this->transfmatrix[$i][$j]; 
  4672.                 if (isset($ctm['a'])) { 
  4673.                     $x = $x * $this->k; 
  4674.                     $y = ($this->h - $y) * $this->k; 
  4675.                     $w = $w * $this->k; 
  4676.                     $h = $h * $this->k; 
  4677.                     // top left 
  4678.                     $xt = $x; 
  4679.                     $yt = $y; 
  4680.                     $x1 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4681.                     $y1 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4682.                     // top right 
  4683.                     $xt = $x + $w; 
  4684.                     $yt = $y; 
  4685.                     $x2 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4686.                     $y2 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4687.                     // bottom left 
  4688.                     $xt = $x; 
  4689.                     $yt = $y - $h; 
  4690.                     $x3 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4691.                     $y3 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4692.                     // bottom right 
  4693.                     $xt = $x + $w; 
  4694.                     $yt = $y - $h; 
  4695.                     $x4 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4696.                     $y4 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4697.                     // new coordinates (rectangle area) 
  4698.                     $x = min($x1, $x2, $x3, $x4); 
  4699.                     $y = max($y1, $y2, $y3, $y4); 
  4700.                     $w = (max($x1, $x2, $x3, $x4) - $x) / $this->k; 
  4701.                     $h = ($y - min($y1, $y2, $y3, $y4)) / $this->k; 
  4702.                     $x = $x / $this->k; 
  4703.                     $y = $this->h - ($y / $this->k); 
  4704.                 } 
  4705.             } 
  4706.         } 
  4707.     } 
  4708.     if ($this->page <= 0) { 
  4709.         $page = 1; 
  4710.     } else { 
  4711.         $page = $this->page; 
  4712.     } 
  4713.     if (!isset($this->PageAnnots[$page])) { 
  4714.         $this->PageAnnots[$page] = array(); 
  4715.     } 
  4716.     $this->PageAnnots[$page][] = array('n' => ++$this->n, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'txt' => $text, 'opt' => $opt, 'numspaces' => $spaces); 
  4717.     if (!$this->pdfa_mode) { 
  4718.         if ((($opt['Subtype'] == 'FileAttachment') OR ($opt['Subtype'] == 'Sound')) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($opt['FS'])) 
  4719.             AND (@file_exists($opt['FS']) OR TCPDF_STATIC::isValidURL($opt['FS'])) 
  4720.             AND (!isset($this->embeddedfiles[basename($opt['FS'])]))) { 
  4721.             $this->embeddedfiles[basename($opt['FS'])] = array('f' => ++$this->n, 'n' => ++$this->n, 'file' => $opt['FS']); 
  4722.         } 
  4723.     } 
  4724.     // Add widgets annotation's icons 
  4725.     if (isset($opt['mk']['i']) AND @file_exists($opt['mk']['i'])) { 
  4726.         $this->Image($opt['mk']['i'], '', '', 10, 10, '', '', '', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, true); 
  4727.     } 
  4728.     if (isset($opt['mk']['ri']) AND @file_exists($opt['mk']['ri'])) { 
  4729.         $this->Image($opt['mk']['ri'], '', '', 0, 0, '', '', '', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, true); 
  4730.     } 
  4731.     if (isset($opt['mk']['ix']) AND @file_exists($opt['mk']['ix'])) { 
  4732.         $this->Image($opt['mk']['ix'], '', '', 0, 0, '', '', '', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, true); 
  4733.     } 
  4734. } 
  4735.  
  4736. /** 
  4737.  * Embedd the attached files. 
  4738.  * @since 4.3.000 (2008-12-07) 
  4739.  * @protected 
  4740.  * @see Annotation() 
  4741.  */ 
  4742. protected function _putEmbeddedFiles() { 
  4743.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  4744.         // embedded files are not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  4745.         return; 
  4746.     } 
  4747.     reset($this->embeddedfiles); 
  4748.     foreach ($this->embeddedfiles as $filename => $filedata) { 
  4749.         $data = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($filedata['file']); 
  4750.         if ($data !== FALSE) { 
  4751.             $rawsize = strlen($data); 
  4752.             if ($rawsize > 0) { 
  4753.                 // update name tree 
  4754.                 $this->efnames[$filename] = $filedata['f'].' 0 R'; 
  4755.                 // embedded file specification object 
  4756.                 $out = $this->_getobj($filedata['f'])."\n"; 
  4757.                 $out .= '<</Type /Filespec /F '.$this->_datastring($filename, $filedata['f']).' /EF <</F '.$filedata['n'].' 0 R>> >>'; 
  4758.                 $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  4759.                 $this->_out($out); 
  4760.                 // embedded file object 
  4761.                 $filter = ''; 
  4762.                 if ($this->compress) { 
  4763.                     $data = gzcompress($data); 
  4764.                     $filter = ' /Filter /FlateDecode'; 
  4765.                 } 
  4766.                 $stream = $this->_getrawstream($data, $filedata['n']); 
  4767.                 $out = $this->_getobj($filedata['n'])."\n"; 
  4768.                 $out .= '<< /Type /EmbeddedFile'.$filter.' /Length '.strlen($stream).' /Params <</Size '.$rawsize.'>> >>'; 
  4769.                 $out .= ' stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'; 
  4770.                 $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  4771.                 $this->_out($out); 
  4772.             } 
  4773.         } 
  4774.     } 
  4775. } 
  4776.  
  4777. /** 
  4778.  * Prints a text cell at the specified position. 
  4779.  * This method allows to place a string precisely on the page. 
  4780.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the cell origin 
  4781.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the cell origin 
  4782.  * @param $txt (string) String to print 
  4783.  * @param $fstroke (int) outline size in user units (false = disable) 
  4784.  * @param $fclip (boolean) if true activate clipping mode (you must call StartTransform() before this function and StopTransform() to stop the clipping tranformation). 
  4785.  * @param $ffill (boolean) if true fills the text 
  4786.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  4787.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right (or left for RTL languages)</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line</li><li>2: below</li></ul>Putting 1 is equivalent to putting 0 and calling Ln() just after. Default value: 0. 
  4788.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  4789.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  4790.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  4791.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  4792.  * @param $ignore_min_height (boolean) if true ignore automatic minimum height value. 
  4793.  * @param $calign (string) cell vertical alignment relative to the specified Y value. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : cell top</li><li>A : font top</li><li>L : font baseline</li><li>D : font bottom</li><li>B : cell bottom</li></ul> 
  4794.  * @param $valign (string) text vertical alignment inside the cell. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : bottom</li></ul> 
  4795.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis for $x and $y initial position. 
  4796.  * @public 
  4797.  * @since 1.0 
  4798.  * @see Cell(), Write(), MultiCell(), WriteHTML(), WriteHTMLCell() 
  4799.  */ 
  4800. public function Text($x, $y, $txt, $fstroke=false, $fclip=false, $ffill=true, $border=0, $ln=0, $align='', $fill=false, $link='', $stretch=0, $ignore_min_height=false, $calign='T', $valign='M', $rtloff=false) { 
  4801.     $textrendermode = $this->textrendermode; 
  4802.     $textstrokewidth = $this->textstrokewidth; 
  4803.     $this->setTextRenderingMode($fstroke, $ffill, $fclip); 
  4804.     $this->SetXY($x, $y, $rtloff); 
  4805.     $this->Cell(0, 0, $txt, $border, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch, $ignore_min_height, $calign, $valign); 
  4806.     // restore previous rendering mode 
  4807.     $this->textrendermode = $textrendermode; 
  4808.     $this->textstrokewidth = $textstrokewidth; 
  4809. } 
  4810.  
  4811. /** 
  4812.  * Whenever a page break condition is met, the method is called, and the break is issued or not depending on the returned value. 
  4813.  * The default implementation returns a value according to the mode selected by SetAutoPageBreak().<br /> 
  4814.  * This method is called automatically and should not be called directly by the application. 
  4815.  * @return boolean 
  4816.  * @public 
  4817.  * @since 1.4 
  4818.  * @see SetAutoPageBreak() 
  4819.  */ 
  4820. public function AcceptPageBreak() { 
  4821.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  4822.         // multi column mode 
  4823.         if ($this->current_column < ($this->num_columns - 1)) { 
  4824.             // go to next column 
  4825.             $this->selectColumn($this->current_column + 1); 
  4826.         } elseif ($this->AutoPageBreak) { 
  4827.             // add a new page 
  4828.             $this->AddPage(); 
  4829.             // set first column 
  4830.             $this->selectColumn(0); 
  4831.         } 
  4832.         // avoid page breaking from checkPageBreak() 
  4833.         return false; 
  4834.     } 
  4835.     return $this->AutoPageBreak; 
  4836. } 
  4837.  
  4838. /** 
  4839.  * Add page if needed. 
  4840.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. Default value: 0. 
  4841.  * @param $y (mixed) starting y position, leave empty for current position. 
  4842.  * @param $addpage (boolean) if true add a page, otherwise only return the true/false state 
  4843.  * @return boolean true in case of page break, false otherwise. 
  4844.  * @since 3.2.000 (2008-07-01) 
  4845.  * @protected 
  4846.  */ 
  4847. protected function checkPageBreak($h=0, $y='', $addpage=true) { 
  4848.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($y)) { 
  4849.         $y = $this->y; 
  4850.     } 
  4851.     $current_page = $this->page; 
  4852.     if ((($y + $h) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) AND ($this->inPageBody()) AND ($this->AcceptPageBreak())) { 
  4853.         if ($addpage) { 
  4854.             //Automatic page break 
  4855.             $x = $this->x; 
  4856.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  4857.             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  4858.             $oldpage = $this->page - 1; 
  4859.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  4860.                 if ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['orm']) { 
  4861.                     $this->x = $x - ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['orm']); 
  4862.                 } else { 
  4863.                     $this->x = $x; 
  4864.                 } 
  4865.             } else { 
  4866.                 if ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['olm']) { 
  4867.                     $this->x = $x + ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['olm']); 
  4868.                 } else { 
  4869.                     $this->x = $x; 
  4870.                 } 
  4871.             } 
  4872.         } 
  4873.         return true; 
  4874.     } 
  4875.     if ($current_page != $this->page) { 
  4876.         // account for columns mode 
  4877.         return true; 
  4878.     } 
  4879.     return false; 
  4880. } 
  4881.  
  4882. /** 
  4883.  * Prints a cell (rectangular area) with optional borders, background color and character string. The upper-left corner of the cell corresponds to the current position. The text can be aligned or centered. After the call, the current position moves to the right or to the next line. It is possible to put a link on the text.<br /> 
  4884.  * If automatic page breaking is enabled and the cell goes beyond the limit, a page break is done before outputting. 
  4885.  * @param $w (float) Cell width. If 0, the cell extends up to the right margin. 
  4886.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. Default value: 0. 
  4887.  * @param $txt (string) String to print. Default value: empty string. 
  4888.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  4889.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right (or left for RTL languages)</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line</li><li>2: below</li></ul> Putting 1 is equivalent to putting 0 and calling Ln() just after. Default value: 0. 
  4890.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  4891.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  4892.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  4893.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  4894.  * @param $ignore_min_height (boolean) if true ignore automatic minimum height value. 
  4895.  * @param $calign (string) cell vertical alignment relative to the specified Y value. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : cell top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : cell bottom</li><li>A : font top</li><li>L : font baseline</li><li>D : font bottom</li></ul> 
  4896.  * @param $valign (string) text vertical alignment inside the cell. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : bottom</li></ul> 
  4897.  * @public 
  4898.  * @since 1.0 
  4899.  * @see SetFont(), SetDrawColor(), SetFillColor(), SetTextColor(), SetLineWidth(), AddLink(), Ln(), MultiCell(), Write(), SetAutoPageBreak() 
  4900.  */ 
  4901. public function Cell($w, $h=0, $txt='', $border=0, $ln=0, $align='', $fill=false, $link='', $stretch=0, $ignore_min_height=false, $calign='T', $valign='M') { 
  4902.     $prev_cell_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  4903.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  4904.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  4905.     if (!$ignore_min_height) { 
  4906.         $min_cell_height = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  4907.         if ($h < $min_cell_height) { 
  4908.             $h = $min_cell_height; 
  4909.         } 
  4910.     } 
  4911.     $this->checkPageBreak($h + $this->cell_margin['T'] + $this->cell_margin['B']); 
  4912.     // apply text shadow if enabled 
  4913.     if ($this->txtshadow['enabled']) { 
  4914.         // save data 
  4915.         $x = $this->x; 
  4916.         $y = $this->y; 
  4917.         $bc = $this->bgcolor; 
  4918.         $fc = $this->fgcolor; 
  4919.         $sc = $this->strokecolor; 
  4920.         $alpha = $this->alpha; 
  4921.         // print shadow 
  4922.         $this->x += $this->txtshadow['depth_w']; 
  4923.         $this->y += $this->txtshadow['depth_h']; 
  4924.         $this->SetFillColorArray($this->txtshadow['color']); 
  4925.         $this->SetTextColorArray($this->txtshadow['color']); 
  4926.         $this->SetDrawColorArray($this->txtshadow['color']); 
  4927.         if ($this->txtshadow['opacity'] != $alpha['CA']) { 
  4928.             $this->setAlpha($this->txtshadow['opacity'], $this->txtshadow['blend_mode']); 
  4929.         } 
  4930.         if ($this->state == 2) { 
  4931.             $this->_out($this->getCellCode($w, $h, $txt, $border, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch, true, $calign, $valign)); 
  4932.         } 
  4933.         //restore data 
  4934.         $this->x = $x; 
  4935.         $this->y = $y; 
  4936.         $this->SetFillColorArray($bc); 
  4937.         $this->SetTextColorArray($fc); 
  4938.         $this->SetDrawColorArray($sc); 
  4939.         if ($this->txtshadow['opacity'] != $alpha['CA']) { 
  4940.             $this->setAlpha($alpha['CA'], $alpha['BM'], $alpha['ca'], $alpha['AIS']); 
  4941.         } 
  4942.     } 
  4943.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  4944.         $this->_out($this->getCellCode($w, $h, $txt, $border, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch, true, $calign, $valign)); 
  4945.     } 
  4946.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  4947.     $this->cell_margin = $prev_cell_margin; 
  4948. } 
  4949.  
  4950. /** 
  4951.  * Returns the PDF string code to print a cell (rectangular area) with optional borders, background color and character string. The upper-left corner of the cell corresponds to the current position. The text can be aligned or centered. After the call, the current position moves to the right or to the next line. It is possible to put a link on the text.<br /> 
  4952.  * If automatic page breaking is enabled and the cell goes beyond the limit, a page break is done before outputting. 
  4953.  * @param $w (float) Cell width. If 0, the cell extends up to the right margin. 
  4954.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. Default value: 0. 
  4955.  * @param $txt (string) String to print. Default value: empty string. 
  4956.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  4957.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right (or left for RTL languages)</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line</li><li>2: below</li></ul>Putting 1 is equivalent to putting 0 and calling Ln() just after. Default value: 0. 
  4958.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  4959.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  4960.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  4961.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  4962.  * @param $ignore_min_height (boolean) if true ignore automatic minimum height value. 
  4963.  * @param $calign (string) cell vertical alignment relative to the specified Y value. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : cell top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : cell bottom</li><li>A : font top</li><li>L : font baseline</li><li>D : font bottom</li></ul> 
  4964.  * @param $valign (string) text vertical alignment inside the cell. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : top</li><li>M : middle</li><li>B : bottom</li></ul> 
  4965.  * @return string containing cell code 
  4966.  * @protected 
  4967.  * @since 1.0 
  4968.  * @see Cell() 
  4969.  */ 
  4970. protected function getCellCode($w, $h=0, $txt='', $border=0, $ln=0, $align='', $fill=false, $link='', $stretch=0, $ignore_min_height=false, $calign='T', $valign='M') { 
  4971.     // replace 'NO-BREAK SPACE' (U+00A0) character with a simple space 
  4972.     $txt = str_replace(TCPDF_FONTS::unichr(160, $this->isunicode), ' ', $txt); 
  4973.     $prev_cell_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  4974.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  4975.     $txt = TCPDF_STATIC::removeSHY($txt, $this->isunicode); 
  4976.     $rs = ''; //string to be returned 
  4977.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  4978.     if (!$ignore_min_height) { 
  4979.         $min_cell_height = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  4980.         if ($h < $min_cell_height) { 
  4981.             $h = $min_cell_height; 
  4982.         } 
  4983.     } 
  4984.     $k = $this->k; 
  4985.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  4986.     list($this->x, $this->y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $this->x, $this->y); 
  4987.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  4988.         $x = $this->x - $this->cell_margin['R']; 
  4989.     } else { 
  4990.         $x = $this->x + $this->cell_margin['L']; 
  4991.     } 
  4992.     $y = $this->y + $this->cell_margin['T']; 
  4993.     $prev_font_stretching = $this->font_stretching; 
  4994.     $prev_font_spacing = $this->font_spacing; 
  4995.     // cell vertical alignment 
  4996.     switch ($calign) { 
  4997.         case 'A': { 
  4998.             // font top 
  4999.             switch ($valign) { 
  5000.                 case 'T': { 
  5001.                     // top 
  5002.                     $y -= $this->cell_padding['T']; 
  5003.                     break; 
  5004.                 } 
  5005.                 case 'B': { 
  5006.                     // bottom 
  5007.                     $y -= ($h - $this->cell_padding['B'] - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent); 
  5008.                     break; 
  5009.                 } 
  5010.                 default: 
  5011.                 case 'C': 
  5012.                 case 'M': { 
  5013.                     // center 
  5014.                     $y -= (($h - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5015.                     break; 
  5016.                 } 
  5017.             } 
  5018.             break; 
  5019.         } 
  5020.         case 'L': { 
  5021.             // font baseline 
  5022.             switch ($valign) { 
  5023.                 case 'T': { 
  5024.                     // top 
  5025.                     $y -= ($this->cell_padding['T'] + $this->FontAscent); 
  5026.                     break; 
  5027.                 } 
  5028.                 case 'B': { 
  5029.                     // bottom 
  5030.                     $y -= ($h - $this->cell_padding['B'] - $this->FontDescent); 
  5031.                     break; 
  5032.                 } 
  5033.                 default: 
  5034.                 case 'C': 
  5035.                 case 'M': { 
  5036.                     // center 
  5037.                     $y -= (($h + $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5038.                     break; 
  5039.                 } 
  5040.             } 
  5041.             break; 
  5042.         } 
  5043.         case 'D': { 
  5044.             // font bottom 
  5045.             switch ($valign) { 
  5046.                 case 'T': { 
  5047.                     // top 
  5048.                     $y -= ($this->cell_padding['T'] + $this->FontAscent + $this->FontDescent); 
  5049.                     break; 
  5050.                 } 
  5051.                 case 'B': { 
  5052.                     // bottom 
  5053.                     $y -= ($h - $this->cell_padding['B']); 
  5054.                     break; 
  5055.                 } 
  5056.                 default: 
  5057.                 case 'C': 
  5058.                 case 'M': { 
  5059.                     // center 
  5060.                     $y -= (($h + $this->FontAscent + $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5061.                     break; 
  5062.                 } 
  5063.             } 
  5064.             break; 
  5065.         } 
  5066.         case 'B': { 
  5067.             // cell bottom 
  5068.             $y -= $h; 
  5069.             break; 
  5070.         } 
  5071.         case 'C': 
  5072.         case 'M': { 
  5073.             // cell center 
  5074.             $y -= ($h / 2); 
  5075.             break; 
  5076.         } 
  5077.         default: 
  5078.         case 'T': { 
  5079.             // cell top 
  5080.             break; 
  5081.         } 
  5082.     } 
  5083.     // text vertical alignment 
  5084.     switch ($valign) { 
  5085.         case 'T': { 
  5086.             // top 
  5087.             $yt = $y + $this->cell_padding['T']; 
  5088.             break; 
  5089.         } 
  5090.         case 'B': { 
  5091.             // bottom 
  5092.             $yt = $y + $h - $this->cell_padding['B'] - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent; 
  5093.             break; 
  5094.         } 
  5095.         default: 
  5096.         case 'C': 
  5097.         case 'M': { 
  5098.             // center 
  5099.             $yt = $y + (($h - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5100.             break; 
  5101.         } 
  5102.     } 
  5103.     $basefonty = $yt + $this->FontAscent; 
  5104.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($w) OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  5105.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5106.             $w = $x - $this->lMargin; 
  5107.         } else { 
  5108.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $x; 
  5109.         } 
  5110.     } 
  5111.     $s = ''; 
  5112.     // fill and borders 
  5113.     if (is_string($border) AND (strlen($border) == 4)) { 
  5114.         // full border 
  5115.         $border = 1; 
  5116.     } 
  5117.     if ($fill OR ($border == 1)) { 
  5118.         if ($fill) { 
  5119.             $op = ($border == 1) ? 'B' : 'f'; 
  5120.         } else { 
  5121.             $op = 'S'; 
  5122.         } 
  5123.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5124.             $xk = (($x - $w) * $k); 
  5125.         } else { 
  5126.             $xk = ($x * $k); 
  5127.         } 
  5128.         $s .= sprintf('%F %F %F %F re %s ', $xk, (($this->h - $y) * $k), ($w * $k), (-$h * $k), $op); 
  5129.     } 
  5130.     // draw borders 
  5131.     $s .= $this->getCellBorder($x, $y, $w, $h, $border); 
  5132.     if ($txt != '') { 
  5133.         $txt2 = $txt; 
  5134.         if ($this->isunicode) { 
  5135.             if (($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'core') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'TrueType') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'Type1')) { 
  5136.                 $txt2 = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($txt2, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  5137.             } else { 
  5138.                 $unicode = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($txt, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); // array of UTF-8 unicode values 
  5139.                 $unicode = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($unicode, '', $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  5140.                 // replace thai chars (if any) 
  5141.                 if (defined('K_THAI_TOPCHARS') AND (K_THAI_TOPCHARS == true)) { 
  5142.                     // number of chars 
  5143.                     $numchars = count($unicode); 
  5144.                     // po pla, for far, for fan 
  5145.                     $longtail = array(0x0e1b, 0x0e1d, 0x0e1f); 
  5146.                     // do chada, to patak 
  5147.                     $lowtail = array(0x0e0e, 0x0e0f); 
  5148.                     // mai hun arkad, sara i, sara ii, sara ue, sara uee 
  5149.                     $upvowel = array(0x0e31, 0x0e34, 0x0e35, 0x0e36, 0x0e37); 
  5150.                     // mai ek, mai tho, mai tri, mai chattawa, karan 
  5151.                     $tonemark = array(0x0e48, 0x0e49, 0x0e4a, 0x0e4b, 0x0e4c); 
  5152.                     // sara u, sara uu, pinthu 
  5153.                     $lowvowel = array(0x0e38, 0x0e39, 0x0e3a); 
  5154.                     $output = array(); 
  5155.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $numchars; $i++) { 
  5156.                         if (($unicode[$i] >= 0x0e00) && ($unicode[$i] <= 0x0e5b)) { 
  5157.                             $ch0 = $unicode[$i]; 
  5158.                             $ch1 = ($i > 0) ? $unicode[($i - 1)] : 0; 
  5159.                             $ch2 = ($i > 1) ? $unicode[($i - 2)] : 0; 
  5160.                             $chn = ($i < ($numchars - 1)) ? $unicode[($i + 1)] : 0; 
  5161.                             if (in_array($ch0, $tonemark)) { 
  5162.                                 if ($chn == 0x0e33) { 
  5163.                                     // sara um 
  5164.                                     if (in_array($ch1, $longtail)) { 
  5165.                                         // tonemark at upper left 
  5166.                                         $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf713 + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5167.                                     } else { 
  5168.                                         // tonemark at upper right (normal position) 
  5169.                                         $output[] = $ch0; 
  5170.                                     } 
  5171.                                 } elseif (in_array($ch1, $longtail) OR (in_array($ch2, $longtail) AND in_array($ch1, $lowvowel))) { 
  5172.                                     // tonemark at lower left 
  5173.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf705 + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5174.                                 } elseif (in_array($ch1, $upvowel)) { 
  5175.                                     if (in_array($ch2, $longtail)) { 
  5176.                                         // tonemark at upper left 
  5177.                                         $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf713 + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5178.                                     } else { 
  5179.                                         // tonemark at upper right (normal position) 
  5180.                                         $output[] = $ch0; 
  5181.                                     } 
  5182.                                 } else { 
  5183.                                     // tonemark at lower right 
  5184.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf70a + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5185.                                 } 
  5186.                             } elseif (($ch0 == 0x0e33) AND (in_array($ch1, $longtail) OR (in_array($ch2, $longtail) AND in_array($ch1, $tonemark)))) { 
  5187.                                 // add lower left nikhahit and sara aa 
  5188.                                 if ($this->isCharDefined(0xf711) AND $this->isCharDefined(0x0e32)) { 
  5189.                                     $output[] = 0xf711; 
  5190.                                     $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'][0xf711] = true; 
  5191.                                     $output[] = 0x0e32; 
  5192.                                     $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'][0x0e32] = true; 
  5193.                                 } else { 
  5194.                                     $output[] = $ch0; 
  5195.                                 } 
  5196.                             } elseif (in_array($ch1, $longtail)) { 
  5197.                                 if ($ch0 == 0x0e31) { 
  5198.                                     // lower left mai hun arkad 
  5199.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf710); 
  5200.                                 } elseif (in_array($ch0, $upvowel)) { 
  5201.                                     // lower left 
  5202.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf701 + $ch0 - 0x0e34)); 
  5203.                                 } elseif ($ch0 == 0x0e47) { 
  5204.                                     // lower left mai tai koo 
  5205.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf712); 
  5206.                                 } else { 
  5207.                                     // normal character 
  5208.                                     $output[] = $ch0; 
  5209.                                 } 
  5210.                             } elseif (in_array($ch1, $lowtail) AND in_array($ch0, $lowvowel)) { 
  5211.                                 // lower vowel 
  5212.                                 $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf718 + $ch0 - 0x0e38)); 
  5213.                             } elseif (($ch0 == 0x0e0d) AND in_array($chn, $lowvowel)) { 
  5214.                                 // yo ying without lower part 
  5215.                                 $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf70f); 
  5216.                             } elseif (($ch0 == 0x0e10) AND in_array($chn, $lowvowel)) { 
  5217.                                 // tho santan without lower part 
  5218.                                 $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf700); 
  5219.                             } else { 
  5220.                                 $output[] = $ch0; 
  5221.                             } 
  5222.                         } else { 
  5223.                             // non-thai character 
  5224.                             $output[] = $unicode[$i]; 
  5225.                         } 
  5226.                     } 
  5227.                     $unicode = $output; 
  5228.                     // update font subsetchars 
  5229.                     $this->setFontSubBuffer($this->CurrentFont['fontkey'], 'subsetchars', $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars']); 
  5230.                 } // end of K_THAI_TOPCHARS 
  5231.                 $txt2 = TCPDF_FONTS::arrUTF8ToUTF16BE($unicode, false); 
  5232.             } 
  5233.         } 
  5234.         $txt2 = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($txt2); 
  5235.         // get current text width (considering general font stretching and spacing) 
  5236.         $txwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  5237.         $width = $txwidth; 
  5238.         // check for stretch mode 
  5239.         if ($stretch > 0) { 
  5240.             // calculate ratio between cell width and text width 
  5241.             if ($width <= 0) { 
  5242.                 $ratio = 1; 
  5243.             } else { 
  5244.                 $ratio = (($w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / $width); 
  5245.             } 
  5246.             // check if stretching is required 
  5247.             if (($ratio < 1) OR (($ratio > 1) AND (($stretch % 2) == 0))) { 
  5248.                 // the text will be stretched to fit cell width 
  5249.                 if ($stretch > 2) { 
  5250.                     // set new character spacing 
  5251.                     $this->font_spacing += ($w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R'] - $width) / (max(($this->GetNumChars($txt) - 1), 1) * ($this->font_stretching / 100)); 
  5252.                 } else { 
  5253.                     // set new horizontal stretching 
  5254.                     $this->font_stretching *= $ratio; 
  5255.                 } 
  5256.                 // recalculate text width (the text fills the entire cell) 
  5257.                 $width = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5258.                 // reset alignment 
  5259.                 $align = ''; 
  5260.             } 
  5261.         } 
  5262.         if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5263.             // apply font stretching 
  5264.             $rs .= sprintf('BT %F Tz ET ', $this->font_stretching); 
  5265.         } 
  5266.         if ($this->font_spacing != 0) { 
  5267.             // increase/decrease font spacing 
  5268.             $rs .= sprintf('BT %F Tc ET ', ($this->font_spacing * $this->k)); 
  5269.         } 
  5270.         if ($this->ColorFlag AND ($this->textrendermode < 4)) { 
  5271.             $s .= 'q '.$this->TextColor.' '; 
  5272.         } 
  5273.         // rendering mode 
  5274.         $s .= sprintf('BT %d Tr %F w ET ', $this->textrendermode, ($this->textstrokewidth * $this->k)); 
  5275.         // count number of spaces 
  5276.         $ns = substr_count($txt, chr(32)); 
  5277.         // Justification 
  5278.         $spacewidth = 0; 
  5279.         if (($align == 'J') AND ($ns > 0)) { 
  5280.             if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  5281.                 // get string width without spaces 
  5282.                 $width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_replace(' ', '', $txt)); 
  5283.                 // calculate average space width 
  5284.                 $spacewidth = -1000 * ($w - $width - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / ($ns?$ns:1) / ($this->FontSize?$this->FontSize:1); 
  5285.                 if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5286.                     // word spacing is affected by stretching 
  5287.                     $spacewidth /= ($this->font_stretching / 100); 
  5288.                 } 
  5289.                 // set word position to be used with TJ operator 
  5290.                 $txt2 = str_replace(chr(0).chr(32), ') '.sprintf('%F', $spacewidth).' (', $txt2); 
  5291.                 $unicode_justification = true; 
  5292.             } else { 
  5293.                 // get string width 
  5294.                 $width = $txwidth; 
  5295.                 // new space width 
  5296.                 $spacewidth = (($w - $width - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / ($ns?$ns:1)) * $this->k; 
  5297.                 if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5298.                     // word spacing (Tw) is affected by stretching 
  5299.                     $spacewidth /= ($this->font_stretching / 100); 
  5300.                 } 
  5301.                 // set word spacing 
  5302.                 $rs .= sprintf('BT %F Tw ET ', $spacewidth); 
  5303.             } 
  5304.             $width = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5305.         } 
  5306.         // replace carriage return characters 
  5307.         $txt2 = str_replace("\r", ' ', $txt2); 
  5308.         switch ($align) { 
  5309.             case 'C': { 
  5310.                 $dx = ($w - $width) / 2; 
  5311.                 break; 
  5312.             } 
  5313.             case 'R': { 
  5314.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5315.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5316.                 } else { 
  5317.                     $dx = $w - $width - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5318.                 } 
  5319.                 break; 
  5320.             } 
  5321.             case 'L': { 
  5322.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5323.                     $dx = $w - $width - $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  5324.                 } else { 
  5325.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  5326.                 } 
  5327.                 break; 
  5328.             } 
  5329.             case 'J': 
  5330.             default: { 
  5331.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5332.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5333.                 } else { 
  5334.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  5335.                 } 
  5336.                 break; 
  5337.             } 
  5338.         } 
  5339.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5340.             $xdx = $x - $dx - $width; 
  5341.         } else { 
  5342.             $xdx = $x + $dx; 
  5343.         } 
  5344.         $xdk = $xdx * $k; 
  5345.         // print text 
  5346.         $s .= sprintf('BT %F %F Td [(%s)] TJ ET', $xdk, (($this->h - $basefonty) * $k), $txt2); 
  5347.         if (isset($uniblock)) { 
  5348.             // print overlapping characters as separate string 
  5349.             $xshift = 0; // horizontal shift 
  5350.             $ty = (($this->h - $basefonty + (0.2 * $this->FontSize)) * $k); 
  5351.             $spw = (($w - $txwidth - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / ($ns?$ns:1)); 
  5352.             foreach ($uniblock as $uk => $uniarr) { 
  5353.                 if (($uk % 2) == 0) { 
  5354.                     // x space to skip 
  5355.                     if ($spacewidth != 0) { 
  5356.                         // justification shift 
  5357.                         $xshift += (count(array_keys($uniarr, 32)) * $spw); 
  5358.                     } 
  5359.                     $xshift += $this->GetArrStringWidth($uniarr); // + shift justification 
  5360.                 } else { 
  5361.                     // character to print 
  5362.                     $topchr = TCPDF_FONTS::arrUTF8ToUTF16BE($uniarr, false); 
  5363.                     $topchr = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($topchr); 
  5364.                     $s .= sprintf(' BT %F %F Td [(%s)] TJ ET', ($xdk + ($xshift * $k)), $ty, $topchr); 
  5365.                 } 
  5366.             } 
  5367.         } 
  5368.         if ($this->underline) { 
  5369.             $s .= ' '.$this->_dounderlinew($xdx, $basefonty, $width); 
  5370.         } 
  5371.         if ($this->linethrough) { 
  5372.             $s .= ' '.$this->_dolinethroughw($xdx, $basefonty, $width); 
  5373.         } 
  5374.         if ($this->overline) { 
  5375.             $s .= ' '.$this->_dooverlinew($xdx, $basefonty, $width); 
  5376.         } 
  5377.         if ($this->ColorFlag AND ($this->textrendermode < 4)) { 
  5378.             $s .= ' Q'; 
  5379.         } 
  5380.         if ($link) { 
  5381.             $this->Link($xdx, $yt, $width, ($this->FontAscent + $this->FontDescent), $link, $ns); 
  5382.         } 
  5383.     } 
  5384.     // output cell 
  5385.     if ($s) { 
  5386.         // output cell 
  5387.         $rs .= $s; 
  5388.         if ($this->font_spacing != 0) { 
  5389.             // reset font spacing mode 
  5390.             $rs .= ' BT 0 Tc ET'; 
  5391.         } 
  5392.         if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5393.             // reset font stretching mode 
  5394.             $rs .= ' BT 100 Tz ET'; 
  5395.         } 
  5396.     } 
  5397.     // reset word spacing 
  5398.     if (!$this->isUnicodeFont() AND ($align == 'J')) { 
  5399.         $rs .= ' BT 0 Tw ET'; 
  5400.     } 
  5401.     // reset stretching and spacing 
  5402.     $this->font_stretching = $prev_font_stretching; 
  5403.     $this->font_spacing = $prev_font_spacing; 
  5404.     $this->lasth = $h; 
  5405.     if ($ln > 0) { 
  5406.         //Go to the beginning of the next line 
  5407.         $this->y = $y + $h + $this->cell_margin['B']; 
  5408.         if ($ln == 1) { 
  5409.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  5410.                 $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  5411.             } else { 
  5412.                 $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  5413.             } 
  5414.         } 
  5415.     } else { 
  5416.         // go left or right by case 
  5417.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5418.             $this->x = $x - $w - $this->cell_margin['L']; 
  5419.         } else { 
  5420.             $this->x = $x + $w + $this->cell_margin['R']; 
  5421.         } 
  5422.     } 
  5423.     $gstyles = ''.$this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor.' '.$this->FillColor."\n"; 
  5424.     $rs = $gstyles.$rs; 
  5425.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  5426.     $this->cell_margin = $prev_cell_margin; 
  5427.     return $rs; 
  5428. } 
  5429.  
  5430. /** 
  5431.  * Replace a char if is defined on the current font. 
  5432.  * @param $oldchar (int) Integer code (unicode) of the character to replace. 
  5433.  * @param $newchar (int) Integer code (unicode) of the new character. 
  5434.  * @return int the replaced char or the old char in case the new char i not defined 
  5435.  * @protected 
  5436.  * @since 5.9.167 (2012-06-22) 
  5437.  */ 
  5438. protected function replaceChar($oldchar, $newchar) { 
  5439.     if ($this->isCharDefined($newchar)) { 
  5440.         // add the new char on the subset list 
  5441.         $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'][$newchar] = true; 
  5442.         // return the new character 
  5443.         return $newchar; 
  5444.     } 
  5445.     // return the old char 
  5446.     return $oldchar; 
  5447. } 
  5448.  
  5449. /** 
  5450.  * Returns the code to draw the cell border 
  5451.  * @param $x (float) X coordinate. 
  5452.  * @param $y (float) Y coordinate. 
  5453.  * @param $w (float) Cell width. 
  5454.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. 
  5455.  * @param $brd (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  5456.  * @return string containing cell border code 
  5457.  * @protected 
  5458.  * @see SetLineStyle() 
  5459.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-02) 
  5460.  */ 
  5461. protected function getCellBorder($x, $y, $w, $h, $brd) { 
  5462.     $s = ''; // string to be returned 
  5463.     if (empty($brd)) { 
  5464.         return $s; 
  5465.     } 
  5466.     if ($brd == 1) { 
  5467.         $brd = array('LRTB' => true); 
  5468.     } 
  5469.     // calculate coordinates for border 
  5470.     $k = $this->k; 
  5471.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  5472.         $xeL = ($x - $w) * $k; 
  5473.         $xeR = $x * $k; 
  5474.     } else { 
  5475.         $xeL = $x * $k; 
  5476.         $xeR = ($x + $w) * $k; 
  5477.     } 
  5478.     $yeL = (($this->h - ($y + $h)) * $k); 
  5479.     $yeT = (($this->h - $y) * $k); 
  5480.     $xeT = $xeL; 
  5481.     $xeB = $xeR; 
  5482.     $yeR = $yeT; 
  5483.     $yeB = $yeL; 
  5484.     if (is_string($brd)) { 
  5485.         // convert string to array 
  5486.         $slen = strlen($brd); 
  5487.         $newbrd = array(); 
  5488.         for ($i = 0; $i < $slen; ++$i) { 
  5489.             $newbrd[$brd[$i]] = array('cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter'); 
  5490.         } 
  5491.         $brd = $newbrd; 
  5492.     } 
  5493.     if (isset($brd['mode'])) { 
  5494.         $mode = $brd['mode']; 
  5495.         unset($brd['mode']); 
  5496.     } else { 
  5497.         $mode = 'normal'; 
  5498.     } 
  5499.     foreach ($brd as $border => $style) { 
  5500.         if (is_array($style) AND !empty($style)) { 
  5501.             // apply border style 
  5502.             $prev_style = $this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor.' '; 
  5503.             $s .= $this->SetLineStyle($style, true)."\n"; 
  5504.         } 
  5505.         switch ($mode) { 
  5506.             case 'ext': { 
  5507.                 $off = (($this->LineWidth / 2) * $k); 
  5508.                 $xL = $xeL - $off; 
  5509.                 $xR = $xeR + $off; 
  5510.                 $yT = $yeT + $off; 
  5511.                 $yL = $yeL - $off; 
  5512.                 $xT = $xL; 
  5513.                 $xB = $xR; 
  5514.                 $yR = $yT; 
  5515.                 $yB = $yL; 
  5516.                 $w += $this->LineWidth; 
  5517.                 $h += $this->LineWidth; 
  5518.                 break; 
  5519.             } 
  5520.             case 'int': { 
  5521.                 $off = ($this->LineWidth / 2) * $k; 
  5522.                 $xL = $xeL + $off; 
  5523.                 $xR = $xeR - $off; 
  5524.                 $yT = $yeT - $off; 
  5525.                 $yL = $yeL + $off; 
  5526.                 $xT = $xL; 
  5527.                 $xB = $xR; 
  5528.                 $yR = $yT; 
  5529.                 $yB = $yL; 
  5530.                 $w -= $this->LineWidth; 
  5531.                 $h -= $this->LineWidth; 
  5532.                 break; 
  5533.             } 
  5534.             case 'normal': 
  5535.             default: { 
  5536.                 $xL = $xeL; 
  5537.                 $xT = $xeT; 
  5538.                 $xB = $xeB; 
  5539.                 $xR = $xeR; 
  5540.                 $yL = $yeL; 
  5541.                 $yT = $yeT; 
  5542.                 $yB = $yeB; 
  5543.                 $yR = $yeR; 
  5544.                 break; 
  5545.             } 
  5546.         } 
  5547.         // draw borders by case 
  5548.         if (strlen($border) == 4) { 
  5549.             $s .= sprintf('%F %F %F %F re S ', $xT, $yT, ($w * $k), (-$h * $k)); 
  5550.         } elseif (strlen($border) == 3) { 
  5551.             if (strpos($border, 'B') === false) { // LTR 
  5552.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5553.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5554.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5555.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5556.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5557.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'L') === false) { // TRB 
  5558.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5559.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5560.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5561.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5562.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5563.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'T') === false) { // RBL 
  5564.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5565.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5566.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5567.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5568.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5569.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'R') === false) { // BLT 
  5570.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5571.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5572.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5573.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5574.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5575.             } 
  5576.         } elseif (strlen($border) == 2) { 
  5577.             if ((strpos($border, 'L') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'T') !== false)) { // LT 
  5578.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5579.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5580.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5581.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5582.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'T') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'R') !== false)) { // TR 
  5583.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5584.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5585.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5586.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5587.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'R') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'B') !== false)) { // RB 
  5588.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5589.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5590.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5591.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5592.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'B') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'L') !== false)) { // BL 
  5593.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5594.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5595.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5596.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5597.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'L') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'R') !== false)) { // LR 
  5598.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5599.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5600.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5601.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5602.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5603.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5604.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'T') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'B') !== false)) { // TB 
  5605.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5606.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5607.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5608.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5609.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5610.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5611.             } 
  5612.         } else { // strlen($border) == 1 
  5613.             if (strpos($border, 'L') !== false) { // L 
  5614.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5615.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5616.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5617.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'T') !== false) { // T 
  5618.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5619.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5620.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5621.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'R') !== false) { // R 
  5622.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5623.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5624.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5625.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'B') !== false) { // B 
  5626.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5627.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5628.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5629.             } 
  5630.         } 
  5631.         if (is_array($style) AND !empty($style)) { 
  5632.             // reset border style to previous value 
  5633.             $s .= "\n".$this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor."\n"; 
  5634.         } 
  5635.     } 
  5636.     return $s; 
  5637. } 
  5638.  
  5639. /** 
  5640.  * This method allows printing text with line breaks. 
  5641.  * They can be automatic (as soon as the text reaches the right border of the cell) or explicit (via the \n character). As many cells as necessary are output, one below the other.<br /> 
  5642.  * Text can be aligned, centered or justified. The cell block can be framed and the background painted. 
  5643.  * @param $w (float) Width of cells. If 0, they extend up to the right margin of the page. 
  5644.  * @param $h (float) Cell minimum height. The cell extends automatically if needed. 
  5645.  * @param $txt (string) String to print 
  5646.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  5647.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justification (default value when $ishtml=false)</li></ul> 
  5648.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  5649.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line [DEFAULT]</li><li>2: below</li></ul> 
  5650.  * @param $x (float) x position in user units 
  5651.  * @param $y (float) y position in user units 
  5652.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default true). 
  5653.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  5654.  * @param $ishtml (boolean) INTERNAL USE ONLY -- set to true if $txt is HTML content (default = false). Never set this parameter to true, use instead writeHTMLCell() or writeHTML() methods. 
  5655.  * @param $autopadding (boolean) if true, uses internal padding and automatically adjust it to account for line width. 
  5656.  * @param $maxh (float) maximum height. It should be >= $h and less then remaining space to the bottom of the page, or 0 for disable this feature. This feature works only when $ishtml=false. 
  5657.  * @param $valign (string) Vertical alignment of text (requires $maxh = $h > 0). Possible values are:<ul><li>T: TOP</li><li>M: middle</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul>. This feature works only when $ishtml=false and the cell must fit in a single page. 
  5658.  * @param $fitcell (boolean) if true attempt to fit all the text within the cell by reducing the font size (do not work in HTML mode). $maxh must be greater than 0 and wqual to $h. 
  5659.  * @return int Return the number of cells or 1 for html mode. 
  5660.  * @public 
  5661.  * @since 1.3 
  5662.  * @see SetFont(), SetDrawColor(), SetFillColor(), SetTextColor(), SetLineWidth(), Cell(), Write(), SetAutoPageBreak() 
  5663.  */ 
  5664. public function MultiCell($w, $h, $txt, $border=0, $align='J', $fill=false, $ln=1, $x='', $y='', $reseth=true, $stretch=0, $ishtml=false, $autopadding=true, $maxh=0, $valign='T', $fitcell=false) { 
  5665.     $prev_cell_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  5666.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  5667.     // adjust internal padding 
  5668.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  5669.     $mc_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  5670.     $mc_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  5671.     $this->cell_padding['T'] = 0; 
  5672.     $this->cell_padding['B'] = 0; 
  5673.     $this->setCellMargins(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  5674.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lasth) OR $reseth) { 
  5675.         // reset row height 
  5676.         $this->resetLastH(); 
  5677.     } 
  5678.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($y)) { 
  5679.         $this->SetY($y); 
  5680.     } else { 
  5681.         $y = $this->GetY(); 
  5682.     } 
  5683.     $resth = 0; 
  5684.     if (($h > 0) AND $this->inPageBody() AND (($y + $h + $mc_margin['T'] + $mc_margin['B']) > $this->PageBreakTrigger)) { 
  5685.         // spit cell in more pages/columns 
  5686.         $newh = ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $y); 
  5687.         $resth = ($h - $newh); // cell to be printed on the next page/column 
  5688.         $h = $newh; 
  5689.     } 
  5690.     // get current page number 
  5691.     $startpage = $this->page; 
  5692.     // get current column 
  5693.     $startcolumn = $this->current_column; 
  5694.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($x)) { 
  5695.         $this->SetX($x); 
  5696.     } else { 
  5697.         $x = $this->GetX(); 
  5698.     } 
  5699.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  5700.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions(0, $x, $y); 
  5701.     // apply margins 
  5702.     $oy = $y + $mc_margin['T']; 
  5703.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  5704.         $ox = ($this->w - $x - $mc_margin['R']); 
  5705.     } else { 
  5706.         $ox = ($x + $mc_margin['L']); 
  5707.     } 
  5708.     $this->x = $ox; 
  5709.     $this->y = $oy; 
  5710.     // set width 
  5711.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($w) OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  5712.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5713.             $w = ($this->x - $this->lMargin - $mc_margin['L']); 
  5714.         } else { 
  5715.             $w = ($this->w - $this->x - $this->rMargin - $mc_margin['R']); 
  5716.         } 
  5717.     } 
  5718.     // store original margin values 
  5719.     $lMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  5720.     $rMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  5721.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  5722.         $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $this->x); 
  5723.         $this->lMargin = ($this->x - $w); 
  5724.     } else { 
  5725.         $this->lMargin = ($this->x); 
  5726.         $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $this->x - $w); 
  5727.     } 
  5728.     $this->clMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  5729.     $this->crMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  5730.     if ($autopadding) { 
  5731.         // add top padding 
  5732.         $this->y += $mc_padding['T']; 
  5733.     } 
  5734.     if ($ishtml) { // ******* Write HTML text 
  5735.         $this->writeHTML($txt, true, false, $reseth, true, $align); 
  5736.         $nl = 1; 
  5737.     } else { // ******* Write simple text 
  5738.         $prev_FontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  5739.         if ($fitcell) { 
  5740.             // ajust height values 
  5741.             $tobottom = ($this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin - $this->cell_padding['T'] - $this->cell_padding['B']); 
  5742.             $h = $maxh = max(min($h, $tobottom), min($maxh, $tobottom)); 
  5743.         } 
  5744.         // vertical alignment 
  5745.         if ($maxh > 0) { 
  5746.             // get text height 
  5747.             $text_height = $this->getStringHeight($w, $txt, $reseth, $autopadding, $mc_padding, $border); 
  5748.             if ($fitcell) { 
  5749.                 // try to reduce font size to fit text on cell (use a quick search algorithm) 
  5750.                 $fmin = 1; 
  5751.                 $fmax = $this->FontSizePt; 
  5752.                 $diff_epsilon = (1 / $this->k); // one point (min resolution) 
  5753.                 $maxit = (2 * intval($fmax)); // max number of iterations 
  5754.                 while ($maxit > 0) { 
  5755.                     $fmid = (($fmax + $fmin) / 2); 
  5756.                     $this->SetFontSize($fmid, false); 
  5757.                     $this->resetLastH(); 
  5758.                     $text_height = $this->getStringHeight($w, $txt, $reseth, $autopadding, $mc_padding, $border); 
  5759.                     $diff = ($maxh - $text_height); 
  5760.                     if ($diff >= 0) { 
  5761.                         if ($diff < $diff_epsilon) { 
  5762.                             break; 
  5763.                         } 
  5764.                         $fmin = $fmid; 
  5765.                     } else { 
  5766.                         $fmax = $fmid; 
  5767.                     } 
  5768.                     --$maxit; 
  5769.                 } 
  5770.                 if ($maxit <= 0) { 
  5771.                     $fmid = $fmin; 
  5772.                 } 
  5773.                 $this->SetFontSize($fmid); 
  5774.             } 
  5775.             if ($text_height < $maxh) { 
  5776.                 if ($valign == 'M') { 
  5777.                     // text vertically centered 
  5778.                     $this->y += (($maxh - $text_height) / 2); 
  5779.                 } elseif ($valign == 'B') { 
  5780.                     // text vertically aligned on bottom 
  5781.                     $this->y += ($maxh - $text_height); 
  5782.                 } 
  5783.             } 
  5784.         } 
  5785.         $nl = $this->Write($this->lasth, $txt, '', 0, $align, true, $stretch, false, true, $maxh, 0, $mc_margin); 
  5786.         if ($fitcell) { 
  5787.             // restore font size 
  5788.             $this->SetFontSize($prev_FontSizePt); 
  5789.         } 
  5790.     } 
  5791.     if ($autopadding) { 
  5792.         // add bottom padding 
  5793.         $this->y += $mc_padding['B']; 
  5794.     } 
  5795.     // Get end-of-text Y position 
  5796.     $currentY = $this->y; 
  5797.     // get latest page number 
  5798.     $endpage = $this->page; 
  5799.     if ($resth > 0) { 
  5800.         $skip = ($endpage - $startpage); 
  5801.         $tmpresth = $resth; 
  5802.         while ($tmpresth > 0) { 
  5803.             if ($skip <= 0) { 
  5804.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  5805.                 $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  5806.             } 
  5807.             if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  5808.                 $tmpresth -= ($this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin); 
  5809.             } else { 
  5810.                 $tmpresth -= ($this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin); 
  5811.             } 
  5812.             --$skip; 
  5813.         } 
  5814.         $currentY = $this->y; 
  5815.         $endpage = $this->page; 
  5816.     } 
  5817.     // get latest column 
  5818.     $endcolumn = $this->current_column; 
  5819.     if ($this->num_columns == 0) { 
  5820.         $this->num_columns = 1; 
  5821.     } 
  5822.     // disable page regions check 
  5823.     $check_page_regions = $this->check_page_regions; 
  5824.     $this->check_page_regions = false; 
  5825.     // get border modes 
  5826.     $border_start = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='start', $this->opencell); 
  5827.     $border_end = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='end', $this->opencell); 
  5828.     $border_middle = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  5829.     // design borders around HTML cells. 
  5830.     for ($page = $startpage; $page <= $endpage; ++$page) { // for each page 
  5831.         $ccode = ''; 
  5832.         $this->setPage($page); 
  5833.         if ($this->num_columns < 2) { 
  5834.             // single-column mode 
  5835.             $this->SetX($x); 
  5836.             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  5837.         } 
  5838.         // account for margin changes 
  5839.         if ($page > $startpage) { 
  5840.             if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  5841.                 $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  5842.             } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  5843.                 $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  5844.             } 
  5845.         } 
  5846.         if ($startpage == $endpage) { 
  5847.             // single page 
  5848.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5849.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5850.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5851.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5852.                 } else { 
  5853.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5854.                 } 
  5855.                 if ($startcolumn == $endcolumn) { // single column 
  5856.                     $cborder = $border; 
  5857.                     $h = max($h, ($currentY - $oy)); 
  5858.                     $this->y = $oy; 
  5859.                 } elseif ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  5860.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  5861.                     $this->y = $oy; 
  5862.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5863.                 } elseif ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  5864.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  5865.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  5866.                     if ($resth > $h) { 
  5867.                         $h = $resth; 
  5868.                     } 
  5869.                 } else { // middle column 
  5870.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5871.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5872.                     $resth -= $h; 
  5873.                 } 
  5874.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5875.             } // end for each column 
  5876.         } elseif ($page == $startpage) { // first page 
  5877.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5878.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5879.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5880.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5881.                 } else { 
  5882.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5883.                 } 
  5884.                 if ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  5885.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  5886.                     $this->y = $oy; 
  5887.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5888.                 } else { // middle column 
  5889.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5890.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5891.                     $resth -= $h; 
  5892.                 } 
  5893.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5894.             } // end for each column 
  5895.         } elseif ($page == $endpage) { // last page 
  5896.             for ($column = 0; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5897.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5898.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5899.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5900.                 } else { 
  5901.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5902.                 } 
  5903.                 if ($column == $endcolumn) { 
  5904.                     // end column 
  5905.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  5906.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  5907.                     if ($resth > $h) { 
  5908.                         $h = $resth; 
  5909.                     } 
  5910.                 } else { 
  5911.                     // middle column 
  5912.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5913.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5914.                     $resth -= $h; 
  5915.                 } 
  5916.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5917.             } // end for each column 
  5918.         } else { // middle page 
  5919.             for ($column = 0; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5920.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5921.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5922.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5923.                 } else { 
  5924.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5925.                 } 
  5926.                 $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5927.                 $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5928.                 $resth -= $h; 
  5929.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5930.             } // end for each column 
  5931.         } 
  5932.         if ($cborder OR $fill) { 
  5933.             $offsetlen = strlen($ccode); 
  5934.             // draw border and fill 
  5935.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  5936.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  5937.                 if (end($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']) !== false) { 
  5938.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  5939.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey]; 
  5940.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  5941.                 } else { 
  5942.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk']; 
  5943.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] += $offsetlen; 
  5944.                 } 
  5945.                 $pagebuff = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']; 
  5946.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  5947.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  5948.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$ccode.$pend; 
  5949.             } else { 
  5950.                 if (end($this->transfmrk[$this->page]) !== false) { 
  5951.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  5952.                     $pagemark = $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey]; 
  5953.                     $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  5954.                 } elseif ($this->InFooter) { 
  5955.                     $pagemark = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  5956.                     $this->footerpos[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  5957.                 } else { 
  5958.                     $pagemark = $this->intmrk[$this->page]; 
  5959.                     $this->intmrk[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  5960.                 } 
  5961.                 $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  5962.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  5963.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  5964.                 $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $pstart.$ccode.$pend); 
  5965.             } 
  5966.         } 
  5967.     } // end for each page 
  5968.     // restore page regions check 
  5969.     $this->check_page_regions = $check_page_regions; 
  5970.     // Get end-of-cell Y position 
  5971.     $currentY = $this->GetY(); 
  5972.     // restore previous values 
  5973.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  5974.         $this->selectColumn(); 
  5975.     } else { 
  5976.         // restore original margins 
  5977.         $this->lMargin = $lMargin; 
  5978.         $this->rMargin = $rMargin; 
  5979.         if ($this->page > $startpage) { 
  5980.             // check for margin variations between pages (i.e. booklet mode) 
  5981.             $dl = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  5982.             $dr = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  5983.             if (($dl != 0) OR ($dr != 0)) { 
  5984.                 $this->lMargin += $dl; 
  5985.                 $this->rMargin += $dr; 
  5986.             } 
  5987.         } 
  5988.     } 
  5989.     if ($ln > 0) { 
  5990.         //Go to the beginning of the next line 
  5991.         $this->SetY($currentY + $mc_margin['B']); 
  5992.         if ($ln == 2) { 
  5993.             $this->SetX($x + $w + $mc_margin['L'] + $mc_margin['R']); 
  5994.         } 
  5995.     } else { 
  5996.         // go left or right by case 
  5997.         $this->setPage($startpage); 
  5998.         $this->y = $y; 
  5999.         $this->SetX($x + $w + $mc_margin['L'] + $mc_margin['R']); 
  6000.     } 
  6001.     $this->setContentMark(); 
  6002.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  6003.     $this->cell_margin = $prev_cell_margin; 
  6004.     $this->clMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  6005.     $this->crMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  6006.     return $nl; 
  6007. } 
  6008.  
  6009. /** 
  6010.  * This method return the estimated number of lines for print a simple text string using Multicell() method. 
  6011.  * @param $txt (string) String for calculating his height
