  6012.  * @param $w (float) Width of cells. If 0, they extend up to the right margin of the page. 
  6013.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default false). 
  6014.  * @param $autopadding (boolean) if true, uses internal padding and automatically adjust it to account for line width (default true). 
  6015.  * @param $cellpadding (float) Internal cell padding, if empty uses default cell padding. 
  6016.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  6017.  * @return float Return the minimal height needed for multicell method for printing the $txt param. 
  6018.  * @author Alexander Escalona Fern\E1ndez, Nicola Asuni 
  6019.  * @public 
  6020.  * @since 4.5.011 
  6021.  */ 
  6022. public function getNumLines($txt, $w=0, $reseth=false, $autopadding=true, $cellpadding='', $border=0) { 
  6023.     if ($txt === NULL) { 
  6024.         return 0; 
  6025.     } 
  6026.     if ($txt === '') { 
  6027.         // empty string 
  6028.         return 1; 
  6029.     } 
  6030.     // adjust internal padding 
  6031.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6032.     $prev_lasth = $this->lasth; 
  6033.     if (is_array($cellpadding)) { 
  6034.         $this->cell_padding = $cellpadding; 
  6035.     } 
  6036.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  6037.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($w) OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  6038.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  6039.             $w = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  6040.         } else { 
  6041.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  6042.         } 
  6043.     } 
  6044.     $wmax = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  6045.     if ($reseth) { 
  6046.         // reset row height 
  6047.         $this->resetLastH(); 
  6048.     } 
  6049.     $lines = 1; 
  6050.     $sum = 0; 
  6051.     $chars = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($txt, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont), $txt, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6052.     $charsWidth = $this->GetArrStringWidth($chars, '', '', 0, true); 
  6053.     $length = count($chars); 
  6054.     $lastSeparator = -1; 
  6055.     for ($i = 0; $i < $length; ++$i) { 
  6056.         $c = $chars[$i]; 
  6057.         $charWidth = $charsWidth[$i]; 
  6058.         if (($c != 160) 
  6059.                 AND (($c == 173) 
  6060.                     OR preg_match($this->re_spaces, TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($c, $this->isunicode)) 
  6061.                     OR (($c == 45) 
  6062.                         AND ($i > 0) AND ($i < ($length - 1)) 
  6063.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($chars[($i - 1)], $this->isunicode)) 
  6064.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($chars[($i + 1)], $this->isunicode)) 
  6065.  ) 
  6066.  ) 
  6067.  ) { 
  6068.             $lastSeparator = $i; 
  6069.         } 
  6070.         if ((($sum + $charWidth) > $wmax) OR ($c == 10)) { 
  6071.             ++$lines; 
  6072.             if ($c == 10) { 
  6073.                 $lastSeparator = -1; 
  6074.                 $sum = 0; 
  6075.             } elseif ($lastSeparator != -1) { 
  6076.                 $i = $lastSeparator; 
  6077.                 $lastSeparator = -1; 
  6078.                 $sum = 0; 
  6079.             } else { 
  6080.                 $sum = $charWidth; 
  6081.             } 
  6082.         } else { 
  6083.             $sum += $charWidth; 
  6084.         } 
  6085.     } 
  6086.     if ($chars[($length - 1)] == 10) { 
  6087.         --$lines; 
  6088.     } 
  6089.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  6090.     $this->lasth = $prev_lasth; 
  6091.     return $lines; 
  6092. } 
  6093.  
  6094. /** 
  6095.  * This method return the estimated height needed for printing a simple text string using the Multicell() method. 
  6096.  * Generally, if you want to know the exact height for a block of content you can use the following alternative technique: 
  6097.  * @pre 
  6098.  *  // store current object 
  6099.  *  $pdf->startTransaction(); 
  6100.  *  // store starting values 
  6101.  *  $start_y = $pdf->GetY(); 
  6102.  *  $start_page = $pdf->getPage(); 
  6103.  *  // call your printing functions with your parameters 
  6104.  *  // - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
  6105.  *  $pdf->MultiCell($w=0, $h=0, $txt, $border=1, $align='L', $fill=false, $ln=1, $x='', $y='', $reseth=true, $stretch=0, $ishtml=false, $autopadding=true, $maxh=0); 
  6106.  *  // - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
  6107.  *  // get the new Y 
  6108.  *  $end_y = $pdf->GetY(); 
  6109.  *  $end_page = $pdf->getPage(); 
  6110.  *  // calculate height 
  6111.  *  $height = 0; 
  6112.  *  if ($end_page == $start_page) { 
  6113.  *      $height = $end_y - $start_y; 
  6114.  *  } else { 
  6115.  *      for ($page=$start_page; $page <= $end_page; ++$page) { 
  6116.  *          $this->setPage($page); 
  6117.  *          if ($page == $start_page) { 
  6118.  *              // first page 
  6119.  *              $height = $this->h - $start_y - $this->bMargin; 
  6120.  *          } elseif ($page == $end_page) { 
  6121.  *              // last page 
  6122.  *              $height = $end_y - $this->tMargin; 
  6123.  *          } else { 
  6124.  *              $height = $this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin; 
  6125.  *          } 
  6126.  *      } 
  6127.  *  } 
  6128.  *  // restore previous object 
  6129.  *  $pdf = $pdf->rollbackTransaction(); 
  6130.  * 
  6131.  * @param $w (float) Width of cells. If 0, they extend up to the right margin of the page. 
  6132.  * @param $txt (string) String for calculating his height 
  6133.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default false). 
  6134.  * @param $autopadding (boolean) if true, uses internal padding and automatically adjust it to account for line width (default true). 
  6135.  * @param $cellpadding (float) Internal cell padding, if empty uses default cell padding. 
  6136.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  6137.  * @return float Return the minimal height needed for multicell method for printing the $txt param. 
  6138.  * @author Nicola Asuni, Alexander Escalona Fern\E1ndez 
  6139.  * @public 
  6140.  */ 
  6141. public function getStringHeight($w, $txt, $reseth=false, $autopadding=true, $cellpadding='', $border=0) { 
  6142.     // adjust internal padding 
  6143.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6144.     $prev_lasth = $this->lasth; 
  6145.     if (is_array($cellpadding)) { 
  6146.         $this->cell_padding = $cellpadding; 
  6147.     } 
  6148.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  6149.     $lines = $this->getNumLines($txt, $w, $reseth, $autopadding, $cellpadding, $border); 
  6150.     $height = $this->getCellHeight(($lines * $this->FontSize), $autopadding); 
  6151.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  6152.     $this->lasth = $prev_lasth; 
  6153.     return $height; 
  6154. } 
  6155.  
  6156. /** 
  6157.  * This method prints text from the current position.<br /> 
  6158.  * @param $h (float) Line height 
  6159.  * @param $txt (string) String to print 
  6160.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink() 
  6161.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  6162.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  6163.  * @param $ln (boolean) if true set cursor at the bottom of the line, otherwise set cursor at the top of the line. 
  6164.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  6165.  * @param $firstline (boolean) if true prints only the first line and return the remaining string. 
  6166.  * @param $firstblock (boolean) if true the string is the starting of a line. 
  6167.  * @param $maxh (float) maximum height. It should be >= $h and less then remaining space to the bottom of the page, or 0 for disable this feature. 
  6168.  * @param $wadj (float) first line width will be reduced by this amount (used in HTML mode). 
  6169.  * @param $margin (array) margin array of the parent container 
  6170.  * @return mixed Return the number of cells or the remaining string if $firstline = true. 
  6171.  * @public 
  6172.  * @since 1.5 
  6173.  */ 
  6174. public function Write($h, $txt, $link='', $fill=false, $align='', $ln=false, $stretch=0, $firstline=false, $firstblock=false, $maxh=0, $wadj=0, $margin='') { 
  6175.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  6176.     list($this->x, $this->y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $this->x, $this->y); 
  6177.     if (strlen($txt) == 0) { 
  6178.         // fix empty text 
  6179.         $txt = ' '; 
  6180.     } 
  6181.     if ($margin === '') { 
  6182.         // set default margins 
  6183.         $margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  6184.     } 
  6185.     // remove carriage returns 
  6186.     $s = str_replace("\r", '', $txt); 
  6187.     // check if string contains arabic text 
  6188.     if (preg_match(TCPDF_FONT_DATA::$uni_RE_PATTERN_ARABIC, $s)) { 
  6189.         $arabic = true; 
  6190.     } else { 
  6191.         $arabic = false; 
  6192.     } 
  6193.     // check if string contains RTL text 
  6194.     if ($arabic OR ($this->tmprtl == 'R') OR preg_match(TCPDF_FONT_DATA::$uni_RE_PATTERN_RTL, $s)) { 
  6195.         $rtlmode = true; 
  6196.     } else { 
  6197.         $rtlmode = false; 
  6198.     } 
  6199.     // get a char width 
  6200.     $chrwidth = $this->GetCharWidth(46); // dot character 
  6201.     // get array of unicode values 
  6202.     $chars = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($s, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6203.     // calculate maximum width for a single character on string 
  6204.     $chrw = $this->GetArrStringWidth($chars, '', '', 0, true); 
  6205.     array_walk($chrw, array($this, 'getRawCharWidth')); 
  6206.     $maxchwidth = max($chrw); 
  6207.     // get array of chars 
  6208.     $uchars = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrayToUniArray($chars, $this->isunicode); 
  6209.     // get the number of characters 
  6210.     $nb = count($chars); 
  6211.     // replacement for SHY character (minus symbol) 
  6212.     $shy_replacement = 45; 
  6213.     $shy_replacement_char = TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($shy_replacement, $this->isunicode); 
  6214.     // widht for SHY replacement 
  6215.     $shy_replacement_width = $this->GetCharWidth($shy_replacement); 
  6216.     // max Y 
  6217.     $maxy = $this->y + $maxh - $h - $this->cell_padding['T'] - $this->cell_padding['B']; 
  6218.     // page width 
  6219.     $pw = $w = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  6220.     // calculate remaining line width ($w) 
  6221.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6222.         $w = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  6223.     } else { 
  6224.         $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  6225.     } 
  6226.     // max column width 
  6227.     $wmax = ($w - $wadj); 
  6228.     if (!$firstline) { 
  6229.         $wmax -= ($this->cell_padding['L'] + $this->cell_padding['R']); 
  6230.     } 
  6231.     if ((!$firstline) AND (($chrwidth > $wmax) OR ($maxchwidth > $wmax))) { 
  6232.         // the maximum width character do not fit on column 
  6233.         return ''; 
  6234.     } 
  6235.     // minimum row height 
  6236.     $row_height = max($h, $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize)); 
  6237.     $start_page = $this->page; 
  6238.     $i = 0; // character position 
  6239.     $j = 0; // current starting position 
  6240.     $sep = -1; // position of the last blank space 
  6241.     $prevsep = $sep; // previous separator 
  6242.     $shy = false; // true if the last blank is a soft hypen (SHY) 
  6243.     $l = 0; // current string length 
  6244.     $nl = 0; //number of lines 
  6245.     $linebreak = false; 
  6246.     $pc = 0; // previous character 
  6247.     // for each character 
  6248.     while ($i < $nb) { 
  6249.         if (($maxh > 0) AND ($this->y >= $maxy) ) { 
  6250.             break; 
  6251.         } 
  6252.         //Get the current character 
  6253.         $c = $chars[$i]; 
  6254.         if ($c == 10) { // 10 = "\n" = new line 
  6255.             //Explicit line break 
  6256.             if ($align == 'J') { 
  6257.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6258.                     $talign = 'R'; 
  6259.                 } else { 
  6260.                     $talign = 'L'; 
  6261.                 } 
  6262.             } else { 
  6263.                 $talign = $align; 
  6264.             } 
  6265.             $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $i); 
  6266.             if ($firstline) { 
  6267.                 $startx = $this->x; 
  6268.                 $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)); 
  6269.                 if ($rtlmode) { 
  6270.                     $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6271.                 } 
  6272.                 $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6273.                 unset($tmparr); 
  6274.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6275.                     $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew; 
  6276.                 } else { 
  6277.                     $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew; 
  6278.                 } 
  6279.                 $w = $linew; 
  6280.                 $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6281.                 if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6282.                     $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6283.                 } 
  6284.             } 
  6285.             if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6286.                 $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6287.             } 
  6288.             // Skip newlines at the begining of a page or column 
  6289.             if (!empty($tmpstr) OR ($this->y < ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $row_height))) { 
  6290.                 $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, 1, $talign, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6291.             } 
  6292.             unset($tmpstr); 
  6293.             if ($firstline) { 
  6294.                 $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6295.                 return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $i)); 
  6296.             } 
  6297.             ++$nl; 
  6298.             $j = $i + 1; 
  6299.             $l = 0; 
  6300.             $sep = -1; 
  6301.             $prevsep = $sep; 
  6302.             $shy = false; 
  6303.             // account for margin changes 
  6304.             if ((($this->y + $this->lasth) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) AND ($this->inPageBody())) { 
  6305.                 $this->AcceptPageBreak(); 
  6306.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6307.                     $this->x -= $margin['R']; 
  6308.                 } else { 
  6309.                     $this->x += $margin['L']; 
  6310.                 } 
  6311.                 $this->lMargin += $margin['L']; 
  6312.                 $this->rMargin += $margin['R']; 
  6313.             } 
  6314.             $w = $this->getRemainingWidth(); 
  6315.             $wmax = ($w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']); 
  6316.         } else { 
  6317.             // 160 is the non-breaking space. 
  6318.             // 173 is SHY (Soft Hypen). 
  6319.             // \p{Z} or \p{Separator}: any kind of Unicode whitespace or invisible separator. 
  6320.             // \p{Lo} or \p{Other_Letter}: a Unicode letter or ideograph that does not have lowercase and uppercase variants. 
  6321.             // \p{Lo} is needed because Chinese characters are packed next to each other without spaces in between. 
  6322.             if (($c != 160) 
  6323.                 AND (($c == 173) 
  6324.                     OR preg_match($this->re_spaces, TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($c, $this->isunicode)) 
  6325.                     OR (($c == 45) 
  6326.                         AND ($i < ($nb - 1)) 
  6327.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($pc, $this->isunicode)) 
  6328.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($chars[($i + 1)], $this->isunicode)) 
  6329.  ) 
  6330.  ) 
  6331.  ) { 
  6332.                 // update last blank space position 
  6333.                 $prevsep = $sep; 
  6334.                 $sep = $i; 
  6335.                 // check if is a SHY 
  6336.                 if (($c == 173) OR ($c == 45)) { 
  6337.                     $shy = true; 
  6338.                     if ($pc == 45) { 
  6339.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_width = 0; 
  6340.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_char = ''; 
  6341.                     } else { 
  6342.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_width = $shy_replacement_width; 
  6343.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_char = $shy_replacement_char; 
  6344.                     } 
  6345.                 } else { 
  6346.                     $shy = false; 
  6347.                 } 
  6348.             } 
  6349.             // update string length 
  6350.             if ($this->isUnicodeFont() AND ($arabic)) { 
  6351.                 // with bidirectional algorithm some chars may be changed affecting the line length 
  6352.                 // *** very slow *** 
  6353.                 $l = $this->GetArrStringWidth(TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi(array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)), '', $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  6354.             } else { 
  6355.                 $l += $this->GetCharWidth($c); 
  6356.             } 
  6357.             if (($l > $wmax) OR (($c == 173) AND (($l + $tmp_shy_replacement_width) >= $wmax))) { 
  6358.                 if (($c == 173) AND (($l + $tmp_shy_replacement_width) > $wmax)) { 
  6359.                     $sep = $prevsep; 
  6360.                 } 
  6361.                 // we have reached the end of column 
  6362.                 if ($sep == -1) { 
  6363.                     // check if the line was already started 
  6364.                     if (($this->rtl AND ($this->x <= ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->cell_padding['R'] - $margin['R'] - $chrwidth))) 
  6365.                         OR ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->x >= ($this->lMargin + $this->cell_padding['L'] + $margin['L'] + $chrwidth)))) { 
  6366.                         // print a void cell and go to next line 
  6367.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, '', 0, 1); 
  6368.                         $linebreak = true; 
  6369.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6370.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j)); 
  6371.                         } 
  6372.                     } else { 
  6373.                         // truncate the word because do not fit on column 
  6374.                         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $i); 
  6375.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6376.                             $startx = $this->x; 
  6377.                             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)); 
  6378.                             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6379.                                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6380.                             } 
  6381.                             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6382.                             unset($tmparr); 
  6383.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6384.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew; 
  6385.                             } else { 
  6386.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew; 
  6387.                             } 
  6388.                             $w = $linew; 
  6389.                             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6390.                             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6391.                                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6392.                             } 
  6393.                         } 
  6394.                         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6395.                             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6396.                         } 
  6397.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, 1, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6398.                         unset($tmpstr); 
  6399.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6400.                             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6401.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $i)); 
  6402.                         } 
  6403.                         $j = $i; 
  6404.                         --$i; 
  6405.                     } 
  6406.                 } else { 
  6407.                     // word wrapping 
  6408.                     if ($this->rtl AND (!$firstblock) AND ($sep < $i)) { 
  6409.                         $endspace = 1; 
  6410.                     } else { 
  6411.                         $endspace = 0; 
  6412.                     } 
  6413.                     // check the length of the next string 
  6414.                     $strrest = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, ($sep + $endspace)); 
  6415.                     $nextstr = TCPDF_STATIC::pregSplit('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'/', $this->re_space['m'], $this->stringTrim($strrest)); 
  6416.                     if (isset($nextstr[0]) AND ($this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[0]) > $pw)) { 
  6417.                         // truncate the word because do not fit on a full page width 
  6418.                         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $i); 
  6419.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6420.                             $startx = $this->x; 
  6421.                             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)); 
  6422.                             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6423.                                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6424.                             } 
  6425.                             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6426.                             unset($tmparr); 
  6427.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6428.                                 $this->endlinex = ($startx - $linew); 
  6429.                             } else { 
  6430.                                 $this->endlinex = ($startx + $linew); 
  6431.                             } 
  6432.                             $w = $linew; 
  6433.                             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6434.                             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6435.                                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6436.                             } 
  6437.                         } 
  6438.                         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6439.                             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6440.                         } 
  6441.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, 1, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6442.                         unset($tmpstr); 
  6443.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6444.                             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6445.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $i)); 
  6446.                         } 
  6447.                         $j = $i; 
  6448.                         --$i; 
  6449.                     } else { 
  6450.                         // word wrapping 
  6451.                         if ($shy) { 
  6452.                             // add hypen (minus symbol) at the end of the line 
  6453.                             $shy_width = $tmp_shy_replacement_width; 
  6454.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6455.                                 $shy_char_left = $tmp_shy_replacement_char; 
  6456.                                 $shy_char_right = ''; 
  6457.                             } else { 
  6458.                                 $shy_char_left = ''; 
  6459.                                 $shy_char_right = $tmp_shy_replacement_char; 
  6460.                             } 
  6461.                         } else { 
  6462.                             $shy_width = 0; 
  6463.                             $shy_char_left = ''; 
  6464.                             $shy_char_right = ''; 
  6465.                         } 
  6466.                         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, ($sep + $endspace)); 
  6467.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6468.                             $startx = $this->x; 
  6469.                             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, (($sep + $endspace) - $j)); 
  6470.                             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6471.                                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6472.                             } 
  6473.                             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6474.                             unset($tmparr); 
  6475.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6476.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew - $shy_width; 
  6477.                             } else { 
  6478.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew + $shy_width; 
  6479.                             } 
  6480.                             $w = $linew; 
  6481.                             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6482.                             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6483.                                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6484.                             } 
  6485.                         } 
  6486.                         // print the line 
  6487.                         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6488.                             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6489.                         } 
  6490.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $shy_char_left.$tmpstr.$shy_char_right, 0, 1, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6491.                         unset($tmpstr); 
  6492.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6493.                             if ($chars[$sep] == 45) { 
  6494.                                 $endspace += 1; 
  6495.                             } 
  6496.                             // return the remaining text 
  6497.                             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6498.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, ($sep + $endspace))); 
  6499.                         } 
  6500.                         $i = $sep; 
  6501.                         $sep = -1; 
  6502.                         $shy = false; 
  6503.                         $j = ($i + 1); 
  6504.                     } 
  6505.                 } 
  6506.                 // account for margin changes 
  6507.                 if ((($this->y + $this->lasth) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) AND ($this->inPageBody())) { 
  6508.                     $this->AcceptPageBreak(); 
  6509.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6510.                         $this->x -= $margin['R']; 
  6511.                     } else { 
  6512.                         $this->x += $margin['L']; 
  6513.                     } 
  6514.                     $this->lMargin += $margin['L']; 
  6515.                     $this->rMargin += $margin['R']; 
  6516.                 } 
  6517.                 $w = $this->getRemainingWidth(); 
  6518.                 $wmax = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  6519.                 if ($linebreak) { 
  6520.                     $linebreak = false; 
  6521.                 } else { 
  6522.                     ++$nl; 
  6523.                     $l = 0; 
  6524.                 } 
  6525.             } 
  6526.         } 
  6527.         // save last character 
  6528.         $pc = $c; 
  6529.         ++$i; 
  6530.     } // end while i < nb 
  6531.     // print last substring (if any) 
  6532.     if ($l > 0) { 
  6533.         switch ($align) { 
  6534.             case 'J': 
  6535.             case 'C': { 
  6536.                 $w = $w; 
  6537.                 break; 
  6538.             } 
  6539.             case 'L': { 
  6540.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6541.                     $w = $w; 
  6542.                 } else { 
  6543.                     $w = $l; 
  6544.                 } 
  6545.                 break; 
  6546.             } 
  6547.             case 'R': { 
  6548.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6549.                     $w = $l; 
  6550.                 } else { 
  6551.                     $w = $w; 
  6552.                 } 
  6553.                 break; 
  6554.             } 
  6555.             default: { 
  6556.                 $w = $l; 
  6557.                 break; 
  6558.             } 
  6559.         } 
  6560.         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $nb); 
  6561.         if ($firstline) { 
  6562.             $startx = $this->x; 
  6563.             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($nb - $j)); 
  6564.             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6565.                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6566.             } 
  6567.             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6568.             unset($tmparr); 
  6569.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6570.                 $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew; 
  6571.             } else { 
  6572.                 $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew; 
  6573.             } 
  6574.             $w = $linew; 
  6575.             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6576.             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6577.                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6578.             } 
  6579.         } 
  6580.         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6581.             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6582.         } 
  6583.         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6584.         unset($tmpstr); 
  6585.         if ($firstline) { 
  6586.             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6587.             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $nb)); 
  6588.         } 
  6589.         ++$nl; 
  6590.     } 
  6591.     if ($firstline) { 
  6592.         return ''; 
  6593.     } 
  6594.     return $nl; 
  6595. } 
  6596.  
  6597. /** 
  6598.  * Returns the remaining width between the current position and margins. 
  6599.  * @return int Return the remaining width 
  6600.  * @protected 
  6601.  */ 
  6602. protected function getRemainingWidth() { 
  6603.     list($this->x, $this->y) = $this->checkPageRegions(0, $this->x, $this->y); 
  6604.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6605.         return ($this->x - $this->lMargin); 
  6606.     } else { 
  6607.         return ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x); 
  6608.     } 
  6609. } 
  6610.  
  6611. /** 
  6612.  * Set the block dimensions accounting for page breaks and page/column fitting 
  6613.  * @param $w (float) width 
  6614.  * @param $h (float) height 
  6615.  * @param $x (float) X coordinate 
  6616.  * @param $y (float) Y coodiante 
  6617.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) if true the block is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  6618.  * @return array($w, $h, $x, $y) 
  6619.  * @protected 
  6620.  * @since 5.5.009 (2010-07-05) 
  6621.  */ 
  6622. protected function fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage=false) { 
  6623.     if ($w <= 0) { 
  6624.         // set maximum width 
  6625.         $w = ($this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin); 
  6626.         if ($w <= 0) { 
  6627.             $w = 1; 
  6628.         } 
  6629.     } 
  6630.     if ($h <= 0) { 
  6631.         // set maximum height 
  6632.         $h = ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->tMargin); 
  6633.         if ($h <= 0) { 
  6634.             $h = 1; 
  6635.         } 
  6636.     } 
  6637.     // resize the block to be vertically contained on a single page or single column 
  6638.     if ($fitonpage OR $this->AutoPageBreak) { 
  6639.         $ratio_wh = ($w / $h); 
  6640.         if ($h > ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->tMargin)) { 
  6641.             $h = $this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->tMargin; 
  6642.             $w = ($h * $ratio_wh); 
  6643.         } 
  6644.         // resize the block to be horizontally contained on a single page or single column 
  6645.         if ($fitonpage) { 
  6646.             $maxw = ($this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin); 
  6647.             if ($w > $maxw) { 
  6648.                 $w = $maxw; 
  6649.                 $h = ($w / $ratio_wh); 
  6650.             } 
  6651.         } 
  6652.     } 
  6653.     // Check whether we need a new page or new column first as this does not fit 
  6654.     $prev_x = $this->x; 
  6655.     $prev_y = $this->y; 
  6656.     if ($this->checkPageBreak($h, $y) OR ($this->y < $prev_y)) { 
  6657.         $y = $this->y; 
  6658.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  6659.             $x += ($prev_x - $this->x); 
  6660.         } else { 
  6661.             $x += ($this->x - $prev_x); 
  6662.         } 
  6663.         $this->newline = true; 
  6664.     } 
  6665.     // resize the block to be contained on the remaining available page or column space 
  6666.     if ($fitonpage) { 
  6667.         $ratio_wh = ($w / $h); 
  6668.         if (($y + $h) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) { 
  6669.             $h = $this->PageBreakTrigger - $y; 
  6670.             $w = ($h * $ratio_wh); 
  6671.         } 
  6672.         if ((!$this->rtl) AND (($x + $w) > ($this->w - $this->rMargin))) { 
  6673.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $x; 
  6674.             $h = ($w / $ratio_wh); 
  6675.         } elseif (($this->rtl) AND (($x - $w) < ($this->lMargin))) { 
  6676.             $w = $x - $this->lMargin; 
  6677.             $h = ($w / $ratio_wh); 
  6678.         } 
  6679.     } 
  6680.     return array($w, $h, $x, $y); 
  6681. } 
  6682.  
  6683. /** 
  6684.  * Puts an image in the page. 
  6685.  * The upper-left corner must be given. 
  6686.  * The dimensions can be specified in different ways:<ul> 
  6687.  * <li>explicit width and height (expressed in user unit)</li> 
  6688.  * <li>one explicit dimension, the other being calculated automatically in order to keep the original proportions</li> 
  6689.  * <li>no explicit dimension, in which case the image is put at 72 dpi</li></ul> 
  6690.  * Supported formats are JPEG and PNG images whitout GD library and all images supported by GD: GD, GD2, GD2PART, GIF, JPEG, PNG, BMP, XBM, XPM; 
  6691.  * The format can be specified explicitly or inferred from the file extension.<br /> 
  6692.  * It is possible to put a link on the image.<br /> 
  6693.  * Remark: if an image is used several times, only one copy will be embedded in the file.<br /> 
  6694.  * @param $file (string) Name of the file containing the image or a '@' character followed by the image data string. To link an image without embedding it on the document, set an asterisk character before the URL (i.e.: '*http://www.example.com/image.jpg'). 
  6695.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner (LTR) or upper-right corner (RTL). 
  6696.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner (LTR) or upper-right corner (RTL). 
  6697.  * @param $w (float) Width of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  6698.  * @param $h (float) Height of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  6699.  * @param $type (string) Image format. Possible values are (case insensitive): JPEG and PNG (whitout GD library) and all images supported by GD: GD, GD2, GD2PART, GIF, JPEG, PNG, BMP, XBM, XPM;. If not specified, the type is inferred from the file extension. 
  6700.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  6701.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to image insertion relative to image height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> 
  6702.  * @param $resize (mixed) If true resize (reduce) the image to fit $w and $h (requires GD or ImageMagick library); if false do not resize; if 2 force resize in all cases (upscaling and downscaling). 
  6703.  * @param $dpi (int) dot-per-inch resolution used on resize 
  6704.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the image on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  6705.  * @param $ismask (boolean) true if this image is a mask, false otherwise 
  6706.  * @param $imgmask (mixed) image object returned by this function or false 
  6707.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  6708.  * @param $fitbox (mixed) If not false scale image dimensions proportionally to fit within the ($w, $h) box. $fitbox can be true or a 2 characters string indicating the image alignment inside the box. The first character indicate the horizontal alignment (L = left, C = center, R = right) the second character indicate the vertical algnment (T = top, M = middle, B = bottom). 
  6709.  * @param $hidden (boolean) If true do not display the image. 
  6710.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) If true the image is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  6711.  * @param $alt (boolean) If true the image will be added as alternative and not directly printed (the ID of the image will be returned). 
  6712.  * @param $altimgs (array) Array of alternate images IDs. Each alternative image must be an array with two values: an integer representing the image ID (the value returned by the Image method) and a boolean value to indicate if the image is the default for printing. 
  6713.  * @return image information 
  6714.  * @public 
  6715.  * @since 1.1 
  6716.  */ 
  6717. public function Image($file, $x='', $y='', $w=0, $h=0, $type='', $link='', $align='', $resize=false, $dpi=300, $palign='', $ismask=false, $imgmask=false, $border=0, $fitbox=false, $hidden=false, $fitonpage=false, $alt=false, $altimgs=array()) { 
  6718.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  6719.         return; 
  6720.     } 
  6721.     if ($x === '') { 
  6722.         $x = $this->x; 
  6723.     } 
  6724.     if ($y === '') { 
  6725.         $y = $this->y; 
  6726.     } 
  6727.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  6728.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  6729.     $exurl = ''; // external streams 
  6730.     $imsize = FALSE; 
  6731.     // check if we are passing an image as file or string 
  6732.     if ($file[0] === '@') { 
  6733.         // image from string 
  6734.         $imgdata = substr($file, 1); 
  6735.     } else { // image file 
  6736.         if ($file[0] === '*') { 
  6737.             // image as external stream 
  6738.             $file = substr($file, 1); 
  6739.             $exurl = $file; 
  6740.         } 
  6741.         // check if is a local file 
  6742.         if (!@file_exists($file)) { 
  6743.             // try to encode spaces on filename 
  6744.             $tfile = str_replace(' ', '%20', $file); 
  6745.             if (@file_exists($tfile)) { 
  6746.                 $file = $tfile; 
  6747.             } 
  6748.         } 
  6749.         if (($imsize = @getimagesize($file)) === FALSE) { 
  6750.             if (in_array($file, $this->imagekeys)) { 
  6751.                 // get existing image data 
  6752.                 $info = $this->getImageBuffer($file); 
  6753.                 $imsize = array($info['w'], $info['h']);                 
  6754.             } elseif (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_img') === FALSE) { 
  6755.                 $imgdata = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($file); 
  6756.             } 
  6757.         } 
  6758.     } 
  6759.     if (!empty($imgdata)) { 
  6760.         // copy image to cache 
  6761.         $original_file = $file; 
  6762.         $file = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('img'); 
  6763.         $fp = fopen($file, 'w'); 
  6764.         if (!$fp) { 
  6765.             $this->Error('Unable to write file: '.$file); 
  6766.         } 
  6767.         fwrite($fp, $imgdata); 
  6768.         fclose($fp); 
  6769.         unset($imgdata); 
  6770.         $imsize = @getimagesize($file); 
  6771.         if ($imsize === FALSE) { 
  6772.             unlink($file); 
  6773.             $file = $original_file; 
  6774.         } else { 
  6775.             $this->cached_files[] = $file; 
  6776.         } 
  6777.     } 
  6778.     if ($imsize === FALSE) { 
  6779.         if (($w > 0) AND ($h > 0)) { 
  6780.             // get measures from specified data 
  6781.             $pw = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($w, 0, $this->pdfunit, true) * $this->imgscale * $this->k; 
  6782.             $ph = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($h, 0, $this->pdfunit, true) * $this->imgscale * $this->k; 
  6783.             $imsize = array($pw, $ph); 
  6784.         } else { 
  6785.             $this->Error('[Image] Unable to get the size of the image: '.$file); 
  6786.         } 
  6787.     } 
  6788.     // file hash 
  6789.     $filehash = md5($this->file_id.$file); 
  6790.     // get original image width and height in pixels 
  6791.     list($pixw, $pixh) = $imsize; 
  6792.     // calculate image width and height on document 
  6793.     if (($w <= 0) AND ($h <= 0)) { 
  6794.         // convert image size to document unit 
  6795.         $w = $this->pixelsToUnits($pixw); 
  6796.         $h = $this->pixelsToUnits($pixh); 
  6797.     } elseif ($w <= 0) { 
  6798.         $w = $h * $pixw / $pixh; 
  6799.     } elseif ($h <= 0) { 
  6800.         $h = $w * $pixh / $pixw; 
  6801.     } elseif (($fitbox !== false) AND ($w > 0) AND ($h > 0)) { 
  6802.         if (strlen($fitbox) !== 2) { 
  6803.             // set default alignment 
  6804.             $fitbox = '--'; 
  6805.         } 
  6806.         // scale image dimensions proportionally to fit within the ($w, $h) box 
  6807.         if ((($w * $pixh) / ($h * $pixw)) < 1) { 
  6808.             // store current height 
  6809.             $oldh = $h; 
  6810.             // calculate new height 
  6811.             $h = $w * $pixh / $pixw; 
  6812.             // height difference 
  6813.             $hdiff = ($oldh - $h); 
  6814.             // vertical alignment 
  6815.             switch (strtoupper($fitbox[1])) { 
  6816.                 case 'T': { 
  6817.                     break; 
  6818.                 } 
  6819.                 case 'M': { 
  6820.                     $y += ($hdiff / 2); 
  6821.                     break; 
  6822.                 } 
  6823.                 case 'B': { 
  6824.                     $y += $hdiff; 
  6825.                     break; 
  6826.                 } 
  6827.             } 
  6828.         } else { 
  6829.             // store current width 
  6830.             $oldw = $w; 
  6831.             // calculate new width 
  6832.             $w = $h * $pixw / $pixh; 
  6833.             // width difference 
  6834.             $wdiff = ($oldw - $w); 
  6835.             // horizontal alignment 
  6836.             switch (strtoupper($fitbox[0])) { 
  6837.                 case 'L': { 
  6838.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6839.                         $x -= $wdiff; 
  6840.                     } 
  6841.                     break; 
  6842.                 } 
  6843.                 case 'C': { 
  6844.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6845.                         $x -= ($wdiff / 2); 
  6846.                     } else { 
  6847.                         $x += ($wdiff / 2); 
  6848.                     } 
  6849.                     break; 
  6850.                 } 
  6851.                 case 'R': { 
  6852.                     if (!$this->rtl) { 
  6853.                         $x += $wdiff; 
  6854.                     } 
  6855.                     break; 
  6856.                 } 
  6857.             } 
  6858.         } 
  6859.     } 
  6860.     // fit the image on available space 
  6861.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage); 
  6862.     // calculate new minimum dimensions in pixels 
  6863.     $neww = round($w * $this->k * $dpi / $this->dpi); 
  6864.     $newh = round($h * $this->k * $dpi / $this->dpi); 
  6865.     // check if resize is necessary (resize is used only to reduce the image) 
  6866.     $newsize = ($neww * $newh); 
  6867.     $pixsize = ($pixw * $pixh); 
  6868.     if (intval($resize) == 2) { 
  6869.         $resize = true; 
  6870.     } elseif ($newsize >= $pixsize) { 
  6871.         $resize = false; 
  6872.     } 
  6873.     // check if image has been already added on document 
  6874.     $newimage = true; 
  6875.     if (in_array($file, $this->imagekeys)) { 
  6876.         $newimage = false; 
  6877.         // get existing image data 
  6878.         $info = $this->getImageBuffer($file); 
  6879.         if (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_imgmask_') === FALSE) { 
  6880.             // check if the newer image is larger 
  6881.             $oldsize = ($info['w'] * $info['h']); 
  6882.             if ((($oldsize < $newsize) AND ($resize)) OR (($oldsize < $pixsize) AND (!$resize))) { 
  6883.                 $newimage = true; 
  6884.             } 
  6885.         } 
  6886.     } elseif (($ismask === false) AND ($imgmask === false) AND (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_imgmask_') === FALSE)) { 
  6887.         // create temp image file (without alpha channel) 
  6888.         $tempfile_plain = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_plain_'.$filehash; 
  6889.         // create temp alpha file 
  6890.         $tempfile_alpha = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_alpha_'.$filehash; 
  6891.         // check for cached images 
  6892.         if (in_array($tempfile_plain, $this->imagekeys)) { 
  6893.             // get existing image data 
  6894.             $info = $this->getImageBuffer($tempfile_plain); 
  6895.             // check if the newer image is larger 
  6896.             $oldsize = ($info['w'] * $info['h']); 
  6897.             if ((($oldsize < $newsize) AND ($resize)) OR (($oldsize < $pixsize) AND (!$resize))) { 
  6898.                 $newimage = true; 
  6899.             } else { 
  6900.                 $newimage = false; 
  6901.                 // embed mask image 
  6902.                 $imgmask = $this->Image($tempfile_alpha, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'PNG', '', '', $resize, $dpi, '', true, false); 
  6903.                 // embed image, masked with previously embedded mask 
  6904.                 return $this->Image($tempfile_plain, $x, $y, $w, $h, $type, $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, false, $imgmask); 
  6905.             } 
  6906.         } 
  6907.     } 
  6908.     if ($newimage) { 
  6909.         //First use of image, get info 
  6910.         $type = strtolower($type); 
  6911.         if ($type == '') { 
  6912.             $type = TCPDF_IMAGES::getImageFileType($file, $imsize); 
  6913.         } elseif ($type == 'jpg') { 
  6914.             $type = 'jpeg'; 
  6915.         } 
  6916.         $mqr = TCPDF_STATIC::get_mqr(); 
  6917.         TCPDF_STATIC::set_mqr(false); 
  6918.         // Specific image handlers (defined on TCPDF_IMAGES CLASS) 
  6919.         $mtd = '_parse'.$type; 
  6920.         // GD image handler function 
  6921.         $gdfunction = 'imagecreatefrom'.$type; 
  6922.         $info = false; 
  6923.         if ((method_exists('TCPDF_IMAGES', $mtd)) AND (!($resize AND (function_exists($gdfunction) OR extension_loaded('imagick'))))) { 
  6924.             // TCPDF image functions 
  6925.             $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::$mtd($file); 
  6926.             if (($ismask === false) AND ($imgmask === false) AND (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_imgmask_') === FALSE) 
  6927.                 AND (($info === 'pngalpha') OR (isset($info['trns']) AND !empty($info['trns'])))) { 
  6928.                 return $this->ImagePngAlpha($file, $x, $y, $pixw, $pixh, $w, $h, 'PNG', $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, $filehash); 
  6929.             } 
  6930.         } 
  6931.         if (($info === false) AND function_exists($gdfunction)) { 
  6932.             try { 
  6933.                 // GD library 
  6934.                 $img = $gdfunction($file); 
  6935.                 if ($img !== false) { 
  6936.                     if ($resize) { 
  6937.                         $imgr = imagecreatetruecolor($neww, $newh); 
  6938.                         if (($type == 'gif') OR ($type == 'png')) { 
  6939.                             $imgr = TCPDF_IMAGES::setGDImageTransparency($imgr, $img); 
  6940.                         } 
  6941.                         imagecopyresampled($imgr, $img, 0, 0, 0, 0, $neww, $newh, $pixw, $pixh); 
  6942.                         $img = $imgr; 
  6943.                     } 
  6944.                     if (($type == 'gif') OR ($type == 'png')) { 
  6945.                         $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::_toPNG($img); 
  6946.                     } else { 
  6947.                         $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::_toJPEG($img, $this->jpeg_quality); 
  6948.                     } 
  6949.                 } 
  6950.             } catch(Exception $e) { 
  6951.                 $info = false; 
  6952.             } 
  6953.         } 
  6954.         if (($info === false) AND extension_loaded('imagick')) { 
  6955.             try { 
  6956.                 // ImageMagick library 
  6957.                 $img = new Imagick(); 
  6958.                 if ($type == 'SVG') { 
  6959.                     // get SVG file content 
  6960.                     $svgimg = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($file); 
  6961.                     if ($svgimg !== FALSE) { 
  6962.                         // get width and height 
  6963.                         $regs = array(); 
  6964.                         if (preg_match('/<svg([^\>]*)>/si', $svgimg, $regs)) { 
  6965.                             $svgtag = $regs[1]; 
  6966.                             $tmp = array(); 
  6967.                             if (preg_match('/[\s]+width[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $svgtag, $tmp)) { 
  6968.                                 $ow = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  6969.                                 $owu = sprintf('%F', ($ow * $dpi / 72)).$this->pdfunit; 
  6970.                                 $svgtag = preg_replace('/[\s]+width[\s]*=[\s]*"[^"]*"/si', ' width="'.$owu.'"', $svgtag, 1); 
  6971.                             } else { 
  6972.                                 $ow = $w; 
  6973.                             } 
  6974.                             $tmp = array(); 
  6975.                             if (preg_match('/[\s]+height[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $svgtag, $tmp)) { 
  6976.                                 $oh = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  6977.                                 $ohu = sprintf('%F', ($oh * $dpi / 72)).$this->pdfunit; 
  6978.                                 $svgtag = preg_replace('/[\s]+height[\s]*=[\s]*"[^"]*"/si', ' height="'.$ohu.'"', $svgtag, 1); 
  6979.                             } else { 
  6980.                                 $oh = $h; 
  6981.                             } 
  6982.                             $tmp = array(); 
  6983.                             if (!preg_match('/[\s]+viewBox[\s]*=[\s]*"[\s]*([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]*"/si', $svgtag, $tmp)) { 
  6984.                                 $vbw = ($ow * $this->imgscale * $this->k); 
  6985.                                 $vbh = ($oh * $this->imgscale * $this->k); 
  6986.                                 $vbox = sprintf(' viewBox="0 0 %F %F" ', $vbw, $vbh); 
  6987.                                 $svgtag = $vbox.$svgtag; 
  6988.                             } 
  6989.                             $svgimg = preg_replace('/<svg([^\>]*)>/si', '<svg'.$svgtag.'>', $svgimg, 1); 
  6990.                         } 
  6991.                         $img->readImageBlob($svgimg); 
  6992.                     } 
  6993.                 } else { 
  6994.                     $img->readImage($file); 
  6995.                 } 
  6996.                 if ($resize) { 
  6997.                     $img->resizeImage($neww, $newh, 10, 1, false); 
  6998.                 } 
  6999.                 $img->setCompressionQuality($this->jpeg_quality); 
  7000.                 $img->setImageFormat('jpeg'); 
  7001.                 $tempname = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('img'); 
  7002.                 $img->writeImage($tempname); 
  7003.                 $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::_parsejpeg($tempname); 
  7004.                 unlink($tempname); 
  7005.                 $img->destroy(); 
  7006.             } catch(Exception $e) { 
  7007.                 $info = false; 
  7008.             } 
  7009.         } 
  7010.         if ($info === false) { 
  7011.             // unable to process image 
  7012.             return; 
  7013.         } 
  7014.         TCPDF_STATIC::set_mqr($mqr); 
  7015.         if ($ismask) { 
  7016.             // force grayscale 
  7017.             $info['cs'] = 'DeviceGray'; 
  7018.         } 
  7019.         if ($imgmask !== false) { 
  7020.             $info['masked'] = $imgmask; 
  7021.         } 
  7022.         if (!empty($exurl)) { 
  7023.             $info['exurl'] = $exurl; 
  7024.         } 
  7025.         // array of alternative images 
  7026.         $info['altimgs'] = $altimgs; 
  7027.         // add image to document 
  7028.         $info['i'] = $this->setImageBuffer($file, $info); 
  7029.     } 
  7030.     // set alignment 
  7031.     $this->img_rb_y = $y + $h; 
  7032.     // set alignment 
  7033.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  7034.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  7035.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  7036.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  7037.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  7038.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  7039.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  7040.         } else { 
  7041.             $ximg = $x - $w; 
  7042.         } 
  7043.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg; 
  7044.     } else { 
  7045.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  7046.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  7047.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  7048.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  7049.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  7050.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  7051.         } else { 
  7052.             $ximg = $x; 
  7053.         } 
  7054.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg + $w; 
  7055.     } 
  7056.     if ($ismask OR $hidden) { 
  7057.         // image is not displayed 
  7058.         return $info['i']; 
  7059.     } 
  7060.     $xkimg = $ximg * $this->k; 
  7061.     if (!$alt) { 
  7062.         // only non-alternative immages will be set 
  7063.         $this->_out(sprintf('q %F 0 0 %F %F %F cm /I%u Do Q', ($w * $this->k), ($h * $this->k), $xkimg, (($this->h - ($y + $h)) * $this->k), $info['i'])); 
  7064.     } 
  7065.     if (!empty($border)) { 
  7066.         $bx = $this->x; 
  7067.         $by = $this->y; 
  7068.         $this->x = $ximg; 
  7069.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  7070.             $this->x += $w; 
  7071.         } 
  7072.         $this->y = $y; 
  7073.         $this->Cell($w, $h, '', $border, 0, '', 0, '', 0, true); 
  7074.         $this->x = $bx; 
  7075.         $this->y = $by; 
  7076.     } 
  7077.     if ($link) { 
  7078.         $this->Link($ximg, $y, $w, $h, $link, 0); 
  7079.     } 
  7080.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  7081.     switch($align) { 
  7082.         case 'T': { 
  7083.             $this->y = $y; 
  7084.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7085.             break; 
  7086.         } 
  7087.         case 'M': { 
  7088.             $this->y = $y + round($h/2); 
  7089.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7090.             break; 
  7091.         } 
  7092.         case 'B': { 
  7093.             $this->y = $this->img_rb_y; 
  7094.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7095.             break; 
  7096.         } 
  7097.         case 'N': { 
  7098.             $this->SetY($this->img_rb_y); 
  7099.             break; 
  7100.         } 
  7101.         default:{ 
  7102.             break; 
  7103.         } 
  7104.     } 
  7105.     $this->endlinex = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7106.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  7107.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  7108.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['images'][] = $info['i']; 
  7109.     } 
  7110.     return $info['i']; 
  7111. } 
  7112.  
  7113. /** 
  7114.  * Extract info from a PNG image with alpha channel using the Imagick or GD library. 
  7115.  * @param $file (string) Name of the file containing the image. 
  7116.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  7117.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  7118.  * @param $wpx (float) Original width of the image in pixels. 
  7119.  * @param $hpx (float) original height of the image in pixels. 
  7120.  * @param $w (float) Width of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  7121.  * @param $h (float) Height of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  7122.  * @param $type (string) Image format. Possible values are (case insensitive): JPEG and PNG (whitout GD library) and all images supported by GD: GD, GD2, GD2PART, GIF, JPEG, PNG, BMP, XBM, XPM;. If not specified, the type is inferred from the file extension. 
  7123.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  7124.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to image insertion relative to image height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> 
  7125.  * @param $resize (boolean) If true resize (reduce) the image to fit $w and $h (requires GD library). 
  7126.  * @param $dpi (int) dot-per-inch resolution used on resize 
  7127.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the image on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  7128.  * @param $filehash (string) File hash used to build unique file names. 
  7129.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  7130.  * @protected 
  7131.  * @since 4.3.007 (2008-12-04) 
  7132.  * @see Image() 
  7133.  */ 
  7134. protected function ImagePngAlpha($file, $x, $y, $wpx, $hpx, $w, $h, $type, $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, $filehash='') { 
  7135.     // create temp images 
  7136.     if (empty($filehash)) { 
  7137.         $filehash = md5($this->file_id.$file); 
  7138.     } 
  7139.     // create temp image file (without alpha channel) 
  7140.     $tempfile_plain = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_plain_'.$filehash; 
  7141.     // create temp alpha file 
  7142.     $tempfile_alpha = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_alpha_'.$filehash; 
  7143.     $parsed = false; 
  7144.     $parse_error = ''; 
  7145.     // ImageMagick extension 
  7146.     if (($parsed === false) AND extension_loaded('imagick')) { 
  7147.         try { 
  7148.             // ImageMagick library 
  7149.             $img = new Imagick(); 
  7150.             $img->readImage($file); 
  7151.             // clone image object 
  7152.             $imga = TCPDF_STATIC::objclone($img); 
  7153.             // extract alpha channel 
  7154.             if (method_exists($img, 'setImageAlphaChannel') AND defined('Imagick::ALPHACHANNEL_EXTRACT')) { 
  7155.                 $img->setImageAlphaChannel(Imagick::ALPHACHANNEL_EXTRACT); 
  7156.             } else { 
  7157.                 $img->separateImageChannel(8); // 8 = (imagick::CHANNEL_ALPHA | imagick::CHANNEL_OPACITY | imagick::CHANNEL_MATTE); 
  7158.                 $img->negateImage(true); 
  7159.             } 
  7160.             $img->setImageFormat('png'); 
  7161.             $img->writeImage($tempfile_alpha); 
  7162.             // remove alpha channel 
  7163.             if (method_exists($imga, 'setImageMatte')) { 
  7164.                 $imga->setImageMatte(false); 
  7165.             } else { 
  7166.                 $imga->separateImageChannel(39); // 39 = (imagick::CHANNEL_ALL & ~(imagick::CHANNEL_ALPHA | imagick::CHANNEL_OPACITY | imagick::CHANNEL_MATTE)); 
  7167.             } 
  7168.             $imga->setImageFormat('png'); 
  7169.             $imga->writeImage($tempfile_plain); 
  7170.             $parsed = true; 
  7171.         } catch (Exception $e) { 
  7172.             // Imagemagick fails, try with GD 
  7173.             $parse_error = 'Imagick library error: '.$e->getMessage(); 
  7174.         } 
  7175.     } 
  7176.     // GD extension 
  7177.     if (($parsed === false) AND function_exists('imagecreatefrompng')) { 
  7178.         try { 
  7179.             // generate images 
  7180.             $img = imagecreatefrompng($file); 
  7181.             $imgalpha = imagecreate($wpx, $hpx); 
  7182.             // generate gray scale palette (0 -> 255) 
  7183.             for ($c = 0; $c < 256; ++$c) { 
  7184.                 ImageColorAllocate($imgalpha, $c, $c, $c); 
  7185.             } 
  7186.             // extract alpha channel 
  7187.             for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $wpx; ++$xpx) { 
  7188.                 for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $hpx; ++$ypx) { 
  7189.                     $color = imagecolorat($img, $xpx, $ypx); 
  7190.                     // get and correct gamma color 
  7191.                     $alpha = $this->getGDgamma($img, $color); 
  7192.                     imagesetpixel($imgalpha, $xpx, $ypx, $alpha); 
  7193.                 } 
  7194.             } 
  7195.             imagepng($imgalpha, $tempfile_alpha); 
  7196.             imagedestroy($imgalpha); 
  7197.             // extract image without alpha channel 
  7198.             $imgplain = imagecreatetruecolor($wpx, $hpx); 
  7199.             imagecopy($imgplain, $img, 0, 0, 0, 0, $wpx, $hpx); 
  7200.             imagepng($imgplain, $tempfile_plain); 
  7201.             imagedestroy($imgplain); 
  7202.             $parsed = true; 
  7203.         } catch (Exception $e) { 
  7204.             // GD fails 
  7205.             $parse_error = 'GD library error: '.$e->getMessage(); 
  7206.         } 
  7207.     } 
  7208.     if ($parsed === false) { 
  7209.         if (empty($parse_error)) { 
  7210.             $this->Error('TCPDF requires the Imagick or GD extension to handle PNG images with alpha channel.'); 
  7211.         } else { 
  7212.             $this->Error($parse_error); 
  7213.         } 
  7214.     } 
  7215.     // embed mask image 
  7216.     $imgmask = $this->Image($tempfile_alpha, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'PNG', '', '', $resize, $dpi, '', true, false); 
  7217.     // embed image, masked with previously embedded mask 
  7218.     $this->Image($tempfile_plain, $x, $y, $w, $h, $type, $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, false, $imgmask); 
  7219.     // remove temp files 
  7220.     unlink($tempfile_alpha); 
  7221.     unlink($tempfile_plain); 
  7222. } 
  7223.  
  7224. /** 
  7225.  * Get the GD-corrected PNG gamma value from alpha color 
  7226.  * @param $img (int) GD image Resource ID. 
  7227.  * @param $c (int) alpha color 
  7228.  * @protected 
  7229.  * @since 4.3.007 (2008-12-04) 
  7230.  */ 
  7231. protected function getGDgamma($img, $c) { 
  7232.     if (!isset($this->gdgammacache['#'.$c])) { 
  7233.         $colors = imagecolorsforindex($img, $c); 
  7234.         // GD alpha is only 7 bit (0 -> 127) 
  7235.         $this->gdgammacache['#'.$c] = (((127 - $colors['alpha']) / 127) * 255); 
  7236.         // correct gamma 
  7237.         $this->gdgammacache['#'.$c] = (pow(($this->gdgammacache['#'.$c] / 255), 2.2) * 255); 
  7238.         // store the latest values on cache to improve performances 
  7239.         if (count($this->gdgammacache) > 8) { 
  7240.             // remove one element from the cache array 
  7241.             array_shift($this->gdgammacache); 
  7242.         } 
  7243.     } 
  7244.     return $this->gdgammacache['#'.$c]; 
  7245. } 
  7246.  
  7247. /** 
  7248.  * Performs a line break. 
  7249.  * The current abscissa goes back to the left margin and the ordinate increases by the amount passed in parameter. 
  7250.  * @param $h (float) The height of the break. By default, the value equals the height of the last printed cell. 
  7251.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the current left (or right o for RTL) padding to the X coordinate 
  7252.  * @public 
  7253.  * @since 1.0 
  7254.  * @see Cell() 
  7255.  */ 
  7256. public function Ln($h='', $cell=false) { 
  7257.     if (($this->num_columns > 1) AND ($this->y == $this->columns[$this->current_column]['y']) AND isset($this->columns[$this->current_column]['x']) AND ($this->x == $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x'])) { 
  7258.         // revove vertical space from the top of the column 
  7259.         return; 
  7260.     } 
  7261.     if ($cell) { 
  7262.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  7263.             $cellpadding = $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  7264.         } else { 
  7265.             $cellpadding = $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  7266.         } 
  7267.     } else { 
  7268.         $cellpadding = 0; 
  7269.     } 
  7270.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  7271.         $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $cellpadding; 
  7272.     } else { 
  7273.         $this->x = $this->lMargin + $cellpadding; 
  7274.     } 
  7275.     if (is_string($h)) { 
  7276.         $this->y += $this->lasth; 
  7277.     } else { 
  7278.         $this->y += $h; 
  7279.     } 
  7280.     $this->newline = true; 
  7281. } 
  7282.  
  7283. /** 
  7284.  * Returns the relative X value of current position. 
  7285.  * The value is relative to the left border for LTR languages and to the right border for RTL languages. 
  7286.  * @return float 
  7287.  * @public 
  7288.  * @since 1.2 
  7289.  * @see SetX(), GetY(), SetY() 
  7290.  */ 
  7291. public function GetX() { 
  7292.     //Get x position 
  7293.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  7294.         return ($this->w - $this->x); 
  7295.     } else { 
  7296.         return $this->x; 
  7297.     } 
  7298. } 
  7299.  
  7300. /** 
  7301.  * Returns the absolute X value of current position. 
  7302.  * @return float 
  7303.  * @public 
  7304.  * @since 1.2 
  7305.  * @see SetX(), GetY(), SetY() 
  7306.  */ 
  7307. public function GetAbsX() { 
  7308.     return $this->x; 
  7309. } 
  7310.  
  7311. /** 
  7312.  * Returns the ordinate of the current position. 
  7313.  * @return float 
  7314.  * @public 
  7315.  * @since 1.0 
  7316.  * @see SetY(), GetX(), SetX() 
  7317.  */ 
  7318. public function GetY() { 
  7319.     return $this->y; 
  7320. } 
  7321.  
  7322. /** 
  7323.  * Defines the abscissa of the current position. 
  7324.  * If the passed value is negative, it is relative to the right of the page (or left if language is RTL). 
  7325.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa in user units. 
  7326.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true always uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis. 
  7327.  * @public 
  7328.  * @since 1.2 
  7329.  * @see GetX(), GetY(), SetY(), SetXY() 
  7330.  */ 
  7331. public function SetX($x, $rtloff=false) { 
  7332.     $x = floatval($x); 
  7333.     if (!$rtloff AND $this->rtl) { 
  7334.         if ($x >= 0) { 
  7335.             $this->x = $this->w - $x; 
  7336.         } else { 
  7337.             $this->x = abs($x); 
  7338.         } 
  7339.     } else { 
  7340.         if ($x >= 0) { 
  7341.             $this->x = $x; 
  7342.         } else { 
  7343.             $this->x = $this->w + $x; 
  7344.         } 
  7345.     } 
  7346.     if ($this->x < 0) { 
  7347.         $this->x = 0; 
  7348.     } 
  7349.     if ($this->x > $this->w) { 
  7350.         $this->x = $this->w; 
  7351.     } 
  7352. } 
  7353.  
  7354. /** 
  7355.  * Moves the current abscissa back to the left margin and sets the ordinate. 
  7356.  * If the passed value is negative, it is relative to the bottom of the page. 
  7357.  * @param $y (float) The value of the ordinate in user units. 
  7358.  * @param $resetx (bool) if true (default) reset the X position. 
  7359.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true always uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis. 
  7360.  * @public 
  7361.  * @since 1.0 
  7362.  * @see GetX(), GetY(), SetY(), SetXY() 
  7363.  */ 
  7364. public function SetY($y, $resetx=true, $rtloff=false) { 
  7365.     $y = floatval($y); 
  7366.     if ($resetx) { 
  7367.         //reset x 
  7368.         if (!$rtloff AND $this->rtl) { 
  7369.             $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  7370.         } else { 
  7371.             $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  7372.         } 
  7373.     } 
  7374.     if ($y >= 0) { 
  7375.         $this->y = $y; 
  7376.     } else { 
  7377.         $this->y = $this->h + $y; 
  7378.     } 
  7379.     if ($this->y < 0) { 
  7380.         $this->y = 0; 
  7381.     } 
  7382.     if ($this->y > $this->h) { 
  7383.         $this->y = $this->h; 
  7384.     } 
  7385. } 
  7386.  
  7387. /** 
  7388.  * Defines the abscissa and ordinate of the current position. 
  7389.  * If the passed values are negative, they are relative respectively to the right and bottom of the page. 
  7390.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa. 
  7391.  * @param $y (float) The value of the ordinate. 
  7392.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true always uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis. 
  7393.  * @public 
  7394.  * @since 1.2 
  7395.  * @see SetX(), SetY() 
  7396.  */ 
  7397. public function SetXY($x, $y, $rtloff=false) { 
  7398.     $this->SetY($y, false, $rtloff); 
  7399.     $this->SetX($x, $rtloff); 
  7400. } 
  7401.  
  7402. /** 
  7403.  * Set the absolute X coordinate of the current pointer. 
  7404.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa in user units. 
  7405.  * @public 
  7406.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  7407.  * @see setAbsX(), setAbsY(), SetAbsXY() 
  7408.  */ 
  7409. public function SetAbsX($x) { 
  7410.     $this->x = floatval($x); 
  7411. } 
  7412.  
  7413. /** 
  7414.  * Set the absolute Y coordinate of the current pointer. 
  7415.  * @param $y (float) (float) The value of the ordinate in user units. 
  7416.  * @public 
  7417.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  7418.  * @see setAbsX(), setAbsY(), SetAbsXY() 
  7419.  */ 
  7420. public function SetAbsY($y) { 
  7421.     $this->y = floatval($y); 
  7422. } 
  7423.  
  7424. /** 
  7425.  * Set the absolute X and Y coordinates of the current pointer. 
  7426.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa in user units. 
  7427.  * @param $y (float) (float) The value of the ordinate in user units. 
  7428.  * @public 
  7429.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  7430.  * @see setAbsX(), setAbsY(), SetAbsXY() 
  7431.  */ 
  7432. public function SetAbsXY($x, $y) { 
  7433.     $this->SetAbsX($x); 
  7434.     $this->SetAbsY($y); 
  7435. } 
  7436.  
  7437. /** 
  7438.  * Send the document to a given destination: string, local file or browser. 
  7439.  * In the last case, the plug-in may be used (if present) or a download ("Save as" dialog box) may be forced.<br /> 
  7440.  * The method first calls Close() if necessary to terminate the document. 
  7441.  * @param $name (string) The name of the file when saved. Note that special characters are removed and blanks characters are replaced with the underscore character. 
  7442.  * @param $dest (string) Destination where to send the document. It can take one of the following values:<ul><li>I: send the file inline to the browser (default). The plug-in is used if available. The name given by name is used when one selects the "Save as" option on the link generating the PDF.</li><li>D: send to the browser and force a file download with the name given by name.</li><li>F: save to a local server file with the name given by name.</li><li>S: return the document as a string (name is ignored).</li><li>FI: equivalent to F + I option</li><li>FD: equivalent to F + D option</li><li>E: return the document as base64 mime multi-part email attachment (RFC 2045)</li></ul> 
  7443.  * @public 
  7444.  * @since 1.0 
  7445.  * @see Close() 
  7446.  */ 
  7447. public function Output($name='doc.pdf', $dest='I') { 
  7448.     //Output PDF to some destination 
  7449.     //Finish document if necessary 
  7450.     if ($this->state < 3) { 
  7451.         $this->Close(); 
  7452.     } 
  7453.     //Normalize parameters 
  7454.     if (is_bool($dest)) { 
  7455.         $dest = $dest ? 'D' : 'F'; 
  7456.     } 
  7457.     $dest = strtoupper($dest); 
  7458.     if ($dest[0] != 'F') { 
  7459.         $name = preg_replace('/[\s]+/', '_', $name); 
  7460.         $name = preg_replace('/[^a-zA-Z0-9_\.-]/', '', $name); 
  7461.     } 
  7462.     if ($this->sign) { 
  7463.         // *** apply digital signature to the document *** 
  7464.         // get the document content 
  7465.         $pdfdoc = $this->getBuffer(); 
  7466.         // remove last newline 
  7467.         $pdfdoc = substr($pdfdoc, 0, -1); 
  7468.         // Remove the original buffer 
  7469.         if (isset($this->diskcache) AND $this->diskcache) { 
  7470.             // remove buffer file from cache 
  7471.             unlink($this->buffer); 
  7472.         } 
  7473.         unset($this->buffer); 
  7474.         // remove filler space 
  7475.         $byterange_string_len = strlen(TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string); 
  7476.         // define the ByteRange 
  7477.         $byte_range = array(); 
  7478.         $byte_range[0] = 0; 
  7479.         $byte_range[1] = strpos($pdfdoc, TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string) + $byterange_string_len + 10; 
  7480.         $byte_range[2] = $byte_range[1] + $this->signature_max_length + 2; 
  7481.         $byte_range[3] = strlen($pdfdoc) - $byte_range[2]; 
  7482.         $pdfdoc = substr($pdfdoc, 0, $byte_range[1]).substr($pdfdoc, $byte_range[2]); 
  7483.         // replace the ByteRange 
  7484.         $byterange = sprintf('/ByteRange[0 %u %u %u]', $byte_range[1], $byte_range[2], $byte_range[3]); 
  7485.         $byterange .= str_repeat(' ', ($byterange_string_len - strlen($byterange))); 
  7486.         $pdfdoc = str_replace(TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string, $byterange, $pdfdoc); 
  7487.         // write the document to a temporary folder 
  7488.         $tempdoc = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('doc'); 
  7489.         $f = fopen($tempdoc, 'wb'); 
  7490.         if (!$f) { 
  7491.             $this->Error('Unable to create temporary file: '.$tempdoc); 
  7492.         } 
  7493.         $pdfdoc_length = strlen($pdfdoc); 
  7494.         fwrite($f, $pdfdoc, $pdfdoc_length); 
  7495.         fclose($f); 
  7496.         // get digital signature via openssl library 
  7497.         $tempsign = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('sig'); 
  7498.         if (empty($this->signature_data['extracerts'])) { 
  7499.             openssl_pkcs7_sign($tempdoc, $tempsign, $this->signature_data['signcert'], array($this->signature_data['privkey'], $this->signature_data['password']), array(), PKCS7_BINARY | PKCS7_DETACHED); 
  7500.         } else { 
  7501.             openssl_pkcs7_sign($tempdoc, $tempsign, $this->signature_data['signcert'], array($this->signature_data['privkey'], $this->signature_data['password']), array(), PKCS7_BINARY | PKCS7_DETACHED, $this->signature_data['extracerts']); 
  7502.         } 
  7503.         unlink($tempdoc); 
  7504.         // read signature 
  7505.         $signature = file_get_contents($tempsign); 
  7506.         unlink($tempsign); 
  7507.         // extract signature 
  7508.         $signature = substr($signature, $pdfdoc_length); 
  7509.         $signature = substr($signature, (strpos($signature, "%%EOF\n\n------") + 13)); 
  7510.         $tmparr = explode("\n\n", $signature); 
  7511.         $signature = $tmparr[1]; 
  7512.         unset($tmparr); 
  7513.         // decode signature 
  7514.         $signature = base64_decode(trim($signature)); 
  7515.         // add TSA timestamp to signature 
  7516.         $signature = $this->applyTSA($signature); 
  7517.         // convert signature to hex 
  7518.         $signature = current(unpack('H*', $signature)); 
  7519.         $signature = str_pad($signature, $this->signature_max_length, '0'); 
  7520.         // disable disk caching 
  7521.         $this->diskcache = false; 
  7522.         // Add signature to the document 
  7523.         $this->buffer = substr($pdfdoc, 0, $byte_range[1]).'<'.$signature.'>'.substr($pdfdoc, $byte_range[1]); 
  7524.         $this->bufferlen = strlen($this->buffer); 
  7525.     } 
  7526.     switch($dest) { 
  7527.         case 'I': { 
  7528.             // Send PDF to the standard output
