  7529.             if (ob_get_contents()) { 
  7530.                 $this->Error('Some data has already been output, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7531.             } 
  7532.             if (php_sapi_name() != 'cli') { 
  7533.                 // send output to a browser 
  7534.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7535.                 if (headers_sent()) { 
  7536.                     $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7537.                 } 
  7538.                 header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7539.                 //header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); // HTTP/1.1 
  7540.                 header('Pragma: public'); 
  7541.                 header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7542.                 header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7543.                 header('Content-Disposition: inline; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7544.                 TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData($this->getBuffer(), $this->bufferlen); 
  7545.             } else { 
  7546.                 echo $this->getBuffer(); 
  7547.             } 
  7548.             break; 
  7549.         } 
  7550.         case 'D': { 
  7551.             // download PDF as file 
  7552.             if (ob_get_contents()) { 
  7553.                 $this->Error('Some data has already been output, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7554.             } 
  7555.             header('Content-Description: File Transfer'); 
  7556.             if (headers_sent()) { 
  7557.                 $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7558.             } 
  7559.             header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7560.             //header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); // HTTP/1.1 
  7561.             header('Pragma: public'); 
  7562.             header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7563.             header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7564.             // force download dialog 
  7565.             if (strpos(php_sapi_name(), 'cgi') === false) { 
  7566.                 header('Content-Type: application/force-download'); 
  7567.                 header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream', false); 
  7568.                 header('Content-Type: application/download', false); 
  7569.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf', false); 
  7570.             } else { 
  7571.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7572.             } 
  7573.             // use the Content-Disposition header to supply a recommended filename 
  7574.             header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7575.             header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary'); 
  7576.             TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData($this->getBuffer(), $this->bufferlen); 
  7577.             break; 
  7578.         } 
  7579.         case 'F': 
  7580.         case 'FI': 
  7581.         case 'FD': { 
  7582.             // save PDF to a local file 
  7583.             if ($this->diskcache) { 
  7584.                 copy($this->buffer, $name); 
  7585.             } else { 
  7586.                 $f = fopen($name, 'wb'); 
  7587.                 if (!$f) { 
  7588.                     $this->Error('Unable to create output file: '.$name); 
  7589.                 } 
  7590.                 fwrite($f, $this->getBuffer(), $this->bufferlen); 
  7591.                 fclose($f); 
  7592.             } 
  7593.             if ($dest == 'FI') { 
  7594.                 // send headers to browser 
  7595.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7596.                 header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7597.                 //header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); // HTTP/1.1 
  7598.                 header('Pragma: public'); 
  7599.                 header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7600.                 header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7601.                 header('Content-Disposition: inline; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7602.                 TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData(file_get_contents($name), filesize($name)); 
  7603.             } elseif ($dest == 'FD') { 
  7604.                 // send headers to browser 
  7605.                 if (ob_get_contents()) { 
  7606.                     $this->Error('Some data has already been output, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7607.                 } 
  7608.                 header('Content-Description: File Transfer'); 
  7609.                 if (headers_sent()) { 
  7610.                     $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7611.                 } 
  7612.                 header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7613.                 header('Pragma: public'); 
  7614.                 header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7615.                 header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7616.                 // force download dialog 
  7617.                 if (strpos(php_sapi_name(), 'cgi') === false) { 
  7618.                     header('Content-Type: application/force-download'); 
  7619.                     header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream', false); 
  7620.                     header('Content-Type: application/download', false); 
  7621.                     header('Content-Type: application/pdf', false); 
  7622.                 } else { 
  7623.                     header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7624.                 } 
  7625.                 // use the Content-Disposition header to supply a recommended filename 
  7626.                 header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7627.                 header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary'); 
  7628.                 TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData(file_get_contents($name), filesize($name)); 
  7629.             } 
  7630.             break; 
  7631.         } 
  7632.         case 'E': { 
  7633.             // return PDF as base64 mime multi-part email attachment (RFC 2045) 
  7634.             $retval = 'Content-Type: application/pdf;'."\r\n"; 
  7635.             $retval .= ' name="'.$name.'"'."\r\n"; 
  7636.             $retval .= 'Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64'."\r\n"; 
  7637.             $retval .= 'Content-Disposition: attachment;'."\r\n"; 
  7638.             $retval .= ' filename="'.$name.'"'."\r\n\r\n"; 
  7639.             $retval .= chunk_split(base64_encode($this->getBuffer()), 76, "\r\n"); 
  7640.             return $retval; 
  7641.         } 
  7642.         case 'S': { 
  7643.             // returns PDF as a string 
  7644.             return $this->getBuffer(); 
  7645.         } 
  7646.         default: { 
  7647.             $this->Error('Incorrect output destination: '.$dest); 
  7648.         } 
  7649.     } 
  7650.     return ''; 
  7651. } 
  7652.  
  7653. /** 
  7654.  * Unset all class variables except the following critical variables. 
  7655.  * @param $destroyall (boolean) if true destroys all class variables, otherwise preserves critical variables. 
  7656.  * @param $preserve_objcopy (boolean) if true preserves the objcopy variable 
  7657.  * @public 
  7658.  * @since 4.5.016 (2009-02-24) 
  7659.  */ 
  7660. public function _destroy($destroyall=false, $preserve_objcopy=false) { 
  7661.     if ($destroyall AND isset($this->diskcache) AND $this->diskcache AND (!$preserve_objcopy) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->buffer))) { 
  7662.         // remove buffer file from cache 
  7663.         unlink($this->buffer); 
  7664.     } 
  7665.     if ($destroyall AND !empty($this->cached_files)) { 
  7666.         // remove cached files 
  7667.         foreach ($this->cached_files as $cachefile) { 
  7668.             if (is_file($cachefile)) { 
  7669.                 unlink($cachefile); 
  7670.             } 
  7671.         } 
  7672.         unset($this->cached_files); 
  7673.     } 
  7674.     $preserve = array( 
  7675.         'internal_encoding',  
  7676.         'state',  
  7677.         'bufferlen',  
  7678.         'buffer',  
  7679.         'diskcache',  
  7680.         'cached_files',  
  7681.         'sign',  
  7682.         'signature_data',  
  7683.         'signature_max_length',  
  7684.         'byterange_string',  
  7685.         'tsa_timestamp',  
  7686.         'tsa_data' 
  7687.  ); 
  7688.     foreach (array_keys(get_object_vars($this)) as $val) { 
  7689.         if ($destroyall OR !in_array($val, $preserve)) { 
  7690.             if ((!$preserve_objcopy OR ($val != 'objcopy')) AND isset($this->$val)) { 
  7691.                 unset($this->$val); 
  7692.             } 
  7693.         } 
  7694.     } 
  7695. } 
  7696.  
  7697. /** 
  7698.  * Check for locale-related bug 
  7699.  * @protected 
  7700.  */ 
  7701. protected function _dochecks() { 
  7702.     //Check for locale-related bug 
  7703.     if (1.1 == 1) { 
  7704.         $this->Error('Don\'t alter the locale before including class file'); 
  7705.     } 
  7706.     //Check for decimal separator 
  7707.     if (sprintf('%.1F', 1.0) != '1.0') { 
  7708.         setlocale(LC_NUMERIC, 'C'); 
  7709.     } 
  7710. } 
  7711.  
  7712. /** 
  7713.  * Return an array containing variations for the basic page number alias. 
  7714.  * @param $a (string) Base alias. 
  7715.  * @return array of page number aliases 
  7716.  * @protected 
  7717.  */ 
  7718. protected function getInternalPageNumberAliases($a= '') { 
  7719.     $alias = array(); 
  7720.     // build array of Unicode + ASCII variants (the order is important) 
  7721.     $alias = array('u' => array(), 'a' => array()); 
  7722.     $u = '{'.$a.'}'; 
  7723.     $alias['u'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($u); 
  7724.     if ($this->isunicode) { 
  7725.         $alias['u'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($u, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7726.         $alias['u'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::utf8StrRev($u, false, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7727.         $alias['a'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($a, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7728.         $alias['a'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::utf8StrRev($a, false, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7729.     } 
  7730.     $alias['a'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($a); 
  7731.     return $alias; 
  7732. } 
  7733.  
  7734. /** 
  7735.  * Return an array containing all internal page aliases. 
  7736.  * @return array of page number aliases 
  7737.  * @protected 
  7738.  */ 
  7739. protected function getAllInternalPageNumberAliases() { 
  7740.     $basic_alias = array(TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_tot_pages, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_num_page, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_right_shift); 
  7741.     $pnalias = array(); 
  7742.     foreach($basic_alias as $k => $a) { 
  7743.         $pnalias[$k] = $this->getInternalPageNumberAliases($a); 
  7744.     } 
  7745.     return $pnalias; 
  7746. } 
  7747.  
  7748. /** 
  7749.  * Replace right shift page number aliases with spaces to correct right alignment. 
  7750.  * This works perfectly only when using monospaced fonts. 
  7751.  * @param $page (string) Page content. 
  7752.  * @param $aliases (array) Array of page aliases. 
  7753.  * @param $diff (int) initial difference to add. 
  7754.  * @return replaced page content. 
  7755.  * @protected 
  7756.  */ 
  7757. protected function replaceRightShiftPageNumAliases($page, $aliases, $diff) { 
  7758.     foreach ($aliases as $type => $alias) { 
  7759.         foreach ($alias as $a) { 
  7760.             // find position of compensation factor 
  7761.             $startnum = (strpos($a, ':') + 1); 
  7762.             $a = substr($a, 0, $startnum); 
  7763.             if (($pos = strpos($page, $a)) !== false) { 
  7764.                 // end of alias 
  7765.                 $endnum = strpos($page, '}', $pos); 
  7766.                 // string to be replaced 
  7767.                 $aa = substr($page, $pos, ($endnum - $pos + 1)); 
  7768.                 // get compensation factor 
  7769.                 $ratio = substr($page, ($pos + $startnum), ($endnum - $pos - $startnum)); 
  7770.                 $ratio = preg_replace('/[^0-9\.]/', '', $ratio); 
  7771.                 $ratio = floatval($ratio); 
  7772.                 if ($type == 'u') { 
  7773.                     $chrdiff = floor(($diff + 12) * $ratio); 
  7774.                     $shift = str_repeat(' ', $chrdiff); 
  7775.                     $shift = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($shift, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7776.                 } else { 
  7777.                     $chrdiff = floor(($diff + 11) * $ratio); 
  7778.                     $shift = str_repeat(' ', $chrdiff); 
  7779.                 } 
  7780.                 $page = str_replace($aa, $shift, $page); 
  7781.             } 
  7782.         } 
  7783.     } 
  7784.     return $page; 
  7785. } 
  7786.  
  7787. /** 
  7788.  * Set page boxes to be included on page descriptions. 
  7789.  * @param $boxes (array) Array of page boxes to set on document: ('MediaBox', 'CropBox', 'BleedBox', 'TrimBox', 'ArtBox'). 
  7790.  * @protected 
  7791.  */ 
  7792. protected function setPageBoxTypes($boxes) { 
  7793.     $this->page_boxes = array(); 
  7794.     foreach ($boxes as $box) { 
  7795.         if (in_array($box, TCPDF_STATIC::$pageboxes)) { 
  7796.             $this->page_boxes[] = $box; 
  7797.         } 
  7798.     } 
  7799. } 
  7800.  
  7801. /** 
  7802.  * Output pages (and replace page number aliases). 
  7803.  * @protected 
  7804.  */ 
  7805. protected function _putpages() { 
  7806.     $filter = ($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : ''; 
  7807.     // get internal aliases for page numbers 
  7808.     $pnalias = $this->getAllInternalPageNumberAliases(); 
  7809.     $num_pages = $this->numpages; 
  7810.     $ptpa = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $num_pages - 1)); 
  7811.     $ptpu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($ptpa, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7812.     $ptp_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($ptpa); 
  7813.     $pagegroupnum = 0; 
  7814.     $groupnum = 0; 
  7815.     $ptgu = 1; 
  7816.     $ptga = 1; 
  7817.     $ptg_num_chars = 1; 
  7818.     for ($n = 1; $n <= $num_pages; ++$n) { 
  7819.         // get current page 
  7820.         $temppage = $this->getPageBuffer($n); 
  7821.         $pagelen = strlen($temppage); 
  7822.         // set replacements for total pages number 
  7823.         $pnpa = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $n - 1)); 
  7824.         $pnpu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($pnpa, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7825.         $pnp_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($pnpa); 
  7826.         $pdiff = 0; // difference used for right shift alignment of page numbers 
  7827.         $gdiff = 0; // difference used for right shift alignment of page group numbers 
  7828.         if (!empty($this->pagegroups)) { 
  7829.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$n])) { 
  7830.                 $pagegroupnum = 0; 
  7831.                 ++$groupnum; 
  7832.                 $ptga = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($this->pagegroups[$groupnum]); 
  7833.                 $ptgu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($ptga, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7834.                 $ptg_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($ptga); 
  7835.             } 
  7836.             ++$pagegroupnum; 
  7837.             $pnga = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($pagegroupnum); 
  7838.             $pngu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($pnga, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7839.             $png_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($pnga); 
  7840.             // replace page numbers 
  7841.             $replace = array(); 
  7842.             $replace[] = array($ptgu, $ptg_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[2]['u']); 
  7843.             $replace[] = array($ptga, $ptg_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[2]['a']); 
  7844.             $replace[] = array($pngu, $png_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[3]['u']); 
  7845.             $replace[] = array($pnga, $png_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[3]['a']); 
  7846.             list($temppage, $gdiff) = TCPDF_STATIC::replacePageNumAliases($temppage, $replace, $gdiff); 
  7847.         } 
  7848.         // replace page numbers 
  7849.         $replace = array(); 
  7850.         $replace[] = array($ptpu, $ptp_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[0]['u']); 
  7851.         $replace[] = array($ptpa, $ptp_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[0]['a']); 
  7852.         $replace[] = array($pnpu, $pnp_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[1]['u']); 
  7853.         $replace[] = array($pnpa, $pnp_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[1]['a']); 
  7854.         list($temppage, $pdiff) = TCPDF_STATIC::replacePageNumAliases($temppage, $replace, $pdiff); 
  7855.         // replace right shift alias 
  7856.         $temppage = $this->replaceRightShiftPageNumAliases($temppage, $pnalias[4], max($pdiff, $gdiff)); 
  7857.         // replace EPS marker 
  7858.         $temppage = str_replace($this->epsmarker, '', $temppage); 
  7859.         //Page 
  7860.         $this->page_obj_id[$n] = $this->_newobj(); 
  7861.         $out = '<<'; 
  7862.         $out .= ' /Type /Page'; 
  7863.         $out .= ' /Parent 1 0 R'; 
  7864.         if (empty($this->signature_data['approval']) OR ($this->signature_data['approval'] != 'A')) { 
  7865.             $out .= ' /LastModified '.$this->_datestring(0, $this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  7866.         } 
  7867.         $out .= ' /Resources 2 0 R'; 
  7868.         foreach ($this->page_boxes as $box) { 
  7869.             $out .= ' /'.$box; 
  7870.             $out .= sprintf(' [%F %F %F %F]', $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['llx'], $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['lly'], $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['urx'], $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['ury']); 
  7871.         } 
  7872.         if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo']) AND !empty($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'])) { 
  7873.             $out .= ' /BoxColorInfo <<'; 
  7874.             foreach ($this->page_boxes as $box) { 
  7875.                 if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box])) { 
  7876.                     $out .= ' /'.$box.' <<'; 
  7877.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['C'])) { 
  7878.                         $color = $this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['C']; 
  7879.                         $out .= ' /C ['; 
  7880.                         $out .= sprintf(' %F %F %F', ($color[0] / 255), ($color[1] / 255), ($color[2] / 255)); 
  7881.                         $out .= ' ]'; 
  7882.                     } 
  7883.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['W'])) { 
  7884.                         $out .= ' /W '.($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['W'] * $this->k); 
  7885.                     } 
  7886.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['S'])) { 
  7887.                         $out .= ' /S /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['S']; 
  7888.                     } 
  7889.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['D'])) { 
  7890.                         $dashes = $this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['D']; 
  7891.                         $out .= ' /D ['; 
  7892.                         foreach ($dashes as $dash) { 
  7893.                             $out .= sprintf(' %F', ($dash * $this->k)); 
  7894.                         } 
  7895.                         $out .= ' ]'; 
  7896.                     } 
  7897.                     $out .= ' >>'; 
  7898.                 } 
  7899.             } 
  7900.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  7901.         } 
  7902.         $out .= ' /Contents '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  7903.         $out .= ' /Rotate '.$this->pagedim[$n]['Rotate']; 
  7904.         if (!$this->pdfa_mode) { 
  7905.             $out .= ' /Group << /Type /Group /S /Transparency /CS /DeviceRGB >>'; 
  7906.         } 
  7907.         if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']) AND !empty($this->pagedim[$n]['trans'])) { 
  7908.             // page transitions 
  7909.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dur'])) { 
  7910.                 $out .= ' /Dur '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dur']; 
  7911.             } 
  7912.             $out .= ' /Trans <<'; 
  7913.             $out .= ' /Type /Trans'; 
  7914.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['S'])) { 
  7915.                 $out .= ' /S /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['S']; 
  7916.             } 
  7917.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['D'])) { 
  7918.                 $out .= ' /D '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['D']; 
  7919.             } 
  7920.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dm'])) { 
  7921.                 $out .= ' /Dm /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dm']; 
  7922.             } 
  7923.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['M'])) { 
  7924.                 $out .= ' /M /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['M']; 
  7925.             } 
  7926.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Di'])) { 
  7927.                 $out .= ' /Di '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Di']; 
  7928.             } 
  7929.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['SS'])) { 
  7930.                 $out .= ' /SS '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['SS']; 
  7931.             } 
  7932.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['B'])) { 
  7933.                 $out .= ' /B '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['B']; 
  7934.             } 
  7935.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  7936.         } 
  7937.         $out .= $this->_getannotsrefs($n); 
  7938.         $out .= ' /PZ '.$this->pagedim[$n]['PZ']; 
  7939.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  7940.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  7941.         $this->_out($out); 
  7942.         //Page content 
  7943.         $p = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($temppage) : $temppage; 
  7944.         $this->_newobj(); 
  7945.         $p = $this->_getrawstream($p); 
  7946.         $this->_out('<<'.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($p).'>> stream'."\n".$p."\n".'endstream'."\n".'endobj'); 
  7947.         if ($this->diskcache) { 
  7948.             // remove temporary files 
  7949.             unlink($this->pages[$n]); 
  7950.         } 
  7951.     } 
  7952.     //Pages root 
  7953.     $out = $this->_getobj(1)."\n"; 
  7954.     $out .= '<< /Type /Pages /Kids ['; 
  7955.     foreach($this->page_obj_id as $page_obj) { 
  7956.         $out .= ' '.$page_obj.' 0 R'; 
  7957.     } 
  7958.     $out .= ' ] /Count '.$num_pages.' >>'; 
  7959.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  7960.     $this->_out($out); 
  7961. } 
  7962.  
  7963. /** 
  7964.  * Output references to page annotations 
  7965.  * @param $n (int) page number 
  7966.  * @protected 
  7967.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  7968.  * @since 4.7.000 (2008-08-29) 
  7969.  * @deprecated 
  7970.  */ 
  7971. protected function _putannotsrefs($n) { 
  7972.     $this->_out($this->_getannotsrefs($n)); 
  7973. } 
  7974.  
  7975. /** 
  7976.  * Get references to page annotations. 
  7977.  * @param $n (int) page number 
  7978.  * @return string 
  7979.  * @protected 
  7980.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  7981.  * @since 5.0.010 (2010-05-17) 
  7982.  */ 
  7983. protected function _getannotsrefs($n) { 
  7984.     if (!(isset($this->PageAnnots[$n]) OR ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])))) { 
  7985.         return ''; 
  7986.     } 
  7987.     $out = ' /Annots ['; 
  7988.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
  7989.         foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $key => $val) { 
  7990.             if (!in_array($val['n'], $this->radio_groups)) { 
  7991.                 $out .= ' '.$val['n'].' 0 R'; 
  7992.             } 
  7993.         } 
  7994.         // add radiobutton groups 
  7995.         if (isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$n])) { 
  7996.             foreach ($this->radiobutton_groups[$n] as $key => $data) { 
  7997.                 if (isset($data['n'])) { 
  7998.                     $out .= ' '.$data['n'].' 0 R'; 
  7999.                 } 
  8000.             } 
  8001.         } 
  8002.     } 
  8003.     if ($this->sign AND ($n == $this->signature_appearance['page']) AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])) { 
  8004.         // set reference for signature object 
  8005.         $out .= ' '.$this->sig_obj_id.' 0 R'; 
  8006.     } 
  8007.     if (!empty($this->empty_signature_appearance)) { 
  8008.         foreach ($this->empty_signature_appearance as $esa) { 
  8009.             if ($esa['page'] == $n) { 
  8010.                 // set reference for empty signature objects 
  8011.                 $out .= ' '.$esa['objid'].' 0 R'; 
  8012.             } 
  8013.         } 
  8014.     } 
  8015.     $out .= ' ]'; 
  8016.     return $out; 
  8017. } 
  8018.  
  8019. /** 
  8020.  * Output annotations objects for all pages. 
  8021.  * !!! THIS METHOD IS NOT YET COMPLETED !!! 
  8022.  * See section 12.5 of PDF 32000_2008 reference. 
  8023.  * @protected 
  8024.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  8025.  * @since 3.0.018 (2008-08-06) 
  8026.  */ 
  8027. protected function _putannotsobjs() { 
  8028.     // reset object counter 
  8029.     for ($n=1; $n <= $this->numpages; ++$n) { 
  8030.         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
  8031.             // set page annotations 
  8032.             foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $key => $pl) { 
  8033.                 $annot_obj_id = $this->PageAnnots[$n][$key]['n']; 
  8034.                 // create annotation object for grouping radiobuttons 
  8035.                 if (isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']]) AND is_array($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']])) { 
  8036.                     $radio_button_obj_id = $this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']]['n']; 
  8037.                     $annots = '<<'; 
  8038.                     $annots .= ' /Type /Annot'; 
  8039.                     $annots .= ' /Subtype /Widget'; 
  8040.                     $annots .= ' /Rect [0 0 0 0]'; 
  8041.                     if ($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']]['#readonly#']) { 
  8042.                         // read only 
  8043.                         $annots .= ' /F 68'; 
  8044.                         $annots .= ' /Ff 49153'; 
  8045.                     } else { 
  8046.                         $annots .= ' /F 4'; // default print for PDF/A 
  8047.                         $annots .= ' /Ff 49152'; 
  8048.                     } 
  8049.                     $annots .= ' /T '.$this->_datastring($pl['txt'], $radio_button_obj_id); 
  8050.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['tu']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['tu'])) { 
  8051.                         $annots .= ' /TU '.$this->_datastring($pl['opt']['tu'], $radio_button_obj_id); 
  8052.                     } 
  8053.                     $annots .= ' /FT /Btn'; 
  8054.                     $annots .= ' /Kids ['; 
  8055.                     $defval = ''; 
  8056.                     foreach ($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']] as $key => $data) { 
  8057.                         if (isset($data['kid'])) { 
  8058.                             $annots .= ' '.$data['kid'].' 0 R'; 
  8059.                             if ($data['def'] !== 'Off') { 
  8060.                                 $defval = $data['def']; 
  8061.                             } 
  8062.                         } 
  8063.                     } 
  8064.                     $annots .= ' ]'; 
  8065.                     if (!empty($defval)) { 
  8066.                         $annots .= ' /V /'.$defval; 
  8067.                     } 
  8068.                     $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8069.                     $this->_out($this->_getobj($radio_button_obj_id)."\n".$annots."\n".'endobj'); 
  8070.                     $this->form_obj_id[] = $radio_button_obj_id; 
  8071.                     // store object id to be used on Parent entry of Kids 
  8072.                     $this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']] = $radio_button_obj_id; 
  8073.                 } 
  8074.                 $formfield = false; 
  8075.                 $pl['opt'] = array_change_key_case($pl['opt'], CASE_LOWER); 
  8076.                 $a = $pl['x'] * $this->k; 
  8077.                 $b = $this->pagedim[$n]['h'] - (($pl['y'] + $pl['h']) * $this->k); 
  8078.                 $c = $pl['w'] * $this->k; 
  8079.                 $d = $pl['h'] * $this->k; 
  8080.                 $rect = sprintf('%F %F %F %F', $a, $b, $a+$c, $b+$d); 
  8081.                 // create new annotation object 
  8082.                 $annots = '<</Type /Annot'; 
  8083.                 $annots .= ' /Subtype /'.$pl['opt']['subtype']; 
  8084.                 $annots .= ' /Rect ['.$rect.']'; 
  8085.                 $ft = array('Btn', 'Tx', 'Ch', 'Sig'); 
  8086.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['ft']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['ft'], $ft)) { 
  8087.                     $annots .= ' /FT /'.$pl['opt']['ft']; 
  8088.                     $formfield = true; 
  8089.                 } 
  8090.                 $annots .= ' /Contents '.$this->_textstring($pl['txt'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8091.                 $annots .= ' /P '.$this->page_obj_id[$n].' 0 R'; 
  8092.                 $annots .= ' /NM '.$this->_datastring(sprintf('%04u-%04u', $n, $key), $annot_obj_id); 
  8093.                 $annots .= ' /M '.$this->_datestring($annot_obj_id, $this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  8094.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['f'])) { 
  8095.                     $fval = 0; 
  8096.                     if (is_array($pl['opt']['f'])) { 
  8097.                         foreach ($pl['opt']['f'] as $f) { 
  8098.                             switch (strtolower($f)) { 
  8099.                                 case 'invisible': { 
  8100.                                     $fval += 1 << 0; 
  8101.                                     break; 
  8102.                                 } 
  8103.                                 case 'hidden': { 
  8104.                                     $fval += 1 << 1; 
  8105.                                     break; 
  8106.                                 } 
  8107.                                 case 'print': { 
  8108.                                     $fval += 1 << 2; 
  8109.                                     break; 
  8110.                                 } 
  8111.                                 case 'nozoom': { 
  8112.                                     $fval += 1 << 3; 
  8113.                                     break; 
  8114.                                 } 
  8115.                                 case 'norotate': { 
  8116.                                     $fval += 1 << 4; 
  8117.                                     break; 
  8118.                                 } 
  8119.                                 case 'noview': { 
  8120.                                     $fval += 1 << 5; 
  8121.                                     break; 
  8122.                                 } 
  8123.                                 case 'readonly': { 
  8124.                                     $fval += 1 << 6; 
  8125.                                     break; 
  8126.                                 } 
  8127.                                 case 'locked': { 
  8128.                                     $fval += 1 << 8; 
  8129.                                     break; 
  8130.                                 } 
  8131.                                 case 'togglenoview': { 
  8132.                                     $fval += 1 << 9; 
  8133.                                     break; 
  8134.                                 } 
  8135.                                 case 'lockedcontents': { 
  8136.                                     $fval += 1 << 10; 
  8137.                                     break; 
  8138.                                 } 
  8139.                                 default: { 
  8140.                                     break; 
  8141.                                 } 
  8142.                             } 
  8143.                         } 
  8144.                     } else { 
  8145.                         $fval = intval($pl['opt']['f']); 
  8146.                     } 
  8147.                 } else { 
  8148.                     $fval = 4; 
  8149.                 } 
  8150.                 if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  8151.                     // force print flag for PDF/A mode 
  8152.                     $fval |= 4; 
  8153.                 } 
  8154.                 $annots .= ' /F '.intval($fval); 
  8155.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['as']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['as'])) { 
  8156.                     $annots .= ' /AS /'.$pl['opt']['as']; 
  8157.                 } 
  8158.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['ap'])) { 
  8159.                     // appearance stream 
  8160.                     $annots .= ' /AP <<'; 
  8161.                     if (is_array($pl['opt']['ap'])) { 
  8162.                         foreach ($pl['opt']['ap'] as $apmode => $apdef) { 
  8163.                             // $apmode can be: n = normal; r = rollover; d = down; 
  8164.                             $annots .= ' /'.strtoupper($apmode); 
  8165.                             if (is_array($apdef)) { 
  8166.                                 $annots .= ' <<'; 
  8167.                                 foreach ($apdef as $apstate => $stream) { 
  8168.                                     // reference to XObject that define the appearance for this mode-state 
  8169.                                     $apsobjid = $this->_putAPXObject($c, $d, $stream); 
  8170.                                     $annots .= ' /'.$apstate.' '.$apsobjid.' 0 R'; 
  8171.                                 } 
  8172.                                 $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8173.                             } else { 
  8174.                                 // reference to XObject that define the appearance for this mode 
  8175.                                 $apsobjid = $this->_putAPXObject($c, $d, $apdef); 
  8176.                                 $annots .= ' '.$apsobjid.' 0 R'; 
  8177.                             } 
  8178.                         } 
  8179.                     } else { 
  8180.                         $annots .= $pl['opt']['ap']; 
  8181.                     } 
  8182.                     $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8183.                 } 
  8184.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['bs']))) { 
  8185.                     $annots .= ' /BS <<'; 
  8186.                     $annots .= ' /Type /Border'; 
  8187.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']['w'])) { 
  8188.                         $annots .= ' /W '.intval($pl['opt']['bs']['w']); 
  8189.                     } 
  8190.                     $bstyles = array('S', 'D', 'B', 'I', 'U'); 
  8191.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']['s']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['bs']['s'], $bstyles)) { 
  8192.                         $annots .= ' /S /'.$pl['opt']['bs']['s']; 
  8193.                     } 
  8194.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']['d']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['bs']['d']))) { 
  8195.                         $annots .= ' /D ['; 
  8196.                         foreach ($pl['opt']['bs']['d'] as $cord) { 
  8197.                             $annots .= ' '.intval($cord); 
  8198.                         } 
  8199.                         $annots .= ']'; 
  8200.                     } 
  8201.                     $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8202.                 } else { 
  8203.                     $annots .= ' /Border ['; 
  8204.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['border']) AND (count($pl['opt']['border']) >= 3)) { 
  8205.                         $annots .= intval($pl['opt']['border'][0]).' '; 
  8206.                         $annots .= intval($pl['opt']['border'][1]).' '; 
  8207.                         $annots .= intval($pl['opt']['border'][2]); 
  8208.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['border'][3]) AND is_array($pl['opt']['border'][3])) { 
  8209.                             $annots .= ' ['; 
  8210.                             foreach ($pl['opt']['border'][3] as $dash) { 
  8211.                                 $annots .= intval($dash).' '; 
  8212.                             } 
  8213.                             $annots .= ']'; 
  8214.                         } 
  8215.                     } else { 
  8216.                         $annots .= '0 0 0'; 
  8217.                     } 
  8218.                     $annots .= ']'; 
  8219.                 } 
  8220.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['be']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['be']))) { 
  8221.                     $annots .= ' /BE <<'; 
  8222.                     $bstyles = array('S', 'C'); 
  8223.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['be']['s']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['be']['s'], $bstyles)) { 
  8224.                         $annots .= ' /S /'.$pl['opt']['bs']['s']; 
  8225.                     } else { 
  8226.                         $annots .= ' /S /S'; 
  8227.                     } 
  8228.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['be']['i']) AND ($pl['opt']['be']['i'] >= 0) AND ($pl['opt']['be']['i'] <= 2)) { 
  8229.                         $annots .= ' /I '.sprintf(' %F', $pl['opt']['be']['i']); 
  8230.                     } 
  8231.                     $annots .= '>>'; 
  8232.                 } 
  8233.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['c']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['c'])) AND !empty($pl['opt']['c'])) { 
  8234.                     $annots .= ' /C '.TCPDF_COLORS::getColorStringFromArray($pl['opt']['c']); 
  8235.                 } 
  8236.                 //$annots .= ' /StructParent '; 
  8237.                 //$annots .= ' /OC '; 
  8238.                 $markups = array('text', 'freetext', 'line', 'square', 'circle', 'polygon', 'polyline', 'highlight', 'underline', 'squiggly', 'strikeout', 'stamp', 'caret', 'ink', 'fileattachment', 'sound'); 
  8239.                 if (in_array(strtolower($pl['opt']['subtype']), $markups)) { 
  8240.                     // this is a markup type 
  8241.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['t']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['t'])) { 
  8242.                         $annots .= ' /T '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['t'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8243.                     } 
  8244.                     //$annots .= ' /Popup '; 
  8245.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['ca'])) { 
  8246.                         $annots .= ' /CA '.sprintf('%F', floatval($pl['opt']['ca'])); 
  8247.                     } 
  8248.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['rc'])) { 
  8249.                         $annots .= ' /RC '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['rc'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8250.                     } 
  8251.                     $annots .= ' /CreationDate '.$this->_datestring($annot_obj_id, $this->doc_creation_timestamp); 
  8252.                     //$annots .= ' /IRT '; 
  8253.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['subj'])) { 
  8254.                         $annots .= ' /Subj '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['subj'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8255.                     } 
  8256.                     //$annots .= ' /RT '; 
  8257.                     //$annots .= ' /IT '; 
  8258.                     //$annots .= ' /ExData '; 
  8259.                 } 
  8260.                 $lineendings = array('Square', 'Circle', 'Diamond', 'OpenArrow', 'ClosedArrow', 'None', 'Butt', 'ROpenArrow', 'RClosedArrow', 'Slash'); 
  8261.                 // Annotation types 
  8262.                 switch (strtolower($pl['opt']['subtype'])) { 
  8263.                     case 'text': { 
  8264.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['open'])) { 
  8265.                             $annots .= ' /Open '. (strtolower($pl['opt']['open']) == 'true' ? 'true' : 'false'); 
  8266.                         } 
  8267.                         $iconsapp = array('Comment', 'Help', 'Insert', 'Key', 'NewParagraph', 'Note', 'Paragraph'); 
  8268.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['name']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['name'], $iconsapp)) { 
  8269.                             $annots .= ' /Name /'.$pl['opt']['name']; 
  8270.                         } else { 
  8271.                             $annots .= ' /Name /Note'; 
  8272.                         } 
  8273.                         $statemodels = array('Marked', 'Review'); 
  8274.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['statemodel']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['statemodel'], $statemodels)) { 
  8275.                             $annots .= ' /StateModel /'.$pl['opt']['statemodel']; 
  8276.                         } else { 
  8277.                             $pl['opt']['statemodel'] = 'Marked'; 
  8278.                             $annots .= ' /StateModel /'.$pl['opt']['statemodel']; 
  8279.                         } 
  8280.                         if ($pl['opt']['statemodel'] == 'Marked') { 
  8281.                             $states = array('Accepted', 'Unmarked'); 
  8282.                         } else { 
  8283.                             $states = array('Accepted', 'Rejected', 'Cancelled', 'Completed', 'None'); 
  8284.                         } 
  8285.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['state']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['state'], $states)) { 
  8286.                             $annots .= ' /State /'.$pl['opt']['state']; 
  8287.                         } else { 
  8288.                             if ($pl['opt']['statemodel'] == 'Marked') { 
  8289.                                 $annots .= ' /State /Unmarked'; 
  8290.                             } else { 
  8291.                                 $annots .= ' /State /None'; 
  8292.                             } 
  8293.                         } 
  8294.                         break; 
  8295.                     } 
  8296.                     case 'link': { 
  8297.                         if (is_string($pl['txt'])) { 
  8298.                             if ($pl['txt'][0] == '#') { 
  8299.                                 // internal destination 
  8300.                                 $annots .= ' /Dest /'.TCPDF_STATIC::encodeNameObject(substr($pl['txt'], 1)); 
  8301.                             } elseif ($pl['txt'][0] == '%') { 
  8302.                                 // embedded PDF file 
  8303.                                 $filename = basename(substr($pl['txt'], 1)); 
  8304.                                 $annots .= ' /A << /S /GoToE /D [0 /Fit] /NewWindow true /T << /R /C /P '.($n - 1).' /A '.$this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['a'].' >> >>'; 
  8305.                             } elseif ($pl['txt'][0] == '*') { 
  8306.                                 // embedded generic file 
  8307.                                 $filename = basename(substr($pl['txt'], 1)); 
  8308.                                 $jsa = 'var D=event.target.doc;var MyData=D.dataObjects;for (var i in MyData) if (MyData[i].path=="'.$filename.'") D.exportDataObject( { cName : MyData[i].name, nLaunch : 2});'; 
  8309.                                 $annots .= ' /A << /S /JavaScript /JS '.$this->_textstring($jsa, $annot_obj_id).'>>'; 
  8310.                             } else { 
  8311.                                 $parsedUrl = parse_url($pl['txt']); 
  8312.                                 if (empty($parsedUrl['scheme']) AND (strtolower(substr($parsedUrl['path'], -4)) == '.pdf')) { 
  8313.                                     // relative link to a PDF file 
  8314.                                     $dest = '[0 /Fit]'; // default page 0 
  8315.                                     if (!empty($parsedUrl['fragment'])) { 
  8316.                                         // check for named destination 
  8317.                                         $tmp = explode('=', $parsedUrl['fragment']); 
  8318.                                         $dest = '('.((count($tmp) == 2) ? $tmp[1] : $tmp[0]).')'; 
  8319.                                     } 
  8320.                                     $annots .= ' /A <</S /GoToR /D '.$dest.' /F '.$this->_datastring($this->unhtmlentities($parsedUrl['path']), $annot_obj_id).' /NewWindow true>>'; 
  8321.                                 } else { 
  8322.                                     // external URI link 
  8323.                                     $annots .= ' /A <</S /URI /URI '.$this->_datastring($this->unhtmlentities($pl['txt']), $annot_obj_id).'>>'; 
  8324.                                 } 
  8325.                             } 
  8326.                         } elseif (isset($this->links[$pl['txt']])) { 
  8327.                             // internal link ID 
  8328.                             $l = $this->links[$pl['txt']]; 
  8329.                             if (isset($this->page_obj_id[($l['p'])])) { 
  8330.                                 $annots .= sprintf(' /Dest [%u 0 R /XYZ 0 %F null]', $this->page_obj_id[($l['p'])], ($this->pagedim[$l['p']]['h'] - ($l['y'] * $this->k))); 
  8331.                             } 
  8332.                         } 
  8333.                         $hmodes = array('N', 'I', 'O', 'P'); 
  8334.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['h']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['h'], $hmodes)) { 
  8335.                             $annots .= ' /H /'.$pl['opt']['h']; 
  8336.                         } else { 
  8337.                             $annots .= ' /H /I'; 
  8338.                         } 
  8339.                         //$annots .= ' /PA '; 
  8340.                         //$annots .= ' /Quadpoints '; 
  8341.                         break; 
  8342.                     } 
  8343.                     case 'freetext': { 
  8344.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['da']) AND !empty($pl['opt']['da'])) { 
  8345.                             $annots .= ' /DA ('.$pl['opt']['da'].')'; 
  8346.                         } 
  8347.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['q']) AND ($pl['opt']['q'] >= 0) AND ($pl['opt']['q'] <= 2)) { 
  8348.                             $annots .= ' /Q '.intval($pl['opt']['q']); 
  8349.                         } 
  8350.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['rc'])) { 
  8351.                             $annots .= ' /RC '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['rc'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8352.                         } 
  8353.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['ds'])) { 
  8354.                             $annots .= ' /DS '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['ds'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8355.                         } 
  8356.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['cl']) AND is_array($pl['opt']['cl'])) { 
  8357.                             $annots .= ' /CL ['; 
  8358.                             foreach ($pl['opt']['cl'] as $cl) { 
  8359.                                 $annots .= sprintf('%F ', $cl * $this->k); 
  8360.                             } 
  8361.                             $annots .= ']'; 
  8362.                         } 
  8363.                         $tfit = array('FreeText', 'FreeTextCallout', 'FreeTextTypeWriter'); 
  8364.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['it']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['it'], $tfit)) { 
  8365.                             $annots .= ' /IT /'.$pl['opt']['it']; 
  8366.                         } 
  8367.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['rd']) AND is_array($pl['opt']['rd'])) { 
  8368.                             $l = $pl['opt']['rd'][0] * $this->k; 
  8369.                             $r = $pl['opt']['rd'][1] * $this->k; 
  8370.                             $t = $pl['opt']['rd'][2] * $this->k; 
  8371.                             $b = $pl['opt']['rd'][3] * $this->k; 
  8372.                             $annots .= ' /RD ['.sprintf('%F %F %F %F', $l, $r, $t, $b).']'; 
  8373.                         } 
  8374.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['le']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['le'], $lineendings)) { 
  8375.                             $annots .= ' /LE /'.$pl['opt']['le']; 
  8376.                         } 
  8377.                         break; 
  8378.                     } 
  8379.                     case 'line': { 
  8380.                         break; 
  8381.                     } 
  8382.                     case 'square': { 
  8383.                         break; 
  8384.                     } 
  8385.                     case 'circle': { 
  8386.                         break; 
  8387.                     } 
  8388.                     case 'polygon': { 
  8389.                         break; 
  8390.                     } 
  8391.                     case 'polyline': { 
  8392.                         break; 
  8393.                     } 
  8394.                     case 'highlight': { 
  8395.                         break; 
  8396.                     } 
  8397.                     case 'underline': { 
  8398.                         break; 
  8399.                     } 
  8400.                     case 'squiggly': { 
  8401.                         break; 
  8402.                     } 
  8403.                     case 'strikeout': { 
  8404.                         break; 
  8405.                     } 
  8406.                     case 'stamp': { 
  8407.                         break; 
  8408.                     } 
  8409.                     case 'caret': { 
  8410.                         break; 
  8411.                     } 
  8412.                     case 'ink': { 
  8413.                         break; 
  8414.                     } 
  8415.                     case 'popup': { 
  8416.                         break; 
  8417.                     } 
  8418.                     case 'fileattachment': { 
  8419.                         if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  8420.                             // embedded files are not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  8421.                             break; 
  8422.                         } 
  8423.                         if (!isset($pl['opt']['fs'])) { 
  8424.                             break; 
  8425.                         } 
  8426.                         $filename = basename($pl['opt']['fs']); 
  8427.                         if (isset($this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['f'])) { 
  8428.                             $annots .= ' /FS '.$this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['f'].' 0 R'; 
  8429.                             $iconsapp = array('Graph', 'Paperclip', 'PushPin', 'Tag'); 
  8430.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['name']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['name'], $iconsapp)) { 
  8431.                                 $annots .= ' /Name /'.$pl['opt']['name']; 
  8432.                             } else { 
  8433.                                 $annots .= ' /Name /PushPin'; 
  8434.                             } 
  8435.                             // index (zero-based) of the annotation in the Annots array of this page 
  8436.                             $this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['a'] = $key; 
  8437.                         } 
  8438.                         break; 
  8439.                     } 
  8440.                     case 'sound': { 
  8441.                         if (!isset($pl['opt']['fs'])) { 
  8442.                             break; 
  8443.                         } 
  8444.                         $filename = basename($pl['opt']['fs']); 
  8445.                         if (isset($this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['f'])) { 
  8446.                             // ... TO BE COMPLETED ... 
  8447.                             // /R /C /B /E /CO /CP 
  8448.                             $annots .= ' /Sound '.$this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['f'].' 0 R'; 
  8449.                             $iconsapp = array('Speaker', 'Mic'); 
  8450.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['name']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['name'], $iconsapp)) { 
  8451.                                 $annots .= ' /Name /'.$pl['opt']['name']; 
  8452.                             } else { 
  8453.                                 $annots .= ' /Name /Speaker'; 
  8454.                             } 
  8455.                         } 
  8456.                         break; 
  8457.                     } 
  8458.                     case 'movie': { 
  8459.                         break; 
  8460.                     } 
  8461.                     case 'widget': { 
  8462.                         $hmode = array('N', 'I', 'O', 'P', 'T'); 
  8463.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['h']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['h'], $hmode)) { 
  8464.                             $annots .= ' /H /'.$pl['opt']['h']; 
  8465.                         } 
  8466.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['mk'])) AND !empty($pl['opt']['mk'])) { 
  8467.                             $annots .= ' /MK <<'; 
  8468.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['r'])) { 
  8469.                                 $annots .= ' /R '.$pl['opt']['mk']['r']; 
  8470.                             } 
  8471.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['bc']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['mk']['bc']))) { 
  8472.                                 $annots .= ' /BC '.TCPDF_COLORS::getColorStringFromArray($pl['opt']['mk']['bc']); 
  8473.                             } 
  8474.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['bg']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['mk']['bg']))) { 
  8475.                                 $annots .= ' /BG '.TCPDF_COLORS::getColorStringFromArray($pl['opt']['mk']['bg']); 
  8476.                             } 
  8477.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['ca'])) { 
  8478.                                 $annots .= ' /CA '.$pl['opt']['mk']['ca']; 
  8479.                             } 
  8480.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['rc'])) { 
  8481.                                 $annots .= ' /RC '.$pl['opt']['mk']['rc']; 
  8482.                             } 
  8483.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['ac'])) { 
  8484.                                 $annots .= ' /AC '.$pl['opt']['mk']['ac']; 
  8485.                             } 
  8486.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['i'])) { 
  8487.                                 $info = $this->getImageBuffer($pl['opt']['mk']['i']); 
  8488.                                 if ($info !== false) { 
  8489.                                     $annots .= ' /I '.$info['n'].' 0 R'; 
  8490.                                 } 
  8491.                             } 
  8492.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['ri'])) { 
  8493.                                 $info = $this->getImageBuffer($pl['opt']['mk']['ri']); 
  8494.                                 if ($info !== false) { 
  8495.                                     $annots .= ' /RI '.$info['n'].' 0 R'; 
  8496.                                 } 
  8497.                             } 
  8498.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['ix'])) { 
  8499.                                 $info = $this->getImageBuffer($pl['opt']['mk']['ix']); 
  8500.                                 if ($info !== false) { 
  8501.                                     $annots .= ' /IX '.$info['n'].' 0 R'; 
  8502.                                 } 
  8503.                             } 
  8504.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['if']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['mk']['if'])) AND !empty($pl['opt']['mk']['if'])) { 
  8505.                                 $annots .= ' /IF <<'; 
  8506.                                 $if_sw = array('A', 'B', 'S', 'N'); 
  8507.                                 if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['sw']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['sw'], $if_sw)) { 
  8508.                                     $annots .= ' /SW /'.$pl['opt']['mk']['if']['sw']; 
  8509.                                 } 
  8510.                                 $if_s = array('A', 'P'); 
  8511.                                 if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['s']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['s'], $if_s)) { 
  8512.                                     $annots .= ' /S /'.$pl['opt']['mk']['if']['s']; 
  8513.                                 } 
  8514.                                 if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['a']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['a'])) AND !empty($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['a'])) { 
  8515.                                     $annots .= sprintf(' /A [%F %F]', $pl['opt']['mk']['if']['a'][0], $pl['opt']['mk']['if']['a'][1]); 
  8516.                                 } 
  8517.                                 if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['fb']) AND ($pl['opt']['mk']['if']['fb'])) { 
  8518.                                     $annots .= ' /FB true'; 
  8519.                                 } 
  8520.                                 $annots .= '>>'; 
  8521.                             } 
  8522.                             if (isset($pl['opt']['mk']['tp']) AND ($pl['opt']['mk']['tp'] >= 0) AND ($pl['opt']['mk']['tp'] <= 6)) { 
  8523.                                 $annots .= ' /TP '.intval($pl['opt']['mk']['tp']); 
  8524.                             } 
  8525.                             $annots .= '>>'; 
  8526.                         } // end MK 
  8527.                         // --- Entries for field dictionaries --- 
  8528.                         if (isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']])) { 
  8529.                             // set parent 
  8530.                             $annots .= ' /Parent '.$this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']].' 0 R'; 
  8531.                         } 
  8532.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['t']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['t'])) { 
  8533.                             $annots .= ' /T '.$this->_datastring($pl['opt']['t'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8534.                         } 
  8535.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['tu']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['tu'])) { 
  8536.                             $annots .= ' /TU '.$this->_datastring($pl['opt']['tu'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8537.                         } 
  8538.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['tm']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['tm'])) { 
  8539.                             $annots .= ' /TM '.$this->_datastring($pl['opt']['tm'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8540.                         } 
  8541.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['ff'])) { 
  8542.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['ff'])) { 
  8543.                                 // array of bit settings 
  8544.                                 $flag = 0; 
  8545.                                 foreach($pl['opt']['ff'] as $val) { 
  8546.                                     $flag += 1 << ($val - 1); 
  8547.                                 } 
  8548.                             } else { 
  8549.                                 $flag = intval($pl['opt']['ff']); 
  8550.                             } 
  8551.                             $annots .= ' /Ff '.$flag; 
  8552.                         } 
  8553.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['maxlen'])) { 
  8554.                             $annots .= ' /MaxLen '.intval($pl['opt']['maxlen']); 
  8555.                         } 
  8556.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['v'])) { 
  8557.                             $annots .= ' /V'; 
  8558.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['v'])) { 
  8559.                                 foreach ($pl['opt']['v'] AS $optval) { 
  8560.                                     if (is_float($optval)) { 
  8561.                                         $optval = sprintf('%F', $optval); 
  8562.                                     } 
  8563.                                     $annots .= ' '.$optval; 
  8564.                                 } 
  8565.                             } else { 
  8566.                                 $annots .= ' '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['v'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8567.                             } 
  8568.                         } 
  8569.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['dv'])) { 
  8570.                             $annots .= ' /DV'; 
  8571.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['dv'])) { 
  8572.                                 foreach ($pl['opt']['dv'] AS $optval) { 
  8573.                                     if (is_float($optval)) { 
  8574.                                         $optval = sprintf('%F', $optval); 
  8575.                                     } 
  8576.                                     $annots .= ' '.$optval; 
  8577.                                 } 
  8578.                             } else { 
  8579.                                 $annots .= ' '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['dv'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8580.                             } 
  8581.                         } 
  8582.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['rv'])) { 
  8583.                             $annots .= ' /RV'; 
  8584.                             if (is_array($pl['opt']['rv'])) { 
  8585.                                 foreach ($pl['opt']['rv'] AS $optval) { 
  8586.                                     if (is_float($optval)) { 
  8587.                                         $optval = sprintf('%F', $optval); 
  8588.                                     } 
  8589.                                     $annots .= ' '.$optval; 
  8590.                                 } 
  8591.                             } else { 
  8592.                                 $annots .= ' '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['rv'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8593.                             } 
  8594.                         } 
  8595.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['a']) AND !empty($pl['opt']['a'])) { 
  8596.                             $annots .= ' /A << '.$pl['opt']['a'].' >>'; 
  8597.                         } 
  8598.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['aa']) AND !empty($pl['opt']['aa'])) { 
  8599.                             $annots .= ' /AA << '.$pl['opt']['aa'].' >>'; 
  8600.                         } 
  8601.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['da']) AND !empty($pl['opt']['da'])) { 
  8602.                             $annots .= ' /DA ('.$pl['opt']['da'].')'; 
  8603.                         } 
  8604.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['q']) AND ($pl['opt']['q'] >= 0) AND ($pl['opt']['q'] <= 2)) { 
  8605.                             $annots .= ' /Q '.intval($pl['opt']['q']); 
  8606.                         } 
  8607.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['opt']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['opt'])) AND !empty($pl['opt']['opt'])) { 
  8608.                             $annots .= ' /Opt ['; 
  8609.                             foreach($pl['opt']['opt'] AS $copt) { 
  8610.                                 if (is_array($copt)) { 
  8611.                                     $annots .= ' ['.$this->_textstring($copt[0], $annot_obj_id).' '.$this->_textstring($copt[1], $annot_obj_id).']'; 
  8612.                                 } else { 
  8613.                                     $annots .= ' '.$this->_textstring($copt, $annot_obj_id); 
  8614.                                 } 
  8615.                             } 
  8616.                             $annots .= ']'; 
  8617.                         } 
  8618.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['ti'])) { 
  8619.                             $annots .= ' /TI '.intval($pl['opt']['ti']); 
  8620.                         } 
  8621.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['i']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['i'])) AND !empty($pl['opt']['i'])) { 
  8622.                             $annots .= ' /I ['; 
  8623.                             foreach($pl['opt']['i'] AS $copt) { 
  8624.                                 $annots .= intval($copt).' '; 
  8625.                             } 
  8626.                             $annots .= ']'; 
  8627.                         } 
  8628.                         break; 
  8629.                     } 
  8630.                     case 'screen': { 
  8631.                         break; 
  8632.                     } 
  8633.                     case 'printermark': { 
  8634.                         break; 
  8635.                     } 
  8636.                     case 'trapnet': { 
  8637.                         break; 
  8638.                     } 
  8639.                     case 'watermark': { 
  8640.                         break; 
  8641.                     } 
  8642.                     case '3d': { 
  8643.                         break; 
  8644.                     } 
  8645.                     default: { 
  8646.                         break; 
  8647.                     } 
  8648.                 } 
  8649.                 $annots .= '>>'; 
  8650.                 // create new annotation object 
  8651.                 $this->_out($this->_getobj($annot_obj_id)."\n".$annots."\n".'endobj'); 
  8652.                 if ($formfield AND !isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']])) { 
  8653.                     // store reference of form object 
  8654.                     $this->form_obj_id[] = $annot_obj_id; 
  8655.                 } 
  8656.             } 
  8657.         } 
  8658.     } // end for each page 
  8659. } 
  8660.  
  8661. /** 
  8662.  * Put appearance streams XObject used to define annotation's appearance states. 
  8663.  * @param $w (int) annotation width 
  8664.  * @param $h (int) annotation height 
  8665.  * @param $stream (string) appearance stream 
  8666.  * @return int object ID 
  8667.  * @protected 
  8668.  * @since 4.8.001 (2009-09-09) 
  8669.  */ 
  8670. protected function _putAPXObject($w=0, $h=0, $stream='') { 
  8671.     $stream = trim($stream); 
  8672.     $out = $this->_getobj()."\n"; 
  8673.     $this->xobjects['AX'.$this->n] = array('n' => $this->n); 
  8674.     $out .= '<<'; 
  8675.     $out .= ' /Type /XObject'; 
  8676.     $out .= ' /Subtype /Form'; 
  8677.     $out .= ' /FormType 1'; 
  8678.     if ($this->compress) { 
  8679.         $stream = gzcompress($stream); 
  8680.         $out .= ' /Filter /FlateDecode'; 
  8681.     } 
  8682.     $rect = sprintf('%F %F', $w, $h); 
  8683.     $out .= ' /BBox [0 0 '.$rect.']'; 
  8684.     $out .= ' /Matrix [1 0 0 1 0 0]'; 
  8685.     $out .= ' /Resources 2 0 R'; 
  8686.     $stream = $this->_getrawstream($stream); 
  8687.     $out .= ' /Length '.strlen($stream); 
  8688.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  8689.     $out .= ' stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'; 
  8690.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8691.     $this->_out($out); 
  8692.     return $this->n; 
  8693. } 
  8694.  
  8695. /** 
  8696.  * Output fonts. 
  8697.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  8698.  * @protected 
  8699.  */ 
  8700. protected function _putfonts() { 
  8701.     $nf = $this->n; 
  8702.     foreach ($this->diffs as $diff) { 
  8703.         //Encodings 
  8704.         $this->_newobj(); 
  8705.         $this->_out('<< /Type /Encoding /BaseEncoding /WinAnsiEncoding /Differences ['.$diff.'] >>'."\n".'endobj'); 
  8706.     } 
  8707.     $mqr = TCPDF_STATIC::get_mqr(); 
  8708.     TCPDF_STATIC::set_mqr(false); 
  8709.     foreach ($this->FontFiles as $file => $info) { 
  8710.         // search and get font file to embedd 
  8711.         $fontfile = TCPDF_FONTS::getFontFullPath($file, $info['fontdir']); 
  8712.         if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontfile)) { 
  8713.             $font = file_get_contents($fontfile); 
  8714.             $compressed = (substr($file, -2) == '.z'); 
  8715.             if ((!$compressed) AND (isset($info['length2']))) { 
  8716.                 $header = (ord($font[0]) == 128); 
  8717.                 if ($header) { 
  8718.                     // strip first binary header 
  8719.                     $font = substr($font, 6); 
  8720.                 } 
  8721.                 if ($header AND (ord($font[$info['length1']]) == 128)) { 
  8722.                     // strip second binary header 
  8723.                     $font = substr($font, 0, $info['length1']).substr($font, ($info['length1'] + 6)); 
  8724.                 } 
  8725.             } elseif ($info['subset'] AND ((!$compressed) OR ($compressed AND function_exists('gzcompress')))) { 
  8726.                 if ($compressed) { 
  8727.                     // uncompress font 
  8728.                     $font = gzuncompress($font); 
  8729.                 } 
  8730.                 // merge subset characters 
  8731.                 $subsetchars = array(); // used chars 
  8732.                 foreach ($info['fontkeys'] as $fontkey) { 
  8733.                     $fontinfo = $this->getFontBuffer($fontkey); 
  8734.                     $subsetchars += $fontinfo['subsetchars']; 
  8735.                 } 
  8736.                 // rebuild a font subset 
  8737.                 $font = TCPDF_FONTS::_getTrueTypeFontSubset($font, $subsetchars); 
  8738.                 // calculate new font length 
  8739.                 $info['length1'] = strlen($font); 
  8740.                 if ($compressed) { 
  8741.                     // recompress font 
  8742.                     $font = gzcompress($font); 
  8743.                 } 
  8744.             } 
  8745.             $this->_newobj(); 
  8746.             $this->FontFiles[$file]['n'] = $this->n; 
  8747.             $stream = $this->_getrawstream($font); 
  8748.             $out = '<< /Length '.strlen($stream); 
  8749.             if ($compressed) { 
  8750.                 $out .= ' /Filter /FlateDecode'; 
  8751.             } 
  8752.             $out .= ' /Length1 '.$info['length1']; 
  8753.             if (isset($info['length2'])) { 
  8754.                 $out .= ' /Length2 '.$info['length2'].' /Length3 0'; 
  8755.             } 
  8756.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  8757.             $out .= ' stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'; 
  8758.             $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8759.             $this->_out($out); 
  8760.         } 
  8761.     } 
  8762.     TCPDF_STATIC::set_mqr($mqr); 
  8763.     foreach ($this->fontkeys as $k) { 
  8764.         //Font objects 
  8765.         $font = $this->getFontBuffer($k); 
  8766.         $type = $font['type']; 
  8767.         $name = $font['name']; 
  8768.         if ($type == 'core') { 
  8769.             // standard core font 
  8770.             $out = $this->_getobj($this->font_obj_ids[$k])."\n"; 
  8771.             $out .= '<</Type /Font'; 
  8772.             $out .= ' /Subtype /Type1'; 
  8773.             $out .= ' /BaseFont /'.$name; 
  8774.             $out .= ' /Name /F'.$font['i']; 
  8775.             if ((strtolower($name) != 'symbol') AND (strtolower($name) != 'zapfdingbats')) { 
  8776.                 $out .= ' /Encoding /WinAnsiEncoding'; 
  8777.             } 
  8778.             if ($k == 'helvetica') { 
  8779.                 // add default font for annotations 
  8780.                 $this->annotation_fonts[$k] = $font['i']; 
  8781.             } 
  8782.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  8783.             $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8784.             $this->_out($out); 
  8785.         } elseif (($type == 'Type1') OR ($type == 'TrueType')) { 
  8786.             // additional Type1 or TrueType font 
  8787.             $out = $this->_getobj($this->font_obj_ids[$k])."\n"; 
  8788.             $out .= '<</Type /Font'; 
  8789.             $out .= ' /Subtype /'.$type; 
  8790.             $out .= ' /BaseFont /'.$name; 
  8791.             $out .= ' /Name /F'.$font['i']; 
  8792.             $out .= ' /FirstChar 32 /LastChar 255'; 
  8793.             $out .= ' /Widths '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  8794.             $out .= ' /FontDescriptor '.($this->n + 2).' 0 R'; 
  8795.             if ($font['enc']) { 
  8796.                 if (isset($font['diff'])) { 
  8797.                     $out .= ' /Encoding '.($nf + $font['diff']).' 0 R'; 
  8798.                 } else { 
  8799.                     $out .= ' /Encoding /WinAnsiEncoding'; 
  8800.                 } 
  8801.             } 
  8802.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  8803.             $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8804.             $this->_out($out); 
  8805.             // Widths 
  8806.             $this->_newobj(); 
  8807.             $s = '['; 
  8808.             for ($i = 32; $i < 256; ++$i) { 
  8809.                 if (isset($font['cw'][$i])) { 
  8810.                     $s .= $font['cw'][$i].' '; 
  8811.                 } else { 
  8812.                     $s .= $font['dw'].' '; 
  8813.                 } 
  8814.             } 
  8815.             $s .= ']'; 
  8816.             $s .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8817.             $this->_out($s); 
  8818.             //Descriptor 
  8819.             $this->_newobj(); 
  8820.             $s = '<</Type /FontDescriptor /FontName /'.$name; 
  8821.             foreach ($font['desc'] as $fdk => $fdv) { 
  8822.                 if (is_float($fdv)) { 
  8823.                     $fdv = sprintf('%F', $fdv); 
  8824.                 } 
  8825.                 $s .= ' /'.$fdk.' '.$fdv.''; 
  8826.             } 
  8827.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($font['file'])) { 
  8828.                 $s .= ' /FontFile'.($type == 'Type1' ? '' : '2').' '.$this->FontFiles[$font['file']]['n'].' 0 R'; 
  8829.             } 
  8830.             $s .= '>>'; 
  8831.             $s .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8832.             $this->_out($s); 
  8833.         } else { 
  8834.             // additional types 
  8835.             $mtd = '_put'.strtolower($type); 
  8836.             if (!method_exists($this, $mtd)) { 
  8837.                 $this->Error('Unsupported font type: '.$type); 
  8838.             } 
  8839.             $this->$mtd($font); 
  8840.         } 
  8841.     } 
  8842. } 
  8843.  
  8844. /** 
  8845.  * Adds unicode fonts.<br> 
  8846.  * Based on PDF Reference 1.3 (section 5) 
  8847.  * @param $font (array) font data 
  8848.  * @protected 
  8849.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  8850.  * @since 1.52.0.TC005 (2005-01-05) 
  8851.  */ 
  8852. protected function _puttruetypeunicode($font) { 
  8853.     $fontname = ''; 
  8854.     if ($font['subset']) { 
  8855.         // change name for font subsetting 
  8856.         $subtag = sprintf('%06u', $font['i']); 
  8857.         $subtag = strtr($subtag, '0123456789', 'ABCDEFGHIJ'); 
  8858.         $fontname .= $subtag.'+'; 
  8859.     } 
  8860.     $fontname .= $font['name']; 
  8861.     // Type0 Font 
  8862.     // A composite font composed of other fonts, organized hierarchically 
  8863.     $out = $this->_getobj($this->font_obj_ids[$font['fontkey']])."\n"; 
  8864.     $out .= '<< /Type /Font'; 
  8865.     $out .= ' /Subtype /Type0'; 
  8866.     $out .= ' /BaseFont /'.$fontname; 
  8867.     $out .= ' /Name /F'.$font['i']; 
  8868.     $out .= ' /Encoding /'.$font['enc']; 
  8869.     $out .= ' /ToUnicode '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  8870.     $out .= ' /DescendantFonts ['.($this->n + 2).' 0 R]'; 
  8871.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  8872.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8873.     $this->_out($out); 
  8874.     // ToUnicode map for Identity-H 
  8875.     $stream = TCPDF_FONT_DATA::$uni_identity_h; 
  8876.     // ToUnicode Object 
  8877.     $this->_newobj(); 
  8878.     $stream = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($stream) : $stream; 
  8879.     $filter = ($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : ''; 
  8880.     $stream = $this->_getrawstream($stream); 
  8881.     $this->_out('<<'.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($stream).'>> stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'."\n".'endobj'); 
  8882.     // CIDFontType2 
  8883.     // A CIDFont whose glyph descriptions are based on TrueType font technology 
  8884.     $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  8885.     $out = '<< /Type /Font'; 
  8886.     $out .= ' /Subtype /CIDFontType2'; 
  8887.     $out .= ' /BaseFont /'.$fontname; 
  8888.     // A dictionary containing entries that define the character collection of the CIDFont. 
  8889.     $cidinfo = '/Registry '.$this->_datastring($font['cidinfo']['Registry'], $oid); 
  8890.     $cidinfo .= ' /Ordering '.$this->_datastring($font['cidinfo']['Ordering'], $oid); 
  8891.     $cidinfo .= ' /Supplement '.$font['cidinfo']['Supplement']; 
  8892.     $out .= ' /CIDSystemInfo << '.$cidinfo.' >>'; 
  8893.     $out .= ' /FontDescriptor '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  8894.     $out .= ' /DW '.$font['dw']; // default width 
  8895.     $out .= "\n".TCPDF_FONTS::_putfontwidths($font, 0); 
  8896.     if (isset($font['ctg']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($font['ctg']))) { 
  8897.         $out .= "\n".'/CIDToGIDMap '.($this->n + 2).' 0 R'; 
  8898.     } 
  8899.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  8900.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8901.     $this->_out($out); 
  8902.     // Font descriptor 
  8903.     // A font descriptor describing the CIDFont default metrics other than its glyph widths 
  8904.     $this->_newobj(); 
  8905.     $out = '<< /Type /FontDescriptor'; 
  8906.     $out .= ' /FontName /'.$fontname; 
  8907.     foreach ($font['desc'] as $key => $value) { 
  8908.         if (is_float($value)) { 
  8909.             $value = sprintf('%F', $value); 
  8910.         } 
  8911.         $out .= ' /'.$key.' '.$value; 
  8912.     } 
  8913.     $fontdir = false; 
  8914.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($font['file'])) { 
  8915.         // A stream containing a TrueType font 
  8916.         $out .= ' /FontFile2 '.$this->FontFiles[$font['file']]['n'].' 0 R'; 
  8917.         $fontdir = $this->FontFiles[$font['file']]['fontdir']; 
  8918.     } 
  8919.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  8920.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8921.     $this->_out($out); 
  8922.     if (isset($font['ctg']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($font['ctg']))) { 
  8923.         $this->_newobj(); 
  8924.         // Embed CIDToGIDMap 
  8925.         // A specification of the mapping from CIDs to glyph indices 
  8926.         // search and get CTG font file to embedd 
  8927.         $ctgfile = strtolower($font['ctg']); 
  8928.         // search and get ctg font file to embedd 
  8929.         $fontfile = TCPDF_FONTS::getFontFullPath($ctgfile, $fontdir); 
  8930.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontfile)) { 
  8931.             $this->Error('Font file not found: '.$ctgfile); 
  8932.         } 
  8933.         $stream = $this->_getrawstream(file_get_contents($fontfile)); 
  8934.         $out = '<< /Length '.strlen($stream).''; 
  8935.         if (substr($fontfile, -2) == '.z') { // check file extension 
  8936.             // Decompresses data encoded using the public-domain 
  8937.             // zlib/deflate compression method, reproducing the 
  8938.             // original text or binary data 
  8939.             $out .= ' /Filter /FlateDecode'; 
  8940.         } 
  8941.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  8942.         $out .= ' stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'; 
  8943.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8944.         $this->_out($out); 
  8945.     } 
  8946. } 
  8947.  
  8948. /** 
  8949.  * Output CID-0 fonts.
