  8950.  * A Type 0 CIDFont contains glyph descriptions based on the Adobe Type 1 font format 
  8951.  * @param $font (array) font data 
  8952.  * @protected 
  8953.  * @author Andrew Whitehead, Nicola Asuni, Yukihiro Nakadaira 
  8954.  * @since 3.2.000 (2008-06-23) 
  8955.  */ 
  8956. protected function _putcidfont0($font) { 
  8957.     $cidoffset = 0; 
  8958.     if (!isset($font['cw'][1])) { 
  8959.         $cidoffset = 31; 
  8960.     } 
  8961.     if (isset($font['cidinfo']['uni2cid'])) { 
  8962.         // convert unicode to cid. 
  8963.         $uni2cid = $font['cidinfo']['uni2cid']; 
  8964.         $cw = array(); 
  8965.         foreach ($font['cw'] as $uni => $width) { 
  8966.             if (isset($uni2cid[$uni])) { 
  8967.                 $cw[($uni2cid[$uni] + $cidoffset)] = $width; 
  8968.             } elseif ($uni < 256) { 
  8969.                 $cw[$uni] = $width; 
  8970.             } // else unknown character 
  8971.         } 
  8972.         $font = array_merge($font, array('cw' => $cw)); 
  8973.     } 
  8974.     $name = $font['name']; 
  8975.     $enc = $font['enc']; 
  8976.     if ($enc) { 
  8977.         $longname = $name.'-'.$enc; 
  8978.     } else { 
  8979.         $longname = $name; 
  8980.     } 
  8981.     $out = $this->_getobj($this->font_obj_ids[$font['fontkey']])."\n"; 
  8982.     $out .= '<</Type /Font'; 
  8983.     $out .= ' /Subtype /Type0'; 
  8984.     $out .= ' /BaseFont /'.$longname; 
  8985.     $out .= ' /Name /F'.$font['i']; 
  8986.     if ($enc) { 
  8987.         $out .= ' /Encoding /'.$enc; 
  8988.     } 
  8989.     $out .= ' /DescendantFonts ['.($this->n + 1).' 0 R]'; 
  8990.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  8991.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  8992.     $this->_out($out); 
  8993.     $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  8994.     $out = '<</Type /Font'; 
  8995.     $out .= ' /Subtype /CIDFontType0'; 
  8996.     $out .= ' /BaseFont /'.$name; 
  8997.     $cidinfo = '/Registry '.$this->_datastring($font['cidinfo']['Registry'], $oid); 
  8998.     $cidinfo .= ' /Ordering '.$this->_datastring($font['cidinfo']['Ordering'], $oid); 
  8999.     $cidinfo .= ' /Supplement '.$font['cidinfo']['Supplement']; 
  9000.     $out .= ' /CIDSystemInfo <<'.$cidinfo.'>>'; 
  9001.     $out .= ' /FontDescriptor '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  9002.     $out .= ' /DW '.$font['dw']; 
  9003.     $out .= "\n".TCPDF_FONTS::_putfontwidths($font, $cidoffset); 
  9004.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9005.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9006.     $this->_out($out); 
  9007.     $this->_newobj(); 
  9008.     $s = '<</Type /FontDescriptor /FontName /'.$name; 
  9009.     foreach ($font['desc'] as $k => $v) { 
  9010.         if ($k != 'Style') { 
  9011.             if (is_float($v)) { 
  9012.                 $v = sprintf('%F', $v); 
  9013.             } 
  9014.             $s .= ' /'.$k.' '.$v.''; 
  9015.         } 
  9016.     } 
  9017.     $s .= '>>'; 
  9018.     $s .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9019.     $this->_out($s); 
  9020. } 
  9021.  
  9022. /** 
  9023.  * Output images. 
  9024.  * @protected 
  9025.  */ 
  9026. protected function _putimages() { 
  9027.     $filter = ($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : ''; 
  9028.     foreach ($this->imagekeys as $file) { 
  9029.         $info = $this->getImageBuffer($file); 
  9030.         // set object for alternate images array 
  9031.         if ((!$this->pdfa_mode) AND isset($info['altimgs']) AND !empty($info['altimgs'])) { 
  9032.             $altoid = $this->_newobj(); 
  9033.             $out = '['; 
  9034.             foreach ($info['altimgs'] as $altimage) { 
  9035.                 if (isset($this->xobjects['I'.$altimage[0]]['n'])) { 
  9036.                     $out .= ' << /Image '.$this->xobjects['I'.$altimage[0]]['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9037.                     $out .= ' /DefaultForPrinting'; 
  9038.                     if ($altimage[1] === true) { 
  9039.                         $out .= ' true'; 
  9040.                     } else { 
  9041.                         $out .= ' false'; 
  9042.                     } 
  9043.                     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9044.                 } 
  9045.             } 
  9046.             $out .= ' ]'; 
  9047.             $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9048.             $this->_out($out); 
  9049.         } 
  9050.         // set image object 
  9051.         $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  9052.         $this->xobjects['I'.$info['i']] = array('n' => $oid); 
  9053.         $this->setImageSubBuffer($file, 'n', $this->n); 
  9054.         $out = '<</Type /XObject'; 
  9055.         $out .= ' /Subtype /Image'; 
  9056.         $out .= ' /Width '.$info['w']; 
  9057.         $out .= ' /Height '.$info['h']; 
  9058.         if (array_key_exists('masked', $info)) { 
  9059.             $out .= ' /SMask '.($this->n - 1).' 0 R'; 
  9060.         } 
  9061.         // set color space 
  9062.         $icc = false; 
  9063.         if (isset($info['icc']) AND ($info['icc'] !== false)) { 
  9064.             // ICC Colour Space 
  9065.             $icc = true; 
  9066.             $out .= ' /ColorSpace [/ICCBased '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R]'; 
  9067.         } elseif ($info['cs'] == 'Indexed') { 
  9068.             // Indexed Colour Space 
  9069.             $out .= ' /ColorSpace [/Indexed /DeviceRGB '.((strlen($info['pal']) / 3) - 1).' '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R]'; 
  9070.         } else { 
  9071.             // Device Colour Space 
  9072.             $out .= ' /ColorSpace /'.$info['cs']; 
  9073.         } 
  9074.         if ($info['cs'] == 'DeviceCMYK') { 
  9075.             $out .= ' /Decode [1 0 1 0 1 0 1 0]'; 
  9076.         } 
  9077.         $out .= ' /BitsPerComponent '.$info['bpc']; 
  9078.         if (isset($altoid) AND ($altoid > 0)) { 
  9079.             // reference to alternate images dictionary 
  9080.             $out .= ' /Alternates '.$altoid.' 0 R'; 
  9081.         } 
  9082.         if (isset($info['exurl']) AND !empty($info['exurl'])) { 
  9083.             // external stream 
  9084.             $out .= ' /Length 0'; 
  9085.             $out .= ' /F << /FS /URL /F '.$this->_datastring($info['exurl'], $oid).' >>'; 
  9086.             if (isset($info['f'])) { 
  9087.                 $out .= ' /FFilter /'.$info['f']; 
  9088.             } 
  9089.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  9090.             $out .= ' stream'."\n".'endstream'; 
  9091.         } else { 
  9092.             if (isset($info['f'])) { 
  9093.                 $out .= ' /Filter /'.$info['f']; 
  9094.             } 
  9095.             if (isset($info['parms'])) { 
  9096.                 $out .= ' '.$info['parms']; 
  9097.             } 
  9098.             if (isset($info['trns']) AND is_array($info['trns'])) { 
  9099.                 $trns = ''; 
  9100.                 $count_info = count($info['trns']); 
  9101.                 if ($info['cs'] == 'Indexed') { 
  9102.                     $maxval =(pow(2, $info['bpc']) - 1); 
  9103.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $count_info; ++$i) { 
  9104.                         if (($info['trns'][$i] != 0) AND ($info['trns'][$i] != $maxval)) { 
  9105.                             // this is not a binary type mask @TODO: create a SMask 
  9106.                             $trns = ''; 
  9107.                             break; 
  9108.                         } elseif (empty($trns) AND ($info['trns'][$i] == 0)) { 
  9109.                             // store the first fully transparent value 
  9110.                             $trns .= $i.' '.$i.' '; 
  9111.                         } 
  9112.                     } 
  9113.                 } else { 
  9114.                     // grayscale or RGB 
  9115.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $count_info; ++$i) { 
  9116.                         if ($info['trns'][$i] == 0) { 
  9117.                             $trns .= $info['trns'][$i].' '.$info['trns'][$i].' '; 
  9118.                         } 
  9119.                     } 
  9120.                 } 
  9121.                 // Colour Key Masking 
  9122.                 if (!empty($trns)) { 
  9123.                     $out .= ' /Mask ['.$trns.']'; 
  9124.                 } 
  9125.             } 
  9126.             $stream = $this->_getrawstream($info['data']); 
  9127.             $out .= ' /Length '.strlen($stream).' >>'; 
  9128.             $out .= ' stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'; 
  9129.         } 
  9130.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9131.         $this->_out($out); 
  9132.         if ($icc) { 
  9133.             // ICC colour profile 
  9134.             $this->_newobj(); 
  9135.             $icc = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($info['icc']) : $info['icc']; 
  9136.             $icc = $this->_getrawstream($icc); 
  9137.             $this->_out('<</N '.$info['ch'].' /Alternate /'.$info['cs'].' '.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($icc).'>> stream'."\n".$icc."\n".'endstream'."\n".'endobj'); 
  9138.         } elseif ($info['cs'] == 'Indexed') { 
  9139.             // colour palette 
  9140.             $this->_newobj(); 
  9141.             $pal = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($info['pal']) : $info['pal']; 
  9142.             $pal = $this->_getrawstream($pal); 
  9143.             $this->_out('<<'.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($pal).'>> stream'."\n".$pal."\n".'endstream'."\n".'endobj'); 
  9144.         } 
  9145.     } 
  9146. } 
  9147.  
  9148. /** 
  9149.  * Output Form XObjects Templates. 
  9150.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  9151.  * @since 5.8.017 (2010-08-24) 
  9152.  * @protected 
  9153.  * @see startTemplate(), endTemplate(), printTemplate() 
  9154.  */ 
  9155. protected function _putxobjects() { 
  9156.     foreach ($this->xobjects as $key => $data) { 
  9157.         if (isset($data['outdata'])) { 
  9158.             $stream = str_replace($this->epsmarker, '', trim($data['outdata'])); 
  9159.             $out = $this->_getobj($data['n'])."\n"; 
  9160.             $out .= '<<'; 
  9161.             $out .= ' /Type /XObject'; 
  9162.             $out .= ' /Subtype /Form'; 
  9163.             $out .= ' /FormType 1'; 
  9164.             if ($this->compress) { 
  9165.                 $stream = gzcompress($stream); 
  9166.                 $out .= ' /Filter /FlateDecode'; 
  9167.             } 
  9168.             $out .= sprintf(' /BBox [%F %F %F %F]', ($data['x'] * $this->k), (-$data['y'] * $this->k), (($data['w'] + $data['x']) * $this->k), (($data['h'] - $data['y']) * $this->k)); 
  9169.             $out .= ' /Matrix [1 0 0 1 0 0]'; 
  9170.             $out .= ' /Resources <<'; 
  9171.             $out .= ' /ProcSet [/PDF /Text /ImageB /ImageC /ImageI]'; 
  9172.             if (!$this->pdfa_mode) { 
  9173.                 // transparency 
  9174.                 if (isset($data['extgstates']) AND !empty($data['extgstates'])) { 
  9175.                     $out .= ' /ExtGState <<'; 
  9176.                     foreach ($data['extgstates'] as $k => $extgstate) { 
  9177.                         if (isset($this->extgstates[$k]['name'])) { 
  9178.                             $out .= ' /'.$this->extgstates[$k]['name']; 
  9179.                         } else { 
  9180.                             $out .= ' /GS'.$k; 
  9181.                         } 
  9182.                         $out .= ' '.$this->extgstates[$k]['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9183.                     } 
  9184.                     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9185.                 } 
  9186.                 if (isset($data['gradients']) AND !empty($data['gradients'])) { 
  9187.                     $gp = ''; 
  9188.                     $gs = ''; 
  9189.                     foreach ($data['gradients'] as $id => $grad) { 
  9190.                         // gradient patterns 
  9191.                         $gp .= ' /p'.$id.' '.$this->gradients[$id]['pattern'].' 0 R'; 
  9192.                         // gradient shadings 
  9193.                         $gs .= ' /Sh'.$id.' '.$this->gradients[$id]['id'].' 0 R'; 
  9194.                     } 
  9195.                     $out .= ' /Pattern <<'.$gp.' >>'; 
  9196.                     $out .= ' /Shading <<'.$gs.' >>'; 
  9197.                 } 
  9198.             } 
  9199.             // spot colors 
  9200.             if (isset($data['spot_colors']) AND !empty($data['spot_colors'])) { 
  9201.                 $out .= ' /ColorSpace <<'; 
  9202.                 foreach ($data['spot_colors'] as $name => $color) { 
  9203.                     $out .= ' /CS'.$color['i'].' '.$this->spot_colors[$name]['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9204.                 } 
  9205.                 $out .= ' >>'; 
  9206.             } 
  9207.             // fonts 
  9208.             if (!empty($data['fonts'])) { 
  9209.                 $out .= ' /Font <<'; 
  9210.                 foreach ($data['fonts'] as $fontkey => $fontid) { 
  9211.                     $out .= ' /F'.$fontid.' '.$this->font_obj_ids[$fontkey].' 0 R'; 
  9212.                 } 
  9213.                 $out .= ' >>'; 
  9214.             } 
  9215.             // images or nested xobjects 
  9216.             if (!empty($data['images']) OR !empty($data['xobjects'])) { 
  9217.                 $out .= ' /XObject <<'; 
  9218.                 foreach ($data['images'] as $imgid) { 
  9219.                     $out .= ' /I'.$imgid.' '.$this->xobjects['I'.$imgid]['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9220.                 } 
  9221.                 foreach ($data['xobjects'] as $sub_id => $sub_objid) { 
  9222.                     $out .= ' /'.$sub_id.' '.$sub_objid['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9223.                 } 
  9224.                 $out .= ' >>'; 
  9225.             } 
  9226.             $out .= ' >>'; //end resources 
  9227.             if (isset($data['group']) AND ($data['group'] !== false)) { 
  9228.                 // set transparency group 
  9229.                 $out .= ' /Group << /Type /Group /S /Transparency'; 
  9230.                 if (is_array($data['group'])) { 
  9231.                     if (isset($data['group']['CS']) AND !empty($data['group']['CS'])) { 
  9232.                         $out .= ' /CS /'.$data['group']['CS']; 
  9233.                     } 
  9234.                     if (isset($data['group']['I'])) { 
  9235.                         $out .= ' /I /'.($data['group']['I']===true?'true':'false'); 
  9236.                     } 
  9237.                     if (isset($data['group']['K'])) { 
  9238.                         $out .= ' /K /'.($data['group']['K']===true?'true':'false'); 
  9239.                     } 
  9240.                 } 
  9241.                 $out .= ' >>'; 
  9242.             } 
  9243.             $stream = $this->_getrawstream($stream, $data['n']); 
  9244.             $out .= ' /Length '.strlen($stream); 
  9245.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  9246.             $out .= ' stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'; 
  9247.             $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9248.             $this->_out($out); 
  9249.         } 
  9250.     } 
  9251. } 
  9252.  
  9253. /** 
  9254.  * Output Spot Colors Resources. 
  9255.  * @protected 
  9256.  * @since 3.0.024 (2008-09-12) 
  9257.  */ 
  9258. protected function _putspotcolors() { 
  9259.     foreach ($this->spot_colors as $name => $color) { 
  9260.         $this->_newobj(); 
  9261.         $this->spot_colors[$name]['n'] = $this->n; 
  9262.         $out = '[/Separation /'.str_replace(' ', '#20', $name); 
  9263.         $out .= ' /DeviceCMYK <<'; 
  9264.         $out .= ' /Range [0 1 0 1 0 1 0 1] /C0 [0 0 0 0]'; 
  9265.         $out .= ' '.sprintf('/C1 [%F %F %F %F] ', ($color['C'] / 100), ($color['M'] / 100), ($color['Y'] / 100), ($color['K'] / 100)); 
  9266.         $out .= ' /FunctionType 2 /Domain [0 1] /N 1>>]'; 
  9267.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9268.         $this->_out($out); 
  9269.     } 
  9270. } 
  9271.  
  9272. /** 
  9273.  * Return XObjects Dictionary. 
  9274.  * @return string XObjects dictionary 
  9275.  * @protected 
  9276.  * @since 5.8.014 (2010-08-23) 
  9277.  */ 
  9278. protected function _getxobjectdict() { 
  9279.     $out = ''; 
  9280.     foreach ($this->xobjects as $id => $objid) { 
  9281.         $out .= ' /'.$id.' '.$objid['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9282.     } 
  9283.     return $out; 
  9284. } 
  9285.  
  9286. /** 
  9287.  * Output Resources Dictionary. 
  9288.  * @protected 
  9289.  */ 
  9290. protected function _putresourcedict() { 
  9291.     $out = $this->_getobj(2)."\n"; 
  9292.     $out .= '<< /ProcSet [/PDF /Text /ImageB /ImageC /ImageI]'; 
  9293.     $out .= ' /Font <<'; 
  9294.     foreach ($this->fontkeys as $fontkey) { 
  9295.         $font = $this->getFontBuffer($fontkey); 
  9296.         $out .= ' /F'.$font['i'].' '.$font['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9297.     } 
  9298.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9299.     $out .= ' /XObject <<'; 
  9300.     $out .= $this->_getxobjectdict(); 
  9301.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9302.     // layers 
  9303.     if (!empty($this->pdflayers)) { 
  9304.         $out .= ' /Properties <<'; 
  9305.         foreach ($this->pdflayers as $layer) { 
  9306.             $out .= ' /'.$layer['layer'].' '.$layer['objid'].' 0 R'; 
  9307.         } 
  9308.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9309.     } 
  9310.     if (!$this->pdfa_mode) { 
  9311.         // transparency 
  9312.         if (isset($this->extgstates) AND !empty($this->extgstates)) { 
  9313.             $out .= ' /ExtGState <<'; 
  9314.             foreach ($this->extgstates as $k => $extgstate) { 
  9315.                 if (isset($extgstate['name'])) { 
  9316.                     $out .= ' /'.$extgstate['name']; 
  9317.                 } else { 
  9318.                     $out .= ' /GS'.$k; 
  9319.                 } 
  9320.                 $out .= ' '.$extgstate['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9321.             } 
  9322.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  9323.         } 
  9324.         if (isset($this->gradients) AND !empty($this->gradients)) { 
  9325.             $gp = ''; 
  9326.             $gs = ''; 
  9327.             foreach ($this->gradients as $id => $grad) { 
  9328.                 // gradient patterns 
  9329.                 $gp .= ' /p'.$id.' '.$grad['pattern'].' 0 R'; 
  9330.                 // gradient shadings 
  9331.                 $gs .= ' /Sh'.$id.' '.$grad['id'].' 0 R'; 
  9332.             } 
  9333.             $out .= ' /Pattern <<'.$gp.' >>'; 
  9334.             $out .= ' /Shading <<'.$gs.' >>'; 
  9335.         } 
  9336.     } 
  9337.     // spot colors 
  9338.     if (isset($this->spot_colors) AND !empty($this->spot_colors)) { 
  9339.         $out .= ' /ColorSpace <<'; 
  9340.         foreach ($this->spot_colors as $color) { 
  9341.             $out .= ' /CS'.$color['i'].' '.$color['n'].' 0 R'; 
  9342.         } 
  9343.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9344.     } 
  9345.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9346.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9347.     $this->_out($out); 
  9348. } 
  9349.  
  9350. /** 
  9351.  * Output Resources. 
  9352.  * @protected 
  9353.  */ 
  9354. protected function _putresources() { 
  9355.     $this->_putextgstates(); 
  9356.     $this->_putocg(); 
  9357.     $this->_putfonts(); 
  9358.     $this->_putimages(); 
  9359.     $this->_putspotcolors(); 
  9360.     $this->_putshaders(); 
  9361.     $this->_putxobjects(); 
  9362.     $this->_putresourcedict(); 
  9363.     $this->_putdests(); 
  9364.     $this->_putEmbeddedFiles(); 
  9365.     $this->_putannotsobjs(); 
  9366.     $this->_putjavascript(); 
  9367.     $this->_putbookmarks(); 
  9368.     $this->_putencryption(); 
  9369. } 
  9370.  
  9371. /** 
  9372.  * Adds some Metadata information (Document Information Dictionary) 
  9373.  * (see Chapter 14.3.3 Document Information Dictionary of PDF32000_2008.pdf Reference) 
  9374.  * @return int object id 
  9375.  * @protected 
  9376.  */ 
  9377. protected function _putinfo() { 
  9378.     $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  9379.     $out = '<<'; 
  9380.     // store current isunicode value 
  9381.     $prev_isunicode = $this->isunicode; 
  9382.     if ($this->docinfounicode) { 
  9383.         $this->isunicode = true; 
  9384.     } 
  9385.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->title)) { 
  9386.         // The document's title. 
  9387.         $out .= ' /Title '.$this->_textstring($this->title, $oid); 
  9388.     } 
  9389.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->author)) { 
  9390.         // The name of the person who created the document. 
  9391.         $out .= ' /Author '.$this->_textstring($this->author, $oid); 
  9392.     } 
  9393.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->subject)) { 
  9394.         // The subject of the document. 
  9395.         $out .= ' /Subject '.$this->_textstring($this->subject, $oid); 
  9396.     } 
  9397.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->keywords)) { 
  9398.         // Keywords associated with the document. 
  9399.         $out .= ' /Keywords '.$this->_textstring($this->keywords, $oid); 
  9400.     } 
  9401.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->creator)) { 
  9402.         // If the document was converted to PDF from another format, the name of the conforming product that created the original document from which it was converted. 
  9403.         $out .= ' /Creator '.$this->_textstring($this->creator, $oid); 
  9404.     } 
  9405.     // restore previous isunicode value 
  9406.     $this->isunicode = $prev_isunicode; 
  9407.     // default producer 
  9408.     $out .= ' /Producer '.$this->_textstring(TCPDF_STATIC::getTCPDFProducer(), $oid); 
  9409.     // The date and time the document was created, in human-readable form 
  9410.     $out .= ' /CreationDate '.$this->_datestring(0, $this->doc_creation_timestamp); 
  9411.     // The date and time the document was most recently modified, in human-readable form 
  9412.     $out .= ' /ModDate '.$this->_datestring(0, $this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  9413.     // A name object indicating whether the document has been modified to include trapping information 
  9414.     $out .= ' /Trapped /False'; 
  9415.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9416.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9417.     $this->_out($out); 
  9418.     return $oid; 
  9419. } 
  9420.  
  9421. /** 
  9422.  * Set additional XMP data to be added on the default XMP data just before the end of "x:xmpmeta" tag. 
  9423.  * IMPORTANT: This data is added as-is without controls, so you have to validate your data before using this method! 
  9424.  * @param $xmp (string) Custom XMP data. 
  9425.  * @since 5.9.128 (2011-10-06) 
  9426.  * @public 
  9427.  */ 
  9428. public function setExtraXMP($xmp) { 
  9429.     $this->custom_xmp = $xmp; 
  9430. } 
  9431.  
  9432. /** 
  9433.  * Put XMP data object and return ID. 
  9434.  * @return (int) The object ID. 
  9435.  * @since 5.9.121 (2011-09-28) 
  9436.  * @protected 
  9437.  */ 
  9438. protected function _putXMP() { 
  9439.     $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  9440.     // store current isunicode value 
  9441.     $prev_isunicode = $this->isunicode; 
  9442.     $this->isunicode = true; 
  9443.     $prev_encrypted = $this->encrypted; 
  9444.     $this->encrypted = false; 
  9445.     // set XMP data 
  9446.     $xmp = '<?xpacket begin="'.TCPDF_FONTS::unichr(0xfeff, $this->isunicode).'" id="W5M0MpCehiHzreSzNTczkc9d"?>'."\n"; 
  9447.     $xmp .= '<x:xmpmeta xmlns:x="adobe:ns:meta/" x:xmptk="Adobe XMP Core 4.2.1-c043 52.372728, 2009/01/18-15:08:04">'."\n"; 
  9448.     $xmp .= "\t".'<rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#">'."\n"; 
  9449.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'<rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">'."\n"; 
  9450.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<dc:format>application/pdf</dc:format>'."\n"; 
  9451.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<dc:title>'."\n"; 
  9452.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:Alt>'."\n"; 
  9453.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li xml:lang="x-default">'.TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML($this->title).'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9454.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:Alt>'."\n"; 
  9455.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'</dc:title>'."\n"; 
  9456.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<dc:creator>'."\n"; 
  9457.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:Seq>'."\n"; 
  9458.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li>'.TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML($this->author).'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9459.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:Seq>'."\n"; 
  9460.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'</dc:creator>'."\n"; 
  9461.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<dc:description>'."\n"; 
  9462.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:Alt>'."\n"; 
  9463.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li xml:lang="x-default">'.TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML($this->subject).'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9464.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:Alt>'."\n"; 
  9465.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'</dc:description>'."\n"; 
  9466.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<dc:subject>'."\n"; 
  9467.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:Bag>'."\n"; 
  9468.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li>'.TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML($this->keywords).'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9469.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:Bag>'."\n"; 
  9470.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'</dc:subject>'."\n"; 
  9471.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'</rdf:Description>'."\n"; 
  9472.     // convert doc creation date format 
  9473.     $dcdate = TCPDF_STATIC::getFormattedDate($this->doc_creation_timestamp); 
  9474.     $doccreationdate = substr($dcdate, 0, 4).'-'.substr($dcdate, 4, 2).'-'.substr($dcdate, 6, 2); 
  9475.     $doccreationdate .= 'T'.substr($dcdate, 8, 2).':'.substr($dcdate, 10, 2).':'.substr($dcdate, 12, 2); 
  9476.     $doccreationdate .= '+'.substr($dcdate, 15, 2).':'.substr($dcdate, 18, 2); 
  9477.     $doccreationdate = TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML($doccreationdate); 
  9478.     // convert doc modification date format 
  9479.     $dmdate = TCPDF_STATIC::getFormattedDate($this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  9480.     $docmoddate = substr($dmdate, 0, 4).'-'.substr($dmdate, 4, 2).'-'.substr($dmdate, 6, 2); 
  9481.     $docmoddate .= 'T'.substr($dmdate, 8, 2).':'.substr($dmdate, 10, 2).':'.substr($dmdate, 12, 2); 
  9482.     $docmoddate .= '+'.substr($dmdate, 15, 2).':'.substr($dmdate, 18, 2); 
  9483.     $docmoddate = TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML($docmoddate); 
  9484.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'<rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:xmp="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/">'."\n"; 
  9485.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<xmp:CreateDate>'.$doccreationdate.'</xmp:CreateDate>'."\n"; 
  9486.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<xmp:CreatorTool>'.$this->creator.'</xmp:CreatorTool>'."\n"; 
  9487.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<xmp:ModifyDate>'.$docmoddate.'</xmp:ModifyDate>'."\n"; 
  9488.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<xmp:MetadataDate>'.$doccreationdate.'</xmp:MetadataDate>'."\n"; 
  9489.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'</rdf:Description>'."\n"; 
  9490.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'<rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:pdf="http://ns.adobe.com/pdf/1.3/">'."\n"; 
  9491.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<pdf:Keywords>'.TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML($this->keywords).'</pdf:Keywords>'."\n"; 
  9492.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<pdf:Producer>'.TCPDF_STATIC::_escapeXML(TCPDF_STATIC::getTCPDFProducer()).'</pdf:Producer>'."\n"; 
  9493.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'</rdf:Description>'."\n"; 
  9494.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'<rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:xmpMM="http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/mm/">'."\n"; 
  9495.     $uuid = 'uuid:'.substr($this->file_id, 0, 8).'-'.substr($this->file_id, 8, 4).'-'.substr($this->file_id, 12, 4).'-'.substr($this->file_id, 16, 4).'-'.substr($this->file_id, 20, 12); 
  9496.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<xmpMM:DocumentID>'.$uuid.'</xmpMM:DocumentID>'."\n"; 
  9497.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<xmpMM:InstanceID>'.$uuid.'</xmpMM:InstanceID>'."\n"; 
  9498.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'</rdf:Description>'."\n"; 
  9499.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  9500.         $xmp .= "\t\t".'<rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:pdfaid="http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/">'."\n"; 
  9501.         $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<pdfaid:part>1</pdfaid:part>'."\n"; 
  9502.         $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<pdfaid:conformance>B</pdfaid:conformance>'."\n"; 
  9503.         $xmp .= "\t\t".'</rdf:Description>'."\n"; 
  9504.     } 
  9505.     // XMP extension schemas 
  9506.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'<rdf:Description rdf:about="" xmlns:pdfaExtension="http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/extension/" xmlns:pdfaSchema="http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/schema#" xmlns:pdfaProperty="http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/property#">'."\n"; 
  9507.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'<pdfaExtension:schemas>'."\n"; 
  9508.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:Bag>'."\n"; 
  9509.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li rdf:parseType="Resource">'."\n"; 
  9510.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:namespaceURI>http://ns.adobe.com/pdf/1.3/</pdfaSchema:namespaceURI>'."\n"; 
  9511.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:prefix>pdf</pdfaSchema:prefix>'."\n"; 
  9512.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:schema>Adobe PDF Schema</pdfaSchema:schema>'."\n"; 
  9513.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9514.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li rdf:parseType="Resource">'."\n"; 
  9515.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:namespaceURI>http://ns.adobe.com/xap/1.0/mm/</pdfaSchema:namespaceURI>'."\n"; 
  9516.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:prefix>xmpMM</pdfaSchema:prefix>'."\n"; 
  9517.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:schema>XMP Media Management Schema</pdfaSchema:schema>'."\n"; 
  9518.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:property>'."\n"; 
  9519.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:Seq>'."\n"; 
  9520.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li rdf:parseType="Resource">'."\n"; 
  9521.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:category>internal</pdfaProperty:category>'."\n"; 
  9522.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:description>UUID based identifier for specific incarnation of a document</pdfaProperty:description>'."\n"; 
  9523.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:name>InstanceID</pdfaProperty:name>'."\n"; 
  9524.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:valueType>URI</pdfaProperty:valueType>'."\n"; 
  9525.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9526.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:Seq>'."\n"; 
  9527.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</pdfaSchema:property>'."\n"; 
  9528.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9529.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li rdf:parseType="Resource">'."\n"; 
  9530.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:namespaceURI>http://www.aiim.org/pdfa/ns/id/</pdfaSchema:namespaceURI>'."\n"; 
  9531.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:prefix>pdfaid</pdfaSchema:prefix>'."\n"; 
  9532.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:schema>PDF/A ID Schema</pdfaSchema:schema>'."\n"; 
  9533.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaSchema:property>'."\n"; 
  9534.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:Seq>'."\n"; 
  9535.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li rdf:parseType="Resource">'."\n"; 
  9536.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:category>internal</pdfaProperty:category>'."\n"; 
  9537.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:description>Part of PDF/A standard</pdfaProperty:description>'."\n"; 
  9538.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:name>part</pdfaProperty:name>'."\n"; 
  9539.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:valueType>Integer</pdfaProperty:valueType>'."\n"; 
  9540.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9541.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li rdf:parseType="Resource">'."\n"; 
  9542.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:category>internal</pdfaProperty:category>'."\n"; 
  9543.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:description>Amendment of PDF/A standard</pdfaProperty:description>'."\n"; 
  9544.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:name>amd</pdfaProperty:name>'."\n"; 
  9545.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:valueType>Text</pdfaProperty:valueType>'."\n"; 
  9546.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9547.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<rdf:li rdf:parseType="Resource">'."\n"; 
  9548.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:category>internal</pdfaProperty:category>'."\n"; 
  9549.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:description>Conformance level of PDF/A standard</pdfaProperty:description>'."\n"; 
  9550.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:name>conformance</pdfaProperty:name>'."\n"; 
  9551.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'<pdfaProperty:valueType>Text</pdfaProperty:valueType>'."\n"; 
  9552.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9553.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:Seq>'."\n"; 
  9554.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t\t".'</pdfaSchema:property>'."\n"; 
  9555.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:li>'."\n"; 
  9556.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t\t".'</rdf:Bag>'."\n"; 
  9557.     $xmp .= "\t\t\t".'</pdfaExtension:schemas>'."\n"; 
  9558.     $xmp .= "\t\t".'</rdf:Description>'."\n"; 
  9559.     $xmp .= "\t".'</rdf:RDF>'."\n"; 
  9560.     $xmp .= $this->custom_xmp; 
  9561.     $xmp .= '</x:xmpmeta>'."\n"; 
  9562.     $xmp .= '<?xpacket end="w"?>'; 
  9563.     $out = '<< /Type /Metadata /Subtype /XML /Length '.strlen($xmp).' >> stream'."\n".$xmp."\n".'endstream'."\n".'endobj'; 
  9564.     // restore previous isunicode value 
  9565.     $this->isunicode = $prev_isunicode; 
  9566.     $this->encrypted = $prev_encrypted; 
  9567.     $this->_out($out); 
  9568.     return $oid; 
  9569. } 
  9570.  
  9571. /** 
  9572.  * Output Catalog. 
  9573.  * @return int object id 
  9574.  * @protected 
  9575.  */ 
  9576. protected function _putcatalog() { 
  9577.     // put XMP 
  9578.     $xmpobj = $this->_putXMP(); 
  9579.     // if required, add standard sRGB_IEC61966-2.1 blackscaled ICC colour profile 
  9580.     if ($this->pdfa_mode OR $this->force_srgb) { 
  9581.         $iccobj = $this->_newobj(); 
  9582.         $icc = file_get_contents(dirname(__FILE__).'/include/sRGB.icc'); 
  9583.         $filter = ''; 
  9584.         if ($this->compress) { 
  9585.             $filter = ' /Filter /FlateDecode'; 
  9586.             $icc = gzcompress($icc); 
  9587.         } 
  9588.         $icc = $this->_getrawstream($icc); 
  9589.         $this->_out('<</N 3 '.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($icc).'>> stream'."\n".$icc."\n".'endstream'."\n".'endobj'); 
  9590.     } 
  9591.     // start catalog 
  9592.     $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  9593.     $out = '<< /Type /Catalog'; 
  9594.     $out .= ' /Version /'.$this->PDFVersion; 
  9595.     //$out .= ' /Extensions <<>>'; 
  9596.     $out .= ' /Pages 1 0 R'; 
  9597.     //$out .= ' /PageLabels ' //...; 
  9598.     $out .= ' /Names <<'; 
  9599.     if ((!$this->pdfa_mode) AND !empty($this->n_js)) { 
  9600.         $out .= ' /JavaScript '.$this->n_js; 
  9601.     } 
  9602.     if (!empty($this->efnames)) { 
  9603.         $out .= ' /EmbeddedFiles <</Names ['; 
  9604.         foreach ($this->efnames AS $fn => $fref) { 
  9605.             $out .= ' '.$this->_datastring($fn).' '.$fref; 
  9606.         } 
  9607.         $out .= ' ]>>'; 
  9608.     } 
  9609.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9610.     if (!empty($this->dests)) { 
  9611.         $out .= ' /Dests '.($this->n_dests).' 0 R'; 
  9612.     } 
  9613.     $out .= $this->_putviewerpreferences(); 
  9614.     if (isset($this->LayoutMode) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->LayoutMode))) { 
  9615.         $out .= ' /PageLayout /'.$this->LayoutMode; 
  9616.     } 
  9617.     if (isset($this->PageMode) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->PageMode))) { 
  9618.         $out .= ' /PageMode /'.$this->PageMode; 
  9619.     } 
  9620.     if (count($this->outlines) > 0) { 
  9621.         $out .= ' /Outlines '.$this->OutlineRoot.' 0 R'; 
  9622.         $out .= ' /PageMode /UseOutlines'; 
  9623.     } 
  9624.     //$out .= ' /Threads []'; 
  9625.     if ($this->ZoomMode == 'fullpage') { 
  9626.         $out .= ' /OpenAction ['.$this->page_obj_id[1].' 0 R /Fit]'; 
  9627.     } elseif ($this->ZoomMode == 'fullwidth') { 
  9628.         $out .= ' /OpenAction ['.$this->page_obj_id[1].' 0 R /FitH null]'; 
  9629.     } elseif ($this->ZoomMode == 'real') { 
  9630.         $out .= ' /OpenAction ['.$this->page_obj_id[1].' 0 R /XYZ null null 1]'; 
  9631.     } elseif (!is_string($this->ZoomMode)) { 
  9632.         $out .= sprintf(' /OpenAction ['.$this->page_obj_id[1].' 0 R /XYZ null null %F]', ($this->ZoomMode / 100)); 
  9633.     } 
  9634.     //$out .= ' /AA <<>>'; 
  9635.     //$out .= ' /URI <<>>'; 
  9636.     $out .= ' /Metadata '.$xmpobj.' 0 R'; 
  9637.     //$out .= ' /StructTreeRoot <<>>'; 
  9638.     //$out .= ' /MarkInfo <<>>'; 
  9639.     if (isset($this->l['a_meta_language'])) { 
  9640.         $out .= ' /Lang '.$this->_textstring($this->l['a_meta_language'], $oid); 
  9641.     } 
  9642.     //$out .= ' /SpiderInfo <<>>'; 
  9643.     // set OutputIntent to sRGB IEC61966-2.1 if required 
  9644.     if ($this->pdfa_mode OR $this->force_srgb) { 
  9645.         $out .= ' /OutputIntents [<<'; 
  9646.         $out .= ' /Type /OutputIntent'; 
  9647.         $out .= ' /S /GTS_PDFA1'; 
  9648.         $out .= ' /OutputCondition '.$this->_textstring('sRGB IEC61966-2.1', $oid); 
  9649.         $out .= ' /OutputConditionIdentifier '.$this->_textstring('sRGB IEC61966-2.1', $oid); 
  9650.         $out .= ' /RegistryName '.$this->_textstring('http://www.color.org', $oid); 
  9651.         $out .= ' /Info '.$this->_textstring('sRGB IEC61966-2.1', $oid); 
  9652.         $out .= ' /DestOutputProfile '.$iccobj.' 0 R'; 
  9653.         $out .= ' >>]'; 
  9654.     } 
  9655.     //$out .= ' /PieceInfo <<>>'; 
  9656.     if (!empty($this->pdflayers)) { 
  9657.         $lyrobjs = ''; 
  9658.         $lyrobjs_off = ''; 
  9659.         $lyrobjs_lock = ''; 
  9660.         foreach ($this->pdflayers as $layer) { 
  9661.             $layer_obj_ref = ' '.$layer['objid'].' 0 R'; 
  9662.             $lyrobjs .= $layer_obj_ref; 
  9663.             if ($layer['view'] === false) { 
  9664.                 $lyrobjs_off .= $layer_obj_ref; 
  9665.             } 
  9666.             if ($layer['lock']) { 
  9667.                 $lyrobjs_lock .= $layer_obj_ref; 
  9668.             } 
  9669.         } 
  9670.         $out .= ' /OCProperties << /OCGs ['.$lyrobjs.']'; 
  9671.         $out .= ' /D <<'; 
  9672.         $out .= ' /Name '.$this->_textstring('Layers', $oid); 
  9673.         $out .= ' /Creator '.$this->_textstring('TCPDF', $oid); 
  9674.         $out .= ' /BaseState /ON'; 
  9675.         $out .= ' /OFF ['.$lyrobjs_off.']'; 
  9676.         $out .= ' /Locked ['.$lyrobjs_lock.']'; 
  9677.         $out .= ' /Intent /View'; 
  9678.         $out .= ' /AS ['; 
  9679.         $out .= ' << /Event /Print /OCGs ['.$lyrobjs.'] /Category [/Print] >>'; 
  9680.         $out .= ' << /Event /View /OCGs ['.$lyrobjs.'] /Category [/View] >>'; 
  9681.         $out .= ' ]'; 
  9682.         $out .= ' /Order ['.$lyrobjs.']'; 
  9683.         $out .= ' /ListMode /AllPages'; 
  9684.         //$out .= ' /RBGroups ['..']'; 
  9685.         //$out .= ' /Locked ['..']'; 
  9686.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9687.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9688.     } 
  9689.     // AcroForm 
  9690.     if (!empty($this->form_obj_id) 
  9691.         OR ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])) 
  9692.         OR !empty($this->empty_signature_appearance)) { 
  9693.         $out .= ' /AcroForm <<'; 
  9694.         $objrefs = ''; 
  9695.         if ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])) { 
  9696.             // set reference for signature object 
  9697.             $objrefs .= $this->sig_obj_id.' 0 R'; 
  9698.         } 
  9699.         if (!empty($this->empty_signature_appearance)) { 
  9700.             foreach ($this->empty_signature_appearance as $esa) { 
  9701.                 // set reference for empty signature objects 
  9702.                 $objrefs .= ' '.$esa['objid'].' 0 R'; 
  9703.             } 
  9704.         } 
  9705.         if (!empty($this->form_obj_id)) { 
  9706.             foreach($this->form_obj_id as $objid) { 
  9707.                 $objrefs .= ' '.$objid.' 0 R'; 
  9708.             } 
  9709.         } 
  9710.         $out .= ' /Fields ['.$objrefs.']'; 
  9711.         // It's better to turn off this value and set the appearance stream for each annotation (/AP) to avoid conflicts with signature fields. 
  9712.         if (empty($this->signature_data['approval']) OR ($this->signature_data['approval'] != 'A')) { 
  9713.             $out .= ' /NeedAppearances false'; 
  9714.         } 
  9715.         if ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])) { 
  9716.             if ($this->signature_data['cert_type'] > 0) { 
  9717.                 $out .= ' /SigFlags 3'; 
  9718.             } else { 
  9719.                 $out .= ' /SigFlags 1'; 
  9720.             } 
  9721.         } 
  9722.         //$out .= ' /CO '; 
  9723.         if (isset($this->annotation_fonts) AND !empty($this->annotation_fonts)) { 
  9724.             $out .= ' /DR <<'; 
  9725.             $out .= ' /Font <<'; 
  9726.             foreach ($this->annotation_fonts as $fontkey => $fontid) { 
  9727.                 $out .= ' /F'.$fontid.' '.$this->font_obj_ids[$fontkey].' 0 R'; 
  9728.             } 
  9729.             $out .= ' >> >>'; 
  9730.         } 
  9731.         $font = $this->getFontBuffer('helvetica'); 
  9732.         $out .= ' /DA (/F'.$font['i'].' 0 Tf 0 g)'; 
  9733.         $out .= ' /Q '.(($this->rtl)?'2':'0'); 
  9734.         //$out .= ' /XFA '; 
  9735.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9736.         // signatures 
  9737.         if ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])  
  9738.             AND (empty($this->signature_data['approval']) OR ($this->signature_data['approval'] != 'A'))) { 
  9739.             if ($this->signature_data['cert_type'] > 0) { 
  9740.                 $out .= ' /Perms << /DocMDP '.($this->sig_obj_id + 1).' 0 R >>'; 
  9741.             } else { 
  9742.                 $out .= ' /Perms << /UR3 '.($this->sig_obj_id + 1).' 0 R >>'; 
  9743.             } 
  9744.         } 
  9745.     } 
  9746.     //$out .= ' /Legal <<>>'; 
  9747.     //$out .= ' /Requirements []'; 
  9748.     //$out .= ' /Collection <<>>'; 
  9749.     //$out .= ' /NeedsRendering true'; 
  9750.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9751.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9752.     $this->_out($out); 
  9753.     return $oid; 
  9754. } 
  9755.  
  9756. /** 
  9757.  * Output viewer preferences. 
  9758.  * @return string for viewer preferences 
  9759.  * @author Nicola asuni 
  9760.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  9761.  * @protected 
  9762.  */ 
  9763. protected function _putviewerpreferences() { 
  9764.     $vp = $this->viewer_preferences; 
  9765.     $out = ' /ViewerPreferences <<'; 
  9766.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  9767.         $out .= ' /Direction /R2L'; 
  9768.     } else { 
  9769.         $out .= ' /Direction /L2R'; 
  9770.     } 
  9771.     if (isset($vp['HideToolbar']) AND ($vp['HideToolbar'])) { 
  9772.         $out .= ' /HideToolbar true'; 
  9773.     } 
  9774.     if (isset($vp['HideMenubar']) AND ($vp['HideMenubar'])) { 
  9775.         $out .= ' /HideMenubar true'; 
  9776.     } 
  9777.     if (isset($vp['HideWindowUI']) AND ($vp['HideWindowUI'])) { 
  9778.         $out .= ' /HideWindowUI true'; 
  9779.     } 
  9780.     if (isset($vp['FitWindow']) AND ($vp['FitWindow'])) { 
  9781.         $out .= ' /FitWindow true'; 
  9782.     } 
  9783.     if (isset($vp['CenterWindow']) AND ($vp['CenterWindow'])) { 
  9784.         $out .= ' /CenterWindow true'; 
  9785.     } 
  9786.     if (isset($vp['DisplayDocTitle']) AND ($vp['DisplayDocTitle'])) { 
  9787.         $out .= ' /DisplayDocTitle true'; 
  9788.     } 
  9789.     if (isset($vp['NonFullScreenPageMode'])) { 
  9790.         $out .= ' /NonFullScreenPageMode /'.$vp['NonFullScreenPageMode']; 
  9791.     } 
  9792.     if (isset($vp['ViewArea'])) { 
  9793.         $out .= ' /ViewArea /'.$vp['ViewArea']; 
  9794.     } 
  9795.     if (isset($vp['ViewClip'])) { 
  9796.         $out .= ' /ViewClip /'.$vp['ViewClip']; 
  9797.     } 
  9798.     if (isset($vp['PrintArea'])) { 
  9799.         $out .= ' /PrintArea /'.$vp['PrintArea']; 
  9800.     } 
  9801.     if (isset($vp['PrintClip'])) { 
  9802.         $out .= ' /PrintClip /'.$vp['PrintClip']; 
  9803.     } 
  9804.     if (isset($vp['PrintScaling'])) { 
  9805.         $out .= ' /PrintScaling /'.$vp['PrintScaling']; 
  9806.     } 
  9807.     if (isset($vp['Duplex']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($vp['Duplex']))) { 
  9808.         $out .= ' /Duplex /'.$vp['Duplex']; 
  9809.     } 
  9810.     if (isset($vp['PickTrayByPDFSize'])) { 
  9811.         if ($vp['PickTrayByPDFSize']) { 
  9812.             $out .= ' /PickTrayByPDFSize true'; 
  9813.         } else { 
  9814.             $out .= ' /PickTrayByPDFSize false'; 
  9815.         } 
  9816.     } 
  9817.     if (isset($vp['PrintPageRange'])) { 
  9818.         $PrintPageRangeNum = ''; 
  9819.         foreach ($vp['PrintPageRange'] as $k => $v) { 
  9820.             $PrintPageRangeNum .= ' '.($v - 1).''; 
  9821.         } 
  9822.         $out .= ' /PrintPageRange ['.substr($PrintPageRangeNum, 1).']'; 
  9823.     } 
  9824.     if (isset($vp['NumCopies'])) { 
  9825.         $out .= ' /NumCopies '.intval($vp['NumCopies']); 
  9826.     } 
  9827.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9828.     return $out; 
  9829. } 
  9830.  
  9831. /** 
  9832.  * Output PDF File Header (7.5.2). 
  9833.  * @protected 
  9834.  */ 
  9835. protected function _putheader() { 
  9836.     $this->_out('%PDF-'.$this->PDFVersion); 
  9837.     $this->_out('%'.chr(0xe2).chr(0xe3).chr(0xcf).chr(0xd3)); 
  9838. } 
  9839.  
  9840. /** 
  9841.  * Output end of document (EOF). 
  9842.  * @protected 
  9843.  */ 
  9844. protected function _enddoc() { 
  9845.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['fontkey']) AND isset($this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'])) { 
  9846.         // save subset chars of the previous font 
  9847.         $this->setFontSubBuffer($this->CurrentFont['fontkey'], 'subsetchars', $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars']); 
  9848.     } 
  9849.     $this->state = 1; 
  9850.     $this->_putheader(); 
  9851.     $this->_putpages(); 
  9852.     $this->_putresources(); 
  9853.     // empty signature fields 
  9854.     if (!empty($this->empty_signature_appearance)) { 
  9855.         foreach ($this->empty_signature_appearance as $key => $esa) { 
  9856.             // widget annotation for empty signature 
  9857.             $out = $this->_getobj($esa['objid'])."\n"; 
  9858.             $out .= '<< /Type /Annot'; 
  9859.             $out .= ' /Subtype /Widget'; 
  9860.             $out .= ' /Rect ['.$esa['rect'].']'; 
  9861.             $out .= ' /P '.$this->page_obj_id[($esa['page'])].' 0 R'; // link to signature appearance page 
  9862.             $out .= ' /F 4'; 
  9863.             $out .= ' /FT /Sig'; 
  9864.             $signame = $esa['name'].sprintf(' [%03d]', ($key + 1)); 
  9865.             $out .= ' /T '.$this->_textstring($signame, $esa['objid']); 
  9866.             $out .= ' /Ff 0'; 
  9867.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  9868.             $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9869.             $this->_out($out); 
  9870.         } 
  9871.     } 
  9872.     // Signature 
  9873.     if ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])) { 
  9874.         // widget annotation for signature 
  9875.         $out = $this->_getobj($this->sig_obj_id)."\n"; 
  9876.         $out .= '<< /Type /Annot'; 
  9877.         $out .= ' /Subtype /Widget'; 
  9878.         $out .= ' /Rect ['.$this->signature_appearance['rect'].']'; 
  9879.         $out .= ' /P '.$this->page_obj_id[($this->signature_appearance['page'])].' 0 R'; // link to signature appearance page 
  9880.         $out .= ' /F 4'; 
  9881.         $out .= ' /FT /Sig'; 
  9882.         $out .= ' /T '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_appearance['name'], $this->sig_obj_id); 
  9883.         $out .= ' /Ff 0'; 
  9884.         $out .= ' /V '.($this->sig_obj_id + 1).' 0 R'; 
  9885.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9886.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9887.         $this->_out($out); 
  9888.         // signature 
  9889.         $this->_putsignature(); 
  9890.     } 
  9891.     // Info 
  9892.     $objid_info = $this->_putinfo(); 
  9893.     // Catalog 
  9894.     $objid_catalog = $this->_putcatalog(); 
  9895.     // Cross-ref 
  9896.     $o = $this->bufferlen; 
  9897.     // XREF section 
  9898.     $this->_out('xref'); 
  9899.     $this->_out('0 '.($this->n + 1)); 
  9900.     $this->_out('0000000000 65535 f '); 
  9901.     $freegen = ($this->n + 2); 
  9902.     for ($i=1; $i <= $this->n; ++$i) { 
  9903.         if (!isset($this->offsets[$i]) AND ($i > 1)) { 
  9904.             $this->_out(sprintf('0000000000 %05d f ', $freegen)); 
  9905.             ++$freegen; 
  9906.         } else { 
  9907.             $this->_out(sprintf('%010d 00000 n ', $this->offsets[$i])); 
  9908.         } 
  9909.     } 
  9910.     // TRAILER 
  9911.     $out = 'trailer'."\n"; 
  9912.     $out .= '<<'; 
  9913.     $out .= ' /Size '.($this->n + 1); 
  9914.     $out .= ' /Root '.$objid_catalog.' 0 R'; 
  9915.     $out .= ' /Info '.$objid_info.' 0 R'; 
  9916.     if ($this->encrypted) { 
  9917.         $out .= ' /Encrypt '.$this->encryptdata['objid'].' 0 R'; 
  9918.     } 
  9919.     $out .= ' /ID [ <'.$this->file_id.'> <'.$this->file_id.'> ]'; 
  9920.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9921.     $this->_out($out); 
  9922.     $this->_out('startxref'); 
  9923.     $this->_out($o); 
  9924.     $this->_out('%%EOF'); 
  9925.     $this->state = 3; // end-of-doc 
  9926.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  9927.         // remove temporary files used for images 
  9928.         foreach ($this->imagekeys as $key) { 
  9929.             // remove temporary files 
  9930.             unlink($this->images[$key]); 
  9931.         } 
  9932.         foreach ($this->fontkeys as $key) { 
  9933.             // remove temporary files 
  9934.             unlink($this->fonts[$key]); 
  9935.         } 
  9936.     } 
  9937. } 
  9938.  
  9939. /** 
  9940.  * Initialize a new page. 
  9941.  * @param $orientation (string) page orientation. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>P or PORTRAIT (default)</li><li>L or LANDSCAPE</li></ul> 
  9942.  * @param $format (mixed) The format used for pages. It can be either: one of the string values specified at getPageSizeFromFormat() or an array of parameters specified at setPageFormat(). 
  9943.  * @protected 
  9944.  * @see getPageSizeFromFormat(), setPageFormat() 
  9945.  */ 
  9946. protected function _beginpage($orientation='', $format='') { 
  9947.     ++$this->page; 
  9948.     $this->pageobjects[$this->page] = array(); 
  9949.     $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, ''); 
  9950.     // initialize array for graphics tranformation positions inside a page buffer 
  9951.     $this->transfmrk[$this->page] = array(); 
  9952.     $this->state = 2; 
  9953.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($orientation)) { 
  9954.         if (isset($this->CurOrientation)) { 
  9955.             $orientation = $this->CurOrientation; 
  9956.         } elseif ($this->fwPt > $this->fhPt) { 
  9957.             // landscape 
  9958.             $orientation = 'L'; 
  9959.         } else { 
  9960.             // portrait 
  9961.             $orientation = 'P'; 
  9962.         } 
  9963.     } 
  9964.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($format)) { 
  9965.         $this->pagedim[$this->page] = $this->pagedim[($this->page - 1)]; 
  9966.         $this->setPageOrientation($orientation); 
  9967.     } else { 
  9968.         $this->setPageFormat($format, $orientation); 
  9969.     } 
  9970.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  9971.         $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  9972.     } else { 
  9973.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  9974.     } 
  9975.     $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  9976.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$this->page])) { 
  9977.         // start a new group 
  9978.         $this->currpagegroup = $this->newpagegroup[$this->page]; 
  9979.         $this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup] = 1; 
  9980.     } elseif (isset($this->currpagegroup) AND ($this->currpagegroup > 0)) { 
  9981.         ++$this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup]; 
  9982.     } 
  9983. } 
  9984.  
  9985. /** 
  9986.  * Mark end of page. 
  9987.  * @protected 
  9988.  */ 
  9989. protected function _endpage() { 
  9990.     $this->setVisibility('all'); 
  9991.     $this->state = 1; 
  9992. } 
  9993.  
  9994. /** 
  9995.  * Begin a new object and return the object number. 
  9996.  * @return int object number 
  9997.  * @protected 
  9998.  */ 
  9999. protected function _newobj() { 
  10000.     $this->_out($this->_getobj()); 
  10001.     return $this->n; 
  10002. } 
  10003.  
  10004. /** 
  10005.  * Return the starting object string for the selected object ID. 
  10006.  * @param $objid (int) Object ID (leave empty to get a new ID). 
  10007.  * @return string the starting object string 
  10008.  * @protected 
  10009.  * @since 5.8.009 (2010-08-20) 
  10010.  */ 
  10011. protected function _getobj($objid='') { 
  10012.     if ($objid === '') { 
  10013.         ++$this->n; 
  10014.         $objid = $this->n; 
  10015.     } 
  10016.     $this->offsets[$objid] = $this->bufferlen; 
  10017.     $this->pageobjects[$this->page][] = $objid; 
  10018.     return $objid.' 0 obj'; 
  10019. } 
  10020.  
  10021. /** 
  10022.  * Underline text. 
  10023.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10024.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10025.  * @param $txt (string) text to underline 
  10026.  * @protected 
  10027.  */ 
  10028. protected function _dounderline($x, $y, $txt) { 
  10029.     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  10030.     return $this->_dounderlinew($x, $y, $w); 
  10031. } 
  10032.  
  10033. /** 
  10034.  * Underline for rectangular text area. 
  10035.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10036.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10037.  * @param $w (int) width to underline 
  10038.  * @protected 
  10039.  * @since 4.8.008 (2009-09-29) 
  10040.  */ 
  10041. protected function _dounderlinew($x, $y, $w) { 
  10042.     $linew = - $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSizePt; 
  10043.     return sprintf('%F %F %F %F re f', $x * $this->k, ((($this->h - $y) * $this->k) + $linew), $w * $this->k, $linew); 
  10044. } 
  10045.  
  10046. /** 
  10047.  * Line through text. 
  10048.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10049.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10050.  * @param $txt (string) text to linethrough 
  10051.  * @protected 
  10052.  */ 
  10053. protected function _dolinethrough($x, $y, $txt) { 
  10054.     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  10055.     return $this->_dolinethroughw($x, $y, $w); 
  10056. } 
  10057.  
  10058. /** 
  10059.  * Line through for rectangular text area. 
  10060.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10061.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10062.  * @param $w (int) line length (width) 
  10063.  * @protected 
  10064.  * @since 4.9.008 (2009-09-29) 
  10065.  */ 
  10066. protected function _dolinethroughw($x, $y, $w) { 
  10067.     $linew = - $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSizePt; 
  10068.     return sprintf('%F %F %F %F re f', $x * $this->k, ((($this->h - $y) * $this->k) + $linew + ($this->FontSizePt / 3)), $w * $this->k, $linew); 
  10069. } 
  10070.  
  10071. /** 
  10072.  * Overline text. 
  10073.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10074.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10075.  * @param $txt (string) text to overline 
  10076.  * @protected 
  10077.  * @since 4.9.015 (2010-04-19) 
  10078.  */ 
  10079. protected function _dooverline($x, $y, $txt) { 
  10080.     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  10081.     return $this->_dooverlinew($x, $y, $w); 
  10082. } 
  10083.  
  10084. /** 
  10085.  * Overline for rectangular text area. 
  10086.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10087.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10088.  * @param $w (int) width to overline 
  10089.  * @protected 
  10090.  * @since 4.9.015 (2010-04-19) 
  10091.  */ 
  10092. protected function _dooverlinew($x, $y, $w) { 
  10093.     $linew = - $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSizePt; 
  10094.     return sprintf('%F %F %F %F re f', $x * $this->k, (($this->h - $y + $this->FontAscent) * $this->k) - $linew, $w * $this->k, $linew); 
  10095.  
  10096. } 
  10097.  
  10098. /** 
  10099.  * Format a data string for meta information 
  10100.  * @param $s (string) data string to escape. 
  10101.  * @param $n (int) object ID 
  10102.  * @return string escaped string. 
  10103.  * @protected 
  10104.  */ 
  10105. protected function _datastring($s, $n=0) { 
  10106.     if ($n == 0) { 
  10107.         $n = $this->n; 
  10108.     } 
  10109.     $s = $this->_encrypt_data($n, $s); 
  10110.     return '('. TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($s).')'; 
  10111. } 
  10112.  
  10113. /** 
  10114.  * Set the document creation timestamp 
  10115.  * @param $time (mixed) Document creation timestamp in seconds or date-time string. 
  10116.  * @public 
  10117.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10118.  */ 
  10119. public function setDocCreationTimestamp($time) { 
  10120.     if (is_string($time)) { 
  10121.         $time = TCPDF_STATIC::getTimestamp($time); 
  10122.     } 
  10123.     $this->doc_creation_timestamp = intval($time); 
  10124. } 
  10125.  
  10126. /** 
  10127.  * Set the document modification timestamp 
  10128.  * @param $time (mixed) Document modification timestamp in seconds or date-time string. 
  10129.  * @public 
  10130.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10131.  */ 
  10132. public function setDocModificationTimestamp($time) { 
  10133.     if (is_string($time)) { 
  10134.         $time = TCPDF_STATIC::getTimestamp($time); 
  10135.     } 
  10136.     $this->doc_modification_timestamp = intval($time); 
  10137. } 
  10138.  
  10139. /** 
  10140.  * Returns document creation timestamp in seconds. 
  10141.  * @return (int) Creation timestamp in seconds. 
  10142.  * @public 
  10143.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10144.  */ 
  10145. public function getDocCreationTimestamp() { 
  10146.     return $this->doc_creation_timestamp; 
  10147. } 
  10148.  
  10149. /** 
  10150.  * Returns document modification timestamp in seconds. 
  10151.  * @return (int) Modfication timestamp in seconds. 
  10152.  * @public 
  10153.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10154.  */ 
  10155. public function getDocModificationTimestamp() { 
  10156.     return $this->doc_modification_timestamp; 
  10157. } 
  10158.  
  10159. /** 
  10160.  * Returns a formatted date for meta information 
  10161.  * @param $n (int) Object ID. 
  10162.  * @param $timestamp (int) Timestamp to convert. 
  10163.  * @return string escaped date string. 
  10164.  * @protected 
  10165.  * @since 4.6.028 (2009-08-25) 
  10166.  */ 
  10167. protected function _datestring($n=0, $timestamp=0) { 
  10168.     if ((empty($timestamp)) OR ($timestamp < 0)) { 
  10169.         $timestamp = $this->doc_creation_timestamp; 
  10170.     } 
  10171.     return $this->_datastring('D:'.TCPDF_STATIC::getFormattedDate($timestamp), $n); 
  10172. } 
  10173.  
  10174. /** 
  10175.  * Format a text string for meta information 
  10176.  * @param $s (string) string to escape. 
  10177.  * @param $n (int) object ID 
  10178.  * @return string escaped string. 
  10179.  * @protected 
  10180.  */ 
  10181. protected function _textstring($s, $n=0) { 
  10182.     if ($this->isunicode) { 
  10183.         //Convert string to UTF-16BE 
  10184.         $s = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($s, true, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  10185.     } 
  10186.     return $this->_datastring($s, $n); 
  10187. } 
  10188.  
  10189. /** 
  10190.  * THIS METHOD IS DEPRECATED 
  10191.  * Format a text string 
  10192.  * @param $s (string) string to escape. 
  10193.  * @return string escaped string. 
  10194.  * @protected 
  10195.  * @deprecated 
  10196.  */ 
  10197. protected function _escapetext($s) { 
  10198.     if ($this->isunicode) { 
  10199.         if (($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'core') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'TrueType') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'Type1')) { 
  10200.             $s = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($s, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  10201.         } else { 
  10202.             //Convert string to UTF-16BE and reverse RTL language 
  10203.             $s = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8StrRev($s, false, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  10204.         } 
  10205.     } 
  10206.     return TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($s); 
  10207. } 
  10208.  
  10209. /** 
  10210.  * get raw output stream. 
  10211.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10212.  * @param $n (int) object reference for encryption mode 
  10213.  * @protected 
  10214.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10215.  * @since 5.5.000 (2010-06-22) 
  10216.  */ 
  10217. protected function _getrawstream($s, $n=0) { 
  10218.     if ($n <= 0) { 
  10219.         // default to current object 
  10220.         $n = $this->n; 
  10221.     } 
  10222.     return $this->_encrypt_data($n, $s); 
  10223. } 
  10224.  
  10225. /** 
  10226.  * Format output stream (DEPRECATED). 
  10227.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10228.  * @param $n (int) object reference for encryption mode 
  10229.  * @protected 
  10230.  * @deprecated 
  10231.  */ 
  10232. protected function _getstream($s, $n=0) { 
  10233.     return 'stream'."\n".$this->_getrawstream($s, $n)."\n".'endstream'; 
  10234. } 
  10235.  
  10236. /** 
  10237.  * Output a stream (DEPRECATED). 
  10238.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10239.  * @param $n (int) object reference for encryption mode 
  10240.  * @protected 
  10241.  * @deprecated 
  10242.  */ 
  10243. protected function _putstream($s, $n=0) { 
  10244.     $this->_out($this->_getstream($s, $n)); 
  10245. } 
  10246.  
  10247. /** 
  10248.  * Output a string to the document. 
  10249.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10250.  * @protected 
  10251.  */ 
  10252. protected function _out($s) { 
  10253.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  10254.         if ($this->inxobj) { 
  10255.             // we are inside an XObject template 
  10256.             $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] .= $s."\n"; 
  10257.         } elseif ((!$this->InFooter) AND isset($this->footerlen[$this->page]) AND ($this->footerlen[$this->page] > 0)) { 
  10258.             // puts data before page footer 
  10259.             $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  10260.             $page = substr($pagebuff, 0, -$this->footerlen[$this->page]); 
  10261.             $footer = substr($pagebuff, -$this->footerlen[$this->page]); 
  10262.             $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $page.$s."\n".$footer); 
  10263.             // update footer position 
  10264.             $this->footerpos[$this->page] += strlen($s."\n"); 
  10265.         } else { 
  10266.             // set page data 
  10267.             $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $s."\n", true); 
  10268.         } 
  10269.     } elseif ($this->state > 0) { 
  10270.         // set general data 
  10271.         $this->setBuffer($s."\n"); 
  10272.     } 
  10273. } 
  10274.  
  10275. /** 
  10276.  * Set header font. 
  10277.  * @param $font (array) Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10278.  * @public 
  10279.  * @since 1.1 
  10280.  */ 
  10281. public function setHeaderFont($font) { 
  10282.     $this->header_font = $font; 
  10283. } 
  10284.  
  10285. /** 
  10286.  * Get header font. 
  10287.  * @return array() Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10288.  * @public 
  10289.  * @since 3.0.012 (2008-07-24) 
  10290.  */ 
  10291. public function getHeaderFont() { 
  10292.     return $this->header_font; 
  10293. } 
  10294.  
  10295. /** 
  10296.  * Set footer font. 
  10297.  * @param $font (array) Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10298.  * @public 
  10299.  * @since 1.1 
  10300.  */ 
  10301. public function setFooterFont($font) { 
  10302.     $this->footer_font = $font; 
  10303. } 
  10304.  
  10305. /** 
  10306.  * Get Footer font. 
  10307.  * @return array() Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10308.  * @public 
  10309.  * @since 3.0.012 (2008-07-24) 
  10310.  */ 
  10311. public function getFooterFont() { 
  10312.     return $this->footer_font; 
  10313. } 
  10314.  
  10315. /** 
  10316.  * Set language array. 
  10317.  * @param $language (array) 
  10318.  * @public 
  10319.  * @since 1.1 
  10320.  */ 
  10321. public function setLanguageArray($language) { 
  10322.     $this->l = $language; 
  10323.     if (isset($this->l['a_meta_dir'])) { 
  10324.         $this->rtl = $this->l['a_meta_dir']=='rtl' ? true : false; 
  10325.     } else { 
  10326.         $this->rtl = false; 
  10327.     } 
  10328. } 
  10329.  
  10330. /** 
  10331.  * Returns the PDF data. 
  10332.  * @public 
  10333.  */ 
  10334. public function getPDFData() { 
  10335.     if ($this->state < 3) { 
  10336.         $this->Close(); 
  10337.     } 
  10338.     return $this->buffer; 
  10339. } 
  10340.  
  10341. /** 
  10342.  * Output anchor link. 
  10343.  * @param $url (string) link URL or internal link (i.e.: <a href="#23, 4.5">link to page 23 at 4.5 Y position</a>) 
  10344.  * @param $name (string) link name 
  10345.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  10346.  * @param $firstline (boolean) if true prints only the first line and return the remaining string. 
  10347.  * @param $color (array) array of RGB text color 
  10348.  * @param $style (string) font style (U, D, B, I) 
  10349.  * @param $firstblock (boolean) if true the string is the starting of a line. 
  10350.  * @return the number of cells used or the remaining text if $firstline = true; 
  10351.  * @public 
  10352.  */ 
  10353. public function addHtmlLink($url, $name, $fill=false, $firstline=false, $color='', $style=-1, $firstblock=false) { 
  10354.     if (isset($url[1]) AND ($url[0] == '#')) { 
  10355.         // convert url to internal link 
  10356.         $lnkdata = explode(', ', $url); 
  10357.         if (isset($lnkdata[0]) ) { 
  10358.             $page = substr($lnkdata[0], 1); 
  10359.             if (isset($lnkdata[1]) AND (strlen($lnkdata[1]) > 0)) { 
  10360.                 $lnky = floatval($lnkdata[1]); 
  10361.             } else { 
  10362.                 $lnky = 0; 
  10363.             } 
  10364.             $url = $this->AddLink(); 
  10365.             $this->SetLink($url, $lnky, $page); 
  10366.         } 
  10367.     } 
  10368.     // store current settings 
  10369.     $prevcolor = $this->fgcolor; 
  10370.     $prevstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  10371.     if (empty($color)) { 
  10372.         $this->SetTextColorArray($this->htmlLinkColorArray); 
  10373.     } else { 
  10374.         $this->SetTextColorArray($color); 
  10375.     } 
  10376.     if ($style == -1) { 
  10377.         $this->SetFont('', $this->FontStyle.$this->htmlLinkFontStyle); 
  10378.     } else { 
  10379.         $this->SetFont('', $this->FontStyle.$style); 
  10380.     } 
  10381.     $ret = $this->Write($this->lasth, $name, $url, $fill, '', false, 0, $firstline, $firstblock, 0); 
  10382.     // restore settings 
  10383.     $this->SetFont('', $prevstyle); 
  10384.     $this->SetTextColorArray($prevcolor); 
  10385.     return $ret; 
  10386. } 
  10387.  
  10388. /** 
  10389.  * Converts pixels to User's Units. 
  10390.  * @param $px (int) pixels 
  10391.  * @return float value in user's unit 
  10392.  * @public 
  10393.  * @see setImageScale(), getImageScale() 
  10394.  */ 
  10395. public function pixelsToUnits($px) { 
  10396.     return ($px / ($this->imgscale * $this->k)); 
  10397. } 
  10398.  
  10399. /** 
  10400.  * Reverse function for htmlentities. 
  10401.  * Convert entities in UTF-8. 
  10402.  * @param $text_to_convert (string) Text to convert. 
  10403.  * @return string converted text string 
  10404.  * @public 
  10405.  */ 
  10406. public function unhtmlentities($text_to_convert) { 
  10407.     return @html_entity_decode($text_to_convert, ENT_QUOTES, $this->encoding); 
  10408. } 
  10409.  
  10410. // ENCRYPTION METHODS ---------------------------------- 
  10411.  
  10412. /** 
  10413.  * Compute encryption key depending on object number where the encrypted data is stored. 
  10414.  * This is used for all strings and streams without crypt filter specifier. 
  10415.  * @param $n (int) object number 
  10416.  * @return int object key 
  10417.  * @protected 
  10418.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10419.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10420.  */ 
  10421. protected function _objectkey($n) { 
  10422.     $objkey = $this->encryptdata['key'].pack('VXxx', $n); 
  10423.     if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 2) { // AES-128 
  10424.         // AES padding 
  10425.         $objkey .= "\x73\x41\x6C\x54"; // sAlT 
  10426.     } 
  10427.     $objkey = substr(TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16($objkey), 0, (($this->encryptdata['Length'] / 8) + 5)); 
  10428.     $objkey = substr($objkey, 0, 16); 
  10429.     return $objkey; 
  10430. } 
  10431.  
  10432. /** 
  10433.  * Encrypt the input string. 
  10434.  * @param $n (int) object number 
  10435.  * @param $s (string) data string to encrypt 
  10436.  * @return encrypted string 
  10437.  * @protected 
  10438.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10439.  * @since 5.0.005 (2010-05-11) 
  10440.  */ 
  10441. protected function _encrypt_data($n, $s) { 
  10442.     if (!$this->encrypted) { 
  10443.         return $s; 
  10444.     } 
  10445.     switch ($this->encryptdata['mode']) { 
  10446.         case 0:   // RC4-40 
  10447.         case 1: { // RC4-128 
  10448.             $s = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($this->_objectkey($n), $s, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10449.             break; 
  10450.         } 
  10451.         case 2: { // AES-128 
  10452.             $s = TCPDF_STATIC::_AES($this->_objectkey($n), $s); 
  10453.             break; 
  10454.         } 
  10455.         case 3: { // AES-256 
  10456.             $s = TCPDF_STATIC::_AES($this->encryptdata['key'], $s); 
  10457.             break; 
  10458.         } 
  10459.     } 
  10460.     return $s; 
  10461. } 
  10462.  
  10463. /** 
  10464.  * Put encryption on PDF document. 
  10465.  * @protected 
  10466.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10467.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10468.  */ 
  10469. protected function _putencryption() { 
  10470.     if (!$this->encrypted) { 
  10471.         return; 
  10472.     } 
  10473.     $this->encryptdata['objid'] = $this->_newobj(); 
  10474.     $out = '<<'; 
  10475.     if (!isset($this->encryptdata['Filter']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['Filter'])) { 
  10476.         $this->encryptdata['Filter'] = 'Standard'; 
  10477.     } 
  10478.     $out .= ' /Filter /'.$this->encryptdata['Filter']; 
  10479.     if (isset($this->encryptdata['SubFilter']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['SubFilter'])) { 
  10480.         $out .= ' /SubFilter /'.$this->encryptdata['SubFilter']; 
  10481.     } 
  10482.     if (!isset($this->encryptdata['V']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['V'])) { 
  10483.         $this->encryptdata['V'] = 1; 
  10484.     } 
  10485.     // V is a code specifying the algorithm to be used in encrypting and decrypting the document 
  10486.     $out .= ' /V '.$this->encryptdata['V']; 
  10487.     if (isset($this->encryptdata['Length']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['Length'])) { 
  10488.         // The length of the encryption key, in bits. The value shall be a multiple of 8, in the range 40 to 256 
  10489.         $out .= ' /Length '.$this->encryptdata['Length']; 
  10490.     } else { 
  10491.         $out .= ' /Length 40'; 
  10492.     } 
  10493.     if ($this->encryptdata['V'] >= 4) { 
  10494.         if (!isset($this->encryptdata['StmF']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['StmF'])) { 
  10495.             $this->encryptdata['StmF'] = 'Identity'; 
  10496.         } 
  10497.         if (!isset($this->encryptdata['StrF']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['StrF'])) { 
  10498.             // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used when decrypting all strings in the document. 
  10499.             $this->encryptdata['StrF'] = 'Identity'; 
  10500.         } 
  10501.         // A dictionary whose keys shall be crypt filter names and whose values shall be the corresponding crypt filter dictionaries. 
  10502.         if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF'])) { 
  10503.             $out .= ' /CF <<'; 
  10504.             $out .= ' /'.$this->encryptdata['StmF'].' <<'; 
  10505.             $out .= ' /Type /CryptFilter'; 
  10506.             if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM'])) { 
  10507.                 // The method used 
  10508.                 $out .= ' /CFM /'.$this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM']; 
  10509.                 if ($this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { 
  10510.                     $out .= ' /Recipients ['; 
  10511.                     foreach ($this->encryptdata['Recipients'] as $rec) { 
  10512.                         $out .= ' <'.$rec.'>'; 
  10513.                     } 
  10514.                     $out .= ' ]'; 
  10515.                     if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['EncryptMetadata']) AND (!$this->encryptdata['CF']['EncryptMetadata'])) { 
  10516.                         $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata false'; 
  10517.                     } else { 
  10518.                         $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata true'; 
  10519.                     } 
  10520.                 } 
  10521.             } else { 
  10522.                 $out .= ' /CFM /None'; 
  10523.             } 
  10524.             if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['AuthEvent']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF']['AuthEvent'])) { 
  10525.                 // The event to be used to trigger the authorization that is required to access encryption keys used by this filter. 
  10526.                 $out .= ' /AuthEvent /'.$this->encryptdata['CF']['AuthEvent']; 
  10527.             } else { 
  10528.                 $out .= ' /AuthEvent /DocOpen'; 
  10529.             } 
  10530.             if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['Length']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF']['Length'])) { 
  10531.                 // The bit length of the encryption key. 
  10532.                 $out .= ' /Length '.$this->encryptdata['CF']['Length']; 
  10533.             } 
  10534.             $out .= ' >> >>'; 
  10535.         } 
  10536.         // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used by default when decrypting streams. 
  10537.         $out .= ' /StmF /'.$this->encryptdata['StmF']; 
  10538.         // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used when decrypting all strings in the document. 
  10539.         $out .= ' /StrF /'.$this->encryptdata['StrF']; 
  10540.         if (isset($this->encryptdata['EFF']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['EFF'])) { 
  10541.             // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used when encrypting embedded file streams that do not have their own crypt filter specifier. 
  10542.             $out .= ' /EFF /'.$this->encryptdata['']; 
  10543.         } 
  10544.     } 
  10545.     // Additional encryption dictionary entries for the standard security handler 
  10546.     if ($this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { 
  10547.         if (($this->encryptdata['V'] < 4) AND isset($this->encryptdata['Recipients']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['Recipients'])) { 
  10548.             $out .= ' /Recipients ['; 
  10549.             foreach ($this->encryptdata['Recipients'] as $rec) { 
  10550.                 $out .= ' <'.$rec.'>'; 
  10551.             } 
  10552.             $out .= ' ]'; 
  10553.         } 
  10554.     } else { 
  10555.         $out .= ' /R'; 
  10556.         if ($this->encryptdata['V'] == 5) { // AES-256 
  10557.             $out .= ' 5'; 
  10558.             $out .= ' /OE ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['OE']).')'; 
  10559.             $out .= ' /UE ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['UE']).')'; 
  10560.             $out .= ' /Perms ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['perms']).')'; 
  10561.         } elseif ($this->encryptdata['V'] == 4) { // AES-128 
  10562.             $out .= ' 4'; 
  10563.         } elseif ($this->encryptdata['V'] < 2) { // RC-40 
  10564.             $out .= ' 2'; 
  10565.         } else { // RC-128 
  10566.             $out .= ' 3'; 
  10567.         } 
  10568.         $out .= ' /O ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['O']).')'; 
  10569.         $out .= ' /U ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['U']).')'; 
  10570.         $out .= ' /P '.$this->encryptdata['P']; 
  10571.         if (isset($this->encryptdata['EncryptMetadata']) AND (!$this->encryptdata['EncryptMetadata'])) { 
  10572.             $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata false'; 
  10573.         } else { 
  10574.             $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata true'; 
  10575.         } 
  10576.     } 
  10577.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  10578.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  10579.     $this->_out($out); 
  10580. } 
  10581.  
  10582. /** 
  10583.  * Compute U value (used for encryption) 
  10584.  * @return string U value 
  10585.  * @protected 
  10586.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10587.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10588.  */ 
  10589. protected function _Uvalue() { 
  10590.     if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 0) { // RC4-40 
  10591.         return TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($this->encryptdata['key'], TCPDF_STATIC::$enc_padding, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10592.     } elseif ($this->encryptdata['mode'] < 3) { // RC4-128, AES-128 
  10593.         $tmp = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16(TCPDF_STATIC::$enc_padding.$this->encryptdata['fileid']); 
  10594.         $enc = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($this->encryptdata['key'], $tmp, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10595.         $len = strlen($tmp); 
  10596.         for ($i = 1; $i <= 19; ++$i) { 
  10597.             $ek = ''; 
  10598.             for ($j = 0; $j < $len; ++$j) { 
  10599.                 $ek .= chr(ord($this->encryptdata['key'][$j]) ^ $i); 
  10600.             } 
  10601.             $enc = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($ek, $enc, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10602.         } 
  10603.         $enc .= str_repeat("\x00", 16); 
  10604.         return substr($enc, 0, 32); 
  10605.     } elseif ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 3) { // AES-256 
  10606.         $seed = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16(TCPDF_STATIC::getRandomSeed()); 
  10607.         // User Validation Salt 
  10608.         $this->encryptdata['UVS'] = substr($seed, 0, 8); 
  10609.         // User Key Salt 
  10610.         $this->encryptdata['UKS'] = substr($seed, 8, 16); 
  10611.         return hash('sha256', $this->encryptdata['user_password'].$this->encryptdata['UVS'], true).$this->encryptdata['UVS'].$this->encryptdata['UKS']; 
  10612.     } 
  10613. } 
  10614.  
  10615. /** 
  10616.  * Compute UE value (used for encryption) 
  10617.  * @return string UE value 
  10618.  * @protected 
  10619.  * @since 5.9.006 (2010-10-19) 
  10620.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10621.  */ 
  10622. protected function _UEvalue() { 
  10623.     $hashkey = hash('sha256', $this->encryptdata['user_password'].$this->encryptdata['UKS'], true); 
  10624.     $iv = str_repeat("\x00", mcrypt_get_iv_size(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, MCRYPT_MODE_CBC)); 
  10625.     return mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $hashkey, $this->encryptdata['key'], MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $iv); 
  10626. } 
  10627.  
  10628. /**
