  12178.  * @param $name (string) Destination name. 
  12179.  * @param $y (float) Y position in user units of the destiantion on the selected page (default = -1 = current position; 0 = page start;). 
  12180.  * @param $page (int|string) Target page number (leave empty for current page). If you prefix a page number with the * character, then this page will not be changed when adding/deleting/moving pages. 
  12181.  * @param $x (float) X position in user units of the destiantion on the selected page (default = -1 = current position;). 
  12182.  * @return (string) Stripped named destination identifier or false in case of error. 
  12183.  * @public 
  12184.  * @author Christian Deligant, Nicola Asuni 
  12185.  * @since 5.9.097 (2011-06-23) 
  12186.  */ 
  12187. public function setDestination($name, $y=-1, $page='', $x=-1) { 
  12188.     // remove unsupported characters 
  12189.     $name = TCPDF_STATIC::encodeNameObject($name); 
  12190.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($name)) { 
  12191.         return false; 
  12192.     } 
  12193.     if ($y == -1) { 
  12194.         $y = $this->GetY(); 
  12195.     } elseif ($y < 0) { 
  12196.         $y = 0; 
  12197.     } elseif ($y > $this->h) { 
  12198.         $y = $this->h; 
  12199.     } 
  12200.     if ($x == -1) { 
  12201.         $x = $this->GetX(); 
  12202.     } elseif ($x < 0) { 
  12203.         $x = 0; 
  12204.     } elseif ($x > $this->w) { 
  12205.         $x = $this->w; 
  12206.     } 
  12207.     $fixed = false; 
  12208.     if (!empty($page) AND ($page[0] == '*')) { 
  12209.         $page = intval(substr($page, 1)); 
  12210.         // this page number will not be changed when moving/add/deleting pages 
  12211.         $fixed = true; 
  12212.     } 
  12213.     if (empty($page)) { 
  12214.         $page = $this->PageNo(); 
  12215.         if (empty($page)) { 
  12216.             return; 
  12217.         } 
  12218.     } 
  12219.     $this->dests[$name] = array('x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'p' => $page, 'f' => $fixed); 
  12220.     return $name; 
  12221. } 
  12222.  
  12223. /** 
  12224.  * Return the Named Destination array. 
  12225.  * @return (array) Named Destination array. 
  12226.  * @public 
  12227.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12228.  * @since 5.9.097 (2011-06-23) 
  12229.  */ 
  12230. public function getDestination() { 
  12231.     return $this->dests; 
  12232. } 
  12233.  
  12234. /** 
  12235.  * Insert Named Destinations. 
  12236.  * @protected 
  12237.  * @author Johannes G\FCntert, Nicola Asuni 
  12238.  * @since 5.9.098 (2011-06-23) 
  12239.  */ 
  12240. protected function _putdests() { 
  12241.     if (empty($this->dests)) { 
  12242.         return; 
  12243.     } 
  12244.     $this->n_dests = $this->_newobj(); 
  12245.     $out = ' <<'; 
  12246.     foreach($this->dests as $name => $o) { 
  12247.         $out .= ' /'.$name.' '.sprintf('[%u 0 R /XYZ %F %F null]', $this->page_obj_id[($o['p'])], ($o['x'] * $this->k), ($this->pagedim[$o['p']]['h'] - ($o['y'] * $this->k))); 
  12248.     } 
  12249.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  12250.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  12251.     $this->_out($out); 
  12252. } 
  12253.  
  12254. /** 
  12255.  * Adds a bookmark - alias for Bookmark(). 
  12256.  * @param $txt (string) Bookmark description. 
  12257.  * @param $level (int) Bookmark level (minimum value is 0). 
  12258.  * @param $y (float) Y position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position; 0 = page start;). 
  12259.  * @param $page (int|string) Target page number (leave empty for current page). If you prefix a page number with the * character, then this page will not be changed when adding/deleting/moving pages. 
  12260.  * @param $style (string) Font style: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  12261.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array (values from 0 to 255). 
  12262.  * @param $x (float) X position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position;). 
  12263.  * @param $link (mixed) URL, or numerical link ID, or named destination (# character followed by the destination name), or embedded file (* character followed by the file name). 
  12264.  * @public 
  12265.  */ 
  12266. public function setBookmark($txt, $level=0, $y=-1, $page='', $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0), $x=-1, $link='') { 
  12267.     $this->Bookmark($txt, $level, $y, $page, $style, $color, $x, $link); 
  12268. } 
  12269.  
  12270. /** 
  12271.  * Adds a bookmark. 
  12272.  * @param $txt (string) Bookmark description. 
  12273.  * @param $level (int) Bookmark level (minimum value is 0). 
  12274.  * @param $y (float) Y position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position; 0 = page start;). 
  12275.  * @param $page (int|string) Target page number (leave empty for current page). If you prefix a page number with the * character, then this page will not be changed when adding/deleting/moving pages. 
  12276.  * @param $style (string) Font style: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  12277.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array (values from 0 to 255). 
  12278.  * @param $x (float) X position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position;). 
  12279.  * @param $link (mixed) URL, or numerical link ID, or named destination (# character followed by the destination name), or embedded file (* character followed by the file name). 
  12280.  * @public 
  12281.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12282.  */ 
  12283. public function Bookmark($txt, $level=0, $y=-1, $page='', $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0), $x=-1, $link='') { 
  12284.     if ($level < 0) { 
  12285.         $level = 0; 
  12286.     } 
  12287.     if (isset($this->outlines[0])) { 
  12288.         $lastoutline = end($this->outlines); 
  12289.         $maxlevel = $lastoutline['l'] + 1; 
  12290.     } else { 
  12291.         $maxlevel = 0; 
  12292.     } 
  12293.     if ($level > $maxlevel) { 
  12294.         $level = $maxlevel; 
  12295.     } 
  12296.     if ($y == -1) { 
  12297.         $y = $this->GetY(); 
  12298.     } elseif ($y < 0) { 
  12299.         $y = 0; 
  12300.     } elseif ($y > $this->h) { 
  12301.         $y = $this->h; 
  12302.     } 
  12303.     if ($x == -1) { 
  12304.         $x = $this->GetX(); 
  12305.     } elseif ($x < 0) { 
  12306.         $x = 0; 
  12307.     } elseif ($x > $this->w) { 
  12308.         $x = $this->w; 
  12309.     } 
  12310.     $fixed = false; 
  12311.     if (!empty($page) AND ($page[0] == '*')) { 
  12312.         $page = intval(substr($page, 1)); 
  12313.         // this page number will not be changed when moving/add/deleting pages 
  12314.         $fixed = true; 
  12315.     } 
  12316.     if (empty($page)) { 
  12317.         $page = $this->PageNo(); 
  12318.         if (empty($page)) { 
  12319.             return; 
  12320.         } 
  12321.     } 
  12322.     $this->outlines[] = array('t' => $txt, 'l' => $level, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'p' => $page, 'f' => $fixed, 's' => strtoupper($style), 'c' => $color, 'u' => $link); 
  12323. } 
  12324.  
  12325. /** 
  12326.  * Sort bookmarks for page and key. 
  12327.  * @protected 
  12328.  * @since 5.9.119 (2011-09-19) 
  12329.  */ 
  12330. protected function sortBookmarks() { 
  12331.     // get sorting columns 
  12332.     $outline_p = array(); 
  12333.     $outline_y = array(); 
  12334.     foreach ($this->outlines as $key => $row) { 
  12335.         $outline_p[$key] = $row['p']; 
  12336.         $outline_k[$key] = $key; 
  12337.     } 
  12338.     // sort outlines by page and original position 
  12339.     array_multisort($outline_p, SORT_NUMERIC, SORT_ASC, $outline_k, SORT_NUMERIC, SORT_ASC, $this->outlines); 
  12340. } 
  12341.  
  12342. /** 
  12343.  * Create a bookmark PDF string. 
  12344.  * @protected 
  12345.  * @author Olivier Plathey, Nicola Asuni 
  12346.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12347.  */ 
  12348. protected function _putbookmarks() { 
  12349.     $nb = count($this->outlines); 
  12350.     if ($nb == 0) { 
  12351.         return; 
  12352.     } 
  12353.     // sort bookmarks 
  12354.     $this->sortBookmarks(); 
  12355.     $lru = array(); 
  12356.     $level = 0; 
  12357.     foreach ($this->outlines as $i => $o) { 
  12358.         if ($o['l'] > 0) { 
  12359.             $parent = $lru[($o['l'] - 1)]; 
  12360.             //Set parent and last pointers 
  12361.             $this->outlines[$i]['parent'] = $parent; 
  12362.             $this->outlines[$parent]['last'] = $i; 
  12363.             if ($o['l'] > $level) { 
  12364.                 //Level increasing: set first pointer 
  12365.                 $this->outlines[$parent]['first'] = $i; 
  12366.             } 
  12367.         } else { 
  12368.             $this->outlines[$i]['parent'] = $nb; 
  12369.         } 
  12370.         if (($o['l'] <= $level) AND ($i > 0)) { 
  12371.             //Set prev and next pointers 
  12372.             $prev = $lru[$o['l']]; 
  12373.             $this->outlines[$prev]['next'] = $i; 
  12374.             $this->outlines[$i]['prev'] = $prev; 
  12375.         } 
  12376.         $lru[$o['l']] = $i; 
  12377.         $level = $o['l']; 
  12378.     } 
  12379.     //Outline items 
  12380.     $n = $this->n + 1; 
  12381.     $nltags = '/<br[\s]?\/>|<\/(blockquote|dd|dl|div|dt|h1|h2|h3|h4|h5|h6|hr|li|ol|p|pre|ul|tcpdf|table|tr|td)>/si'; 
  12382.     foreach ($this->outlines as $i => $o) { 
  12383.         $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  12384.         // covert HTML title to string 
  12385.         $title = preg_replace($nltags, "\n", $o['t']); 
  12386.         $title = preg_replace("/[\r]+/si", '', $title); 
  12387.         $title = preg_replace("/[\n]+/si", "\n", $title); 
  12388.         $title = strip_tags($title); 
  12389.         $title = $this->stringTrim($title); 
  12390.         $out = '<</Title '.$this->_textstring($title, $oid); 
  12391.         $out .= ' /Parent '.($n + $o['parent']).' 0 R'; 
  12392.         if (isset($o['prev'])) { 
  12393.             $out .= ' /Prev '.($n + $o['prev']).' 0 R'; 
  12394.         } 
  12395.         if (isset($o['next'])) { 
  12396.             $out .= ' /Next '.($n + $o['next']).' 0 R'; 
  12397.         } 
  12398.         if (isset($o['first'])) { 
  12399.             $out .= ' /First '.($n + $o['first']).' 0 R'; 
  12400.         } 
  12401.         if (isset($o['last'])) { 
  12402.             $out .= ' /Last '.($n + $o['last']).' 0 R'; 
  12403.         } 
  12404.         if (isset($o['u']) AND !empty($o['u'])) { 
  12405.             // link 
  12406.             if (is_string($o['u'])) { 
  12407.                 if ($o['u'][0] == '#') { 
  12408.                     // internal destination 
  12409.                     $out .= ' /Dest /'.TCPDF_STATIC::encodeNameObject(substr($o['u'], 1)); 
  12410.                 } elseif ($o['u'][0] == '%') { 
  12411.                     // embedded PDF file 
  12412.                     $filename = basename(substr($o['u'], 1)); 
  12413.                     $out .= ' /A <</S /GoToE /D [0 /Fit] /NewWindow true /T << /R /C /P '.($o['p'] - 1).' /A '.$this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['a'].' >> >>'; 
  12414.                 } elseif ($o['u'][0] == '*') { 
  12415.                     // embedded generic file 
  12416.                     $filename = basename(substr($o['u'], 1)); 
  12417.                     $jsa = 'var D=event.target.doc;var MyData=D.dataObjects;for (var i in MyData) if (MyData[i].path=="'.$filename.'") D.exportDataObject( { cName : MyData[i].name, nLaunch : 2});'; 
  12418.                     $out .= ' /A <</S /JavaScript /JS '.$this->_textstring($jsa, $oid).'>>'; 
  12419.                 } else { 
  12420.                     // external URI link 
  12421.                     $out .= ' /A <</S /URI /URI '.$this->_datastring($this->unhtmlentities($o['u']), $oid).'>>'; 
  12422.                 } 
  12423.             } elseif (isset($this->links[$o['u']])) { 
  12424.                 // internal link ID 
  12425.                 $l = $this->links[$o['u']]; 
  12426.                 if (isset($this->page_obj_id[($l['p'])])) { 
  12427.                     $out .= sprintf(' /Dest [%u 0 R /XYZ 0 %F null]', $this->page_obj_id[($l['p'])], ($this->pagedim[$l['p']]['h'] - ($l['y'] * $this->k))); 
  12428.                 } 
  12429.             } 
  12430.         } elseif (isset($this->page_obj_id[($o['p'])])) { 
  12431.             // link to a page 
  12432.             $out .= ' '.sprintf('/Dest [%u 0 R /XYZ %F %F null]', $this->page_obj_id[($o['p'])], ($o['x'] * $this->k), ($this->pagedim[$o['p']]['h'] - ($o['y'] * $this->k))); 
  12433.         } 
  12434.         // set font style 
  12435.         $style = 0; 
  12436.         if (!empty($o['s'])) { 
  12437.             // bold 
  12438.             if (strpos($o['s'], 'B') !== false) { 
  12439.                 $style |= 2; 
  12440.             } 
  12441.             // oblique 
  12442.             if (strpos($o['s'], 'I') !== false) { 
  12443.                 $style |= 1; 
  12444.             } 
  12445.         } 
  12446.         $out .= sprintf(' /F %d', $style); 
  12447.         // set bookmark color 
  12448.         if (isset($o['c']) AND is_array($o['c']) AND (count($o['c']) == 3)) { 
  12449.             $color = array_values($o['c']); 
  12450.             $out .= sprintf(' /C [%F %F %F]', ($color[0] / 255), ($color[1] / 255), ($color[2] / 255)); 
  12451.         } else { 
  12452.             // black 
  12453.             $out .= ' /C [0.0 0.0 0.0]'; 
  12454.         } 
  12455.         $out .= ' /Count 0'; // normally closed item 
  12456.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  12457.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  12458.         $this->_out($out); 
  12459.     } 
  12460.     //Outline root 
  12461.     $this->OutlineRoot = $this->_newobj(); 
  12462.     $this->_out('<< /Type /Outlines /First '.$n.' 0 R /Last '.($n + $lru[0]).' 0 R >>'."\n".'endobj'); 
  12463. } 
  12464.  
  12465. // --- JAVASCRIPT ------------------------------------------------------ 
  12466.  
  12467. /** 
  12468.  * Adds a javascript 
  12469.  * @param $script (string) Javascript code 
  12470.  * @public 
  12471.  * @author Johannes G\FCntert, Nicola Asuni 
  12472.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12473.  */ 
  12474. public function IncludeJS($script) { 
  12475.     $this->javascript .= $script; 
  12476. } 
  12477.  
  12478. /** 
  12479.  * Adds a javascript object and return object ID 
  12480.  * @param $script (string) Javascript code 
  12481.  * @param $onload (boolean) if true executes this object when opening the document 
  12482.  * @return int internal object ID 
  12483.  * @public 
  12484.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12485.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12486.  */ 
  12487. public function addJavascriptObject($script, $onload=false) { 
  12488.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  12489.         // javascript is not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  12490.         return false; 
  12491.     } 
  12492.     ++$this->n; 
  12493.     $this->js_objects[$this->n] = array('n' => $this->n, 'js' => $script, 'onload' => $onload); 
  12494.     return $this->n; 
  12495. } 
  12496.  
  12497. /** 
  12498.  * Create a javascript PDF string. 
  12499.  * @protected 
  12500.  * @author Johannes G\FCntert, Nicola Asuni 
  12501.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12502.  */ 
  12503. protected function _putjavascript() { 
  12504.     if ($this->pdfa_mode OR (empty($this->javascript) AND empty($this->js_objects))) { 
  12505.         return; 
  12506.     } 
  12507.     if (strpos($this->javascript, 'this.addField') > 0) { 
  12508.         if (!$this->ur['enabled']) { 
  12509.             //$this->setUserRights(); 
  12510.         } 
  12511.         // the following two lines are used to avoid form fields duplication after saving 
  12512.         // The addField method only works when releasing user rights (UR3) 
  12513.         $jsa = sprintf("ftcpdfdocsaved=this.addField('%s', '%s', %d, [%F, %F, %F, %F]);", 'tcpdfdocsaved', 'text', 0, 0, 1, 0, 1); 
  12514.         $jsb = "getField('tcpdfdocsaved').value='saved';"; 
  12515.         $this->javascript = $jsa."\n".$this->javascript."\n".$jsb; 
  12516.     } 
  12517.     // name tree for javascript 
  12518.     $this->n_js = '<< /Names ['; 
  12519.     if (!empty($this->javascript)) { 
  12520.         $this->n_js .= ' (EmbeddedJS) '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  12521.     } 
  12522.     if (!empty($this->js_objects)) { 
  12523.         foreach ($this->js_objects as $key => $val) { 
  12524.             if ($val['onload']) { 
  12525.                 $this->n_js .= ' (JS'.$key.') '.$key.' 0 R'; 
  12526.             } 
  12527.         } 
  12528.     } 
  12529.     $this->n_js .= ' ] >>'; 
  12530.     // default Javascript object 
  12531.     if (!empty($this->javascript)) { 
  12532.         $obj_id = $this->_newobj(); 
  12533.         $out = '<< /S /JavaScript'; 
  12534.         $out .= ' /JS '.$this->_textstring($this->javascript, $obj_id); 
  12535.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  12536.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  12537.         $this->_out($out); 
  12538.     } 
  12539.     // additional Javascript objects 
  12540.     if (!empty($this->js_objects)) { 
  12541.         foreach ($this->js_objects as $key => $val) { 
  12542.             $out = $this->_getobj($key)."\n".' << /S /JavaScript /JS '.$this->_textstring($val['js'], $key).' >>'."\n".'endobj'; 
  12543.             $this->_out($out); 
  12544.         } 
  12545.     } 
  12546. } 
  12547.  
  12548. /** 
  12549.  * Adds a javascript form field. 
  12550.  * @param $type (string) field type 
  12551.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12552.  * @param $x (int) horizontal position 
  12553.  * @param $y (int) vertical position 
  12554.  * @param $w (int) width 
  12555.  * @param $h (int) height 
  12556.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12557.  * @protected 
  12558.  * @author Denis Van Nuffelen, Nicola Asuni 
  12559.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12560.  */ 
  12561. protected function _addfield($type, $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop) { 
  12562.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12563.         $x = $x - $w; 
  12564.     } 
  12565.     // the followind avoid fields duplication after saving the document 
  12566.     $this->javascript .= "if (getField('tcpdfdocsaved').value != 'saved') {"; 
  12567.     $k = $this->k; 
  12568.     $this->javascript .= sprintf("f".$name."=this.addField('%s', '%s', %u, [%F, %F, %F, %F]);", $name, $type, $this->PageNo()-1, $x*$k, ($this->h-$y)*$k+1, ($x+$w)*$k, ($this->h-$y-$h)*$k+1)."\n"; 
  12569.     $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.textSize='.$this->FontSizePt.";\n"; 
  12570.     while (list($key, $val) = each($prop)) { 
  12571.         if (strcmp(substr($key, -5), 'Color') == 0) { 
  12572.             $val = TCPDF_COLORS::_JScolor($val); 
  12573.         } else { 
  12574.             $val = "'".$val."'"; 
  12575.         } 
  12576.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.'.$key.'='.$val.";\n"; 
  12577.     } 
  12578.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12579.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12580.     } else { 
  12581.         $this->x += $w; 
  12582.     } 
  12583.     $this->javascript .= '}'; 
  12584. } 
  12585.  
  12586. // --- FORM FIELDS ----------------------------------------------------- 
  12587.  
  12588.  
  12589.  
  12590. /** 
  12591.  * Set default properties for form fields. 
  12592.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12593.  * @public 
  12594.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12595.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-06) 
  12596.  */ 
  12597. public function setFormDefaultProp($prop=array()) { 
  12598.     $this->default_form_prop = $prop; 
  12599. } 
  12600.  
  12601. /** 
  12602.  * Return the default properties for form fields. 
  12603.  * @return array $prop javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12604.  * @public 
  12605.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12606.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-06) 
  12607.  */ 
  12608. public function getFormDefaultProp() { 
  12609.     return $this->default_form_prop; 
  12610. } 
  12611.  
  12612. /** 
  12613.  * Creates a text field 
  12614.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12615.  * @param $w (float) Width of the rectangle 
  12616.  * @param $h (float) Height of the rectangle 
  12617.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12618.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12619.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12620.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12621.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12622.  * @public 
  12623.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12624.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12625.  */ 
  12626. public function TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12627.     if ($x === '') { 
  12628.         $x = $this->x; 
  12629.     } 
  12630.     if ($y === '') { 
  12631.         $y = $this->y; 
  12632.     } 
  12633.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12634.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  12635.     if ($js) { 
  12636.         $this->_addfield('text', $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  12637.         return; 
  12638.     } 
  12639.     // get default style 
  12640.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12641.     // get annotation data 
  12642.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12643.     // set default appearance stream 
  12644.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  12645.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12646.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12647.     // build appearance stream 
  12648.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12649.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  12650.     $text = ''; 
  12651.     if (isset($prop['value']) AND !empty($prop['value'])) { 
  12652.         $text = $prop['value']; 
  12653.     } elseif (isset($opt['v']) AND !empty($opt['v'])) { 
  12654.         $text = $opt['v']; 
  12655.     } 
  12656.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  12657.     $align = ''; 
  12658.     if (isset($popt['q'])) { 
  12659.         switch ($popt['q']) { 
  12660.             case 0: { 
  12661.                 $align = 'L'; 
  12662.                 break; 
  12663.             } 
  12664.             case 1: { 
  12665.                 $align = 'C'; 
  12666.                 break; 
  12667.             } 
  12668.             case 2: { 
  12669.                 $align = 'R'; 
  12670.                 break; 
  12671.             } 
  12672.             default: { 
  12673.                 $align = ''; 
  12674.                 break; 
  12675.             } 
  12676.         } 
  12677.     } 
  12678.     $this->MultiCell($w, $h, $text, 0, $align, false, 0, 0, 0, true, 0, false, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  12679.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  12680.     --$this->n; 
  12681.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  12682.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  12683.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  12684.     // merge options 
  12685.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12686.     // remove some conflicting options 
  12687.     unset($opt['bs']); 
  12688.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12689.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12690.     $opt['ft'] = 'Tx'; 
  12691.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  12692.     // Additional annotation's parameters (check _putannotsobj() method): 
  12693.     //$opt['f'] 
  12694.     //$opt['as'] 
  12695.     //$opt['bs'] 
  12696.     //$opt['be'] 
  12697.     //$opt['c'] 
  12698.     //$opt['border'] 
  12699.     //$opt['h'] 
  12700.     //$opt['mk']; 
  12701.     //$opt['mk']['r'] 
  12702.     //$opt['mk']['bc']; 
  12703.     //$opt['mk']['bg']; 
  12704.     unset($opt['mk']['ca']); 
  12705.     unset($opt['mk']['rc']); 
  12706.     unset($opt['mk']['ac']); 
  12707.     unset($opt['mk']['i']); 
  12708.     unset($opt['mk']['ri']); 
  12709.     unset($opt['mk']['ix']); 
  12710.     unset($opt['mk']['if']); 
  12711.     //$opt['mk']['if']['sw']; 
  12712.     //$opt['mk']['if']['s']; 
  12713.     //$opt['mk']['if']['a']; 
  12714.     //$opt['mk']['if']['fb']; 
  12715.     unset($opt['mk']['tp']); 
  12716.     //$opt['tu'] 
  12717.     //$opt['tm'] 
  12718.     //$opt['ff'] 
  12719.     //$opt['v'] 
  12720.     //$opt['dv'] 
  12721.     //$opt['a'] 
  12722.     //$opt['aa'] 
  12723.     //$opt['q'] 
  12724.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  12725.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12726.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12727.     } else { 
  12728.         $this->x += $w; 
  12729.     } 
  12730. } 
  12731.  
  12732. /** 
  12733.  * Creates a RadioButton field. 
  12734.  * @param $name (string) Field name. 
  12735.  * @param $w (int) Width of the radio button. 
  12736.  * @param $prop (array) Javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12737.  * @param $opt (array) Annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12738.  * @param $onvalue (string) Value to be returned if selected. 
  12739.  * @param $checked (boolean) Define the initial state. 
  12740.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12741.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12742.  * @param $js (boolean) If true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12743.  * @public 
  12744.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12745.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12746.  */ 
  12747. public function RadioButton($name, $w, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $onvalue='On', $checked=false, $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12748.     if ($x === '') { 
  12749.         $x = $this->x; 
  12750.     } 
  12751.     if ($y === '') { 
  12752.         $y = $this->y; 
  12753.     } 
  12754.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12755.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($w, $x, $y); 
  12756.     if ($js) { 
  12757.         $this->_addfield('radiobutton', $name, $x, $y, $w, $w, $prop); 
  12758.         return; 
  12759.     } 
  12760.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($onvalue)) { 
  12761.         $onvalue = 'On'; 
  12762.     } 
  12763.     if ($checked) { 
  12764.         $defval = $onvalue; 
  12765.     } else { 
  12766.         $defval = 'Off'; 
  12767.     } 
  12768.     // set font 
  12769.     $font = 'zapfdingbats'; 
  12770.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  12771.         // all fonts must be embedded 
  12772.         $font = 'pdfa'.$font; 
  12773.     } 
  12774.     $this->AddFont($font); 
  12775.     $tmpfont = $this->getFontBuffer($font); 
  12776.     // set data for parent group 
  12777.     if (!isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page])) { 
  12778.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page] = array(); 
  12779.     } 
  12780.     if (!isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name])) { 
  12781.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name] = array(); 
  12782.         ++$this->n; 
  12783.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['n'] = $this->n; 
  12784.         $this->radio_groups[] = $this->n; 
  12785.     } 
  12786.     $kid = ($this->n + 1); 
  12787.     // save object ID to be added on Kids entry on parent object 
  12788.     $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name][] = array('kid' => $kid, 'def' => $defval); 
  12789.     // get default style 
  12790.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12791.     $prop['NoToggleToOff'] = 'true'; 
  12792.     $prop['Radio'] = 'true'; 
  12793.     $prop['borderStyle'] = 'inset'; 
  12794.     // get annotation data 
  12795.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12796.     // set additional default options 
  12797.     $this->annotation_fonts[$tmpfont['fontkey']] = $tmpfont['i']; 
  12798.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12799.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12800.     // build appearance stream 
  12801.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12802.     $popt['ap']['n'] = array(); 
  12803.     $fx = ((($w - $this->getAbsFontMeasure($tmpfont['cw'][108])) / 2) * $this->k); 
  12804.     $fy = (($w - ((($tmpfont['desc']['Ascent'] - $tmpfont['desc']['Descent']) * $this->FontSizePt / 1000) / $this->k)) * $this->k); 
  12805.     $popt['ap']['n'][$onvalue] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(108).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  12806.     $popt['ap']['n']['Off'] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(109).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  12807.     if (!isset($popt['mk'])) { 
  12808.         $popt['mk'] = array(); 
  12809.     } 
  12810.     $popt['mk']['ca'] = '(l)'; 
  12811.     // merge options 
  12812.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12813.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12814.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12815.     $opt['ft'] = 'Btn'; 
  12816.     if ($checked) { 
  12817.         $opt['v'] = array('/'.$onvalue); 
  12818.         $opt['as'] = $onvalue; 
  12819.     } else { 
  12820.         $opt['as'] = 'Off'; 
  12821.     } 
  12822.     // store readonly flag 
  12823.     if (!isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['#readonly#'])) { 
  12824.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['#readonly#'] = false; 
  12825.     } 
  12826.     $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['#readonly#'] |= ($opt['f'] & 64); 
  12827.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $w, $name, $opt, 0); 
  12828.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12829.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12830.     } else { 
  12831.         $this->x += $w; 
  12832.     } 
  12833. } 
  12834.  
  12835. /** 
  12836.  * Creates a List-box field 
  12837.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12838.  * @param $w (int) width 
  12839.  * @param $h (int) height 
  12840.  * @param $values (array) array containing the list of values. 
  12841.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12842.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12843.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12844.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12845.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12846.  * @public 
  12847.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12848.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12849.  */ 
  12850. public function ListBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12851.     if ($x === '') { 
  12852.         $x = $this->x; 
  12853.     } 
  12854.     if ($y === '') { 
  12855.         $y = $this->y; 
  12856.     } 
  12857.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12858.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  12859.     if ($js) { 
  12860.         $this->_addfield('listbox', $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  12861.         $s = ''; 
  12862.         foreach ($values as $value) { 
  12863.             if (is_array($value)) { 
  12864.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value[1]).'\', \''.addslashes($value[0]).'\']'; 
  12865.             } else { 
  12866.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value).'\', \''.addslashes($value).'\']'; 
  12867.             } 
  12868.         } 
  12869.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.setItems('.substr($s, 1).');'."\n"; 
  12870.         return; 
  12871.     } 
  12872.     // get default style 
  12873.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12874.     // get annotation data 
  12875.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12876.     // set additional default values 
  12877.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  12878.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12879.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12880.     // build appearance stream 
  12881.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12882.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  12883.     $text = ''; 
  12884.     foreach($values as $item) { 
  12885.         if (is_array($item)) { 
  12886.             $text .= $item[1]."\n"; 
  12887.         } else { 
  12888.             $text .= $item."\n"; 
  12889.         } 
  12890.     } 
  12891.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  12892.     $this->MultiCell($w, $h, $text, 0, '', false, 0, 0, 0, true, 0, false, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  12893.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  12894.     --$this->n; 
  12895.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  12896.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  12897.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  12898.     // merge options 
  12899.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12900.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12901.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12902.     $opt['ft'] = 'Ch'; 
  12903.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  12904.     $opt['opt'] = $values; 
  12905.     unset($opt['mk']['ca']); 
  12906.     unset($opt['mk']['rc']); 
  12907.     unset($opt['mk']['ac']); 
  12908.     unset($opt['mk']['i']); 
  12909.     unset($opt['mk']['ri']); 
  12910.     unset($opt['mk']['ix']); 
  12911.     unset($opt['mk']['if']); 
  12912.     unset($opt['mk']['tp']); 
  12913.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  12914.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12915.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12916.     } else { 
  12917.         $this->x += $w; 
  12918.     } 
  12919. } 
  12920.  
  12921. /** 
  12922.  * Creates a Combo-box field 
  12923.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12924.  * @param $w (int) width 
  12925.  * @param $h (int) height 
  12926.  * @param $values (array) array containing the list of values. 
  12927.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12928.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12929.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12930.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12931.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12932.  * @public 
  12933.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12934.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12935.  */ 
  12936. public function ComboBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12937.     if ($x === '') { 
  12938.         $x = $this->x; 
  12939.     } 
  12940.     if ($y === '') { 
  12941.         $y = $this->y; 
  12942.     } 
  12943.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12944.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  12945.     if ($js) { 
  12946.         $this->_addfield('combobox', $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  12947.         $s = ''; 
  12948.         foreach ($values as $value) { 
  12949.             if (is_array($value)) { 
  12950.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value[1]).'\', \''.addslashes($value[0]).'\']'; 
  12951.             } else { 
  12952.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value).'\', \''.addslashes($value).'\']'; 
  12953.             } 
  12954.         } 
  12955.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.setItems('.substr($s, 1).');'."\n"; 
  12956.         return; 
  12957.     } 
  12958.     // get default style 
  12959.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12960.     $prop['Combo'] = true; 
  12961.     // get annotation data 
  12962.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12963.     // set additional default options 
  12964.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  12965.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12966.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12967.     // build appearance stream 
  12968.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12969.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  12970.     $text = ''; 
  12971.     foreach($values as $item) { 
  12972.         if (is_array($item)) { 
  12973.             $text .= $item[1]."\n"; 
  12974.         } else { 
  12975.             $text .= $item."\n"; 
  12976.         } 
  12977.     } 
  12978.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  12979.     $this->MultiCell($w, $h, $text, 0, '', false, 0, 0, 0, true, 0, false, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  12980.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  12981.     --$this->n; 
  12982.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  12983.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  12984.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  12985.     // merge options 
  12986.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12987.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12988.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12989.     $opt['ft'] = 'Ch'; 
  12990.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  12991.     $opt['opt'] = $values; 
  12992.     unset($opt['mk']['ca']); 
  12993.     unset($opt['mk']['rc']); 
  12994.     unset($opt['mk']['ac']); 
  12995.     unset($opt['mk']['i']); 
  12996.     unset($opt['mk']['ri']); 
  12997.     unset($opt['mk']['ix']); 
  12998.     unset($opt['mk']['if']); 
  12999.     unset($opt['mk']['tp']); 
  13000.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  13001.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  13002.         $this->x -= $w; 
  13003.     } else { 
  13004.         $this->x += $w; 
  13005.     } 
  13006. } 
  13007.  
  13008. /** 
  13009.  * Creates a CheckBox field 
  13010.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  13011.  * @param $w (int) width 
  13012.  * @param $checked (boolean) define the initial state. 
  13013.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  13014.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  13015.  * @param $onvalue (string) value to be returned if selected. 
  13016.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13017.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13018.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  13019.  * @public 
  13020.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13021.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  13022.  */ 
  13023. public function CheckBox($name, $w, $checked=false, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $onvalue='Yes', $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  13024.     if ($x === '') { 
  13025.         $x = $this->x; 
  13026.     } 
  13027.     if ($y === '') { 
  13028.         $y = $this->y; 
  13029.     } 
  13030.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  13031.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($w, $x, $y); 
  13032.     if ($js) { 
  13033.         $this->_addfield('checkbox', $name, $x, $y, $w, $w, $prop); 
  13034.         return; 
  13035.     } 
  13036.     if (!isset($prop['value'])) { 
  13037.         $prop['value'] = array('Yes'); 
  13038.     } 
  13039.     // get default style 
  13040.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  13041.     $prop['borderStyle'] = 'inset'; 
  13042.     // get annotation data 
  13043.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  13044.     // set additional default options 
  13045.     $font = 'zapfdingbats'; 
  13046.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  13047.         // all fonts must be embedded 
  13048.         $font = 'pdfa'.$font; 
  13049.     } 
  13050.     $this->AddFont($font); 
  13051.     $tmpfont = $this->getFontBuffer($font); 
  13052.     $this->annotation_fonts[$tmpfont['fontkey']] = $tmpfont['i']; 
  13053.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  13054.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  13055.     // build appearance stream 
  13056.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  13057.     $popt['ap']['n'] = array(); 
  13058.     $fx = ((($w - $this->getAbsFontMeasure($tmpfont['cw'][110])) / 2) * $this->k); 
  13059.     $fy = (($w - ((($tmpfont['desc']['Ascent'] - $tmpfont['desc']['Descent']) * $this->FontSizePt / 1000) / $this->k)) * $this->k); 
  13060.     $popt['ap']['n']['Yes'] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(110).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  13061.     $popt['ap']['n']['Off'] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(111).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  13062.     // merge options 
  13063.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  13064.     // set remaining annotation data 
  13065.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  13066.     $opt['ft'] = 'Btn'; 
  13067.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  13068.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($onvalue)) { 
  13069.         $onvalue = 'Yes'; 
  13070.     } 
  13071.     $opt['opt'] = array($onvalue); 
  13072.     if ($checked) { 
  13073.         $opt['v'] = array('/Yes'); 
  13074.         $opt['as'] = 'Yes'; 
  13075.     } else { 
  13076.         $opt['v'] = array('/Off'); 
  13077.         $opt['as'] = 'Off'; 
  13078.     } 
  13079.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $w, $name, $opt, 0); 
  13080.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  13081.         $this->x -= $w; 
  13082.     } else { 
  13083.         $this->x += $w; 
  13084.     } 
  13085. } 
  13086.  
  13087. /** 
  13088.  * Creates a button field 
  13089.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  13090.  * @param $w (int) width 
  13091.  * @param $h (int) height 
  13092.  * @param $caption (string) caption. 
  13093.  * @param $action (mixed) action triggered by pressing the button. Use a string to specify a javascript action. Use an array to specify a form action options as on section 12.7.5 of PDF32000_2008. 
  13094.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  13095.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  13096.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13097.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13098.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  13099.  * @public 
  13100.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13101.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  13102.  */ 
  13103. public function Button($name, $w, $h, $caption, $action, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  13104.     if ($x === '') { 
  13105.         $x = $this->x; 
  13106.     } 
  13107.     if ($y === '') { 
  13108.         $y = $this->y; 
  13109.     } 
  13110.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  13111.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  13112.     if ($js) { 
  13113.         $this->_addfield('button', $name, $this->x, $this->y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  13114.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".buttonSetCaption('".addslashes($caption)."');\n"; 
  13115.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".setAction('MouseUp', '".addslashes($action)."');\n"; 
  13116.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".highlight='push';\n"; 
  13117.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".print=false;\n"; 
  13118.         return; 
  13119.     } 
  13120.     // get default style 
  13121.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  13122.     $prop['Pushbutton'] = 'true'; 
  13123.     $prop['highlight'] = 'push'; 
  13124.     $prop['display'] = 'display.noPrint'; 
  13125.     // get annotation data 
  13126.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  13127.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  13128.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  13129.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  13130.     // build appearance stream 
  13131.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  13132.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  13133.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  13134.     $bw = (2 / $this->k); // border width 
  13135.     $border = array( 
  13136.         'L' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(231)),  
  13137.         'R' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(51)),  
  13138.         'T' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(231)),  
  13139.         'B' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(51))); 
  13140.     $this->SetFillColor(204); 
  13141.     $this->Cell($w, $h, $caption, $border, 0, 'C', true, '', 1, false, 'T', 'M'); 
  13142.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  13143.     --$this->n; 
  13144.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  13145.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  13146.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  13147.     // set additional default options 
  13148.     if (!isset($popt['mk'])) { 
  13149.         $popt['mk'] = array(); 
  13150.     } 
  13151.     $ann_obj_id = ($this->n + 1); 
  13152.     if (!empty($action) AND !is_array($action)) { 
  13153.         $ann_obj_id = ($this->n + 2); 
  13154.     } 
  13155.     $popt['mk']['ca'] = $this->_textstring($caption, $ann_obj_id); 
  13156.     $popt['mk']['rc'] = $this->_textstring($caption, $ann_obj_id); 
  13157.     $popt['mk']['ac'] = $this->_textstring($caption, $ann_obj_id); 
  13158.     // merge options 
  13159.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  13160.     // set remaining annotation data 
  13161.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  13162.     $opt['ft'] = 'Btn'; 
  13163.     $opt['t'] = $caption; 
  13164.     $opt['v'] = $name; 
  13165.     if (!empty($action)) { 
  13166.         if (is_array($action)) { 
  13167.             // form action options as on section 12.7.5 of PDF32000_2008. 
  13168.             $opt['aa'] = '/D <<'; 
  13169.             $bmode = array('SubmitForm', 'ResetForm', 'ImportData'); 
  13170.             foreach ($action AS $key => $val) { 
  13171.                 if (($key == 'S') AND in_array($val, $bmode)) { 
  13172.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /S /'.$val; 
  13173.                 } elseif (($key == 'F') AND (!empty($val))) { 
  13174.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /F '.$this->_datastring($val, $ann_obj_id); 
  13175.                 } elseif (($key == 'Fields') AND is_array($val) AND !empty($val)) { 
  13176.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /Fields ['; 
  13177.                     foreach ($val AS $field) { 
  13178.                         $opt['aa'] .= ' '.$this->_textstring($field, $ann_obj_id); 
  13179.                     } 
  13180.                     $opt['aa'] .= ']'; 
  13181.                 } elseif (($key == 'Flags')) { 
  13182.                     $ff = 0; 
  13183.                     if (is_array($val)) { 
  13184.                         foreach ($val AS $flag) { 
  13185.                             switch ($flag) { 
  13186.                                 case 'Include/Exclude': { 
  13187.                                     $ff += 1 << 0; 
  13188.                                     break; 
  13189.                                 } 
  13190.                                 case 'IncludeNoValueFields': { 
  13191.                                     $ff += 1 << 1; 
  13192.                                     break; 
  13193.                                 } 
  13194.                                 case 'ExportFormat': { 
  13195.                                     $ff += 1 << 2; 
  13196.                                     break; 
  13197.                                 } 
  13198.                                 case 'GetMethod': { 
  13199.                                     $ff += 1 << 3; 
  13200.                                     break; 
  13201.                                 } 
  13202.                                 case 'SubmitCoordinates': { 
  13203.                                     $ff += 1 << 4; 
  13204.                                     break; 
  13205.                                 } 
  13206.                                 case 'XFDF': { 
  13207.                                     $ff += 1 << 5; 
  13208.                                     break; 
  13209.                                 } 
  13210.                                 case 'IncludeAppendSaves': { 
  13211.                                     $ff += 1 << 6; 
  13212.                                     break; 
  13213.                                 } 
  13214.                                 case 'IncludeAnnotations': { 
  13215.                                     $ff += 1 << 7; 
  13216.                                     break; 
  13217.                                 } 
  13218.                                 case 'SubmitPDF': { 
  13219.                                     $ff += 1 << 8; 
  13220.                                     break; 
  13221.                                 } 
  13222.                                 case 'CanonicalFormat': { 
  13223.                                     $ff += 1 << 9; 
  13224.                                     break; 
  13225.                                 } 
  13226.                                 case 'ExclNonUserAnnots': { 
  13227.                                     $ff += 1 << 10; 
  13228.                                     break; 
  13229.                                 } 
  13230.                                 case 'ExclFKey': { 
  13231.                                     $ff += 1 << 11; 
  13232.                                     break; 
  13233.                                 } 
  13234.                                 case 'EmbedForm': { 
  13235.                                     $ff += 1 << 13; 
  13236.                                     break; 
  13237.                                 } 
  13238.                             } 
  13239.                         } 
  13240.                     } else { 
  13241.                         $ff = intval($val); 
  13242.                     } 
  13243.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /Flags '.$ff; 
  13244.                 } 
  13245.             } 
  13246.             $opt['aa'] .= ' >>'; 
  13247.         } else { 
  13248.             // Javascript action or raw action command 
  13249.             $js_obj_id = $this->addJavascriptObject($action); 
  13250.             $opt['aa'] = '/D '.$js_obj_id.' 0 R'; 
  13251.         } 
  13252.     } 
  13253.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  13254.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  13255.         $this->x -= $w; 
  13256.     } else { 
  13257.         $this->x += $w; 
  13258.     } 
  13259. } 
  13260.  
  13261. // --- END FORMS FIELDS ------------------------------------------------ 
  13262.  
  13263. /** 
  13264.  * Add certification signature (DocMDP or UR3) 
  13265.  * You can set only one signature type 
  13266.  * @protected 
  13267.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13268.  * @since 4.6.008 (2009-05-07) 
  13269.  */ 
  13270. protected function _putsignature() { 
  13271.     if ((!$this->sign) OR (!isset($this->signature_data['cert_type']))) { 
  13272.         return; 
  13273.     } 
  13274.     $sigobjid = ($this->sig_obj_id + 1); 
  13275.     $out = $this->_getobj($sigobjid)."\n"; 
  13276.     $out .= '<< /Type /Sig'; 
  13277.     $out .= ' /Filter /Adobe.PPKLite'; 
  13278.     $out .= ' /SubFilter /adbe.pkcs7.detached'; 
  13279.     $out .= ' '.TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string; 
  13280.     $out .= ' /Contents<'.str_repeat('0', $this->signature_max_length).'>'; 
  13281.     if (empty($this->signature_data['approval']) OR ($this->signature_data['approval'] != 'A')) { 
  13282.         $out .= ' /Reference ['; // array of signature reference dictionaries 
  13283.         $out .= ' << /Type /SigRef'; 
  13284.         if ($this->signature_data['cert_type'] > 0) { 
  13285.             $out .= ' /TransformMethod /DocMDP'; 
  13286.             $out .= ' /TransformParams <<'; 
  13287.             $out .= ' /Type /TransformParams'; 
  13288.             $out .= ' /P '.$this->signature_data['cert_type']; 
  13289.             $out .= ' /V /1.2'; 
  13290.         } else { 
  13291.             $out .= ' /TransformMethod /UR3'; 
  13292.             $out .= ' /TransformParams <<'; 
  13293.             $out .= ' /Type /TransformParams'; 
  13294.             $out .= ' /V /2.2'; 
  13295.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['document'])) { 
  13296.                 $out .= ' /Document['.$this->ur['document'].']'; 
  13297.             } 
  13298.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['form'])) { 
  13299.                 $out .= ' /Form['.$this->ur['form'].']'; 
  13300.             } 
  13301.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['signature'])) { 
  13302.                 $out .= ' /Signature['.$this->ur['signature'].']'; 
  13303.             } 
  13304.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['annots'])) { 
  13305.                 $out .= ' /Annots['.$this->ur['annots'].']'; 
  13306.             } 
  13307.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['ef'])) { 
  13308.                 $out .= ' /EF['.$this->ur['ef'].']'; 
  13309.             } 
  13310.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['formex'])) { 
  13311.                 $out .= ' /FormEX['.$this->ur['formex'].']'; 
  13312.             } 
  13313.         } 
  13314.         $out .= ' >>'; // close TransformParams 
  13315.         // optional digest data (values must be calculated and replaced later) 
  13316.         //$out .= ' /Data ********** 0 R'; 
  13317.         //$out .= ' /DigestMethod/MD5'; 
  13318.         //$out .= ' /DigestLocation[********** 34]'; 
  13319.         //$out .= ' /DigestValue<********************************>'; 
  13320.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  13321.         $out .= ' ]'; // end of reference 
  13322.     } 
  13323.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['Name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['Name'])) { 
  13324.         $out .= ' /Name '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['Name'], $sigobjid); 
  13325.     } 
  13326.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['Location']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['Location'])) { 
  13327.         $out .= ' /Location '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['Location'], $sigobjid); 
  13328.     } 
  13329.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['Reason']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['Reason'])) { 
  13330.         $out .= ' /Reason '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['Reason'], $sigobjid); 
  13331.     } 
  13332.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['ContactInfo']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['ContactInfo'])) { 
  13333.         $out .= ' /ContactInfo '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['ContactInfo'], $sigobjid); 
  13334.     } 
  13335.     $out .= ' /M '.$this->_datestring($sigobjid, $this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  13336.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  13337.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  13338.     $this->_out($out); 
  13339. } 
  13340.  
  13341. /** 
  13342.  * Set User's Rights for PDF Reader 
  13343.  * WARNING: This is experimental and currently do not work. 
  13344.  * Check the PDF Reference 8.7.1 Transform Methods,  
  13345.  * Table 8.105 Entries in the UR transform parameters dictionary 
  13346.  * @param $enable (boolean) if true enable user's rights on PDF reader 
  13347.  * @param $document (string) Names specifying additional document-wide usage rights for the document. The only defined value is "/FullSave", which permits a user to save the document along with modified form and/or annotation data. 
  13348.  * @param $annots (string) Names specifying additional annotation-related usage rights for the document. Valid names in PDF 1.5 and later are /Create/Delete/Modify/Copy/Import/Export, which permit the user to perform the named operation on annotations. 
  13349.  * @param $form (string) Names specifying additional form-field-related usage rights for the document. Valid names are: /Add/Delete/FillIn/Import/Export/SubmitStandalone/SpawnTemplate 
  13350.  * @param $signature (string) Names specifying additional signature-related usage rights for the document. The only defined value is /Modify, which permits a user to apply a digital signature to an existing signature form field or clear a signed signature form field. 
  13351.  * @param $ef (string) Names specifying additional usage rights for named embedded files in the document. Valid names are /Create/Delete/Modify/Import, which permit the user to perform the named operation on named embedded files 
  13352.  Names specifying additional embedded-files-related usage rights for the document. 
  13353.  * @param $formex (string) Names specifying additional form-field-related usage rights. The only valid name is BarcodePlaintext, which permits text form field data to be encoded as a plaintext two-dimensional barcode. 
  13354.  * @public 
  13355.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13356.  * @since 2.9.000 (2008-03-26) 
  13357.  */ 
  13358. public function setUserRights( 
  13359.         $enable=true,  
  13360.         $document='/FullSave',  
  13361.         $annots='/Create/Delete/Modify/Copy/Import/Export',  
  13362.         $form='/Add/Delete/FillIn/Import/Export/SubmitStandalone/SpawnTemplate',  
  13363.         $signature='/Modify',  
  13364.         $ef='/Create/Delete/Modify/Import',  
  13365.         $formex='') { 
  13366.     $this->ur['enabled'] = $enable; 
  13367.     $this->ur['document'] = $document; 
  13368.     $this->ur['annots'] = $annots; 
  13369.     $this->ur['form'] = $form; 
  13370.     $this->ur['signature'] = $signature; 
  13371.     $this->ur['ef'] = $ef; 
  13372.     $this->ur['formex'] = $formex; 
  13373.     if (!$this->sign) { 
  13374.         $this->setSignature('', '', '', '', 0, array()); 
  13375.     } 
  13376. } 
  13377.  
  13378. /** 
  13379.  * Enable document signature (requires the OpenSSL Library). 
  13380.  * The digital signature improve document authenticity and integrity and allows o enable extra features on Acrobat Reader. 
  13381.  * To create self-signed signature: openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365000 -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.crt 
  13382.  * To export crt to p12: openssl pkcs12 -export -in tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.p12 
  13383.  * To convert pfx certificate to pem: openssl pkcs12 -in tcpdf.pfx -out tcpdf.crt -nodes 
  13384.  * @param $signing_cert (mixed) signing certificate (string or filename prefixed with 'file://') 
  13385.  * @param $private_key (mixed) private key (string or filename prefixed with 'file://') 
  13386.  * @param $private_key_password (string) password 
  13387.  * @param $extracerts (string) specifies the name of a file containing a bunch of extra certificates to include in the signature which can for example be used to help the recipient to verify the certificate that you used. 
  13388.  * @param $cert_type (int) The access permissions granted for this document. Valid values shall be: 1 = No changes to the document shall be permitted; any change to the document shall invalidate the signature; 2 = Permitted changes shall be filling in forms, instantiating page templates, and signing; other changes shall invalidate the signature; 3 = Permitted changes shall be the same as for 2, as well as annotation creation, deletion, and modification; other changes shall invalidate the signature. 
  13389.  * @param $info (array) array of option information: Name, Location, Reason, ContactInfo. 
  13390.  * @param $approval (string) Enable approval signature eg. for PDF incremental update 
  13391.  * @public 
  13392.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13393.  * @since 4.6.005 (2009-04-24) 
  13394.  */ 
  13395. public function setSignature($signing_cert='', $private_key='', $private_key_password='', $extracerts='', $cert_type=2, $info=array(), $approval='') { 
  13396.     // to create self-signed signature: openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365000 -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.crt 
  13397.     // to export crt to p12: openssl pkcs12 -export -in tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.p12 
  13398.     // to convert pfx certificate to pem: openssl 
  13399.     //     OpenSSL> pkcs12 -in <cert.pfx> -out <cert.crt> -nodes 
  13400.     $this->sign = true; 
  13401.     ++$this->n; 
  13402.     $this->sig_obj_id = $this->n; // signature widget 
  13403.     ++$this->n; // signature object ($this->sig_obj_id + 1) 
  13404.     $this->signature_data = array(); 
  13405.     if (strlen($signing_cert) == 0) { 
  13406.         $this->Error('Please provide a certificate file and password!'); 
  13407.     } 
  13408.     if (strlen($private_key) == 0) { 
  13409.         $private_key = $signing_cert; 
  13410.     } 
  13411.     $this->signature_data['signcert'] = $signing_cert; 
  13412.     $this->signature_data['privkey'] = $private_key; 
  13413.     $this->signature_data['password'] = $private_key_password; 
  13414.     $this->signature_data['extracerts'] = $extracerts; 
  13415.     $this->signature_data['cert_type'] = $cert_type; 
  13416.     $this->signature_data['info'] = $info; 
  13417.     $this->signature_data['approval'] = $approval; 
  13418. } 
  13419.  
  13420. /** 
  13421.  * Set the digital signature appearance (a cliccable rectangle area to get signature properties) 
  13422.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  13423.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  13424.  * @param $w (float) Width of the signature area. 
  13425.  * @param $h (float) Height of the signature area. 
  13426.  * @param $page (int) option page number (if < 0 the current page is used). 
  13427.  * @param $name (string) Name of the signature. 
  13428.  * @public 
  13429.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13430.  * @since 5.3.011 (2010-06-17) 
  13431.  */ 
  13432. public function setSignatureAppearance($x=0, $y=0, $w=0, $h=0, $page=-1, $name='') { 
  13433.     $this->signature_appearance = $this->getSignatureAppearanceArray($x, $y, $w, $h, $page, $name); 
  13434. } 
  13435.  
  13436. /** 
  13437.  * Add an empty digital signature appearance (a cliccable rectangle area to get signature properties) 
  13438.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  13439.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  13440.  * @param $w (float) Width of the signature area. 
  13441.  * @param $h (float) Height of the signature area. 
  13442.  * @param $page (int) option page number (if < 0 the current page is used). 
  13443.  * @param $name (string) Name of the signature. 
  13444.  * @public 
  13445.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13446.  * @since 5.9.101 (2011-07-06) 
  13447.  */ 
  13448. public function addEmptySignatureAppearance($x=0, $y=0, $w=0, $h=0, $page=-1, $name='') { 
  13449.     ++$this->n; 
  13450.     $this->empty_signature_appearance[] = array('objid' => $this->n) + $this->getSignatureAppearanceArray($x, $y, $w, $h, $page, $name); 
  13451. } 
  13452.  
  13453. /** 
  13454.  * Get the array that defines the signature appearance (page and rectangle coordinates). 
  13455.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  13456.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  13457.  * @param $w (float) Width of the signature area. 
  13458.  * @param $h (float) Height of the signature area. 
  13459.  * @param $page (int) option page number (if < 0 the current page is used). 
  13460.  * @param $name (string) Name of the signature. 
  13461.  * @return (array) Array defining page and rectangle coordinates of signature appearance. 
  13462.  * @protected 
  13463.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13464.  * @since 5.9.101 (2011-07-06) 
  13465.  */ 
  13466. protected function getSignatureAppearanceArray($x=0, $y=0, $w=0, $h=0, $page=-1, $name='') { 
  13467.     $sigapp = array(); 
  13468.     if (($page < 1) OR ($page > $this->numpages)) { 
  13469.         $sigapp['page'] = $this->page; 
  13470.     } else { 
  13471.         $sigapp['page'] = intval($page); 
  13472.     } 
  13473.     if (empty($name)) { 
  13474.         $sigapp['name'] = 'Signature'; 
  13475.     } else { 
  13476.         $sigapp['name'] = $name; 
  13477.     } 
  13478.     $a = $x * $this->k; 
  13479.     $b = $this->pagedim[($sigapp['page'])]['h'] - (($y + $h) * $this->k); 
  13480.     $c = $w * $this->k; 
  13481.     $d = $h * $this->k; 
  13482.     $sigapp['rect'] = sprintf('%F %F %F %F', $a, $b, ($a + $c), ($b + $d)); 
  13483.     return $sigapp; 
  13484. } 
  13485.  
  13486. /** 
  13487.  * Enable document timestamping (requires the OpenSSL Library). 
  13488.  * The trusted timestamping improve document security that means that no one should be able to change the document once it has been recorded. 
  13489.  * Use with digital signature only! 
  13490.  * @param $tsa_host (string) Time Stamping Authority (TSA) server (prefixed with 'https://') 
  13491.  * @param $tsa_username (string) Specifies the username for TSA authorization (optional) OR specifies the TSA authorization PEM file (see: example_66.php, optional) 
  13492.  * @param $tsa_password (string) Specifies the password for TSA authorization (optional) 
  13493.  * @param $tsa_cert (string) Specifies the location of TSA certificate for authorization (optional for cURL) 
  13494.  * @public 
  13495.  * @author Richard Stockinger 
  13496.  * @since 6.0.085 (2014-06-16) 
  13497.  */ 
  13498. public function setTimeStamp($tsa_host='', $tsa_username='', $tsa_password='', $tsa_cert='') { 
  13499.     $this->tsa_data = array(); 
  13500.     if (!function_exists('curl_init')) { 
  13501.         $this->Error('Please enable cURL PHP extension!'); 
  13502.     } 
  13503.     if (strlen($tsa_host) == 0) { 
  13504.         $this->Error('Please specify the host of Time Stamping Authority (TSA)!'); 
  13505.     } 
  13506.     $this->tsa_data['tsa_host'] = $tsa_host; 
  13507.     if (is_file($tsa_username)) { 
  13508.         $this->tsa_data['tsa_auth'] = $tsa_username; 
  13509.     } else { 
  13510.         $this->tsa_data['tsa_username'] = $tsa_username; 
  13511.     } 
  13512.     $this->tsa_data['tsa_password'] = $tsa_password; 
  13513.     $this->tsa_data['tsa_cert'] = $tsa_cert; 
  13514.     $this->tsa_timestamp = true; 
  13515. } 
  13516.  
  13517. /** 
  13518.  * NOT YET IMPLEMENTED 
  13519.  * Request TSA for a timestamp 
  13520.  * @param $signature (string) Digital signature as binary string 
  13521.  * @return (string) Timestamped digital signature 
  13522.  * @protected 
  13523.  * @author Richard Stockinger 
  13524.  * @since 6.0.085 (2014-06-16) 
  13525.  */ 
  13526. protected function applyTSA($signature) { 
  13527.     if (!$this->tsa_timestamp) { 
  13528.         return $signature; 
  13529.     } 
  13530.     //@TODO: implement this feature 
  13531.     return $signature; 
  13532. } 
  13533.  
  13534. /** 
  13535.  * Create a new page group. 
  13536.  * NOTE: call this function before calling AddPage() 
  13537.  * @param $page (int) starting group page (leave empty for next page). 
  13538.  * @public 
  13539.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13540.  */ 
  13541. public function startPageGroup($page='') { 
  13542.     if (empty($page)) { 
  13543.         $page = $this->page + 1; 
  13544.     } 
  13545.     $this->newpagegroup[$page] = sizeof($this->newpagegroup) + 1; 
  13546. } 
  13547.  
  13548. /** 
  13549.  * Set the starting page number. 
  13550.  * @param $num (int) Starting page number. 
  13551.  * @since 5.9.093 (2011-06-16) 
  13552.  * @public 
  13553.  */ 
  13554. public function setStartingPageNumber($num=1) { 
  13555.     $this->starting_page_number = max(0, intval($num)); 
  13556. } 
  13557.  
  13558. /** 
  13559.  * Returns the string alias used right align page numbers. 
  13560.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string wil contain an additional open curly brace. 
  13561.  * @return string 
  13562.  * @since 5.9.099 (2011-06-27) 
  13563.  * @public 
  13564.  */ 
  13565. public function getAliasRightShift() { 
  13566.     // calculate aproximatively the ratio between widths of aliases and replacements. 
  13567.     $ref = '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_right_shift.'}{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages.'}{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page.'}'; 
  13568.     $rep = str_repeat(' ', $this->GetNumChars($ref)); 
  13569.     $wrep = $this->GetStringWidth($rep); 
  13570.     if ($wrep > 0) { 
  13571.         $wdiff = max(1, ($this->GetStringWidth($ref) / $wrep)); 
  13572.     } else { 
  13573.         $wdiff = 1; 
  13574.     } 
  13575.     $sdiff = sprintf('%F', $wdiff); 
  13576.     $alias = TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_right_shift.$sdiff.'}'; 
  13577.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13578.         $alias = '{'.$alias; 
  13579.     } 
  13580.     return $alias; 
  13581. } 
  13582.  
  13583. /** 
  13584.  * Returns the string alias used for the total number of pages. 
  13585.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13586.  * This alias will be replaced by the total number of pages in the document. 
  13587.  * @return string 
  13588.  * @since 3.0.018 (2008-08-08) 
  13589.  * @public 
  13590.  */ 
  13591. public function getAliasNbPages() { 
  13592.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13593.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages.'}'; 
  13594.     } 
  13595.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages; 
  13596. } 
  13597.  
  13598. /** 
  13599.  * Returns the string alias used for the page number. 
  13600.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13601.  * This alias will be replaced by the page number. 
  13602.  * @return string 
  13603.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  13604.  * @public 
  13605.  */ 
  13606. public function getAliasNumPage() { 
  13607.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13608.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page.'}'; 
  13609.     } 
  13610.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page; 
  13611. } 
  13612.  
  13613. /** 
  13614.  * Return the alias for the total number of pages in the current page group. 
  13615.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13616.  * This alias will be replaced by the total number of pages in this group. 
  13617.  * @return alias of the current page group 
  13618.  * @public 
  13619.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13620.  */ 
  13621. public function getPageGroupAlias() { 
  13622.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13623.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_tot_pages.'}'; 
  13624.     } 
  13625.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_tot_pages; 
  13626. } 
  13627.  
  13628. /** 
  13629.  * Return the alias for the page number on the current page group. 
  13630.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13631.  * This alias will be replaced by the page number (relative to the belonging group). 
  13632.  * @return alias of the current page group 
  13633.  * @public 
  13634.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  13635.  */ 
  13636. public function getPageNumGroupAlias() { 
  13637.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13638.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_num_page.'}'; 
  13639.     } 
  13640.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_num_page; 
  13641. } 
  13642.  
  13643. /** 
  13644.  * Return the current page in the group. 
  13645.  * @return current page in the group 
  13646.  * @public 
  13647.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13648.  */ 
  13649. public function getGroupPageNo() { 
  13650.     return $this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup]; 
  13651. } 
  13652.  
  13653. /** 
  13654.  * Returns the current group page number formatted as a string. 
  13655.  * @public 
  13656.  * @since 4.3.003 (2008-11-18) 
  13657.  * @see PaneNo(), formatPageNumber() 
  13658.  */ 
  13659. public function getGroupPageNoFormatted() { 
  13660.     return TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($this->getGroupPageNo()); 
  13661. } 
  13662.  
  13663. /** 
  13664.  * Returns the current page number formatted as a string. 
  13665.  * @public 
  13666.  * @since 4.2.005 (2008-11-06) 
  13667.  * @see PaneNo(), formatPageNumber() 
  13668.  */ 
  13669. public function PageNoFormatted() { 
  13670.     return TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($this->PageNo()); 
  13671. } 
  13672.  
  13673. /** 
  13674.  * Put pdf layers. 
  13675.  * @protected 
  13676.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13677.  */ 
  13678. protected function _putocg() { 
  13679.     if (empty($this->pdflayers)) { 
  13680.         return; 
  13681.     } 
  13682.     foreach ($this->pdflayers as $key => $layer) { 
  13683.          $this->pdflayers[$key]['objid'] = $this->_newobj(); 
  13684.          $out = '<< /Type /OCG'; 
  13685.          $out .= ' /Name '.$this->_textstring($layer['name'], $this->pdflayers[$key]['objid']); 
  13686.          $out .= ' /Usage <<'; 
  13687.          if (isset($layer['print']) AND ($layer['print'] !== NULL)) { 
  13688.             $out .= ' /Print <</PrintState /'.($layer['print']?'ON':'OFF').'>>'; 
  13689.          } 
  13690.          $out .= ' /View <</ViewState /'.($layer['view']?'ON':'OFF').'>>'; 
  13691.          $out .= ' >> >>'; 
  13692.          $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  13693.          $this->_out($out); 
  13694.     } 
  13695. } 
  13696.  
  13697. /** 
  13698.  * Start a new pdf layer. 
  13699.  * @param $name (string) Layer name (only a-z letters and numbers). Leave empty for automatic name. 
  13700.  * @param $print (boolean|null) Set to TRUE to print this layer, FALSE to not print and NULL to not set this option 
  13701.  * @param $view (boolean) Set to true to view this layer. 
  13702.  * @param $lock (boolean) If true lock the layer 
  13703.  * @public 
  13704.  * @since 5.9.102 (2011-07-13) 
  13705.  */ 
  13706. public function startLayer($name='', $print=true, $view=true, $lock=true) { 
  13707.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  13708.         return; 
  13709.     } 
  13710.     $layer = sprintf('LYR%03d', (count($this->pdflayers) + 1)); 
  13711.     if (empty($name)) { 
  13712.         $name = $layer; 
  13713.     } else { 
  13714.         $name = preg_replace('/[^a-zA-Z0-9_\-]/', '', $name); 
  13715.     } 
  13716.     $this->pdflayers[] = array('layer' => $layer, 'name' => $name, 'print' => $print, 'view' => $view, 'lock' => $lock); 
  13717.     $this->openMarkedContent = true; 
  13718.     $this->_out('/OC /'.$layer.' BDC'); 
  13719. } 
  13720.  
  13721. /** 
  13722.  * End the current PDF layer. 
  13723.  * @public 
  13724.  * @since 5.9.102 (2011-07-13) 
  13725.  */ 
  13726. public function endLayer() { 
  13727.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  13728.         return; 
  13729.     } 
  13730.     if ($this->openMarkedContent) { 
  13731.         // close existing open marked-content layer 
  13732.         $this->_out('EMC'); 
  13733.         $this->openMarkedContent = false; 
  13734.     } 
  13735. } 
  13736.  
  13737. /** 
  13738.  * Set the visibility of the successive elements. 
  13739.  * This can be useful, for instance, to put a background 
  13740.  * image or color that will show on screen but won't print. 
  13741.  * @param $v (string) visibility mode. Legal values are: all, print, screen or view. 
  13742.  * @public 
  13743.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13744.  */ 
  13745. public function setVisibility($v) { 
  13746.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  13747.         return; 
  13748.     } 
  13749.     $this->endLayer(); 
  13750.     switch($v) { 
  13751.         case 'print': { 
  13752.             $this->startLayer('Print', true, false); 
  13753.             break; 
  13754.         } 
  13755.         case 'view': 
  13756.         case 'screen': { 
  13757.             $this->startLayer('View', false, true); 
  13758.             break; 
  13759.         } 
  13760.         case 'all': { 
  13761.             $this->_out(''); 
  13762.             break; 
  13763.         } 
  13764.         default: { 
  13765.             $this->Error('Incorrect visibility: '.$v); 
  13766.             break; 
  13767.         } 
  13768.     } 
  13769. } 
  13770.  
  13771. /** 
  13772.  * Add transparency parameters to the current extgstate 
  13773.  * @param $parms (array) parameters 
  13774.  * @return the number of extgstates 
  13775.  * @protected 
  13776.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13777.  */ 
  13778. protected function addExtGState($parms) { 
  13779.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  13780.         // transparencies are not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  13781.         return; 
  13782.     } 
  13783.     // check if this ExtGState already exist 
  13784.     foreach ($this->extgstates as $i => $ext) { 
  13785.         if ($ext['parms'] == $parms) { 
  13786.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  13787.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  13788.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['extgstates'][$i] = $ext; 
  13789.             } 
  13790.             // return reference to existing ExtGState 
  13791.             return $i; 
  13792.         } 
  13793.     } 
  13794.     $n = (count($this->extgstates) + 1); 
  13795.     $this->extgstates[$n] = array('parms' => $parms); 
  13796.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  13797.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  13798.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['extgstates'][$n] = $this->extgstates[$n]; 
  13799.     } 
  13800.     return $n; 
  13801. } 
  13802.  
  13803. /** 
  13804.  * Add an extgstate
