  15265.     // horizontal padding 
  15266.     if (!isset($style['hpadding'])) { 
  15267.         $hpadding = $padding; 
  15268.     } elseif ($style['hpadding'] === 'auto') { 
  15269.         $hpadding = 10 * ($w / ($arrcode['maxw'] + 20)); 
  15270.     } else { 
  15271.         $hpadding = floatval($style['hpadding']); 
  15272.     } 
  15273.     // vertical padding 
  15274.     if (!isset($style['vpadding'])) { 
  15275.         $vpadding = $padding; 
  15276.     } elseif ($style['vpadding'] === 'auto') { 
  15277.         $vpadding = ($hpadding / 2); 
  15278.     } else { 
  15279.         $vpadding = floatval($style['vpadding']); 
  15280.     } 
  15281.     // calculate xres (single bar width) 
  15282.     $max_xres = ($w - (2 * $hpadding)) / $arrcode['maxw']; 
  15283.     if ($style['stretch']) { 
  15284.         $xres = $max_xres; 
  15285.     } else { 
  15286.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($xres)) { 
  15287.             $xres = (0.141 * $this->k); // default bar width = 0.4 mm 
  15288.         } 
  15289.         if ($xres > $max_xres) { 
  15290.             // correct xres to fit on $w 
  15291.             $xres = $max_xres; 
  15292.         } 
  15293.         if ((isset($style['padding']) AND ($style['padding'] === 'auto')) 
  15294.             OR (isset($style['hpadding']) AND ($style['hpadding'] === 'auto'))) { 
  15295.             $hpadding = 10 * $xres; 
  15296.             if (isset($style['vpadding']) AND ($style['vpadding'] === 'auto')) { 
  15297.                 $vpadding = ($hpadding / 2); 
  15298.             } 
  15299.         } 
  15300.     } 
  15301.     if ($style['fitwidth']) { 
  15302.         $wold = $w; 
  15303.         $w = (($arrcode['maxw'] * $xres) + (2 * $hpadding)); 
  15304.         if (isset($style['cellfitalign'])) { 
  15305.             switch ($style['cellfitalign']) { 
  15306.                 case 'L': { 
  15307.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  15308.                         $x -= ($wold - $w); 
  15309.                     } 
  15310.                     break; 
  15311.                 } 
  15312.                 case 'R': { 
  15313.                     if (!$this->rtl) { 
  15314.                         $x += ($wold - $w); 
  15315.                     } 
  15316.                     break; 
  15317.                 } 
  15318.                 case 'C': { 
  15319.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  15320.                         $x -= (($wold - $w) / 2); 
  15321.                     } else { 
  15322.                         $x += (($wold - $w) / 2); 
  15323.                     } 
  15324.                     break; 
  15325.                 } 
  15326.                 default : { 
  15327.                     break; 
  15328.                 } 
  15329.             } 
  15330.         } 
  15331.     } 
  15332.     $text_height = $this->getCellHeight($fontsize / $this->k); 
  15333.     // height 
  15334.     if (($h === '') OR ($h <= 0)) { 
  15335.         // set default height 
  15336.         $h = (($arrcode['maxw'] * $xres) / 3) + (2 * $vpadding) + $text_height; 
  15337.     } 
  15338.     $barh = $h - $text_height - (2 * $vpadding); 
  15339.     if ($barh <=0) { 
  15340.         // try to reduce font or padding to fit barcode on available height 
  15341.         if ($text_height > $h) { 
  15342.             $fontsize = (($h * $this->k) / (4 * $this->cell_height_ratio)); 
  15343.             $text_height = $this->getCellHeight($fontsize / $this->k); 
  15344.             $this->SetFont($style['font'], '', $fontsize); 
  15345.         } 
  15346.         if ($vpadding > 0) { 
  15347.             $vpadding = (($h - $text_height) / 4); 
  15348.         } 
  15349.         $barh = $h - $text_height - (2 * $vpadding); 
  15350.     } 
  15351.     // fit the barcode on available space 
  15352.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, false); 
  15353.     // set alignment 
  15354.     $this->img_rb_y = $y + $h; 
  15355.     // set alignment 
  15356.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  15357.         if ($style['position'] == 'L') { 
  15358.             $xpos = $this->lMargin; 
  15359.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'C') { 
  15360.             $xpos = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  15361.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'R') { 
  15362.             $xpos = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  15363.         } else { 
  15364.             $xpos = $x - $w; 
  15365.         } 
  15366.         $this->img_rb_x = $xpos; 
  15367.     } else { 
  15368.         if ($style['position'] == 'L') { 
  15369.             $xpos = $this->lMargin; 
  15370.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'C') { 
  15371.             $xpos = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  15372.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'R') { 
  15373.             $xpos = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  15374.         } else { 
  15375.             $xpos = $x; 
  15376.         } 
  15377.         $this->img_rb_x = $xpos + $w; 
  15378.     } 
  15379.     $xpos_rect = $xpos; 
  15380.     if (!isset($style['align'])) { 
  15381.         $style['align'] = 'C'; 
  15382.     } 
  15383.     switch ($style['align']) { 
  15384.         case 'L': { 
  15385.             $xpos = $xpos_rect + $hpadding; 
  15386.             break; 
  15387.         } 
  15388.         case 'R': { 
  15389.             $xpos = $xpos_rect + ($w - ($arrcode['maxw'] * $xres)) - $hpadding; 
  15390.             break; 
  15391.         } 
  15392.         case 'C': 
  15393.         default : { 
  15394.             $xpos = $xpos_rect + (($w - ($arrcode['maxw'] * $xres)) / 2); 
  15395.             break; 
  15396.         } 
  15397.     } 
  15398.     $xpos_text = $xpos; 
  15399.     // barcode is always printed in LTR direction 
  15400.     $tempRTL = $this->rtl; 
  15401.     $this->rtl = false; 
  15402.     // print background color 
  15403.     if ($style['bgcolor']) { 
  15404.         $this->Rect($xpos_rect, $y, $w, $h, $style['border'] ? 'DF' : 'F', '', $style['bgcolor']); 
  15405.     } elseif ($style['border']) { 
  15406.         $this->Rect($xpos_rect, $y, $w, $h, 'D'); 
  15407.     } 
  15408.     // set foreground color 
  15409.     $this->SetDrawColorArray($style['fgcolor']); 
  15410.     $this->SetTextColorArray($style['fgcolor']); 
  15411.     // print bars 
  15412.     foreach ($arrcode['bcode'] as $k => $v) { 
  15413.         $bw = ($v['w'] * $xres); 
  15414.         if ($v['t']) { 
  15415.             // draw a vertical bar 
  15416.             $ypos = $y + $vpadding + ($v['p'] * $barh / $arrcode['maxh']); 
  15417.             $this->Rect($xpos, $ypos, $bw, ($v['h'] * $barh / $arrcode['maxh']), 'F', array(), $style['fgcolor']); 
  15418.         } 
  15419.         $xpos += $bw; 
  15420.     } 
  15421.     // print text 
  15422.     if ($style['text']) { 
  15423.         if (isset($style['label']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($style['label'])) { 
  15424.             $label = $style['label']; 
  15425.         } else { 
  15426.             $label = $code; 
  15427.         } 
  15428.         $txtwidth = ($arrcode['maxw'] * $xres); 
  15429.         if ($this->GetStringWidth($label) > $txtwidth) { 
  15430.             $style['stretchtext'] = 2; 
  15431.         } 
  15432.         // print text 
  15433.         $this->x = $xpos_text; 
  15434.         $this->y = $y + $vpadding + $barh; 
  15435.         $cellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  15436.         $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  15437.         $this->Cell($txtwidth, '', $label, 0, 0, 'C', false, '', $style['stretchtext'], false, 'T', 'T'); 
  15438.         $this->cell_padding = $cellpadding; 
  15439.     } 
  15440.     // restore original direction 
  15441.     $this->rtl = $tempRTL; 
  15442.     // restore previous settings 
  15443.     $this->setGraphicVars($gvars); 
  15444.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  15445.     switch($align) { 
  15446.         case 'T':{ 
  15447.             $this->y = $y; 
  15448.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15449.             break; 
  15450.         } 
  15451.         case 'M':{ 
  15452.             $this->y = $y + round($h / 2); 
  15453.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15454.             break; 
  15455.         } 
  15456.         case 'B':{ 
  15457.             $this->y = $this->img_rb_y; 
  15458.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15459.             break; 
  15460.         } 
  15461.         case 'N':{ 
  15462.             $this->SetY($this->img_rb_y); 
  15463.             break; 
  15464.         } 
  15465.         default:{ 
  15466.             break; 
  15467.         } 
  15468.     } 
  15469.     $this->endlinex = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15470. } 
  15471.  
  15472. /** 
  15473.  * Print 2D Barcode. 
  15474.  * @param $code (string) code to print 
  15475.  * @param $type (string) type of barcode (see tcpdf_barcodes_2d.php for supported formats). 
  15476.  * @param $x (int) x position in user units 
  15477.  * @param $y (int) y position in user units 
  15478.  * @param $w (int) width in user units 
  15479.  * @param $h (int) height in user units 
  15480.  * @param $style (array) array of options:<ul> 
  15481.  * <li>boolean $style['border'] if true prints a border around the barcode</li> 
  15482.  * <li>int $style['padding'] padding to leave around the barcode in barcode units (set to 'auto' for automatic padding)</li> 
  15483.  * <li>int $style['hpadding'] horizontal padding in barcode units (set to 'auto' for automatic padding)</li> 
  15484.  * <li>int $style['vpadding'] vertical padding in barcode units (set to 'auto' for automatic padding)</li> 
  15485.  * <li>int $style['module_width'] width of a single module in points</li> 
  15486.  * <li>int $style['module_height'] height of a single module in points</li> 
  15487.  * <li>array $style['fgcolor'] color array for bars and text</li> 
  15488.  * <li>mixed $style['bgcolor'] color array for background or false for transparent</li> 
  15489.  * <li>string $style['position'] barcode position on the page: L = left margin; C = center; R = right margin; S = stretch</li><li>$style['module_width'] width of a single module in points</li> 
  15490.  * <li>$style['module_height'] height of a single module in points</li></ul> 
  15491.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to barcode insertion relative to barcode height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> 
  15492.  * @param $distort (boolean) if true distort the barcode to fit width and height, otherwise preserve aspect ratio 
  15493.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  15494.  * @since 4.5.037 (2009-04-07) 
  15495.  * @public 
  15496.  */ 
  15497. public function write2DBarcode($code, $type, $x='', $y='', $w='', $h='', $style='', $align='', $distort=false) { 
  15498.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string(trim($code))) { 
  15499.         return; 
  15500.     } 
  15501.     require_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/tcpdf_barcodes_2d.php'); 
  15502.     // save current graphic settings 
  15503.     $gvars = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  15504.     // create new barcode object 
  15505.     $barcodeobj = new TCPDF2DBarcode($code, $type); 
  15506.     $arrcode = $barcodeobj->getBarcodeArray(); 
  15507.     if (($arrcode === false) OR empty($arrcode) OR !isset($arrcode['num_rows']) OR ($arrcode['num_rows'] == 0) OR !isset($arrcode['num_cols']) OR ($arrcode['num_cols'] == 0)) { 
  15508.         $this->Error('Error in 2D barcode string'); 
  15509.     } 
  15510.     // set default values 
  15511.     if (!isset($style['position'])) { 
  15512.         $style['position'] = ''; 
  15513.     } 
  15514.     if (!isset($style['fgcolor'])) { 
  15515.         $style['fgcolor'] = array(0, 0, 0); // default black 
  15516.     } 
  15517.     if (!isset($style['bgcolor'])) { 
  15518.         $style['bgcolor'] = false; // default transparent 
  15519.     } 
  15520.     if (!isset($style['border'])) { 
  15521.         $style['border'] = false; 
  15522.     } 
  15523.     // padding 
  15524.     if (!isset($style['padding'])) { 
  15525.         $style['padding'] = 0; 
  15526.     } elseif ($style['padding'] === 'auto') { 
  15527.         $style['padding'] = 4; 
  15528.     } 
  15529.     if (!isset($style['hpadding'])) { 
  15530.         $style['hpadding'] = $style['padding']; 
  15531.     } elseif ($style['hpadding'] === 'auto') { 
  15532.         $style['hpadding'] = 4; 
  15533.     } 
  15534.     if (!isset($style['vpadding'])) { 
  15535.         $style['vpadding'] = $style['padding']; 
  15536.     } elseif ($style['vpadding'] === 'auto') { 
  15537.         $style['vpadding'] = 4; 
  15538.     } 
  15539.     $hpad = (2 * $style['hpadding']); 
  15540.     $vpad = (2 * $style['vpadding']); 
  15541.     // cell (module) dimension 
  15542.     if (!isset($style['module_width'])) { 
  15543.         $style['module_width'] = 1; // width of a single module in points 
  15544.     } 
  15545.     if (!isset($style['module_height'])) { 
  15546.         $style['module_height'] = 1; // height of a single module in points 
  15547.     } 
  15548.     if ($x === '') { 
  15549.         $x = $this->x; 
  15550.     } 
  15551.     if ($y === '') { 
  15552.         $y = $this->y; 
  15553.     } 
  15554.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  15555.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  15556.     // number of barcode columns and rows 
  15557.     $rows = $arrcode['num_rows']; 
  15558.     $cols = $arrcode['num_cols']; 
  15559.     if (($rows <= 0) || ($cols <= 0)) { 
  15560.         $this->Error('Error in 2D barcode string'); 
  15561.     } 
  15562.     // module width and height 
  15563.     $mw = $style['module_width']; 
  15564.     $mh = $style['module_height']; 
  15565.     if (($mw <= 0) OR ($mh <= 0)) { 
  15566.         $this->Error('Error in 2D barcode string'); 
  15567.     } 
  15568.     // get max dimensions 
  15569.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  15570.         $maxw = $x - $this->lMargin; 
  15571.     } else { 
  15572.         $maxw = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $x; 
  15573.     } 
  15574.     $maxh = ($this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin); 
  15575.     $ratioHW = ((($rows * $mh) + $hpad) / (($cols * $mw) + $vpad)); 
  15576.     $ratioWH = ((($cols * $mw) + $vpad) / (($rows * $mh) + $hpad)); 
  15577.     if (!$distort) { 
  15578.         if (($maxw * $ratioHW) > $maxh) { 
  15579.             $maxw = $maxh * $ratioWH; 
  15580.         } 
  15581.         if (($maxh * $ratioWH) > $maxw) { 
  15582.             $maxh = $maxw * $ratioHW; 
  15583.         } 
  15584.     } 
  15585.     // set maximum dimesions 
  15586.     if ($w > $maxw) { 
  15587.         $w = $maxw; 
  15588.     } 
  15589.     if ($h > $maxh) { 
  15590.         $h = $maxh; 
  15591.     } 
  15592.     // set dimensions 
  15593.     if ((($w === '') OR ($w <= 0)) AND (($h === '') OR ($h <= 0))) { 
  15594.         $w = ($cols + $hpad) * ($mw / $this->k); 
  15595.         $h = ($rows + $vpad) * ($mh / $this->k); 
  15596.     } elseif (($w === '') OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  15597.         $w = $h * $ratioWH; 
  15598.     } elseif (($h === '') OR ($h <= 0)) { 
  15599.         $h = $w * $ratioHW; 
  15600.     } 
  15601.     // barcode size (excluding padding) 
  15602.     $bw = ($w * $cols) / ($cols + $hpad); 
  15603.     $bh = ($h * $rows) / ($rows + $vpad); 
  15604.     // dimension of single barcode cell unit 
  15605.     $cw = $bw / $cols; 
  15606.     $ch = $bh / $rows; 
  15607.     if (!$distort) { 
  15608.         if (($cw / $ch) > ($mw / $mh)) { 
  15609.             // correct horizontal distortion 
  15610.             $cw = $ch * $mw / $mh; 
  15611.             $bw = $cw * $cols; 
  15612.             $style['hpadding'] = ($w - $bw) / (2 * $cw); 
  15613.         } else { 
  15614.             // correct vertical distortion 
  15615.             $ch = $cw * $mh / $mw; 
  15616.             $bh = $ch * $rows; 
  15617.             $style['vpadding'] = ($h - $bh) / (2 * $ch); 
  15618.         } 
  15619.     } 
  15620.     // fit the barcode on available space 
  15621.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, false); 
  15622.     // set alignment 
  15623.     $this->img_rb_y = $y + $h; 
  15624.     // set alignment 
  15625.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  15626.         if ($style['position'] == 'L') { 
  15627.             $xpos = $this->lMargin; 
  15628.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'C') { 
  15629.             $xpos = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  15630.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'R') { 
  15631.             $xpos = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  15632.         } else { 
  15633.             $xpos = $x - $w; 
  15634.         } 
  15635.         $this->img_rb_x = $xpos; 
  15636.     } else { 
  15637.         if ($style['position'] == 'L') { 
  15638.             $xpos = $this->lMargin; 
  15639.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'C') { 
  15640.             $xpos = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  15641.         } elseif ($style['position'] == 'R') { 
  15642.             $xpos = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  15643.         } else { 
  15644.             $xpos = $x; 
  15645.         } 
  15646.         $this->img_rb_x = $xpos + $w; 
  15647.     } 
  15648.     $xstart = $xpos + ($style['hpadding'] * $cw); 
  15649.     $ystart = $y + ($style['vpadding'] * $ch); 
  15650.     // barcode is always printed in LTR direction 
  15651.     $tempRTL = $this->rtl; 
  15652.     $this->rtl = false; 
  15653.     // print background color 
  15654.     if ($style['bgcolor']) { 
  15655.         $this->Rect($xpos, $y, $w, $h, $style['border'] ? 'DF' : 'F', '', $style['bgcolor']); 
  15656.     } elseif ($style['border']) { 
  15657.         $this->Rect($xpos, $y, $w, $h, 'D'); 
  15658.     } 
  15659.     // set foreground color 
  15660.     $this->SetDrawColorArray($style['fgcolor']); 
  15661.     // print barcode cells 
  15662.     // for each row 
  15663.     for ($r = 0; $r < $rows; ++$r) { 
  15664.         $xr = $xstart; 
  15665.         // for each column 
  15666.         for ($c = 0; $c < $cols; ++$c) { 
  15667.             if ($arrcode['bcode'][$r][$c] == 1) { 
  15668.                 // draw a single barcode cell 
  15669.                 $this->Rect($xr, $ystart, $cw, $ch, 'F', array(), $style['fgcolor']); 
  15670.             } 
  15671.             $xr += $cw; 
  15672.         } 
  15673.         $ystart += $ch; 
  15674.     } 
  15675.     // restore original direction 
  15676.     $this->rtl = $tempRTL; 
  15677.     // restore previous settings 
  15678.     $this->setGraphicVars($gvars); 
  15679.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  15680.     switch($align) { 
  15681.         case 'T':{ 
  15682.             $this->y = $y; 
  15683.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15684.             break; 
  15685.         } 
  15686.         case 'M':{ 
  15687.             $this->y = $y + round($h/2); 
  15688.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15689.             break; 
  15690.         } 
  15691.         case 'B':{ 
  15692.             $this->y = $this->img_rb_y; 
  15693.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15694.             break; 
  15695.         } 
  15696.         case 'N':{ 
  15697.             $this->SetY($this->img_rb_y); 
  15698.             break; 
  15699.         } 
  15700.         default:{ 
  15701.             break; 
  15702.         } 
  15703.     } 
  15704.     $this->endlinex = $this->img_rb_x; 
  15705. } 
  15706.  
  15707. /** 
  15708.  * Returns an array containing current margins: 
  15709.  * <ul> 
  15710.         <li>$ret['left'] = left margin</li> 
  15711.         <li>$ret['right'] = right margin</li> 
  15712.         <li>$ret['top'] = top margin</li> 
  15713.         <li>$ret['bottom'] = bottom margin</li> 
  15714.         <li>$ret['header'] = header margin</li> 
  15715.         <li>$ret['footer'] = footer margin</li> 
  15716.         <li>$ret['cell'] = cell padding array</li> 
  15717.         <li>$ret['padding_left'] = cell left padding</li> 
  15718.         <li>$ret['padding_top'] = cell top padding</li> 
  15719.         <li>$ret['padding_right'] = cell right padding</li> 
  15720.         <li>$ret['padding_bottom'] = cell bottom padding</li> 
  15721.  * </ul> 
  15722.  * @return array containing all margins measures 
  15723.  * @public 
  15724.  * @since 3.2.000 (2008-06-23) 
  15725.  */ 
  15726. public function getMargins() { 
  15727.     $ret = array( 
  15728.         'left' => $this->lMargin,  
  15729.         'right' => $this->rMargin,  
  15730.         'top' => $this->tMargin,  
  15731.         'bottom' => $this->bMargin,  
  15732.         'header' => $this->header_margin,  
  15733.         'footer' => $this->footer_margin,  
  15734.         'cell' => $this->cell_padding,  
  15735.         'padding_left' => $this->cell_padding['L'],  
  15736.         'padding_top' => $this->cell_padding['T'],  
  15737.         'padding_right' => $this->cell_padding['R'],  
  15738.         'padding_bottom' => $this->cell_padding['B'] 
  15739.  ); 
  15740.     return $ret; 
  15741. } 
  15742.  
  15743. /** 
  15744.  * Returns an array containing original margins: 
  15745.  * <ul> 
  15746.         <li>$ret['left'] = left margin</li> 
  15747.         <li>$ret['right'] = right margin</li> 
  15748.  * </ul> 
  15749.  * @return array containing all margins measures 
  15750.  * @public 
  15751.  * @since 3.0.012 (2008-07-24) 
  15752.  */ 
  15753. public function getOriginalMargins() { 
  15754.     $ret = array( 
  15755.         'left' => $this->original_lMargin,  
  15756.         'right' => $this->original_rMargin 
  15757.  ); 
  15758.     return $ret; 
  15759. } 
  15760.  
  15761. /** 
  15762.  * Returns the current font size. 
  15763.  * @return current font size 
  15764.  * @public 
  15765.  * @since 3.2.000 (2008-06-23) 
  15766.  */ 
  15767. public function getFontSize() { 
  15768.     return $this->FontSize; 
  15769. } 
  15770.  
  15771. /** 
  15772.  * Returns the current font size in points unit. 
  15773.  * @return current font size in points unit 
  15774.  * @public 
  15775.  * @since 3.2.000 (2008-06-23) 
  15776.  */ 
  15777. public function getFontSizePt() { 
  15778.     return $this->FontSizePt; 
  15779. } 
  15780.  
  15781. /** 
  15782.  * Returns the current font family name. 
  15783.  * @return string current font family name 
  15784.  * @public 
  15785.  * @since 4.3.008 (2008-12-05) 
  15786.  */ 
  15787. public function getFontFamily() { 
  15788.     return $this->FontFamily; 
  15789. } 
  15790.  
  15791. /** 
  15792.  * Returns the current font style. 
  15793.  * @return string current font style 
  15794.  * @public 
  15795.  * @since 4.3.008 (2008-12-05) 
  15796.  */ 
  15797. public function getFontStyle() { 
  15798.     return $this->FontStyle; 
  15799. } 
  15800.  
  15801. /** 
  15802.  * Cleanup HTML code (requires HTML Tidy library). 
  15803.  * @param $html (string) htmlcode to fix 
  15804.  * @param $default_css (string) CSS commands to add 
  15805.  * @param $tagvs (array) parameters for setHtmlVSpace method 
  15806.  * @param $tidy_options (array) options for tidy_parse_string function 
  15807.  * @return string XHTML code cleaned up 
  15808.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  15809.  * @public 
  15810.  * @since 5.9.017 (2010-11-16) 
  15811.  * @see setHtmlVSpace() 
  15812.  */ 
  15813. public function fixHTMLCode($html, $default_css='', $tagvs='', $tidy_options='') { 
  15814.     return TCPDF_STATIC::fixHTMLCode($html, $default_css, $tagvs, $tidy_options, $this->tagvspaces); 
  15815. } 
  15816.  
  15817. /** 
  15818.  * Returns the border width from CSS property 
  15819.  * @param $width (string) border width 
  15820.  * @return int with in user units 
  15821.  * @protected 
  15822.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-02) 
  15823.  */ 
  15824. protected function getCSSBorderWidth($width) { 
  15825.     if ($width == 'thin') { 
  15826.         $width = (2 / $this->k); 
  15827.     } elseif ($width == 'medium') { 
  15828.         $width = (4 / $this->k); 
  15829.     } elseif ($width == 'thick') { 
  15830.         $width = (6 / $this->k); 
  15831.     } else { 
  15832.         $width = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($width, 1, 'px', false); 
  15833.     } 
  15834.     return $width; 
  15835. } 
  15836.  
  15837. /** 
  15838.  * Returns the border dash style from CSS property 
  15839.  * @param $style (string) border style to convert 
  15840.  * @return int sash style (return -1 in case of none or hidden border) 
  15841.  * @protected 
  15842.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-02) 
  15843.  */ 
  15844. protected function getCSSBorderDashStyle($style) { 
  15845.     switch (strtolower($style)) { 
  15846.         case 'none': 
  15847.         case 'hidden': { 
  15848.             $dash = -1; 
  15849.             break; 
  15850.         } 
  15851.         case 'dotted': { 
  15852.             $dash = 1; 
  15853.             break; 
  15854.         } 
  15855.         case 'dashed': { 
  15856.             $dash = 3; 
  15857.             break; 
  15858.         } 
  15859.         case 'double': 
  15860.         case 'groove': 
  15861.         case 'ridge': 
  15862.         case 'inset': 
  15863.         case 'outset': 
  15864.         case 'solid': 
  15865.         default: { 
  15866.             $dash = 0; 
  15867.             break; 
  15868.         } 
  15869.     } 
  15870.     return $dash; 
  15871. } 
  15872.  
  15873. /** 
  15874.  * Returns the border style array from CSS border properties 
  15875.  * @param $cssborder (string) border properties 
  15876.  * @return array containing border properties 
  15877.  * @protected 
  15878.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-02) 
  15879.  */ 
  15880. protected function getCSSBorderStyle($cssborder) { 
  15881.     $bprop = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($cssborder)); 
  15882.     $border = array(); // value to be returned 
  15883.     switch (count($bprop)) { 
  15884.         case 3: { 
  15885.             $width = $bprop[0]; 
  15886.             $style = $bprop[1]; 
  15887.             $color = $bprop[2]; 
  15888.             break; 
  15889.         } 
  15890.         case 2: { 
  15891.             $width = 'medium'; 
  15892.             $style = $bprop[0]; 
  15893.             $color = $bprop[1]; 
  15894.             break; 
  15895.         } 
  15896.         case 1: { 
  15897.             $width = 'medium'; 
  15898.             $style = $bprop[0]; 
  15899.             $color = 'black'; 
  15900.             break; 
  15901.         } 
  15902.         default: { 
  15903.             $width = 'medium'; 
  15904.             $style = 'solid'; 
  15905.             $color = 'black'; 
  15906.             break; 
  15907.         } 
  15908.     } 
  15909.     if ($style == 'none') { 
  15910.         return array(); 
  15911.     } 
  15912.     $border['cap'] = 'square'; 
  15913.     $border['join'] = 'miter'; 
  15914.     $border['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($style); 
  15915.     if ($border['dash'] < 0) { 
  15916.         return array(); 
  15917.     } 
  15918.     $border['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($width); 
  15919.     $border['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($color, $this->spot_colors); 
  15920.     return $border; 
  15921. } 
  15922.  
  15923. /** 
  15924.  * Get the internal Cell padding from CSS attribute. 
  15925.  * @param $csspadding (string) padding properties 
  15926.  * @param $width (float) width of the containing element 
  15927.  * @return array of cell paddings 
  15928.  * @public 
  15929.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-10-04) 
  15930.  */ 
  15931. public function getCSSPadding($csspadding, $width=0) { 
  15932.     $padding = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($csspadding)); 
  15933.     $cell_padding = array(); // value to be returned 
  15934.     switch (count($padding)) { 
  15935.         case 4: { 
  15936.             $cell_padding['T'] = $padding[0]; 
  15937.             $cell_padding['R'] = $padding[1]; 
  15938.             $cell_padding['B'] = $padding[2]; 
  15939.             $cell_padding['L'] = $padding[3]; 
  15940.             break; 
  15941.         } 
  15942.         case 3: { 
  15943.             $cell_padding['T'] = $padding[0]; 
  15944.             $cell_padding['R'] = $padding[1]; 
  15945.             $cell_padding['B'] = $padding[2]; 
  15946.             $cell_padding['L'] = $padding[1]; 
  15947.             break; 
  15948.         } 
  15949.         case 2: { 
  15950.             $cell_padding['T'] = $padding[0]; 
  15951.             $cell_padding['R'] = $padding[1]; 
  15952.             $cell_padding['B'] = $padding[0]; 
  15953.             $cell_padding['L'] = $padding[1]; 
  15954.             break; 
  15955.         } 
  15956.         case 1: { 
  15957.             $cell_padding['T'] = $padding[0]; 
  15958.             $cell_padding['R'] = $padding[0]; 
  15959.             $cell_padding['B'] = $padding[0]; 
  15960.             $cell_padding['L'] = $padding[0]; 
  15961.             break; 
  15962.         } 
  15963.         default: { 
  15964.             return $this->cell_padding; 
  15965.         } 
  15966.     } 
  15967.     if ($width == 0) { 
  15968.         $width = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  15969.     } 
  15970.     $cell_padding['T'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($cell_padding['T'], $width, 'px', false); 
  15971.     $cell_padding['R'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($cell_padding['R'], $width, 'px', false); 
  15972.     $cell_padding['B'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($cell_padding['B'], $width, 'px', false); 
  15973.     $cell_padding['L'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($cell_padding['L'], $width, 'px', false); 
  15974.     return $cell_padding; 
  15975. } 
  15976.  
  15977. /** 
  15978.  * Get the internal Cell margin from CSS attribute. 
  15979.  * @param $cssmargin (string) margin properties 
  15980.  * @param $width (float) width of the containing element 
  15981.  * @return array of cell margins 
  15982.  * @public 
  15983.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-10-04) 
  15984.  */ 
  15985. public function getCSSMargin($cssmargin, $width=0) { 
  15986.     $margin = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($cssmargin)); 
  15987.     $cell_margin = array(); // value to be returned 
  15988.     switch (count($margin)) { 
  15989.         case 4: { 
  15990.             $cell_margin['T'] = $margin[0]; 
  15991.             $cell_margin['R'] = $margin[1]; 
  15992.             $cell_margin['B'] = $margin[2]; 
  15993.             $cell_margin['L'] = $margin[3]; 
  15994.             break; 
  15995.         } 
  15996.         case 3: { 
  15997.             $cell_margin['T'] = $margin[0]; 
  15998.             $cell_margin['R'] = $margin[1]; 
  15999.             $cell_margin['B'] = $margin[2]; 
  16000.             $cell_margin['L'] = $margin[1]; 
  16001.             break; 
  16002.         } 
  16003.         case 2: { 
  16004.             $cell_margin['T'] = $margin[0]; 
  16005.             $cell_margin['R'] = $margin[1]; 
  16006.             $cell_margin['B'] = $margin[0]; 
  16007.             $cell_margin['L'] = $margin[1]; 
  16008.             break; 
  16009.         } 
  16010.         case 1: { 
  16011.             $cell_margin['T'] = $margin[0]; 
  16012.             $cell_margin['R'] = $margin[0]; 
  16013.             $cell_margin['B'] = $margin[0]; 
  16014.             $cell_margin['L'] = $margin[0]; 
  16015.             break; 
  16016.         } 
  16017.         default: { 
  16018.             return $this->cell_margin; 
  16019.         } 
  16020.     } 
  16021.     if ($width == 0) { 
  16022.         $width = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  16023.     } 
  16024.     $cell_margin['T'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits(str_replace('auto', '0', $cell_margin['T']), $width, 'px', false); 
  16025.     $cell_margin['R'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits(str_replace('auto', '0', $cell_margin['R']), $width, 'px', false); 
  16026.     $cell_margin['B'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits(str_replace('auto', '0', $cell_margin['B']), $width, 'px', false); 
  16027.     $cell_margin['L'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits(str_replace('auto', '0', $cell_margin['L']), $width, 'px', false); 
  16028.     return $cell_margin; 
  16029. } 
  16030.  
  16031. /** 
  16032.  * Get the border-spacing from CSS attribute. 
  16033.  * @param $cssbspace (string) border-spacing CSS properties 
  16034.  * @param $width (float) width of the containing element 
  16035.  * @return array of border spacings 
  16036.  * @public 
  16037.  * @since 5.9.010 (2010-10-27) 
  16038.  */ 
  16039. public function getCSSBorderMargin($cssbspace, $width=0) { 
  16040.     $space = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($cssbspace)); 
  16041.     $border_spacing = array(); // value to be returned 
  16042.     switch (count($space)) { 
  16043.         case 2: { 
  16044.             $border_spacing['H'] = $space[0]; 
  16045.             $border_spacing['V'] = $space[1]; 
  16046.             break; 
  16047.         } 
  16048.         case 1: { 
  16049.             $border_spacing['H'] = $space[0]; 
  16050.             $border_spacing['V'] = $space[0]; 
  16051.             break; 
  16052.         } 
  16053.         default: { 
  16054.             return array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0); 
  16055.         } 
  16056.     } 
  16057.     if ($width == 0) { 
  16058.         $width = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  16059.     } 
  16060.     $border_spacing['H'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($border_spacing['H'], $width, 'px', false); 
  16061.     $border_spacing['V'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($border_spacing['V'], $width, 'px', false); 
  16062.     return $border_spacing; 
  16063. } 
  16064.  
  16065. /** 
  16066.  * Returns the letter-spacing value from CSS value 
  16067.  * @param $spacing (string) letter-spacing value 
  16068.  * @param $parent (float) font spacing (tracking) value of the parent element 
  16069.  * @return float quantity to increases or decreases the space between characters in a text. 
  16070.  * @protected 
  16071.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-10-02) 
  16072.  */ 
  16073. protected function getCSSFontSpacing($spacing, $parent=0) { 
  16074.     $val = 0; // value to be returned 
  16075.     $spacing = trim($spacing); 
  16076.     switch ($spacing) { 
  16077.         case 'normal': { 
  16078.             $val = 0; 
  16079.             break; 
  16080.         } 
  16081.         case 'inherit': { 
  16082.             if ($parent == 'normal') { 
  16083.                 $val = 0; 
  16084.             } else { 
  16085.                 $val = $parent; 
  16086.             } 
  16087.             break; 
  16088.         } 
  16089.         default: { 
  16090.             $val = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($spacing, 0, 'px', false); 
  16091.         } 
  16092.     } 
  16093.     return $val; 
  16094. } 
  16095.  
  16096. /** 
  16097.  * Returns the percentage of font stretching from CSS value 
  16098.  * @param $stretch (string) stretch mode 
  16099.  * @param $parent (float) stretch value of the parent element 
  16100.  * @return float font stretching percentage 
  16101.  * @protected 
  16102.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-10-02) 
  16103.  */ 
  16104. protected function getCSSFontStretching($stretch, $parent=100) { 
  16105.     $val = 100; // value to be returned 
  16106.     $stretch = trim($stretch); 
  16107.     switch ($stretch) { 
  16108.         case 'ultra-condensed': { 
  16109.             $val = 40; 
  16110.             break; 
  16111.         } 
  16112.         case 'extra-condensed': { 
  16113.             $val = 55; 
  16114.             break; 
  16115.         } 
  16116.         case 'condensed': { 
  16117.             $val = 70; 
  16118.             break; 
  16119.         } 
  16120.         case 'semi-condensed': { 
  16121.             $val = 85; 
  16122.             break; 
  16123.         } 
  16124.         case 'normal': { 
  16125.             $val = 100; 
  16126.             break; 
  16127.         } 
  16128.         case 'semi-expanded': { 
  16129.             $val = 115; 
  16130.             break; 
  16131.         } 
  16132.         case 'expanded': { 
  16133.             $val = 130; 
  16134.             break; 
  16135.         } 
  16136.         case 'extra-expanded': { 
  16137.             $val = 145; 
  16138.             break; 
  16139.         } 
  16140.         case 'ultra-expanded': { 
  16141.             $val = 160; 
  16142.             break; 
  16143.         } 
  16144.         case 'wider': { 
  16145.             $val = ($parent + 10); 
  16146.             break; 
  16147.         } 
  16148.         case 'narrower': { 
  16149.             $val = ($parent - 10); 
  16150.             break; 
  16151.         } 
  16152.         case 'inherit': { 
  16153.             if ($parent == 'normal') { 
  16154.                 $val = 100; 
  16155.             } else { 
  16156.                 $val = $parent; 
  16157.             } 
  16158.             break; 
  16159.         } 
  16160.         default: { 
  16161.             $val = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($stretch, 100, '%', false); 
  16162.         } 
  16163.     } 
  16164.     return $val; 
  16165. } 
  16166.  
  16167. /** 
  16168.  * Convert HTML string containing font size value to points 
  16169.  * @param $val (string) String containing font size value and unit. 
  16170.  * @param $refsize (float) Reference font size in points. 
  16171.  * @param $parent_size (float) Parent font size in points. 
  16172.  * @param $defaultunit (string) Default unit (can be one of the following: %, em, ex, px, in, mm, pc, pt). 
  16173.  * @return float value in points 
  16174.  * @public 
  16175.  */ 
  16176. public function getHTMLFontUnits($val, $refsize=12, $parent_size=12, $defaultunit='pt') { 
  16177.     $refsize = TCPDF_FONTS::getFontRefSize($refsize); 
  16178.     $parent_size = TCPDF_FONTS::getFontRefSize($parent_size, $refsize); 
  16179.     switch ($val) { 
  16180.         case 'xx-small': { 
  16181.             $size = ($refsize - 4); 
  16182.             break; 
  16183.         } 
  16184.         case 'x-small': { 
  16185.             $size = ($refsize - 3); 
  16186.             break; 
  16187.         } 
  16188.         case 'small': { 
  16189.             $size = ($refsize - 2); 
  16190.             break; 
  16191.         } 
  16192.         case 'medium': { 
  16193.             $size = $refsize; 
  16194.             break; 
  16195.         } 
  16196.         case 'large': { 
  16197.             $size = ($refsize + 2); 
  16198.             break; 
  16199.         } 
  16200.         case 'x-large': { 
  16201.             $size = ($refsize + 4); 
  16202.             break; 
  16203.         } 
  16204.         case 'xx-large': { 
  16205.             $size = ($refsize + 6); 
  16206.             break; 
  16207.         } 
  16208.         case 'smaller': { 
  16209.             $size = ($parent_size - 3); 
  16210.             break; 
  16211.         } 
  16212.         case 'larger': { 
  16213.             $size = ($parent_size + 3); 
  16214.             break; 
  16215.         } 
  16216.         default: { 
  16217.             $size = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($val, $parent_size, $defaultunit, true); 
  16218.         } 
  16219.     } 
  16220.     return $size; 
  16221. } 
  16222.  
  16223. /** 
  16224.  * Returns the HTML DOM array. 
  16225.  * @param $html (string) html code 
  16226.  * @return array 
  16227.  * @protected 
  16228.  * @since 3.2.000 (2008-06-20) 
  16229.  */ 
  16230. protected function getHtmlDomArray($html) { 
  16231.     // array of CSS styles ( selector => properties). 
  16232.     $css = array(); 
  16233.     // get CSS array defined at previous call 
  16234.     $matches = array(); 
  16235.     if (preg_match_all('/<cssarray>([^\<]*)<\/cssarray>/isU', $html, $matches) > 0) { 
  16236.         if (isset($matches[1][0])) { 
  16237.             $css = array_merge($css, unserialize($this->unhtmlentities($matches[1][0]))); 
  16238.         } 
  16239.         $html = preg_replace('/<cssarray>(.*?)<\/cssarray>/isU', '', $html); 
  16240.     } 
  16241.     // extract external CSS files 
  16242.     $matches = array(); 
  16243.     if (preg_match_all('/<link([^\>]*)>/isU', $html, $matches) > 0) { 
  16244.         foreach ($matches[1] as $key => $link) { 
  16245.             $type = array(); 
  16246.             if (preg_match('/type[\s]*=[\s]*"text\/css"/', $link, $type)) { 
  16247.                 $type = array(); 
  16248.                 preg_match('/media[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $link, $type); 
  16249.                 // get 'all' and 'print' media, other media types are discarded 
  16250.                 // (all, braille, embossed, handheld, print, projection, screen, speech, tty, tv) 
  16251.                 if (empty($type) OR (isset($type[1]) AND (($type[1] == 'all') OR ($type[1] == 'print')))) { 
  16252.                     $type = array(); 
  16253.                     if (preg_match('/href[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $link, $type) > 0) { 
  16254.                         // read CSS data file 
  16255.                         $cssdata = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents(trim($type[1])); 
  16256.                         if (($cssdata !== FALSE) AND (strlen($cssdata) > 0)) { 
  16257.                             $css = array_merge($css, TCPDF_STATIC::extractCSSproperties($cssdata)); 
  16258.                         } 
  16259.                     } 
  16260.                 } 
  16261.             } 
  16262.         } 
  16263.     } 
  16264.     // extract style tags 
  16265.     $matches = array(); 
  16266.     if (preg_match_all('/<style([^\>]*)>([^\<]*)<\/style>/isU', $html, $matches) > 0) { 
  16267.         foreach ($matches[1] as $key => $media) { 
  16268.             $type = array(); 
  16269.             preg_match('/media[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $media, $type); 
  16270.             // get 'all' and 'print' media, other media types are discarded 
  16271.             // (all, braille, embossed, handheld, print, projection, screen, speech, tty, tv) 
  16272.             if (empty($type) OR (isset($type[1]) AND (($type[1] == 'all') OR ($type[1] == 'print')))) { 
  16273.                 $cssdata = $matches[2][$key]; 
  16274.                 $css = array_merge($css, TCPDF_STATIC::extractCSSproperties($cssdata)); 
  16275.             } 
  16276.         } 
  16277.     } 
  16278.     // create a special tag to contain the CSS array (used for table content) 
  16279.     $csstagarray = '<cssarray>'.htmlentities(serialize($css)).'</cssarray>'; 
  16280.     // remove head and style blocks 
  16281.     $html = preg_replace('/<head([^\>]*)>(.*?)<\/head>/siU', '', $html); 
  16282.     $html = preg_replace('/<style([^\>]*)>([^\<]*)<\/style>/isU', '', $html); 
  16283.     // define block tags 
  16284.     $blocktags = array('blockquote', 'br', 'dd', 'dl', 'div', 'dt', 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6', 'hr', 'li', 'ol', 'p', 'pre', 'ul', 'tcpdf', 'table', 'tr', 'td'); 
  16285.     // define self-closing tags 
  16286.     $selfclosingtags = array('area', 'base', 'basefont', 'br', 'hr', 'input', 'img', 'link', 'meta'); 
  16287.     // remove all unsupported tags (the line below lists all supported tags) 
  16288.     $html = strip_tags($html, '<marker/><a><b><blockquote><body><br><br/><dd><del><div><dl><dt><em><font><form><h1><h2><h3><h4><h5><h6><hr><hr/><i><img><input><label><li><ol><option><p><pre><s><select><small><span><strike><strong><sub><sup><table><tablehead><tcpdf><td><textarea><th><thead><tr><tt><u><ul>'); 
  16289.     //replace some blank characters 
  16290.     $html = preg_replace('/<pre/', '<xre', $html); // preserve pre tag 
  16291.     $html = preg_replace('/<(table|tr|td|th|tcpdf|blockquote|dd|div|dl|dt|form|h1|h2|h3|h4|h5|h6|br|hr|li|ol|ul|p)([^\>]*)>[\n\r\t]+/', '<\\1\\2>', $html); 
  16292.     $html = preg_replace('@(\r\n|\r)@', "\n", $html); 
  16293.     $repTable = array("\t" => ' ', "\0" => ' ', "\x0B" => ' ', "\\" => "\\\\"); 
  16294.     $html = strtr($html, $repTable); 
  16295.     $offset = 0; 
  16296.     while (($offset < strlen($html)) AND ($pos = strpos($html, '</pre>', $offset)) !== false) { 
  16297.         $html_a = substr($html, 0, $offset); 
  16298.         $html_b = substr($html, $offset, ($pos - $offset + 6)); 
  16299.         while (preg_match("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</pre>'si", $html_b)) { 
  16300.             // preserve newlines on <pre> tag 
  16301.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</pre>'si", "<xre\\1>\\2<br />\\3</pre>", $html_b); 
  16302.         } 
  16303.         while (preg_match("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)".$this->re_space['p']."(.*?)</pre>'".$this->re_space['m'], $html_b)) { 
  16304.             // preserve spaces on <pre> tag 
  16305.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)".$this->re_space['p']."(.*?)</pre>'".$this->re_space['m'], "<xre\\1>\\2 \\3</pre>", $html_b); 
  16306.         } 
  16307.         $html = $html_a.$html_b.substr($html, $pos + 6); 
  16308.         $offset = strlen($html_a.$html_b); 
  16309.     } 
  16310.     $offset = 0; 
  16311.     while (($offset < strlen($html)) AND ($pos = strpos($html, '</textarea>', $offset)) !== false) { 
  16312.         $html_a = substr($html, 0, $offset); 
  16313.         $html_b = substr($html, $offset, ($pos - $offset + 11)); 
  16314.         while (preg_match("'<textarea([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</textarea>'si", $html_b)) { 
  16315.             // preserve newlines on <textarea> tag 
  16316.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<textarea([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</textarea>'si", "<textarea\\1>\\2<TBR>\\3</textarea>", $html_b); 
  16317.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<textarea([^\>]*)>(.*?)[\"](.*?)</textarea>'si", "<textarea\\1>\\2''\\3</textarea>", $html_b); 
  16318.         } 
  16319.         $html = $html_a.$html_b.substr($html, $pos + 11); 
  16320.         $offset = strlen($html_a.$html_b); 
  16321.     } 
  16322.     $html = preg_replace('/([\s]*)<option/si', '<option', $html); 
  16323.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/option>([\s]*)/si', '</option>', $html); 
  16324.     $offset = 0; 
  16325.     while (($offset < strlen($html)) AND ($pos = strpos($html, '</option>', $offset)) !== false) { 
  16326.         $html_a = substr($html, 0, $offset); 
  16327.         $html_b = substr($html, $offset, ($pos - $offset + 9)); 
  16328.         while (preg_match("'<option([^\>]*)>(.*?)</option>'si", $html_b)) { 
  16329.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<option([\s]+)value=\"([^\"]*)\"([^\>]*)>(.*?)</option>'si", "\\2#!TaB!#\\4#!NwL!#", $html_b); 
  16330.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<option([^\>]*)>(.*?)</option>'si", "\\2#!NwL!#", $html_b); 
  16331.         } 
  16332.         $html = $html_a.$html_b.substr($html, $pos + 9); 
  16333.         $offset = strlen($html_a.$html_b); 
  16334.     } 
  16335.     if (preg_match("'</select'si", $html)) { 
  16336.         $html = preg_replace("'<select([^\>]*)>'si", "<select\\1 opt=\"", $html); 
  16337.         $html = preg_replace("'#!NwL!#</select>'si", "\" />", $html); 
  16338.     } 
  16339.     $html = str_replace("\n", ' ', $html); 
  16340.     // restore textarea newlines 
  16341.     $html = str_replace('<TBR>', "\n", $html); 
  16342.     // remove extra spaces from code 
  16343.     $html = preg_replace('/[\s]+<\/(table|tr|ul|ol|dl)>/', '</\\1>', $html); 
  16344.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+<\/(td|th|li|dt|dd)>/'.$this->re_space['m'], '</\\1>', $html); 
  16345.     $html = preg_replace('/[\s]+<(tr|td|th|li|dt|dd)/', '<\\1', $html); 
  16346.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+<(ul|ol|dl|br)/'.$this->re_space['m'], '<\\1', $html); 
  16347.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/(table|tr|td|th|blockquote|dd|dt|dl|div|dt|h1|h2|h3|h4|h5|h6|hr|li|ol|ul|p)>[\s]+</', '</\\1><', $html); 
  16348.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/(td|th)>/', '<marker style="font-size:0"/></\\1>', $html); 
  16349.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/table>([\s]*)<marker style="font-size:0"\/>/', '</table>', $html); 
  16350.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+<img/'.$this->re_space['m'], chr(32).'<img', $html); 
  16351.     $html = preg_replace('/<img([^\>]*)>[\s]+([^\<])/xi', '<img\\1> \\2', $html); 
  16352.     $html = preg_replace('/<img([^\>]*)>/xi', '<img\\1><span><marker style="font-size:0"/></span>', $html); 
  16353.     $html = preg_replace('/<xre/', '<pre', $html); // restore pre tag 
  16354.     $html = preg_replace('/<textarea([^\>]*)>([^\<]*)<\/textarea>/xi', '<textarea\\1 value="\\2" />', $html); 
  16355.     $html = preg_replace('/<li([^\>]*)><\/li>/', '<li\\1> </li>', $html); 
  16356.     $html = preg_replace('/<li([^\>]*)>'.$this->re_space['p'].'*<img/'.$this->re_space['m'], '<li\\1><font size="1"> </font><img', $html); 
  16357.     $html = preg_replace('/<([^\>\/]*)>[\s]/', '<\\1> ', $html); // preserve some spaces 
  16358.     $html = preg_replace('/[\s]<\/([^\>]*)>/', ' </\\1>', $html); // preserve some spaces 
  16359.     $html = preg_replace('/<su([bp])/', '<zws/><su\\1', $html); // fix sub/sup alignment 
  16360.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/su([bp])>/', '</su\\1><zws/>', $html); // fix sub/sup alignment 
  16361.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+/'.$this->re_space['m'], chr(32), $html); // replace multiple spaces with a single space 
  16362.     // trim string 
  16363.     $html = $this->stringTrim($html); 
  16364.     // fix br tag after li 
  16365.     $html = preg_replace('/<li><br([^\>]*)>/', '<li> <br\\1>', $html); 
  16366.     // fix first image tag alignment 
  16367.     $html = preg_replace('/^<img/', '<span style="font-size:0"><br /></span> <img', $html, 1); 
  16368.     // pattern for generic tag 
  16369.     $tagpattern = '/(<[^>]+>)/'; 
  16370.     // explodes the string 
  16371.     $a = preg_split($tagpattern, $html, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY); 
  16372.     // count elements 
  16373.     $maxel = count($a); 
  16374.     $elkey = 0; 
  16375.     $key = 0; 
  16376.     // create an array of elements 
  16377.     $dom = array(); 
  16378.     $dom[$key] = array(); 
  16379.     // set inheritable properties fot the first void element 
  16380.     // possible inheritable properties are: azimuth, border-collapse, border-spacing, caption-side, color, cursor, direction, empty-cells, font, font-family, font-stretch, font-size, font-size-adjust, font-style, font-variant, font-weight, letter-spacing, line-height, list-style, list-style-image, list-style-position, list-style-type, orphans, page, page-break-inside, quotes, speak, speak-header, text-align, text-indent, text-transform, volume, white-space, widows, word-spacing 
  16381.     $dom[$key]['tag'] = false; 
  16382.     $dom[$key]['block'] = false; 
  16383.     $dom[$key]['value'] = ''; 
  16384.     $dom[$key]['parent'] = 0; 
  16385.     $dom[$key]['hide'] = false; 
  16386.     $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $this->FontFamily; 
  16387.     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $this->FontStyle; 
  16388.     $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $this->FontSizePt; 
  16389.     $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $this->font_stretching; 
  16390.     $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $this->font_spacing; 
  16391.     $dom[$key]['stroke'] = $this->textstrokewidth; 
  16392.     $dom[$key]['fill'] = (($this->textrendermode % 2) == 0); 
  16393.     $dom[$key]['clip'] = ($this->textrendermode > 3); 
  16394.     $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $this->cell_height_ratio; 
  16395.     $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = false; 
  16396.     $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $this->fgcolor; // color 
  16397.     $dom[$key]['strokecolor'] = $this->strokecolor; 
  16398.     $dom[$key]['align'] = ''; 
  16399.     $dom[$key]['listtype'] = ''; 
  16400.     $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = 0; 
  16401.     $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = ''; 
  16402.     $dom[$key]['border'] = array(); 
  16403.     $dom[$key]['dir'] = $this->rtl?'rtl':'ltr'; 
  16404.     $thead = false; // true when we are inside the THEAD tag 
  16405.     ++$key; 
  16406.     $level = array(); 
  16407.     array_push($level, 0); // root 
  16408.     while ($elkey < $maxel) { 
  16409.         $dom[$key] = array(); 
  16410.         $element = $a[$elkey]; 
  16411.         $dom[$key]['elkey'] = $elkey; 
  16412.         if (preg_match($tagpattern, $element)) { 
  16413.             // html tag 
  16414.             $element = substr($element, 1, -1); 
  16415.             // get tag name 
  16416.             preg_match('/[\/]?([a-zA-Z0-9]*)/', $element, $tag); 
  16417.             $tagname = strtolower($tag[1]); 
  16418.             // check if we are inside a table header 
  16419.             if ($tagname == 'thead') { 
  16420.                 if ($element[0] == '/') { 
  16421.                     $thead = false; 
  16422.                 } else { 
  16423.                     $thead = true; 
  16424.                 } 
  16425.                 ++$elkey; 
  16426.                 continue; 
  16427.             } 
  16428.             $dom[$key]['tag'] = true; 
  16429.             $dom[$key]['value'] = $tagname; 
  16430.             if (in_array($dom[$key]['value'], $blocktags)) { 
  16431.                 $dom[$key]['block'] = true; 
  16432.             } else { 
  16433.                 $dom[$key]['block'] = false; 
  16434.             } 
  16435.             if ($element[0] == '/') { 
  16436.                 // *** closing html tag 
  16437.                 $dom[$key]['opening'] = false; 
  16438.                 $dom[$key]['parent'] = end($level); 
  16439.                 array_pop($level); 
  16440.                 $dom[$key]['hide'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['hide']; 
  16441.                 $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fontname']; 
  16442.                 $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fontstyle']; 
  16443.                 $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fontsize']; 
  16444.                 $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['font-stretch']; 
  16445.                 $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['letter-spacing']; 
  16446.                 $dom[$key]['stroke'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['stroke']; 
  16447.                 $dom[$key]['fill'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fill']; 
  16448.                 $dom[$key]['clip'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['clip']; 
  16449.                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['line-height']; 
  16450.                 $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['bgcolor']; 
  16451.                 $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fgcolor']; 
  16452.                 $dom[$key]['strokecolor'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['strokecolor']; 
  16453.                 $dom[$key]['align'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['align']; 
  16454.                 $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['text-transform']; 
  16455.                 $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['dir']; 
  16456.                 if (isset($dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['listtype'])) { 
  16457.                     $dom[$key]['listtype'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['listtype']; 
  16458.                 } 
  16459.                 // set the number of columns in table tag 
  16460.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND (!isset($dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['cols']))) { 
  16461.                     $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['cols'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['cols']; 
  16462.                 } 
  16463.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'td') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'th')) { 
  16464.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = $csstagarray; 
  16465.                     for ($i = ($dom[$key]['parent'] + 1); $i < $key; ++$i) { 
  16466.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] .= $a[$dom[$i]['elkey']]; 
  16467.                     } 
  16468.                     $key = $i; 
  16469.                     // mark nested tables 
  16470.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = str_replace('<table', '<table nested="true"', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content']); 
  16471.                     // remove thead sections from nested tables 
  16472.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = str_replace('<thead>', '', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content']); 
  16473.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = str_replace('</thead>', '', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content']); 
  16474.                 } 
  16475.                 // store header rows on a new table 
  16476.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead'] === true)) { 
  16477.                     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['thead'])) { 
  16478.                         $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['thead'] = $csstagarray.$a[$dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['elkey']]; 
  16479.                     } 
  16480.                     for ($i = $dom[$key]['parent']; $i <= $key; ++$i) { 
  16481.                         $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['thead'] .= $a[$dom[$i]['elkey']]; 
  16482.                     } 
  16483.                     if (!isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute'])) { 
  16484.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute'] = array(); 
  16485.                     } 
  16486.                     // header elements must be always contained in a single page 
  16487.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr'] = 'true'; 
  16488.                 } 
  16489.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table') AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead']))) { 
  16490.                     // remove the nobr attributes from the table header 
  16491.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead'] = str_replace(' nobr="true"', '', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead']); 
  16492.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead'] .= '</tablehead>'; 
  16493.                 } 
  16494.             } else { 
  16495.                 // *** opening or self-closing html tag 
  16496.                 $dom[$key]['opening'] = true; 
  16497.                 $dom[$key]['parent'] = end($level); 
  16498.                 if ((substr($element, -1, 1) == '/') OR (in_array($dom[$key]['value'], $selfclosingtags))) { 
  16499.                     // self-closing tag 
  16500.                     $dom[$key]['self'] = true; 
  16501.                 } else { 
  16502.                     // opening tag 
  16503.                     array_push($level, $key); 
  16504.                     $dom[$key]['self'] = false; 
  16505.                 } 
  16506.                 // copy some values from parent 
  16507.                 $parentkey = 0; 
  16508.                 if ($key > 0) { 
  16509.                     $parentkey = $dom[$key]['parent']; 
  16510.                     $dom[$key]['hide'] = $dom[$parentkey]['hide']; 
  16511.                     $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fontname']; 
  16512.                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fontstyle']; 
  16513.                     $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fontsize']; 
  16514.                     $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $dom[$parentkey]['font-stretch']; 
  16515.                     $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $dom[$parentkey]['letter-spacing']; 
  16516.                     $dom[$key]['stroke'] = $dom[$parentkey]['stroke']; 
  16517.                     $dom[$key]['fill'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fill']; 
  16518.                     $dom[$key]['clip'] = $dom[$parentkey]['clip']; 
  16519.                     $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[$parentkey]['line-height']; 
  16520.                     $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = $dom[$parentkey]['bgcolor']; 
  16521.                     $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fgcolor']; 
  16522.                     $dom[$key]['strokecolor'] = $dom[$parentkey]['strokecolor']; 
  16523.                     $dom[$key]['align'] = $dom[$parentkey]['align']; 
  16524.                     $dom[$key]['listtype'] = $dom[$parentkey]['listtype']; 
  16525.                     $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = $dom[$parentkey]['text-indent']; 
  16526.                     $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = $dom[$parentkey]['text-transform']; 
  16527.                     $dom[$key]['border'] = array(); 
  16528.                     $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[$parentkey]['dir']; 
  16529.                 } 
  16530.                 // get attributes 
  16531.                 preg_match_all('/([^=\s]*)[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $element, $attr_array, PREG_PATTERN_ORDER); 
  16532.                 $dom[$key]['attribute'] = array(); // reset attribute array 
  16533.                 while (list($id, $name) = each($attr_array[1])) { 
  16534.                     $dom[$key]['attribute'][strtolower($name)] = $attr_array[2][$id]; 
  16535.                 } 
  16536.                 if (!empty($css)) { 
  16537.                     // merge CSS style to current style 
  16538.                     list($dom[$key]['csssel'], $dom[$key]['cssdata']) = TCPDF_STATIC::getCSSdataArray($dom, $key, $css); 
  16539.                     $dom[$key]['attribute']['style'] = TCPDF_STATIC::getTagStyleFromCSSarray($dom[$key]['cssdata']); 
  16540.                 } 
  16541.                 // split style attributes 
  16542.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['style']) AND !empty($dom[$key]['attribute']['style'])) { 
  16543.                     // get style attributes 
  16544.                     preg_match_all('/([^;:\s]*):([^;]*)/', $dom[$key]['attribute']['style'], $style_array, PREG_PATTERN_ORDER); 
  16545.                     $dom[$key]['style'] = array(); // reset style attribute array 
  16546.                     while (list($id, $name) = each($style_array[1])) { 
  16547.                         // in case of duplicate attribute the last replace the previous 
  16548.                         $dom[$key]['style'][strtolower($name)] = trim($style_array[2][$id]); 
  16549.                     } 
  16550.                     // --- get some style attributes --- 
  16551.                     // text direction 
  16552.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['direction'])) { 
  16553.                         $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[$key]['style']['direction']; 
  16554.                     } 
  16555.                     // display 
  16556.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['display'])) { 
  16557.                         $dom[$key]['hide'] = (trim(strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['display'])) == 'none'); 
  16558.                     } 
  16559.                     // font family 
  16560.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-family'])) { 
  16561.                         $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $this->getFontFamilyName($dom[$key]['style']['font-family']); 
  16562.                     } 
  16563.                     // list-style-type 
  16564.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['list-style-type'])) { 
  16565.                         $dom[$key]['listtype'] = trim(strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['list-style-type'])); 
  16566.                         if ($dom[$key]['listtype'] == 'inherit') { 
  16567.                             $dom[$key]['listtype'] = $dom[$parentkey]['listtype']; 
  16568.                         } 
  16569.                     } 
  16570.                     // text-indent 
  16571.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-indent'])) { 
  16572.                         $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['style']['text-indent']); 
  16573.                         if ($dom[$key]['text-indent'] == 'inherit') { 
  16574.                             $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = $dom[$parentkey]['text-indent']; 
  16575.                         } 
  16576.                     } 
  16577.                     // text-transform 
  16578.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-transform'])) { 
  16579.                         $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = $dom[$key]['style']['text-transform']; 
  16580.                     } 
  16581.                     // font size 
  16582.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-size'])) { 
  16583.                         $fsize = trim($dom[$key]['style']['font-size']); 
  16584.                         $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $this->getHTMLFontUnits($fsize, $dom[0]['fontsize'], $dom[$parentkey]['fontsize'], 'pt'); 
  16585.                     } 
  16586.                     // font-stretch 
  16587.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-stretch'])) { 
  16588.                         $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $this->getCSSFontStretching($dom[$key]['style']['font-stretch'], $dom[$parentkey]['font-stretch']); 
  16589.                     } 
  16590.                     // letter-spacing 
  16591.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['letter-spacing'])) { 
  16592.                         $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $this->getCSSFontSpacing($dom[$key]['style']['letter-spacing'], $dom[$parentkey]['letter-spacing']); 
  16593.                     } 
  16594.                     // line-height (internally is the cell height ratio) 
  16595.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['line-height'])) { 
  16596.                         $lineheight = trim($dom[$key]['style']['line-height']); 
  16597.                         switch ($lineheight) { 
  16598.                             // A normal line height. This is default 
  16599.                             case 'normal': { 
  16600.                                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[0]['line-height']; 
  16601.                                 break; 
  16602.                             } 
  16603.                             case 'inherit': { 
  16604.                                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[$parentkey]['line-height']; 
  16605.                             } 
  16606.                             default: { 
  16607.                                 if (is_numeric($lineheight)) { 
  16608.                                     // convert to percentage of font height 
  16609.                                     $lineheight = ($lineheight * 100).'%'; 
  16610.                                 } 
  16611.                                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($lineheight, 1, '%', true); 
  16612.                                 if (substr($lineheight, -1) !== '%') { 
  16613.                                     $dom[$key]['line-height'] = (($dom[$key]['line-height'] - $this->cell_padding['T'] - $this->cell_padding['B']) / $dom[$key]['fontsize']); 
  16614.                                 } 
  16615.                             } 
  16616.                         } 
  16617.                     } 
  16618.                     // font style 
  16619.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-weight'])) { 
  16620.                         if (strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['font-weight'][0]) == 'n') { 
  16621.                             if (strpos($dom[$key]['fontstyle'], 'B') !== false) { 
  16622.                                 $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = str_replace('B', '', $dom[$key]['fontstyle']); 
  16623.                             } 
  16624.                         } elseif (strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['font-weight'][0]) == 'b') { 
  16625.                             $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'B'; 
  16626.                         } 
  16627.                     } 
  16628.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-style']) AND (strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['font-style'][0]) == 'i')) { 
  16629.                         $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'I'; 
  16630.                     } 
  16631.                     // font color 
  16632.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['color']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['style']['color']))) { 
  16633.                         $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['style']['color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16634.                     } elseif ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'a') { 
  16635.                         $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $this->htmlLinkColorArray; 
  16636.                     } 
  16637.                     // background color 
  16638.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['background-color']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['style']['background-color']))) { 
  16639.                         $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['style']['background-color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16640.                     } 
  16641.                     // text-decoration 
  16642.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-decoration'])) { 
  16643.                         $decors = explode(' ', strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['text-decoration'])); 
  16644.                         foreach ($decors as $dec) { 
  16645.                             $dec = trim($dec); 
  16646.                             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dec)) { 
  16647.                                 if ($dec[0] == 'u') { 
  16648.                                     // underline 
  16649.                                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'U'; 
  16650.                                 } elseif ($dec[0] == 'l') { 
  16651.                                     // line-through 
  16652.                                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'D'; 
  16653.                                 } elseif ($dec[0] == 'o') { 
  16654.                                     // overline 
  16655.                                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'O'; 
  16656.                                 } 
  16657.                             } 
  16658.                         } 
  16659.                     } elseif ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'a') { 
  16660.                         $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $this->htmlLinkFontStyle; 
  16661.                     } 
  16662.                     // check for width attribute 
  16663.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['width'])) { 
  16664.                         $dom[$key]['width'] = $dom[$key]['style']['width']; 
  16665.                     } 
  16666.                     // check for height attribute 
  16667.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['height'])) { 
  16668.                         $dom[$key]['height'] = $dom[$key]['style']['height']; 
  16669.                     } 
  16670.                     // check for text alignment 
  16671.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-align'])) { 
  16672.                         $dom[$key]['align'] = strtoupper($dom[$key]['style']['text-align'][0]); 
  16673.                     } 
  16674.                     // check for CSS border properties 
  16675.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border'])) { 
  16676.                         $borderstyle = $this->getCSSBorderStyle($dom[$key]['style']['border']); 
  16677.                         if (!empty($borderstyle)) { 
  16678.                             $dom[$key]['border']['LTRB'] = $borderstyle; 
  16679.                         } 
  16680.                     } 
  16681.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-color'])) { 
  16682.                         $brd_colors = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($dom[$key]['style']['border-color'])); 
  16683.                         if (isset($brd_colors[3])) { 
  16684.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[3], $this->spot_colors); 
  16685.                         } 
  16686.                         if (isset($brd_colors[1])) { 
  16687.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[1], $this->spot_colors); 
  16688.                         } 
  16689.                         if (isset($brd_colors[0])) { 
  16690.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[0], $this->spot_colors); 
  16691.                         } 
  16692.                         if (isset($brd_colors[2])) { 
  16693.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[2], $this->spot_colors); 
  16694.                         } 
  16695.                     } 
  16696.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-width'])) { 
  16697.                         $brd_widths = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($dom[$key]['style']['border-width'])); 
  16698.                         if (isset($brd_widths[3])) { 
  16699.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[3]); 
  16700.                         } 
  16701.                         if (isset($brd_widths[1])) { 
  16702.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[1]); 
  16703.                         } 
  16704.                         if (isset($brd_widths[0])) { 
  16705.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[0]); 
  16706.                         } 
  16707.                         if (isset($brd_widths[2])) { 
  16708.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[2]); 
  16709.                         } 
  16710.                     } 
  16711.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-style'])) { 
  16712.                         $brd_styles = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($dom[$key]['style']['border-style'])); 
  16713.                         if (isset($brd_styles[3]) AND ($brd_styles[3]!='none')) { 
  16714.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16715.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16716.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[3]); 
  16717.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['L']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16718.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['L'] = array(); 
  16719.                             } 
  16720.                         } 
  16721.                         if (isset($brd_styles[1])) { 
  16722.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16723.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16724.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[1]); 
  16725.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['R']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16726.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['R'] = array(); 
  16727.                             } 
  16728.                         } 
  16729.                         if (isset($brd_styles[0])) { 
  16730.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16731.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16732.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[0]); 
  16733.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['T']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16734.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['T'] = array(); 
  16735.                             } 
  16736.                         } 
  16737.                         if (isset($brd_styles[2])) { 
  16738.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16739.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16740.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[2]); 
  16741.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['B']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16742.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['B'] = array(); 
  16743.                             } 
  16744.                         } 
  16745.                     } 
  16746.                     $cellside = array('L' => 'left', 'R' => 'right', 'T' => 'top', 'B' => 'bottom'); 
  16747.                     foreach ($cellside as $bsk => $bsv) { 
  16748.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv])) { 
  16749.                             $borderstyle = $this->getCSSBorderStyle($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv]); 
  16750.                             if (!empty($borderstyle)) { 
  16751.                                 $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk] = $borderstyle; 
  16752.                             } 
  16753.                         } 
  16754.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-color'])) { 
  16755.                             $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16756.                         } 
  16757.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-width'])) { 
  16758.                             $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-width']); 
  16759.                         } 
  16760.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-style'])) { 
  16761.                             $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-style']); 
  16762.                             if ($dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['dash'] < 0) { 
  16763.                                 $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk] = array(); 
  16764.                             } 
  16765.                         } 
  16766.                     } 
  16767.                     // check for CSS padding properties 
  16768.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['padding'])) { 
  16769.                         $dom[$key]['padding'] = $this->getCSSPadding($dom[$key]['style']['padding']); 
  16770.                     } else { 
  16771.                         $dom[$key]['padding'] = $this->cell_padding; 
  16772.                     }
