  17886.                     $trx = sprintf('1 0 0 1 %F %F cm', ($t_x * $this->k), ($yshift * $this->k)); 
  17887.                     $pstart .= "\nq\n".$trx."\n".$pmid."\nQ\n"; 
  17888.                     $endlinepos = strlen($pstart); 
  17889.                     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17890.                         // we are inside an XObject template 
  17891.                         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$pend; 
  17892.                         foreach ($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17893.                             if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  17894.                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  17895.                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  17896.                             } 
  17897.                         } 
  17898.                     } else { 
  17899.                         $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $pstart.$pend); 
  17900.                         // shift the annotations and links 
  17901.                         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17902.                             foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$this->page] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17903.                                 if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  17904.                                     $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  17905.                                     $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  17906.                                 } 
  17907.                             } 
  17908.                         } 
  17909.                     } 
  17910.                     $this->y -= $yshift; 
  17911.                 } 
  17912.             } 
  17913.             $pbrk = $this->checkPageBreak($this->lasth); 
  17914.             $this->newline = false; 
  17915.             $startlinex = $this->x; 
  17916.             $startliney = $this->y; 
  17917.             if ($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['value'] == 'sup') { 
  17918.                 $startliney -= ((0.3 * $this->FontSizePt) / $this->k); 
  17919.             } elseif ($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['value'] == 'sub') { 
  17920.                 $startliney -= (($this->FontSizePt / 0.7) / $this->k); 
  17921.             } else { 
  17922.                 $minstartliney = $startliney; 
  17923.                 $maxbottomliney = ($this->y + $this->getCellHeight($fontsize / $this->k)); 
  17924.             } 
  17925.             $startlinepage = $this->page; 
  17926.             if (isset($endlinepos) AND (!$pbrk)) { 
  17927.                 $startlinepos = $endlinepos; 
  17928.             } else { 
  17929.                 if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17930.                     // we are inside an XObject template 
  17931.                     $startlinepos = strlen($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']); 
  17932.                 } elseif (!$this->InFooter) { 
  17933.                     if (isset($this->footerlen[$this->page])) { 
  17934.                         $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page] - $this->footerlen[$this->page]; 
  17935.                     } else { 
  17936.                         $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  17937.                     } 
  17938.                     $startlinepos = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  17939.                 } else { 
  17940.                     $startlinepos = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  17941.                 } 
  17942.             } 
  17943.             unset($endlinepos); 
  17944.             $plalign = $lalign; 
  17945.             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17946.                 $pask = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]); 
  17947.             } else { 
  17948.                 $pask = 0; 
  17949.             } 
  17950.             if (!($dom[$key]['tag'] AND !$dom[$key]['opening'] AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table') 
  17951.                 AND (isset($this->emptypagemrk[$this->page])) 
  17952.                 AND ($this->emptypagemrk[$this->page] == $this->pagelen[$this->page]))) { 
  17953.                 $this->SetFont($fontname, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  17954.                 if ($wfill) { 
  17955.                     $this->SetFillColorArray($this->bgcolor); 
  17956.                 } 
  17957.             } 
  17958.         } // end newline 
  17959.         if (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  17960.             unset($opentagpos); 
  17961.         } 
  17962.         if ($dom[$key]['tag']) { 
  17963.             if ($dom[$key]['opening']) { 
  17964.                 // get text indentation (if any) 
  17965.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['text-indent']) AND $dom[$key]['block']) { 
  17966.                     $this->textindent = $dom[$key]['text-indent']; 
  17967.                     $this->newline = true; 
  17968.                 } 
  17969.                 // table 
  17970.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table') AND isset($dom[$key]['cols']) AND ($dom[$key]['cols'] > 0)) { 
  17971.                     // available page width 
  17972.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  17973.                         $wtmp = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  17974.                     } else { 
  17975.                         $wtmp = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  17976.                     } 
  17977.                     // get cell spacing 
  17978.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  17979.                         $clsp = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  17980.                         $cellspacing = array('H' => $clsp, 'V' => $clsp); 
  17981.                     } elseif (isset($dom[$key]['border-spacing'])) { 
  17982.                         $cellspacing = $dom[$key]['border-spacing']; 
  17983.                     } else { 
  17984.                         $cellspacing = array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0); 
  17985.                     } 
  17986.                     // table width 
  17987.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['width'])) { 
  17988.                         $table_width = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['width'], $wtmp, 'px'); 
  17989.                     } else { 
  17990.                         $table_width = $wtmp; 
  17991.                     } 
  17992.                     $table_width -= (2 * $cellspacing['H']); 
  17993.                     if (!$this->inthead) { 
  17994.                         $this->y += $cellspacing['V']; 
  17995.                     } 
  17996.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  17997.                         $cellspacingx = -$cellspacing['H']; 
  17998.                     } else { 
  17999.                         $cellspacingx = $cellspacing['H']; 
  18000.                     } 
  18001.                     // total table width without cellspaces 
  18002.                     $table_columns_width = ($table_width - ($cellspacing['H'] * ($dom[$key]['cols'] - 1))); 
  18003.                     // minimum column width 
  18004.                     $table_min_column_width = ($table_columns_width / $dom[$key]['cols']); 
  18005.                     // array of custom column widths 
  18006.                     $table_colwidths = array_fill(0, $dom[$key]['cols'], $table_min_column_width); 
  18007.                 } 
  18008.                 // table row 
  18009.                 if ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') { 
  18010.                     // reset column counter 
  18011.                     $colid = 0; 
  18012.                 } 
  18013.                 // table cell 
  18014.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'td') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'th')) { 
  18015.                     $trid = $dom[$key]['parent']; 
  18016.                     $table_el = $dom[$trid]['parent']; 
  18017.                     if (!isset($dom[$table_el]['cols'])) { 
  18018.                         $dom[$table_el]['cols'] = $dom[$trid]['cols']; 
  18019.                     } 
  18020.                     // store border info 
  18021.                     $tdborder = 0; 
  18022.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['border']) AND !empty($dom[$key]['border'])) { 
  18023.                         $tdborder = $dom[$key]['border']; 
  18024.                     } 
  18025.                     $colspan = intval($dom[$key]['attribute']['colspan']); 
  18026.                     if ($colspan <= 0) { 
  18027.                         $colspan = 1; 
  18028.                     } 
  18029.                     $old_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  18030.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['attribute']['cellpadding'])) { 
  18031.                         $crclpd = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['attribute']['cellpadding'], 1, 'px'); 
  18032.                         $current_cell_padding = array('L' => $crclpd, 'T' => $crclpd, 'R' => $crclpd, 'B' => $crclpd); 
  18033.                     } elseif (isset($dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['padding'])) { 
  18034.                         $current_cell_padding = $dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['padding']; 
  18035.                     } else { 
  18036.                         $current_cell_padding = array('L' => 0, 'T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0); 
  18037.                     } 
  18038.                     $this->cell_padding = $current_cell_padding; 
  18039.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['height'])) { 
  18040.                         // minimum cell height 
  18041.                         $cellh = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['height'], 0, 'px'); 
  18042.                     } else { 
  18043.                         $cellh = 0; 
  18044.                     } 
  18045.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['content'])) { 
  18046.                         $cell_content = stripslashes($dom[$key]['content']); 
  18047.                     } else { 
  18048.                         $cell_content = ' '; 
  18049.                     } 
  18050.                     $tagtype = $dom[$key]['value']; 
  18051.                     $parentid = $key; 
  18052.                     while (($key < $maxel) AND (!(($dom[$key]['tag']) AND (!$dom[$key]['opening']) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == $tagtype) AND ($dom[$key]['parent'] == $parentid)))) { 
  18053.                         // move $key index forward 
  18054.                         ++$key; 
  18055.                     } 
  18056.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['startpage'])) { 
  18057.                         $dom[$trid]['startpage'] = $this->page; 
  18058.                     } else { 
  18059.                         $this->setPage($dom[$trid]['startpage']); 
  18060.                     } 
  18061.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['startcolumn'])) { 
  18062.                         $dom[$trid]['startcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  18063.                     } elseif ($this->current_column != $dom[$trid]['startcolumn']) { 
  18064.                         $tmpx = $this->x; 
  18065.                         $this->selectColumn($dom[$trid]['startcolumn']); 
  18066.                         $this->x = $tmpx; 
  18067.                     } 
  18068.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['starty'])) { 
  18069.                         $dom[$trid]['starty'] = $this->y; 
  18070.                     } else { 
  18071.                         $this->y = $dom[$trid]['starty']; 
  18072.                     } 
  18073.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['startx'])) { 
  18074.                         $dom[$trid]['startx'] = $this->x; 
  18075.                         $this->x += $cellspacingx; 
  18076.                     } else { 
  18077.                         $this->x += ($cellspacingx / 2); 
  18078.                     } 
  18079.                     if (isset($dom[$parentid]['attribute']['rowspan'])) { 
  18080.                         $rowspan = intval($dom[$parentid]['attribute']['rowspan']); 
  18081.                     } else { 
  18082.                         $rowspan = 1; 
  18083.                     } 
  18084.                     // skip row-spanned cells started on the previous rows 
  18085.                     if (isset($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'])) { 
  18086.                         $rsk = 0; 
  18087.                         $rskmax = count($dom[$table_el]['rowspans']); 
  18088.                         while ($rsk < $rskmax) { 
  18089.                             $trwsp = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$rsk]; 
  18090.                             $rsstartx = $trwsp['startx']; 
  18091.                             $rsendx = $trwsp['endx']; 
  18092.                             // account for margin changes 
  18093.                             if ($trwsp['startpage'] < $this->page) { 
  18094.                                 if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['orm'])) { 
  18095.                                     $dl = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['orm']); 
  18096.                                     $rsstartx -= $dl; 
  18097.                                     $rsendx -= $dl; 
  18098.                                 } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['olm'])) { 
  18099.                                     $dl = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['olm']); 
  18100.                                     $rsstartx += $dl; 
  18101.                                     $rsendx += $dl; 
  18102.                                 } 
  18103.                             } 
  18104.                             if (($trwsp['rowspan'] > 0) 
  18105.                                 AND ($rsstartx > ($this->x - $cellspacing['H'] - $current_cell_padding['L'] - $this->feps)) 
  18106.                                 AND ($rsstartx < ($this->x + $cellspacing['H'] + $current_cell_padding['R'] + $this->feps)) 
  18107.                                 AND (($trwsp['starty'] < ($this->y - $this->feps)) OR ($trwsp['startpage'] < $this->page) OR ($trwsp['startcolumn'] < $this->current_column))) { 
  18108.                                 // set the starting X position of the current cell 
  18109.                                 $this->x = $rsendx + $cellspacingx; 
  18110.                                 // increment column indicator 
  18111.                                 $colid += $trwsp['colspan']; 
  18112.                                 if (($trwsp['rowspan'] == 1) 
  18113.                                     AND (isset($dom[$trid]['endy'])) 
  18114.                                     AND (isset($dom[$trid]['endpage'])) 
  18115.                                     AND (isset($dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) 
  18116.                                     AND ($trwsp['endpage'] == $dom[$trid]['endpage']) 
  18117.                                     AND ($trwsp['endcolumn'] == $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18118.                                     // set ending Y position for row 
  18119.                                     $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$rsk]['endy'] = max($dom[$trid]['endy'], $trwsp['endy']); 
  18120.                                     $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$rsk]['endy']; 
  18121.                                 } 
  18122.                                 $rsk = 0; 
  18123.                             } else { 
  18124.                                 ++$rsk; 
  18125.                             } 
  18126.                         } 
  18127.                     } 
  18128.                     if (isset($dom[$parentid]['width'])) { 
  18129.                         // user specified width 
  18130.                         $cellw = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$parentid]['width'], $table_columns_width, 'px'); 
  18131.                         $tmpcw = ($cellw / $colspan); 
  18132.                         for ($i = 0; $i < $colspan; ++$i) { 
  18133.                             $table_colwidths[($colid + $i)] = $tmpcw; 
  18134.                         } 
  18135.                     } else { 
  18136.                         // inherit column width 
  18137.                         $cellw = 0; 
  18138.                         for ($i = 0; $i < $colspan; ++$i) { 
  18139.                             $cellw += $table_colwidths[($colid + $i)]; 
  18140.                         } 
  18141.                     } 
  18142.                     $cellw += (($colspan - 1) * $cellspacing['H']); 
  18143.                     // increment column indicator 
  18144.                     $colid += $colspan; 
  18145.                     // add rowspan information to table element 
  18146.                     if ($rowspan > 1) { 
  18147.                         $trsid = array_push($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'], array('trid' => $trid, 'rowspan' => $rowspan, 'mrowspan' => $rowspan, 'colspan' => $colspan, 'startpage' => $this->page, 'startcolumn' => $this->current_column, 'startx' => $this->x, 'starty' => $this->y)); 
  18148.                     } 
  18149.                     $cellid = array_push($dom[$trid]['cellpos'], array('startx' => $this->x)); 
  18150.                     if ($rowspan > 1) { 
  18151.                         $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['rowspanid'] = ($trsid - 1); 
  18152.                     } 
  18153.                     // push background colors 
  18154.                     if (isset($dom[$parentid]['bgcolor']) AND ($dom[$parentid]['bgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  18155.                         $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['bgcolor'] = $dom[$parentid]['bgcolor']; 
  18156.                     } 
  18157.                     // store border info 
  18158.                     if (isset($tdborder) AND !empty($tdborder)) { 
  18159.                         $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['border'] = $tdborder; 
  18160.                     } 
  18161.                     $prevLastH = $this->lasth; 
  18162.                     // store some info for multicolumn mode 
  18163.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  18164.                         $this->colxshift['x'] = $this->w - $this->x - $this->rMargin; 
  18165.                     } else { 
  18166.                         $this->colxshift['x'] = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  18167.                     } 
  18168.                     $this->colxshift['s'] = $cellspacing; 
  18169.                     $this->colxshift['p'] = $current_cell_padding; 
  18170.                     // ****** write the cell content ****** 
  18171.                     $this->MultiCell($cellw, $cellh, $cell_content, false, $lalign, false, 2, '', '', true, 0, true, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  18172.                     // restore some values 
  18173.                     $this->colxshift = array('x' => 0, 's' => array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0), 'p' => array('L' => 0, 'T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0)); 
  18174.                     $this->lasth = $prevLastH; 
  18175.                     $this->cell_padding = $old_cell_padding; 
  18176.                     $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['endx'] = $this->x; 
  18177.                     // update the end of row position 
  18178.                     if ($rowspan <= 1) { 
  18179.                         if (isset($dom[$trid]['endy'])) { 
  18180.                             if (($this->page == $dom[$trid]['endpage']) AND ($this->current_column == $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18181.                                 $dom[$trid]['endy'] = max($this->y, $dom[$trid]['endy']); 
  18182.                             } elseif (($this->page > $dom[$trid]['endpage']) OR ($this->current_column > $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18183.                                 $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  18184.                             } 
  18185.                         } else { 
  18186.                             $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  18187.                         } 
  18188.                         if (isset($dom[$trid]['endpage'])) { 
  18189.                             $dom[$trid]['endpage'] = max($this->page, $dom[$trid]['endpage']); 
  18190.                         } else { 
  18191.                             $dom[$trid]['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  18192.                         } 
  18193.                         if (isset($dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18194.                             $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'] = max($this->current_column, $dom[$trid]['endcolumn']); 
  18195.                         } else { 
  18196.                             $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  18197.                         } 
  18198.                     } else { 
  18199.                         // account for row-spanned cells 
  18200.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endx'] = $this->x; 
  18201.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  18202.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  18203.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  18204.                     } 
  18205.                     if (isset($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'])) { 
  18206.                         // update endy and endpage on rowspanned cells 
  18207.                         foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  18208.                             if ($trwsp['rowspan'] > 0) { 
  18209.                                 if (isset($dom[$trid]['endpage'])) { 
  18210.                                     if (($trwsp['endpage'] == $dom[$trid]['endpage']) AND ($trwsp['endcolumn'] == $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18211.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = max($dom[$trid]['endy'], $trwsp['endy']); 
  18212.                                     } elseif (($trwsp['endpage'] < $dom[$trid]['endpage']) OR ($trwsp['endcolumn'] < $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18213.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = $dom[$trid]['endy']; 
  18214.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] = $dom[$trid]['endpage']; 
  18215.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] = $dom[$trid]['endcolumn']; 
  18216.                                     } else { 
  18217.                                         $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $this->pagedim[$dom[$trid]['endpage']]['hk'] - $this->pagedim[$dom[$trid]['endpage']]['bm']; 
  18218.                                     } 
  18219.                                 } 
  18220.                             } 
  18221.                         } 
  18222.                     } 
  18223.                     $this->x += ($cellspacingx / 2); 
  18224.                 } else { 
  18225.                     // opening tag (or self-closing tag) 
  18226.                     if (!isset($opentagpos)) { 
  18227.                         if ($this->inxobj) { 
  18228.                             // we are inside an XObject template 
  18229.                             $opentagpos = strlen($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']); 
  18230.                         } elseif (!$this->InFooter) { 
  18231.                             if (isset($this->footerlen[$this->page])) { 
  18232.                                 $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page] - $this->footerlen[$this->page]; 
  18233.                             } else { 
  18234.                                 $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  18235.                             } 
  18236.                             $opentagpos = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  18237.                         } 
  18238.                     } 
  18239.                     $dom = $this->openHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell); 
  18240.                 } 
  18241.             } else { // closing tag 
  18242.                 $prev_numpages = $this->numpages; 
  18243.                 $old_bordermrk = $this->bordermrk[$this->page]; 
  18244.                 $dom = $this->closeHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell, $maxbottomliney); 
  18245.                 if ($this->bordermrk[$this->page] > $old_bordermrk) { 
  18246.                     $startlinepos += ($this->bordermrk[$this->page] - $old_bordermrk); 
  18247.                 } 
  18248.                 if ($prev_numpages > $this->numpages) { 
  18249.                     $startlinepage = $this->page; 
  18250.                 } 
  18251.             } 
  18252.         } elseif (strlen($dom[$key]['value']) > 0) { 
  18253.             // print list-item 
  18254.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lispacer) AND ($this->lispacer != '^')) { 
  18255.                 $this->SetFont($pfontname, $pfontstyle, $pfontsize); 
  18256.                 $this->resetLastH(); 
  18257.                 $minstartliney = $this->y; 
  18258.                 $maxbottomliney = ($startliney + $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize)); 
  18259.                 if (is_numeric($pfontsize) AND ($pfontsize > 0)) { 
  18260.                     $this->putHtmlListBullet($this->listnum, $this->lispacer, $pfontsize); 
  18261.                 } 
  18262.                 $this->SetFont($curfontname, $curfontstyle, $curfontsize); 
  18263.                 $this->resetLastH(); 
  18264.                 if (is_numeric($pfontsize) AND ($pfontsize > 0) AND is_numeric($curfontsize) AND ($curfontsize > 0) AND ($pfontsize != $curfontsize)) { 
  18265.                     $pfontascent = $this->getFontAscent($pfontname, $pfontstyle, $pfontsize); 
  18266.                     $pfontdescent = $this->getFontDescent($pfontname, $pfontstyle, $pfontsize); 
  18267.                     $this->y += ($this->getCellHeight(($pfontsize - $curfontsize) / $this->k) + $pfontascent - $curfontascent - $pfontdescent + $curfontdescent) / 2; 
  18268.                     $minstartliney = min($this->y, $minstartliney); 
  18269.                     $maxbottomliney = max(($this->y + $this->getCellHeight($pfontsize / $this->k)), $maxbottomliney); 
  18270.                 } 
  18271.             } 
  18272.             // text 
  18273.             $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  18274.             if ((!$this->premode) AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  18275.                 // reverse spaces order 
  18276.                 $lsp = ''; // left spaces 
  18277.                 $rsp = ''; // right spaces 
  18278.                 if (preg_match('/^('.$this->re_space['p'].'+)/'.$this->re_space['m'], $dom[$key]['value'], $matches)) { 
  18279.                     $lsp = $matches[1]; 
  18280.                 } 
  18281.                 if (preg_match('/('.$this->re_space['p'].'+)$/'.$this->re_space['m'], $dom[$key]['value'], $matches)) { 
  18282.                     $rsp = $matches[1]; 
  18283.                 } 
  18284.                 $dom[$key]['value'] = $rsp.$this->stringTrim($dom[$key]['value']).$lsp; 
  18285.             } 
  18286.             if ($newline) { 
  18287.                 if (!$this->premode) { 
  18288.                     $prelen = strlen($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18289.                     if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  18290.                         // right trim except non-breaking space 
  18291.                         $dom[$key]['value'] = $this->stringRightTrim($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18292.                     } else { 
  18293.                         // left trim except non-breaking space 
  18294.                         $dom[$key]['value'] = $this->stringLeftTrim($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18295.                     } 
  18296.                     $postlen = strlen($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18297.                     if (($postlen == 0) AND ($prelen > 0)) { 
  18298.                         $dom[$key]['trimmed_space'] = true; 
  18299.                     } 
  18300.                 } 
  18301.                 $newline = false; 
  18302.                 $firstblock = true; 
  18303.             } else { 
  18304.                 $firstblock = false; 
  18305.                 // replace empty multiple spaces string with a single space 
  18306.                 $dom[$key]['value'] = preg_replace('/^'.$this->re_space['p'].'+$/'.$this->re_space['m'], chr(32), $dom[$key]['value']); 
  18307.             } 
  18308.             $strrest = ''; 
  18309.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18310.                 $this->x -= $this->textindent; 
  18311.             } else { 
  18312.                 $this->x += $this->textindent; 
  18313.             } 
  18314.             if (!isset($dom[$key]['trimmed_space']) OR !$dom[$key]['trimmed_space']) { 
  18315.                 $strlinelen = $this->GetStringWidth($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18316.                 if (!empty($this->HREF) AND (isset($this->HREF['url']))) { 
  18317.                     // HTML <a> Link 
  18318.                     $hrefcolor = ''; 
  18319.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fgcolor']) AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  18320.                         $hrefcolor = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fgcolor']; 
  18321.                     } 
  18322.                     $hrefstyle = -1; 
  18323.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontstyle']) AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontstyle'] !== false)) { 
  18324.                         $hrefstyle = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontstyle']; 
  18325.                     } 
  18326.                     $strrest = $this->addHtmlLink($this->HREF['url'], $dom[$key]['value'], $wfill, true, $hrefcolor, $hrefstyle, true); 
  18327.                 } else { 
  18328.                     $wadj = 0; // space to leave for block continuity 
  18329.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  18330.                         $cwa = ($this->x - $this->lMargin); 
  18331.                     } else { 
  18332.                         $cwa = ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x); 
  18333.                     } 
  18334.                     if (($strlinelen < $cwa) AND (isset($dom[($key + 1)])) AND ($dom[($key + 1)]['tag']) AND (!$dom[($key + 1)]['block'])) { 
  18335.                         // check the next text blocks for continuity 
  18336.                         $nkey = ($key + 1); 
  18337.                         $write_block = true; 
  18338.                         $same_textdir = true; 
  18339.                         $tmp_fontname = $this->FontFamily; 
  18340.                         $tmp_fontstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  18341.                         $tmp_fontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  18342.                         while ($write_block AND isset($dom[$nkey])) { 
  18343.                             if ($dom[$nkey]['tag']) { 
  18344.                                 if ($dom[$nkey]['block']) { 
  18345.                                     // end of block 
  18346.                                     $write_block = false; 
  18347.                                 } 
  18348.                                 $tmp_fontname = isset($dom[$nkey]['fontname']) ? $dom[$nkey]['fontname'] : $this->FontFamily; 
  18349.                                 $tmp_fontstyle = isset($dom[$nkey]['fontstyle']) ? $dom[$nkey]['fontstyle'] : $this->FontStyle; 
  18350.                                 $tmp_fontsize = isset($dom[$nkey]['fontsize']) ? $dom[$nkey]['fontsize'] : $this->FontSizePt; 
  18351.                                 $same_textdir = ($dom[$nkey]['dir'] == $dom[$key]['dir']); 
  18352.                             } else { 
  18353.                                 $nextstr = TCPDF_STATIC::pregSplit('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+/', $this->re_space['m'], $dom[$nkey]['value']); 
  18354.                                 if (isset($nextstr[0]) AND $same_textdir) { 
  18355.                                     $wadj += $this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[0], $tmp_fontname, $tmp_fontstyle, $tmp_fontsize); 
  18356.                                     if (isset($nextstr[1])) { 
  18357.                                         $write_block = false; 
  18358.                                     } 
  18359.                                 } 
  18360.                             } 
  18361.                             ++$nkey; 
  18362.                         } 
  18363.                     } 
  18364.                     if (($wadj > 0) AND (($strlinelen + $wadj) >= $cwa)) { 
  18365.                         $wadj = 0; 
  18366.                         $nextstr = TCPDF_STATIC::pregSplit('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'/', $this->re_space['m'], $dom[$key]['value']); 
  18367.                         $numblks = count($nextstr); 
  18368.                         if ($numblks > 1) { 
  18369.                             // try to split on blank spaces 
  18370.                             $wadj = ($cwa - $strlinelen + $this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[($numblks - 1)])); 
  18371.                         } else { 
  18372.                             // set the entire block on new line 
  18373.                             $wadj = $this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[0]); 
  18374.                         } 
  18375.                     } 
  18376.                     // check for reversed text direction 
  18377.                     if (($wadj > 0) AND (($this->rtl AND ($this->tmprtl === 'L')) OR (!$this->rtl AND ($this->tmprtl === 'R')))) { 
  18378.                         // LTR text on RTL direction or RTL text on LTR direction 
  18379.                         $reverse_dir = true; 
  18380.                         $this->rtl = !$this->rtl; 
  18381.                         $revshift = ($strlinelen + $wadj + 0.000001); // add little quantity for rounding problems 
  18382.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  18383.                             $this->x += $revshift; 
  18384.                         } else { 
  18385.                             $this->x -= $revshift; 
  18386.                         } 
  18387.                         $xws = $this->x; 
  18388.                     } 
  18389.                     // ****** write only until the end of the line and get the rest ****** 
  18390.                     $strrest = $this->Write($this->lasth, $dom[$key]['value'], '', $wfill, '', false, 0, true, $firstblock, 0, $wadj); 
  18391.                     // restore default direction 
  18392.                     if ($reverse_dir AND ($wadj == 0)) { 
  18393.                         $this->x = $xws; 
  18394.                         $this->rtl = !$this->rtl; 
  18395.                         $reverse_dir = false; 
  18396.                     } 
  18397.                 } 
  18398.             } 
  18399.             $this->textindent = 0; 
  18400.             if (strlen($strrest) > 0) { 
  18401.                 // store the remaining string on the previous $key position 
  18402.                 $this->newline = true; 
  18403.                 if ($strrest == $dom[$key]['value']) { 
  18404.                     // used to avoid infinite loop 
  18405.                     ++$loop; 
  18406.                 } else { 
  18407.                     $loop = 0; 
  18408.                 } 
  18409.                 $dom[$key]['value'] = $strrest; 
  18410.                 if ($cell) { 
  18411.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  18412.                         $this->x -= $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  18413.                     } else { 
  18414.                         $this->x += $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  18415.                     } 
  18416.                 } 
  18417.                 if ($loop < 3) { 
  18418.                     --$key; 
  18419.                 } 
  18420.             } else { 
  18421.                 $loop = 0; 
  18422.                 // add the positive font spacing of the last character (if any) 
  18423.                  if ($this->font_spacing > 0) { 
  18424.                      if ($this->rtl) { 
  18425.                         $this->x -= $this->font_spacing; 
  18426.                     } else { 
  18427.                         $this->x += $this->font_spacing; 
  18428.                     } 
  18429.                 } 
  18430.             } 
  18431.         } 
  18432.         ++$key; 
  18433.         if (isset($dom[$key]['tag']) AND $dom[$key]['tag'] AND (!isset($dom[$key]['opening']) OR !$dom[$key]['opening']) AND isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr']) AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr'] == 'true')) { 
  18434.             // check if we are on a new page or on a new column 
  18435.             if ((!$undo) AND (($this->y < $this->start_transaction_y) OR (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] < $this->start_transaction_y)))) { 
  18436.                 // we are on a new page or on a new column and the total object height is less than the available vertical space. 
  18437.                 // restore previous object 
  18438.                 $this->rollbackTransaction(true); 
  18439.                 // restore previous values 
  18440.                 foreach ($this_method_vars as $vkey => $vval) { 
  18441.                     $$vkey = $vval; 
  18442.                 } 
  18443.                 if (!empty($dom[$key]['thead'])) { 
  18444.                     $this->inthead = true; 
  18445.                 } 
  18446.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  18447.                 $pre_y = $this->y; 
  18448.                 if ((!$this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1)) AND ($this->y < $pre_y)) { 
  18449.                     $startliney = $this->y; 
  18450.                 } 
  18451.                 $undo = true; // avoid infinite loop 
  18452.             } else { 
  18453.                 $undo = false; 
  18454.             } 
  18455.         } 
  18456.     } // end for each $key 
  18457.     // align the last line 
  18458.     if (isset($startlinex)) { 
  18459.         $yshift = ($minstartliney - $startliney); 
  18460.         if (($yshift > 0) OR ($this->page > $startlinepage)) { 
  18461.             $yshift = 0; 
  18462.         } 
  18463.         $t_x = 0; 
  18464.         // the last line must be shifted to be aligned as requested 
  18465.         $linew = abs($this->endlinex - $startlinex); 
  18466.         if ($this->inxobj) { 
  18467.             // we are inside an XObject template 
  18468.             $pstart = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], 0, $startlinepos); 
  18469.             if (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  18470.                 $midpos = $opentagpos; 
  18471.             } else { 
  18472.                 $midpos = 0; 
  18473.             } 
  18474.             if ($midpos > 0) { 
  18475.                 $pmid = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $startlinepos, ($midpos - $startlinepos)); 
  18476.                 $pend = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $midpos); 
  18477.             } else { 
  18478.                 $pmid = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $startlinepos); 
  18479.                 $pend = ''; 
  18480.             } 
  18481.         } else { 
  18482.             $pstart = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), 0, $startlinepos); 
  18483.             if (isset($opentagpos) AND isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage]) AND (!$this->InFooter)) { 
  18484.                 $this->footerpos[$startlinepage] = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  18485.                 $midpos = min($opentagpos, $this->footerpos[$startlinepage]); 
  18486.             } elseif (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  18487.                 $midpos = $opentagpos; 
  18488.             } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage]) AND (!$this->InFooter)) { 
  18489.                 $this->footerpos[$startlinepage] = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  18490.                 $midpos = $this->footerpos[$startlinepage]; 
  18491.             } else { 
  18492.                 $midpos = 0; 
  18493.             } 
  18494.             if ($midpos > 0) { 
  18495.                 $pmid = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $startlinepos, ($midpos - $startlinepos)); 
  18496.                 $pend = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $midpos); 
  18497.             } else { 
  18498.                 $pmid = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $startlinepos); 
  18499.                 $pend = ''; 
  18500.             } 
  18501.         } 
  18502.         if ((isset($plalign) AND ((($plalign == 'C') OR (($plalign == 'R') AND (!$this->rtl)) OR (($plalign == 'L') AND ($this->rtl)))))) { 
  18503.             // calculate shifting amount 
  18504.             $tw = $w; 
  18505.             if ($this->lMargin != $prevlMargin) { 
  18506.                 $tw += ($prevlMargin - $this->lMargin); 
  18507.             } 
  18508.             if ($this->rMargin != $prevrMargin) { 
  18509.                 $tw += ($prevrMargin - $this->rMargin); 
  18510.             } 
  18511.             $one_space_width = $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)); 
  18512.             $no = 0; // number of spaces on a line contained on a single block 
  18513.             if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { // RTL 
  18514.                 // remove left space if exist 
  18515.                 $pos1 = TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('); 
  18516.                 if ($pos1 > 0) { 
  18517.                     $pos1 = intval($pos1); 
  18518.                     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  18519.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('.chr(0).chr(32))); 
  18520.                         $spacelen = 2; 
  18521.                     } else { 
  18522.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('.chr(32))); 
  18523.                         $spacelen = 1; 
  18524.                     } 
  18525.                     if ($pos1 == $pos2) { 
  18526.                         $pmid = substr($pmid, 0, ($pos1 + 2)).substr($pmid, ($pos1 + 2 + $spacelen)); 
  18527.                         if (substr($pmid, $pos1, 4) == '[()]') { 
  18528.                             $linew -= $one_space_width; 
  18529.                         } elseif ($pos1 == strpos($pmid, '[(')) { 
  18530.                             $no = 1; 
  18531.                         } 
  18532.                     } 
  18533.                 } 
  18534.             } else { // LTR 
  18535.                 // remove right space if exist 
  18536.                 $pos1 = TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, ')]'); 
  18537.                 if ($pos1 > 0) { 
  18538.                     $pos1 = intval($pos1); 
  18539.                     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  18540.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, chr(0).chr(32).')]')) + 2; 
  18541.                         $spacelen = 2; 
  18542.                     } else { 
  18543.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, chr(32).')]')) + 1; 
  18544.                         $spacelen = 1; 
  18545.                     } 
  18546.                     if ($pos1 == $pos2) { 
  18547.                         $pmid = substr($pmid, 0, ($pos1 - $spacelen)).substr($pmid, $pos1); 
  18548.                         $linew -= $one_space_width; 
  18549.                     } 
  18550.                 } 
  18551.             } 
  18552.             $mdiff = ($tw - $linew); 
  18553.             if ($plalign == 'C') { 
  18554.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  18555.                     $t_x = -($mdiff / 2); 
  18556.                 } else { 
  18557.                     $t_x = ($mdiff / 2); 
  18558.                 } 
  18559.             } elseif ($plalign == 'R') { 
  18560.                 // right alignment on LTR document 
  18561.                 $t_x = $mdiff; 
  18562.             } elseif ($plalign == 'L') { 
  18563.                 // left alignment on RTL document 
  18564.                 $t_x = -$mdiff; 
  18565.             } 
  18566.         } // end if startlinex 
  18567.         if (($t_x != 0) OR ($yshift < 0)) { 
  18568.             // shift the line 
  18569.             $trx = sprintf('1 0 0 1 %F %F cm', ($t_x * $this->k), ($yshift * $this->k)); 
  18570.             $pstart .= "\nq\n".$trx."\n".$pmid."\nQ\n"; 
  18571.             $endlinepos = strlen($pstart); 
  18572.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  18573.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  18574.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$pend; 
  18575.                 foreach ($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'] as $pak => $pac) { 
  18576.                     if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  18577.                         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  18578.                         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  18579.                     } 
  18580.                 } 
  18581.             } else { 
  18582.                 $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $pstart.$pend); 
  18583.                 // shift the annotations and links 
  18584.                 if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  18585.                     foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$this->page] as $pak => $pac) { 
  18586.                         if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  18587.                             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  18588.                             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  18589.                         } 
  18590.                     } 
  18591.                 } 
  18592.             } 
  18593.             $this->y -= $yshift; 
  18594.             $yshift = 0; 
  18595.         } 
  18596.     } 
  18597.     // restore previous values 
  18598.     $this->setGraphicVars($gvars); 
  18599.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  18600.         $this->selectColumn(); 
  18601.     } elseif ($this->page > $prevPage) { 
  18602.         $this->lMargin = $this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm']; 
  18603.         $this->rMargin = $this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm']; 
  18604.     } 
  18605.     // restore previous list state 
  18606.     $this->cell_height_ratio = $prev_cell_height_ratio; 
  18607.     $this->listnum = $prev_listnum; 
  18608.     $this->listordered = $prev_listordered; 
  18609.     $this->listcount = $prev_listcount; 
  18610.     $this->lispacer = $prev_lispacer; 
  18611.     if ($ln AND (!($cell AND ($dom[$key-1]['value'] == 'table')))) { 
  18612.         $this->Ln($this->lasth); 
  18613.         if ($this->y < $maxbottomliney) { 
  18614.             $this->y = $maxbottomliney; 
  18615.         } 
  18616.     } 
  18617.     unset($dom); 
  18618. } 
  18619.  
  18620. /** 
  18621.  * Process opening tags. 
  18622.  * @param $dom (array) html dom array 
  18623.  * @param $key (int) current element id 
  18624.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the default left (or right if RTL) padding to each new line (default false). 
  18625.  * @return $dom array 
  18626.  * @protected 
  18627.  */ 
  18628. protected function openHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell) { 
  18629.     $tag = $dom[$key]; 
  18630.     $parent = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]; 
  18631.     $firsttag = ($key == 1); 
  18632.     // check for text direction attribute 
  18633.     if (isset($tag['dir'])) { 
  18634.         $this->setTempRTL($tag['dir']); 
  18635.     } else { 
  18636.         $this->tmprtl = false; 
  18637.     } 
  18638.     if ($tag['block']) { 
  18639.         $hbz = 0; // distance from y to line bottom 
  18640.         $hb = 0; // vertical space between block tags 
  18641.         // calculate vertical space for block tags 
  18642.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['h']) AND ($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['h'] >= 0)) { 
  18643.             $cur_h = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['h']; 
  18644.         } elseif (isset($tag['fontsize'])) { 
  18645.             $cur_h = $this->getCellHeight($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k); 
  18646.         } else { 
  18647.             $cur_h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  18648.         } 
  18649.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['n'])) { 
  18650.             $on = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['n']; 
  18651.         } elseif (preg_match('/[h][0-9]/', $tag['value']) > 0) { 
  18652.             $on = 0.6; 
  18653.         } else { 
  18654.             $on = 1; 
  18655.         } 
  18656.         if ((!isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']])) AND (in_array($tag['value'], array('div', 'dt', 'dd', 'li', 'br', 'hr')))) { 
  18657.             $hb = 0; 
  18658.         } else { 
  18659.             $hb = ($on * $cur_h); 
  18660.         } 
  18661.         if (($this->htmlvspace <= 0) AND ($on > 0)) { 
  18662.             if (isset($parent['fontsize'])) { 
  18663.                 $hbz = (($parent['fontsize'] / $this->k) * $this->cell_height_ratio); 
  18664.             } else { 
  18665.                 $hbz = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  18666.             } 
  18667.         } 
  18668.         if (isset($dom[($key - 1)]) AND ($dom[($key - 1)]['value'] == 'table')) { 
  18669.             // fix vertical space after table 
  18670.             $hbz = 0; 
  18671.         } 
  18672.         // closing vertical space 
  18673.         $hbc = 0; 
  18674.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']) AND ($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h'] >= 0)) { 
  18675.             $pre_h = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']; 
  18676.         } elseif (isset($parent['fontsize'])) { 
  18677.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($parent['fontsize'] / $this->k); 
  18678.         } else { 
  18679.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  18680.         } 
  18681.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n'])) { 
  18682.             $cn = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n']; 
  18683.         } elseif (preg_match('/[h][0-9]/', $tag['value']) > 0) { 
  18684.             $cn = 0.6; 
  18685.         } else { 
  18686.             $cn = 1; 
  18687.         } 
  18688.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1])) { 
  18689.             $hbc = ($cn * $pre_h); 
  18690.         } 
  18691.     } 
  18692.     // Opening tag 
  18693.     switch($tag['value']) { 
  18694.         case 'table': { 
  18695.             $cp = 0; 
  18696.             $cs = 0; 
  18697.             $dom[$key]['rowspans'] = array(); 
  18698.             if (!isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['nested']) OR ($dom[$key]['attribute']['nested'] != 'true')) { 
  18699.                 $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  18700.                 // set table header 
  18701.                 if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['thead'])) { 
  18702.                     // set table header 
  18703.                     $this->thead = $dom[$key]['thead']; 
  18704.                     if (!isset($this->theadMargins) OR (empty($this->theadMargins))) { 
  18705.                         $this->theadMargins = array(); 
  18706.                         $this->theadMargins['cell_padding'] = $this->cell_padding; 
  18707.                         $this->theadMargins['lmargin'] = $this->lMargin; 
  18708.                         $this->theadMargins['rmargin'] = $this->rMargin; 
  18709.                         $this->theadMargins['page'] = $this->page; 
  18710.                         $this->theadMargins['cell'] = $cell; 
  18711.                         $this->theadMargins['gvars'] = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  18712.                     } 
  18713.                 } 
  18714.             } 
  18715.             // store current margins and page 
  18716.             $dom[$key]['old_cell_padding'] = $this->cell_padding; 
  18717.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['cellpadding'])) { 
  18718.                 $pad = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['attribute']['cellpadding'], 1, 'px'); 
  18719.                 $this->SetCellPadding($pad); 
  18720.             } elseif (isset($tag['padding'])) { 
  18721.                 $this->cell_padding = $tag['padding']; 
  18722.             } 
  18723.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  18724.                 $cs = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  18725.             } elseif (isset($tag['border-spacing'])) { 
  18726.                 $cs = $tag['border-spacing']['V']; 
  18727.             } 
  18728.             $prev_y = $this->y; 
  18729.             if ($this->checkPageBreak(((2 * $cp) + (2 * $cs) + $this->lasth), '', false) OR ($this->y < $prev_y)) { 
  18730.                 $this->inthead = true; 
  18731.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  18732.                 $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  18733.             } 
  18734.             break; 
  18735.         } 
  18736.         case 'tr': { 
  18737.             // array of columns positions 
  18738.             $dom[$key]['cellpos'] = array(); 
  18739.             break; 
  18740.         } 
  18741.         case 'hr': { 
  18742.             if ((isset($tag['height'])) AND ($tag['height'] != '')) { 
  18743.                 $hrHeight = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['height'], 1, 'px'); 
  18744.             } else { 
  18745.                 $hrHeight = $this->GetLineWidth(); 
  18746.             } 
  18747.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, max($hb, ($hrHeight / 2)), $cell, $firsttag); 
  18748.             $x = $this->GetX(); 
  18749.             $y = $this->GetY(); 
  18750.             $wtmp = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  18751.             if ($cell) { 
  18752.                 $wtmp -= ($this->cell_padding['L'] + $this->cell_padding['R']); 
  18753.             } 
  18754.             if ((isset($tag['width'])) AND ($tag['width'] != '')) { 
  18755.                 $hrWidth = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['width'], $wtmp, 'px'); 
  18756.             } else { 
  18757.                 $hrWidth = $wtmp; 
  18758.             } 
  18759.             $prevlinewidth = $this->GetLineWidth(); 
  18760.             $this->SetLineWidth($hrHeight); 
  18761.             $this->Line($x, $y, $x + $hrWidth, $y); 
  18762.             $this->SetLineWidth($prevlinewidth); 
  18763.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(max($hbc, ($hrHeight / 2)), 0, $cell, !isset($dom[($key + 1)])); 
  18764.             break; 
  18765.         } 
  18766.         case 'a': { 
  18767.             if (array_key_exists('href', $tag['attribute'])) { 
  18768.                 $this->HREF['url'] = $tag['attribute']['href']; 
  18769.             } 
  18770.             break; 
  18771.         } 
  18772.         case 'img': { 
  18773.             if (!empty($tag['attribute']['src'])) { 
  18774.                 if ($tag['attribute']['src'][0] === '@') { 
  18775.                     // data stream 
  18776.                     $tag['attribute']['src'] = '@'.base64_decode(substr($tag['attribute']['src'], 1)); 
  18777.                     $type = ''; 
  18778.                 } else { 
  18779.                     // get image type 
  18780.                     $type = TCPDF_IMAGES::getImageFileType($tag['attribute']['src']); 
  18781.                 } 
  18782.                 if (!isset($tag['width'])) { 
  18783.                     $tag['width'] = 0; 
  18784.                 } 
  18785.                 if (!isset($tag['height'])) { 
  18786.                     $tag['height'] = 0; 
  18787.                 } 
  18788.                 //if (!isset($tag['attribute']['align'])) { 
  18789.                     // the only alignment supported is "bottom" 
  18790.                     // further development is required for other modes. 
  18791.                     $tag['attribute']['align'] = 'bottom'; 
  18792.                 //} 
  18793.                 switch($tag['attribute']['align']) { 
  18794.                     case 'top': { 
  18795.                         $align = 'T'; 
  18796.                         break; 
  18797.                     } 
  18798.                     case 'middle': { 
  18799.                         $align = 'M'; 
  18800.                         break; 
  18801.                     } 
  18802.                     case 'bottom': { 
  18803.                         $align = 'B'; 
  18804.                         break; 
  18805.                     } 
  18806.                     default: { 
  18807.                         $align = 'B'; 
  18808.                         break; 
  18809.                     } 
  18810.                 } 
  18811.                 $prevy = $this->y; 
  18812.                 $xpos = $this->x; 
  18813.                 $imglink = ''; 
  18814.                 if (isset($this->HREF['url']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->HREF['url'])) { 
  18815.                     $imglink = $this->HREF['url']; 
  18816.                     if ($imglink[0] == '#') { 
  18817.                         // convert url to internal link 
  18818.                         $lnkdata = explode(', ', $imglink); 
  18819.                         if (isset($lnkdata[0])) { 
  18820.                             $page = intval(substr($lnkdata[0], 1)); 
  18821.                             if (empty($page) OR ($page <= 0)) { 
  18822.                                 $page = $this->page; 
  18823.                             } 
  18824.                             if (isset($lnkdata[1]) AND (strlen($lnkdata[1]) > 0)) { 
  18825.                                 $lnky = floatval($lnkdata[1]); 
  18826.                             } else { 
  18827.                                 $lnky = 0; 
  18828.                             } 
  18829.                             $imglink = $this->AddLink(); 
  18830.                             $this->SetLink($imglink, $lnky, $page); 
  18831.                         } 
  18832.                     } 
  18833.                 } 
  18834.                 $border = 0; 
  18835.                 if (isset($tag['border']) AND !empty($tag['border'])) { 
  18836.                     // currently only support 1 (frame) or a combination of 'LTRB' 
  18837.                     $border = $tag['border']; 
  18838.                 } 
  18839.                 $iw = ''; 
  18840.                 if (isset($tag['width'])) { 
  18841.                     $iw = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['width'], ($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k), 'px', false); 
  18842.                 } 
  18843.                 $ih = ''; 
  18844.                 if (isset($tag['height'])) { 
  18845.                     $ih = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['height'], ($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k), 'px', false); 
  18846.                 } 
  18847.                 if (($type == 'eps') OR ($type == 'ai')) { 
  18848.                     $this->ImageEps($tag['attribute']['src'], $xpos, $this->y, $iw, $ih, $imglink, true, $align, '', $border, true); 
  18849.                 } elseif ($type == 'svg') { 
  18850.                     $this->ImageSVG($tag['attribute']['src'], $xpos, $this->y, $iw, $ih, $imglink, $align, '', $border, true); 
  18851.                 } else { 
  18852.                     $this->Image($tag['attribute']['src'], $xpos, $this->y, $iw, $ih, '', $imglink, $align, false, 300, '', false, false, $border, false, false, true); 
  18853.                 } 
  18854.                 switch($align) { 
  18855.                     case 'T': { 
  18856.                         $this->y = $prevy; 
  18857.                         break; 
  18858.                     } 
  18859.                     case 'M': { 
  18860.                         $this->y = (($this->img_rb_y + $prevy - ($this->getCellHeight($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k))) / 2); 
  18861.                         break; 
  18862.                     } 
  18863.                     case 'B': { 
  18864.                         $this->y = $this->img_rb_y - ($this->getCellHeight($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k) - ($this->getFontDescent($tag['fontname'], $tag['fontstyle'], $tag['fontsize']) * $this->cell_height_ratio)); 
  18865.                         break; 
  18866.                     } 
  18867.                 } 
  18868.             } 
  18869.             break; 
  18870.         } 
  18871.         case 'dl': { 
  18872.             ++$this->listnum; 
  18873.             if ($this->listnum == 1) { 
  18874.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18875.             } else { 
  18876.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18877.             } 
  18878.             break; 
  18879.         } 
  18880.         case 'dt': { 
  18881.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18882.             break; 
  18883.         } 
  18884.         case 'dd': { 
  18885.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18886.                 $this->rMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18887.             } else { 
  18888.                 $this->lMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18889.             } 
  18890.             ++$this->listindentlevel; 
  18891.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18892.             break; 
  18893.         } 
  18894.         case 'ul': 
  18895.         case 'ol': { 
  18896.             ++$this->listnum; 
  18897.             if ($tag['value'] == 'ol') { 
  18898.                 $this->listordered[$this->listnum] = true; 
  18899.             } else { 
  18900.                 $this->listordered[$this->listnum] = false; 
  18901.             } 
  18902.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['start'])) { 
  18903.                 $this->listcount[$this->listnum] = intval($tag['attribute']['start']) - 1; 
  18904.             } else { 
  18905.                 $this->listcount[$this->listnum] = 0; 
  18906.             } 
  18907.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18908.                 $this->rMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18909.                 $this->x -= $this->listindent; 
  18910.             } else { 
  18911.                 $this->lMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18912.                 $this->x += $this->listindent; 
  18913.             } 
  18914.             ++$this->listindentlevel; 
  18915.             if ($this->listnum == 1) { 
  18916.                 if ($key > 1) { 
  18917.                     $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18918.                 } 
  18919.             } else { 
  18920.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18921.             } 
  18922.             break; 
  18923.         } 
  18924.         case 'li': { 
  18925.             if ($key > 2) { 
  18926.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18927.             } 
  18928.             if ($this->listordered[$this->listnum]) { 
  18929.                 // ordered item 
  18930.                 if (isset($parent['attribute']['type']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['attribute']['type'])) { 
  18931.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['attribute']['type']; 
  18932.                 } elseif (isset($parent['listtype']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['listtype'])) { 
  18933.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['listtype']; 
  18934.                 } elseif (isset($this->lisymbol) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lisymbol)) { 
  18935.                     $this->lispacer = $this->lisymbol; 
  18936.                 } else { 
  18937.                     $this->lispacer = '#'; 
  18938.                 } 
  18939.                 ++$this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  18940.                 if (isset($tag['attribute']['value'])) { 
  18941.                     $this->listcount[$this->listnum] = intval($tag['attribute']['value']); 
  18942.                 } 
  18943.             } else { 
  18944.                 // unordered item 
  18945.                 if (isset($parent['attribute']['type']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['attribute']['type'])) { 
  18946.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['attribute']['type']; 
  18947.                 } elseif (isset($parent['listtype']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['listtype'])) { 
  18948.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['listtype']; 
  18949.                 } elseif (isset($this->lisymbol) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lisymbol)) { 
  18950.                     $this->lispacer = $this->lisymbol; 
  18951.                 } else { 
  18952.                     $this->lispacer = '!'; 
  18953.                 } 
  18954.             } 
  18955.             break; 
  18956.         } 
  18957.         case 'blockquote': { 
  18958.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18959.                 $this->rMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18960.             } else { 
  18961.                 $this->lMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18962.             } 
  18963.             ++$this->listindentlevel; 
  18964.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18965.             break; 
  18966.         } 
  18967.         case 'br': { 
  18968.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18969.             break; 
  18970.         } 
  18971.         case 'div': { 
  18972.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18973.             break; 
  18974.         } 
  18975.         case 'p': { 
  18976.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18977.             break; 
  18978.         } 
  18979.         case 'pre': { 
  18980.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18981.             $this->premode = true; 
  18982.             break; 
  18983.         } 
  18984.         case 'sup': { 
  18985.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() - ((0.7 * $this->FontSizePt) / $this->k)); 
  18986.             break; 
  18987.         } 
  18988.         case 'sub': { 
  18989.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() + ((0.3 * $this->FontSizePt) / $this->k)); 
  18990.             break; 
  18991.         } 
  18992.         case 'h1': 
  18993.         case 'h2': 
  18994.         case 'h3': 
  18995.         case 'h4': 
  18996.         case 'h5': 
  18997.         case 'h6': { 
  18998.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18999.             break; 
  19000.         } 
  19001.         // Form fields (since 4.8.000 - 2009-09-07) 
  19002.         case 'form': { 
  19003.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['action'])) { 
  19004.                 $this->form_action = $tag['attribute']['action']; 
  19005.             } else { 
  19006.                 $this->Error('Please explicitly set action attribute path!'); 
  19007.             } 
  19008.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['enctype'])) { 
  19009.                 $this->form_enctype = $tag['attribute']['enctype']; 
  19010.             } else { 
  19011.                 $this->form_enctype = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'; 
  19012.             } 
  19013.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['method'])) { 
  19014.                 $this->form_mode = $tag['attribute']['method']; 
  19015.             } else { 
  19016.                 $this->form_mode = 'post'; 
  19017.             } 
  19018.             break; 
  19019.         } 
  19020.         case 'input': { 
  19021.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['name'])) { 
  19022.                 $name = $tag['attribute']['name']; 
  19023.             } else { 
  19024.                 break; 
  19025.             } 
  19026.             $prop = array(); 
  19027.             $opt = array(); 
  19028.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['readonly']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['readonly'])) { 
  19029.                 $prop['readonly'] = true; 
  19030.             } 
  19031.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['value']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['value'])) { 
  19032.                 $value = $tag['attribute']['value']; 
  19033.             } 
  19034.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['maxlength']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['maxlength'])) { 
  19035.                 $opt['maxlen'] = intval($tag['attribute']['maxlength']); 
  19036.             } 
  19037.             $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19038.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['size']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['size'])) { 
  19039.                 $w = intval($tag['attribute']['size']) * $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)) * 2; 
  19040.             } else { 
  19041.                 $w = $h; 
  19042.             } 
  19043.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['checked']) AND (($tag['attribute']['checked'] == 'checked') OR ($tag['attribute']['checked'] == 'true'))) { 
  19044.                 $checked = true; 
  19045.             } else { 
  19046.                 $checked = false; 
  19047.             } 
  19048.             if (isset($tag['align'])) { 
  19049.                 switch ($tag['align']) { 
  19050.                     case 'C': { 
  19051.                         $opt['q'] = 1; 
  19052.                         break; 
  19053.                     } 
  19054.                     case 'R': { 
  19055.                         $opt['q'] = 2; 
  19056.                         break; 
  19057.                     } 
  19058.                     case 'L': 
  19059.                     default: { 
  19060.                         break; 
  19061.                     } 
  19062.                 } 
  19063.             } 
  19064.             switch ($tag['attribute']['type']) { 
  19065.                 case 'text': { 
  19066.                     if (isset($value)) { 
  19067.                         $opt['v'] = $value; 
  19068.                     } 
  19069.                     $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19070.                     break; 
  19071.                 } 
  19072.                 case 'password': { 
  19073.                     if (isset($value)) { 
  19074.                         $opt['v'] = $value; 
  19075.                     } 
  19076.                     $prop['password'] = 'true'; 
  19077.                     $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19078.                     break; 
  19079.                 } 
  19080.                 case 'checkbox': { 
  19081.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19082.                         break; 
  19083.                     } 
  19084.                     $this->CheckBox($name, $w, $checked, $prop, $opt, $value, '', '', false); 
  19085.                     break; 
  19086.                 } 
  19087.                 case 'radio': { 
  19088.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19089.                         break; 
  19090.                     } 
  19091.                     $this->RadioButton($name, $w, $prop, $opt, $value, $checked, '', '', false); 
  19092.                     break; 
  19093.                 } 
  19094.                 case 'submit': { 
  19095.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19096.                         $value = 'submit'; 
  19097.                     } 
  19098.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 1.5; 
  19099.                     $h *= 1.6; 
  19100.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19101.                     $action = array(); 
  19102.                     $action['S'] = 'SubmitForm'; 
  19103.                     $action['F'] = $this->form_action; 
  19104.                     if ($this->form_enctype != 'FDF') { 
  19105.                         $action['Flags'] = array('ExportFormat'); 
  19106.                     } 
  19107.                     if ($this->form_mode == 'get') { 
  19108.                         $action['Flags'] = array('GetMethod'); 
  19109.                     } 
  19110.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, $action, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19111.                     break; 
  19112.                 } 
  19113.                 case 'reset': { 
  19114.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19115.                         $value = 'reset'; 
  19116.                     } 
  19117.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 1.5; 
  19118.                     $h *= 1.6; 
  19119.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19120.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, array('S'=>'ResetForm'), $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19121.                     break; 
  19122.                 } 
  19123.                 case 'file': { 
  19124.                     $prop['fileSelect'] = 'true'; 
  19125.                     $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19126.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19127.                         $value = '*'; 
  19128.                     } 
  19129.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 2; 
  19130.                     $h *= 1.2; 
  19131.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19132.                     $jsaction = 'var f=this.getField(\''.$name.'\'); f.browseForFileToSubmit();'; 
  19133.                     $this->Button('FB_'.$name, $w, $h, $value, $jsaction, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19134.                     break; 
  19135.                 } 
  19136.                 case 'hidden': { 
  19137.                     if (isset($value)) { 
  19138.                         $opt['v'] = $value; 
  19139.                     } 
  19140.                     $opt['f'] = array('invisible', 'hidden'); 
  19141.                     $this->TextField($name, 0, 0, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19142.                     break; 
  19143.                 } 
  19144.                 case 'image': { 
  19145.                     // THIS TYPE MUST BE FIXED 
  19146.                     if (isset($tag['attribute']['src']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['src'])) { 
  19147.                         $img = $tag['attribute']['src']; 
  19148.                     } else { 
  19149.                         break; 
  19150.                     } 
  19151.                     $value = 'img'; 
  19152.                     //$opt['mk'] = array('i'=>$img, 'tp'=>1, 'if'=>array('sw'=>'A', 's'=>'A', 'fb'=>false)); 
  19153.                     if (isset($tag['attribute']['onclick']) AND !empty($tag['attribute']['onclick'])) { 
  19154.                         $jsaction = $tag['attribute']['onclick']; 
  19155.                     } else { 
  19156.                         $jsaction = ''; 
  19157.                     } 
  19158.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, $jsaction, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19159.                     break; 
  19160.                 } 
  19161.                 case 'button': { 
  19162.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19163.                         $value = ' '; 
  19164.                     } 
  19165.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 1.5; 
  19166.                     $h *= 1.6; 
  19167.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19168.                     if (isset($tag['attribute']['onclick']) AND !empty($tag['attribute']['onclick'])) { 
  19169.                         $jsaction = $tag['attribute']['onclick']; 
  19170.                     } else { 
  19171.                         $jsaction = ''; 
  19172.                     } 
  19173.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, $jsaction, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19174.                     break; 
  19175.                 } 
  19176.             } 
  19177.             break; 
  19178.         } 
  19179.         case 'textarea': { 
  19180.             $prop = array(); 
  19181.             $opt = array(); 
  19182.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['readonly']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['readonly'])) { 
  19183.                 $prop['readonly'] = true; 
  19184.             } 
  19185.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['name'])) { 
  19186.                 $name = $tag['attribute']['name']; 
  19187.             } else { 
  19188.                 break; 
  19189.             } 
  19190.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['value']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['value'])) { 
  19191.                 $opt['v'] = $tag['attribute']['value']; 
  19192.             } 
  19193.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['cols']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['cols'])) { 
  19194.                 $w = intval($tag['attribute']['cols']) * $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)) * 2; 
  19195.             } else { 
  19196.                 $w = 40; 
  19197.             } 
  19198.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['rows']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['rows'])) { 
  19199.                 $h = intval($tag['attribute']['rows']) * $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19200.             } else { 
  19201.                 $h = 10; 
  19202.             } 
  19203.             $prop['multiline'] = 'true'; 
  19204.             $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19205.             break; 
  19206.         } 
  19207.         case 'select': { 
  19208.             $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19209.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['size']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['size'])) { 
  19210.                 $h *= ($tag['attribute']['size'] + 1); 
  19211.             } 
  19212.             $prop = array(); 
  19213.             $opt = array(); 
  19214.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['name'])) { 
  19215.                 $name = $tag['attribute']['name']; 
  19216.             } else { 
  19217.                 break; 
  19218.             } 
  19219.             $w = 0; 
  19220.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['opt']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['opt'])) { 
  19221.                 $options = explode('#!NwL!#', $tag['attribute']['opt']); 
  19222.                 $values = array(); 
  19223.                 foreach ($options as $val) { 
  19224.                     if (strpos($val, '#!TaB!#') !== false) { 
  19225.                         $opts = explode('#!TaB!#', $val); 
  19226.                         $values[] = $opts; 
  19227.                         $w = max($w, $this->GetStringWidth($opts[1]));
