  19228.                     } else { 
  19229.                         $values[] = $val; 
  19230.                         $w = max($w, $this->GetStringWidth($val)); 
  19231.                     } 
  19232.                 } 
  19233.             } else { 
  19234.                 break; 
  19235.             } 
  19236.             $w *= 2; 
  19237.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['multiple']) AND ($tag['attribute']['multiple']='multiple')) { 
  19238.                 $prop['multipleSelection'] = 'true'; 
  19239.                 $this->ListBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19240.             } else { 
  19241.                 $this->ComboBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19242.             } 
  19243.             break; 
  19244.         } 
  19245.         case 'tcpdf': { 
  19246.             if (defined('K_TCPDF_CALLS_IN_HTML') AND (K_TCPDF_CALLS_IN_HTML === true)) { 
  19247.                 // Special tag used to call TCPDF methods 
  19248.                 if (isset($tag['attribute']['method'])) { 
  19249.                     $tcpdf_method = $tag['attribute']['method']; 
  19250.                     if (method_exists($this, $tcpdf_method)) { 
  19251.                         if (isset($tag['attribute']['params']) AND (!empty($tag['attribute']['params']))) { 
  19252.                             $params = unserialize(urldecode($tag['attribute']['params'])); 
  19253.                             call_user_func_array(array($this, $tcpdf_method), $params); 
  19254.                         } else { 
  19255.                             $this->$tcpdf_method(); 
  19256.                         } 
  19257.                         $this->newline = true; 
  19258.                     } 
  19259.                 } 
  19260.             } 
  19261.             break; 
  19262.         } 
  19263.         default: { 
  19264.             break; 
  19265.         } 
  19266.     } 
  19267.     // define tags that support borders and background colors 
  19268.     $bordertags = array('blockquote', 'br', 'dd', 'dl', 'div', 'dt', 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6', 'hr', 'li', 'ol', 'p', 'pre', 'ul', 'tcpdf', 'table'); 
  19269.     if (in_array($tag['value'], $bordertags)) { 
  19270.         // set border 
  19271.         $dom[$key]['borderposition'] = $this->getBorderStartPosition(); 
  19272.     } 
  19273.     if ($dom[$key]['self'] AND isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreakafter'])) { 
  19274.         $pba = $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreakafter']; 
  19275.         // check for pagebreak 
  19276.         if (($pba == 'true') OR ($pba == 'left') OR ($pba == 'right')) { 
  19277.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19278.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19279.         } 
  19280.         if ((($pba == 'left') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)))) 
  19281.             OR (($pba == 'right') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0))))) { 
  19282.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19283.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19284.         } 
  19285.     } 
  19286.     return $dom; 
  19287. } 
  19288.  
  19289. /** 
  19290.  * Process closing tags. 
  19291.  * @param $dom (array) html dom array 
  19292.  * @param $key (int) current element id 
  19293.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the default left (or right if RTL) padding to each new line (default false). 
  19294.  * @param $maxbottomliney (int) maximum y value of current line 
  19295.  * @return $dom array 
  19296.  * @protected 
  19297.  */ 
  19298. protected function closeHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell, $maxbottomliney=0) { 
  19299.     $tag = $dom[$key]; 
  19300.     $parent = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]; 
  19301.     $lasttag = ((!isset($dom[($key + 1)])) OR ((!isset($dom[($key + 2)])) AND ($dom[($key + 1)]['value'] == 'marker'))); 
  19302.     $in_table_head = false; 
  19303.     // maximum x position (used to draw borders) 
  19304.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19305.         $xmax = $this->w; 
  19306.     } else { 
  19307.         $xmax = 0; 
  19308.     } 
  19309.     if ($tag['block']) { 
  19310.         $hbz = 0; // distance from y to line bottom 
  19311.         $hb = 0; // vertical space between block tags 
  19312.         // calculate vertical space for block tags 
  19313.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']) AND ($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h'] >= 0)) { 
  19314.             $pre_h = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']; 
  19315.         } elseif (isset($parent['fontsize'])) { 
  19316.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($parent['fontsize'] / $this->k); 
  19317.         } else { 
  19318.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19319.         } 
  19320.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n'])) { 
  19321.             $cn = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n']; 
  19322.         } elseif (preg_match('/[h][0-9]/', $tag['value']) > 0) { 
  19323.             $cn = 0.6; 
  19324.         } else { 
  19325.             $cn = 1; 
  19326.         } 
  19327.         if ((!isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']])) AND ($tag['value'] == 'div')) { 
  19328.             $hb = 0; 
  19329.         } else { 
  19330.             $hb = ($cn * $pre_h); 
  19331.         } 
  19332.         if ($maxbottomliney > $this->PageBreakTrigger) { 
  19333.             $hbz = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19334.         } elseif ($this->y < $maxbottomliney) { 
  19335.             $hbz = ($maxbottomliney - $this->y); 
  19336.         } 
  19337.     } 
  19338.     // Closing tag 
  19339.     switch($tag['value']) { 
  19340.         case 'tr': { 
  19341.             $table_el = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent']; 
  19342.             if (!isset($parent['endy'])) { 
  19343.                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  19344.                 $parent['endy'] = $this->y; 
  19345.             } 
  19346.             if (!isset($parent['endpage'])) { 
  19347.                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  19348.                 $parent['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  19349.             } 
  19350.             if (!isset($parent['endcolumn'])) { 
  19351.                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  19352.                 $parent['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  19353.             } 
  19354.             // update row-spanned cells 
  19355.             if (isset($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'])) { 
  19356.                 foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19357.                     $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] -= 1; 
  19358.                     if ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] == 0) { 
  19359.                         if (($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] == $parent['endpage']) AND ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] == $parent['endcolumn'])) { 
  19360.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'], $parent['endy']); 
  19361.                         } elseif (($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] > $parent['endpage']) OR ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] > $parent['endcolumn'])) { 
  19362.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy']; 
  19363.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage']; 
  19364.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn']; 
  19365.                         } 
  19366.                     } 
  19367.                 } 
  19368.                 // report new endy and endpage to the rowspanned cells 
  19369.                 foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19370.                     if ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] == 0) { 
  19371.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'], $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage']); 
  19372.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage']; 
  19373.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'], $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn']); 
  19374.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn']; 
  19375.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'], $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy']); 
  19376.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy']; 
  19377.                     } 
  19378.                 } 
  19379.                 // update remaining rowspanned cells 
  19380.                 foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19381.                     if ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] == 0) { 
  19382.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage']; 
  19383.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn']; 
  19384.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy']; 
  19385.                     } 
  19386.                 } 
  19387.             } 
  19388.             $this->setPage($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage']); 
  19389.             if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  19390.                 $this->selectColumn($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn']); 
  19391.             } 
  19392.             $this->y = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy']; 
  19393.             if (isset($dom[$table_el]['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  19394.                 $this->y += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$table_el]['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  19395.             } elseif (isset($dom[$table_el]['border-spacing'])) { 
  19396.                 $this->y += $dom[$table_el]['border-spacing']['V']; 
  19397.             } 
  19398.             $this->Ln(0, $cell); 
  19399.             if ($this->current_column == $parent['startcolumn']) { 
  19400.                 $this->x = $parent['startx']; 
  19401.             } 
  19402.             // account for booklet mode 
  19403.             if ($this->page > $parent['startpage']) { 
  19404.                 if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['orm'])) { 
  19405.                     $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['orm']); 
  19406.                 } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['olm'])) { 
  19407.                     $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['olm']); 
  19408.                 } 
  19409.             } 
  19410.             break; 
  19411.         } 
  19412.         case 'tablehead': 
  19413.             // closing tag used for the thead part 
  19414.             $in_table_head = true; 
  19415.             $this->inthead = false; 
  19416.         case 'table': { 
  19417.             $table_el = $parent; 
  19418.             // set default border 
  19419.             if (isset($table_el['attribute']['border']) AND ($table_el['attribute']['border'] > 0)) { 
  19420.                 // set default border 
  19421.                 $border = array('LTRB' => array('width' => $this->getCSSBorderWidth($table_el['attribute']['border']), 'cap'=>'square', 'join'=>'miter', 'dash'=> 0, 'color'=>array(0, 0, 0))); 
  19422.             } else { 
  19423.                 $border = 0; 
  19424.             } 
  19425.             $default_border = $border; 
  19426.             // fix bottom line alignment of last line before page break 
  19427.             foreach ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['trids'] as $j => $trkey) { 
  19428.                 // update row-spanned cells 
  19429.                 if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'])) { 
  19430.                     foreach ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19431.                         if (isset($prevtrkey) AND ($trwsp['trid'] == $prevtrkey) AND ($trwsp['mrowspan'] > 0)) { 
  19432.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['trid'] = $trkey; 
  19433.                         } 
  19434.                         if ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['trid'] == $trkey) { 
  19435.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['mrowspan'] -= 1; 
  19436.                         } 
  19437.                     } 
  19438.                 } 
  19439.                 if (isset($prevtrkey) AND ($dom[$trkey]['startpage'] > $dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage'])) { 
  19440.                     $pgendy = $this->pagedim[$dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage']]['hk'] - $this->pagedim[$dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage']]['bm']; 
  19441.                     $dom[$prevtrkey]['endy'] = $pgendy; 
  19442.                     // update row-spanned cells 
  19443.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'])) { 
  19444.                         foreach ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19445.                             if (($trwsp['trid'] == $trkey) AND ($trwsp['mrowspan'] > 1) AND ($trwsp['endpage'] == $dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage'])) { 
  19446.                                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = $pgendy; 
  19447.                                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['mrowspan'] = -1; 
  19448.                             } 
  19449.                         } 
  19450.                     } 
  19451.                 } 
  19452.                 $prevtrkey = $trkey; 
  19453.                 $table_el = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]; 
  19454.             } 
  19455.             // for each row 
  19456.             if (count($table_el['trids']) > 0) { 
  19457.                 unset($xmax); 
  19458.             } 
  19459.             foreach ($table_el['trids'] as $j => $trkey) { 
  19460.                 $parent = $dom[$trkey]; 
  19461.                 if (!isset($xmax)) { 
  19462.                     $xmax = $parent['cellpos'][(count($parent['cellpos']) - 1)]['endx']; 
  19463.                 } 
  19464.                 // for each cell on the row 
  19465.                 foreach ($parent['cellpos'] as $k => $cellpos) { 
  19466.                     if (isset($cellpos['rowspanid']) AND ($cellpos['rowspanid'] >= 0)) { 
  19467.                         $cellpos['startx'] = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['startx']; 
  19468.                         $cellpos['endx'] = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endx']; 
  19469.                         $endy = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endy']; 
  19470.                         $startpage = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['startpage']; 
  19471.                         $endpage = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endpage']; 
  19472.                         $startcolumn = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['startcolumn']; 
  19473.                         $endcolumn = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endcolumn']; 
  19474.                     } else { 
  19475.                         $endy = $parent['endy']; 
  19476.                         $startpage = $parent['startpage']; 
  19477.                         $endpage = $parent['endpage']; 
  19478.                         $startcolumn = $parent['startcolumn']; 
  19479.                         $endcolumn = $parent['endcolumn']; 
  19480.                     } 
  19481.                     if ($this->num_columns == 0) { 
  19482.                         $this->num_columns = 1; 
  19483.                     } 
  19484.                     if (isset($cellpos['border'])) { 
  19485.                         $border = $cellpos['border']; 
  19486.                     } 
  19487.                     if (isset($cellpos['bgcolor']) AND ($cellpos['bgcolor']) !== false) { 
  19488.                         $this->SetFillColorArray($cellpos['bgcolor']); 
  19489.                         $fill = true; 
  19490.                     } else { 
  19491.                         $fill = false; 
  19492.                     } 
  19493.                     $x = $cellpos['startx']; 
  19494.                     $y = $parent['starty']; 
  19495.                     $starty = $y; 
  19496.                     $w = abs($cellpos['endx'] - $cellpos['startx']); 
  19497.                     // get border modes 
  19498.                     $border_start = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='start', $this->opencell); 
  19499.                     $border_end = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='end', $this->opencell); 
  19500.                     $border_middle = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  19501.                     // design borders around HTML cells. 
  19502.                     for ($page = $startpage; $page <= $endpage; ++$page) { // for each page 
  19503.                         $ccode = ''; 
  19504.                         $this->setPage($page); 
  19505.                         if ($this->num_columns < 2) { 
  19506.                             // single-column mode 
  19507.                             $this->x = $x; 
  19508.                             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  19509.                         } 
  19510.                         // account for margin changes 
  19511.                         if ($page > $startpage) { 
  19512.                             if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  19513.                                 $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  19514.                             } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  19515.                                 $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  19516.                             } 
  19517.                         } 
  19518.                         if ($startpage == $endpage) { // single page 
  19519.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19520.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19521.                             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19522.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19523.                                 if ($startcolumn == $endcolumn) { // single column 
  19524.                                     $cborder = $border; 
  19525.                                     $h = $endy - $parent['starty']; 
  19526.                                     $this->y = $y; 
  19527.                                     $this->x = $x; 
  19528.                                 } elseif ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19529.                                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19530.                                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19531.                                     $this->x = $x; 
  19532.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19533.                                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19534.                                         $deltacol = $this->x + $this->rMargin - $this->w; 
  19535.                                     } else { 
  19536.                                         $deltacol = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  19537.                                     } 
  19538.                                 } elseif ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  19539.                                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  19540.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19541.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19542.                                     } 
  19543.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19544.                                     $h = $endy - $this->y; 
  19545.                                 } else { // middle column 
  19546.                                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19547.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19548.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19549.                                     } 
  19550.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19551.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19552.                                 } 
  19553.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19554.                             } // end for each column 
  19555.                         } elseif ($page == $startpage) { // first page 
  19556.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19557.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19558.                             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19559.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19560.                                 if ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19561.                                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19562.                                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19563.                                     $this->x = $x; 
  19564.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19565.                                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19566.                                         $deltacol = $this->x + $this->rMargin - $this->w; 
  19567.                                     } else { 
  19568.                                         $deltacol = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  19569.                                     } 
  19570.                                 } else { // middle column 
  19571.                                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19572.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19573.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19574.                                     } 
  19575.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19576.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19577.                                 } 
  19578.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19579.                             } // end for each column 
  19580.                         } elseif ($page == $endpage) { // last page 
  19581.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19582.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19583.                             for ($column = 0; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19584.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19585.                                 if ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  19586.                                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  19587.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19588.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19589.                                     } 
  19590.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19591.                                     $h = $endy - $this->y; 
  19592.                                 } else { // middle column 
  19593.                                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19594.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19595.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19596.                                     } 
  19597.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19598.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19599.                                 } 
  19600.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19601.                             } // end for each column 
  19602.                         } else { // middle page 
  19603.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19604.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19605.                             for ($column = 0; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19606.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19607.                                 $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19608.                                 if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19609.                                     $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19610.                                 } 
  19611.                                 $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19612.                                 $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19613.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19614.                             } // end for each column 
  19615.                         } 
  19616.                         if ($cborder OR $fill) { 
  19617.                             $offsetlen = strlen($ccode); 
  19618.                             // draw border and fill 
  19619.                             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  19620.                                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  19621.                                 if (end($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']) !== false) { 
  19622.                                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  19623.                                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey]; 
  19624.                                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  19625.                                 } else { 
  19626.                                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk']; 
  19627.                                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] += $offsetlen; 
  19628.                                 } 
  19629.                                 $pagebuff = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']; 
  19630.                                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  19631.                                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  19632.                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$ccode.$pend; 
  19633.                             } else { 
  19634.                                 // draw border and fill 
  19635.                                 if (end($this->transfmrk[$this->page]) !== false) { 
  19636.                                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  19637.                                     $pagemark = $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey]; 
  19638.                                 } elseif ($this->InFooter) { 
  19639.                                     $pagemark = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  19640.                                 } else { 
  19641.                                     $pagemark = $this->intmrk[$this->page]; 
  19642.                                 } 
  19643.                                 $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  19644.                                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  19645.                                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  19646.                                 $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $pstart.$ccode.$pend); 
  19647.                             } 
  19648.                         } 
  19649.                     } // end for each page 
  19650.                     // restore default border 
  19651.                     $border = $default_border; 
  19652.                 } // end for each cell on the row 
  19653.                 if (isset($table_el['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  19654.                     $this->y += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($table_el['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  19655.                 } elseif (isset($table_el['border-spacing'])) { 
  19656.                     $this->y += $table_el['border-spacing']['V']; 
  19657.                 } 
  19658.                 $this->Ln(0, $cell); 
  19659.                 $this->x = $parent['startx']; 
  19660.                 if ($endpage > $startpage) { 
  19661.                     if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  19662.                         $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  19663.                     } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  19664.                         $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  19665.                     } 
  19666.                 } 
  19667.             } 
  19668.             if (!$in_table_head) { // we are not inside a thead section 
  19669.                 $this->cell_padding = $table_el['old_cell_padding']; 
  19670.                 // reset row height 
  19671.                 $this->resetLastH(); 
  19672.                 if (($this->page == ($this->numpages - 1)) AND ($this->pageopen[$this->numpages])) { 
  19673.                     $plendiff = ($this->pagelen[$this->numpages] - $this->emptypagemrk[$this->numpages]); 
  19674.                     if (($plendiff > 0) AND ($plendiff < 60)) { 
  19675.                         $pagediff = substr($this->getPageBuffer($this->numpages), $this->emptypagemrk[$this->numpages], $plendiff); 
  19676.                         if (substr($pagediff, 0, 5) == 'BT /F') { 
  19677.                             // the difference is only a font setting 
  19678.                             $plendiff = 0; 
  19679.                         } 
  19680.                     } 
  19681.                     if ($plendiff == 0) { 
  19682.                         // remove last blank page 
  19683.                         $this->deletePage($this->numpages); 
  19684.                     } 
  19685.                 } 
  19686.                 if (isset($this->theadMargins['top'])) { 
  19687.                     // restore top margin 
  19688.                     $this->tMargin = $this->theadMargins['top']; 
  19689.                 } 
  19690.                 if (!isset($table_el['attribute']['nested']) OR ($table_el['attribute']['nested'] != 'true')) { 
  19691.                     // reset main table header 
  19692.                     $this->thead = ''; 
  19693.                     $this->theadMargins = array(); 
  19694.                     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['tm'] = $this->tMargin; 
  19695.                 } 
  19696.             } 
  19697.             $parent = $table_el; 
  19698.             break; 
  19699.         } 
  19700.         case 'a': { 
  19701.             $this->HREF = ''; 
  19702.             break; 
  19703.         } 
  19704.         case 'sup': { 
  19705.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() + ((0.7 * $parent['fontsize']) / $this->k)); 
  19706.             break; 
  19707.         } 
  19708.         case 'sub': { 
  19709.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() - ((0.3 * $parent['fontsize']) / $this->k)); 
  19710.             break; 
  19711.         } 
  19712.         case 'div': { 
  19713.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19714.             break; 
  19715.         } 
  19716.         case 'blockquote': { 
  19717.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  19718.                 $this->rMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19719.             } else { 
  19720.                 $this->lMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19721.             } 
  19722.             --$this->listindentlevel; 
  19723.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19724.             break; 
  19725.         } 
  19726.         case 'p': { 
  19727.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19728.             break; 
  19729.         } 
  19730.         case 'pre': { 
  19731.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19732.             $this->premode = false; 
  19733.             break; 
  19734.         } 
  19735.         case 'dl': { 
  19736.             --$this->listnum; 
  19737.             if ($this->listnum <= 0) { 
  19738.                 $this->listnum = 0; 
  19739.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19740.             } else { 
  19741.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19742.             } 
  19743.             $this->resetLastH(); 
  19744.             break; 
  19745.         } 
  19746.         case 'dt': { 
  19747.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19748.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19749.             break; 
  19750.         } 
  19751.         case 'dd': { 
  19752.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19753.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  19754.                 $this->rMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19755.             } else { 
  19756.                 $this->lMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19757.             } 
  19758.             --$this->listindentlevel; 
  19759.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19760.             break; 
  19761.         } 
  19762.         case 'ul': 
  19763.         case 'ol': { 
  19764.             --$this->listnum; 
  19765.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19766.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  19767.                 $this->rMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19768.             } else { 
  19769.                 $this->lMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19770.             } 
  19771.             --$this->listindentlevel; 
  19772.             if ($this->listnum <= 0) { 
  19773.                 $this->listnum = 0; 
  19774.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19775.             } else { 
  19776.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19777.             } 
  19778.             $this->resetLastH(); 
  19779.             break; 
  19780.         } 
  19781.         case 'li': { 
  19782.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19783.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19784.             break; 
  19785.         } 
  19786.         case 'h1': 
  19787.         case 'h2': 
  19788.         case 'h3': 
  19789.         case 'h4': 
  19790.         case 'h5': 
  19791.         case 'h6': { 
  19792.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19793.             break; 
  19794.         } 
  19795.         // Form fields (since 4.8.000 - 2009-09-07) 
  19796.         case 'form': { 
  19797.             $this->form_action = ''; 
  19798.             $this->form_enctype = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'; 
  19799.             break; 
  19800.         } 
  19801.         default : { 
  19802.             break; 
  19803.         } 
  19804.     } 
  19805.     // draw border and background (if any) 
  19806.     $this->drawHTMLTagBorder($parent, $xmax); 
  19807.     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['pagebreakafter'])) { 
  19808.         $pba = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['pagebreakafter']; 
  19809.         // check for pagebreak 
  19810.         if (($pba == 'true') OR ($pba == 'left') OR ($pba == 'right')) { 
  19811.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19812.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19813.         } 
  19814.         if ((($pba == 'left') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)))) 
  19815.             OR (($pba == 'right') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0))))) { 
  19816.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19817.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19818.         } 
  19819.     } 
  19820.     $this->tmprtl = false; 
  19821.     return $dom; 
  19822. } 
  19823.  
  19824. /** 
  19825.  * Add vertical spaces if needed. 
  19826.  * @param $hbz (string) Distance between current y and line bottom. 
  19827.  * @param $hb (string) The height of the break. 
  19828.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the default left (or right if RTL) padding to each new line (default false). 
  19829.  * @param $firsttag (boolean) set to true when the tag is the first. 
  19830.  * @param $lasttag (boolean) set to true when the tag is the last. 
  19831.  * @protected 
  19832.  */ 
  19833. protected function addHTMLVertSpace($hbz=0, $hb=0, $cell=false, $firsttag=false, $lasttag=false) { 
  19834.     if ($firsttag) { 
  19835.         $this->Ln(0, $cell); 
  19836.         $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  19837.         return; 
  19838.     } 
  19839.     if ($lasttag) { 
  19840.         $this->Ln($hbz, $cell); 
  19841.         $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  19842.         return; 
  19843.     } 
  19844.     if ($hb < $this->htmlvspace) { 
  19845.         $hd = 0; 
  19846.     } else { 
  19847.         $hd = $hb - $this->htmlvspace; 
  19848.         $this->htmlvspace = $hb; 
  19849.     } 
  19850.     $this->Ln(($hbz + $hd), $cell); 
  19851. } 
  19852.  
  19853. /** 
  19854.  * Return the starting coordinates to draw an html border 
  19855.  * @return array containing top-left border coordinates 
  19856.  * @protected 
  19857.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-03) 
  19858.  */ 
  19859. protected function getBorderStartPosition() { 
  19860.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19861.         $xmax = $this->lMargin; 
  19862.     } else { 
  19863.         $xmax = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  19864.     } 
  19865.     return array('page' => $this->page, 'column' => $this->current_column, 'x' => $this->x, 'y' => $this->y, 'xmax' => $xmax); 
  19866. } 
  19867.  
  19868. /** 
  19869.  * Draw an HTML block border and fill 
  19870.  * @param $tag (array) array of tag properties. 
  19871.  * @param $xmax (int) end X coordinate for border. 
  19872.  * @protected 
  19873.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-03) 
  19874.  */ 
  19875. protected function drawHTMLTagBorder($tag, $xmax) { 
  19876.     if (!isset($tag['borderposition'])) { 
  19877.         // nothing to draw 
  19878.         return; 
  19879.     } 
  19880.     $prev_x = $this->x; 
  19881.     $prev_y = $this->y; 
  19882.     $prev_lasth = $this->lasth; 
  19883.     $border = 0; 
  19884.     $fill = false; 
  19885.     $this->lasth = 0; 
  19886.     if (isset($tag['border']) AND !empty($tag['border'])) { 
  19887.         // get border style 
  19888.         $border = $tag['border']; 
  19889.         if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->thead) AND (!$this->inthead)) { 
  19890.             // border for table header 
  19891.             $border = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  19892.         } 
  19893.     } 
  19894.     if (isset($tag['bgcolor']) AND ($tag['bgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  19895.         // get background color 
  19896.         $old_bgcolor = $this->bgcolor; 
  19897.         $this->SetFillColorArray($tag['bgcolor']); 
  19898.         $fill = true; 
  19899.     } 
  19900.     if (!$border AND !$fill) { 
  19901.         // nothing to draw 
  19902.         return; 
  19903.     } 
  19904.     if (isset($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  19905.         $clsp = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  19906.         $cellspacing = array('H' => $clsp, 'V' => $clsp); 
  19907.     } elseif (isset($tag['border-spacing'])) { 
  19908.         $cellspacing = $tag['border-spacing']; 
  19909.     } else { 
  19910.         $cellspacing = array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0); 
  19911.     } 
  19912.     if (($tag['value'] != 'table') AND (is_array($border)) AND (!empty($border))) { 
  19913.         // draw the border externally respect the sqare edge. 
  19914.         $border['mode'] = 'ext'; 
  19915.     } 
  19916.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19917.         if ($xmax >= $tag['borderposition']['x']) { 
  19918.             $xmax = $tag['borderposition']['xmax']; 
  19919.         } 
  19920.         $w = ($tag['borderposition']['x'] - $xmax); 
  19921.     } else { 
  19922.         if ($xmax <= $tag['borderposition']['x']) { 
  19923.             $xmax = $tag['borderposition']['xmax']; 
  19924.         } 
  19925.         $w = ($xmax - $tag['borderposition']['x']); 
  19926.     } 
  19927.     if ($w <= 0) { 
  19928.         return; 
  19929.     } 
  19930.     $w += $cellspacing['H']; 
  19931.     $startpage = $tag['borderposition']['page']; 
  19932.     $startcolumn = $tag['borderposition']['column']; 
  19933.     $x = $tag['borderposition']['x']; 
  19934.     $y = $tag['borderposition']['y']; 
  19935.     $endpage = $this->page; 
  19936.     $starty = $tag['borderposition']['y'] - $cellspacing['V']; 
  19937.     $currentY = $this->y; 
  19938.     $this->x = $x; 
  19939.     // get latest column 
  19940.     $endcolumn = $this->current_column; 
  19941.     if ($this->num_columns == 0) { 
  19942.         $this->num_columns = 1; 
  19943.     } 
  19944.     // get border modes 
  19945.     $border_start = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='start', $this->opencell); 
  19946.     $border_end = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='end', $this->opencell); 
  19947.     $border_middle = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  19948.     // temporary disable page regions 
  19949.     $temp_page_regions = $this->page_regions; 
  19950.     $this->page_regions = array(); 
  19951.     // design borders around HTML cells. 
  19952.     for ($page = $startpage; $page <= $endpage; ++$page) { // for each page 
  19953.         $ccode = ''; 
  19954.         $this->setPage($page); 
  19955.         if ($this->num_columns < 2) { 
  19956.             // single-column mode 
  19957.             $this->x = $x; 
  19958.             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  19959.         } 
  19960.         // account for margin changes 
  19961.         if ($page > $startpage) { 
  19962.             if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  19963.                 $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  19964.             } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  19965.                 $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  19966.             } 
  19967.         } 
  19968.         if ($startpage == $endpage) { 
  19969.             // single page 
  19970.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19971.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19972.                 if ($startcolumn == $endcolumn) { // single column 
  19973.                     $cborder = $border; 
  19974.                     $h = ($currentY - $y) + $cellspacing['V']; 
  19975.                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19976.                 } elseif ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19977.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19978.                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19979.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19980.                 } elseif ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  19981.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  19982.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  19983.                 } else { // middle column 
  19984.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19985.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19986.                 } 
  19987.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19988.             } // end for each column 
  19989.         } elseif ($page == $startpage) { // first page 
  19990.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19991.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19992.                 if ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19993.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19994.                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19995.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19996.                 } else { // middle column 
  19997.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19998.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19999.                 } 
  20000.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  20001.             } // end for each column 
  20002.         } elseif ($page == $endpage) { // last page 
  20003.             for ($column = 0; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  20004.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  20005.                 if ($column == $endcolumn) { 
  20006.                     // end column 
  20007.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  20008.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  20009.                 } else { 
  20010.                     // middle column 
  20011.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  20012.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  20013.                 } 
  20014.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  20015.             } // end for each column 
  20016.         } else { // middle page 
  20017.             for ($column = 0; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  20018.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  20019.                 $cborder = $border_middle; 
  20020.                 $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  20021.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  20022.             } // end for each column 
  20023.         } 
  20024.         if ($cborder OR $fill) { 
  20025.             $offsetlen = strlen($ccode); 
  20026.             // draw border and fill 
  20027.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  20028.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  20029.                 if (end($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']) !== false) { 
  20030.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  20031.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey]; 
  20032.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  20033.                 } else { 
  20034.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk']; 
  20035.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] += $offsetlen; 
  20036.                 } 
  20037.                 $pagebuff = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']; 
  20038.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  20039.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  20040.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$ccode.$pend; 
  20041.             } else { 
  20042.                 if (end($this->transfmrk[$this->page]) !== false) { 
  20043.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  20044.                     $pagemark = $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey]; 
  20045.                 } elseif ($this->InFooter) { 
  20046.                     $pagemark = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  20047.                 } else { 
  20048.                     $pagemark = $this->intmrk[$this->page]; 
  20049.                 } 
  20050.                 $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  20051.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  20052.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  20053.                 $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $pstart.$ccode.$pend); 
  20054.                 $this->bordermrk[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  20055.                 $this->cntmrk[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  20056.             } 
  20057.         } 
  20058.     } // end for each page 
  20059.     // restore page regions 
  20060.     $this->page_regions = $temp_page_regions; 
  20061.     if (isset($old_bgcolor)) { 
  20062.         // restore background color 
  20063.         $this->SetFillColorArray($old_bgcolor); 
  20064.     } 
  20065.     // restore pointer position 
  20066.     $this->x = $prev_x; 
  20067.     $this->y = $prev_y; 
  20068.     $this->lasth = $prev_lasth; 
  20069. } 
  20070.  
  20071. /** 
  20072.  * Set the default bullet to be used as LI bullet symbol 
  20073.  * @param $symbol (string) character or string to be used (legal values are: '' = automatic, '!' = auto bullet, '#' = auto numbering, 'disc', 'disc', 'circle', 'square', '1', 'decimal', 'decimal-leading-zero', 'i', 'lower-roman', 'I', 'upper-roman', 'a', 'lower-alpha', 'lower-latin', 'A', 'upper-alpha', 'upper-latin', 'lower-greek', 'img|type|width|height|image.ext') 
  20074.  * @public 
  20075.  * @since 3.0.028 (2008-09-26) 
  20076.  */ 
  20077. public function setLIsymbol($symbol='!') { 
  20078.     // check for custom image symbol 
  20079.     if (substr($symbol, 0, 4) == 'img|') { 
  20080.         $this->lisymbol = $symbol; 
  20081.         return; 
  20082.     } 
  20083.     $symbol = strtolower($symbol); 
  20084.     $valid_symbols = array('!', '#', 'disc', 'circle', 'square', '1', 'decimal', 'decimal-leading-zero', 'i', 'lower-roman', 'I', 'upper-roman', 'a', 'lower-alpha', 'lower-latin', 'A', 'upper-alpha', 'upper-latin', 'lower-greek'); 
  20085.     if (in_array($symbol, $valid_symbols)) { 
  20086.         $this->lisymbol = $symbol; 
  20087.     } else { 
  20088.         $this->lisymbol = ''; 
  20089.     } 
  20090. } 
  20091.  
  20092. /** 
  20093.  * Set the booklet mode for double-sided pages. 
  20094.  * @param $booklet (boolean) true set the booklet mode on, false otherwise. 
  20095.  * @param $inner (float) Inner page margin. 
  20096.  * @param $outer (float) Outer page margin. 
  20097.  * @public 
  20098.  * @since 4.2.000 (2008-10-29) 
  20099.  */ 
  20100. public function SetBooklet($booklet=true, $inner=-1, $outer=-1) { 
  20101.     $this->booklet = $booklet; 
  20102.     if ($inner >= 0) { 
  20103.         $this->lMargin = $inner; 
  20104.     } 
  20105.     if ($outer >= 0) { 
  20106.         $this->rMargin = $outer; 
  20107.     } 
  20108. } 
  20109.  
  20110. /** 
  20111.  * Swap the left and right margins. 
  20112.  * @param $reverse (boolean) if true swap left and right margins. 
  20113.  * @protected 
  20114.  * @since 4.2.000 (2008-10-29) 
  20115.  */ 
  20116. protected function swapMargins($reverse=true) { 
  20117.     if ($reverse) { 
  20118.         // swap left and right margins 
  20119.         $mtemp = $this->original_lMargin; 
  20120.         $this->original_lMargin = $this->original_rMargin; 
  20121.         $this->original_rMargin = $mtemp; 
  20122.         $deltam = $this->original_lMargin - $this->original_rMargin; 
  20123.         $this->lMargin += $deltam; 
  20124.         $this->rMargin -= $deltam; 
  20125.     } 
  20126. } 
  20127.  
  20128. /** 
  20129.  * Set the vertical spaces for HTML tags. 
  20130.  * The array must have the following structure (example): 
  20131.  * $tagvs = array('h1' => array(0 => array('h' => '', 'n' => 2), 1 => array('h' => 1.3, 'n' => 1))); 
  20132.  * The first array level contains the tag names,  
  20133.  * the second level contains 0 for opening tags or 1 for closing tags,  
  20134.  * the third level contains the vertical space unit (h) and the number spaces to add (n). 
  20135.  * If the h parameter is not specified, default values are used. 
  20136.  * @param $tagvs (array) array of tags and relative vertical spaces. 
  20137.  * @public 
  20138.  * @since 4.2.001 (2008-10-30) 
  20139.  */ 
  20140. public function setHtmlVSpace($tagvs) { 
  20141.     $this->tagvspaces = $tagvs; 
  20142. } 
  20143.  
  20144. /** 
  20145.  * Set custom width for list indentation. 
  20146.  * @param $width (float) width of the indentation. Use negative value to disable it. 
  20147.  * @public 
  20148.  * @since 4.2.007 (2008-11-12) 
  20149.  */ 
  20150. public function setListIndentWidth($width) { 
  20151.     return $this->customlistindent = floatval($width); 
  20152. } 
  20153.  
  20154. /** 
  20155.  * Set the top/bottom cell sides to be open or closed when the cell cross the page. 
  20156.  * @param $isopen (boolean) if true keeps the top/bottom border open for the cell sides that cross the page. 
  20157.  * @public 
  20158.  * @since 4.2.010 (2008-11-14) 
  20159.  */ 
  20160. public function setOpenCell($isopen) { 
  20161.     $this->opencell = $isopen; 
  20162. } 
  20163.  
  20164. /** 
  20165.  * Set the color and font style for HTML links. 
  20166.  * @param $color (array) RGB array of colors 
  20167.  * @param $fontstyle (string) additional font styles to add 
  20168.  * @public 
  20169.  * @since 4.3.003 (2008-12-09) 
  20170.  */ 
  20171. public function setHtmlLinksStyle($color=array(0, 0, 255), $fontstyle='U') { 
  20172.     $this->htmlLinkColorArray = $color; 
  20173.     $this->htmlLinkFontStyle = $fontstyle; 
  20174. } 
  20175.  
  20176. /** 
  20177.  * Convert HTML string containing value and unit of measure to user's units or points. 
  20178.  * @param $htmlval (string) String containing values and unit. 
  20179.  * @param $refsize (string) Reference value in points. 
  20180.  * @param $defaultunit (string) Default unit (can be one of the following: %, em, ex, px, in, mm, pc, pt). 
  20181.  * @param $points (boolean) If true returns points, otherwise returns value in user's units. 
  20182.  * @return float value in user's unit or point if $points=true 
  20183.  * @public 
  20184.  * @since 4.3.004 (2008-12-10) 
  20185.  */ 
  20186. public function getHTMLUnitToUnits($htmlval, $refsize=1, $defaultunit='px', $points=false) { 
  20187.     $supportedunits = array('%', 'em', 'ex', 'px', 'in', 'cm', 'mm', 'pc', 'pt'); 
  20188.     $retval = 0; 
  20189.     $value = 0; 
  20190.     $unit = 'px'; 
  20191.     if ($points) { 
  20192.         $k = 1; 
  20193.     } else { 
  20194.         $k = $this->k; 
  20195.     } 
  20196.     if (in_array($defaultunit, $supportedunits)) { 
  20197.         $unit = $defaultunit; 
  20198.     } 
  20199.     if (is_numeric($htmlval)) { 
  20200.         $value = floatval($htmlval); 
  20201.     } elseif (preg_match('/([0-9\.\-\+]+)/', $htmlval, $mnum)) { 
  20202.         $value = floatval($mnum[1]); 
  20203.         if (preg_match('/([a-z%]+)/', $htmlval, $munit)) { 
  20204.             if (in_array($munit[1], $supportedunits)) { 
  20205.                 $unit = $munit[1]; 
  20206.             } 
  20207.         } 
  20208.     } 
  20209.     switch ($unit) { 
  20210.         // percentage 
  20211.         case '%': { 
  20212.             $retval = (($value * $refsize) / 100); 
  20213.             break; 
  20214.         } 
  20215.         // relative-size 
  20216.         case 'em': { 
  20217.             $retval = ($value * $refsize); 
  20218.             break; 
  20219.         } 
  20220.         // height of lower case 'x' (about half the font-size) 
  20221.         case 'ex': { 
  20222.             $retval = ($value * ($refsize / 2)); 
  20223.             break; 
  20224.         } 
  20225.         // absolute-size 
  20226.         case 'in': { 
  20227.             $retval = (($value * $this->dpi) / $k); 
  20228.             break; 
  20229.         } 
  20230.         // centimeters 
  20231.         case 'cm': { 
  20232.             $retval = (($value / 2.54 * $this->dpi) / $k); 
  20233.             break; 
  20234.         } 
  20235.         // millimeters 
  20236.         case 'mm': { 
  20237.             $retval = (($value / 25.4 * $this->dpi) / $k); 
  20238.             break; 
  20239.         } 
  20240.         // one pica is 12 points 
  20241.         case 'pc': { 
  20242.             $retval = (($value * 12) / $k); 
  20243.             break; 
  20244.         } 
  20245.         // points 
  20246.         case 'pt': { 
  20247.             $retval = ($value / $k); 
  20248.             break; 
  20249.         } 
  20250.         // pixels 
  20251.         case 'px': { 
  20252.             $retval = $this->pixelsToUnits($value); 
  20253.             if ($points) { 
  20254.                 $retval *= $this->k; 
  20255.             } 
  20256.             break; 
  20257.         } 
  20258.     } 
  20259.     return $retval; 
  20260. } 
  20261.  
  20262. /** 
  20263.  * Output an HTML list bullet or ordered item symbol 
  20264.  * @param $listdepth (int) list nesting level 
  20265.  * @param $listtype (string) type of list 
  20266.  * @param $size (float) current font size 
  20267.  * @protected 
  20268.  * @since 4.3.004 (2008-12-10) 
  20269.  */ 
  20270. protected function putHtmlListBullet($listdepth, $listtype='', $size=10) { 
  20271.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  20272.         return; 
  20273.     } 
  20274.     $size /= $this->k; 
  20275.     $fill = ''; 
  20276.     $bgcolor = $this->bgcolor; 
  20277.     $color = $this->fgcolor; 
  20278.     $strokecolor = $this->strokecolor; 
  20279.     $width = 0; 
  20280.     $textitem = ''; 
  20281.     $tmpx = $this->x; 
  20282.     $lspace = $this->GetStringWidth('  '); 
  20283.     if ($listtype == '^') { 
  20284.         // special symbol used for avoid justification of rect bullet 
  20285.         $this->lispacer = ''; 
  20286.         return; 
  20287.     } elseif ($listtype == '!') { 
  20288.         // set default list type for unordered list 
  20289.         $deftypes = array('disc', 'circle', 'square'); 
  20290.         $listtype = $deftypes[($listdepth - 1) % 3]; 
  20291.     } elseif ($listtype == '#') { 
  20292.         // set default list type for ordered list 
  20293.         $listtype = 'decimal'; 
  20294.     } elseif (substr($listtype, 0, 4) == 'img|') { 
  20295.         // custom image type ('img|type|width|height|image.ext') 
  20296.         $img = explode('|', $listtype); 
  20297.         $listtype = 'img'; 
  20298.     } 
  20299.     switch ($listtype) { 
  20300.         // unordered types 
  20301.         case 'none': { 
  20302.             break; 
  20303.         } 
  20304.         case 'disc': { 
  20305.             $r = $size / 6; 
  20306.             $lspace += (2 * $r); 
  20307.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  20308.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20309.             } else { 
  20310.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20311.             } 
  20312.             $this->Circle(($this->x + $r), ($this->y + ($this->lasth / 2)), $r, 0, 360, 'F', array(), $color, 8); 
  20313.             break; 
  20314.         } 
  20315.         case 'circle': { 
  20316.             $r = $size / 6; 
  20317.             $lspace += (2 * $r); 
  20318.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  20319.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20320.             } else { 
  20321.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20322.             } 
  20323.             $prev_line_style = $this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor; 
  20324.             $new_line_style = array('width' => ($r / 3), 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'phase' => 0, 'color'=>$color); 
  20325.             $this->Circle(($this->x + $r), ($this->y + ($this->lasth / 2)), ($r * (1 - (1/6))), 0, 360, 'D', $new_line_style, array(), 8); 
  20326.             $this->_out($prev_line_style); // restore line settings 
  20327.             break; 
  20328.         } 
  20329.         case 'square': { 
  20330.             $l = $size / 3; 
  20331.             $lspace += $l; 
  20332.             if ($this->rtl) {; 
  20333.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20334.             } else { 
  20335.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20336.             } 
  20337.             $this->Rect($this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $l) / 2)), $l, $l, 'F', array(), $color); 
  20338.             break; 
  20339.         } 
  20340.         case 'img': { 
  20341.             // 1=>type, 2=>width, 3=>height, 4=>image.ext 
  20342.             $lspace += $img[2]; 
  20343.             if ($this->rtl) {; 
  20344.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20345.             } else { 
  20346.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20347.             } 
  20348.             $imgtype = strtolower($img[1]); 
  20349.             $prev_y = $this->y; 
  20350.             switch ($imgtype) { 
  20351.                 case 'svg': { 
  20352.                     $this->ImageSVG($img[4], $this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $img[3]) / 2)), $img[2], $img[3], '', 'T', '', 0, false); 
  20353.                     break; 
  20354.                 } 
  20355.                 case 'ai': 
  20356.                 case 'eps': { 
  20357.                     $this->ImageEps($img[4], $this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $img[3]) / 2)), $img[2], $img[3], '', true, 'T', '', 0, false); 
  20358.                     break; 
  20359.                 } 
  20360.                 default: { 
  20361.                     $this->Image($img[4], $this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $img[3]) / 2)), $img[2], $img[3], $img[1], '', 'T', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, false, false); 
  20362.                     break; 
  20363.                 } 
  20364.             } 
  20365.             $this->y = $prev_y; 
  20366.             break; 
  20367.         } 
  20368.         // ordered types 
  20369.         // $this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  20370.         // $textitem 
  20371.         case '1': 
  20372.         case 'decimal': { 
  20373.             $textitem = $this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  20374.             break; 
  20375.         } 
  20376.         case 'decimal-leading-zero': { 
  20377.             $textitem = sprintf('%02d', $this->listcount[$this->listnum]); 
  20378.             break; 
  20379.         } 
  20380.         case 'i': 
  20381.         case 'lower-roman': { 
  20382.             $textitem = strtolower(TCPDF_STATIC::intToRoman($this->listcount[$this->listnum])); 
  20383.             break; 
  20384.         } 
  20385.         case 'I': 
  20386.         case 'upper-roman': { 
  20387.             $textitem = TCPDF_STATIC::intToRoman($this->listcount[$this->listnum]); 
  20388.             break; 
  20389.         } 
  20390.         case 'a': 
  20391.         case 'lower-alpha': 
  20392.         case 'lower-latin': { 
  20393.             $textitem = chr(97 + $this->listcount[$this->listnum] - 1); 
  20394.             break; 
  20395.         } 
  20396.         case 'A': 
  20397.         case 'upper-alpha': 
  20398.         case 'upper-latin': { 
  20399.             $textitem = chr(65 + $this->listcount[$this->listnum] - 1); 
  20400.             break; 
  20401.         } 
  20402.         case 'lower-greek': { 
  20403.             $textitem = TCPDF_FONTS::unichr((945 + $this->listcount[$this->listnum] - 1), $this->isunicode); 
  20404.             break; 
  20405.         } 
  20406.         /** 
  20407.         // Types to be implemented (special handling) 
  20408.         case 'hebrew': { 
  20409.             break; 
  20410.         } 
  20411.         case 'armenian': { 
  20412.             break; 
  20413.         } 
  20414.         case 'georgian': { 
  20415.             break; 
  20416.         } 
  20417.         case 'cjk-ideographic': { 
  20418.             break; 
  20419.         } 
  20420.         case 'hiragana': { 
  20421.             break; 
  20422.         } 
  20423.         case 'katakana': { 
  20424.             break; 
  20425.         } 
  20426.         case 'hiragana-iroha': { 
  20427.             break; 
  20428.         } 
  20429.         case 'katakana-iroha': { 
  20430.             break; 
  20431.         } 
  20432.         */ 
  20433.         default: { 
  20434.             $textitem = $this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  20435.         } 
  20436.     } 
  20437.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($textitem)) { 
  20438.         // Check whether we need a new page or new column 
  20439.         $prev_y = $this->y; 
  20440.         $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  20441.         if ($this->checkPageBreak($h) OR ($this->y < $prev_y)) { 
  20442.             $tmpx = $this->x; 
  20443.         } 
  20444.         // print ordered item 
  20445.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  20446.             $textitem = '.'.$textitem; 
  20447.         } else { 
  20448.             $textitem = $textitem.'.'; 
  20449.         } 
  20450.         $lspace += $this->GetStringWidth($textitem); 
  20451.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  20452.             $this->x += $lspace; 
  20453.         } else { 
  20454.             $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20455.         } 
  20456.         $this->Write($this->lasth, $textitem, '', false, '', false, 0, false); 
  20457.     } 
  20458.     $this->x = $tmpx; 
  20459.     $this->lispacer = '^'; 
  20460.     // restore colors 
  20461.     $this->SetFillColorArray($bgcolor); 
  20462.     $this->SetDrawColorArray($strokecolor); 
  20463.     $this->SettextColorArray($color); 
  20464. } 
  20465.  
  20466. /** 
  20467.  * Returns current graphic variables as array. 
  20468.  * @return array of graphic variables 
  20469.  * @protected 
  20470.  * @since 4.2.010 (2008-11-14) 
  20471.  */ 
  20472. protected function getGraphicVars() { 
  20473.     $grapvars = array( 
  20474.         'FontFamily' => $this->FontFamily,  
  20475.         'FontStyle' => $this->FontStyle,  
  20476.         'FontSizePt' => $this->FontSizePt,  
  20477.         'rMargin' => $this->rMargin,  
  20478.         'lMargin' => $this->lMargin,  
  20479.         'cell_padding' => $this->cell_padding,  
  20480.         'cell_margin' => $this->cell_margin,  
  20481.         'LineWidth' => $this->LineWidth,  
  20482.         'linestyleWidth' => $this->linestyleWidth,  
  20483.         'linestyleCap' => $this->linestyleCap,  
  20484.         'linestyleJoin' => $this->linestyleJoin,  
  20485.         'linestyleDash' => $this->linestyleDash,  
  20486.         'textrendermode' => $this->textrendermode,  
  20487.         'textstrokewidth' => $this->textstrokewidth,  
  20488.         'DrawColor' => $this->DrawColor,  
  20489.         'FillColor' => $this->FillColor,  
  20490.         'TextColor' => $this->TextColor,  
  20491.         'ColorFlag' => $this->ColorFlag,  
  20492.         'bgcolor' => $this->bgcolor,  
  20493.         'fgcolor' => $this->fgcolor,  
  20494.         'htmlvspace' => $this->htmlvspace,  
  20495.         'listindent' => $this->listindent,  
  20496.         'listindentlevel' => $this->listindentlevel,  
  20497.         'listnum' => $this->listnum,  
  20498.         'listordered' => $this->listordered,  
  20499.         'listcount' => $this->listcount,  
  20500.         'lispacer' => $this->lispacer,  
  20501.         'cell_height_ratio' => $this->cell_height_ratio,  
  20502.         'font_stretching' => $this->font_stretching,  
  20503.         'font_spacing' => $this->font_spacing,  
  20504.         'alpha' => $this->alpha,  
  20505.         // extended 
  20506.         'lasth' => $this->lasth,  
  20507.         'tMargin' => $this->tMargin,  
  20508.         'bMargin' => $this->bMargin,  
  20509.         'AutoPageBreak' => $this->AutoPageBreak,  
  20510.         'PageBreakTrigger' => $this->PageBreakTrigger,  
  20511.         'x' => $this->x,  
  20512.         'y' => $this->y,  
  20513.         'w' => $this->w,  
  20514.         'h' => $this->h,  
  20515.         'wPt' => $this->wPt,  
  20516.         'hPt' => $this->hPt,  
  20517.         'fwPt' => $this->fwPt,  
  20518.         'fhPt' => $this->fhPt,  
  20519.         'page' => $this->page,  
  20520.         'current_column' => $this->current_column,  
  20521.         'num_columns' => $this->num_columns 
  20522.  ); 
  20523.     return $grapvars; 
  20524. } 
  20525.  
  20526. /** 
  20527.  * Set graphic variables. 
  20528.  * @param $gvars (array) array of graphic variablesto restore 
  20529.  * @param $extended (boolean) if true restore extended graphic variables 
  20530.  * @protected 
  20531.  * @since 4.2.010 (2008-11-14) 
  20532.  */ 
  20533. protected function setGraphicVars($gvars, $extended=false) { 
  20534.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  20535.          return; 
  20536.     } 
  20537.     $this->FontFamily = $gvars['FontFamily']; 
  20538.     $this->FontStyle = $gvars['FontStyle']; 
  20539.     $this->FontSizePt = $gvars['FontSizePt']; 
  20540.     $this->rMargin = $gvars['rMargin']; 
  20541.     $this->lMargin = $gvars['lMargin']; 
  20542.     $this->cell_padding = $gvars['cell_padding']; 
  20543.     $this->cell_margin = $gvars['cell_margin']; 
  20544.     $this->LineWidth = $gvars['LineWidth']; 
  20545.     $this->linestyleWidth = $gvars['linestyleWidth']; 
  20546.     $this->linestyleCap = $gvars['linestyleCap']; 
  20547.     $this->linestyleJoin = $gvars['linestyleJoin']; 
  20548.     $this->linestyleDash = $gvars['linestyleDash']; 
  20549.     $this->textrendermode = $gvars['textrendermode']; 
  20550.     $this->textstrokewidth = $gvars['textstrokewidth']; 
  20551.     $this->DrawColor = $gvars['DrawColor']; 
  20552.     $this->FillColor = $gvars['FillColor']; 
  20553.     $this->TextColor = $gvars['TextColor']; 
  20554.     $this->ColorFlag = $gvars['ColorFlag']; 
  20555.     $this->bgcolor = $gvars['bgcolor']; 
  20556.     $this->fgcolor = $gvars['fgcolor']; 
  20557.     $this->htmlvspace = $gvars['htmlvspace']; 
  20558.     $this->listindent = $gvars['listindent']; 
  20559.     $this->listindentlevel = $gvars['listindentlevel']; 
  20560.     $this->listnum = $gvars['listnum']; 
  20561.     $this->listordered = $gvars['listordered']; 
  20562.     $this->listcount = $gvars['listcount']; 
  20563.     $this->lispacer = $gvars['lispacer']; 
  20564.     $this->cell_height_ratio = $gvars['cell_height_ratio']; 
  20565.     $this->font_stretching = $gvars['font_stretching']; 
  20566.     $this->font_spacing = $gvars['font_spacing']; 
  20567.     $this->alpha = $gvars['alpha']; 
  20568.     if ($extended) { 
  20569.         // restore extended values 
  20570.         $this->lasth = $gvars['lasth']; 
  20571.         $this->tMargin = $gvars['tMargin']; 
  20572.         $this->bMargin = $gvars['bMargin']; 
  20573.         $this->AutoPageBreak = $gvars['AutoPageBreak']; 
  20574.         $this->PageBreakTrigger = $gvars['PageBreakTrigger']; 
  20575.         $this->x = $gvars['x']; 
  20576.         $this->y = $gvars['y']; 
  20577.         $this->w = $gvars['w']; 
  20578.         $this->h = $gvars['h']; 
  20579.         $this->wPt = $gvars['wPt']; 
  20580.         $this->hPt = $gvars['hPt']; 
  20581.         $this->fwPt = $gvars['fwPt']; 
  20582.         $this->fhPt = $gvars['fhPt']; 
  20583.         $this->page = $gvars['page']; 
  20584.         $this->current_column = $gvars['current_column']; 
  20585.         $this->num_columns = $gvars['num_columns']; 
  20586.     } 
  20587.     $this->_out(''.$this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor.' '.$this->FillColor.''); 
  20588.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->FontFamily)) { 
  20589.         $this->SetFont($this->FontFamily, $this->FontStyle, $this->FontSizePt); 
  20590.     } 
  20591. } 
  20592.  
  20593. /** 
  20594.  * Outputs the "save graphics state" operator 'q' 
  20595.  * @protected 
  20596.  */ 
  20597. protected function _outSaveGraphicsState() { 
  20598.     $this->_out('q'); 
  20599. } 
  20600.  
  20601. /** 
  20602.  * Outputs the "restore graphics state" operator 'Q' 
  20603.  * @protected 
  20604.  */ 
  20605. protected function _outRestoreGraphicsState() { 
  20606.     $this->_out('Q'); 
  20607. } 
  20608.  
  20609. /** 
  20610.  * Writes data to a temporary file on filesystem. 
  20611.  * @param $filename (string) file name 
  20612.  * @param $data (mixed) data to write on file 
  20613.  * @param $append (boolean) if true append data, false replace. 
  20614.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20615.  * @protected 
  20616.  */ 
  20617. protected function writeDiskCache($filename, $data, $append=false) { 
  20618.     if ($append) { 
  20619.         $fmode = 'ab+'; 
  20620.     } else { 
  20621.         $fmode = 'wb+'; 
  20622.     } 
  20623.     $f = @fopen($filename, $fmode); 
  20624.     if (!$f) { 
  20625.         $this->Error('Unable to write cache file: '.$filename); 
  20626.     } else { 
  20627.         fwrite($f, $data); 
  20628.         fclose($f); 
  20629.     } 
  20630.     // update file length (needed for transactions) 
  20631.     if (!isset($this->cache_file_length['_'.$filename])) { 
  20632.         $this->cache_file_length['_'.$filename] = strlen($data); 
  20633.     } else { 
  20634.         $this->cache_file_length['_'.$filename] += strlen($data); 
  20635.     } 
  20636. } 
  20637.  
  20638. /** 
  20639.  * Read data from a temporary file on filesystem. 
  20640.  * @param $filename (string) file name 
  20641.  * @return mixed retrieved data 
  20642.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20643.  * @protected 
  20644.  */ 
  20645. protected function readDiskCache($filename) { 
  20646.     return file_get_contents($filename); 
  20647. } 
  20648.  
  20649. /** 
  20650.  * Set buffer content (always append data). 
  20651.  * @param $data (string) data 
  20652.  * @protected 
  20653.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20654.  */ 
  20655. protected function setBuffer($data) { 
  20656.     $this->bufferlen += strlen($data); 
  20657.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20658.         if (!isset($this->buffer) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->buffer)) { 
  20659.             $this->buffer = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('buf'); 
  20660.         } 
  20661.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->buffer, $data, true); 
  20662.     } else { 
  20663.         $this->buffer .= $data; 
  20664.     } 
  20665. } 
  20666.  
  20667. /** 
  20668.  * Replace the buffer content 
  20669.  * @param $data (string) data 
  20670.  * @protected 
  20671.  * @since 5.5.000 (2010-06-22) 
  20672.  */ 
  20673. protected function replaceBuffer($data) { 
  20674.     $this->bufferlen = strlen($data); 
  20675.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20676.         if (!isset($this->buffer) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->buffer)) { 
  20677.             $this->buffer = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('buf'); 
  20678.         } 
  20679.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->buffer, $data, false); 
  20680.     } else { 
  20681.         $this->buffer = $data; 
  20682.     } 
  20683. } 
  20684.  
  20685. /** 
  20686.  * Get buffer content. 
  20687.  * @return string buffer content 
  20688.  * @protected 
  20689.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20690.  */ 
  20691. protected function getBuffer() { 
  20692.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20693.         return $this->readDiskCache($this->buffer); 
  20694.     } else { 
  20695.         return $this->buffer; 
  20696.     } 
  20697. } 
  20698.  
  20699. /** 
  20700.  * Set page buffer content. 
  20701.  * @param $page (int) page number 
  20702.  * @param $data (string) page data 
  20703.  * @param $append (boolean) if true append data, false replace. 
  20704.  * @protected 
  20705.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20706.  */ 
  20707. protected function setPageBuffer($page, $data, $append=false) { 
  20708.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20709.         if (!isset($this->pages[$page])) { 
  20710.             $this->pages[$page] = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('page'); 
  20711.         } 
  20712.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->pages[$page], $data, $append); 
  20713.     } else { 
  20714.         if ($append) { 
  20715.             $this->pages[$page] .= $data; 
  20716.         } else { 
  20717.             $this->pages[$page] = $data; 
  20718.         } 
  20719.     } 
  20720.     if ($append AND isset($this->pagelen[$page])) { 
  20721.         $this->pagelen[$page] += strlen($data); 
  20722.     } else { 
  20723.         $this->pagelen[$page] = strlen($data); 
  20724.     } 
  20725. } 
  20726.  
  20727. /** 
  20728.  * Get page buffer content. 
  20729.  * @param $page (int) page number 
  20730.  * @return string page buffer content or false in case of error 
  20731.  * @protected 
  20732.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20733.  */ 
  20734. protected function getPageBuffer($page) { 
  20735.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20736.         return $this->readDiskCache($this->pages[$page]); 
  20737.     } elseif (isset($this->pages[$page])) { 
  20738.         return $this->pages[$page]; 
  20739.     } 
  20740.     return false; 
  20741. } 
  20742.  
  20743. /** 
  20744.  * Set image buffer content. 
  20745.  * @param $image (string) image key 
  20746.  * @param $data (array) image data 
  20747.  * @return int image index number 
  20748.  * @protected 
  20749.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20750.  */ 
  20751. protected function setImageBuffer($image, $data) { 
  20752.     if (($data['i'] = array_search($image, $this->imagekeys)) === FALSE) { 
  20753.         $this->imagekeys[$this->numimages] = $image; 
  20754.         $data['i'] = $this->numimages; 
  20755.         ++$this->numimages; 
  20756.     } 
  20757.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20758.         if (!isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20759.             $this->images[$image] = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('img');
