  20760.         } 
  20761.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->images[$image], serialize($data)); 
  20762.     } else { 
  20763.         $this->images[$image] = $data; 
  20764.     } 
  20765.     return $data['i']; 
  20766. } 
  20767.  
  20768. /** 
  20769.  * Set image buffer content for a specified sub-key. 
  20770.  * @param $image (string) image key 
  20771.  * @param $key (string) image sub-key 
  20772.  * @param $data (array) image data 
  20773.  * @protected 
  20774.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20775.  */ 
  20776. protected function setImageSubBuffer($image, $key, $data) { 
  20777.     if (!isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20778.         $this->setImageBuffer($image, array()); 
  20779.     } 
  20780.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20781.         $tmpimg = $this->getImageBuffer($image); 
  20782.         $tmpimg[$key] = $data; 
  20783.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->images[$image], serialize($tmpimg)); 
  20784.     } else { 
  20785.         $this->images[$image][$key] = $data; 
  20786.     } 
  20787. } 
  20788.  
  20789. /** 
  20790.  * Get image buffer content. 
  20791.  * @param $image (string) image key 
  20792.  * @return string image buffer content or false in case of error 
  20793.  * @protected 
  20794.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20795.  */ 
  20796. protected function getImageBuffer($image) { 
  20797.     if ($this->diskcache AND isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20798.         return unserialize($this->readDiskCache($this->images[$image])); 
  20799.     } elseif (isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20800.         return $this->images[$image]; 
  20801.     } 
  20802.     return false; 
  20803. } 
  20804.  
  20805. /** 
  20806.  * Set font buffer content. 
  20807.  * @param $font (string) font key 
  20808.  * @param $data (array) font data 
  20809.  * @protected 
  20810.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20811.  */ 
  20812. protected function setFontBuffer($font, $data) { 
  20813.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20814.         if (!isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20815.             $this->fonts[$font] = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('font'); 
  20816.         } 
  20817.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->fonts[$font], serialize($data)); 
  20818.     } else { 
  20819.         $this->fonts[$font] = $data; 
  20820.     } 
  20821.     if (!in_array($font, $this->fontkeys)) { 
  20822.         $this->fontkeys[] = $font; 
  20823.         // store object ID for current font 
  20824.         ++$this->n; 
  20825.         $this->font_obj_ids[$font] = $this->n; 
  20826.         $this->setFontSubBuffer($font, 'n', $this->n); 
  20827.     } 
  20828. } 
  20829.  
  20830. /** 
  20831.  * Set font buffer content. 
  20832.  * @param $font (string) font key 
  20833.  * @param $key (string) font sub-key 
  20834.  * @param $data (array) font data 
  20835.  * @protected 
  20836.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20837.  */ 
  20838. protected function setFontSubBuffer($font, $key, $data) { 
  20839.     if (!isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20840.         $this->setFontBuffer($font, array()); 
  20841.     } 
  20842.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20843.         $tmpfont = $this->getFontBuffer($font); 
  20844.         $tmpfont[$key] = $data; 
  20845.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->fonts[$font], serialize($tmpfont)); 
  20846.     } else { 
  20847.         $this->fonts[$font][$key] = $data; 
  20848.     } 
  20849. } 
  20850.  
  20851. /** 
  20852.  * Get font buffer content. 
  20853.  * @param $font (string) font key 
  20854.  * @return string font buffer content or false in case of error 
  20855.  * @protected 
  20856.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20857.  */ 
  20858. protected function getFontBuffer($font) { 
  20859.     if ($this->diskcache AND isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20860.         return unserialize($this->readDiskCache($this->fonts[$font])); 
  20861.     } elseif (isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20862.         return $this->fonts[$font]; 
  20863.     } 
  20864.     return false; 
  20865. } 
  20866.  
  20867. /** 
  20868.  * Move a page to a previous position. 
  20869.  * @param $frompage (int) number of the source page 
  20870.  * @param $topage (int) number of the destination page (must be less than $frompage) 
  20871.  * @return true in case of success, false in case of error. 
  20872.  * @public 
  20873.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20874.  */ 
  20875. public function movePage($frompage, $topage) { 
  20876.     if (($frompage > $this->numpages) OR ($frompage <= $topage)) { 
  20877.         return false; 
  20878.     } 
  20879.     if ($frompage == $this->page) { 
  20880.         // close the page before moving it 
  20881.         $this->endPage(); 
  20882.     } 
  20883.     // move all page-related states 
  20884.     $tmppage = $this->getPageBuffer($frompage); 
  20885.     $tmppagedim = $this->pagedim[$frompage]; 
  20886.     $tmppagelen = $this->pagelen[$frompage]; 
  20887.     $tmpintmrk = $this->intmrk[$frompage]; 
  20888.     $tmpbordermrk = $this->bordermrk[$frompage]; 
  20889.     $tmpcntmrk = $this->cntmrk[$frompage]; 
  20890.     $tmppageobjects = $this->pageobjects[$frompage]; 
  20891.     if (isset($this->footerpos[$frompage])) { 
  20892.         $tmpfooterpos = $this->footerpos[$frompage]; 
  20893.     } 
  20894.     if (isset($this->footerlen[$frompage])) { 
  20895.         $tmpfooterlen = $this->footerlen[$frompage]; 
  20896.     } 
  20897.     if (isset($this->transfmrk[$frompage])) { 
  20898.         $tmptransfmrk = $this->transfmrk[$frompage]; 
  20899.     } 
  20900.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$frompage])) { 
  20901.         $tmpannots = $this->PageAnnots[$frompage]; 
  20902.     } 
  20903.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup) AND !empty($this->newpagegroup)) { 
  20904.         for ($i = $frompage; $i > $topage; --$i) { 
  20905.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$i]) AND (($i + $this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]) > $frompage)) { 
  20906.                 --$this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]; 
  20907.                 break; 
  20908.             } 
  20909.         } 
  20910.         for ($i = $topage; $i > 0; --$i) { 
  20911.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$i]) AND (($i + $this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]) > $topage)) { 
  20912.                 ++$this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]; 
  20913.                 break; 
  20914.             } 
  20915.         } 
  20916.     } 
  20917.     for ($i = $frompage; $i > $topage; --$i) { 
  20918.         $j = $i - 1; 
  20919.         // shift pages down 
  20920.         $this->setPageBuffer($i, $this->getPageBuffer($j)); 
  20921.         $this->pagedim[$i] = $this->pagedim[$j]; 
  20922.         $this->pagelen[$i] = $this->pagelen[$j]; 
  20923.         $this->intmrk[$i] = $this->intmrk[$j]; 
  20924.         $this->bordermrk[$i] = $this->bordermrk[$j]; 
  20925.         $this->cntmrk[$i] = $this->cntmrk[$j]; 
  20926.         $this->pageobjects[$i] = $this->pageobjects[$j]; 
  20927.         if (isset($this->footerpos[$j])) { 
  20928.             $this->footerpos[$i] = $this->footerpos[$j]; 
  20929.         } elseif (isset($this->footerpos[$i])) { 
  20930.             unset($this->footerpos[$i]); 
  20931.         } 
  20932.         if (isset($this->footerlen[$j])) { 
  20933.             $this->footerlen[$i] = $this->footerlen[$j]; 
  20934.         } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$i])) { 
  20935.             unset($this->footerlen[$i]); 
  20936.         } 
  20937.         if (isset($this->transfmrk[$j])) { 
  20938.             $this->transfmrk[$i] = $this->transfmrk[$j]; 
  20939.         } elseif (isset($this->transfmrk[$i])) { 
  20940.             unset($this->transfmrk[$i]); 
  20941.         } 
  20942.         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$j])) { 
  20943.             $this->PageAnnots[$i] = $this->PageAnnots[$j]; 
  20944.         } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$i])) { 
  20945.             unset($this->PageAnnots[$i]); 
  20946.         } 
  20947.         if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$j])) { 
  20948.             $this->newpagegroup[$i] = $this->newpagegroup[$j]; 
  20949.             unset($this->newpagegroup[$j]); 
  20950.         } 
  20951.         if ($this->currpagegroup == $j) { 
  20952.             $this->currpagegroup = $i; 
  20953.         } 
  20954.     } 
  20955.     $this->setPageBuffer($topage, $tmppage); 
  20956.     $this->pagedim[$topage] = $tmppagedim; 
  20957.     $this->pagelen[$topage] = $tmppagelen; 
  20958.     $this->intmrk[$topage] = $tmpintmrk; 
  20959.     $this->bordermrk[$topage] = $tmpbordermrk; 
  20960.     $this->cntmrk[$topage] = $tmpcntmrk; 
  20961.     $this->pageobjects[$topage] = $tmppageobjects; 
  20962.     if (isset($tmpfooterpos)) { 
  20963.         $this->footerpos[$topage] = $tmpfooterpos; 
  20964.     } elseif (isset($this->footerpos[$topage])) { 
  20965.         unset($this->footerpos[$topage]); 
  20966.     } 
  20967.     if (isset($tmpfooterlen)) { 
  20968.         $this->footerlen[$topage] = $tmpfooterlen; 
  20969.     } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$topage])) { 
  20970.         unset($this->footerlen[$topage]); 
  20971.     } 
  20972.     if (isset($tmptransfmrk)) { 
  20973.         $this->transfmrk[$topage] = $tmptransfmrk; 
  20974.     } elseif (isset($this->transfmrk[$topage])) { 
  20975.         unset($this->transfmrk[$topage]); 
  20976.     } 
  20977.     if (isset($tmpannots)) { 
  20978.         $this->PageAnnots[$topage] = $tmpannots; 
  20979.     } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$topage])) { 
  20980.         unset($this->PageAnnots[$topage]); 
  20981.     } 
  20982.     // adjust outlines 
  20983.     $tmpoutlines = $this->outlines; 
  20984.     foreach ($tmpoutlines as $key => $outline) { 
  20985.         if (!$outline['f']) { 
  20986.             if (($outline['p'] >= $topage) AND ($outline['p'] < $frompage)) { 
  20987.                 $this->outlines[$key]['p'] = ($outline['p'] + 1); 
  20988.             } elseif ($outline['p'] == $frompage) { 
  20989.                 $this->outlines[$key]['p'] = $topage; 
  20990.             } 
  20991.         } 
  20992.     } 
  20993.     // adjust dests 
  20994.     $tmpdests = $this->dests; 
  20995.     foreach ($tmpdests as $key => $dest) { 
  20996.         if (!$dest['f']) { 
  20997.             if (($dest['p'] >= $topage) AND ($dest['p'] < $frompage)) { 
  20998.                 $this->dests[$key]['p'] = ($dest['p'] + 1); 
  20999.             } elseif ($dest['p'] == $frompage) { 
  21000.                 $this->dests[$key]['p'] = $topage; 
  21001.             } 
  21002.         } 
  21003.     } 
  21004.     // adjust links 
  21005.     $tmplinks = $this->links; 
  21006.     foreach ($tmplinks as $key => $link) { 
  21007.         if (!$link['f']) { 
  21008.             if (($link['p'] >= $topage) AND ($link['p'] < $frompage)) { 
  21009.                 $this->links[$key]['p'] = ($link['p'] + 1); 
  21010.             } elseif ($link['p'] == $frompage) { 
  21011.                 $this->links[$key]['p'] = $topage; 
  21012.             } 
  21013.         } 
  21014.     } 
  21015.     // adjust javascript 
  21016.     $jfrompage = $frompage; 
  21017.     $jtopage = $topage; 
  21018.     if (preg_match_all('/this\.addField\(\'([^\']*)\', \'([^\']*)\', ([0-9]+)/', $this->javascript, $pamatch) > 0) { 
  21019.         foreach($pamatch[0] as $pk => $pmatch) { 
  21020.             $pagenum = intval($pamatch[3][$pk]) + 1; 
  21021.             if (($pagenum >= $jtopage) AND ($pagenum < $jfrompage)) { 
  21022.                 $newpage = ($pagenum + 1); 
  21023.             } elseif ($pagenum == $jfrompage) { 
  21024.                 $newpage = $jtopage; 
  21025.             } else { 
  21026.                 $newpage = $pagenum; 
  21027.             } 
  21028.             --$newpage; 
  21029.             $newjs = "this.addField(\'".$pamatch[1][$pk]."\', \'".$pamatch[2][$pk]."\', ".$newpage; 
  21030.             $this->javascript = str_replace($pmatch, $newjs, $this->javascript); 
  21031.         } 
  21032.         unset($pamatch); 
  21033.     } 
  21034.     // return to last page 
  21035.     $this->lastPage(true); 
  21036.     return true; 
  21037. } 
  21038.  
  21039. /** 
  21040.  * Remove the specified page. 
  21041.  * @param $page (int) page to remove 
  21042.  * @return true in case of success, false in case of error. 
  21043.  * @public 
  21044.  * @since 4.6.004 (2009-04-23) 
  21045.  */ 
  21046. public function deletePage($page) { 
  21047.     if (($page < 1) OR ($page > $this->numpages)) { 
  21048.         return false; 
  21049.     } 
  21050.     // delete current page 
  21051.     unset($this->pages[$page]); 
  21052.     unset($this->pagedim[$page]); 
  21053.     unset($this->pagelen[$page]); 
  21054.     unset($this->intmrk[$page]); 
  21055.     unset($this->bordermrk[$page]); 
  21056.     unset($this->cntmrk[$page]); 
  21057.     foreach ($this->pageobjects[$page] as $oid) { 
  21058.         if (isset($this->offsets[$oid])) { 
  21059.             unset($this->offsets[$oid]); 
  21060.         } 
  21061.     } 
  21062.     unset($this->pageobjects[$page]); 
  21063.     if (isset($this->footerpos[$page])) { 
  21064.         unset($this->footerpos[$page]); 
  21065.     } 
  21066.     if (isset($this->footerlen[$page])) { 
  21067.         unset($this->footerlen[$page]); 
  21068.     } 
  21069.     if (isset($this->transfmrk[$page])) { 
  21070.         unset($this->transfmrk[$page]); 
  21071.     } 
  21072.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$page])) { 
  21073.         unset($this->PageAnnots[$page]); 
  21074.     } 
  21075.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup) AND !empty($this->newpagegroup)) { 
  21076.         for ($i = $page; $i > 0; --$i) { 
  21077.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$i]) AND (($i + $this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]) > $page)) { 
  21078.                 --$this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]; 
  21079.                 break; 
  21080.             } 
  21081.         } 
  21082.     } 
  21083.     if (isset($this->pageopen[$page])) { 
  21084.         unset($this->pageopen[$page]); 
  21085.     } 
  21086.     if ($page < $this->numpages) { 
  21087.         // update remaining pages 
  21088.         for ($i = $page; $i < $this->numpages; ++$i) { 
  21089.             $j = $i + 1; 
  21090.             // shift pages 
  21091.             $this->setPageBuffer($i, $this->getPageBuffer($j)); 
  21092.             $this->pagedim[$i] = $this->pagedim[$j]; 
  21093.             $this->pagelen[$i] = $this->pagelen[$j]; 
  21094.             $this->intmrk[$i] = $this->intmrk[$j]; 
  21095.             $this->bordermrk[$i] = $this->bordermrk[$j]; 
  21096.             $this->cntmrk[$i] = $this->cntmrk[$j]; 
  21097.             $this->pageobjects[$i] = $this->pageobjects[$j]; 
  21098.             if (isset($this->footerpos[$j])) { 
  21099.                 $this->footerpos[$i] = $this->footerpos[$j]; 
  21100.             } elseif (isset($this->footerpos[$i])) { 
  21101.                 unset($this->footerpos[$i]); 
  21102.             } 
  21103.             if (isset($this->footerlen[$j])) { 
  21104.                 $this->footerlen[$i] = $this->footerlen[$j]; 
  21105.             } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$i])) { 
  21106.                 unset($this->footerlen[$i]); 
  21107.             } 
  21108.             if (isset($this->transfmrk[$j])) { 
  21109.                 $this->transfmrk[$i] = $this->transfmrk[$j]; 
  21110.             } elseif (isset($this->transfmrk[$i])) { 
  21111.                 unset($this->transfmrk[$i]); 
  21112.             } 
  21113.             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$j])) { 
  21114.                 $this->PageAnnots[$i] = $this->PageAnnots[$j]; 
  21115.             } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$i])) { 
  21116.                 unset($this->PageAnnots[$i]); 
  21117.             } 
  21118.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$j])) { 
  21119.                 $this->newpagegroup[$i] = $this->newpagegroup[$j]; 
  21120.                 unset($this->newpagegroup[$j]); 
  21121.             } 
  21122.             if ($this->currpagegroup == $j) { 
  21123.                 $this->currpagegroup = $i; 
  21124.             } 
  21125.             if (isset($this->pageopen[$j])) { 
  21126.                 $this->pageopen[$i] = $this->pageopen[$j]; 
  21127.             } elseif (isset($this->pageopen[$i])) { 
  21128.                 unset($this->pageopen[$i]); 
  21129.             } 
  21130.         } 
  21131.         // remove last page 
  21132.         unset($this->pages[$this->numpages]); 
  21133.         unset($this->pagedim[$this->numpages]); 
  21134.         unset($this->pagelen[$this->numpages]); 
  21135.         unset($this->intmrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21136.         unset($this->bordermrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21137.         unset($this->cntmrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21138.         foreach ($this->pageobjects[$this->numpages] as $oid) { 
  21139.             if (isset($this->offsets[$oid])) { 
  21140.                 unset($this->offsets[$oid]); 
  21141.             } 
  21142.         } 
  21143.         unset($this->pageobjects[$this->numpages]); 
  21144.         if (isset($this->footerpos[$this->numpages])) { 
  21145.             unset($this->footerpos[$this->numpages]); 
  21146.         } 
  21147.         if (isset($this->footerlen[$this->numpages])) { 
  21148.             unset($this->footerlen[$this->numpages]); 
  21149.         } 
  21150.         if (isset($this->transfmrk[$this->numpages])) { 
  21151.             unset($this->transfmrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21152.         } 
  21153.         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->numpages])) { 
  21154.             unset($this->PageAnnots[$this->numpages]); 
  21155.         } 
  21156.         if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$this->numpages])) { 
  21157.             unset($this->newpagegroup[$this->numpages]); 
  21158.         } 
  21159.         if ($this->currpagegroup == $this->numpages) { 
  21160.             $this->currpagegroup = ($this->numpages - 1); 
  21161.         } 
  21162.         if (isset($this->pagegroups[$this->numpages])) { 
  21163.             unset($this->pagegroups[$this->numpages]); 
  21164.         } 
  21165.         if (isset($this->pageopen[$this->numpages])) { 
  21166.             unset($this->pageopen[$this->numpages]); 
  21167.         } 
  21168.     } 
  21169.     --$this->numpages; 
  21170.     $this->page = $this->numpages; 
  21171.     // adjust outlines 
  21172.     $tmpoutlines = $this->outlines; 
  21173.     foreach ($tmpoutlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21174.         if (!$outline['f']) { 
  21175.             if ($outline['p'] > $page) { 
  21176.                 $this->outlines[$key]['p'] = $outline['p'] - 1; 
  21177.             } elseif ($outline['p'] == $page) { 
  21178.                 unset($this->outlines[$key]); 
  21179.             } 
  21180.         } 
  21181.     } 
  21182.     // adjust dests 
  21183.     $tmpdests = $this->dests; 
  21184.     foreach ($tmpdests as $key => $dest) { 
  21185.         if (!$dest['f']) { 
  21186.             if ($dest['p'] > $page) { 
  21187.                 $this->dests[$key]['p'] = $dest['p'] - 1; 
  21188.             } elseif ($dest['p'] == $page) { 
  21189.                 unset($this->dests[$key]); 
  21190.             } 
  21191.         } 
  21192.     } 
  21193.     // adjust links 
  21194.     $tmplinks = $this->links; 
  21195.     foreach ($tmplinks as $key => $link) { 
  21196.         if (!$link['f']) { 
  21197.             if ($link['p'] > $page) { 
  21198.                 $this->links[$key]['p'] = $link['p'] - 1; 
  21199.             } elseif ($link['p'] == $page) { 
  21200.                 unset($this->links[$key]); 
  21201.             } 
  21202.         } 
  21203.     } 
  21204.     // adjust javascript 
  21205.     $jpage = $page; 
  21206.     if (preg_match_all('/this\.addField\(\'([^\']*)\', \'([^\']*)\', ([0-9]+)/', $this->javascript, $pamatch) > 0) { 
  21207.         foreach($pamatch[0] as $pk => $pmatch) { 
  21208.             $pagenum = intval($pamatch[3][$pk]) + 1; 
  21209.             if ($pagenum >= $jpage) { 
  21210.                 $newpage = ($pagenum - 1); 
  21211.             } elseif ($pagenum == $jpage) { 
  21212.                 $newpage = 1; 
  21213.             } else { 
  21214.                 $newpage = $pagenum; 
  21215.             } 
  21216.             --$newpage; 
  21217.             $newjs = "this.addField(\'".$pamatch[1][$pk]."\', \'".$pamatch[2][$pk]."\', ".$newpage; 
  21218.             $this->javascript = str_replace($pmatch, $newjs, $this->javascript); 
  21219.         } 
  21220.         unset($pamatch); 
  21221.     } 
  21222.     // return to last page 
  21223.     if ($this->numpages > 0) { 
  21224.         $this->lastPage(true); 
  21225.     } 
  21226.     return true; 
  21227. } 
  21228.  
  21229. /** 
  21230.  * Clone the specified page to a new page. 
  21231.  * @param $page (int) number of page to copy (0 = current page) 
  21232.  * @return true in case of success, false in case of error. 
  21233.  * @public 
  21234.  * @since 4.9.015 (2010-04-20) 
  21235.  */ 
  21236. public function copyPage($page=0) { 
  21237.     if ($page == 0) { 
  21238.         // default value 
  21239.         $page = $this->page; 
  21240.     } 
  21241.     if (($page < 1) OR ($page > $this->numpages)) { 
  21242.         return false; 
  21243.     } 
  21244.     // close the last page 
  21245.     $this->endPage(); 
  21246.     // copy all page-related states 
  21247.     ++$this->numpages; 
  21248.     $this->page = $this->numpages; 
  21249.     $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $this->getPageBuffer($page)); 
  21250.     $this->pagedim[$this->page] = $this->pagedim[$page]; 
  21251.     $this->pagelen[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$page]; 
  21252.     $this->intmrk[$this->page] = $this->intmrk[$page]; 
  21253.     $this->bordermrk[$this->page] = $this->bordermrk[$page]; 
  21254.     $this->cntmrk[$this->page] = $this->cntmrk[$page]; 
  21255.     $this->pageobjects[$this->page] = $this->pageobjects[$page]; 
  21256.     $this->pageopen[$this->page] = false; 
  21257.     if (isset($this->footerpos[$page])) { 
  21258.         $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->footerpos[$page]; 
  21259.     } 
  21260.     if (isset($this->footerlen[$page])) { 
  21261.         $this->footerlen[$this->page] = $this->footerlen[$page]; 
  21262.     } 
  21263.     if (isset($this->transfmrk[$page])) { 
  21264.         $this->transfmrk[$this->page] = $this->transfmrk[$page]; 
  21265.     } 
  21266.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$page])) { 
  21267.         $this->PageAnnots[$this->page] = $this->PageAnnots[$page]; 
  21268.     } 
  21269.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$page])) { 
  21270.         // start a new group 
  21271.         $this->newpagegroup[$this->page] = sizeof($this->newpagegroup) + 1; 
  21272.         $this->currpagegroup = $this->newpagegroup[$this->page]; 
  21273.         $this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup] = 1; 
  21274.     } elseif (isset($this->currpagegroup) AND ($this->currpagegroup > 0)) { 
  21275.         ++$this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup]; 
  21276.     } 
  21277.     // copy outlines 
  21278.     $tmpoutlines = $this->outlines; 
  21279.     foreach ($tmpoutlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21280.         if ($outline['p'] == $page) { 
  21281.             $this->outlines[] = array('t' => $outline['t'], 'l' => $outline['l'], 'x' => $outline['x'], 'y' => $outline['y'], 'p' => $this->page, 'f' => $outline['f'], 's' => $outline['s'], 'c' => $outline['c']); 
  21282.         } 
  21283.     } 
  21284.     // copy links 
  21285.     $tmplinks = $this->links; 
  21286.     foreach ($tmplinks as $key => $link) { 
  21287.         if ($link['p'] == $page) { 
  21288.             $this->links[] = array('p' => $this->page, 'y' => $link['y'], 'f' => $link['f']); 
  21289.         } 
  21290.     } 
  21291.     // return to last page 
  21292.     $this->lastPage(true); 
  21293.     return true; 
  21294. } 
  21295.  
  21296. /** 
  21297.  * Output a Table of Content Index (TOC). 
  21298.  * This method must be called after all Bookmarks were set. 
  21299.  * Before calling this method you have to open the page using the addTOCPage() method. 
  21300.  * After calling this method you have to call endTOCPage() to close the TOC page. 
  21301.  * You can override this method to achieve different styles. 
  21302.  * @param $page (int) page number where this TOC should be inserted (leave empty for current page). 
  21303.  * @param $numbersfont (string) set the font for page numbers (please use monospaced font for better alignment). 
  21304.  * @param $filler (string) string used to fill the space between text and page number. 
  21305.  * @param $toc_name (string) name to use for TOC bookmark. 
  21306.  * @param $style (string) Font style for title: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  21307.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array for bookmark title (values from 0 to 255). 
  21308.  * @public 
  21309.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  21310.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  21311.  * @see addTOCPage(), endTOCPage(), addHTMLTOC() 
  21312.  */ 
  21313. public function addTOC($page='', $numbersfont='', $filler='.', $toc_name='TOC', $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0)) { 
  21314.     $fontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  21315.     $fontfamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  21316.     $fontstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  21317.     $w = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  21318.     $spacer = $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)) * 4; 
  21319.     $lmargin = $this->lMargin; 
  21320.     $rmargin = $this->rMargin; 
  21321.     $x_start = $this->GetX(); 
  21322.     $page_first = $this->page; 
  21323.     $current_page = $this->page; 
  21324.     $page_fill_start = false; 
  21325.     $page_fill_end = false; 
  21326.     $current_column = $this->current_column; 
  21327.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($numbersfont)) { 
  21328.         $numbersfont = $this->default_monospaced_font; 
  21329.     } 
  21330.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($filler)) { 
  21331.         $filler = ' '; 
  21332.     } 
  21333.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21334.         $gap = ' '; 
  21335.     } else { 
  21336.         $gap = ''; 
  21337.         if ($page < 1) { 
  21338.             $page = 1; 
  21339.         } 
  21340.     } 
  21341.     $this->SetFont($numbersfont, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  21342.     $numwidth = $this->GetStringWidth('00000'); 
  21343.     $maxpage = 0; //used for pages on attached documents 
  21344.     foreach ($this->outlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21345.         // check for extra pages (used for attachments) 
  21346.         if (($this->page > $page_first) AND ($outline['p'] >= $this->numpages)) { 
  21347.             $outline['p'] += ($this->page - $page_first); 
  21348.         } 
  21349.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21350.             $aligntext = 'R'; 
  21351.             $alignnum = 'L'; 
  21352.         } else { 
  21353.             $aligntext = 'L'; 
  21354.             $alignnum = 'R'; 
  21355.         } 
  21356.         if ($outline['l'] == 0) { 
  21357.             $this->SetFont($fontfamily, $outline['s'].'B', $fontsize); 
  21358.         } else { 
  21359.             $this->SetFont($fontfamily, $outline['s'], $fontsize - $outline['l']); 
  21360.         } 
  21361.         $this->SetTextColorArray($outline['c']); 
  21362.         // check for page break 
  21363.         $this->checkPageBreak(2 * $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize)); 
  21364.         // set margins and X position 
  21365.         if (($this->page == $current_page) AND ($this->current_column == $current_column)) { 
  21366.             $this->lMargin = $lmargin; 
  21367.             $this->rMargin = $rmargin; 
  21368.         } else { 
  21369.             if ($this->current_column != $current_column) { 
  21370.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  21371.                     $x_start = $this->w - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x']; 
  21372.                 } else { 
  21373.                     $x_start = $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x']; 
  21374.                 } 
  21375.             } 
  21376.             $lmargin = $this->lMargin; 
  21377.             $rmargin = $this->rMargin; 
  21378.             $current_page = $this->page; 
  21379.             $current_column = $this->current_column; 
  21380.         } 
  21381.         $this->SetX($x_start); 
  21382.         $indent = ($spacer * $outline['l']); 
  21383.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21384.             $this->x -= $indent; 
  21385.             $this->rMargin = $this->w - $this->x; 
  21386.         } else { 
  21387.             $this->x += $indent; 
  21388.             $this->lMargin = $this->x; 
  21389.         } 
  21390.         $link = $this->AddLink(); 
  21391.         $this->SetLink($link, $outline['y'], $outline['p']); 
  21392.         // write the text 
  21393.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21394.             $txt = ' '.$outline['t']; 
  21395.         } else { 
  21396.             $txt = $outline['t'].' '; 
  21397.         } 
  21398.         $this->Write(0, $txt, $link, false, $aligntext, false, 0, false, false, 0, $numwidth, ''); 
  21399.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21400.             $tw = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  21401.         } else { 
  21402.             $tw = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  21403.         } 
  21404.         $this->SetFont($numbersfont, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  21405.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21406.             $pagenum = $outline['p']; 
  21407.         } else { 
  21408.             // placemark to be replaced with the correct number 
  21409.             $pagenum = '{#'.($outline['p']).'}'; 
  21410.             if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  21411.                 $pagenum = '{'.$pagenum.'}'; 
  21412.             } 
  21413.             $maxpage = max($maxpage, $outline['p']); 
  21414.         } 
  21415.         $fw = ($tw - $this->GetStringWidth($pagenum.$filler)); 
  21416.         $wfiller = $this->GetStringWidth($filler); 
  21417.         if ($wfiller > 0) { 
  21418.             $numfills = floor($fw / $wfiller); 
  21419.         } else { 
  21420.             $numfills = 0; 
  21421.         } 
  21422.         if ($numfills > 0) { 
  21423.             $rowfill = str_repeat($filler, $numfills); 
  21424.         } else { 
  21425.             $rowfill = ''; 
  21426.         } 
  21427.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21428.             $pagenum = $pagenum.$gap.$rowfill; 
  21429.         } else { 
  21430.             $pagenum = $rowfill.$gap.$pagenum; 
  21431.         } 
  21432.         // write the number 
  21433.         $this->Cell($tw, 0, $pagenum, 0, 1, $alignnum, 0, $link, 0); 
  21434.     } 
  21435.     $page_last = $this->getPage(); 
  21436.     $numpages = ($page_last - $page_first + 1); 
  21437.     // account for booklet mode 
  21438.     if ($this->booklet) { 
  21439.         // check if a blank page is required before TOC 
  21440.         $page_fill_start = ((($page_first % 2) == 0) XOR (($page % 2) == 0)); 
  21441.         $page_fill_end = (!((($numpages % 2) == 0) XOR ($page_fill_start))); 
  21442.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21443.             // add a page at the end (to be moved before TOC) 
  21444.             $this->addPage(); 
  21445.             ++$page_last; 
  21446.             ++$numpages; 
  21447.         } 
  21448.         if ($page_fill_end) { 
  21449.             // add a page at the end 
  21450.             $this->addPage(); 
  21451.             ++$page_last; 
  21452.             ++$numpages; 
  21453.         } 
  21454.     } 
  21455.     $maxpage = max($maxpage, $page_last); 
  21456.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21457.         for ($p = $page_first; $p <= $page_last; ++$p) { 
  21458.             // get page data 
  21459.             $temppage = $this->getPageBuffer($p); 
  21460.             for ($n = 1; $n <= $maxpage; ++$n) { 
  21461.                 // update page numbers 
  21462.                 $a = '{#'.$n.'}'; 
  21463.                 // get page number aliases 
  21464.                 $pnalias = $this->getInternalPageNumberAliases($a); 
  21465.                 // calculate replacement number 
  21466.                 if (($n >= $page) AND ($n <= $this->numpages)) { 
  21467.                     $np = $n + $numpages; 
  21468.                 } else { 
  21469.                     $np = $n; 
  21470.                 } 
  21471.                 $na = TCPDF_STATIC::formatTOCPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $np - 1)); 
  21472.                 $nu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($na, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21473.                 // replace aliases with numbers 
  21474.                 foreach ($pnalias['u'] as $u) { 
  21475.                     $sfill = str_repeat($filler, max(0, (strlen($u) - strlen($nu.' ')))); 
  21476.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  21477.                         $nr = $nu.TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE(' '.$sfill, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21478.                     } else { 
  21479.                         $nr = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($sfill.' ', false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont).$nu; 
  21480.                     } 
  21481.                     $temppage = str_replace($u, $nr, $temppage); 
  21482.                 } 
  21483.                 foreach ($pnalias['a'] as $a) { 
  21484.                     $sfill = str_repeat($filler, max(0, (strlen($a) - strlen($na.' ')))); 
  21485.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  21486.                         $nr = $na.' '.$sfill; 
  21487.                     } else { 
  21488.                         $nr = $sfill.' '.$na; 
  21489.                     } 
  21490.                     $temppage = str_replace($a, $nr, $temppage); 
  21491.                 } 
  21492.             } 
  21493.             // save changes 
  21494.             $this->setPageBuffer($p, $temppage); 
  21495.         } 
  21496.         // move pages 
  21497.         $this->Bookmark($toc_name, 0, 0, $page_first, $style, $color); 
  21498.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21499.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page_first); 
  21500.         } 
  21501.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numpages; ++$i) { 
  21502.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page); 
  21503.         } 
  21504.     } 
  21505. } 
  21506.  
  21507. /** 
  21508.  * Output a Table Of Content Index (TOC) using HTML templates. 
  21509.  * This method must be called after all Bookmarks were set. 
  21510.  * Before calling this method you have to open the page using the addTOCPage() method. 
  21511.  * After calling this method you have to call endTOCPage() to close the TOC page. 
  21512.  * @param $page (int) page number where this TOC should be inserted (leave empty for current page). 
  21513.  * @param $toc_name (string) name to use for TOC bookmark. 
  21514.  * @param $templates (array) array of html templates. Use: "#TOC_DESCRIPTION#" for bookmark title, "#TOC_PAGE_NUMBER#" for page number. 
  21515.  * @param $correct_align (boolean) if true correct the number alignment (numbers must be in monospaced font like courier and right aligned on LTR, or left aligned on RTL) 
  21516.  * @param $style (string) Font style for title: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  21517.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array for title (values from 0 to 255). 
  21518.  * @public 
  21519.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  21520.  * @since 5.0.001 (2010-05-06) 
  21521.  * @see addTOCPage(), endTOCPage(), addTOC() 
  21522.  */ 
  21523. public function addHTMLTOC($page='', $toc_name='TOC', $templates=array(), $correct_align=true, $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0)) { 
  21524.     $filler = ' '; 
  21525.     $prev_htmlLinkColorArray = $this->htmlLinkColorArray; 
  21526.     $prev_htmlLinkFontStyle = $this->htmlLinkFontStyle; 
  21527.     // set new style for link 
  21528.     $this->htmlLinkColorArray = array(); 
  21529.     $this->htmlLinkFontStyle = ''; 
  21530.     $page_first = $this->getPage(); 
  21531.     $page_fill_start = false; 
  21532.     $page_fill_end = false; 
  21533.     // get the font type used for numbers in each template 
  21534.     $current_font = $this->FontFamily; 
  21535.     foreach ($templates as $level => $html) { 
  21536.         $dom = $this->getHtmlDomArray($html); 
  21537.         foreach ($dom as $key => $value) { 
  21538.             if ($value['value'] == '#TOC_PAGE_NUMBER#') { 
  21539.                 $this->SetFont($dom[($key - 1)]['fontname']); 
  21540.                 $templates['F'.$level] = $this->isUnicodeFont(); 
  21541.             } 
  21542.         } 
  21543.     } 
  21544.     $this->SetFont($current_font); 
  21545.     $maxpage = 0; //used for pages on attached documents 
  21546.     foreach ($this->outlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21547.         // get HTML template 
  21548.         $row = $templates[$outline['l']]; 
  21549.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21550.             $pagenum = $outline['p']; 
  21551.         } else { 
  21552.             // placemark to be replaced with the correct number 
  21553.             $pagenum = '{#'.($outline['p']).'}'; 
  21554.             if ($templates['F'.$outline['l']]) { 
  21555.                 $pagenum = '{'.$pagenum.'}'; 
  21556.             } 
  21557.             $maxpage = max($maxpage, $outline['p']); 
  21558.         } 
  21559.         // replace templates with current values 
  21560.         $row = str_replace('#TOC_DESCRIPTION#', $outline['t'], $row); 
  21561.         $row = str_replace('#TOC_PAGE_NUMBER#', $pagenum, $row); 
  21562.         // add link to page 
  21563.         $row = '<a href="#'.$outline['p'].', '.$outline['y'].'">'.$row.'</a>'; 
  21564.         // write bookmark entry 
  21565.         $this->writeHTML($row, false, false, true, false, ''); 
  21566.     } 
  21567.     // restore link styles 
  21568.     $this->htmlLinkColorArray = $prev_htmlLinkColorArray; 
  21569.     $this->htmlLinkFontStyle = $prev_htmlLinkFontStyle; 
  21570.     // move TOC page and replace numbers 
  21571.     $page_last = $this->getPage(); 
  21572.     $numpages = ($page_last - $page_first + 1); 
  21573.     // account for booklet mode 
  21574.     if ($this->booklet) { 
  21575.         // check if a blank page is required before TOC 
  21576.         $page_fill_start = ((($page_first % 2) == 0) XOR (($page % 2) == 0)); 
  21577.         $page_fill_end = (!((($numpages % 2) == 0) XOR ($page_fill_start))); 
  21578.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21579.             // add a page at the end (to be moved before TOC) 
  21580.             $this->addPage(); 
  21581.             ++$page_last; 
  21582.             ++$numpages; 
  21583.         } 
  21584.         if ($page_fill_end) { 
  21585.             // add a page at the end 
  21586.             $this->addPage(); 
  21587.             ++$page_last; 
  21588.             ++$numpages; 
  21589.         } 
  21590.     } 
  21591.     $maxpage = max($maxpage, $page_last); 
  21592.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21593.         for ($p = $page_first; $p <= $page_last; ++$p) { 
  21594.             // get page data 
  21595.             $temppage = $this->getPageBuffer($p); 
  21596.             for ($n = 1; $n <= $maxpage; ++$n) { 
  21597.                 // update page numbers 
  21598.                 $a = '{#'.$n.'}'; 
  21599.                 // get page number aliases 
  21600.                 $pnalias = $this->getInternalPageNumberAliases($a); 
  21601.                 // calculate replacement number 
  21602.                 if ($n >= $page) { 
  21603.                     $np = $n + $numpages; 
  21604.                 } else { 
  21605.                     $np = $n; 
  21606.                 } 
  21607.                 $na = TCPDF_STATIC::formatTOCPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $np - 1)); 
  21608.                 $nu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($na, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21609.                 // replace aliases with numbers 
  21610.                 foreach ($pnalias['u'] as $u) { 
  21611.                     if ($correct_align) { 
  21612.                         $sfill = str_repeat($filler, (strlen($u) - strlen($nu.' '))); 
  21613.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21614.                             $nr = $nu.TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE(' '.$sfill, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21615.                         } else { 
  21616.                             $nr = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($sfill.' ', false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont).$nu; 
  21617.                         } 
  21618.                     } else { 
  21619.                         $nr = $nu; 
  21620.                     } 
  21621.                     $temppage = str_replace($u, $nr, $temppage); 
  21622.                 } 
  21623.                 foreach ($pnalias['a'] as $a) { 
  21624.                     if ($correct_align) { 
  21625.                         $sfill = str_repeat($filler, (strlen($a) - strlen($na.' '))); 
  21626.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21627.                             $nr = $na.' '.$sfill; 
  21628.                         } else { 
  21629.                             $nr = $sfill.' '.$na; 
  21630.                         } 
  21631.                     } else { 
  21632.                         $nr = $na; 
  21633.                     } 
  21634.                     $temppage = str_replace($a, $nr, $temppage); 
  21635.                 } 
  21636.             } 
  21637.             // save changes 
  21638.             $this->setPageBuffer($p, $temppage); 
  21639.         } 
  21640.         // move pages 
  21641.         $this->Bookmark($toc_name, 0, 0, $page_first, $style, $color); 
  21642.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21643.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page_first); 
  21644.         } 
  21645.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numpages; ++$i) { 
  21646.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page); 
  21647.         } 
  21648.     } 
  21649. } 
  21650.  
  21651. /** 
  21652.  * Stores a copy of the current TCPDF object used for undo operation. 
  21653.  * @public 
  21654.  * @since 4.5.029 (2009-03-19) 
  21655.  */ 
  21656. public function startTransaction() { 
  21657.     if (isset($this->objcopy)) { 
  21658.         // remove previous copy 
  21659.         $this->commitTransaction(); 
  21660.     } 
  21661.     // record current page number and Y position 
  21662.     $this->start_transaction_page = $this->page; 
  21663.     $this->start_transaction_y = $this->y; 
  21664.     // clone current object 
  21665.     $this->objcopy = TCPDF_STATIC::objclone($this); 
  21666. } 
  21667.  
  21668. /** 
  21669.  * Delete the copy of the current TCPDF object used for undo operation. 
  21670.  * @public 
  21671.  * @since 4.5.029 (2009-03-19) 
  21672.  */ 
  21673. public function commitTransaction() { 
  21674.     if (isset($this->objcopy)) { 
  21675.         $this->objcopy->_destroy(true, true); 
  21676.         unset($this->objcopy); 
  21677.     } 
  21678. } 
  21679.  
  21680. /** 
  21681.  * This method allows to undo the latest transaction by returning the latest saved TCPDF object with startTransaction(). 
  21682.  * @param $self (boolean) if true restores current class object to previous state without the need of reassignment via the returned value. 
  21683.  * @return TCPDF object. 
  21684.  * @public 
  21685.  * @since 4.5.029 (2009-03-19) 
  21686.  */ 
  21687. public function rollbackTransaction($self=false) { 
  21688.     if (isset($this->objcopy)) { 
  21689.         if (isset($this->objcopy->diskcache) AND $this->objcopy->diskcache) { 
  21690.             // truncate files to previous values 
  21691.             foreach ($this->objcopy->cache_file_length as $file => $length) { 
  21692.                 $file = substr($file, 1); 
  21693.                 $handle = fopen($file, 'r+'); 
  21694.                 ftruncate($handle, $length); 
  21695.             } 
  21696.         } 
  21697.         $this->_destroy(true, true); 
  21698.         if ($self) { 
  21699.             $objvars = get_object_vars($this->objcopy); 
  21700.             foreach ($objvars as $key => $value) { 
  21701.                 $this->$key = $value; 
  21702.             } 
  21703.         } 
  21704.         return $this->objcopy; 
  21705.     } 
  21706.     return $this; 
  21707. } 
  21708.  
  21709. // --- MULTI COLUMNS METHODS ----------------------- 
  21710.  
  21711. /** 
  21712.  * Set multiple columns of the same size 
  21713.  * @param $numcols (int) number of columns (set to zero to disable columns mode) 
  21714.  * @param $width (int) column width 
  21715.  * @param $y (int) column starting Y position (leave empty for current Y position) 
  21716.  * @public 
  21717.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  21718.  */ 
  21719. public function setEqualColumns($numcols=0, $width=0, $y='') { 
  21720.     $this->columns = array(); 
  21721.     if ($numcols < 2) { 
  21722.         $numcols = 0; 
  21723.         $this->columns = array(); 
  21724.     } else { 
  21725.         // maximum column width 
  21726.         $maxwidth = ($this->w - $this->original_lMargin - $this->original_rMargin) / $numcols; 
  21727.         if (($width == 0) OR ($width > $maxwidth)) { 
  21728.             $width = $maxwidth; 
  21729.         } 
  21730.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($y)) { 
  21731.             $y = $this->y; 
  21732.         } 
  21733.         // space between columns 
  21734.         $space = (($this->w - $this->original_lMargin - $this->original_rMargin - ($numcols * $width)) / ($numcols - 1)); 
  21735.         // fill the columns array (with, space, starting Y position) 
  21736.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; ++$i) { 
  21737.             $this->columns[$i] = array('w' => $width, 's' => $space, 'y' => $y); 
  21738.         } 
  21739.     } 
  21740.     $this->num_columns = $numcols; 
  21741.     $this->current_column = 0; 
  21742.     $this->column_start_page = $this->page; 
  21743.     $this->selectColumn(0); 
  21744. } 
  21745.  
  21746. /** 
  21747.  * Remove columns and reset page margins. 
  21748.  * @public 
  21749.  * @since 5.9.072 (2011-04-26) 
  21750.  */ 
  21751. public function resetColumns() { 
  21752.     $this->lMargin = $this->original_lMargin; 
  21753.     $this->rMargin = $this->original_rMargin; 
  21754.     $this->setEqualColumns(); 
  21755. } 
  21756.  
  21757. /** 
  21758.  * Set columns array. 
  21759.  * Each column is represented by an array of arrays with the following keys: (w = width, s = space between columns, y = column top position). 
  21760.  * @param $columns (array) 
  21761.  * @public 
  21762.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  21763.  */ 
  21764. public function setColumnsArray($columns) { 
  21765.     $this->columns = $columns; 
  21766.     $this->num_columns = count($columns); 
  21767.     $this->current_column = 0; 
  21768.     $this->column_start_page = $this->page; 
  21769.     $this->selectColumn(0); 
  21770. } 
  21771.  
  21772. /** 
  21773.  * Set position at a given column 
  21774.  * @param $col (int) column number (from 0 to getNumberOfColumns()-1); empty string = current column. 
  21775.  * @public 
  21776.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  21777.  */ 
  21778. public function selectColumn($col='') { 
  21779.     if (is_string($col)) { 
  21780.         $col = $this->current_column; 
  21781.     } elseif ($col >= $this->num_columns) { 
  21782.         $col = 0; 
  21783.     } 
  21784.     $xshift = array('x' => 0, 's' => array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0), 'p' => array('L' => 0, 'T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0)); 
  21785.     $enable_thead = false; 
  21786.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  21787.         if ($col != $this->current_column) { 
  21788.             // move Y pointer at the top of the column 
  21789.             if ($this->column_start_page == $this->page) { 
  21790.                 $this->y = $this->columns[$col]['y']; 
  21791.             } else { 
  21792.                 $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  21793.             } 
  21794.             // Avoid to write table headers more than once 
  21795.             if (($this->page > $this->maxselcol['page']) OR (($this->page == $this->maxselcol['page']) AND ($col > $this->maxselcol['column']))) { 
  21796.                 $enable_thead = true; 
  21797.                 $this->maxselcol['page'] = $this->page; 
  21798.                 $this->maxselcol['column'] = $col; 
  21799.             } 
  21800.         } 
  21801.         $xshift = $this->colxshift; 
  21802.         // set X position of the current column by case 
  21803.         $listindent = ($this->listindentlevel * $this->listindent); 
  21804.         // calculate column X position 
  21805.         $colpos = 0; 
  21806.         for ($i = 0; $i < $col; ++$i) { 
  21807.             $colpos += ($this->columns[$i]['w'] + $this->columns[$i]['s']); 
  21808.         } 
  21809.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21810.             $x = $this->w - $this->original_rMargin - $colpos; 
  21811.             $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $x + $listindent); 
  21812.             $this->lMargin = ($x - $this->columns[$col]['w']); 
  21813.             $this->x = $x - $listindent; 
  21814.         } else { 
  21815.             $x = $this->original_lMargin + $colpos; 
  21816.             $this->lMargin = ($x + $listindent); 
  21817.             $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $x - $this->columns[$col]['w']); 
  21818.             $this->x = $x + $listindent; 
  21819.         } 
  21820.         $this->columns[$col]['x'] = $x; 
  21821.     } 
  21822.     $this->current_column = $col; 
  21823.     // fix for HTML mode 
  21824.     $this->newline = true; 
  21825.     // print HTML table header (if any) 
  21826.     if ((!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->thead)) AND (!$this->inthead)) { 
  21827.         if ($enable_thead) { 
  21828.             // print table header 
  21829.             $this->writeHTML($this->thead, false, false, false, false, ''); 
  21830.             $this->y += $xshift['s']['V']; 
  21831.             // store end of header position 
  21832.             if (!isset($this->columns[$col]['th'])) { 
  21833.                 $this->columns[$col]['th'] = array(); 
  21834.             } 
  21835.             $this->columns[$col]['th']['\''.$this->page.'\''] = $this->y; 
  21836.             $this->lasth = 0; 
  21837.         } elseif (isset($this->columns[$col]['th']['\''.$this->page.'\''])) { 
  21838.             $this->y = $this->columns[$col]['th']['\''.$this->page.'\'']; 
  21839.         } 
  21840.     } 
  21841.     // account for an html table cell over multiple columns 
  21842.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  21843.         $this->rMargin += $xshift['x']; 
  21844.         $this->x -= ($xshift['x'] + $xshift['p']['R']); 
  21845.     } else { 
  21846.         $this->lMargin += $xshift['x']; 
  21847.         $this->x += $xshift['x'] + $xshift['p']['L']; 
  21848.     } 
  21849. } 
  21850.  
  21851. /** 
  21852.  * Return the current column number 
  21853.  * @return int current column number 
  21854.  * @public 
  21855.  * @since 5.5.011 (2010-07-08) 
  21856.  */ 
  21857. public function getColumn() { 
  21858.     return $this->current_column; 
  21859. } 
  21860.  
  21861. /** 
  21862.  * Return the current number of columns. 
  21863.  * @return int number of columns 
  21864.  * @public 
  21865.  * @since 5.8.018 (2010-08-25) 
  21866.  */ 
  21867. public function getNumberOfColumns() { 
  21868.     return $this->num_columns; 
  21869. } 
  21870.  
  21871. /** 
  21872.  * Set Text rendering mode. 
  21873.  * @param $stroke (int) outline size in user units (0 = disable). 
  21874.  * @param $fill (boolean) if true fills the text (default). 
  21875.  * @param $clip (boolean) if true activate clipping mode 
  21876.  * @public 
  21877.  * @since 4.9.008 (2009-04-02) 
  21878.  */ 
  21879. public function setTextRenderingMode($stroke=0, $fill=true, $clip=false) { 
  21880.     // Ref.: PDF 32000-1:2008 - 9.3.6 Text Rendering Mode 
  21881.     // convert text rendering parameters 
  21882.     if ($stroke < 0) { 
  21883.         $stroke = 0; 
  21884.     } 
  21885.     if ($fill === true) { 
  21886.         if ($stroke > 0) { 
  21887.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21888.                 // Fill, then stroke text and add to path for clipping 
  21889.                 $textrendermode = 6; 
  21890.             } else { 
  21891.                 // Fill, then stroke text 
  21892.                 $textrendermode = 2; 
  21893.             } 
  21894.             $textstrokewidth = $stroke; 
  21895.         } else { 
  21896.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21897.                 // Fill text and add to path for clipping 
  21898.                 $textrendermode = 4; 
  21899.             } else { 
  21900.                 // Fill text 
  21901.                 $textrendermode = 0; 
  21902.             } 
  21903.         } 
  21904.     } else { 
  21905.         if ($stroke > 0) { 
  21906.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21907.                 // Stroke text and add to path for clipping 
  21908.                 $textrendermode = 5; 
  21909.             } else { 
  21910.                 // Stroke text 
  21911.                 $textrendermode = 1; 
  21912.             } 
  21913.             $textstrokewidth = $stroke; 
  21914.         } else { 
  21915.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21916.                 // Add text to path for clipping 
  21917.                 $textrendermode = 7; 
  21918.             } else { 
  21919.                 // Neither fill nor stroke text (invisible) 
  21920.                 $textrendermode = 3; 
  21921.             } 
  21922.         } 
  21923.     } 
  21924.     $this->textrendermode = $textrendermode; 
  21925.     $this->textstrokewidth = $stroke; 
  21926. } 
  21927.  
  21928. /** 
  21929.  * Set parameters for drop shadow effect for text. 
  21930.  * @param $params (array) Array of parameters: enabled (boolean) set to true to enable shadow; depth_w (float) shadow width in user units; depth_h (float) shadow height in user units; color (array) shadow color or false to use the stroke color; opacity (float) Alpha value: real value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque); blend_mode (string) blend mode, one of the following: Normal, Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Darken, Lighten, ColorDodge, ColorBurn, HardLight, SoftLight, Difference, Exclusion, Hue, Saturation, Color, Luminosity. 
  21931.  * @since 5.9.174 (2012-07-25) 
  21932.  * @public 
  21933. */ 
  21934. public function setTextShadow($params=array('enabled'=>false, 'depth_w'=>0, 'depth_h'=>0, 'color'=>false, 'opacity'=>1, 'blend_mode'=>'Normal')) { 
  21935.     if (isset($params['enabled'])) { 
  21936.         $this->txtshadow['enabled'] = $params['enabled']?true:false; 
  21937.     } else { 
  21938.         $this->txtshadow['enabled'] = false; 
  21939.     } 
  21940.     if (isset($params['depth_w'])) { 
  21941.         $this->txtshadow['depth_w'] = floatval($params['depth_w']); 
  21942.     } else { 
  21943.         $this->txtshadow['depth_w'] = 0; 
  21944.     } 
  21945.     if (isset($params['depth_h'])) { 
  21946.         $this->txtshadow['depth_h'] = floatval($params['depth_h']); 
  21947.     } else { 
  21948.         $this->txtshadow['depth_h'] = 0; 
  21949.     } 
  21950.     if (isset($params['color']) AND ($params['color'] !== false) AND is_array($params['color'])) { 
  21951.         $this->txtshadow['color'] = $params['color']; 
  21952.     } else { 
  21953.         $this->txtshadow['color'] = $this->strokecolor; 
  21954.     } 
  21955.     if (isset($params['opacity'])) { 
  21956.         $this->txtshadow['opacity'] = min(1, max(0, floatval($params['opacity']))); 
  21957.     } else { 
  21958.         $this->txtshadow['opacity'] = 1; 
  21959.     } 
  21960.     if (isset($params['blend_mode']) AND in_array($params['blend_mode'], array('Normal', 'Multiply', 'Screen', 'Overlay', 'Darken', 'Lighten', 'ColorDodge', 'ColorBurn', 'HardLight', 'SoftLight', 'Difference', 'Exclusion', 'Hue', 'Saturation', 'Color', 'Luminosity'))) { 
  21961.         $this->txtshadow['blend_mode'] = $params['blend_mode']; 
  21962.     } else { 
  21963.         $this->txtshadow['blend_mode'] = 'Normal'; 
  21964.     } 
  21965.     if ((($this->txtshadow['depth_w'] == 0) AND ($this->txtshadow['depth_h'] == 0)) OR ($this->txtshadow['opacity'] == 0)) { 
  21966.         $this->txtshadow['enabled'] = false; 
  21967.     } 
  21968. } 
  21969.  
  21970. /** 
  21971.  * Return the text shadow parameters array. 
  21972.  * @return Array of parameters. 
  21973.  * @since 5.9.174 (2012-07-25) 
  21974.  * @public 
  21975.  */ 
  21976. public function getTextShadow() { 
  21977.     return $this->txtshadow; 
  21978. } 
  21979.  
  21980. /** 
  21981.  * Returns an array of chars containing soft hyphens. 
  21982.  * @param $word (array) array of chars 
  21983.  * @param $patterns (array) Array of hypenation patterns. 
  21984.  * @param $dictionary (array) Array of words to be returned without applying the hyphenation algoritm. 
  21985.  * @param $leftmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the left of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  21986.  * @param $rightmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the right of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  21987.  * @param $charmin (int) Minimum word length to apply the hyphenation algoritm. 
  21988.  * @param $charmax (int) Maximum length of broken piece of word. 
  21989.  * @return array text with soft hyphens 
  21990.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  21991.  * @since 4.9.012 (2010-04-12) 
  21992.  * @protected 
  21993.  */ 
  21994. protected function hyphenateWord($word, $patterns, $dictionary=array(), $leftmin=1, $rightmin=2, $charmin=1, $charmax=8) { 
  21995.     $hyphenword = array(); // hyphens positions 
  21996.     $numchars = count($word); 
  21997.     if ($numchars <= $charmin) { 
  21998.         return $word; 
  21999.     } 
  22000.     $word_string = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrSubString($word, '', '', $this->isunicode); 
  22001.     // some words will be returned as-is 
  22002.     $pattern = '/^([a-zA-Z0-9_\.\-]+)@((\[[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2, 4}|[0-9]{1, 3})(\]?)$/'; 
  22003.     if (preg_match($pattern, $word_string) > 0) { 
  22004.         // email 
  22005.         return $word; 
  22006.     } 
  22007.     $pattern = '/(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)?)((\[[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2, 4}|[0-9]{1, 3})(\]?)$/'; 
  22008.     if (preg_match($pattern, $word_string) > 0) { 
  22009.         // URL 
  22010.         return $word; 
  22011.     } 
  22012.     if (isset($dictionary[$word_string])) { 
  22013.         return TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($dictionary[$word_string], $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  22014.     } 
  22015.     // surround word with '_' characters 
  22016.     $tmpword = array_merge(array(46), $word, array(46)); 
  22017.     $tmpnumchars = $numchars + 2; 
  22018.     $maxpos = $tmpnumchars - $charmin; 
  22019.     for ($pos = 0; $pos < $maxpos; ++$pos) { 
  22020.         $imax = min(($tmpnumchars - $pos), $charmax); 
  22021.         for ($i = $charmin; $i <= $imax; ++$i) { 
  22022.             $subword = strtolower(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrSubString($tmpword, $pos, ($pos + $i), $this->isunicode)); 
  22023.             if (isset($patterns[$subword])) { 
  22024.                 $pattern = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($patterns[$subword], $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  22025.                 $pattern_length = count($pattern); 
  22026.                 $digits = 1; 
  22027.                 for ($j = 0; $j < $pattern_length; ++$j) { 
  22028.                     // check if $pattern[$j] is a number = hyphenation level (only numbers from 1 to 5 are valid) 
  22029.                     if (($pattern[$j] >= 48) AND ($pattern[$j] <= 57)) { 
  22030.                         if ($j == 0) { 
  22031.                             $zero = $pos - 1; 
  22032.                         } else { 
  22033.                             $zero = $pos + $j - $digits; 
  22034.                         } 
  22035.                         // get hyphenation level 
  22036.                         $level = ($pattern[$j] - 48); 
  22037.                         // if two levels from two different patterns match at the same point, the higher one is selected. 
  22038.                         if (!isset($hyphenword[$zero]) OR ($hyphenword[$zero] < $level)) { 
  22039.                             $hyphenword[$zero] = $level; 
  22040.                         } 
  22041.                         ++$digits; 
  22042.                     } 
  22043.                 } 
  22044.             } 
  22045.         } 
  22046.     } 
  22047.     $inserted = 0; 
  22048.     $maxpos = $numchars - $rightmin; 
  22049.     for ($i = $leftmin; $i <= $maxpos; ++$i) { 
  22050.         // only odd levels indicate allowed hyphenation points 
  22051.         if (isset($hyphenword[$i]) AND (($hyphenword[$i] % 2) != 0)) { 
  22052.             // 173 = soft hyphen character 
  22053.             array_splice($word, $i + $inserted, 0, 173); 
  22054.             ++$inserted; 
  22055.         } 
  22056.     } 
  22057.     return $word; 
  22058. } 
  22059.  
  22060. /** 
  22061.  * Returns text with soft hyphens. 
  22062.  * @param $text (string) text to process 
  22063.  * @param $patterns (mixed) Array of hypenation patterns or a TEX file containing hypenation patterns. TEX patterns can be downloaded from http://www.ctan.org/tex-archive/language/hyph-utf8/tex/generic/hyph-utf8/patterns/ 
  22064.  * @param $dictionary (array) Array of words to be returned without applying the hyphenation algoritm. 
  22065.  * @param $leftmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the left of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  22066.  * @param $rightmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the right of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  22067.  * @param $charmin (int) Minimum word length to apply the hyphenation algoritm. 
  22068.  * @param $charmax (int) Maximum length of broken piece of word. 
  22069.  * @return array text with soft hyphens 
  22070.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22071.  * @since 4.9.012 (2010-04-12) 
  22072.  * @public 
  22073.  */ 
  22074. public function hyphenateText($text, $patterns, $dictionary=array(), $leftmin=1, $rightmin=2, $charmin=1, $charmax=8) { 
  22075.     $text = $this->unhtmlentities($text); 
  22076.     $word = array(); // last word 
  22077.     $txtarr = array(); // text to be returned 
  22078.     $intag = false; // true if we are inside an HTML tag 
  22079.     $skip = false; // true to skip hyphenation 
  22080.     if (!is_array($patterns)) { 
  22081.         $patterns = TCPDF_STATIC::getHyphenPatternsFromTEX($patterns); 
  22082.     } 
  22083.     // get array of characters 
  22084.     $unichars = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($text, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  22085.     // for each char 
  22086.     foreach ($unichars as $char) { 
  22087.         if ((!$intag) AND (!$skip) AND TCPDF_FONT_DATA::$uni_type[$char] == 'L') { 
  22088.             // letter character 
  22089.             $word[] = $char; 
  22090.         } else { 
  22091.             // other type of character 
  22092.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($word)) { 
  22093.                 // hypenate the word 
  22094.                 $txtarr = array_merge($txtarr, $this->hyphenateWord($word, $patterns, $dictionary, $leftmin, $rightmin, $charmin, $charmax)); 
  22095.                 $word = array(); 
  22096.             } 
  22097.             $txtarr[] = $char; 
  22098.             if (chr($char) == '<') { 
  22099.                 // we are inside an HTML tag 
  22100.                 $intag = true; 
  22101.             } elseif ($intag AND (chr($char) == '>')) { 
  22102.                 // end of HTML tag 
  22103.                 $intag = false; 
  22104.                 // check for style tag 
  22105.                 $expected = array(115, 116, 121, 108, 101); // = 'style' 
  22106.                 $current = array_slice($txtarr, -6, 5); // last 5 chars 
  22107.                 $compare = array_diff($expected, $current); 
  22108.                 if (empty($compare)) { 
  22109.                     // check if it is a closing tag 
  22110.                     $expected = array(47); // = '/' 
  22111.                     $current = array_slice($txtarr, -7, 1); 
  22112.                     $compare = array_diff($expected, $current); 
  22113.                     if (empty($compare)) { 
  22114.                         // closing style tag 
  22115.                         $skip = false; 
  22116.                     } else { 
  22117.                         // opening style tag 
  22118.                         $skip = true; 
  22119.                     } 
  22120.                 } 
  22121.             } 
  22122.         } 
  22123.     } 
  22124.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($word)) { 
  22125.         // hypenate the word 
  22126.         $txtarr = array_merge($txtarr, $this->hyphenateWord($word, $patterns, $dictionary, $leftmin, $rightmin, $charmin, $charmax)); 
  22127.     } 
  22128.     // convert char array to string and return 
  22129.     return TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrSubString($txtarr, '', '', $this->isunicode); 
  22130. } 
  22131.  
  22132. /** 
  22133.  * Enable/disable rasterization of vector images using ImageMagick library. 
  22134.  * @param $mode (boolean) if true enable rasterization, false otherwise. 
  22135.  * @public 
  22136.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-04-27) 
  22137.  */ 
  22138. public function setRasterizeVectorImages($mode) { 
  22139.     $this->rasterize_vector_images = $mode; 
  22140. } 
  22141.  
  22142. /** 
  22143.  * Enable or disable default option for font subsetting. 
  22144.  * @param $enable (boolean) if true enable font subsetting by default. 
  22145.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22146.  * @public 
  22147.  * @since 5.3.002 (2010-06-07) 
  22148.  */ 
  22149. public function setFontSubsetting($enable=true) { 
  22150.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  22151.         $this->font_subsetting = false; 
  22152.     } else { 
  22153.         $this->font_subsetting = $enable ? true : false; 
  22154.     } 
  22155. } 
  22156.  
  22157. /** 
  22158.  * Return the default option for font subsetting. 
  22159.  * @return boolean default font subsetting state. 
  22160.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22161.  * @public 
  22162.  * @since 5.3.002 (2010-06-07) 
  22163.  */ 
  22164. public function getFontSubsetting() { 
  22165.     return $this->font_subsetting; 
  22166. } 
  22167.  
  22168. /** 
  22169.  * Left trim the input string 
  22170.  * @param $str (string) string to trim 
  22171.  * @param $replace (string) string that replace spaces. 
  22172.  * @return left trimmed string 
  22173.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22174.  * @public 
  22175.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  22176.  */ 
  22177. public function stringLeftTrim($str, $replace='') { 
  22178.     return preg_replace('/^'.$this->re_space['p'].'+/'.$this->re_space['m'], $replace, $str); 
  22179. } 
  22180.  
  22181. /** 
  22182.  * Right trim the input string 
  22183.  * @param $str (string) string to trim 
  22184.  * @param $replace (string) string that replace spaces. 
  22185.  * @return right trimmed string 
  22186.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22187.  * @public 
  22188.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  22189.  */ 
  22190. public function stringRightTrim($str, $replace='') { 
  22191.     return preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+$/'.$this->re_space['m'], $replace, $str); 
  22192. } 
  22193.  
  22194. /** 
  22195.  * Trim the input string 
  22196.  * @param $str (string) string to trim 
  22197.  * @param $replace (string) string that replace spaces. 
  22198.  * @return trimmed string 
  22199.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22200.  * @public 
  22201.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  22202.  */ 
  22203. public function stringTrim($str, $replace='') { 
  22204.     $str = $this->stringLeftTrim($str, $replace); 
  22205.     $str = $this->stringRightTrim($str, $replace); 
  22206.     return $str; 
  22207. } 
  22208.  
  22209. /** 
  22210.  * Return true if the current font is unicode type. 
  22211.  * @return true for unicode font, false otherwise. 
  22212.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22213.  * @public 
  22214.  * @since 5.8.002 (2010-08-14) 
  22215.  */ 
  22216. public function isUnicodeFont() { 
  22217.     return (($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'TrueTypeUnicode') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'cidfont0')); 
  22218. } 
  22219.  
  22220. /** 
  22221.  * Return normalized font name 
  22222.  * @param $fontfamily (string) property string containing font family names 
  22223.  * @return string normalized font name 
  22224.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22225.  * @public 
  22226.  * @since 5.8.004 (2010-08-17) 
  22227.  */ 
  22228. public function getFontFamilyName($fontfamily) { 
  22229.     // remove spaces and symbols 
  22230.     $fontfamily = preg_replace('/[^a-z0-9_\, ]/', '', strtolower($fontfamily)); 
  22231.     // extract all font names 
  22232.     $fontslist = preg_split('/[, ]/', $fontfamily); 
  22233.     // find first valid font name 
  22234.     foreach ($fontslist as $font) { 
  22235.         // replace font variations 
  22236.         $font = preg_replace('/italic$/', 'I', $font); 
  22237.         $font = preg_replace('/oblique$/', 'I', $font); 
  22238.         $font = preg_replace('/bold([I]?)$/', 'B\\1', $font); 
  22239.         // replace common family names and core fonts 
  22240.         $pattern = array(); 
  22241.         $replacement = array(); 
  22242.         $pattern[] = '/^serif|^cursive|^fantasy|^timesnewroman/'; 
  22243.         $replacement[] = 'times'; 
  22244.         $pattern[] = '/^sansserif/'; 
  22245.         $replacement[] = 'helvetica'; 
  22246.         $pattern[] = '/^monospace/'; 
  22247.         $replacement[] = 'courier'; 
  22248.         $font = preg_replace($pattern, $replacement, $font); 
  22249.         if (in_array(strtolower($font), $this->fontlist) OR in_array($font, $this->fontkeys)) { 
  22250.             return $font; 
  22251.         } 
  22252.     } 
  22253.     // return current font as default 
  22254.     return $this->CurrentFont['fontkey']; 
  22255. } 
  22256.  
  22257. /** 
  22258.  * Start a new XObject Template. 
  22259.  * An XObject Template is a PDF block that is a self-contained description of any sequence of graphics objects (including path objects, text objects, and sampled images). 
  22260.  * An XObject Template may be painted multiple times, either on several pages or at several locations on the same page and produces the same results each time, subject only to the graphics state at the time it is invoked. 
  22261.  * Note: X, Y coordinates will be reset to 0, 0. 
  22262.  * @param $w (int) Template width in user units (empty string or zero = page width less margins). 
  22263.  * @param $h (int) Template height in user units (empty string or zero = page height less margins). 
  22264.  * @param $group (mixed) Set transparency group. Can be a boolean value or an array specifying optional parameters: 'CS' (solour space name), 'I' (boolean flag to indicate isolated group) and 'K' (boolean flag to indicate knockout group). 
  22265.  * @return int the XObject Template ID in case of success or false in case of error. 
  22266.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22267.  * @public 
  22268.  * @since 5.8.017 (2010-08-24) 
  22269.  * @see endTemplate(), printTemplate() 
  22270.  */ 
  22271. public function startTemplate($w=0, $h=0, $group=false) { 
  22272.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  22273.         // we are already inside an XObject template 
  22274.         return false; 
  22275.     } 
  22276.     $this->inxobj = true; 
  22277.     ++$this->n; 
  22278.     // XObject ID 
  22279.     $this->xobjid = 'XT'.$this->n; 
  22280.     // object ID 
  22281.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid] = array('n' => $this->n); 
  22282.     // store current graphic state 
  22283.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['gvars'] = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  22284.     // initialize data 
  22285.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] = 0; 
  22286.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'] = array(); 
  22287.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = ''; 
  22288.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['xobjects'] = array(); 
  22289.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['images'] = array(); 
  22290.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['fonts'] = array(); 
  22291.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'] = array(); 
  22292.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['extgstates'] = array(); 
  22293.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['gradients'] = array(); 
  22294.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['spot_colors'] = array(); 
  22295.     // set new environment 
  22296.     $this->num_columns = 1; 
  22297.     $this->current_column = 0; 
  22298.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak(false); 
  22299.     if (($w === '') OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  22300.         $w = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  22301.     } 
  22302.     if (($h === '') OR ($h <= 0)) { 
  22303.         $h = $this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin; 
  22304.     } 
  22305.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['x'] = 0; 
  22306.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['y'] = 0; 
  22307.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['w'] = $w; 
  22308.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['h'] = $h; 
  22309.     $this->w = $w; 
  22310.     $this->h = $h; 
  22311.     $this->wPt = $this->w * $this->k; 
  22312.     $this->hPt = $this->h * $this->k; 
  22313.     $this->fwPt = $this->wPt; 
  22314.     $this->fhPt = $this->hPt; 
  22315.     $this->x = 0; 
  22316.     $this->y = 0; 
  22317.     $this->lMargin = 0; 
  22318.     $this->rMargin = 0; 
  22319.     $this->tMargin = 0; 
  22320.     $this->bMargin = 0; 
  22321.     // set group mode 
  22322.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['group'] = $group; 
  22323.     return $this->xobjid; 
  22324. } 
  22325.  
  22326. /** 
  22327.  * End the current XObject Template started with startTemplate() and restore the previous graphic state. 
  22328.  * An XObject Template is a PDF block that is a self-contained description of any sequence of graphics objects (including path objects, text objects, and sampled images). 
  22329.  * An XObject Template may be painted multiple times, either on several pages or at several locations on the same page and produces the same results each time, subject only to the graphics state at the time it is invoked. 
  22330.  * @return int the XObject Template ID in case of success or false in case of error. 
  22331.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22332.  * @public 
  22333.  * @since 5.8.017 (2010-08-24) 
  22334.  * @see startTemplate(), printTemplate() 
  22335.  */ 
  22336. public function endTemplate() { 
  22337.     if (!$this->inxobj) { 
  22338.         // we are not inside a template 
  22339.         return false; 
  22340.     } 
  22341.     $this->inxobj = false; 
  22342.     // restore previous graphic state 
  22343.     $this->setGraphicVars($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['gvars'], true); 
  22344.     return $this->xobjid; 
  22345. } 
  22346.  
  22347. /** 
  22348.  * Print an XObject Template. 
  22349.  * You can print an XObject Template inside the currently opened Template. 
  22350.  * An XObject Template is a PDF block that is a self-contained description of any sequence of graphics objects (including path objects, text objects, and sampled images). 
  22351.  * An XObject Template may be painted multiple times, either on several pages or at several locations on the same page and produces the same results each time, subject only to the graphics state at the time it is invoked. 
  22352.  * @param $id (string) The ID of XObject Template to print. 
  22353.  * @param $x (int) X position in user units (empty string = current x position) 
  22354.  * @param $y (int) Y position in user units (empty string = current y position) 
  22355.  * @param $w (int) Width in user units (zero = remaining page width) 
  22356.  * @param $h (int) Height in user units (zero = remaining page height) 
  22357.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to template insertion relative to template height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> 
  22358.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the template on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  22359.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) If true the template is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  22360.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22361.  * @public 
  22362.  * @since 5.8.017 (2010-08-24) 
  22363.  * @see startTemplate(), endTemplate() 
  22364.  */ 
  22365. public function printTemplate($id, $x='', $y='', $w=0, $h=0, $align='', $palign='', $fitonpage=false) { 
  22366.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  22367.          return; 
  22368.     } 
  22369.     if (!isset($this->xobjects[$id])) { 
  22370.         $this->Error('The XObject Template \''.$id.'\' doesn\'t exist!'); 
  22371.     } 
  22372.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  22373.         if ($id == $this->xobjid) { 
  22374.             // close current template 
  22375.             $this->endTemplate(); 
  22376.         } else { 
  22377.             // use the template as resource for the template currently opened 
  22378.             $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['xobjects'][$id] = $this->xobjects[$id]; 
  22379.         } 
  22380.     } 
  22381.     // set default values 
  22382.     if ($x === '') { 
  22383.         $x = $this->x; 
  22384.     } 
  22385.     if ($y === '') { 
  22386.         $y = $this->y; 
  22387.     } 
  22388.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  22389.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  22390.     $ow = $this->xobjects[$id]['w']; 
  22391.     if ($ow <= 0) { 
  22392.         $ow = 1; 
  22393.     } 
  22394.     $oh = $this->xobjects[$id]['h']; 
  22395.     if ($oh <= 0) { 
  22396.         $oh = 1; 
  22397.     } 
  22398.     // calculate template width and height on document 
  22399.     if (($w <= 0) AND ($h <= 0)) { 
  22400.         $w = $ow; 
  22401.         $h = $oh; 
  22402.     } elseif ($w <= 0) { 
  22403.         $w = $h * $ow / $oh;
