  22404.     } elseif ($h <= 0) { 
  22405.         $h = $w * $oh / $ow; 
  22406.     } 
  22407.     // fit the template on available space 
  22408.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage); 
  22409.     // set page alignment 
  22410.     $rb_y = $y + $h; 
  22411.     // set alignment 
  22412.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  22413.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22414.             $xt = $this->lMargin; 
  22415.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22416.             $xt = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22417.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22418.             $xt = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22419.         } else { 
  22420.             $xt = $x - $w; 
  22421.         } 
  22422.         $rb_x = $xt; 
  22423.     } else { 
  22424.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22425.             $xt = $this->lMargin; 
  22426.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22427.             $xt = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22428.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22429.             $xt = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22430.         } else { 
  22431.             $xt = $x; 
  22432.         } 
  22433.         $rb_x = $xt + $w; 
  22434.     } 
  22435.     // print XObject Template + Transformation matrix 
  22436.     $this->StartTransform(); 
  22437.     // translate and scale 
  22438.     $sx = ($w / $ow); 
  22439.     $sy = ($h / $oh); 
  22440.     $tm = array(); 
  22441.     $tm[0] = $sx; 
  22442.     $tm[1] = 0; 
  22443.     $tm[2] = 0; 
  22444.     $tm[3] = $sy; 
  22445.     $tm[4] = $xt * $this->k; 
  22446.     $tm[5] = ($this->h - $h - $y) * $this->k; 
  22447.     $this->Transform($tm); 
  22448.     // set object 
  22449.     $this->_out('/'.$id.' Do'); 
  22450.     $this->StopTransform(); 
  22451.     // add annotations 
  22452.     if (!empty($this->xobjects[$id]['annotations'])) { 
  22453.         foreach ($this->xobjects[$id]['annotations'] as $annot) { 
  22454.             // transform original coordinates 
  22455.             $coordlt = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array(1, 0, 0, 1, ($annot['x'] * $this->k), (-$annot['y'] * $this->k))); 
  22456.             $ax = ($coordlt[4] / $this->k); 
  22457.             $ay = ($this->h - $h - ($coordlt[5] / $this->k)); 
  22458.             $coordrb = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array(1, 0, 0, 1, (($annot['x'] + $annot['w']) * $this->k), ((-$annot['y'] - $annot['h']) * $this->k))); 
  22459.             $aw = ($coordrb[4] / $this->k) - $ax; 
  22460.             $ah = ($this->h - $h - ($coordrb[5] / $this->k)) - $ay; 
  22461.             $this->Annotation($ax, $ay, $aw, $ah, $annot['text'], $annot['opt'], $annot['spaces']); 
  22462.         } 
  22463.     } 
  22464.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  22465.     switch($align) { 
  22466.         case 'T': { 
  22467.             $this->y = $y; 
  22468.             $this->x = $rb_x; 
  22469.             break; 
  22470.         } 
  22471.         case 'M': { 
  22472.             $this->y = $y + round($h/2); 
  22473.             $this->x = $rb_x; 
  22474.             break; 
  22475.         } 
  22476.         case 'B': { 
  22477.             $this->y = $rb_y; 
  22478.             $this->x = $rb_x; 
  22479.             break; 
  22480.         } 
  22481.         case 'N': { 
  22482.             $this->SetY($rb_y); 
  22483.             break; 
  22484.         } 
  22485.         default:{ 
  22486.             break; 
  22487.         } 
  22488.     } 
  22489. } 
  22490.  
  22491. /** 
  22492.  * Set the percentage of character stretching. 
  22493.  * @param $perc (int) percentage of stretching (100 = no stretching) 
  22494.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22495.  * @public 
  22496.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22497.  */ 
  22498. public function setFontStretching($perc=100) { 
  22499.     $this->font_stretching = $perc; 
  22500. } 
  22501.  
  22502. /** 
  22503.  * Get the percentage of character stretching. 
  22504.  * @return float stretching value 
  22505.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22506.  * @public 
  22507.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22508.  */ 
  22509. public function getFontStretching() { 
  22510.     return $this->font_stretching; 
  22511. } 
  22512.  
  22513. /** 
  22514.  * Set the amount to increase or decrease the space between characters in a text. 
  22515.  * @param $spacing (float) amount to increase or decrease the space between characters in a text (0 = default spacing) 
  22516.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22517.  * @public 
  22518.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22519.  */ 
  22520. public function setFontSpacing($spacing=0) { 
  22521.     $this->font_spacing = $spacing; 
  22522. } 
  22523.  
  22524. /** 
  22525.  * Get the amount to increase or decrease the space between characters in a text. 
  22526.  * @return int font spacing (tracking) value 
  22527.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22528.  * @public 
  22529.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22530.  */ 
  22531. public function getFontSpacing() { 
  22532.     return $this->font_spacing; 
  22533. } 
  22534.  
  22535. /** 
  22536.  * Return an array of no-write page regions 
  22537.  * @return array of no-write page regions 
  22538.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22539.  * @public 
  22540.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22541.  * @see setPageRegions(), addPageRegion() 
  22542.  */ 
  22543. public function getPageRegions() { 
  22544.     return $this->page_regions; 
  22545. } 
  22546.  
  22547. /** 
  22548.  * Set no-write regions on page. 
  22549.  * A no-write region is a portion of the page with a rectangular or trapezium shape that will not be covered when writing text or html code. 
  22550.  * A region is always aligned on the left or right side of the page ad is defined using a vertical segment. 
  22551.  * You can set multiple regions for the same page. 
  22552.  * @param $regions (array) array of no-write regions. For each region you can define an array as follow: ('page' => page number or empy for current page, 'xt' => X top, 'yt' => Y top, 'xb' => X bottom, 'yb' => Y bottom, 'side' => page side 'L' = left or 'R' = right). Omit this parameter to remove all regions. 
  22553.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22554.  * @public 
  22555.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22556.  * @see addPageRegion(), getPageRegions() 
  22557.  */ 
  22558. public function setPageRegions($regions=array()) { 
  22559.     // empty current regions array 
  22560.     $this->page_regions = array(); 
  22561.     // add regions 
  22562.     foreach ($regions as $data) { 
  22563.         $this->addPageRegion($data); 
  22564.     } 
  22565. } 
  22566.  
  22567. /** 
  22568.  * Add a single no-write region on selected page. 
  22569.  * A no-write region is a portion of the page with a rectangular or trapezium shape that will not be covered when writing text or html code. 
  22570.  * A region is always aligned on the left or right side of the page ad is defined using a vertical segment. 
  22571.  * You can set multiple regions for the same page. 
  22572.  * @param $region (array) array of a single no-write region array: ('page' => page number or empy for current page, 'xt' => X top, 'yt' => Y top, 'xb' => X bottom, 'yb' => Y bottom, 'side' => page side 'L' = left or 'R' = right). 
  22573.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22574.  * @public 
  22575.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22576.  * @see setPageRegions(), getPageRegions() 
  22577.  */ 
  22578. public function addPageRegion($region) { 
  22579.     if (!isset($region['page']) OR empty($region['page'])) { 
  22580.         $region['page'] = $this->page; 
  22581.     } 
  22582.     if (isset($region['xt']) AND isset($region['xb']) AND ($region['xt'] > 0) AND ($region['xb'] > 0) 
  22583.         AND isset($region['yt'])  AND isset($region['yb']) AND ($region['yt'] >= 0) AND ($region['yt'] < $region['yb']) 
  22584.         AND isset($region['side']) AND (($region['side'] == 'L') OR ($region['side'] == 'R'))) { 
  22585.         $this->page_regions[] = $region; 
  22586.     } 
  22587. } 
  22588.  
  22589. /** 
  22590.  * Remove a single no-write region. 
  22591.  * @param $key (int) region key 
  22592.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22593.  * @public 
  22594.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22595.  * @see setPageRegions(), getPageRegions() 
  22596.  */ 
  22597. public function removePageRegion($key) { 
  22598.     if (isset($this->page_regions[$key])) { 
  22599.         unset($this->page_regions[$key]); 
  22600.     } 
  22601. } 
  22602.  
  22603. /** 
  22604.  * Check page for no-write regions and adapt current coordinates and page margins if necessary. 
  22605.  * A no-write region is a portion of the page with a rectangular or trapezium shape that will not be covered when writing text or html code. 
  22606.  * A region is always aligned on the left or right side of the page ad is defined using a vertical segment. 
  22607.  * @param $h (float) height of the text/image/object to print in user units 
  22608.  * @param $x (float) current X coordinate in user units 
  22609.  * @param $y (float) current Y coordinate in user units 
  22610.  * @return array($x, $y) 
  22611.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22612.  * @protected 
  22613.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22614.  */ 
  22615. protected function checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y) { 
  22616.     // set default values 
  22617.     if ($x === '') { 
  22618.         $x = $this->x; 
  22619.     } 
  22620.     if ($y === '') { 
  22621.         $y = $this->y; 
  22622.     } 
  22623.     if (!$this->check_page_regions OR empty($this->page_regions)) { 
  22624.         // no page regions defined 
  22625.         return array($x, $y); 
  22626.     } 
  22627.     if (empty($h)) { 
  22628.         $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  22629.     } 
  22630.     // check for page break 
  22631.     if ($this->checkPageBreak($h, $y)) { 
  22632.         // the content will be printed on a new page 
  22633.         $x = $this->x; 
  22634.         $y = $this->y; 
  22635.     } 
  22636.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  22637.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22638.             $this->lMargin = ($this->columns[$this->current_column]['x'] - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['w']); 
  22639.         } else { 
  22640.             $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x'] - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['w']); 
  22641.         } 
  22642.     } else { 
  22643.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22644.             $this->lMargin = max($this->clMargin, $this->original_lMargin); 
  22645.         } else { 
  22646.             $this->rMargin = max($this->crMargin, $this->original_rMargin); 
  22647.         } 
  22648.     } 
  22649.     // adjust coordinates and page margins 
  22650.     foreach ($this->page_regions as $regid => $regdata) { 
  22651.         if ($regdata['page'] == $this->page) { 
  22652.             // check region boundaries 
  22653.             if (($y > ($regdata['yt'] - $h)) AND ($y <= $regdata['yb'])) { 
  22654.                 // Y is inside the region 
  22655.                 $minv = ($regdata['xb'] - $regdata['xt']) / ($regdata['yb'] - $regdata['yt']); // inverse of angular coefficient 
  22656.                 $yt = max($y, $regdata['yt']); 
  22657.                 $yb = min(($yt + $h), $regdata['yb']); 
  22658.                 $xt = (($yt - $regdata['yt']) * $minv) + $regdata['xt']; 
  22659.                 $xb = (($yb - $regdata['yt']) * $minv) + $regdata['xt']; 
  22660.                 if ($regdata['side'] == 'L') { // left side 
  22661.                     $new_margin = max($xt, $xb); 
  22662.                     if ($this->lMargin < $new_margin) { 
  22663.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22664.                             // adjust left page margin 
  22665.                             $this->lMargin = max(0, $new_margin); 
  22666.                         } 
  22667.                         if ($x < $new_margin) { 
  22668.                             // adjust x position 
  22669.                             $x = $new_margin; 
  22670.                             if ($new_margin > ($this->w - $this->rMargin)) { 
  22671.                                 // adjust y position 
  22672.                                 $y = $regdata['yb'] - $h; 
  22673.                             } 
  22674.                         } 
  22675.                     } 
  22676.                 } elseif ($regdata['side'] == 'R') { // right side 
  22677.                     $new_margin = min($xt, $xb); 
  22678.                     if (($this->w - $this->rMargin) > $new_margin) { 
  22679.                         if (!$this->rtl) { 
  22680.                             // adjust right page margin 
  22681.                             $this->rMargin = max(0, ($this->w - $new_margin)); 
  22682.                         } 
  22683.                         if ($x > $new_margin) { 
  22684.                             // adjust x position 
  22685.                             $x = $new_margin; 
  22686.                             if ($new_margin > $this->lMargin) { 
  22687.                                 // adjust y position 
  22688.                                 $y = $regdata['yb'] - $h; 
  22689.                             } 
  22690.                         } 
  22691.                     } 
  22692.                 } 
  22693.             } 
  22694.         } 
  22695.     } 
  22696.     return array($x, $y); 
  22697. } 
  22698.  
  22699. // --- SVG METHODS --------------------------------------------------------- 
  22700.  
  22701. /** 
  22702.  * Embedd a Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) image. 
  22703.  * NOTE: SVG standard is not yet fully implemented, use the setRasterizeVectorImages() method to enable/disable rasterization of vector images using ImageMagick library. 
  22704.  * @param $file (string) Name of the SVG file or a '@' character followed by the SVG data string. 
  22705.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  22706.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  22707.  * @param $w (float) Width of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  22708.  * @param $h (float) Height of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  22709.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  22710.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to image insertion relative to image height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> If the alignment is an empty string, then the pointer will be restored on the starting SVG position. 
  22711.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the image on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  22712.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  22713.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) if true the image is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  22714.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22715.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  22716.  * @public 
  22717.  */ 
  22718. public function ImageSVG($file, $x='', $y='', $w=0, $h=0, $link='', $align='', $palign='', $border=0, $fitonpage=false) { 
  22719.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  22720.          return; 
  22721.     } 
  22722.     // reseet SVG vars 
  22723.     $this->svggradients = array(); 
  22724.     $this->svggradientid = 0; 
  22725.     $this->svgdefsmode = false; 
  22726.     $this->svgdefs = array(); 
  22727.     $this->svgclipmode = false; 
  22728.     $this->svgclippaths = array(); 
  22729.     $this->svgcliptm = array(); 
  22730.     $this->svgclipid = 0; 
  22731.     $this->svgtext = ''; 
  22732.     $this->svgtextmode = array(); 
  22733.     if ($this->rasterize_vector_images AND ($w > 0) AND ($h > 0)) { 
  22734.         // convert SVG to raster image using GD or ImageMagick libraries 
  22735.         return $this->Image($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'SVG', $link, $align, true, 300, $palign, false, false, $border, false, false, false); 
  22736.     } 
  22737.     if ($file[0] === '@') { // image from string 
  22738.         $this->svgdir = ''; 
  22739.         $svgdata = substr($file, 1); 
  22740.     } else { // SVG file 
  22741.         $this->svgdir = dirname($file); 
  22742.         $svgdata = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($file); 
  22743.     } 
  22744.     if ($svgdata === FALSE) { 
  22745.         $this->Error('SVG file not found: '.$file); 
  22746.     } 
  22747.     if ($x === '') { 
  22748.         $x = $this->x; 
  22749.     } 
  22750.     if ($y === '') { 
  22751.         $y = $this->y; 
  22752.     } 
  22753.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  22754.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  22755.     $k = $this->k; 
  22756.     $ox = 0; 
  22757.     $oy = 0; 
  22758.     $ow = $w; 
  22759.     $oh = $h; 
  22760.     $aspect_ratio_align = 'xMidYMid'; 
  22761.     $aspect_ratio_ms = 'meet'; 
  22762.     $regs = array(); 
  22763.     // get original image width and height 
  22764.     preg_match('/<svg([^\>]*)>/si', $svgdata, $regs); 
  22765.     if (isset($regs[1]) AND !empty($regs[1])) { 
  22766.         $tmp = array(); 
  22767.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+x[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22768.             $ox = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22769.         } 
  22770.         $tmp = array(); 
  22771.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+y[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22772.             $oy = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22773.         } 
  22774.         $tmp = array(); 
  22775.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+width[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22776.             $ow = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22777.         } 
  22778.         $tmp = array(); 
  22779.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+height[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22780.             $oh = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22781.         } 
  22782.         $tmp = array(); 
  22783.         $view_box = array(); 
  22784.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+viewBox[\s]*=[\s]*"[\s]*([0-9\.\-]+)[\s]+([0-9\.\-]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]*"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22785.             if (count($tmp) == 5) { 
  22786.                 array_shift($tmp); 
  22787.                 foreach ($tmp as $key => $val) { 
  22788.                     $view_box[$key] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($val, 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22789.                 } 
  22790.                 $ox = $view_box[0]; 
  22791.                 $oy = $view_box[1]; 
  22792.             } 
  22793.             // get aspect ratio 
  22794.             $tmp = array(); 
  22795.             if (preg_match('/[\s]+preserveAspectRatio[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22796.                 $aspect_ratio = preg_split('/[\s]+/si', $tmp[1]); 
  22797.                 switch (count($aspect_ratio)) { 
  22798.                     case 3: { 
  22799.                         $aspect_ratio_align = $aspect_ratio[1]; 
  22800.                         $aspect_ratio_ms = $aspect_ratio[2]; 
  22801.                         break; 
  22802.                     } 
  22803.                     case 2: { 
  22804.                         $aspect_ratio_align = $aspect_ratio[0]; 
  22805.                         $aspect_ratio_ms = $aspect_ratio[1]; 
  22806.                         break; 
  22807.                     } 
  22808.                     case 1: { 
  22809.                         $aspect_ratio_align = $aspect_ratio[0]; 
  22810.                         $aspect_ratio_ms = 'meet'; 
  22811.                         break; 
  22812.                     } 
  22813.                 } 
  22814.             } 
  22815.         } 
  22816.     } 
  22817.     if ($ow <= 0) { 
  22818.         $ow = 1; 
  22819.     } 
  22820.     if ($oh <= 0) { 
  22821.         $oh = 1; 
  22822.     } 
  22823.     // calculate image width and height on document 
  22824.     if (($w <= 0) AND ($h <= 0)) { 
  22825.         // convert image size to document unit 
  22826.         $w = $ow; 
  22827.         $h = $oh; 
  22828.     } elseif ($w <= 0) { 
  22829.         $w = $h * $ow / $oh; 
  22830.     } elseif ($h <= 0) { 
  22831.         $h = $w * $oh / $ow; 
  22832.     } 
  22833.     // fit the image on available space 
  22834.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage); 
  22835.     if ($this->rasterize_vector_images) { 
  22836.         // convert SVG to raster image using GD or ImageMagick libraries 
  22837.         return $this->Image($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'SVG', $link, $align, true, 300, $palign, false, false, $border, false, false, false); 
  22838.     } 
  22839.     // set alignment 
  22840.     $this->img_rb_y = $y + $h; 
  22841.     // set alignment 
  22842.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  22843.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22844.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  22845.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22846.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22847.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22848.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22849.         } else { 
  22850.             $ximg = $x - $w; 
  22851.         } 
  22852.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg; 
  22853.     } else { 
  22854.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22855.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  22856.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22857.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22858.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22859.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22860.         } else { 
  22861.             $ximg = $x; 
  22862.         } 
  22863.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg + $w; 
  22864.     } 
  22865.     // store current graphic vars 
  22866.     $gvars = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  22867.     // store SVG position and scale factors 
  22868.     $svgoffset_x = ($ximg - $ox) * $this->k; 
  22869.     $svgoffset_y = -($y - $oy) * $this->k; 
  22870.     if (isset($view_box[2]) AND ($view_box[2] > 0) AND ($view_box[3] > 0)) { 
  22871.         $ow = $view_box[2]; 
  22872.         $oh = $view_box[3]; 
  22873.     } else { 
  22874.         if ($ow <= 0) { 
  22875.             $ow = $w; 
  22876.         } 
  22877.         if ($oh <= 0) { 
  22878.             $oh = $h; 
  22879.         } 
  22880.     } 
  22881.     $svgscale_x = $w / $ow; 
  22882.     $svgscale_y = $h / $oh; 
  22883.     // scaling and alignment 
  22884.     if ($aspect_ratio_align != 'none') { 
  22885.         // store current scaling values 
  22886.         $svgscale_old_x = $svgscale_x; 
  22887.         $svgscale_old_y = $svgscale_y; 
  22888.         // force uniform scaling 
  22889.         if ($aspect_ratio_ms == 'slice') { 
  22890.             // the entire viewport is covered by the viewBox 
  22891.             if ($svgscale_x > $svgscale_y) { 
  22892.                 $svgscale_y = $svgscale_x; 
  22893.             } elseif ($svgscale_x < $svgscale_y) { 
  22894.                 $svgscale_x = $svgscale_y; 
  22895.             } 
  22896.         } else { // meet 
  22897.             // the entire viewBox is visible within the viewport 
  22898.             if ($svgscale_x < $svgscale_y) { 
  22899.                 $svgscale_y = $svgscale_x; 
  22900.             } elseif ($svgscale_x > $svgscale_y) { 
  22901.                 $svgscale_x = $svgscale_y; 
  22902.             } 
  22903.         } 
  22904.         // correct X alignment 
  22905.         switch (substr($aspect_ratio_align, 1, 3)) { 
  22906.             case 'Min': { 
  22907.                 // do nothing 
  22908.                 break; 
  22909.             } 
  22910.             case 'Max': { 
  22911.                 $svgoffset_x += (($w * $this->k) - ($ow * $this->k * $svgscale_x)); 
  22912.                 break; 
  22913.             } 
  22914.             default: 
  22915.             case 'Mid': { 
  22916.                 $svgoffset_x += ((($w * $this->k) - ($ow * $this->k * $svgscale_x)) / 2); 
  22917.                 break; 
  22918.             } 
  22919.         } 
  22920.         // correct Y alignment 
  22921.         switch (substr($aspect_ratio_align, 5)) { 
  22922.             case 'Min': { 
  22923.                 // do nothing 
  22924.                 break; 
  22925.             } 
  22926.             case 'Max': { 
  22927.                 $svgoffset_y -= (($h * $this->k) - ($oh * $this->k * $svgscale_y)); 
  22928.                 break; 
  22929.             } 
  22930.             default: 
  22931.             case 'Mid': { 
  22932.                 $svgoffset_y -= ((($h * $this->k) - ($oh * $this->k * $svgscale_y)) / 2); 
  22933.                 break; 
  22934.             } 
  22935.         } 
  22936.     } 
  22937.     // store current page break mode 
  22938.     $page_break_mode = $this->AutoPageBreak; 
  22939.     $page_break_margin = $this->getBreakMargin(); 
  22940.     $cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  22941.     $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  22942.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak(false); 
  22943.     // save the current graphic state 
  22944.     $this->_out('q'.$this->epsmarker); 
  22945.     // set initial clipping mask 
  22946.     $this->Rect($ximg, $y, $w, $h, 'CNZ', array(), array()); 
  22947.     // scale and translate 
  22948.     $e = $ox * $this->k * (1 - $svgscale_x); 
  22949.     $f = ($this->h - $oy) * $this->k * (1 - $svgscale_y); 
  22950.     $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F %F %F %F %F cm', $svgscale_x, 0, 0, $svgscale_y, ($e + $svgoffset_x), ($f + $svgoffset_y))); 
  22951.     // creates a new XML parser to be used by the other XML functions 
  22952.     $this->parser = xml_parser_create('UTF-8'); 
  22953.     // the following function allows to use parser inside object 
  22954.     xml_set_object($this->parser, $this); 
  22955.     // disable case-folding for this XML parser 
  22956.     xml_parser_set_option($this->parser, XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING, 0); 
  22957.     // sets the element handler functions for the XML parser 
  22958.     xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, 'startSVGElementHandler', 'endSVGElementHandler'); 
  22959.     // sets the character data handler function for the XML parser 
  22960.     xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser, 'segSVGContentHandler'); 
  22961.     // start parsing an XML document 
  22962.     if (!xml_parse($this->parser, $svgdata)) { 
  22963.         $error_message = sprintf('SVG Error: %s at line %d', xml_error_string(xml_get_error_code($this->parser)), xml_get_current_line_number($this->parser)); 
  22964.         $this->Error($error_message); 
  22965.     } 
  22966.     // free this XML parser 
  22967.     xml_parser_free($this->parser); 
  22968.     // restore previous graphic state 
  22969.     $this->_out($this->epsmarker.'Q'); 
  22970.     // restore graphic vars 
  22971.     $this->setGraphicVars($gvars); 
  22972.     $this->lasth = $gvars['lasth']; 
  22973.     if (!empty($border)) { 
  22974.         $bx = $this->x; 
  22975.         $by = $this->y; 
  22976.         $this->x = $ximg; 
  22977.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22978.             $this->x += $w; 
  22979.         } 
  22980.         $this->y = $y; 
  22981.         $this->Cell($w, $h, '', $border, 0, '', 0, '', 0, true); 
  22982.         $this->x = $bx; 
  22983.         $this->y = $by; 
  22984.     } 
  22985.     if ($link) { 
  22986.         $this->Link($ximg, $y, $w, $h, $link, 0); 
  22987.     } 
  22988.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  22989.     switch($align) { 
  22990.         case 'T':{ 
  22991.             $this->y = $y; 
  22992.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  22993.             break; 
  22994.         } 
  22995.         case 'M':{ 
  22996.             $this->y = $y + round($h/2); 
  22997.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  22998.             break; 
  22999.         } 
  23000.         case 'B':{ 
  23001.             $this->y = $this->img_rb_y; 
  23002.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  23003.             break; 
  23004.         } 
  23005.         case 'N':{ 
  23006.             $this->SetY($this->img_rb_y); 
  23007.             break; 
  23008.         } 
  23009.         default:{ 
  23010.             // restore pointer to starting position 
  23011.             $this->x = $gvars['x']; 
  23012.             $this->y = $gvars['y']; 
  23013.             $this->page = $gvars['page']; 
  23014.             $this->current_column = $gvars['current_column']; 
  23015.             $this->tMargin = $gvars['tMargin']; 
  23016.             $this->bMargin = $gvars['bMargin']; 
  23017.             $this->w = $gvars['w']; 
  23018.             $this->h = $gvars['h']; 
  23019.             $this->wPt = $gvars['wPt']; 
  23020.             $this->hPt = $gvars['hPt']; 
  23021.             $this->fwPt = $gvars['fwPt']; 
  23022.             $this->fhPt = $gvars['fhPt']; 
  23023.             break; 
  23024.         } 
  23025.     } 
  23026.     $this->endlinex = $this->img_rb_x; 
  23027.     // restore page break 
  23028.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak($page_break_mode, $page_break_margin); 
  23029.     $this->cell_padding = $cell_padding; 
  23030. } 
  23031.  
  23032. /** 
  23033.  * Convert SVG transformation matrix to PDF. 
  23034.  * @param $tm (array) original SVG transformation matrix 
  23035.  * @return array transformation matrix 
  23036.  * @protected 
  23037.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23038.  */ 
  23039. protected function convertSVGtMatrix($tm) { 
  23040.     $a = $tm[0]; 
  23041.     $b = -$tm[1]; 
  23042.     $c = -$tm[2]; 
  23043.     $d = $tm[3]; 
  23044.     $e = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tm[4], 1, $this->svgunit, false) * $this->k; 
  23045.     $f = -$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tm[5], 1, $this->svgunit, false) * $this->k; 
  23046.     $x = 0; 
  23047.     $y = $this->h * $this->k; 
  23048.     $e = ($x * (1 - $a)) - ($y * $c) + $e; 
  23049.     $f = ($y * (1 - $d)) - ($x * $b) + $f; 
  23050.     return array($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f); 
  23051. } 
  23052.  
  23053. /** 
  23054.  * Apply SVG graphic transformation matrix. 
  23055.  * @param $tm (array) original SVG transformation matrix 
  23056.  * @protected 
  23057.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23058.  */ 
  23059. protected function SVGTransform($tm) { 
  23060.     $this->Transform($this->convertSVGtMatrix($tm)); 
  23061. } 
  23062.  
  23063. /** 
  23064.  * Apply the requested SVG styles (*** TO BE COMPLETED ***) 
  23065.  * @param $svgstyle (array) array of SVG styles to apply 
  23066.  * @param $prevsvgstyle (array) array of previous SVG style 
  23067.  * @param $x (int) X origin of the bounding box 
  23068.  * @param $y (int) Y origin of the bounding box 
  23069.  * @param $w (int) width of the bounding box 
  23070.  * @param $h (int) height of the bounding box 
  23071.  * @param $clip_function (string) clip function 
  23072.  * @param $clip_params (array) array of parameters for clipping function 
  23073.  * @return object style 
  23074.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  23075.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23076.  * @protected 
  23077.  */ 
  23078. protected function setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prevsvgstyle, $x=0, $y=0, $w=1, $h=1, $clip_function='', $clip_params=array()) { 
  23079.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  23080.          return; 
  23081.     } 
  23082.     $objstyle = ''; 
  23083.     $minlen = (0.01 / $this->k); // minimum acceptable length 
  23084.     if (!isset($svgstyle['opacity'])) { 
  23085.         return $objstyle; 
  23086.     } 
  23087.     // clip-path 
  23088.     $regs = array(); 
  23089.     if (preg_match('/url\([\s]*\#([^\)]*)\)/si', $svgstyle['clip-path'], $regs)) { 
  23090.         $clip_path = $this->svgclippaths[$regs[1]]; 
  23091.         foreach ($clip_path as $cp) { 
  23092.             $this->startSVGElementHandler('clip-path', $cp['name'], $cp['attribs'], $cp['tm']); 
  23093.         } 
  23094.     } 
  23095.     // opacity 
  23096.     if ($svgstyle['opacity'] != 1) { 
  23097.         $this->setAlpha($svgstyle['opacity'], 'Normal', $svgstyle['opacity'], false); 
  23098.     } 
  23099.     // color 
  23100.     $fill_color = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  23101.     $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  23102.     // text color 
  23103.     $text_color = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['text-color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  23104.     $this->SetTextColorArray($text_color); 
  23105.     // clip 
  23106.     if (preg_match('/rect\(([a-z0-9\-\.]*)[\s]*([a-z0-9\-\.]*)[\s]*([a-z0-9\-\.]*)[\s]*([a-z0-9\-\.]*)\)/si', $svgstyle['clip'], $regs)) { 
  23107.         $top = (isset($regs[1])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[1], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23108.         $right = (isset($regs[2])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[2], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23109.         $bottom = (isset($regs[3])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[3], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23110.         $left = (isset($regs[4])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[4], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23111.         $cx = $x + $left; 
  23112.         $cy = $y + $top; 
  23113.         $cw = $w - $left - $right; 
  23114.         $ch = $h - $top - $bottom; 
  23115.         if ($svgstyle['clip-rule'] == 'evenodd') { 
  23116.             $clip_rule = 'CNZ'; 
  23117.         } else { 
  23118.             $clip_rule = 'CEO'; 
  23119.         } 
  23120.         $this->Rect($cx, $cy, $cw, $ch, $clip_rule, array(), array()); 
  23121.     } 
  23122.     // fill 
  23123.     $regs = array(); 
  23124.     if (preg_match('/url\([\s]*\#([^\)]*)\)/si', $svgstyle['fill'], $regs)) { 
  23125.         // gradient 
  23126.         $gradient = $this->svggradients[$regs[1]]; 
  23127.         if (isset($gradient['xref'])) { 
  23128.             // reference to another gradient definition 
  23129.             $newgradient = $this->svggradients[$gradient['xref']]; 
  23130.             $newgradient['coords'] = $gradient['coords']; 
  23131.             $newgradient['mode'] = $gradient['mode']; 
  23132.             $newgradient['type'] = $gradient['type']; 
  23133.             $newgradient['gradientUnits'] = $gradient['gradientUnits']; 
  23134.             if (isset($gradient['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23135.                 $newgradient['gradientTransform'] = $gradient['gradientTransform']; 
  23136.             } 
  23137.             $gradient = $newgradient; 
  23138.         } 
  23139.         //save current Graphic State 
  23140.         $this->_outSaveGraphicsState(); 
  23141.         //set clipping area 
  23142.         if (!empty($clip_function) AND method_exists($this, $clip_function)) { 
  23143.             $bbox = call_user_func_array(array($this, $clip_function), $clip_params); 
  23144.             if ((!isset($gradient['type']) OR ($gradient['type'] != 3)) AND is_array($bbox) AND (count($bbox) == 4)) { 
  23145.                 list($x, $y, $w, $h) = $bbox; 
  23146.             } 
  23147.         } 
  23148.         if ($gradient['mode'] == 'measure') { 
  23149.             if (!isset($gradient['coords'][4])) { 
  23150.                 $gradient['coords'][4] = 0.5; 
  23151.             } 
  23152.             if (isset($gradient['gradientTransform']) AND !empty($gradient['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23153.                 $gtm = $gradient['gradientTransform']; 
  23154.                 // apply transformation matrix 
  23155.                 $xa = ($gtm[0] * $gradient['coords'][0]) + ($gtm[2] * $gradient['coords'][1]) + $gtm[4]; 
  23156.                 $ya = ($gtm[1] * $gradient['coords'][0]) + ($gtm[3] * $gradient['coords'][1]) + $gtm[5]; 
  23157.                 $xb = ($gtm[0] * $gradient['coords'][2]) + ($gtm[2] * $gradient['coords'][3]) + $gtm[4]; 
  23158.                 $yb = ($gtm[1] * $gradient['coords'][2]) + ($gtm[3] * $gradient['coords'][3]) + $gtm[5]; 
  23159.                 $r = sqrt(pow(($gtm[0] * $gradient['coords'][4]), 2) + pow(($gtm[1] * $gradient['coords'][4]), 2)); 
  23160.                 $gradient['coords'][0] = $xa; 
  23161.                 $gradient['coords'][1] = $ya; 
  23162.                 $gradient['coords'][2] = $xb; 
  23163.                 $gradient['coords'][3] = $yb; 
  23164.                 $gradient['coords'][4] = $r; 
  23165.             } 
  23166.             // convert SVG coordinates to user units 
  23167.             $gradient['coords'][0] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][0], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23168.             $gradient['coords'][1] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][1], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23169.             $gradient['coords'][2] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][2], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23170.             $gradient['coords'][3] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][3], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23171.             $gradient['coords'][4] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][4], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23172.             if ($w <= $minlen) { 
  23173.                 $w = $minlen; 
  23174.             } 
  23175.             if ($h <= $minlen) { 
  23176.                 $h = $minlen; 
  23177.             } 
  23178.             // shift units 
  23179.             if ($gradient['gradientUnits'] == 'objectBoundingBox') { 
  23180.                 // convert to SVG coordinate system 
  23181.                 $gradient['coords'][0] += $x; 
  23182.                 $gradient['coords'][1] += $y; 
  23183.                 $gradient['coords'][2] += $x; 
  23184.                 $gradient['coords'][3] += $y; 
  23185.             } 
  23186.             // calculate percentages 
  23187.             $gradient['coords'][0] = (($gradient['coords'][0] - $x) / $w); 
  23188.             $gradient['coords'][1] = (($gradient['coords'][1] - $y) / $h); 
  23189.             $gradient['coords'][2] = (($gradient['coords'][2] - $x) / $w); 
  23190.             $gradient['coords'][3] = (($gradient['coords'][3] - $y) / $h); 
  23191.             $gradient['coords'][4] /= $w; 
  23192.         } elseif ($gradient['mode'] == 'percentage') { 
  23193.             foreach($gradient['coords'] as $key => $val) { 
  23194.                 $gradient['coords'][$key] = (intval($val) / 100); 
  23195.                 if ($val < 0) { 
  23196.                     $gradient['coords'][$key] = 0; 
  23197.                 } elseif ($val > 1) { 
  23198.                     $gradient['coords'][$key] = 1; 
  23199.                 } 
  23200.             } 
  23201.         } 
  23202.         if (($gradient['type'] == 2) AND ($gradient['coords'][0] == $gradient['coords'][2]) AND ($gradient['coords'][1] == $gradient['coords'][3])) { 
  23203.             // single color (no shading) 
  23204.             $gradient['coords'][0] = 1; 
  23205.             $gradient['coords'][1] = 0; 
  23206.             $gradient['coords'][2] = 0.999; 
  23207.             $gradient['coords'][3] = 0; 
  23208.         } 
  23209.         // swap Y coordinates 
  23210.         $tmp = $gradient['coords'][1]; 
  23211.         $gradient['coords'][1] = $gradient['coords'][3]; 
  23212.         $gradient['coords'][3] = $tmp; 
  23213.         // set transformation map for gradient 
  23214.         $cy = ($this->h - $y); 
  23215.         if ($gradient['type'] == 3) { 
  23216.             // circular gradient 
  23217.             $cy -= ($gradient['coords'][1] * ($w + $h)); 
  23218.         } else { 
  23219.             $cy -= $h; 
  23220.         } 
  23221.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F 0 0 %F %F %F cm', ($w * $this->k), ($h * $this->k), ($x * $this->k), ($cy * $this->k))); 
  23222.         if (count($gradient['stops']) > 1) { 
  23223.             $this->Gradient($gradient['type'], $gradient['coords'], $gradient['stops'], array(), false); 
  23224.         } 
  23225.     } elseif ($svgstyle['fill'] != 'none') { 
  23226.         $fill_color = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['fill'], $this->spot_colors); 
  23227.         if ($svgstyle['fill-opacity'] != 1) { 
  23228.             $this->setAlpha($this->alpha['CA'], 'Normal', $svgstyle['fill-opacity'], false); 
  23229.         } 
  23230.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  23231.         if ($svgstyle['fill-rule'] == 'evenodd') { 
  23232.             $objstyle .= 'F*'; 
  23233.         } else { 
  23234.             $objstyle .= 'F'; 
  23235.         } 
  23236.     } 
  23237.     // stroke 
  23238.     if ($svgstyle['stroke'] != 'none') { 
  23239.         if ($svgstyle['stroke-opacity'] != 1) { 
  23240.             $this->setAlpha($svgstyle['stroke-opacity'], 'Normal', $this->alpha['ca'], false); 
  23241.         } 
  23242.         $stroke_style = array( 
  23243.             'color' => TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['stroke'], $this->spot_colors),  
  23244.             'width' => $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($svgstyle['stroke-width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false),  
  23245.             'cap' => $svgstyle['stroke-linecap'],  
  23246.             'join' => $svgstyle['stroke-linejoin'] 
  23247.  ); 
  23248.         if (isset($svgstyle['stroke-dasharray']) AND !empty($svgstyle['stroke-dasharray']) AND ($svgstyle['stroke-dasharray'] != 'none')) { 
  23249.             $stroke_style['dash'] = $svgstyle['stroke-dasharray']; 
  23250.         } 
  23251.         $this->SetLineStyle($stroke_style); 
  23252.         $objstyle .= 'D'; 
  23253.     } 
  23254.     // font 
  23255.     $regs = array(); 
  23256.     if (!empty($svgstyle['font'])) { 
  23257.         if (preg_match('/font-family[\s]*:[\s]*([^\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23258.             $font_family = $this->getFontFamilyName($regs[1]); 
  23259.         } else { 
  23260.             $font_family = $svgstyle['font-family']; 
  23261.         } 
  23262.         if (preg_match('/font-size[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23263.             $font_size = trim($regs[1]); 
  23264.         } else { 
  23265.             $font_size = $svgstyle['font-size']; 
  23266.         } 
  23267.         if (preg_match('/font-style[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23268.             $font_style = trim($regs[1]); 
  23269.         } else { 
  23270.             $font_style = $svgstyle['font-style']; 
  23271.         } 
  23272.         if (preg_match('/font-weight[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23273.             $font_weight = trim($regs[1]); 
  23274.         } else { 
  23275.             $font_weight = $svgstyle['font-weight']; 
  23276.         } 
  23277.         if (preg_match('/font-stretch[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23278.             $font_stretch = trim($regs[1]); 
  23279.         } else { 
  23280.             $font_stretch = $svgstyle['font-stretch']; 
  23281.         } 
  23282.         if (preg_match('/letter-spacing[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23283.             $font_spacing = trim($regs[1]); 
  23284.         } else { 
  23285.             $font_spacing = $svgstyle['letter-spacing']; 
  23286.         } 
  23287.     } else { 
  23288.         $font_family = $this->getFontFamilyName($svgstyle['font-family']); 
  23289.         $font_size = $svgstyle['font-size']; 
  23290.         $font_style = $svgstyle['font-style']; 
  23291.         $font_weight = $svgstyle['font-weight']; 
  23292.         $font_stretch = $svgstyle['font-stretch']; 
  23293.         $font_spacing = $svgstyle['letter-spacing']; 
  23294.     } 
  23295.     $font_size = $this->getHTMLFontUnits($font_size, $this->svgstyles[0]['font-size'], $prevsvgstyle['font-size'], $this->svgunit); 
  23296.     $font_stretch = $this->getCSSFontStretching($font_stretch, $svgstyle['font-stretch']); 
  23297.     $font_spacing = $this->getCSSFontSpacing($font_spacing, $svgstyle['letter-spacing']); 
  23298.     switch ($font_style) { 
  23299.         case 'italic': { 
  23300.             $font_style = 'I'; 
  23301.             break; 
  23302.         } 
  23303.         case 'oblique': { 
  23304.             $font_style = 'I'; 
  23305.             break; 
  23306.         } 
  23307.         default: 
  23308.         case 'normal': { 
  23309.             $font_style = ''; 
  23310.             break; 
  23311.         } 
  23312.     } 
  23313.     switch ($font_weight) { 
  23314.         case 'bold': 
  23315.         case 'bolder': { 
  23316.             $font_style .= 'B'; 
  23317.             break; 
  23318.         } 
  23319.     } 
  23320.     switch ($svgstyle['text-decoration']) { 
  23321.         case 'underline': { 
  23322.             $font_style .= 'U'; 
  23323.             break; 
  23324.         } 
  23325.         case 'overline': { 
  23326.             $font_style .= 'O'; 
  23327.             break; 
  23328.         } 
  23329.         case 'line-through': { 
  23330.             $font_style .= 'D'; 
  23331.             break; 
  23332.         } 
  23333.         default: 
  23334.         case 'none': { 
  23335.             break; 
  23336.         } 
  23337.     } 
  23338.     $this->SetFont($font_family, $font_style, $font_size); 
  23339.     $this->setFontStretching($font_stretch); 
  23340.     $this->setFontSpacing($font_spacing); 
  23341.     return $objstyle; 
  23342. } 
  23343.  
  23344. /** 
  23345.  * Draws an SVG path 
  23346.  * @param $d (string) attribute d of the path SVG element 
  23347.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. Possible values are: 
  23348.  * <ul> 
  23349.  *     <li>D or empty string: Draw (default).</li> 
  23350.  *     <li>F: Fill.</li> 
  23351.  *     <li>F*: Fill using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path.</li> 
  23352.  *     <li>DF or FD: Draw and fill.</li> 
  23353.  *     <li>DF* or FD*: Draw and fill using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path.</li> 
  23354.  *     <li>CNZ: Clipping mode (using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  23355.  *     <li>CEO: Clipping mode (using the nonzero winding number rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  23356.  * </ul> 
  23357.  * @return array of container box measures (x, y, w, h) 
  23358.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  23359.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23360.  * @protected 
  23361.  */ 
  23362. protected function SVGPath($d, $style='') { 
  23363.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  23364.          return; 
  23365.     } 
  23366.     // set fill/stroke style 
  23367.     $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style, ''); 
  23368.     if (empty($op)) { 
  23369.         return; 
  23370.     } 
  23371.     $paths = array(); 
  23372.     $d = preg_replace('/([0-9ACHLMQSTVZ])([\-\+])/si', '\\1 \\2', $d); 
  23373.     preg_match_all('/([ACHLMQSTVZ])[\s]*([^ACHLMQSTVZ\"]*)/si', $d, $paths, PREG_SET_ORDER); 
  23374.     $x = 0; 
  23375.     $y = 0; 
  23376.     $x1 = 0; 
  23377.     $y1 = 0; 
  23378.     $x2 = 0; 
  23379.     $y2 = 0; 
  23380.     $xmin = 2147483647; 
  23381.     $xmax = 0; 
  23382.     $ymin = 2147483647; 
  23383.     $ymax = 0; 
  23384.     $relcoord = false; 
  23385.     $minlen = (0.01 / $this->k); // minimum acceptable length (3 point) 
  23386.     $firstcmd = true; // used to print first point 
  23387.     // draw curve pieces 
  23388.     foreach ($paths as $key => $val) { 
  23389.         // get curve type 
  23390.         $cmd = trim($val[1]); 
  23391.         if (strtolower($cmd) == $cmd) { 
  23392.             // use relative coordinated instead of absolute 
  23393.             $relcoord = true; 
  23394.             $xoffset = $x; 
  23395.             $yoffset = $y; 
  23396.         } else { 
  23397.             $relcoord = false; 
  23398.             $xoffset = 0; 
  23399.             $yoffset = 0; 
  23400.         } 
  23401.         $params = array(); 
  23402.         if (isset($val[2])) { 
  23403.             // get curve parameters 
  23404.             $rawparams = preg_split('/([\, \s]+)/si', trim($val[2])); 
  23405.             $params = array(); 
  23406.             foreach ($rawparams as $ck => $cp) { 
  23407.                 $params[$ck] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($cp, 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23408.                 if (abs($params[$ck]) < $minlen) { 
  23409.                     // aproximate little values to zero 
  23410.                     $params[$ck] = 0; 
  23411.                 } 
  23412.             } 
  23413.         } 
  23414.         // store current origin point 
  23415.         $x0 = $x; 
  23416.         $y0 = $y; 
  23417.         switch (strtoupper($cmd)) { 
  23418.             case 'M': { // moveto 
  23419.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23420.                     if (($ck % 2) == 0) { 
  23421.                         $x = $cp + $xoffset; 
  23422.                     } else { 
  23423.                         $y = $cp + $yoffset; 
  23424.                         if ($firstcmd OR (abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23425.                             if ($ck == 1) { 
  23426.                                 $this->_outPoint($x, $y); 
  23427.                                 $firstcmd = false; 
  23428.                             } else { 
  23429.                                 $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23430.                             } 
  23431.                             $x0 = $x; 
  23432.                             $y0 = $y; 
  23433.                         } 
  23434.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23435.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23436.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23437.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23438.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23439.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23440.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23441.                         } 
  23442.                     } 
  23443.                 } 
  23444.                 break; 
  23445.             } 
  23446.             case 'L': { // lineto 
  23447.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23448.                     if (($ck % 2) == 0) { 
  23449.                         $x = $cp + $xoffset; 
  23450.                     } else { 
  23451.                         $y = $cp + $yoffset; 
  23452.                         if ((abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23453.                             $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23454.                             $x0 = $x; 
  23455.                             $y0 = $y; 
  23456.                         } 
  23457.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23458.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23459.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23460.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23461.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23462.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23463.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23464.                         } 
  23465.                     } 
  23466.                 } 
  23467.                 break; 
  23468.             } 
  23469.             case 'H': { // horizontal lineto 
  23470.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23471.                     $x = $cp + $xoffset; 
  23472.                     if ((abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23473.                         $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23474.                         $x0 = $x; 
  23475.                         $y0 = $y; 
  23476.                     } 
  23477.                     $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23478.                     $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23479.                     if ($relcoord) { 
  23480.                         $xoffset = $x; 
  23481.                     } 
  23482.                 } 
  23483.                 break; 
  23484.             } 
  23485.             case 'V': { // vertical lineto 
  23486.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23487.                     $y = $cp + $yoffset; 
  23488.                     if ((abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23489.                         $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23490.                         $x0 = $x; 
  23491.                         $y0 = $y; 
  23492.                     } 
  23493.                     $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23494.                     $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23495.                     if ($relcoord) { 
  23496.                         $yoffset = $y; 
  23497.                     } 
  23498.                 } 
  23499.                 break; 
  23500.             } 
  23501.             case 'C': { // curveto 
  23502.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23503.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23504.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 6) == 0) { 
  23505.                         $x1 = $params[($ck - 5)] + $xoffset; 
  23506.                         $y1 = $params[($ck - 4)] + $yoffset; 
  23507.                         $x2 = $params[($ck - 3)] + $xoffset; 
  23508.                         $y2 = $params[($ck - 2)] + $yoffset; 
  23509.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23510.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23511.                         $this->_outCurve($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x, $y); 
  23512.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23513.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23514.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23515.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23516.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23517.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23518.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23519.                         } 
  23520.                     } 
  23521.                 } 
  23522.                 break; 
  23523.             } 
  23524.             case 'S': { // shorthand/smooth curveto 
  23525.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23526.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23527.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 4) == 0) { 
  23528.                         if (($key > 0) AND ((strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'C') OR (strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'S'))) { 
  23529.                             $x1 = (2 * $x) - $x2; 
  23530.                             $y1 = (2 * $y) - $y2; 
  23531.                         } else { 
  23532.                             $x1 = $x; 
  23533.                             $y1 = $y; 
  23534.                         } 
  23535.                         $x2 = $params[($ck - 3)] + $xoffset; 
  23536.                         $y2 = $params[($ck - 2)] + $yoffset; 
  23537.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23538.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23539.                         $this->_outCurve($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x, $y); 
  23540.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23541.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23542.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23543.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23544.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23545.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23546.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23547.                         } 
  23548.                     } 
  23549.                 } 
  23550.                 break; 
  23551.             } 
  23552.             case 'Q': { // quadratic Bezier curveto 
  23553.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23554.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23555.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 4) == 0) { 
  23556.                         // convert quadratic points to cubic points 
  23557.                         $x1 = $params[($ck - 3)] + $xoffset; 
  23558.                         $y1 = $params[($ck - 2)] + $yoffset; 
  23559.                         $xa = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23560.                         $ya = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23561.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23562.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23563.                         $xb = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23564.                         $yb = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23565.                         $this->_outCurve($xa, $ya, $xb, $yb, $x, $y); 
  23566.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23567.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23568.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23569.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23570.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23571.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23572.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23573.                         } 
  23574.                     } 
  23575.                 } 
  23576.                 break; 
  23577.             } 
  23578.             case 'T': { // shorthand/smooth quadratic Bezier curveto 
  23579.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23580.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23581.                     if (($ck % 2) != 0) { 
  23582.                         if (($key > 0) AND ((strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'Q') OR (strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'T'))) { 
  23583.                             $x1 = (2 * $x) - $x1; 
  23584.                             $y1 = (2 * $y) - $y1; 
  23585.                         } else { 
  23586.                             $x1 = $x; 
  23587.                             $y1 = $y; 
  23588.                         } 
  23589.                         // convert quadratic points to cubic points 
  23590.                         $xa = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23591.                         $ya = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23592.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23593.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23594.                         $xb = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23595.                         $yb = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23596.                         $this->_outCurve($xa, $ya, $xb, $yb, $x, $y); 
  23597.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23598.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23599.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23600.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23601.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23602.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23603.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23604.                         } 
  23605.                     } 
  23606.                 } 
  23607.                 break; 
  23608.             } 
  23609.             case 'A': { // elliptical arc 
  23610.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23611.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23612.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 7) == 0) { 
  23613.                         $x0 = $x; 
  23614.                         $y0 = $y; 
  23615.                         $rx = abs($params[($ck - 6)]); 
  23616.                         $ry = abs($params[($ck - 5)]); 
  23617.                         $ang = -$rawparams[($ck - 4)]; 
  23618.                         $angle = deg2rad($ang); 
  23619.                         $fa = $rawparams[($ck - 3)]; // large-arc-flag 
  23620.                         $fs = $rawparams[($ck - 2)]; // sweep-flag 
  23621.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23622.                         $y = $params[$ck] + $yoffset; 
  23623.                         if ((abs($x0 - $x) < $minlen) AND (abs($y0 - $y) < $minlen)) { 
  23624.                             // endpoints are almost identical 
  23625.                             $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23626.                             $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23627.                             $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23628.                             $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23629.                         } else { 
  23630.                             $cos_ang = cos($angle); 
  23631.                             $sin_ang = sin($angle); 
  23632.                             $a = (($x0 - $x) / 2); 
  23633.                             $b = (($y0 - $y) / 2); 
  23634.                             $xa = ($a * $cos_ang) - ($b * $sin_ang); 
  23635.                             $ya = ($a * $sin_ang) + ($b * $cos_ang); 
  23636.                             $rx2 = $rx * $rx; 
  23637.                             $ry2 = $ry * $ry; 
  23638.                             $xa2 = $xa * $xa; 
  23639.                             $ya2 = $ya * $ya; 
  23640.                             $delta = ($xa2 / $rx2) + ($ya2 / $ry2); 
  23641.                             if ($delta > 1) { 
  23642.                                 $rx *= sqrt($delta); 
  23643.                                 $ry *= sqrt($delta); 
  23644.                                 $rx2 = $rx * $rx; 
  23645.                                 $ry2 = $ry * $ry; 
  23646.                             } 
  23647.                             $numerator = (($rx2 * $ry2) - ($rx2 * $ya2) - ($ry2 * $xa2)); 
  23648.                             if ($numerator < 0) { 
  23649.                                 $root = 0; 
  23650.                             } else { 
  23651.                                 $root = sqrt($numerator / (($rx2 * $ya2) + ($ry2 * $xa2))); 
  23652.                             } 
  23653.                             if ($fa == $fs) { 
  23654.                                 $root *= -1; 
  23655.                             } 
  23656.                             $cax = $root * (($rx * $ya) / $ry); 
  23657.                             $cay = -$root * (($ry * $xa) / $rx); 
  23658.                             // coordinates of ellipse center 
  23659.                             $cx = ($cax * $cos_ang) - ($cay * $sin_ang) + (($x0 + $x) / 2); 
  23660.                             $cy = ($cax * $sin_ang) + ($cay * $cos_ang) + (($y0 + $y) / 2); 
  23661.                             // get angles 
  23662.                             $angs = TCPDF_STATIC::getVectorsAngle(1, 0, (($xa - $cax) / $rx), (($cay - $ya) / $ry)); 
  23663.                             $dang = TCPDF_STATIC::getVectorsAngle((($xa - $cax) / $rx), (($ya - $cay) / $ry), ((-$xa - $cax) / $rx), ((-$ya - $cay) / $ry)); 
  23664.                             if (($fs == 0) AND ($dang > 0)) { 
  23665.                                 $dang -= (2 * M_PI); 
  23666.                             } elseif (($fs == 1) AND ($dang < 0)) { 
  23667.                                 $dang += (2 * M_PI); 
  23668.                             } 
  23669.                             $angf = $angs - $dang; 
  23670.                             if ((($fs == 0) AND ($angs > $angf)) OR (($fs == 1) AND ($angs < $angf))) { 
  23671.                                 // reverse angles 
  23672.                                 $tmp = $angs; 
  23673.                                 $angs = $angf; 
  23674.                                 $angf = $tmp; 
  23675.                             } 
  23676.                             $angs = round(rad2deg($angs), 6); 
  23677.                             $angf = round(rad2deg($angf), 6); 
  23678.                             // covent angles to positive values 
  23679.                             if (($angs < 0) AND ($angf < 0)) { 
  23680.                                 $angs += 360; 
  23681.                                 $angf += 360; 
  23682.                             } 
  23683.                             $pie = false; 
  23684.                             if (($key == 0) AND (isset($paths[($key + 1)][1])) AND (trim($paths[($key + 1)][1]) == 'z')) { 
  23685.                                 $pie = true; 
  23686.                             } 
  23687.                             list($axmin, $aymin, $axmax, $aymax) = $this->_outellipticalarc($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, $ang, $angs, $angf, $pie, 2, false, ($fs == 0), true); 
  23688.                             $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $axmin); 
  23689.                             $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $aymin); 
  23690.                             $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $axmax); 
  23691.                             $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $aymax); 
  23692.                         } 
  23693.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23694.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23695.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23696.                         } 
  23697.                     } 
  23698.                 } 
  23699.                 break; 
  23700.             } 
  23701.             case 'Z': { 
  23702.                 $this->_out('h'); 
  23703.                 break; 
  23704.             } 
  23705.         } 
  23706.         $firstcmd = false; 
  23707.     } // end foreach 
  23708.     if (!empty($op)) { 
  23709.         $this->_out($op); 
  23710.     } 
  23711.     return array($xmin, $ymin, ($xmax - $xmin), ($ymax - $ymin)); 
  23712. } 
  23713.  
  23714. /** 
  23715.  * Sets the opening SVG element handler function for the XML parser. (*** TO BE COMPLETED ***) 
  23716.  * @param $parser (resource) The first parameter, parser, is a reference to the XML parser calling the handler. 
  23717.  * @param $name (string) The second parameter, name, contains the name of the element for which this handler is called. If case-folding is in effect for this parser, the element name will be in uppercase letters. 
  23718.  * @param $attribs (array) The third parameter, attribs, contains an associative array with the element's attributes (if any). The keys of this array are the attribute names, the values are the attribute values. Attribute names are case-folded on the same criteria as element names. Attribute values are not case-folded. The original order of the attributes can be retrieved by walking through attribs the normal way, using each(). The first key in the array was the first attribute, and so on. 
  23719.  * @param $ctm (array) tranformation matrix for clipping mode (starting transformation matrix). 
  23720.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  23721.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23722.  * @protected 
  23723.  */ 
  23724. protected function startSVGElementHandler($parser, $name, $attribs, $ctm=array()) { 
  23725.     // check if we are in clip mode 
  23726.     if ($this->svgclipmode) { 
  23727.         $this->svgclippaths[$this->svgclipid][] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => $attribs, 'tm' => $this->svgcliptm[$this->svgclipid]); 
  23728.         return; 
  23729.     } 
  23730.     if ($this->svgdefsmode AND !in_array($name, array('clipPath', 'linearGradient', 'radialGradient', 'stop'))) { 
  23731.         if (isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23732.             $attribs['child_elements'] = array(); 
  23733.             $this->svgdefs[$attribs['id']] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => $attribs); 
  23734.             return; 
  23735.         } 
  23736.         if (end($this->svgdefs) !== FALSE) { 
  23737.             $last_svgdefs_id = key($this->svgdefs); 
  23738.             if (isset($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'])) { 
  23739.                 $attribs['id'] = 'DF_'.(count($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements']) + 1); 
  23740.                 $this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'][$attribs['id']] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => $attribs); 
  23741.                 return; 
  23742.             } 
  23743.         } 
  23744.         return; 
  23745.     } 
  23746.     $clipping = false; 
  23747.     if ($parser == 'clip-path') { 
  23748.         // set clipping mode 
  23749.         $clipping = true; 
  23750.     } 
  23751.     // get styling properties 
  23752.     $prev_svgstyle = $this->svgstyles[max(0, (count($this->svgstyles) - 1))]; // previous style 
  23753.     $svgstyle = $this->svgstyles[0]; // set default style 
  23754.     if ($clipping AND !isset($attribs['fill']) AND (!isset($attribs['style']) OR (!preg_match('/[;\"\s]{1}fill[\s]*:[\s]*([^;\"]*)/si', $attribs['style'], $attrval)))) { 
  23755.         // default fill attribute for clipping 
  23756.         $attribs['fill'] = 'none'; 
  23757.     } 
  23758.     if (isset($attribs['style']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($attribs['style']) AND ($attribs['style'][0] != ';')) { 
  23759.         // fix style for regular expression 
  23760.         $attribs['style'] = ';'.$attribs['style']; 
  23761.     } 
  23762.     foreach ($prev_svgstyle as $key => $val) { 
  23763.         if (in_array($key, TCPDF_IMAGES::$svginheritprop)) { 
  23764.             // inherit previous value 
  23765.             $svgstyle[$key] = $val; 
  23766.         } 
  23767.         if (isset($attribs[$key]) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($attribs[$key])) { 
  23768.             // specific attribute settings 
  23769.             if ($attribs[$key] == 'inherit') { 
  23770.                 $svgstyle[$key] = $val; 
  23771.             } else { 
  23772.                 $svgstyle[$key] = $attribs[$key]; 
  23773.             } 
  23774.         } elseif (isset($attribs['style']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($attribs['style'])) { 
  23775.             // CSS style syntax 
  23776.             $attrval = array(); 
  23777.             if (preg_match('/[;\"\s]{1}'.$key.'[\s]*:[\s]*([^;\"]*)/si', $attribs['style'], $attrval) AND isset($attrval[1])) { 
  23778.                 if ($attrval[1] == 'inherit') { 
  23779.                     $svgstyle[$key] = $val; 
  23780.                 } else { 
  23781.                     $svgstyle[$key] = $attrval[1]; 
  23782.                 } 
  23783.             } 
  23784.         } 
  23785.     } 
  23786.     // transformation matrix 
  23787.     if (!empty($ctm)) { 
  23788.         $tm = $ctm; 
  23789.     } else { 
  23790.         $tm = array(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0); 
  23791.     } 
  23792.     if (isset($attribs['transform']) AND !empty($attribs['transform'])) { 
  23793.         $tm = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, TCPDF_STATIC::getSVGTransformMatrix($attribs['transform'])); 
  23794.     } 
  23795.     $svgstyle['transfmatrix'] = $tm; 
  23796.     $invisible = false; 
  23797.     if (($svgstyle['visibility'] == 'hidden') OR ($svgstyle['visibility'] == 'collapse') OR ($svgstyle['display'] == 'none')) { 
  23798.         // the current graphics element is invisible (nothing is painted) 
  23799.         $invisible = true; 
  23800.     } 
  23801.     // process tag 
  23802.     switch($name) { 
  23803.         case 'defs': { 
  23804.             $this->svgdefsmode = true; 
  23805.             break; 
  23806.         } 
  23807.         // clipPath 
  23808.         case 'clipPath': { 
  23809.             if ($invisible) { 
  23810.                 break; 
  23811.             } 
  23812.             $this->svgclipmode = true; 
  23813.             if (!isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23814.                 $attribs['id'] = 'CP_'.(count($this->svgcliptm) + 1); 
  23815.             } 
  23816.             $this->svgclipid = $attribs['id']; 
  23817.             $this->svgclippaths[$this->svgclipid] = array(); 
  23818.             $this->svgcliptm[$this->svgclipid] = $tm; 
  23819.             break; 
  23820.         } 
  23821.         case 'svg': { 
  23822.             // start of SVG object 
  23823.             break; 
  23824.         } 
  23825.         case 'g': { 
  23826.             // group together related graphics elements 
  23827.             array_push($this->svgstyles, $svgstyle); 
  23828.             $this->StartTransform(); 
  23829.             $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$attribs['x']:0); 
  23830.             $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$attribs['y']:0); 
  23831.             $w = 1;//(isset($attribs['width'])?$attribs['width']:1); 
  23832.             $h = 1;//(isset($attribs['height'])?$attribs['height']:1); 
  23833.             $tm = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array($w, 0, 0, $h, $x, $y)); 
  23834.             $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23835.             $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle); 
  23836.             break; 
  23837.         } 
  23838.         case 'linearGradient': { 
  23839.             if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  23840.                 break; 
  23841.             } 
  23842.             if (!isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23843.                 $attribs['id'] = 'GR_'.(count($this->svggradients) + 1); 
  23844.             } 
  23845.             $this->svggradientid = $attribs['id']; 
  23846.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid] = array(); 
  23847.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['type'] = 2; 
  23848.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['stops'] = array(); 
  23849.             if (isset($attribs['gradientUnits'])) { 
  23850.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = $attribs['gradientUnits']; 
  23851.             } else { 
  23852.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = 'objectBoundingBox'; 
  23853.             } 
  23854.             //$attribs['spreadMethod'] 
  23855.             if (((!isset($attribs['x1'])) AND (!isset($attribs['y1'])) AND (!isset($attribs['x2'])) AND (!isset($attribs['y2']))) 
  23856.                 OR ((isset($attribs['x1']) AND (substr($attribs['x1'], -1) == '%')) 
  23857.                     OR (isset($attribs['y1']) AND (substr($attribs['y1'], -1) == '%')) 
  23858.                     OR (isset($attribs['x2']) AND (substr($attribs['x2'], -1) == '%')) 
  23859.                     OR (isset($attribs['y2']) AND (substr($attribs['y2'], -1) == '%')))) { 
  23860.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'percentage'; 
  23861.             } else { 
  23862.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'measure'; 
  23863.             } 
  23864.             $x1 = (isset($attribs['x1'])?$attribs['x1']:'0'); 
  23865.             $y1 = (isset($attribs['y1'])?$attribs['y1']:'0'); 
  23866.             $x2 = (isset($attribs['x2'])?$attribs['x2']:'100'); 
  23867.             $y2 = (isset($attribs['y2'])?$attribs['y2']:'0'); 
  23868.             if (isset($attribs['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23869.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientTransform'] = TCPDF_STATIC::getSVGTransformMatrix($attribs['gradientTransform']); 
  23870.             } 
  23871.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['coords'] = array($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2); 
  23872.             if (isset($attribs['xlink:href']) AND !empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  23873.                 // gradient is defined on another place 
  23874.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['xref'] = substr($attribs['xlink:href'], 1); 
  23875.             } 
  23876.             break; 
  23877.         } 
  23878.         case 'radialGradient': { 
  23879.             if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  23880.                 break; 
  23881.             } 
  23882.             if (!isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23883.                 $attribs['id'] = 'GR_'.(count($this->svggradients) + 1); 
  23884.             } 
  23885.             $this->svggradientid = $attribs['id']; 
  23886.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid] = array(); 
  23887.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['type'] = 3; 
  23888.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['stops'] = array(); 
  23889.             if (isset($attribs['gradientUnits'])) { 
  23890.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = $attribs['gradientUnits']; 
  23891.             } else { 
  23892.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = 'objectBoundingBox'; 
  23893.             } 
  23894.             //$attribs['spreadMethod'] 
  23895.             if (((!isset($attribs['cx'])) AND (!isset($attribs['cy']))) 
  23896.                 OR ((isset($attribs['cx']) AND (substr($attribs['cx'], -1) == '%')) 
  23897.                     OR (isset($attribs['cy']) AND (substr($attribs['cy'], -1) == '%')) )) { 
  23898.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'percentage'; 
  23899.             } else { 
  23900.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'measure'; 
  23901.             } 
  23902.             $cx = (isset($attribs['cx']) ? $attribs['cx'] : 0.5); 
  23903.             $cy = (isset($attribs['cy']) ? $attribs['cy'] : 0.5); 
  23904.             $fx = (isset($attribs['fx']) ? $attribs['fx'] : $cx); 
  23905.             $fy = (isset($attribs['fy']) ? $attribs['fy'] : $cy); 
  23906.             $r = (isset($attribs['r']) ? $attribs['r'] : 0.5); 
  23907.             if (isset($attribs['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23908.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientTransform'] = TCPDF_STATIC::getSVGTransformMatrix($attribs['gradientTransform']); 
  23909.             } 
  23910.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['coords'] = array($cx, $cy, $fx, $fy, $r); 
  23911.             if (isset($attribs['xlink:href']) AND !empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  23912.                 // gradient is defined on another place 
  23913.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['xref'] = substr($attribs['xlink:href'], 1); 
  23914.             } 
  23915.             break; 
  23916.         } 
  23917.         case 'stop': { 
  23918.             // gradient stops 
  23919.             if (substr($attribs['offset'], -1) == '%') { 
  23920.                 $offset = floatval(substr($attribs['offset'], -1)) / 100; 
  23921.             } else { 
  23922.                 $offset = floatval($attribs['offset']); 
  23923.                 if ($offset > 1) { 
  23924.                     $offset /= 100; 
  23925.                 } 
  23926.             }
