  23927.             $stop_color = isset($svgstyle['stop-color'])?TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['stop-color'], $this->spot_colors):'black'; 
  23928.             $opacity = isset($svgstyle['stop-opacity'])?$svgstyle['stop-opacity']:1; 
  23929.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['stops'][] = array('offset' => $offset, 'color' => $stop_color, 'opacity' => $opacity); 
  23930.             break; 
  23931.         } 
  23932.         // paths 
  23933.         case 'path': { 
  23934.             if ($invisible) { 
  23935.                 break; 
  23936.             } 
  23937.             if (isset($attribs['d'])) { 
  23938.                 $d = trim($attribs['d']); 
  23939.                 if (!empty($d)) { 
  23940.                     $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$attribs['x']:0); 
  23941.                     $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$attribs['y']:0); 
  23942.                     $w = (isset($attribs['width'])?$attribs['width']:1); 
  23943.                     $h = (isset($attribs['height'])?$attribs['height']:1); 
  23944.                     $tm = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array($w, 0, 0, $h, $x, $y)); 
  23945.                     if ($clipping) { 
  23946.                         $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23947.                         $this->SVGPath($d, 'CNZ'); 
  23948.                     } else { 
  23949.                         $this->StartTransform(); 
  23950.                         $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23951.                         $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'SVGPath', array($d, 'CNZ')); 
  23952.                         if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  23953.                             $this->SVGPath($d, $obstyle); 
  23954.                         } 
  23955.                         $this->StopTransform(); 
  23956.                     } 
  23957.                 } 
  23958.             } 
  23959.             break; 
  23960.         } 
  23961.         // shapes 
  23962.         case 'rect': { 
  23963.             if ($invisible) { 
  23964.                 break; 
  23965.             } 
  23966.             $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23967.             $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23968.             $w = (isset($attribs['width'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23969.             $h = (isset($attribs['height'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['height'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23970.             $rx = (isset($attribs['rx'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['rx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23971.             $ry = (isset($attribs['ry'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['ry'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):$rx); 
  23972.             if ($clipping) { 
  23973.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23974.                 $this->RoundedRectXY($x, $y, $w, $h, $rx, $ry, '1111', 'CNZ', array(), array()); 
  23975.             } else { 
  23976.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  23977.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23978.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'RoundedRectXY', array($x, $y, $w, $h, $rx, $ry, '1111', 'CNZ')); 
  23979.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  23980.                     $this->RoundedRectXY($x, $y, $w, $h, $rx, $ry, '1111', $obstyle, array(), array()); 
  23981.                 } 
  23982.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  23983.             } 
  23984.             break; 
  23985.         } 
  23986.         case 'circle': { 
  23987.             if ($invisible) { 
  23988.                 break; 
  23989.             } 
  23990.             $r = (isset($attribs['r']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['r'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0); 
  23991.             $cx = (isset($attribs['cx']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['x']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  23992.             $cy = (isset($attribs['cy']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cy'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['y']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  23993.             $x = ($cx - $r); 
  23994.             $y = ($cy - $r); 
  23995.             $w = (2 * $r); 
  23996.             $h = $w; 
  23997.             if ($clipping) { 
  23998.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23999.                 $this->Circle($cx, $cy, $r, 0, 360, 'CNZ', array(), array(), 8); 
  24000.             } else { 
  24001.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24002.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24003.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Circle', array($cx, $cy, $r, 0, 360, 'CNZ')); 
  24004.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24005.                     $this->Circle($cx, $cy, $r, 0, 360, $obstyle, array(), array(), 8); 
  24006.                 } 
  24007.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24008.             } 
  24009.             break; 
  24010.         } 
  24011.         case 'ellipse': { 
  24012.             if ($invisible) { 
  24013.                 break; 
  24014.             } 
  24015.             $rx = (isset($attribs['rx']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['rx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0); 
  24016.             $ry = (isset($attribs['ry']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['ry'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0); 
  24017.             $cx = (isset($attribs['cx']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['x']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  24018.             $cy = (isset($attribs['cy']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cy'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['y']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  24019.             $x = ($cx - $rx); 
  24020.             $y = ($cy - $ry); 
  24021.             $w = (2 * $rx); 
  24022.             $h = (2 * $ry); 
  24023.             if ($clipping) { 
  24024.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24025.                 $this->Ellipse($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, 0, 0, 360, 'CNZ', array(), array(), 8); 
  24026.             } else { 
  24027.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24028.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24029.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Ellipse', array($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, 0, 0, 360, 'CNZ')); 
  24030.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24031.                     $this->Ellipse($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, 0, 0, 360, $obstyle, array(), array(), 8); 
  24032.                 } 
  24033.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24034.             } 
  24035.             break; 
  24036.         } 
  24037.         case 'line': { 
  24038.             if ($invisible) { 
  24039.                 break; 
  24040.             } 
  24041.             $x1 = (isset($attribs['x1'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x1'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24042.             $y1 = (isset($attribs['y1'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y1'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24043.             $x2 = (isset($attribs['x2'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x2'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24044.             $y2 = (isset($attribs['y2'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y2'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24045.             $x = $x1; 
  24046.             $y = $y1; 
  24047.             $w = abs($x2 - $x1); 
  24048.             $h = abs($y2 - $y1); 
  24049.             if (!$clipping) { 
  24050.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24051.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24052.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Line', array($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2)); 
  24053.                 $this->Line($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2); 
  24054.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24055.             } 
  24056.             break; 
  24057.         } 
  24058.         case 'polyline': 
  24059.         case 'polygon': { 
  24060.             if ($invisible) { 
  24061.                 break; 
  24062.             } 
  24063.             $points = (isset($attribs['points'])?$attribs['points']:'0 0'); 
  24064.             $points = trim($points); 
  24065.             // note that point may use a complex syntax not covered here 
  24066.             $points = preg_split('/[\, \s]+/si', $points); 
  24067.             if (count($points) < 4) { 
  24068.                 break; 
  24069.             } 
  24070.             $p = array(); 
  24071.             $xmin = 2147483647; 
  24072.             $xmax = 0; 
  24073.             $ymin = 2147483647; 
  24074.             $ymax = 0; 
  24075.             foreach ($points as $key => $val) { 
  24076.                 $p[$key] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($val, 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24077.                 if (($key % 2) == 0) { 
  24078.                     // X coordinate 
  24079.                     $xmin = min($xmin, $p[$key]); 
  24080.                     $xmax = max($xmax, $p[$key]); 
  24081.                 } else { 
  24082.                     // Y coordinate 
  24083.                     $ymin = min($ymin, $p[$key]); 
  24084.                     $ymax = max($ymax, $p[$key]); 
  24085.                 } 
  24086.             } 
  24087.             $x = $xmin; 
  24088.             $y = $ymin; 
  24089.             $w = ($xmax - $xmin); 
  24090.             $h = ($ymax - $ymin); 
  24091.             if ($name == 'polyline') { 
  24092.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24093.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24094.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'PolyLine', array($p, 'CNZ')); 
  24095.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24096.                     $this->PolyLine($p, $obstyle, array(), array()); 
  24097.                 } 
  24098.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24099.             } else { // polygon 
  24100.                 if ($clipping) { 
  24101.                     $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24102.                     $this->Polygon($p, 'CNZ', array(), array(), true); 
  24103.                 } else { 
  24104.                     $this->StartTransform(); 
  24105.                     $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24106.                     $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Polygon', array($p, 'CNZ')); 
  24107.                     if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24108.                         $this->Polygon($p, $obstyle, array(), array(), true); 
  24109.                     } 
  24110.                     $this->StopTransform(); 
  24111.                 } 
  24112.             } 
  24113.             break; 
  24114.         } 
  24115.         // image 
  24116.         case 'image': { 
  24117.             if ($invisible) { 
  24118.                 break; 
  24119.             } 
  24120.             if (!isset($attribs['xlink:href']) OR empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  24121.                 break; 
  24122.             } 
  24123.             $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24124.             $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24125.             $w = (isset($attribs['width'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24126.             $h = (isset($attribs['height'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['height'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24127.             $img = $attribs['xlink:href']; 
  24128.             if (!$clipping) { 
  24129.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24130.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24131.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24132.                 if (preg_match('/^data:image\/[^;]+;base64, /', $img, $m) > 0) { 
  24133.                     // embedded image encoded as base64 
  24134.                     $img = '@'.base64_decode(substr($img, strlen($m[0]))); 
  24135.                 } else { 
  24136.                     // fix image path 
  24137.                     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->svgdir) AND (($img[0] == '.') OR (basename($img) == $img))) { 
  24138.                         // replace relative path with full server path 
  24139.                         $img = $this->svgdir.'/'.$img; 
  24140.                     } 
  24141.                     if (($img[0] == '/') AND !empty($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) AND ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] != '/')) { 
  24142.                         $findroot = strpos($img, $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']); 
  24143.                         if (($findroot === false) OR ($findroot > 1)) { 
  24144.                             if (substr($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'], -1) == '/') { 
  24145.                                 $img = substr($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'], 0, -1).$img; 
  24146.                             } else { 
  24147.                                 $img = $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'].$img; 
  24148.                             } 
  24149.                         } 
  24150.                     } 
  24151.                     $img = urldecode($img); 
  24152.                     $testscrtype = @parse_url($img); 
  24153.                     if (!isset($testscrtype['query']) OR empty($testscrtype['query'])) { 
  24154.                         // convert URL to server path 
  24155.                         $img = str_replace(K_PATH_URL, K_PATH_MAIN, $img); 
  24156.                     } 
  24157.                 } 
  24158.                 // get image type 
  24159.                 $imgtype = TCPDF_IMAGES::getImageFileType($img); 
  24160.                 if (($imgtype == 'eps') OR ($imgtype == 'ai')) { 
  24161.                     $this->ImageEps($img, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24162.                 } elseif ($imgtype == 'svg') { 
  24163.                     $this->ImageSVG($img, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24164.                 } else { 
  24165.                     $this->Image($img, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24166.                 } 
  24167.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24168.             } 
  24169.             break; 
  24170.         } 
  24171.         // text 
  24172.         case 'text': 
  24173.         case 'tspan': { 
  24174.             // only basic support - advanced features must be implemented 
  24175.             $this->svgtextmode['invisible'] = $invisible; 
  24176.             if ($invisible) { 
  24177.                 break; 
  24178.             } 
  24179.             array_push($this->svgstyles, $svgstyle); 
  24180.             if (isset($attribs['x'])) { 
  24181.                 $x = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24182.             } elseif ($name == 'tspan') { 
  24183.                 $x = $this->x; 
  24184.             } else { 
  24185.                 $x = 0; 
  24186.             } 
  24187.             if (isset($attribs['dx'])) { 
  24188.                 $x += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['dx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24189.             } 
  24190.             if (isset($attribs['y'])) { 
  24191.                 $y = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24192.             } elseif ($name == 'tspan') { 
  24193.                 $y = $this->y; 
  24194.             } else { 
  24195.                 $y = 0; 
  24196.             } 
  24197.             if (isset($attribs['dy'])) { 
  24198.                 $y += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['dy'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24199.             } 
  24200.             $svgstyle['text-color'] = $svgstyle['fill']; 
  24201.             $this->svgtext = ''; 
  24202.             if (isset($svgstyle['text-anchor'])) { 
  24203.                 $this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] = $svgstyle['text-anchor']; 
  24204.             } else { 
  24205.                 $this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] = 'start'; 
  24206.             } 
  24207.             if (isset($svgstyle['direction'])) { 
  24208.                 if ($svgstyle['direction'] == 'rtl') { 
  24209.                     $this->svgtextmode['rtl'] = true; 
  24210.                 } else { 
  24211.                     $this->svgtextmode['rtl'] = false; 
  24212.                 } 
  24213.             } else { 
  24214.                 $this->svgtextmode['rtl'] = false; 
  24215.             } 
  24216.             if (isset($svgstyle['stroke']) AND ($svgstyle['stroke'] != 'none') AND isset($svgstyle['stroke-width']) AND ($svgstyle['stroke-width'] > 0)) { 
  24217.                 $this->svgtextmode['stroke'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($svgstyle['stroke-width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24218.             } else { 
  24219.                 $this->svgtextmode['stroke'] = false; 
  24220.             } 
  24221.             $this->StartTransform(); 
  24222.             $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24223.             $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, 1, 1); 
  24224.             $this->x = $x; 
  24225.             $this->y = $y; 
  24226.             break; 
  24227.         } 
  24228.         // use 
  24229.         case 'use': { 
  24230.             if (isset($attribs['xlink:href']) AND !empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  24231.                 $svgdefid = substr($attribs['xlink:href'], 1); 
  24232.                 if (isset($this->svgdefs[$svgdefid])) { 
  24233.                     $use = $this->svgdefs[$svgdefid]; 
  24234.                     if (isset($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  24235.                         unset($attribs['xlink:href']); 
  24236.                     } 
  24237.                     if (isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  24238.                         unset($attribs['id']); 
  24239.                     } 
  24240.                     if (isset($use['attribs']['x']) AND isset($attribs['x'])) { 
  24241.                         $attribs['x'] += $use['attribs']['x']; 
  24242.                     } 
  24243.                     if (isset($use['attribs']['y']) AND isset($attribs['y'])) { 
  24244.                         $attribs['y'] += $use['attribs']['y']; 
  24245.                     } 
  24246.                     if (empty($attribs['style'])) { 
  24247.                         $attribs['style'] = ''; 
  24248.                     } 
  24249.                     if (!empty($use['attribs']['style'])) { 
  24250.                         // merge styles 
  24251.                         $attribs['style'] = str_replace(';;', ';', ';'.$use['attribs']['style'].$attribs['style']); 
  24252.                     } 
  24253.                     $attribs = array_merge($use['attribs'], $attribs); 
  24254.                     $this->startSVGElementHandler($parser, $use['name'], $attribs); 
  24255.                     return; 
  24256.                 } 
  24257.             } 
  24258.             break; 
  24259.         } 
  24260.         default: { 
  24261.             break; 
  24262.         } 
  24263.     } // end of switch 
  24264.     // process child elements 
  24265.     if (!empty($attribs['child_elements'])) { 
  24266.         $child_elements = $attribs['child_elements']; 
  24267.         unset($attribs['child_elements']); 
  24268.         foreach($child_elements as $child_element) { 
  24269.             if (empty($child_element['attribs']['closing_tag'])) { 
  24270.                 $this->startSVGElementHandler('child-tag', $child_element['name'], $child_element['attribs']); 
  24271.             } else { 
  24272.                 if (isset($child_element['attribs']['content'])) { 
  24273.                     $this->svgtext = $child_element['attribs']['content']; 
  24274.                 } 
  24275.                 $this->endSVGElementHandler('child-tag', $child_element['name']); 
  24276.             } 
  24277.         } 
  24278.     } 
  24279. } 
  24280.  
  24281. /** 
  24282.  * Sets the closing SVG element handler function for the XML parser. 
  24283.  * @param $parser (resource) The first parameter, parser, is a reference to the XML parser calling the handler. 
  24284.  * @param $name (string) The second parameter, name, contains the name of the element for which this handler is called. If case-folding is in effect for this parser, the element name will be in uppercase letters. 
  24285.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  24286.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  24287.  * @protected 
  24288.  */ 
  24289. protected function endSVGElementHandler($parser, $name) { 
  24290.     if ($this->svgdefsmode AND !in_array($name, array('defs', 'clipPath', 'linearGradient', 'radialGradient', 'stop'))) {; 
  24291.         if (end($this->svgdefs) !== FALSE) { 
  24292.             $last_svgdefs_id = key($this->svgdefs); 
  24293.             if (isset($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'])) { 
  24294.                 foreach($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'] as $child_element) { 
  24295.                     if (isset($child_element['attribs']['id']) AND ($child_element['name'] == $name)) { 
  24296.                         $this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'][$child_element['attribs']['id'].'_CLOSE'] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => array('closing_tag' => TRUE, 'content' => $this->svgtext)); 
  24297.                         return; 
  24298.                     } 
  24299.                 } 
  24300.                 if ($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['name'] == $name) { 
  24301.                     $this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'][$last_svgdefs_id.'_CLOSE'] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => array('closing_tag' => TRUE, 'content' => $this->svgtext)); 
  24302.                     return; 
  24303.                 } 
  24304.             } 
  24305.         } 
  24306.         return; 
  24307.     } 
  24308.     switch($name) { 
  24309.         case 'defs': { 
  24310.             $this->svgdefsmode = false; 
  24311.             break; 
  24312.         } 
  24313.         // clipPath 
  24314.         case 'clipPath': { 
  24315.             $this->svgclipmode = false; 
  24316.             break; 
  24317.         } 
  24318.         case 'g': { 
  24319.             // ungroup: remove last style from array 
  24320.             array_pop($this->svgstyles); 
  24321.             $this->StopTransform(); 
  24322.             break; 
  24323.         } 
  24324.         case 'text': 
  24325.         case 'tspan': { 
  24326.             if ($this->svgtextmode['invisible']) { 
  24327.                 // This implementation must be fixed to following the rule: 
  24328.                 // If the 'visibility' property is set to hidden on a 'tspan', 'tref' or 'altGlyph' element, then the text is invisible but still takes up space in text layout calculations. 
  24329.                 break; 
  24330.             } 
  24331.             // print text 
  24332.             $text = $this->svgtext; 
  24333.             //$text = $this->stringTrim($text); 
  24334.             $textlen = $this->GetStringWidth($text); 
  24335.             if ($this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] != 'start') { 
  24336.                 // check if string is RTL text 
  24337.                 if ($this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] == 'end') { 
  24338.                     if ($this->svgtextmode['rtl']) { 
  24339.                         $this->x += $textlen; 
  24340.                     } else { 
  24341.                         $this->x -= $textlen; 
  24342.                     } 
  24343.                 } elseif ($this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] == 'middle') { 
  24344.                     if ($this->svgtextmode['rtl']) { 
  24345.                         $this->x += ($textlen / 2); 
  24346.                     } else { 
  24347.                         $this->x -= ($textlen / 2); 
  24348.                     } 
  24349.                 } 
  24350.             } 
  24351.             $textrendermode = $this->textrendermode; 
  24352.             $textstrokewidth = $this->textstrokewidth; 
  24353.             $this->setTextRenderingMode($this->svgtextmode['stroke'], true, false); 
  24354.             if ($name == 'text') { 
  24355.                 // store current coordinates 
  24356.                 $tmpx = $this->x; 
  24357.                 $tmpy = $this->y; 
  24358.             } 
  24359.             $this->Cell($textlen, 0, $text, 0, 0, '', false, '', 0, false, 'L', 'T'); 
  24360.             if ($name == 'text') { 
  24361.                 // restore coordinates 
  24362.                 $this->x = $tmpx; 
  24363.                 $this->y = $tmpy; 
  24364.             } 
  24365.             // restore previous rendering mode 
  24366.             $this->textrendermode = $textrendermode; 
  24367.             $this->textstrokewidth = $textstrokewidth; 
  24368.             $this->svgtext = ''; 
  24369.             $this->StopTransform(); 
  24370.             if (!$this->svgdefsmode) { 
  24371.                 array_pop($this->svgstyles); 
  24372.             } 
  24373.             break; 
  24374.         } 
  24375.         default: { 
  24376.             break; 
  24377.         } 
  24378.     } 
  24379. } 
  24380.  
  24381. /** 
  24382.  * Sets the character data handler function for the XML parser. 
  24383.  * @param $parser (resource) The first parameter, parser, is a reference to the XML parser calling the handler. 
  24384.  * @param $data (string) The second parameter, data, contains the character data as a string. 
  24385.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  24386.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  24387.  * @protected 
  1. /* @class TCPDF 
  2.  * PHP class for generating PDF documents without requiring external extensions. 
  3.  * TCPDF project (http://www.tcpdf.org) has been originally derived in 2002 from the Public Domain FPDF class by Olivier Plathey (http://www.fpdf.org), but now is almost entirely rewritten.<br> 
  4.  * @package com.tecnick.tcpdf 
  5.  * @brief PHP class for generating PDF documents without requiring external extensions. 
  6.  * @version 6.0.085 
  7.  * @author Nicola Asuni - info@tecnick.com 
  8.  */ 
  9. class TCPDF { 
  10.  
  11. // Protected properties 
  12.  
  13. /** 
  14.  * Current page number. 
  15.  * @protected 
  16.  */ 
  17. protected $page; 
  18.  
  19. /** 
  20.  * Current object number. 
  21.  * @protected 
  22.  */ 
  23. protected $n; 
  24.  
  25. /** 
  26.  * Array of object offsets. 
  27.  * @protected 
  28.  */ 
  29. protected $offsets = array(); 
  30.  
  31. /** 
  32.  * Array of object IDs for each page. 
  33.  * @protected 
  34.  */ 
  35. protected $pageobjects = array(); 
  36.  
  37. /** 
  38.  * Buffer holding in-memory PDF. 
  39.  * @protected 
  40.  */ 
  41. protected $buffer; 
  42.  
  43. /** 
  44.  * Array containing pages. 
  45.  * @protected 
  46.  */ 
  47. protected $pages = array(); 
  48.  
  49. /** 
  50.  * Current document state. 
  51.  * @protected 
  52.  */ 
  53. protected $state; 
  54.  
  55. /** 
  56.  * Compression flag. 
  57.  * @protected 
  58.  */ 
  59. protected $compress; 
  60.  
  61. /** 
  62.  * Current page orientation (P = Portrait, L = Landscape). 
  63.  * @protected 
  64.  */ 
  65. protected $CurOrientation; 
  66.  
  67. /**

  69.  * @protected 
  70.  */ 
  71. protected $pagedim = array(); 
  72.  
  73. /** 
  74.  * Scale factor (number of points in user unit). 
  75.  * @protected 
  76.  */ 
  77. protected $k; 
  78.  
  79. /** 
  80.  * Width of page format in points. 
  81.  * @protected 
  82.  */ 
  83. protected $fwPt; 
  84.

  86.  * Height of page format in points. 
  87.  * @protected 
  88.  */ 
  89. protected $fhPt; 
  90.

  92.  * Current width of page in points. 
  93.  * @protected 
  94.  */ 
  95. protected $wPt; 
  96.  
  97. /** 
  98.  * Current height of page in points. 
  99.  * @protected 
  100.  */ 
  101. protected $hPt; 
  102.  
  103. /** 
  104.  * Current width of page in user unit. 
  105.  * @protected 
  106.  */ 
  107. protected $w; 
  108.  
  109. /** 
  110.  * Current height of page in user unit. 
  111.  * @protected 
  112.  */ 
  113. protected $h; 
  114.  
  115. /** 
  116.  * Left margin. 
  117.  * @protected 
  118.  */ 
  119. protected $lMargin; 
  120.  
  121. /** 
  122.  * Right margin. 
  123.  * @protected 
  124.  */ 
  125. protected $rMargin; 
  126.  
  127. /** 
  128.  * Cell left margin (used by regions). 
  129.  * @protected 
  130.  */ 
  131. protected $clMargin; 
  132.  
  133. /** 
  134.  * Cell right margin (used by regions). 
  135.  * @protected 
  136.  */ 
  137. protected $crMargin; 
  138.  
  139. /** 
  140.  * Top margin. 
  141.  * @protected 
  142.  */ 
  143. protected $tMargin; 
  144.  
  145. /** 
  146.  * Page break margin. 
  147.  * @protected 
  148.  */ 
  149. protected $bMargin; 
  150.  
  151. /** 
  152.  * Array of cell internal paddings ('T' => top, 'R' => right, 'B' => bottom, 'L' => left). 
  153.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-10-03) 
  154.  * @protected 
  155.  */ 
  156. protected $cell_padding = array('T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0, 'L' => 0); 
  157.  
  158. /** 
  159.  * Array of cell margins ('T' => top, 'R' => right, 'B' => bottom, 'L' => left). 
  160.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-10-04) 
  161.  * @protected 
  162.  */ 
  163. protected $cell_margin = array('T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0, 'L' => 0); 
  164.  
  165. /** 
  166.  * Current horizontal position in user unit for cell positioning. 
  167.  * @protected 
  168.  */ 
  169. protected $x; 
  170.  
  171. /** 
  172.  * Current vertical position in user unit for cell positioning. 
  173.  * @protected 
  174.  */ 
  175. protected $y; 
  176.  
  177. /** 
  178.  * Height of last cell printed. 
  179.  * @protected 
  180.  */ 
  181. protected $lasth; 
  182.  
  183. /** 
  184.  * Line width in user unit. 
  185.  * @protected 
  186.  */ 
  187. protected $LineWidth; 
  188.  
  189. /** 
  190.  * Array of standard font names. 
  191.  * @protected 
  192.  */ 
  193. protected $CoreFonts; 
  194.  
  195. /** 
  196.  * Array of used fonts. 
  197.  * @protected 
  198.  */ 
  199. protected $fonts = array(); 
  200.  
  201. /** 
  202.  * Array of font files. 
  203.  * @protected 
  204.  */ 
  205. protected $FontFiles = array(); 
  206.  
  207. /** 
  208.  * Array of encoding differences. 
  209.  * @protected 
  210.  */ 
  211. protected $diffs = array(); 
  212.  
  213. /** 
  214.  * Array of used images. 
  215.  * @protected 
  216.  */ 
  217. protected $images = array(); 
  218.  
  219. /** 
  220.  * Array of cached files. 
  221.  * @protected 
  222.  */ 
  223. protected $cached_files = array(); 
  224.  
  225. /** 
  226.  * Array of Annotations in pages. 
  227.  * @protected 
  228.  */ 
  229. protected $PageAnnots = array(); 
  230.  
  231. /** 
  232.  * Array of internal links. 
  233.  * @protected 
  234.  */ 
  235. protected $links = array(); 
  236.  
  237. /** 
  238.  * Current font family. 
  239.  * @protected 
  240.  */ 
  241. protected $FontFamily; 
  242.  
  243. /** 
  244.  * Current font style. 
  245.  * @protected 
  246.  */ 
  247. protected $FontStyle; 
  248.  
  249. /** 
  250.  * Current font ascent (distance between font top and baseline). 
  251.  * @protected 
  252.  * @since 2.8.000 (2007-03-29) 
  253.  */ 
  254. protected $FontAscent; 
  255.  
  256. /** 
  257.  * Current font descent (distance between font bottom and baseline). 
  258.  * @protected 
  259.  * @since 2.8.000 (2007-03-29) 
  260.  */ 
  261. protected $FontDescent; 
  262.  
  263. /** 
  264.  * Underlining flag. 
  265.  * @protected 
  266.  */ 
  267. protected $underline; 
  268.  
  269. /** 
  270.  * Overlining flag. 
  271.  * @protected 
  272.  */ 
  273. protected $overline; 
  274.  
  275. /** 
  276.  * Current font info. 
  277.  * @protected 
  278.  */ 
  279. protected $CurrentFont; 
  280.  
  281. /** 
  282.  * Current font size in points. 
  283.  * @protected 
  284.  */ 
  285. protected $FontSizePt; 
  286.  
  287. /** 
  288.  * Current font size in user unit. 
  289.  * @protected 
  290.  */ 
  291. protected $FontSize; 
  292.  
  293. /** 
  294.  * Commands for drawing color. 
  295.  * @protected 
  296.  */ 
  297. protected $DrawColor; 
  298.  
  299. /** 
  300.  * Commands for filling color. 
  301.  * @protected 
  302.  */ 
  303. protected $FillColor; 
  304.  
  305. /** 
  306.  * Commands for text color. 
  307.  * @protected 
  308.  */ 
  309. protected $TextColor; 
  310.  
  311. /** 
  312.  * Indicates whether fill and text colors are different. 
  313.  * @protected 
  314.  */ 
  315. protected $ColorFlag; 
  316.  
  317. /** 
  318.  * Automatic page breaking. 
  319.  * @protected 
  320.  */ 
  321. protected $AutoPageBreak; 
  322.  
  323. /** 
  324.  * Threshold used to trigger page breaks. 
  325.  * @protected 
  326.  */ 
  327. protected $PageBreakTrigger; 
  328.  
  329. /** 
  330.  * Flag set when processing page header. 
  331.  * @protected 
  332.  */ 
  333. protected $InHeader = false; 
  334.  
  335. /** 
  336.  * Flag set when processing page footer. 
  337.  * @protected 
  338.  */ 
  339. protected $InFooter = false; 
  340.  
  341. /** 
  342.  * Zoom display mode. 
  343.  * @protected 
  344.  */ 
  345. protected $ZoomMode; 
  346.  
  347. /** 
  348.  * Layout display mode. 
  349.  * @protected 
  350.  */ 
  351. protected $LayoutMode; 
  352.  
  353. /** 
  354.  * If true set the document information dictionary in Unicode. 
  355.  * @protected 
  356.  */ 
  357. protected $docinfounicode = true; 
  358.  
  359. /** 
  360.  * Document title. 
  361.  * @protected 
  362.  */ 
  363. protected $title = ''; 
  364.  
  365. /** 
  366.  * Document subject. 
  367.  * @protected 
  368.  */ 
  369. protected $subject = ''; 
  370.  
  371. /** 
  372.  * Document author. 
  373.  * @protected 
  374.  */ 
  375. protected $author = ''; 
  376.  
  377. /** 
  378.  * Document keywords. 
  379.  * @protected 
  380.  */ 
  381. protected $keywords = ''; 
  382.  
  383. /** 
  384.  * Document creator. 
  385.  * @protected 
  386.  */ 
  387. protected $creator = ''; 
  388.  
  389. /** 
  390.  * Starting page number. 
  391.  * @protected 
  392.  */ 
  393. protected $starting_page_number = 1; 
  394.  
  395. /** 
  396.  * The right-bottom (or left-bottom for RTL) corner X coordinate of last inserted image. 
  397.  * @since 2002-07-31 
  398.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  399.  * @protected 
  400.  */ 
  401. protected $img_rb_x; 
  402.  
  403. /** 
  404.  * The right-bottom corner Y coordinate of last inserted image. 
  405.  * @since 2002-07-31 
  406.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  407.  * @protected 
  408.  */ 
  409. protected $img_rb_y; 
  410.  
  411. /** 
  412.  * Adjusting factor to convert pixels to user units. 
  413.  * @since 2004-06-14 
  414.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  415.  * @protected 
  416.  */ 
  417. protected $imgscale = 1; 
  418.  
  419. /** 
  420.  * Boolean flag set to true when the input text is unicode (require unicode fonts). 
  421.  * @since 2005-01-02 
  422.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  423.  * @protected 
  424.  */ 
  425. protected $isunicode = false; 
  426.  
  427. /** 
  428.  * PDF version. 
  429.  * @since 1.5.3 
  430.  * @protected 
  431.  */ 
  432. protected $PDFVersion = '1.7'; 
  433.  
  434. /** 
  435.  * ID of the stored default header template (-1 = not set). 
  436.  * @protected 
  437.  */ 
  438. protected $header_xobjid = false; 
  439.  
  440. /** 
  441.  * If true reset the Header Xobject template at each page 
  442.  * @protected 
  443.  */ 
  444. protected $header_xobj_autoreset = false; 
  445.  
  446. /** 
  447.  * Minimum distance between header and top page margin. 
  448.  * @protected 
  449.  */ 
  450. protected $header_margin; 
  451.  
  452. /** 
  453.  * Minimum distance between footer and bottom page margin. 
  454.  * @protected 
  455.  */ 
  456. protected $footer_margin; 
  457.  
  458. /** 
  459.  * Original left margin value. 
  460.  * @protected 
  461.  * @since 1.53.0.TC013 
  462.  */ 
  463. protected $original_lMargin; 
  464.  
  465. /** 
  466.  * Original right margin value. 
  467.  * @protected 
  468.  * @since 1.53.0.TC013 
  469.  */ 
  470. protected $original_rMargin; 
  471.  
  472. /** 
  473.  * Default font used on page header. 
  474.  * @protected 
  475.  */ 
  476. protected $header_font; 
  477.  
  478. /** 
  479.  * Default font used on page footer. 
  480.  * @protected 
  481.  */ 
  482. protected $footer_font; 
  483.  
  484. /** 
  485.  * Language templates. 
  486.  * @protected 
  487.  */ 
  488. protected $l; 
  489.  
  490. /** 
  491.  * Barcode to print on page footer (only if set). 
  492.  * @protected 
  493.  */ 
  494. protected $barcode = false; 
  495.  
  496. /** 
  497.  * Boolean flag to print/hide page header. 
  498.  * @protected 
  499.  */ 
  500. protected $print_header = true; 
  501.  
  502. /** 
  503.  * Boolean flag to print/hide page footer. 
  504.  * @protected 
  505.  */ 
  506. protected $print_footer = true; 
  507.  
  508. /** 
  509.  * Header image logo. 
  510.  * @protected 
  511.  */ 
  512. protected $header_logo = ''; 
  513.  
  514. /** 
  515.  * Width of header image logo in user units. 
  516.  * @protected 
  517.  */ 
  518. protected $header_logo_width = 30; 
  519.  
  520. /** 
  521.  * Title to be printed on default page header. 
  522.  * @protected 
  523.  */ 
  524. protected $header_title = ''; 
  525.  
  526. /** 
  527.  * String to pring on page header after title. 
  528.  * @protected 
  529.  */ 
  530. protected $header_string = ''; 
  531.  
  532. /** 
  533.  * Color for header text (RGB array). 
  534.  * @since 5.9.174 (2012-07-25) 
  535.  * @protected 
  536.  */ 
  537. protected $header_text_color = array(0, 0, 0); 
  538.  
  539. /** 
  540.  * Color for header line (RGB array). 
  541.  * @since 5.9.174 (2012-07-25) 
  542.  * @protected 
  543.  */ 
  544. protected $header_line_color = array(0, 0, 0); 
  545.

  549.  * @protected 
  550.  */ 
  551. protected $footer_text_color = array(0, 0, 0);

  556.  * @protected 
  557.  */ 
  558. protected $footer_line_color = array(0, 0, 0); 
  559.

  563.  * @protected 
  564.  */ 
  565. protected $txtshadow = array('enabled'=>false, 'depth_w'=>0, 'depth_h'=>0, 'color'=>false, 'opacity'=>1, 'blend_mode'=>'Normal'); 
  566.

  569.  * @protected 
  570.  */ 
  571. protected $default_table_columns = 4;

  591. protected $fgcolor;

  596.  */ 
  597. protected $listordered = array();

  1184.  */ 
  1185. protected $re_spaces = '/[^\S\xa0]/'; 
  1186.

  1192. protected $re_space = array('p' => '[^\S\xa0]', 'm' => '');

  1214.

  1218.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  1219.  */ 
  1220. protected $default_form_prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'solid', 'fillColor'=>array(255, 255, 255), 'strokeColor'=>array(128, 128, 128));

  1234. protected $form_action = ''; 
  1235.  
  1236. /** 
  1237.  * Current form encryption type (used during XHTML rendering). 
  1238.  * @protected 
  1239.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  1240.  */ 
  1241. protected $form_enctype = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'; 
  1242.  
  1243. /** 
  1244.  * Current method to submit forms. 
  1245.  * @protected 
  1246.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  1247.  */ 
  1248. protected $form_mode = 'post'; 
  1249.  
  1250. /** 
  1251.  * List of fonts used on form fields (fontname => fontkey). 
  1252.  * @protected 
  1253.  * @since 4.8.001 (2009-09-09) 
  1254.  */ 
  1255. protected $annotation_fonts = array(); 
  1256.  
  1257. /** 
  1258.  * List of radio buttons parent objects. 
  1259.  * @protected 
  1260.  * @since 4.8.001 (2009-09-09) 
  1261.  */ 
  1262. protected $radiobutton_groups = array(); 
  1263.  
  1264. /** 
  1265.  * List of radio group objects IDs. 
  1266.  * @protected 
  1267.  * @since 4.8.001 (2009-09-09) 
  1268.  */ 
  1269. protected $radio_groups = array(); 
  1270.  
  1271. /** 
  1272.  * Text indentation value (used for text-indent CSS attribute). 
  1273.  * @protected 
  1274.  * @since 4.8.006 (2009-09-23) 
  1275.  */ 
  1276. protected $textindent = 0; 
  1277.  
  1278. /** 
  1279.  * Store page number when startTransaction() is called. 
  1280.  * @protected 
  1281.  * @since 4.8.006 (2009-09-23) 
  1282.  */ 
  1283. protected $start_transaction_page = 0; 
  1284.  
  1285. /** 
  1286.  * Store Y position when startTransaction() is called. 
  1287.  * @protected 
  1288.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  1289.  */ 
  1290. protected $start_transaction_y = 0; 
  1291.  
  1292. /** 
  1293.  * True when we are printing the thead section on a new page. 
  1294.  * @protected 
  1295.  * @since 4.8.027 (2010-01-25) 
  1296.  */ 
  1297. protected $inthead = false; 
  1298.  
  1299. /** 
  1300.  * Array of column measures (width, space, starting Y position). 
  1301.  * @protected 
  1302.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  1303.  */ 
  1304. protected $columns = array(); 
  1305.

  1307.  * Number of colums. 
  1308.  * @protected 
  1309.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  1310.  */ 
  1311. protected $num_columns = 1; 
  1312.  
  1313. /** 
  1314.  * Current column number. 
  1315.  * @protected 
  1316.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  1317.  */ 
  1318. protected $current_column = 0; 
  1319.

  1321.  * Starting page for columns. 
  1322.  * @protected 
  1323.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  1324.  */ 
  1325. protected $column_start_page = 0; 
  1326.

  1328.  * Maximum page and column selected. 
  1329.  * @protected 
  1330.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  1331.  */ 
  1332. protected $maxselcol = array('page' => 0, 'column' => 0); 
  1333.  
  1334. /** 
  1335.  * Array of: X difference between table cell x start and starting page margin, cellspacing, cellpadding. 
  1336.  * @protected 
  1337.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  1338.  */ 
  1339. protected $colxshift = array('x' => 0, 's' => array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0), 'p' => array('L' => 0, 'T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0)); 
  1340.  
  1341. /** 
  1342.  * Text rendering mode: 0 = Fill text; 1 = Stroke text; 2 = Fill, then stroke text; 3 = Neither fill nor stroke text (invisible); 4 = Fill text and add to path for clipping; 5 = Stroke text and add to path for clipping; 6 = Fill, then stroke text and add to path for clipping; 7 = Add text to path for clipping. 
  1343.  * @protected 
  1344.  * @since 4.9.008 (2010-04-03) 
  1345.  */ 
  1346. protected $textrendermode = 0; 
  1347.

  1352.  */ 
  1353. protected $textstrokewidth = 0;

  1358.  * @since 4.9.008 (2010-04-03) 
  1359.  */ 
  1360. protected $strokecolor; 
  1361.

  1366.  */ 
  1367. protected $pdfunit = 'mm';

  1372.  */

  1428.  */ 
  1429. protected $font_spacing = 0;

  1434.  * @protected

  1436.  */ 
  1437. protected $page_regions = array();

  1500.

  1555. protected $svgtextmode = array(); 
  1556.

  1561.  */ 
  1562. protected $svgstyles = array(array( 
  1563.     'alignment-baseline' => 'auto',  
  1564.     'baseline-shift' => 'baseline',  
  1565.     'clip' => 'auto',  
  1566.     'clip-path' => 'none',  
  1567.     'clip-rule' => 'nonzero',  
  1568.     'color' => 'black',  
  1569.     'color-interpolation' => 'sRGB',  
  1570.     'color-interpolation-filters' => 'linearRGB',  
  1571.     'color-profile' => 'auto',  
  1572.     'color-rendering' => 'auto',  
  1573.     'cursor' => 'auto',  
  1574.     'direction' => 'ltr',  
  1575.     'display' => 'inline',  
  1576.     'dominant-baseline' => 'auto',  
  1577.     'enable-background' => 'accumulate',  
  1578.     'fill' => 'black',  
  1579.     'fill-opacity' => 1,  
  1580.     'fill-rule' => 'nonzero',  
  1581.     'filter' => 'none',  
  1582.     'flood-color' => 'black',  
  1583.     'flood-opacity' => 1,  
  1584.     'font' => '',  
  1585.     'font-family' => 'helvetica',  
  1586.     'font-size' => 'medium',  
  1587.     'font-size-adjust' => 'none',  
  1588.     'font-stretch' => 'normal',  
  1589.     'font-style' => 'normal',  
  1590.     'font-variant' => 'normal',  
  1591.     'font-weight' => 'normal',  
  1592.     'glyph-orientation-horizontal' => '0deg',  
  1593.     'glyph-orientation-vertical' => 'auto',  
  1594.     'image-rendering' => 'auto',  
  1595.     'kerning' => 'auto',  
  1596.     'letter-spacing' => 'normal',  
  1597.     'lighting-color' => 'white',  
  1598.     'marker' => '',  
  1599.     'marker-end' => 'none',  
  1600.     'marker-mid' => 'none',  
  1601.     'marker-start' => 'none',  
  1602.     'mask' => 'none',  
  1603.     'opacity' => 1,  
  1604.     'overflow' => 'auto',  
  1605.     'pointer-events' => 'visiblePainted',  
  1606.     'shape-rendering' => 'auto',  
  1607.     'stop-color' => 'black',  
  1608.     'stop-opacity' => 1,  
  1609.     'stroke' => 'none',  
  1610.     'stroke-dasharray' => 'none',  
  1611.     'stroke-dashoffset' => 0,  
  1612.     'stroke-linecap' => 'butt',  
  1613.     'stroke-linejoin' => 'miter',  
  1614.     'stroke-miterlimit' => 4,  
  1615.     'stroke-opacity' => 1,  
  1616.     'stroke-width' => 1,  
  1617.     'text-anchor' => 'start',  
  1618.     'text-decoration' => 'none',  
  1619.     'text-rendering' => 'auto',  
  1620.     'unicode-bidi' => 'normal',  
  1621.     'visibility' => 'visible',  
  1622.     'word-spacing' => 'normal',  
  1623.     'writing-mode' => 'lr-tb',  
  1624.     'text-color' => 'black',  
  1625.     'transfmatrix' => array(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0) 
  1626.  )); 
  1627.  
  1628. /** 
  1629.  * If true force sRGB color profile for all document. 
  1630.  * @protected 
  1631.  * @since 5.9.121 (2011-09-28) 
  1632.  */ 
  1633. protected $force_srgb = false; 
  1634.  
  1635. /** 
  1636.  * If true set the document to PDF/A mode. 
  1637.  * @protected 
  1638.  * @since 5.9.121 (2011-09-27) 
  1639.  */ 
  1640. protected $pdfa_mode = false; 
  1641.  
  1642. /** 
  1643.  * Document creation date-time 
  1644.  * @protected 
  1645.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-22) 
  1646.  */ 
  1647. protected $doc_creation_timestamp; 
  1648.

  1650.  * Document modification date-time 
  1651.  * @protected 
  1652.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-22) 
  1653.  */ 
  1654. protected $doc_modification_timestamp; 
  1655.  
  1656. /** 
  1657.  * Custom XMP data. 
  1658.  * @protected 
  1659.  * @since 5.9.128 (2011-10-06) 
  1660.  */ 
  1661. protected $custom_xmp = ''; 
  1662.  
  1663. /** 
  1664.  * Overprint mode array. 
  1665.  * (Check the "Entries in a Graphics State Parameter Dictionary" on PDF 32000-1:2008). 
  1666.  * @protected 
  1667.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  1668.  */ 
  1669. protected $overprint = array('OP' => false, 'op' => false, 'OPM' => 0); 
  1670.  
  1671. /** 
  1672.  * Alpha mode array. 
  1673.  * (Check the "Entries in a Graphics State Parameter Dictionary" on PDF 32000-1:2008). 
  1674.  * @protected 
  1675.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  1676.  */ 
  1677. protected $alpha = array('CA' => 1, 'ca' => 1, 'BM' => '/Normal', 'AIS' => false); 
  1678.  
  1679. /** 
  1680.  * Define the page boundaries boxes to be set on document. 
  1681.  * @protected 
  1682.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  1683.  */ 
  1684. protected $page_boxes = array('MediaBox', 'CropBox', 'BleedBox', 'TrimBox', 'ArtBox'); 
  1685.  
  1686. /** 
  1687.  * If true print TCPDF meta link. 
  1688.  * @protected 
  1689.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  1690.  */ 
  1691. protected $tcpdflink = true; 
  1692.  
  1693. /** 
  1694.  * Cache array for computed GD gamma values. 
  1695.  * @protected 
  1696.  * @since 5.9.1632 (2012-06-05) 
  1697.  */ 
  1698. protected $gdgammacache = array(); 
  1699.  
  1700. //------------------------------------------------------------ 
  1701. // METHODS 
  1702. //------------------------------------------------------------ 
  1703.  
  1704. /** 
  1705.  * This is the class constructor. 
  1706.  * It allows to set up the page format, the orientation and the measure unit used in all the methods (except for the font sizes). 
  1707.  *  
  1708.  * IMPORTANT: Please note that this method sets the mb_internal_encoding to ASCII, so if you are using the mbstring module functions with TCPDF you need to correctly set/unset the mb_internal_encoding when needed. 
  1709.  *  
  1710.  * @param $orientation (string) page orientation. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>P or Portrait (default)</li><li>L or Landscape</li><li>'' (empty string) for automatic orientation</li></ul> 
  1711.  * @param $unit (string) User measure unit. Possible values are:<ul><li>pt: point</li><li>mm: millimeter (default)</li><li>cm: centimeter</li><li>in: inch</li></ul><br />A point equals 1/72 of inch, that is to say about 0.35 mm (an inch being 2.54 cm). This is a very common unit in typography; font sizes are expressed in that unit. 
  1712.  * @param $format (mixed) The format used for pages. It can be either: one of the string values specified at getPageSizeFromFormat() or an array of parameters specified at setPageFormat(). 
  1713.  * @param $unicode (boolean) TRUE means that the input text is unicode (default = true) 
  1714.  * @param $encoding (string) Charset encoding (used only when converting back html entities); default is UTF-8. 
  1715.  * @param $diskcache (boolean) If TRUE reduce the RAM memory usage by caching temporary data on filesystem (slower). 
  1716.  * @param $pdfa (boolean) If TRUE set the document to PDF/A mode. 
  1717.  * @public 
  1718.  * @see getPageSizeFromFormat(), setPageFormat() 
  1719.  */ 
  1720. public function __construct($orientation='P', $unit='mm', $format='A4', $unicode=true, $encoding='UTF-8', $diskcache=false, $pdfa=false) { 
  1721.     /** Set internal character encoding to ASCII */ 
  1722.     if (function_exists('mb_internal_encoding') AND mb_internal_encoding()) { 
  1723.         $this->internal_encoding = mb_internal_encoding(); 
  1724.         mb_internal_encoding('ASCII'); 
  1725.     } 
  1726.     $this->font_obj_ids = array(); 
  1727.     $this->page_obj_id = array(); 
  1728.     $this->form_obj_id = array(); 
  1729.     // set pdf/a mode 
  1730.     $this->pdfa_mode = $pdfa; 
  1731.     $this->force_srgb = false; 
  1732.     // set disk caching 
  1733.     $this->diskcache = $diskcache ? true : false; 
  1734.     // set language direction 
  1735.     $this->rtl = false; 
  1736.     $this->tmprtl = false; 
  1737.     // some checks 
  1738.     $this->_dochecks(); 
  1739.     // initialization of properties 
  1740.     $this->isunicode = $unicode; 
  1741.     $this->page = 0; 
  1742.     $this->transfmrk[0] = array(); 
  1743.     $this->pagedim = array(); 
  1744.     $this->n = 2; 
  1745.     $this->buffer = ''; 
  1746.     $this->pages = array(); 
  1747.     $this->state = 0; 
  1748.     $this->fonts = array(); 
  1749.     $this->FontFiles = array(); 
  1750.     $this->diffs = array(); 
  1751.     $this->images = array(); 
  1752.     $this->links = array(); 
  1753.     $this->gradients = array(); 
  1754.     $this->InFooter = false; 
  1755.     $this->lasth = 0; 
  1756.     $this->FontFamily = defined('PDF_FONT_NAME_MAIN')?PDF_FONT_NAME_MAIN:'helvetica'; 
  1757.     $this->FontStyle = ''; 
  1758.     $this->FontSizePt = 12; 
  1759.     $this->underline = false; 
  1760.     $this->overline = false; 
  1761.     $this->linethrough = false; 
  1762.     $this->DrawColor = '0 G'; 
  1763.     $this->FillColor = '0 g'; 
  1764.     $this->TextColor = '0 g'; 
  1765.     $this->ColorFlag = false; 
  1766.     $this->pdflayers = array(); 
  1767.     // encryption values 
  1768.     $this->encrypted = false; 
  1769.     $this->last_enc_key = ''; 
  1770.     // standard Unicode fonts 
  1771.     $this->CoreFonts = array( 
  1772.         'courier'=>'Courier',  
  1773.         'courierB'=>'Courier-Bold',  
  1774.         'courierI'=>'Courier-Oblique',  
  1775.         'courierBI'=>'Courier-BoldOblique',  
  1776.         'helvetica'=>'Helvetica',  
  1777.         'helveticaB'=>'Helvetica-Bold',  
  1778.         'helveticaI'=>'Helvetica-Oblique',  
  1779.         'helveticaBI'=>'Helvetica-BoldOblique',  
  1780.         'times'=>'Times-Roman',  
  1781.         'timesB'=>'Times-Bold',  
  1782.         'timesI'=>'Times-Italic',  
  1783.         'timesBI'=>'Times-BoldItalic',  
  1784.         'symbol'=>'Symbol',  
  1785.         'zapfdingbats'=>'ZapfDingbats' 
  1786.  ); 
  1787.     // set scale factor 
  1788.     $this->setPageUnit($unit); 
  1789.     // set page format and orientation 
  1790.     $this->setPageFormat($format, $orientation); 
  1791.     // page margins (1 cm) 
  1792.     $margin = 28.35 / $this->k; 
  1793.     $this->SetMargins($margin, $margin); 
  1794.     $this->clMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  1795.     $this->crMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  1796.     // internal cell padding 
  1797.     $cpadding = $margin / 10; 
  1798.     $this->setCellPaddings($cpadding, 0, $cpadding, 0); 
  1799.     // cell margins 
  1800.     $this->setCellMargins(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  1801.     // line width (0.2 mm) 
  1802.     $this->LineWidth = 0.57 / $this->k; 
  1803.     $this->linestyleWidth = sprintf('%F w', ($this->LineWidth * $this->k)); 
  1804.     $this->linestyleCap = '0 J'; 
  1805.     $this->linestyleJoin = '0 j'; 
  1806.     $this->linestyleDash = '[] 0 d'; 
  1807.     // automatic page break 
  1808.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak(true, (2 * $margin)); 
  1809.     // full width display mode 
  1810.     $this->SetDisplayMode('fullwidth'); 
  1811.     // compression 
  1812.     $this->SetCompression(); 
  1813.     // set default PDF version number 
  1814.     $this->setPDFVersion(); 
  1815.     $this->tcpdflink = true; 
  1816.     $this->encoding = $encoding; 
  1817.     $this->HREF = array(); 
  1818.     $this->getFontsList(); 
  1819.     $this->fgcolor = array('R' => 0, 'G' => 0, 'B' => 0); 
  1820.     $this->strokecolor = array('R' => 0, 'G' => 0, 'B' => 0); 
  1821.     $this->bgcolor = array('R' => 255, 'G' => 255, 'B' => 255); 
  1822.     $this->extgstates = array(); 
  1823.     $this->setTextShadow(); 
  1824.     // signature 
  1825.     $this->sign = false; 
  1826.     $this->tsa_timestamp = false; 
  1827.     $this->tsa_data = array(); 
  1828.     $this->signature_appearance = array('page' => 1, 'rect' => '0 0 0 0', 'name' => 'Signature'); 
  1829.     $this->empty_signature_appearance = array(); 
  1830.     // user's rights 
  1831.     $this->ur['enabled'] = false; 
  1832.     $this->ur['document'] = '/FullSave'; 
  1833.     $this->ur['annots'] = '/Create/Delete/Modify/Copy/Import/Export'; 
  1834.     $this->ur['form'] = '/Add/Delete/FillIn/Import/Export/SubmitStandalone/SpawnTemplate'; 
  1835.     $this->ur['signature'] = '/Modify'; 
  1836.     $this->ur['ef'] = '/Create/Delete/Modify/Import'; 
  1837.     $this->ur['formex'] = ''; 
  1838.     // set default JPEG quality 
  1839.     $this->jpeg_quality = 75; 
  1840.     // initialize some settings 
  1841.     TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi(array(''), '', false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  1842.     // set default font 
  1843.     $this->SetFont($this->FontFamily, $this->FontStyle, $this->FontSizePt); 
  1844.     $this->setHeaderFont(array($this->FontFamily, $this->FontStyle, $this->FontSizePt)); 
  1845.     $this->setFooterFont(array($this->FontFamily, $this->FontStyle, $this->FontSizePt)); 
  1846.     // check if PCRE Unicode support is enabled 
  1847.     if ($this->isunicode AND (@preg_match('/\pL/u', 'a') == 1)) { 
  1848.         // PCRE unicode support is turned ON 
  1849.         // \s     : any whitespace character 
  1850.         // \p{Z}  : any separator 
  1851.         // \p{Lo} : Unicode letter or ideograph that does not have lowercase and uppercase variants. Is used to chunk chinese words. 
  1852.         // \xa0   : Unicode Character 'NO-BREAK SPACE' (U+00A0) 
  1853.         //$this->setSpacesRE('/(?!\xa0)[\s\p{Z}\p{Lo}]/u'); 
  1854.         $this->setSpacesRE('/(?!\xa0)[\s\p{Z}]/u'); 
  1855.     } else { 
  1856.         // PCRE unicode support is turned OFF 
  1857.         $this->setSpacesRE('/[^\S\xa0]/'); 
  1858.     } 
  1859.     $this->default_form_prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'solid', 'fillColor'=>array(255, 255, 255), 'strokeColor'=>array(128, 128, 128)); 
  1860.     // set file ID for trailer 
  1861.     $serformat = (is_array($format) ? serialize($format) : $format); 
  1862.     $this->file_id = md5(TCPDF_STATIC::getRandomSeed('TCPDF'.$orientation.$unit.$serformat.$encoding)); 
  1863.     // set document creation and modification timestamp 
  1864.     $this->doc_creation_timestamp = time(); 
  1865.     $this->doc_modification_timestamp = $this->doc_creation_timestamp; 
  1866.     // get default graphic vars 
  1867.     $this->default_graphic_vars = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  1868.     $this->header_xobj_autoreset = false; 
  1869.     $this->custom_xmp = ''; 
  1870. } 
  1871.  
  1872. /** 
  1873.  * Default destructor. 
  1874.  * @public 
  1875.  * @since 1.53.0.TC016 
  1876.  */ 
  1877. public function __destruct() { 
  1878.     // restore internal encoding 
  1879.     if (isset($this->internal_encoding) AND !empty($this->internal_encoding)) { 
  1880.         mb_internal_encoding($this->internal_encoding); 
  1881.     } 
  1882.     // unset all class variables 
  1883.     $this->_destroy(true); 
  1884. } 
  1885.  
  1886. /** 
  1887.  * Set the units of measure for the document. 
  1888.  * @param $unit (string) User measure unit. Possible values are:<ul><li>pt: point</li><li>mm: millimeter (default)</li><li>cm: centimeter</li><li>in: inch</li></ul><br />A point equals 1/72 of inch, that is to say about 0.35 mm (an inch being 2.54 cm). This is a very common unit in typography; font sizes are expressed in that unit. 
  1889.  * @public 
  1890.  * @since 3.0.015 (2008-06-06) 
  1891.  */ 
  1892. public function setPageUnit($unit) { 
  1893.     $unit = strtolower($unit); 
  1894.     //Set scale factor 
  1895.     switch ($unit) { 
  1896.         // points 
  1897.         case 'px': 
  1898.         case 'pt': { 
  1899.             $this->k = 1; 
  1900.             break; 
  1901.         } 
  1902.         // millimeters 
  1903.         case 'mm': { 
  1904.             $this->k = $this->dpi / 25.4; 
  1905.             break; 
  1906.         } 
  1907.         // centimeters 
  1908.         case 'cm': { 
  1909.             $this->k = $this->dpi / 2.54; 
  1910.             break; 
  1911.         } 
  1912.         // inches 
  1913.         case 'in': { 
  1914.             $this->k = $this->dpi; 
  1915.             break; 
  1916.         } 
  1917.         // unsupported unit 
  1918.         default : { 
  1919.             $this->Error('Incorrect unit: '.$unit); 
  1920.             break; 
  1921.         } 
  1922.     } 
  1923.     $this->pdfunit = $unit; 
  1924.     if (isset($this->CurOrientation)) { 
  1925.         $this->setPageOrientation($this->CurOrientation); 
  1926.     } 
  1927. } 
  1928.  
  1929. /** 
  1930.  * Change the format of the current page 
  1931.  * @param $format (mixed) The format used for pages. It can be either: one of the string values specified at getPageSizeFromFormat() documentation or an array of two numbers (width, height) or an array containing the following measures and options:<ul> 
  1932.  * <li>['format'] = page format name (one of the above);</li> 
  1933.  * <li>['Rotate'] : The number of degrees by which the page shall be rotated clockwise when displayed or printed. The value shall be a multiple of 90.</li> 
  1934.  * <li>['PZ'] : The page's preferred zoom (magnification) factor.</li> 
  1935.  * <li>['MediaBox'] : the boundaries of the physical medium on which the page shall be displayed or printed:</li> 
  1936.  * <li>['MediaBox']['llx'] : lower-left x coordinate</li> 
  1937.  * <li>['MediaBox']['lly'] : lower-left y coordinate</li> 
  1938.  * <li>['MediaBox']['urx'] : upper-right x coordinate</li> 
  1939.  * <li>['MediaBox']['ury'] : upper-right y coordinate</li> 
  1940.  * <li>['CropBox'] : the visible region of default user space:</li> 
  1941.  * <li>['CropBox']['llx'] : lower-left x coordinate</li> 
  1942.  * <li>['CropBox']['lly'] : lower-left y coordinate</li> 
  1943.  * <li>['CropBox']['urx'] : upper-right x coordinate</li> 
  1944.  * <li>['CropBox']['ury'] : upper-right y coordinate</li> 
  1945.  * <li>['BleedBox'] : the region to which the contents of the page shall be clipped when output in a production environment:</li> 
  1946.  * <li>['BleedBox']['llx'] : lower-left x coordinate</li> 
  1947.  * <li>['BleedBox']['lly'] : lower-left y coordinate</li> 
  1948.  * <li>['BleedBox']['urx'] : upper-right x coordinate</li> 
  1949.  * <li>['BleedBox']['ury'] : upper-right y coordinate</li> 
  1950.  * <li>['TrimBox'] : the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming:</li> 
  1951.  * <li>['TrimBox']['llx'] : lower-left x coordinate</li> 
  1952.  * <li>['TrimBox']['lly'] : lower-left y coordinate</li> 
  1953.  * <li>['TrimBox']['urx'] : upper-right x coordinate</li> 
  1954.  * <li>['TrimBox']['ury'] : upper-right y coordinate</li> 
  1955.  * <li>['ArtBox'] : the extent of the page's meaningful content:</li> 
  1956.  * <li>['ArtBox']['llx'] : lower-left x coordinate</li> 
  1957.  * <li>['ArtBox']['lly'] : lower-left y coordinate</li> 
  1958.  * <li>['ArtBox']['urx'] : upper-right x coordinate</li> 
  1959.  * <li>['ArtBox']['ury'] : upper-right y coordinate</li> 
  1960.  * <li>['BoxColorInfo'] :specify the colours and other visual characteristics that should be used in displaying guidelines on the screen for each of the possible page boundaries other than the MediaBox:</li> 
  1961.  * <li>['BoxColorInfo'][BOXTYPE]['C'] : an array of three numbers in the range 0-255, representing the components in the DeviceRGB colour space.</li> 
  1962.  * <li>['BoxColorInfo'][BOXTYPE]['W'] : the guideline width in default user units</li> 
  1963.  * <li>['BoxColorInfo'][BOXTYPE]['S'] : the guideline style: S = Solid; D = Dashed</li> 
  1964.  * <li>['BoxColorInfo'][BOXTYPE]['D'] : dash array defining a pattern of dashes and gaps to be used in drawing dashed guidelines</li> 
  1965.  * <li>['trans'] : the style and duration of the visual transition to use when moving from another page to the given page during a presentation</li> 
  1966.  * <li>['trans']['Dur'] : The page's display duration (also called its advance timing): the maximum length of time, in seconds, that the page shall be displayed during presentations before the viewer application shall automatically advance to the next page.</li> 
  1967.  * <li>['trans']['S'] : transition style : Split, Blinds, Box, Wipe, Dissolve, Glitter, R, Fly, Push, Cover, Uncover, Fade</li> 
  1968.  * <li>['trans']['D'] : The duration of the transition effect, in seconds.</li> 
  1969.  * <li>['trans']['Dm'] : (Split and Blinds transition styles only) The dimension in which the specified transition effect shall occur: H = Horizontal, V = Vertical. Default value: H.</li> 
  1970.  * <li>['trans']['M'] : (Split, Box and Fly transition styles only) The direction of motion for the specified transition effect: I = Inward from the edges of the page, O = Outward from the center of the pageDefault value: I.</li> 
  1971.  * <li>['trans']['Di'] : (Wipe, Glitter, Fly, Cover, Uncover and Push transition styles only) The direction in which the specified transition effect shall moves, expressed in degrees counterclockwise starting from a left-to-right direction. If the value is a number, it shall be one of: 0 = Left to right, 90 = Bottom to top (Wipe only), 180 = Right to left (Wipe only), 270 = Top to bottom, 315 = Top-left to bottom-right (Glitter only). If the value is a name, it shall be None, which is relevant only for the Fly transition when the value of SS is not 1.0. Default value: 0.</li> 
  1972.  * <li>['trans']['SS'] : (Fly transition style only) The starting or ending scale at which the changes shall be drawn. If M specifies an inward transition, the scale of the changes drawn shall progress from SS to 1.0 over the course of the transition. If M specifies an outward transition, the scale of the changes drawn shall progress from 1.0 to SS over the course of the transition. Default: 1.0.</li> 
  1973.  * <li>['trans']['B'] : (Fly transition style only) If true, the area that shall be flown in is rectangular and opaque. Default: false.</li> 
  1974.  * </ul> 
  1975.  * @param $orientation (string) page orientation. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul> 
  1976.  * <li>P or Portrait (default)</li> 
  1977.  * <li>L or Landscape</li> 
  1978.  * <li>'' (empty string) for automatic orientation</li> 
  1979.  * </ul> 
  1980.  * @protected 
  1981.  * @since 3.0.015 (2008-06-06) 
  1982.  * @see getPageSizeFromFormat() 
  1983.  */ 
  1984. protected function setPageFormat($format, $orientation='P') { 
  1985.     if (!empty($format) AND isset($this->pagedim[$this->page])) { 
  1986.         // remove inherited values 
  1987.         unset($this->pagedim[$this->page]); 
  1988.     } 
  1989.     if (is_string($format)) { 
  1990.         // get page measures from format name 
  1991.         $pf = TCPDF_STATIC::getPageSizeFromFormat($format); 
  1992.         $this->fwPt = $pf[0]; 
  1993.         $this->fhPt = $pf[1]; 
  1994.     } else { 
  1995.         // the boundaries of the physical medium on which the page shall be displayed or printed 
  1996.         if (isset($format['MediaBox'])) { 
  1997.             $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'MediaBox', $format['MediaBox']['llx'], $format['MediaBox']['lly'], $format['MediaBox']['urx'], $format['MediaBox']['ury'], false, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  1998.             $this->fwPt = (($format['MediaBox']['urx'] - $format['MediaBox']['llx']) * $this->k); 
  1999.             $this->fhPt = (($format['MediaBox']['ury'] - $format['MediaBox']['lly']) * $this->k); 
  2000.         } else { 
  2001.             if (isset($format[0]) AND is_numeric($format[0]) AND isset($format[1]) AND is_numeric($format[1])) { 
  2002.                 $pf = array(($format[0] * $this->k), ($format[1] * $this->k)); 
  2003.             } else { 
  2004.                 if (!isset($format['format'])) { 
  2005.                     // default value 
  2006.                     $format['format'] = 'A4'; 
  2007.                 } 
  2008.                 $pf = TCPDF_STATIC::getPageSizeFromFormat($format['format']); 
  2009.             } 
  2010.             $this->fwPt = $pf[0]; 
  2011.             $this->fhPt = $pf[1]; 
  2012.             $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'MediaBox', 0, 0, $this->fwPt, $this->fhPt, true, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2013.         } 
  2014.         // the visible region of default user space 
  2015.         if (isset($format['CropBox'])) { 
  2016.             $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'CropBox', $format['CropBox']['llx'], $format['CropBox']['lly'], $format['CropBox']['urx'], $format['CropBox']['ury'], false, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2017.         } 
  2018.         // the region to which the contents of the page shall be clipped when output in a production environment 
  2019.         if (isset($format['BleedBox'])) { 
  2020.             $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'BleedBox', $format['BleedBox']['llx'], $format['BleedBox']['lly'], $format['BleedBox']['urx'], $format['BleedBox']['ury'], false, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2021.         } 
  2022.         // the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming 
  2023.         if (isset($format['TrimBox'])) { 
  2024.             $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'TrimBox', $format['TrimBox']['llx'], $format['TrimBox']['lly'], $format['TrimBox']['urx'], $format['TrimBox']['ury'], false, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2025.         } 
  2026.         // the page's meaningful content (including potential white space) 
  2027.         if (isset($format['ArtBox'])) { 
  2028.             $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'ArtBox', $format['ArtBox']['llx'], $format['ArtBox']['lly'], $format['ArtBox']['urx'], $format['ArtBox']['ury'], false, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2029.         } 
  2030.         // specify the colours and other visual characteristics that should be used in displaying guidelines on the screen for the various page boundaries 
  2031.         if (isset($format['BoxColorInfo'])) { 
  2032.             $this->pagedim[$this->page]['BoxColorInfo'] = $format['BoxColorInfo']; 
  2033.         } 
  2034.         if (isset($format['Rotate']) AND (($format['Rotate'] % 90) == 0)) { 
  2035.             // The number of degrees by which the page shall be rotated clockwise when displayed or printed. The value shall be a multiple of 90. 
  2036.             $this->pagedim[$this->page]['Rotate'] = intval($format['Rotate']); 
  2037.         } 
  2038.         if (isset($format['PZ'])) { 
  2039.             // The page's preferred zoom (magnification) factor 
  2040.             $this->pagedim[$this->page]['PZ'] = floatval($format['PZ']); 
  2041.         } 
  2042.         if (isset($format['trans'])) { 
  2043.             // The style and duration of the visual transition to use when moving from another page to the given page during a presentation 
  2044.             if (isset($format['trans']['Dur'])) { 
  2045.                 // The page's display duration 
  2046.                 $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['Dur'] = floatval($format['trans']['Dur']); 
  2047.             } 
  2048.             $stansition_styles = array('Split', 'Blinds', 'Box', 'Wipe', 'Dissolve', 'Glitter', 'R', 'Fly', 'Push', 'Cover', 'Uncover', 'Fade'); 
  2049.             if (isset($format['trans']['S']) AND in_array($format['trans']['S'], $stansition_styles)) { 
  2050.                 // The transition style that shall be used when moving to this page from another during a presentation 
  2051.                 $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['S'] = $format['trans']['S']; 
  2052.                 $valid_effect = array('Split', 'Blinds'); 
  2053.                 $valid_vals = array('H', 'V'); 
  2054.                 if (isset($format['trans']['Dm']) AND in_array($format['trans']['S'], $valid_effect) AND in_array($format['trans']['Dm'], $valid_vals)) { 
  2055.                     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['Dm'] = $format['trans']['Dm']; 
  2056.                 } 
  2057.                 $valid_effect = array('Split', 'Box', 'Fly'); 
  2058.                 $valid_vals = array('I', 'O'); 
  2059.                 if (isset($format['trans']['M']) AND in_array($format['trans']['S'], $valid_effect) AND in_array($format['trans']['M'], $valid_vals)) { 
  2060.                     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['M'] = $format['trans']['M']; 
  2061.                 } 
  2062.                 $valid_effect = array('Wipe', 'Glitter', 'Fly', 'Cover', 'Uncover', 'Push'); 
  2063.                 if (isset($format['trans']['Di']) AND in_array($format['trans']['S'], $valid_effect)) { 
  2064.                     if (((($format['trans']['Di'] == 90) OR ($format['trans']['Di'] == 180)) AND ($format['trans']['S'] == 'Wipe')) 
  2065.                         OR (($format['trans']['Di'] == 315) AND ($format['trans']['S'] == 'Glitter')) 
  2066.                         OR (($format['trans']['Di'] == 0) OR ($format['trans']['Di'] == 270))) { 
  2067.                         $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['Di'] = intval($format['trans']['Di']); 
  2068.                     } 
  2069.                 } 
  2070.                 if (isset($format['trans']['SS']) AND ($format['trans']['S'] == 'Fly')) { 
  2071.                     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['SS'] = floatval($format['trans']['SS']); 
  2072.                 } 
  2073.                 if (isset($format['trans']['B']) AND ($format['trans']['B'] === true) AND ($format['trans']['S'] == 'Fly')) { 
  2074.                     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['B'] = 'true'; 
  2075.                 } 
  2076.             } else { 
  2077.                 $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['S'] = 'R'; 
  2078.             } 
  2079.             if (isset($format['trans']['D'])) { 
  2080.                 // The duration of the transition effect, in seconds 
  2081.                 $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['D'] = floatval($format['trans']['D']); 
  2082.             } else { 
  2083.                 $this->pagedim[$this->page]['trans']['D'] = 1; 
  2084.             } 
  2085.         } 
  2086.     } 
  2087.     $this->setPageOrientation($orientation); 
  2088. } 
  2089.  
  2090. /** 
  2091.  * Set page orientation. 
  2092.  * @param $orientation (string) page orientation. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>P or Portrait (default)</li><li>L or Landscape</li><li>'' (empty string) for automatic orientation</li></ul> 
  2093.  * @param $autopagebreak (boolean) Boolean indicating if auto-page-break mode should be on or off. 
  2094.  * @param $bottommargin (float) bottom margin of the page. 
  2095.  * @public 
  2096.  * @since 3.0.015 (2008-06-06) 
  2097.  */ 
  2098. public function setPageOrientation($orientation, $autopagebreak='', $bottommargin='') { 
  2099.     if (!isset($this->pagedim[$this->page]['MediaBox'])) { 
  2100.         // the boundaries of the physical medium on which the page shall be displayed or printed 
  2101.         $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'MediaBox', 0, 0, $this->fwPt, $this->fhPt, true, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2102.     } 
  2103.     if (!isset($this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox'])) { 
  2104.         // the visible region of default user space 
  2105.         $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'CropBox', $this->pagedim[$this->page]['MediaBox']['llx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['MediaBox']['lly'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['MediaBox']['urx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['MediaBox']['ury'], true, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2106.     } 
  2107.     if (!isset($this->pagedim[$this->page]['BleedBox'])) { 
  2108.         // the region to which the contents of the page shall be clipped when output in a production environment 
  2109.         $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'BleedBox', $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['llx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['lly'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['urx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['ury'], true, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2110.     } 
  2111.     if (!isset($this->pagedim[$this->page]['TrimBox'])) { 
  2112.         // the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming 
  2113.         $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'TrimBox', $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['llx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['lly'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['urx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['ury'], true, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2114.     } 
  2115.     if (!isset($this->pagedim[$this->page]['ArtBox'])) { 
  2116.         // the page's meaningful content (including potential white space) 
  2117.         $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::setPageBoxes($this->page, 'ArtBox', $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['llx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['lly'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['urx'], $this->pagedim[$this->page]['CropBox']['ury'], true, $this->k, $this->pagedim); 
  2118.     } 
  2119.     if (!isset($this->pagedim[$this->page]['Rotate'])) { 
  2120.         // The number of degrees by which the page shall be rotated clockwise when displayed or printed. The value shall be a multiple of 90. 
  2121.         $this->pagedim[$this->page]['Rotate'] = 0; 
  2122.     } 
  2123.     if (!isset($this->pagedim[$this->page]['PZ'])) { 
  2124.         // The page's preferred zoom (magnification) factor 
  2125.         $this->pagedim[$this->page]['PZ'] = 1; 
  2126.     } 
  2127.     if ($this->fwPt > $this->fhPt) { 
  2128.         // landscape 
  2129.         $default_orientation = 'L'; 
  2130.     } else { 
  2131.         // portrait 
  2132.         $default_orientation = 'P'; 
  2133.     } 
  2134.     $valid_orientations = array('P', 'L'); 
  2135.     if (empty($orientation)) { 
  2136.         $orientation = $default_orientation; 
  2137.     } else { 
  2138.         $orientation = strtoupper($orientation[0]); 
  2139.     } 
  2140.     if (in_array($orientation, $valid_orientations) AND ($orientation != $default_orientation)) { 
  2141.         $this->CurOrientation = $orientation; 
  2142.         $this->wPt = $this->fhPt; 
  2143.         $this->hPt = $this->fwPt; 
  2144.     } else { 
  2145.         $this->CurOrientation = $default_orientation; 
  2146.         $this->wPt = $this->fwPt; 
  2147.         $this->hPt = $this->fhPt; 
  2148.     } 
  2149.     if ((abs($this->pagedim[$this->page]['MediaBox']['urx'] - $this->hPt) < $this->feps) AND (abs($this->pagedim[$this->page]['MediaBox']['ury'] - $this->wPt) < $this->feps)) { 
  2150.         // swap X and Y coordinates (change page orientation) 
  2151.         $this->pagedim = TCPDF_STATIC::swapPageBoxCoordinates($this->page, $this->pagedim); 
  2152.     } 
  2153.     $this->w = ($this->wPt / $this->k); 
  2154.     $this->h = ($this->hPt / $this->k); 
  2155.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($autopagebreak)) { 
  2156.         if (isset($this->AutoPageBreak)) { 
  2157.             $autopagebreak = $this->AutoPageBreak; 
  2158.         } else { 
  2159.             $autopagebreak = true; 
  2160.         } 
  2161.     } 
  2162.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($bottommargin)) { 
  2163.         if (isset($this->bMargin)) { 
  2164.             $bottommargin = $this->bMargin; 
  2165.         } else { 
  2166.             // default value = 2 cm 
  2167.             $bottommargin = 2 * 28.35 / $this->k; 
  2168.         } 
  2169.     } 
  2170.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak($autopagebreak, $bottommargin); 
  2171.     // store page dimensions 
  2172.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['w'] = $this->wPt; 
  2173.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['h'] = $this->hPt; 
  2174.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['wk'] = $this->w; 
  2175.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['hk'] = $this->h; 
  2176.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['tm'] = $this->tMargin; 
  2177.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['bm'] = $bottommargin; 
  2178.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['lm'] = $this->lMargin; 
  2179.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['rm'] = $this->rMargin; 
  2180.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['pb'] = $autopagebreak; 
  2181.     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['or'] = $this->CurOrientation;
