  3875.  * @return (string) The PDF command. 
  3876.  * @public 
  3877.  * @since 1.3 
  3878.  * @see SetFillColorArray(), SetDrawColor(), SetTextColor(), Rect(), Cell(), MultiCell() 
  3879.  */ 
  3880. public function SetFillColor($col1=0, $col2=-1, $col3=-1, $col4=-1, $ret=false, $name='') { 
  3881.     return $this->setColor('fill', $col1, $col2, $col3, $col4, $ret, $name); 
  3882. } 
  3883.  
  3884. /** 
  3885.  * Defines the color used for text. It can be expressed in RGB components or gray scale. The method can be called before the first page is created and the value is retained from page to page. 
  3886.  * @param $col1 (float) GRAY level for single color, or Red color for RGB (0-255), or CYAN color for CMYK (0-100). 
  3887.  * @param $col2 (float) GREEN color for RGB (0-255), or MAGENTA color for CMYK (0-100). 
  3888.  * @param $col3 (float) BLUE color for RGB (0-255), or YELLOW color for CMYK (0-100). 
  3889.  * @param $col4 (float) KEY (BLACK) color for CMYK (0-100). 
  3890.  * @param $ret (boolean) If true do not send the command. 
  3891.  * @param $name (string) Spot color name (if any). 
  3892.  * @return (string) Empty string. 
  3893.  * @public 
  3894.  * @since 1.3 
  3895.  * @see SetTextColorArray(), SetDrawColor(), SetFillColor(), Text(), Cell(), MultiCell() 
  3896.  */ 
  3897. public function SetTextColor($col1=0, $col2=-1, $col3=-1, $col4=-1, $ret=false, $name='') { 
  3898.     return $this->setColor('text', $col1, $col2, $col3, $col4, $ret, $name); 
  3899. } 
  3900.  
  3901. /** 
  3902.  * Returns the length of a string in user unit. A font must be selected.<br> 
  3903.  * @param $s (string) The string whose length is to be computed 
  3904.  * @param $fontname (string) Family font. It can be either a name defined by AddFont() or one of the standard families. It is also possible to pass an empty string, in that case, the current family is retained. 
  3905.  * @param $fontstyle (string) Font style. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>empty string: regular</li><li>B: bold</li><li>I: italic</li><li>U: underline</li><li>D: line-through</li><li>O: overline</li></ul> or any combination. The default value is regular. 
  3906.  * @param $fontsize (float) Font size in points. The default value is the current size. 
  3907.  * @param $getarray (boolean) if true returns an array of characters widths, if false returns the total length. 
  3908.  * @return mixed int total string length or array of characted widths 
  3909.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  3910.  * @public 
  3911.  * @since 1.2 
  3912.  */ 
  3913. public function GetStringWidth($s, $fontname='', $fontstyle='', $fontsize=0, $getarray=false) { 
  3914.     return $this->GetArrStringWidth(TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($s, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont), $s, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont), $fontname, $fontstyle, $fontsize, $getarray); 
  3915. } 
  3916.  
  3917. /** 
  3918.  * Returns the string length of an array of chars in user unit or an array of characters widths. A font must be selected.<br> 
  3919.  * @param $sa (string) The array of chars whose total length is to be computed 
  3920.  * @param $fontname (string) Family font. It can be either a name defined by AddFont() or one of the standard families. It is also possible to pass an empty string, in that case, the current family is retained. 
  3921.  * @param $fontstyle (string) Font style. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>empty string: regular</li><li>B: bold</li><li>I: italic</li><li>U: underline</li><li>D: line through</li><li>O: overline</li></ul> or any combination. The default value is regular. 
  3922.  * @param $fontsize (float) Font size in points. The default value is the current size. 
  3923.  * @param $getarray (boolean) if true returns an array of characters widths, if false returns the total length. 
  3924.  * @return mixed int total string length or array of characted widths 
  3925.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  3926.  * @public 
  3927.  * @since 2.3.000 (2008-03-06) 
  3928.  */ 
  3929. public function GetArrStringWidth($sa, $fontname='', $fontstyle='', $fontsize=0, $getarray=false) { 
  3930.     // store current values 
  3931.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontname)) { 
  3932.         $prev_FontFamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  3933.         $prev_FontStyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  3934.         $prev_FontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  3935.         $this->SetFont($fontname, $fontstyle, $fontsize, '', 'default', false); 
  3936.     } 
  3937.     // convert UTF-8 array to Latin1 if required 
  3938.     if ($this->isunicode AND (!$this->isUnicodeFont())) { 
  3939.         $sa = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrToLatin1Arr($sa); 
  3940.     } 
  3941.     $w = 0; // total width 
  3942.     $wa = array(); // array of characters widths 
  3943.     foreach ($sa as $ck => $char) { 
  3944.         // character width 
  3945.         $cw = $this->GetCharWidth($char, isset($sa[($ck + 1)])); 
  3946.         $wa[] = $cw; 
  3947.         $w += $cw; 
  3948.     } 
  3949.     // restore previous values 
  3950.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontname)) { 
  3951.         $this->SetFont($prev_FontFamily, $prev_FontStyle, $prev_FontSizePt, '', 'default', false); 
  3952.     } 
  3953.     if ($getarray) { 
  3954.         return $wa; 
  3955.     } 
  3956.     return $w; 
  3957. } 
  3958.  
  3959. /** 
  3960.  * Returns the length of the char in user unit for the current font considering current stretching and spacing (tracking). 
  3961.  * @param $char (int) The char code whose length is to be returned 
  3962.  * @param $notlast (boolean) If false ignore the font-spacing. 
  3963.  * @return float char width 
  3964.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  3965.  * @public 
  3966.  * @since 2.3.000 (2008-03-06) 
  3967.  */ 
  3968. public function GetCharWidth($char, $notlast=true) { 
  3969.     // get raw width 
  3970.     $chw = $this->getRawCharWidth($char); 
  3971.     if (($this->font_spacing < 0) OR (($this->font_spacing > 0) AND $notlast)) { 
  3972.         // increase/decrease font spacing 
  3973.         $chw += $this->font_spacing; 
  3974.     } 
  3975.     if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  3976.         // fixed stretching mode 
  3977.         $chw *= ($this->font_stretching / 100); 
  3978.     } 
  3979.     return $chw; 
  3980. } 
  3981.  
  3982. /** 
  3983.  * Returns the length of the char in user unit for the current font. 
  3984.  * @param $char (int) The char code whose length is to be returned 
  3985.  * @return float char width 
  3986.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  3987.  * @public 
  3988.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-28) 
  3989.  */ 
  3990. public function getRawCharWidth($char) { 
  3991.     if ($char == 173) { 
  3992.         // SHY character will not be printed 
  3993.         return (0); 
  3994.     } 
  3995.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][$char])) { 
  3996.         $w = $this->CurrentFont['cw'][$char]; 
  3997.     } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['dw'])) { 
  3998.         // default width 
  3999.         $w = $this->CurrentFont['dw']; 
  4000.     } elseif (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][32])) { 
  4001.         // default width 
  4002.         $w = $this->CurrentFont['cw'][32]; 
  4003.     } else { 
  4004.         $w = 600; 
  4005.     } 
  4006.     return $this->getAbsFontMeasure($w); 
  4007. } 
  4008.  
  4009. /** 
  4010.  * Returns the numbero of characters in a string. 
  4011.  * @param $s (string) The input string. 
  4012.  * @return int number of characters 
  4013.  * @public 
  4014.  * @since 2.0.0001 (2008-01-07) 
  4015.  */ 
  4016. public function GetNumChars($s) { 
  4017.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  4018.         return count(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($s, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  4019.     } 
  4020.     return strlen($s); 
  4021. } 
  4022.  
  4023. /** 
  4024.  * Fill the list of available fonts ($this->fontlist). 
  4025.  * @protected 
  4026.  * @since 3.0.013 (2008-07-28) 
  4027.  */ 
  4028. protected function getFontsList() { 
  4029.     if (($fontsdir = opendir(TCPDF_FONTS::_getfontpath())) !== false) { 
  4030.         while (($file = readdir($fontsdir)) !== false) { 
  4031.             if (substr($file, -4) == '.php') { 
  4032.                 array_push($this->fontlist, strtolower(basename($file, '.php'))); 
  4033.             } 
  4034.         } 
  4035.         closedir($fontsdir); 
  4036.     } 
  4037. } 
  4038.  
  4039. /** 
  4040.  * Returns the unicode caracter specified by the value 
  4041.  * @param $c (int) UTF-8 value 
  4042.  * @return Returns the specified character. 
  4043.  * @since 2.3.000 (2008-03-05) 
  4044.  * @public 
  4045.  * @deprecated 
  4046.  */ 
  4047. public function unichr($c) { 
  4048.     return TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($c, $this->isunicode); 
  4049. } 
  4050.  
  4051. /** 
  4052.  * Convert and add the selected TrueType or Type1 font to the fonts folder (that must be writeable). 
  4053.  * @param $fontfile (string) Font file (full path). 
  4054.  * @param $fonttype (string) Font type. Leave empty for autodetect mode. Valid values are: TrueTypeUnicode, TrueType, Type1, CID0JP = CID-0 Japanese, CID0KR = CID-0 Korean, CID0CS = CID-0 Chinese Simplified, CID0CT = CID-0 Chinese Traditional. 
  4055.  * @param $enc (string) Name of the encoding table to use. Leave empty for default mode. Omit this parameter for TrueType Unicode and symbolic fonts like Symbol or ZapfDingBats. 
  4056.  * @param $flags (int) Unsigned 32-bit integer containing flags specifying various characteristics of the font (PDF32000:2008 - 9.8.2 Font Descriptor Flags): +1 for fixed font; +4 for symbol or +32 for non-symbol; +64 for italic. Fixed and Italic mode are generally autodetected so you have to set it to 32 = non-symbolic font (default) or 4 = symbolic font. 
  4057.  * @param $outpath (string) Output path for generated font files (must be writeable by the web server). Leave empty for default font folder. 
  4058.  * @param $platid (int) Platform ID for CMAP table to extract (when building a Unicode font for Windows this value should be 3, for Macintosh should be 1). 
  4059.  * @param $encid (int) Encoding ID for CMAP table to extract (when building a Unicode font for Windows this value should be 1, for Macintosh should be 0). When Platform ID is 3, legal values for Encoding ID are: 0=Symbol, 1=Unicode, 2=ShiftJIS, 3=PRC, 4=Big5, 5=Wansung, 6=Johab, 7=Reserved, 8=Reserved, 9=Reserved, 10=UCS-4. 
  4060.  * @param $addcbbox (boolean) If true includes the character bounding box information on the php font file. 
  4061.  * @return (string) TCPDF font name. 
  4062.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  4063.  * @since 5.9.123 (2010-09-30) 
  4064.  * @public 
  4065.  * @deprecated 
  4066.  */ 
  4067. public function addTTFfont($fontfile, $fonttype='', $enc='', $flags=32, $outpath='', $platid=3, $encid=1, $addcbbox=false) { 
  4068.     return TCPDF_FONTS::addTTFfont($fontfile, $fonttype, $enc, $flags, $outpath, $platid, $encid, $addcbbox); 
  4069. } 
  4070.  
  4071. /** 
  4072.  * Imports a TrueType, Type1, core, or CID0 font and makes it available. 
  4073.  * It is necessary to generate a font definition file first (read /fonts/utils/README.TXT). 
  4074.  * The definition file (and the font file itself when embedding) must be present either in the current directory or in the one indicated by K_PATH_FONTS if the constant is defined. If it could not be found, the error "Could not include font definition file" is generated. 
  4075.  * @param $family (string) Font family. The name can be chosen arbitrarily. If it is a standard family name, it will override the corresponding font. 
  4076.  * @param $style (string) Font style. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>empty string: regular (default)</li><li>B: bold</li><li>I: italic</li><li>BI or IB: bold italic</li></ul> 
  4077.  * @param $fontfile (string) The font definition file. By default, the name is built from the family and style, in lower case with no spaces. 
  4078.  * @return array containing the font data, or false in case of error. 
  4079.  * @param $subset (mixed) if true embedd only a subset of the font (stores only the information related to the used characters); if false embedd full font; if 'default' uses the default value set using setFontSubsetting(). This option is valid only for TrueTypeUnicode fonts. If you want to enable users to change the document, set this parameter to false. If you subset the font, the person who receives your PDF would need to have your same font in order to make changes to your PDF. The file size of the PDF would also be smaller because you are embedding only part of a font. 
  4080.  * @public 
  4081.  * @since 1.5 
  4082.  * @see SetFont(), setFontSubsetting() 
  4083.  */ 
  4084. public function AddFont($family, $style='', $fontfile='', $subset='default') { 
  4085.     if ($subset === 'default') { 
  4086.         $subset = $this->font_subsetting; 
  4087.     } 
  4088.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  4089.         $subset = false; 
  4090.     } 
  4091.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($family)) { 
  4092.         if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->FontFamily)) { 
  4093.             $family = $this->FontFamily; 
  4094.         } else { 
  4095.             $this->Error('Empty font family'); 
  4096.         } 
  4097.     } 
  4098.     // move embedded styles on $style 
  4099.     if (substr($family, -1) == 'I') { 
  4100.         $style .= 'I'; 
  4101.         $family = substr($family, 0, -1); 
  4102.     } 
  4103.     if (substr($family, -1) == 'B') { 
  4104.         $style .= 'B'; 
  4105.         $family = substr($family, 0, -1); 
  4106.     } 
  4107.     // normalize family name 
  4108.     $family = strtolower($family); 
  4109.     if ((!$this->isunicode) AND ($family == 'arial')) { 
  4110.         $family = 'helvetica'; 
  4111.     } 
  4112.     if (($family == 'symbol') OR ($family == 'zapfdingbats')) { 
  4113.         $style = ''; 
  4114.     } 
  4115.     if ($this->pdfa_mode AND (isset($this->CoreFonts[$family]))) { 
  4116.         // all fonts must be embedded 
  4117.         $family = 'pdfa'.$family; 
  4118.     } 
  4119.     $tempstyle = strtoupper($style); 
  4120.     $style = ''; 
  4121.     // underline 
  4122.     if (strpos($tempstyle, 'U') !== false) { 
  4123.         $this->underline = true; 
  4124.     } else { 
  4125.         $this->underline = false; 
  4126.     } 
  4127.     // line-through (deleted) 
  4128.     if (strpos($tempstyle, 'D') !== false) { 
  4129.         $this->linethrough = true; 
  4130.     } else { 
  4131.         $this->linethrough = false; 
  4132.     } 
  4133.     // overline 
  4134.     if (strpos($tempstyle, 'O') !== false) { 
  4135.         $this->overline = true; 
  4136.     } else { 
  4137.         $this->overline = false; 
  4138.     } 
  4139.     // bold 
  4140.     if (strpos($tempstyle, 'B') !== false) { 
  4141.         $style .= 'B'; 
  4142.     } 
  4143.     // oblique 
  4144.     if (strpos($tempstyle, 'I') !== false) { 
  4145.         $style .= 'I'; 
  4146.     } 
  4147.     $bistyle = $style; 
  4148.     $fontkey = $family.$style; 
  4149.     $font_style = $style.($this->underline ? 'U' : '').($this->linethrough ? 'D' : '').($this->overline ? 'O' : ''); 
  4150.     $fontdata = array('fontkey' => $fontkey, 'family' => $family, 'style' => $font_style); 
  4151.     // check if the font has been already added 
  4152.     $fb = $this->getFontBuffer($fontkey); 
  4153.     if ($fb !== false) { 
  4154.         if ($this->inxobj) { 
  4155.             // we are inside an XObject template 
  4156.             $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['fonts'][$fontkey] = $fb['i']; 
  4157.         } 
  4158.         return $fontdata; 
  4159.     } 
  4160.     // get specified font directory (if any) 
  4161.     $fontdir = false; 
  4162.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontfile)) { 
  4163.         $fontdir = dirname($fontfile); 
  4164.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontdir) OR ($fontdir == '.')) { 
  4165.             $fontdir = ''; 
  4166.         } else { 
  4167.             $fontdir .= '/'; 
  4168.         } 
  4169.     } 
  4170.     // true when the font style variation is missing 
  4171.     $missing_style = false; 
  4172.     // search and include font file 
  4173.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontfile) OR (!@file_exists($fontfile))) { 
  4174.         // build a standard filenames for specified font 
  4175.         $tmp_fontfile = str_replace(' ', '', $family).strtolower($style).'.php'; 
  4176.         $fontfile = TCPDF_FONTS::getFontFullPath($tmp_fontfile, $fontdir); 
  4177.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontfile)) { 
  4178.             $missing_style = true; 
  4179.             // try to remove the style part 
  4180.             $tmp_fontfile = str_replace(' ', '', $family).'.php'; 
  4181.             $fontfile = TCPDF_FONTS::getFontFullPath($tmp_fontfile, $fontdir); 
  4182.         } 
  4183.     } 
  4184.     // include font file 
  4185.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($fontfile) AND (@file_exists($fontfile))) { 
  4186.         include($fontfile); 
  4187.     } else { 
  4188.         $this->Error('Could not include font definition file: '.$family.''); 
  4189.     } 
  4190.     // check font parameters 
  4191.     if ((!isset($type)) OR (!isset($cw))) { 
  4192.         $this->Error('The font definition file has a bad format: '.$fontfile.''); 
  4193.     } 
  4194.     // SET default parameters 
  4195.     if (!isset($file) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($file)) { 
  4196.         $file = ''; 
  4197.     } 
  4198.     if (!isset($enc) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($enc)) { 
  4199.         $enc = ''; 
  4200.     } 
  4201.     if (!isset($cidinfo) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($cidinfo)) { 
  4202.         $cidinfo = array('Registry'=>'Adobe', 'Ordering'=>'Identity', 'Supplement'=>0); 
  4203.         $cidinfo['uni2cid'] = array(); 
  4204.     } 
  4205.     if (!isset($ctg) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($ctg)) { 
  4206.         $ctg = ''; 
  4207.     } 
  4208.     if (!isset($desc) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($desc)) { 
  4209.         $desc = array(); 
  4210.     } 
  4211.     if (!isset($up) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($up)) { 
  4212.         $up = -100; 
  4213.     } 
  4214.     if (!isset($ut) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($ut)) { 
  4215.         $ut = 50; 
  4216.     } 
  4217.     if (!isset($cw) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($cw)) { 
  4218.         $cw = array(); 
  4219.     } 
  4220.     if (!isset($dw) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dw)) { 
  4221.         // set default width 
  4222.         if (isset($desc['MissingWidth']) AND ($desc['MissingWidth'] > 0)) { 
  4223.             $dw = $desc['MissingWidth']; 
  4224.         } elseif (isset($cw[32])) { 
  4225.             $dw = $cw[32]; 
  4226.         } else { 
  4227.             $dw = 600; 
  4228.         } 
  4229.     } 
  4230.     ++$this->numfonts; 
  4231.     if ($type == 'core') { 
  4232.         $name = $this->CoreFonts[$fontkey]; 
  4233.         $subset = false; 
  4234.     } elseif (($type == 'TrueType') OR ($type == 'Type1')) { 
  4235.         $subset = false; 
  4236.     } elseif ($type == 'TrueTypeUnicode') { 
  4237.         $enc = 'Identity-H'; 
  4238.     } elseif ($type == 'cidfont0') { 
  4239.         if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  4240.             $this->Error('All fonts must be embedded in PDF/A mode!'); 
  4241.         } 
  4242.     } else { 
  4243.         $this->Error('Unknow font type: '.$type.''); 
  4244.     } 
  4245.     // set name if unset 
  4246.     if (!isset($name) OR empty($name)) { 
  4247.         $name = $fontkey; 
  4248.     } 
  4249.     // create artificial font style variations if missing (only works with non-embedded fonts) 
  4250.     if (($type != 'core') AND $missing_style) { 
  4251.         // style variations 
  4252.         $styles = array('' => '', 'B' => ', Bold', 'I' => ', Italic', 'BI' => ', BoldItalic'); 
  4253.         $name .= $styles[$bistyle]; 
  4254.         // artificial bold 
  4255.         if (strpos($bistyle, 'B') !== false) { 
  4256.             if (isset($desc['StemV'])) { 
  4257.                 // from normal to bold 
  4258.                 $desc['StemV'] = round($desc['StemV'] * 1.75); 
  4259.             } else { 
  4260.                 // bold 
  4261.                 $desc['StemV'] = 123; 
  4262.             } 
  4263.         } 
  4264.         // artificial italic 
  4265.         if (strpos($bistyle, 'I') !== false) { 
  4266.             if (isset($desc['ItalicAngle'])) { 
  4267.                 $desc['ItalicAngle'] -= 11; 
  4268.             } else { 
  4269.                 $desc['ItalicAngle'] = -11; 
  4270.             } 
  4271.             if (isset($desc['Flags'])) { 
  4272.                 $desc['Flags'] |= 64; //bit 7 
  4273.             } else { 
  4274.                 $desc['Flags'] = 64; 
  4275.             } 
  4276.         } 
  4277.     } 
  4278.     // check if the array of characters bounding boxes is defined 
  4279.     if (!isset($cbbox)) { 
  4280.         $cbbox = array(); 
  4281.     } 
  4282.     // initialize subsetchars 
  4283.     $subsetchars = array_fill(0, 255, true); 
  4284.     $this->setFontBuffer($fontkey, array('fontkey' => $fontkey, 'i' => $this->numfonts, 'type' => $type, 'name' => $name, 'desc' => $desc, 'up' => $up, 'ut' => $ut, 'cw' => $cw, 'cbbox' => $cbbox, 'dw' => $dw, 'enc' => $enc, 'cidinfo' => $cidinfo, 'file' => $file, 'ctg' => $ctg, 'subset' => $subset, 'subsetchars' => $subsetchars)); 
  4285.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  4286.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  4287.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['fonts'][$fontkey] = $this->numfonts; 
  4288.     } 
  4289.     if (isset($diff) AND (!empty($diff))) { 
  4290.         //Search existing encodings 
  4291.         $d = 0; 
  4292.         $nb = count($this->diffs); 
  4293.         for ($i=1; $i <= $nb; ++$i) { 
  4294.             if ($this->diffs[$i] == $diff) { 
  4295.                 $d = $i; 
  4296.                 break; 
  4297.             } 
  4298.         } 
  4299.         if ($d == 0) { 
  4300.             $d = $nb + 1; 
  4301.             $this->diffs[$d] = $diff; 
  4302.         } 
  4303.         $this->setFontSubBuffer($fontkey, 'diff', $d); 
  4304.     } 
  4305.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($file)) { 
  4306.         if (!isset($this->FontFiles[$file])) { 
  4307.             if ((strcasecmp($type, 'TrueType') == 0) OR (strcasecmp($type, 'TrueTypeUnicode') == 0)) { 
  4308.                 $this->FontFiles[$file] = array('length1' => $originalsize, 'fontdir' => $fontdir, 'subset' => $subset, 'fontkeys' => array($fontkey)); 
  4309.             } elseif ($type != 'core') { 
  4310.                 $this->FontFiles[$file] = array('length1' => $size1, 'length2' => $size2, 'fontdir' => $fontdir, 'subset' => $subset, 'fontkeys' => array($fontkey)); 
  4311.             } 
  4312.         } else { 
  4313.             // update fontkeys that are sharing this font file 
  4314.             $this->FontFiles[$file]['subset'] = ($this->FontFiles[$file]['subset'] AND $subset); 
  4315.             if (!in_array($fontkey, $this->FontFiles[$file]['fontkeys'])) { 
  4316.                 $this->FontFiles[$file]['fontkeys'][] = $fontkey; 
  4317.             } 
  4318.         } 
  4319.     } 
  4320.     return $fontdata; 
  4321. } 
  4322.  
  4323. /** 
  4324.  * Sets the font used to print character strings. 
  4325.  * The font can be either a standard one or a font added via the AddFont() method. Standard fonts use Windows encoding cp1252 (Western Europe). 
  4326.  * The method can be called before the first page is created and the font is retained from page to page. 
  4327.  * If you just wish to change the current font size, it is simpler to call SetFontSize(). 
  4328.  * Note: for the standard fonts, the font metric files must be accessible. There are three possibilities for this:<ul><li>They are in the current directory (the one where the running script lies)</li><li>They are in one of the directories defined by the include_path parameter</li><li>They are in the directory defined by the K_PATH_FONTS constant</li></ul><br /> 
  4329.  * @param $family (string) Family font. It can be either a name defined by AddFont() or one of the standard Type1 families (case insensitive):<ul><li>times (Times-Roman)</li><li>timesb (Times-Bold)</li><li>timesi (Times-Italic)</li><li>timesbi (Times-BoldItalic)</li><li>helvetica (Helvetica)</li><li>helveticab (Helvetica-Bold)</li><li>helveticai (Helvetica-Oblique)</li><li>helveticabi (Helvetica-BoldOblique)</li><li>courier (Courier)</li><li>courierb (Courier-Bold)</li><li>courieri (Courier-Oblique)</li><li>courierbi (Courier-BoldOblique)</li><li>symbol (Symbol)</li><li>zapfdingbats (ZapfDingbats)</li></ul> It is also possible to pass an empty string. In that case, the current family is retained. 
  4330.  * @param $style (string) Font style. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>empty string: regular</li><li>B: bold</li><li>I: italic</li><li>U: underline</li><li>D: line through</li><li>O: overline</li></ul> or any combination. The default value is regular. Bold and italic styles do not apply to Symbol and ZapfDingbats basic fonts or other fonts when not defined. 
  4331.  * @param $size (float) Font size in points. The default value is the current size. If no size has been specified since the beginning of the document, the value taken is 12 
  4332.  * @param $fontfile (string) The font definition file. By default, the name is built from the family and style, in lower case with no spaces. 
  4333.  * @param $subset (mixed) if true embedd only a subset of the font (stores only the information related to the used characters); if false embedd full font; if 'default' uses the default value set using setFontSubsetting(). This option is valid only for TrueTypeUnicode fonts. If you want to enable users to change the document, set this parameter to false. If you subset the font, the person who receives your PDF would need to have your same font in order to make changes to your PDF. The file size of the PDF would also be smaller because you are embedding only part of a font. 
  4334.  * @param $out (boolean) if true output the font size command, otherwise only set the font properties. 
  4335.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  4336.  * @public 
  4337.  * @since 1.0 
  4338.  * @see AddFont(), SetFontSize() 
  4339.  */ 
  4340. public function SetFont($family, $style='', $size=null, $fontfile='', $subset='default', $out=true) { 
  4341.     //Select a font; size given in points 
  4342.     if ($size === null) { 
  4343.         $size = $this->FontSizePt; 
  4344.     } 
  4345.     if ($size < 0) { 
  4346.         $size = 0; 
  4347.     } 
  4348.     // try to add font (if not already added) 
  4349.     $fontdata = $this->AddFont($family, $style, $fontfile, $subset); 
  4350.     $this->FontFamily = $fontdata['family']; 
  4351.     $this->FontStyle = $fontdata['style']; 
  4352.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['fontkey']) AND isset($this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'])) { 
  4353.         // save subset chars of the previous font 
  4354.         $this->setFontSubBuffer($this->CurrentFont['fontkey'], 'subsetchars', $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars']); 
  4355.     } 
  4356.     $this->CurrentFont = $this->getFontBuffer($fontdata['fontkey']); 
  4357.     $this->SetFontSize($size, $out); 
  4358. } 
  4359.  
  4360. /** 
  4361.  * Defines the size of the current font. 
  4362.  * @param $size (float) The font size in points. 
  4363.  * @param $out (boolean) if true output the font size command, otherwise only set the font properties. 
  4364.  * @public 
  4365.  * @since 1.0 
  4366.  * @see SetFont() 
  4367.  */ 
  4368. public function SetFontSize($size, $out=true) { 
  4369.     // font size in points 
  4370.     $this->FontSizePt = $size; 
  4371.     // font size in user units 
  4372.     $this->FontSize = $size / $this->k; 
  4373.     // calculate some font metrics 
  4374.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['FontBBox'])) { 
  4375.         $bbox = explode(' ', substr($this->CurrentFont['desc']['FontBBox'], 1, -1)); 
  4376.         $font_height = ((intval($bbox[3]) - intval($bbox[1])) * $size / 1000); 
  4377.     } else { 
  4378.         $font_height = $size * 1.219; 
  4379.     } 
  4380.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['Ascent']) AND ($this->CurrentFont['desc']['Ascent'] > 0)) { 
  4381.         $font_ascent = ($this->CurrentFont['desc']['Ascent'] * $size / 1000); 
  4382.     } 
  4383.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['Descent']) AND ($this->CurrentFont['desc']['Descent'] <= 0)) { 
  4384.         $font_descent = (- $this->CurrentFont['desc']['Descent'] * $size / 1000); 
  4385.     } 
  4386.     if (!isset($font_ascent) AND !isset($font_descent)) { 
  4387.         // core font 
  4388.         $font_ascent = 0.76 * $font_height; 
  4389.         $font_descent = $font_height - $font_ascent; 
  4390.     } elseif (!isset($font_descent)) { 
  4391.         $font_descent = $font_height - $font_ascent; 
  4392.     } elseif (!isset($font_ascent)) { 
  4393.         $font_ascent = $font_height - $font_descent; 
  4394.     } 
  4395.     $this->FontAscent = ($font_ascent / $this->k); 
  4396.     $this->FontDescent = ($font_descent / $this->k); 
  4397.     if ($out AND ($this->page > 0) AND (isset($this->CurrentFont['i'])) AND ($this->state == 2)) { 
  4398.         $this->_out(sprintf('BT /F%d %F Tf ET', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt)); 
  4399.     } 
  4400. } 
  4401.  
  4402. /** 
  4403.  * Returns the bounding box of the current font in user units. 
  4404.  * @return array 
  4405.  * @public 
  4406.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  4407.  */ 
  4408. public function getFontBBox() { 
  4409.     $fbbox = array(); 
  4410.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['FontBBox'])) { 
  4411.         $tmpbbox = explode(' ', substr($this->CurrentFont['desc']['FontBBox'], 1, -1)); 
  4412.         $fbbox = array_map(array($this, 'getAbsFontMeasure'), $tmpbbox); 
  4413.     } else { 
  4414.         // Find max width 
  4415.         if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MaxWidth'])) { 
  4416.             $maxw = $this->getAbsFontMeasure(intval($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MaxWidth'])); 
  4417.         } else { 
  4418.             $maxw = 0; 
  4419.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth'])) { 
  4420.                 $maxw = max($maxw, $this->CurrentFont['desc']['MissingWidth']); 
  4421.             } 
  4422.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['desc']['AvgWidth'])) { 
  4423.                 $maxw = max($maxw, $this->CurrentFont['desc']['AvgWidth']); 
  4424.             } 
  4425.             if (isset($this->CurrentFont['dw'])) { 
  4426.                 $maxw = max($maxw, $this->CurrentFont['dw']); 
  4427.             } 
  4428.             foreach ($this->CurrentFont['cw'] as $char => $w) { 
  4429.                 $maxw = max($maxw, $w); 
  4430.             } 
  4431.             if ($maxw == 0) { 
  4432.                 $maxw = 600; 
  4433.             } 
  4434.             $maxw = $this->getAbsFontMeasure($maxw); 
  4435.         } 
  4436.         $fbbox = array(0, (0 - $this->FontDescent), $maxw, $this->FontAscent); 
  4437.     } 
  4438.     return $fbbox; 
  4439. } 
  4440.  
  4441. /** 
  4442.  * Convert a relative font measure into absolute value. 
  4443.  * @param $s (int) Font measure. 
  4444.  * @return float Absolute measure. 
  4445.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  4446.  */ 
  4447. public function getAbsFontMeasure($s) { 
  4448.     return ($s * $this->FontSize / 1000); 
  4449. } 
  4450.  
  4451. /** 
  4452.  * Returns the glyph bounding box of the specified character in the current font in user units. 
  4453.  * @param $char (int) Input character code. 
  4454.  * @return mixed array(xMin, yMin, xMax, yMax) or FALSE if not defined. 
  4455.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  4456.  */ 
  4457. public function getCharBBox($char) { 
  4458.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['cbbox'][$char])) { 
  4459.         return array_map(array($this, 'getAbsFontMeasure'), $this->CurrentFont['cbbox'][intval($char)]); 
  4460.     } 
  4461.     return false; 
  4462. } 
  4463.  
  4464. /** 
  4465.  * Return the font descent value 
  4466.  * @param $font (string) font name 
  4467.  * @param $style (string) font style 
  4468.  * @param $size (float) The size (in points) 
  4469.  * @return int font descent 
  4470.  * @public 
  4471.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  4472.  * @since 4.9.003 (2010-03-30) 
  4473.  */ 
  4474. public function getFontDescent($font, $style='', $size=0) { 
  4475.     $fontdata = $this->AddFont($font, $style); 
  4476.     $fontinfo = $this->getFontBuffer($fontdata['fontkey']); 
  4477.     if (isset($fontinfo['desc']['Descent']) AND ($fontinfo['desc']['Descent'] <= 0)) { 
  4478.         $descent = (- $fontinfo['desc']['Descent'] * $size / 1000); 
  4479.     } else { 
  4480.         $descent = (1.219 * 0.24 * $size); 
  4481.     } 
  4482.     return ($descent / $this->k); 
  4483. } 
  4484.  
  4485. /** 
  4486.  * Return the font ascent value. 
  4487.  * @param $font (string) font name 
  4488.  * @param $style (string) font style 
  4489.  * @param $size (float) The size (in points) 
  4490.  * @return int font ascent 
  4491.  * @public 
  4492.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  4493.  * @since 4.9.003 (2010-03-30) 
  4494.  */ 
  4495. public function getFontAscent($font, $style='', $size=0) { 
  4496.     $fontdata = $this->AddFont($font, $style); 
  4497.     $fontinfo = $this->getFontBuffer($fontdata['fontkey']); 
  4498.     if (isset($fontinfo['desc']['Ascent']) AND ($fontinfo['desc']['Ascent'] > 0)) { 
  4499.         $ascent = ($fontinfo['desc']['Ascent'] * $size / 1000); 
  4500.     } else { 
  4501.         $ascent = 1.219 * 0.76 * $size; 
  4502.     } 
  4503.     return ($ascent / $this->k); 
  4504. } 
  4505.  
  4506. /** 
  4507.  * Return true in the character is present in the specified font. 
  4508.  * @param $char (mixed) Character to check (integer value or string) 
  4509.  * @param $font (string) Font name (family name). 
  4510.  * @param $style (string) Font style. 
  4511.  * @return (boolean) true if the char is defined, false otherwise. 
  4512.  * @public 
  4513.  * @since 5.9.153 (2012-03-28) 
  4514.  */ 
  4515. public function isCharDefined($char, $font='', $style='') { 
  4516.     if (is_string($char)) { 
  4517.         // get character code 
  4518.         $char = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($char, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  4519.         $char = $char[0]; 
  4520.     } 
  4521.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($font)) { 
  4522.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($style)) { 
  4523.             return (isset($this->CurrentFont['cw'][intval($char)])); 
  4524.         } 
  4525.         $font = $this->FontFamily; 
  4526.     } 
  4527.     $fontdata = $this->AddFont($font, $style); 
  4528.     $fontinfo = $this->getFontBuffer($fontdata['fontkey']); 
  4529.     return (isset($fontinfo['cw'][intval($char)])); 
  4530. } 
  4531.  
  4532. /** 
  4533.  * Replace missing font characters on selected font with specified substitutions. 
  4534.  * @param $text (string) Text to process. 
  4535.  * @param $font (string) Font name (family name). 
  4536.  * @param $style (string) Font style. 
  4537.  * @param $subs (array) Array of possible character substitutions. The key is the character to check (integer value) and the value is a single intege value or an array of possible substitutes. 
  4538.  * @return (string) Processed text. 
  4539.  * @public 
  4540.  * @since 5.9.153 (2012-03-28) 
  4541.  */ 
  4542. public function replaceMissingChars($text, $font='', $style='', $subs=array()) { 
  4543.     if (empty($subs)) { 
  4544.         return $text; 
  4545.     } 
  4546.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($font)) { 
  4547.         $font = $this->FontFamily; 
  4548.     } 
  4549.     $fontdata = $this->AddFont($font, $style); 
  4550.     $fontinfo = $this->getFontBuffer($fontdata['fontkey']); 
  4551.     $uniarr = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($text, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  4552.     foreach ($uniarr as $k => $chr) { 
  4553.         if (!isset($fontinfo['cw'][$chr])) { 
  4554.             // this character is missing on the selected font 
  4555.             if (isset($subs[$chr])) { 
  4556.                 // we have available substitutions 
  4557.                 if (is_array($subs[$chr])) { 
  4558.                     foreach($subs[$chr] as $s) { 
  4559.                         if (isset($fontinfo['cw'][$s])) { 
  4560.                             $uniarr[$k] = $s; 
  4561.                             break; 
  4562.                         } 
  4563.                     } 
  4564.                 } elseif (isset($fontinfo['cw'][$subs[$chr]])) { 
  4565.                     $uniarr[$k] = $subs[$chr]; 
  4566.                 } 
  4567.             } 
  4568.         } 
  4569.     } 
  4570.     return TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrayToUniArray($uniarr, $this->isunicode)); 
  4571. } 
  4572.  
  4573. /** 
  4574.  * Defines the default monospaced font. 
  4575.  * @param $font (string) Font name. 
  4576.  * @public 
  4577.  * @since 4.5.025 
  4578.  */ 
  4579. public function SetDefaultMonospacedFont($font) { 
  4580.     $this->default_monospaced_font = $font; 
  4581. } 
  4582.  
  4583. /** 
  4584.  * Creates a new internal link and returns its identifier. An internal link is a clickable area which directs to another place within the document.<br /> 
  4585.  * The identifier can then be passed to Cell(), Write(), Image() or Link(). The destination is defined with SetLink(). 
  4586.  * @public 
  4587.  * @since 1.5 
  4588.  * @see Cell(), Write(), Image(), Link(), SetLink() 
  4589.  */ 
  4590. public function AddLink() { 
  4591.     // create a new internal link 
  4592.     $n = count($this->links) + 1; 
  4593.     $this->links[$n] = array('p' => 0, 'y' => 0, 'f' => false); 
  4594.     return $n; 
  4595. } 
  4596.  
  4597. /** 
  4598.  * Defines the page and position a link points to. 
  4599.  * @param $link (int) The link identifier returned by AddLink() 
  4600.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of target position; -1 indicates the current position. The default value is 0 (top of page) 
  4601.  * @param $page (int) Number of target page; -1 indicates the current page (default value). If you prefix a page number with the * character, then this page will not be changed when adding/deleting/moving pages.  
  4602.  * @public 
  4603.  * @since 1.5 
  4604.  * @see AddLink() 
  4605.  */ 
  4606. public function SetLink($link, $y=0, $page=-1) { 
  4607.     $fixed = false; 
  4608.     if (!empty($page) AND ($page[0] == '*')) { 
  4609.         $page = intval(substr($page, 1)); 
  4610.         // this page number will not be changed when moving/add/deleting pages 
  4611.         $fixed = true; 
  4612.     } 
  4613.     if ($page < 0) { 
  4614.         $page = $this->page; 
  4615.     } 
  4616.     if ($y == -1) { 
  4617.         $y = $this->y; 
  4618.     } 
  4619.     $this->links[$link] = array('p' => $page, 'y' => $y, 'f' => $fixed); 
  4620. } 
  4621.  
  4622. /** 
  4623.  * Puts a link on a rectangular area of the page. 
  4624.  * Text or image links are generally put via Cell(), Write() or Image(), but this method can be useful for instance to define a clickable area inside an image. 
  4625.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4626.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4627.  * @param $w (float) Width of the rectangle 
  4628.  * @param $h (float) Height of the rectangle 
  4629.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink() 
  4630.  * @param $spaces (int) number of spaces on the text to link 
  4631.  * @public 
  4632.  * @since 1.5 
  4633.  * @see AddLink(), Annotation(), Cell(), Write(), Image() 
  4634.  */ 
  4635. public function Link($x, $y, $w, $h, $link, $spaces=0) { 
  4636.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $link, array('Subtype'=>'Link'), $spaces); 
  4637. } 
  4638.  
  4639. /** 
  4640.  * Puts a markup annotation on a rectangular area of the page. 
  4641.  * !!!!THE ANNOTATION SUPPORT IS NOT YET FULLY IMPLEMENTED !!!! 
  4642.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4643.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  4644.  * @param $w (float) Width of the rectangle 
  4645.  * @param $h (float) Height of the rectangle 
  4646.  * @param $text (string) annotation text or alternate content 
  4647.  * @param $opt (array) array of options (see section 8.4 of PDF reference 1.7). 
  4648.  * @param $spaces (int) number of spaces on the text to link 
  4649.  * @public 
  4650.  * @since 3.0.018 (2008-08-06) 
  4651.  */ 
  4652. public function Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $text, $opt=array('Subtype'=>'Text'), $spaces=0) { 
  4653.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  4654.         // store parameters for later use on template 
  4655.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][] = array('x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'text' => $text, 'opt' => $opt, 'spaces' => $spaces); 
  4656.         return; 
  4657.     } 
  4658.     if ($x === '') { 
  4659.         $x = $this->x; 
  4660.     } 
  4661.     if ($y === '') { 
  4662.         $y = $this->y; 
  4663.     } 
  4664.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  4665.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  4666.     // recalculate coordinates to account for graphic transformations 
  4667.     if (isset($this->transfmatrix) AND !empty($this->transfmatrix)) { 
  4668.         for ($i=$this->transfmatrix_key; $i > 0; --$i) { 
  4669.             $maxid = count($this->transfmatrix[$i]) - 1; 
  4670.             for ($j=$maxid; $j >= 0; --$j) { 
  4671.                 $ctm = $this->transfmatrix[$i][$j]; 
  4672.                 if (isset($ctm['a'])) { 
  4673.                     $x = $x * $this->k; 
  4674.                     $y = ($this->h - $y) * $this->k; 
  4675.                     $w = $w * $this->k; 
  4676.                     $h = $h * $this->k; 
  4677.                     // top left 
  4678.                     $xt = $x; 
  4679.                     $yt = $y; 
  4680.                     $x1 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4681.                     $y1 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4682.                     // top right 
  4683.                     $xt = $x + $w; 
  4684.                     $yt = $y; 
  4685.                     $x2 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4686.                     $y2 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4687.                     // bottom left 
  4688.                     $xt = $x; 
  4689.                     $yt = $y - $h; 
  4690.                     $x3 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4691.                     $y3 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4692.                     // bottom right 
  4693.                     $xt = $x + $w; 
  4694.                     $yt = $y - $h; 
  4695.                     $x4 = ($ctm['a'] * $xt) + ($ctm['c'] * $yt) + $ctm['e']; 
  4696.                     $y4 = ($ctm['b'] * $xt) + ($ctm['d'] * $yt) + $ctm['f']; 
  4697.                     // new coordinates (rectangle area) 
  4698.                     $x = min($x1, $x2, $x3, $x4); 
  4699.                     $y = max($y1, $y2, $y3, $y4); 
  4700.                     $w = (max($x1, $x2, $x3, $x4) - $x) / $this->k; 
  4701.                     $h = ($y - min($y1, $y2, $y3, $y4)) / $this->k; 
  4702.                     $x = $x / $this->k; 
  4703.                     $y = $this->h - ($y / $this->k); 
  4704.                 } 
  4705.             } 
  4706.         } 
  4707.     } 
  4708.     if ($this->page <= 0) { 
  4709.         $page = 1; 
  4710.     } else { 
  4711.         $page = $this->page; 
  4712.     } 
  4713.     if (!isset($this->PageAnnots[$page])) { 
  4714.         $this->PageAnnots[$page] = array(); 
  4715.     } 
  4716.     $this->PageAnnots[$page][] = array('n' => ++$this->n, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'w' => $w, 'h' => $h, 'txt' => $text, 'opt' => $opt, 'numspaces' => $spaces); 
  4717.     if (!$this->pdfa_mode) { 
  4718.         if ((($opt['Subtype'] == 'FileAttachment') OR ($opt['Subtype'] == 'Sound')) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($opt['FS'])) 
  4719.             AND (@file_exists($opt['FS']) OR TCPDF_STATIC::isValidURL($opt['FS'])) 
  4720.             AND (!isset($this->embeddedfiles[basename($opt['FS'])]))) { 
  4721.             $this->embeddedfiles[basename($opt['FS'])] = array('f' => ++$this->n, 'n' => ++$this->n, 'file' => $opt['FS']); 
  4722.         } 
  4723.     } 
  4724.     // Add widgets annotation's icons 
  4725.     if (isset($opt['mk']['i']) AND @file_exists($opt['mk']['i'])) { 
  4726.         $this->Image($opt['mk']['i'], '', '', 10, 10, '', '', '', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, true); 
  4727.     } 
  4728.     if (isset($opt['mk']['ri']) AND @file_exists($opt['mk']['ri'])) { 
  4729.         $this->Image($opt['mk']['ri'], '', '', 0, 0, '', '', '', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, true); 
  4730.     } 
  4731.     if (isset($opt['mk']['ix']) AND @file_exists($opt['mk']['ix'])) { 
  4732.         $this->Image($opt['mk']['ix'], '', '', 0, 0, '', '', '', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, true); 
  4733.     } 
  4734. } 
  4735.  
  4736. /** 
  4737.  * Embedd the attached files. 
  4738.  * @since 4.3.000 (2008-12-07) 
  4739.  * @protected 
  4740.  * @see Annotation() 
  4741.  */ 
  4742. protected function _putEmbeddedFiles() { 
  4743.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  4744.         // embedded files are not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  4745.         return; 
  4746.     } 
  4747.     reset($this->embeddedfiles); 
  4748.     foreach ($this->embeddedfiles as $filename => $filedata) { 
  4749.         $data = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($filedata['file']); 
  4750.         if ($data !== FALSE) { 
  4751.             $rawsize = strlen($data); 
  4752.             if ($rawsize > 0) { 
  4753.                 // update name tree 
  4754.                 $this->efnames[$filename] = $filedata['f'].' 0 R'; 
  4755.                 // embedded file specification object 
  4756.                 $out = $this->_getobj($filedata['f'])."\n"; 
  4757.                 $out .= '<</Type /Filespec /F '.$this->_datastring($filename, $filedata['f']).' /EF <</F '.$filedata['n'].' 0 R>> >>'; 
  4758.                 $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  4759.                 $this->_out($out); 
  4760.                 // embedded file object 
  4761.                 $filter = ''; 
  4762.                 if ($this->compress) { 
  4763.                     $data = gzcompress($data); 
  4764.                     $filter = ' /Filter /FlateDecode'; 
  4765.                 } 
  4766.                 $stream = $this->_getrawstream($data, $filedata['n']); 
  4767.                 $out = $this->_getobj($filedata['n'])."\n"; 
  4768.                 $out .= '<< /Type /EmbeddedFile'.$filter.' /Length '.strlen($stream).' /Params <</Size '.$rawsize.'>> >>'; 
  4769.                 $out .= ' stream'."\n".$stream."\n".'endstream'; 
  4770.                 $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  4771.                 $this->_out($out); 
  4772.             } 
  4773.         } 
  4774.     } 
  4775. } 
  4776.  
  4777. /** 
  4778.  * Prints a text cell at the specified position. 
  4779.  * This method allows to place a string precisely on the page. 
  4780.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the cell origin 
  4781.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the cell origin 
  4782.  * @param $txt (string) String to print 
  4783.  * @param $fstroke (int) outline size in user units (false = disable) 
  4784.  * @param $fclip (boolean) if true activate clipping mode (you must call StartTransform() before this function and StopTransform() to stop the clipping tranformation). 
  4785.  * @param $ffill (boolean) if true fills the text 
  4786.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  4787.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right (or left for RTL languages)</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line</li><li>2: below</li></ul>Putting 1 is equivalent to putting 0 and calling Ln() just after. Default value: 0. 
  4788.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  4789.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  4790.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  4791.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  4792.  * @param $ignore_min_height (boolean) if true ignore automatic minimum height value. 
  4793.  * @param $calign (string) cell vertical alignment relative to the specified Y value. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : cell top</li><li>A : font top</li><li>L : font baseline</li><li>D : font bottom</li><li>B : cell bottom</li></ul> 
  4794.  * @param $valign (string) text vertical alignment inside the cell. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : bottom</li></ul> 
  4795.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis for $x and $y initial position. 
  4796.  * @public 
  4797.  * @since 1.0 
  4798.  * @see Cell(), Write(), MultiCell(), WriteHTML(), WriteHTMLCell() 
  4799.  */ 
  4800. public function Text($x, $y, $txt, $fstroke=false, $fclip=false, $ffill=true, $border=0, $ln=0, $align='', $fill=false, $link='', $stretch=0, $ignore_min_height=false, $calign='T', $valign='M', $rtloff=false) { 
  4801.     $textrendermode = $this->textrendermode; 
  4802.     $textstrokewidth = $this->textstrokewidth; 
  4803.     $this->setTextRenderingMode($fstroke, $ffill, $fclip); 
  4804.     $this->SetXY($x, $y, $rtloff); 
  4805.     $this->Cell(0, 0, $txt, $border, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch, $ignore_min_height, $calign, $valign); 
  4806.     // restore previous rendering mode 
  4807.     $this->textrendermode = $textrendermode; 
  4808.     $this->textstrokewidth = $textstrokewidth; 
  4809. } 
  4810.  
  4811. /** 
  4812.  * Whenever a page break condition is met, the method is called, and the break is issued or not depending on the returned value. 
  4813.  * The default implementation returns a value according to the mode selected by SetAutoPageBreak().<br /> 
  4814.  * This method is called automatically and should not be called directly by the application. 
  4815.  * @return boolean 
  4816.  * @public 
  4817.  * @since 1.4 
  4818.  * @see SetAutoPageBreak() 
  4819.  */ 
  4820. public function AcceptPageBreak() { 
  4821.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  4822.         // multi column mode 
  4823.         if ($this->current_column < ($this->num_columns - 1)) { 
  4824.             // go to next column 
  4825.             $this->selectColumn($this->current_column + 1); 
  4826.         } elseif ($this->AutoPageBreak) { 
  4827.             // add a new page 
  4828.             $this->AddPage(); 
  4829.             // set first column 
  4830.             $this->selectColumn(0); 
  4831.         } 
  4832.         // avoid page breaking from checkPageBreak() 
  4833.         return false; 
  4834.     } 
  4835.     return $this->AutoPageBreak; 
  4836. } 
  4837.  
  4838. /** 
  4839.  * Add page if needed. 
  4840.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. Default value: 0. 
  4841.  * @param $y (mixed) starting y position, leave empty for current position. 
  4842.  * @param $addpage (boolean) if true add a page, otherwise only return the true/false state 
  4843.  * @return boolean true in case of page break, false otherwise. 
  4844.  * @since 3.2.000 (2008-07-01) 
  4845.  * @protected 
  4846.  */ 
  4847. protected function checkPageBreak($h=0, $y='', $addpage=true) { 
  4848.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($y)) { 
  4849.         $y = $this->y; 
  4850.     } 
  4851.     $current_page = $this->page; 
  4852.     if ((($y + $h) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) AND ($this->inPageBody()) AND ($this->AcceptPageBreak())) { 
  4853.         if ($addpage) { 
  4854.             //Automatic page break 
  4855.             $x = $this->x; 
  4856.             $this->AddPage($this->CurOrientation); 
  4857.             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  4858.             $oldpage = $this->page - 1; 
  4859.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  4860.                 if ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['orm']) { 
  4861.                     $this->x = $x - ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['orm']); 
  4862.                 } else { 
  4863.                     $this->x = $x; 
  4864.                 } 
  4865.             } else { 
  4866.                 if ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['olm']) { 
  4867.                     $this->x = $x + ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$oldpage]['olm']); 
  4868.                 } else { 
  4869.                     $this->x = $x; 
  4870.                 } 
  4871.             } 
  4872.         } 
  4873.         return true; 
  4874.     } 
  4875.     if ($current_page != $this->page) { 
  4876.         // account for columns mode 
  4877.         return true; 
  4878.     } 
  4879.     return false; 
  4880. } 
  4881.  
  4882. /** 
  4883.  * Prints a cell (rectangular area) with optional borders, background color and character string. The upper-left corner of the cell corresponds to the current position. The text can be aligned or centered. After the call, the current position moves to the right or to the next line. It is possible to put a link on the text.<br /> 
  4884.  * If automatic page breaking is enabled and the cell goes beyond the limit, a page break is done before outputting. 
  4885.  * @param $w (float) Cell width. If 0, the cell extends up to the right margin. 
  4886.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. Default value: 0. 
  4887.  * @param $txt (string) String to print. Default value: empty string. 
  4888.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  4889.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right (or left for RTL languages)</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line</li><li>2: below</li></ul> Putting 1 is equivalent to putting 0 and calling Ln() just after. Default value: 0. 
  4890.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  4891.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  4892.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  4893.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  4894.  * @param $ignore_min_height (boolean) if true ignore automatic minimum height value. 
  4895.  * @param $calign (string) cell vertical alignment relative to the specified Y value. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : cell top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : cell bottom</li><li>A : font top</li><li>L : font baseline</li><li>D : font bottom</li></ul> 
  4896.  * @param $valign (string) text vertical alignment inside the cell. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : bottom</li></ul> 
  4897.  * @public 
  4898.  * @since 1.0 
  4899.  * @see SetFont(), SetDrawColor(), SetFillColor(), SetTextColor(), SetLineWidth(), AddLink(), Ln(), MultiCell(), Write(), SetAutoPageBreak() 
  4900.  */ 
  4901. public function Cell($w, $h=0, $txt='', $border=0, $ln=0, $align='', $fill=false, $link='', $stretch=0, $ignore_min_height=false, $calign='T', $valign='M') { 
  4902.     $prev_cell_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  4903.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  4904.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  4905.     if (!$ignore_min_height) { 
  4906.         $min_cell_height = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  4907.         if ($h < $min_cell_height) { 
  4908.             $h = $min_cell_height; 
  4909.         } 
  4910.     } 
  4911.     $this->checkPageBreak($h + $this->cell_margin['T'] + $this->cell_margin['B']); 
  4912.     // apply text shadow if enabled 
  4913.     if ($this->txtshadow['enabled']) { 
  4914.         // save data 
  4915.         $x = $this->x; 
  4916.         $y = $this->y; 
  4917.         $bc = $this->bgcolor; 
  4918.         $fc = $this->fgcolor; 
  4919.         $sc = $this->strokecolor; 
  4920.         $alpha = $this->alpha; 
  4921.         // print shadow 
  4922.         $this->x += $this->txtshadow['depth_w']; 
  4923.         $this->y += $this->txtshadow['depth_h']; 
  4924.         $this->SetFillColorArray($this->txtshadow['color']); 
  4925.         $this->SetTextColorArray($this->txtshadow['color']); 
  4926.         $this->SetDrawColorArray($this->txtshadow['color']); 
  4927.         if ($this->txtshadow['opacity'] != $alpha['CA']) { 
  4928.             $this->setAlpha($this->txtshadow['opacity'], $this->txtshadow['blend_mode']); 
  4929.         } 
  4930.         if ($this->state == 2) { 
  4931.             $this->_out($this->getCellCode($w, $h, $txt, $border, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch, true, $calign, $valign)); 
  4932.         } 
  4933.         //restore data 
  4934.         $this->x = $x; 
  4935.         $this->y = $y; 
  4936.         $this->SetFillColorArray($bc); 
  4937.         $this->SetTextColorArray($fc); 
  4938.         $this->SetDrawColorArray($sc); 
  4939.         if ($this->txtshadow['opacity'] != $alpha['CA']) { 
  4940.             $this->setAlpha($alpha['CA'], $alpha['BM'], $alpha['ca'], $alpha['AIS']); 
  4941.         } 
  4942.     } 
  4943.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  4944.         $this->_out($this->getCellCode($w, $h, $txt, $border, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch, true, $calign, $valign)); 
  4945.     } 
  4946.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  4947.     $this->cell_margin = $prev_cell_margin; 
  4948. } 
  4949.  
  4950. /** 
  4951.  * Returns the PDF string code to print a cell (rectangular area) with optional borders, background color and character string. The upper-left corner of the cell corresponds to the current position. The text can be aligned or centered. After the call, the current position moves to the right or to the next line. It is possible to put a link on the text.<br /> 
  4952.  * If automatic page breaking is enabled and the cell goes beyond the limit, a page break is done before outputting. 
  4953.  * @param $w (float) Cell width. If 0, the cell extends up to the right margin. 
  4954.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. Default value: 0. 
  4955.  * @param $txt (string) String to print. Default value: empty string. 
  4956.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  4957.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right (or left for RTL languages)</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line</li><li>2: below</li></ul>Putting 1 is equivalent to putting 0 and calling Ln() just after. Default value: 0. 
  4958.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  4959.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  4960.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  4961.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  4962.  * @param $ignore_min_height (boolean) if true ignore automatic minimum height value. 
  4963.  * @param $calign (string) cell vertical alignment relative to the specified Y value. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : cell top</li><li>C : center</li><li>B : cell bottom</li><li>A : font top</li><li>L : font baseline</li><li>D : font bottom</li></ul> 
  4964.  * @param $valign (string) text vertical alignment inside the cell. Possible values are:<ul><li>T : top</li><li>M : middle</li><li>B : bottom</li></ul> 
  4965.  * @return string containing cell code 
  4966.  * @protected 
  4967.  * @since 1.0 
  4968.  * @see Cell() 
  4969.  */ 
  4970. protected function getCellCode($w, $h=0, $txt='', $border=0, $ln=0, $align='', $fill=false, $link='', $stretch=0, $ignore_min_height=false, $calign='T', $valign='M') { 
  4971.     // replace 'NO-BREAK SPACE' (U+00A0) character with a simple space 
  4972.     $txt = str_replace(TCPDF_FONTS::unichr(160, $this->isunicode), ' ', $txt); 
  4973.     $prev_cell_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  4974.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  4975.     $txt = TCPDF_STATIC::removeSHY($txt, $this->isunicode); 
  4976.     $rs = ''; //string to be returned 
  4977.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  4978.     if (!$ignore_min_height) { 
  4979.         $min_cell_height = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  4980.         if ($h < $min_cell_height) { 
  4981.             $h = $min_cell_height; 
  4982.         } 
  4983.     } 
  4984.     $k = $this->k; 
  4985.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  4986.     list($this->x, $this->y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $this->x, $this->y); 
  4987.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  4988.         $x = $this->x - $this->cell_margin['R']; 
  4989.     } else { 
  4990.         $x = $this->x + $this->cell_margin['L']; 
  4991.     } 
  4992.     $y = $this->y + $this->cell_margin['T']; 
  4993.     $prev_font_stretching = $this->font_stretching; 
  4994.     $prev_font_spacing = $this->font_spacing; 
  4995.     // cell vertical alignment 
  4996.     switch ($calign) { 
  4997.         case 'A': { 
  4998.             // font top 
  4999.             switch ($valign) { 
  5000.                 case 'T': { 
  5001.                     // top 
  5002.                     $y -= $this->cell_padding['T']; 
  5003.                     break; 
  5004.                 } 
  5005.                 case 'B': { 
  5006.                     // bottom 
  5007.                     $y -= ($h - $this->cell_padding['B'] - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent); 
  5008.                     break; 
  5009.                 } 
  5010.                 default: 
  5011.                 case 'C': 
  5012.                 case 'M': { 
  5013.                     // center 
  5014.                     $y -= (($h - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5015.                     break; 
  5016.                 } 
  5017.             } 
  5018.             break; 
  5019.         } 
  5020.         case 'L': { 
  5021.             // font baseline 
  5022.             switch ($valign) { 
  5023.                 case 'T': { 
  5024.                     // top 
  5025.                     $y -= ($this->cell_padding['T'] + $this->FontAscent); 
  5026.                     break; 
  5027.                 } 
  5028.                 case 'B': { 
  5029.                     // bottom 
  5030.                     $y -= ($h - $this->cell_padding['B'] - $this->FontDescent); 
  5031.                     break; 
  5032.                 } 
  5033.                 default: 
  5034.                 case 'C': 
  5035.                 case 'M': { 
  5036.                     // center 
  5037.                     $y -= (($h + $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5038.                     break; 
  5039.                 } 
  5040.             } 
  5041.             break; 
  5042.         } 
  5043.         case 'D': { 
  5044.             // font bottom 
  5045.             switch ($valign) { 
  5046.                 case 'T': { 
  5047.                     // top 
  5048.                     $y -= ($this->cell_padding['T'] + $this->FontAscent + $this->FontDescent); 
  5049.                     break; 
  5050.                 } 
  5051.                 case 'B': { 
  5052.                     // bottom 
  5053.                     $y -= ($h - $this->cell_padding['B']); 
  5054.                     break; 
  5055.                 } 
  5056.                 default: 
  5057.                 case 'C': 
  5058.                 case 'M': { 
  5059.                     // center 
  5060.                     $y -= (($h + $this->FontAscent + $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5061.                     break; 
  5062.                 } 
  5063.             } 
  5064.             break; 
  5065.         } 
  5066.         case 'B': { 
  5067.             // cell bottom 
  5068.             $y -= $h; 
  5069.             break; 
  5070.         } 
  5071.         case 'C': 
  5072.         case 'M': { 
  5073.             // cell center 
  5074.             $y -= ($h / 2); 
  5075.             break; 
  5076.         } 
  5077.         default: 
  5078.         case 'T': { 
  5079.             // cell top 
  5080.             break; 
  5081.         } 
  5082.     } 
  5083.     // text vertical alignment 
  5084.     switch ($valign) { 
  5085.         case 'T': { 
  5086.             // top 
  5087.             $yt = $y + $this->cell_padding['T']; 
  5088.             break; 
  5089.         } 
  5090.         case 'B': { 
  5091.             // bottom 
  5092.             $yt = $y + $h - $this->cell_padding['B'] - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent; 
  5093.             break; 
  5094.         } 
  5095.         default: 
  5096.         case 'C': 
  5097.         case 'M': { 
  5098.             // center 
  5099.             $yt = $y + (($h - $this->FontAscent - $this->FontDescent) / 2); 
  5100.             break; 
  5101.         } 
  5102.     } 
  5103.     $basefonty = $yt + $this->FontAscent; 
  5104.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($w) OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  5105.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5106.             $w = $x - $this->lMargin; 
  5107.         } else { 
  5108.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $x; 
  5109.         } 
  5110.     } 
  5111.     $s = ''; 
  5112.     // fill and borders 
  5113.     if (is_string($border) AND (strlen($border) == 4)) { 
  5114.         // full border 
  5115.         $border = 1; 
  5116.     } 
  5117.     if ($fill OR ($border == 1)) { 
  5118.         if ($fill) { 
  5119.             $op = ($border == 1) ? 'B' : 'f'; 
  5120.         } else { 
  5121.             $op = 'S'; 
  5122.         } 
  5123.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5124.             $xk = (($x - $w) * $k); 
  5125.         } else { 
  5126.             $xk = ($x * $k); 
  5127.         } 
  5128.         $s .= sprintf('%F %F %F %F re %s ', $xk, (($this->h - $y) * $k), ($w * $k), (-$h * $k), $op); 
  5129.     } 
  5130.     // draw borders 
  5131.     $s .= $this->getCellBorder($x, $y, $w, $h, $border); 
  5132.     if ($txt != '') { 
  5133.         $txt2 = $txt; 
  5134.         if ($this->isunicode) { 
  5135.             if (($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'core') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'TrueType') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'Type1')) { 
  5136.                 $txt2 = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($txt2, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  5137.             } else { 
  5138.                 $unicode = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($txt, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); // array of UTF-8 unicode values 
  5139.                 $unicode = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($unicode, '', $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  5140.                 // replace thai chars (if any) 
  5141.                 if (defined('K_THAI_TOPCHARS') AND (K_THAI_TOPCHARS == true)) { 
  5142.                     // number of chars 
  5143.                     $numchars = count($unicode); 
  5144.                     // po pla, for far, for fan 
  5145.                     $longtail = array(0x0e1b, 0x0e1d, 0x0e1f); 
  5146.                     // do chada, to patak 
  5147.                     $lowtail = array(0x0e0e, 0x0e0f); 
  5148.                     // mai hun arkad, sara i, sara ii, sara ue, sara uee 
  5149.                     $upvowel = array(0x0e31, 0x0e34, 0x0e35, 0x0e36, 0x0e37); 
  5150.                     // mai ek, mai tho, mai tri, mai chattawa, karan 
  5151.                     $tonemark = array(0x0e48, 0x0e49, 0x0e4a, 0x0e4b, 0x0e4c); 
  5152.                     // sara u, sara uu, pinthu 
  5153.                     $lowvowel = array(0x0e38, 0x0e39, 0x0e3a); 
  5154.                     $output = array(); 
  5155.                     for ($i = 0; $i < $numchars; $i++) { 
  5156.                         if (($unicode[$i] >= 0x0e00) && ($unicode[$i] <= 0x0e5b)) { 
  5157.                             $ch0 = $unicode[$i]; 
  5158.                             $ch1 = ($i > 0) ? $unicode[($i - 1)] : 0; 
  5159.                             $ch2 = ($i > 1) ? $unicode[($i - 2)] : 0; 
  5160.                             $chn = ($i < ($numchars - 1)) ? $unicode[($i + 1)] : 0; 
  5161.                             if (in_array($ch0, $tonemark)) { 
  5162.                                 if ($chn == 0x0e33) { 
  5163.                                     // sara um 
  5164.                                     if (in_array($ch1, $longtail)) { 
  5165.                                         // tonemark at upper left 
  5166.                                         $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf713 + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5167.                                     } else { 
  5168.                                         // tonemark at upper right (normal position) 
  5169.                                         $output[] = $ch0; 
  5170.                                     } 
  5171.                                 } elseif (in_array($ch1, $longtail) OR (in_array($ch2, $longtail) AND in_array($ch1, $lowvowel))) { 
  5172.                                     // tonemark at lower left 
  5173.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf705 + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5174.                                 } elseif (in_array($ch1, $upvowel)) { 
  5175.                                     if (in_array($ch2, $longtail)) { 
  5176.                                         // tonemark at upper left 
  5177.                                         $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf713 + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5178.                                     } else { 
  5179.                                         // tonemark at upper right (normal position) 
  5180.                                         $output[] = $ch0; 
  5181.                                     } 
  5182.                                 } else { 
  5183.                                     // tonemark at lower right 
  5184.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf70a + $ch0 - 0x0e48)); 
  5185.                                 } 
  5186.                             } elseif (($ch0 == 0x0e33) AND (in_array($ch1, $longtail) OR (in_array($ch2, $longtail) AND in_array($ch1, $tonemark)))) { 
  5187.                                 // add lower left nikhahit and sara aa 
  5188.                                 if ($this->isCharDefined(0xf711) AND $this->isCharDefined(0x0e32)) { 
  5189.                                     $output[] = 0xf711; 
  5190.                                     $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'][0xf711] = true; 
  5191.                                     $output[] = 0x0e32; 
  5192.                                     $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'][0x0e32] = true; 
  5193.                                 } else { 
  5194.                                     $output[] = $ch0; 
  5195.                                 } 
  5196.                             } elseif (in_array($ch1, $longtail)) { 
  5197.                                 if ($ch0 == 0x0e31) { 
  5198.                                     // lower left mai hun arkad 
  5199.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf710); 
  5200.                                 } elseif (in_array($ch0, $upvowel)) { 
  5201.                                     // lower left 
  5202.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf701 + $ch0 - 0x0e34)); 
  5203.                                 } elseif ($ch0 == 0x0e47) { 
  5204.                                     // lower left mai tai koo 
  5205.                                     $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf712); 
  5206.                                 } else { 
  5207.                                     // normal character 
  5208.                                     $output[] = $ch0; 
  5209.                                 } 
  5210.                             } elseif (in_array($ch1, $lowtail) AND in_array($ch0, $lowvowel)) { 
  5211.                                 // lower vowel 
  5212.                                 $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, (0xf718 + $ch0 - 0x0e38)); 
  5213.                             } elseif (($ch0 == 0x0e0d) AND in_array($chn, $lowvowel)) { 
  5214.                                 // yo ying without lower part 
  5215.                                 $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf70f); 
  5216.                             } elseif (($ch0 == 0x0e10) AND in_array($chn, $lowvowel)) { 
  5217.                                 // tho santan without lower part 
  5218.                                 $output[] = $this->replaceChar($ch0, 0xf700); 
  5219.                             } else { 
  5220.                                 $output[] = $ch0; 
  5221.                             } 
  5222.                         } else { 
  5223.                             // non-thai character 
  5224.                             $output[] = $unicode[$i]; 
  5225.                         } 
  5226.                     } 
  5227.                     $unicode = $output; 
  5228.                     // update font subsetchars 
  5229.                     $this->setFontSubBuffer($this->CurrentFont['fontkey'], 'subsetchars', $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars']); 
  5230.                 } // end of K_THAI_TOPCHARS 
  5231.                 $txt2 = TCPDF_FONTS::arrUTF8ToUTF16BE($unicode, false); 
  5232.             } 
  5233.         } 
  5234.         $txt2 = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($txt2); 
  5235.         // get current text width (considering general font stretching and spacing) 
  5236.         $txwidth = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  5237.         $width = $txwidth; 
  5238.         // check for stretch mode 
  5239.         if ($stretch > 0) { 
  5240.             // calculate ratio between cell width and text width 
  5241.             if ($width <= 0) { 
  5242.                 $ratio = 1; 
  5243.             } else { 
  5244.                 $ratio = (($w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / $width); 
  5245.             } 
  5246.             // check if stretching is required 
  5247.             if (($ratio < 1) OR (($ratio > 1) AND (($stretch % 2) == 0))) { 
  5248.                 // the text will be stretched to fit cell width 
  5249.                 if ($stretch > 2) { 
  5250.                     // set new character spacing 
  5251.                     $this->font_spacing += ($w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R'] - $width) / (max(($this->GetNumChars($txt) - 1), 1) * ($this->font_stretching / 100)); 
  5252.                 } else { 
  5253.                     // set new horizontal stretching 
  5254.                     $this->font_stretching *= $ratio; 
  5255.                 } 
  5256.                 // recalculate text width (the text fills the entire cell) 
  5257.                 $width = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5258.                 // reset alignment 
  5259.                 $align = ''; 
  5260.             } 
  5261.         } 
  5262.         if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5263.             // apply font stretching 
  5264.             $rs .= sprintf('BT %F Tz ET ', $this->font_stretching); 
  5265.         } 
  5266.         if ($this->font_spacing != 0) { 
  5267.             // increase/decrease font spacing 
  5268.             $rs .= sprintf('BT %F Tc ET ', ($this->font_spacing * $this->k)); 
  5269.         } 
  5270.         if ($this->ColorFlag AND ($this->textrendermode < 4)) { 
  5271.             $s .= 'q '.$this->TextColor.' '; 
  5272.         } 
  5273.         // rendering mode
