  5274.         $s .= sprintf('BT %d Tr %F w ET ', $this->textrendermode, ($this->textstrokewidth * $this->k)); 
  5275.         // count number of spaces 
  5276.         $ns = substr_count($txt, chr(32)); 
  5277.         // Justification 
  5278.         $spacewidth = 0; 
  5279.         if (($align == 'J') AND ($ns > 0)) { 
  5280.             if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  5281.                 // get string width without spaces 
  5282.                 $width = $this->GetStringWidth(str_replace(' ', '', $txt)); 
  5283.                 // calculate average space width 
  5284.                 $spacewidth = -1000 * ($w - $width - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / ($ns?$ns:1) / ($this->FontSize?$this->FontSize:1); 
  5285.                 if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5286.                     // word spacing is affected by stretching 
  5287.                     $spacewidth /= ($this->font_stretching / 100); 
  5288.                 } 
  5289.                 // set word position to be used with TJ operator 
  5290.                 $txt2 = str_replace(chr(0).chr(32), ') '.sprintf('%F', $spacewidth).' (', $txt2); 
  5291.                 $unicode_justification = true; 
  5292.             } else { 
  5293.                 // get string width 
  5294.                 $width = $txwidth; 
  5295.                 // new space width 
  5296.                 $spacewidth = (($w - $width - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / ($ns?$ns:1)) * $this->k; 
  5297.                 if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5298.                     // word spacing (Tw) is affected by stretching 
  5299.                     $spacewidth /= ($this->font_stretching / 100); 
  5300.                 } 
  5301.                 // set word spacing 
  5302.                 $rs .= sprintf('BT %F Tw ET ', $spacewidth); 
  5303.             } 
  5304.             $width = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5305.         } 
  5306.         // replace carriage return characters 
  5307.         $txt2 = str_replace("\r", ' ', $txt2); 
  5308.         switch ($align) { 
  5309.             case 'C': { 
  5310.                 $dx = ($w - $width) / 2; 
  5311.                 break; 
  5312.             } 
  5313.             case 'R': { 
  5314.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5315.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5316.                 } else { 
  5317.                     $dx = $w - $width - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5318.                 } 
  5319.                 break; 
  5320.             } 
  5321.             case 'L': { 
  5322.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5323.                     $dx = $w - $width - $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  5324.                 } else { 
  5325.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  5326.                 } 
  5327.                 break; 
  5328.             } 
  5329.             case 'J': 
  5330.             default: { 
  5331.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5332.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  5333.                 } else { 
  5334.                     $dx = $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  5335.                 } 
  5336.                 break; 
  5337.             } 
  5338.         } 
  5339.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5340.             $xdx = $x - $dx - $width; 
  5341.         } else { 
  5342.             $xdx = $x + $dx; 
  5343.         } 
  5344.         $xdk = $xdx * $k; 
  5345.         // print text 
  5346.         $s .= sprintf('BT %F %F Td [(%s)] TJ ET', $xdk, (($this->h - $basefonty) * $k), $txt2); 
  5347.         if (isset($uniblock)) { 
  5348.             // print overlapping characters as separate string 
  5349.             $xshift = 0; // horizontal shift 
  5350.             $ty = (($this->h - $basefonty + (0.2 * $this->FontSize)) * $k); 
  5351.             $spw = (($w - $txwidth - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']) / ($ns?$ns:1)); 
  5352.             foreach ($uniblock as $uk => $uniarr) { 
  5353.                 if (($uk % 2) == 0) { 
  5354.                     // x space to skip 
  5355.                     if ($spacewidth != 0) { 
  5356.                         // justification shift 
  5357.                         $xshift += (count(array_keys($uniarr, 32)) * $spw); 
  5358.                     } 
  5359.                     $xshift += $this->GetArrStringWidth($uniarr); // + shift justification 
  5360.                 } else { 
  5361.                     // character to print 
  5362.                     $topchr = TCPDF_FONTS::arrUTF8ToUTF16BE($uniarr, false); 
  5363.                     $topchr = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($topchr); 
  5364.                     $s .= sprintf(' BT %F %F Td [(%s)] TJ ET', ($xdk + ($xshift * $k)), $ty, $topchr); 
  5365.                 } 
  5366.             } 
  5367.         } 
  5368.         if ($this->underline) { 
  5369.             $s .= ' '.$this->_dounderlinew($xdx, $basefonty, $width); 
  5370.         } 
  5371.         if ($this->linethrough) { 
  5372.             $s .= ' '.$this->_dolinethroughw($xdx, $basefonty, $width); 
  5373.         } 
  5374.         if ($this->overline) { 
  5375.             $s .= ' '.$this->_dooverlinew($xdx, $basefonty, $width); 
  5376.         } 
  5377.         if ($this->ColorFlag AND ($this->textrendermode < 4)) { 
  5378.             $s .= ' Q'; 
  5379.         } 
  5380.         if ($link) { 
  5381.             $this->Link($xdx, $yt, $width, ($this->FontAscent + $this->FontDescent), $link, $ns); 
  5382.         } 
  5383.     } 
  5384.     // output cell 
  5385.     if ($s) { 
  5386.         // output cell 
  5387.         $rs .= $s; 
  5388.         if ($this->font_spacing != 0) { 
  5389.             // reset font spacing mode 
  5390.             $rs .= ' BT 0 Tc ET'; 
  5391.         } 
  5392.         if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  5393.             // reset font stretching mode 
  5394.             $rs .= ' BT 100 Tz ET'; 
  5395.         } 
  5396.     } 
  5397.     // reset word spacing 
  5398.     if (!$this->isUnicodeFont() AND ($align == 'J')) { 
  5399.         $rs .= ' BT 0 Tw ET'; 
  5400.     } 
  5401.     // reset stretching and spacing 
  5402.     $this->font_stretching = $prev_font_stretching; 
  5403.     $this->font_spacing = $prev_font_spacing; 
  5404.     $this->lasth = $h; 
  5405.     if ($ln > 0) { 
  5406.         //Go to the beginning of the next line 
  5407.         $this->y = $y + $h + $this->cell_margin['B']; 
  5408.         if ($ln == 1) { 
  5409.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  5410.                 $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  5411.             } else { 
  5412.                 $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  5413.             } 
  5414.         } 
  5415.     } else { 
  5416.         // go left or right by case 
  5417.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5418.             $this->x = $x - $w - $this->cell_margin['L']; 
  5419.         } else { 
  5420.             $this->x = $x + $w + $this->cell_margin['R']; 
  5421.         } 
  5422.     } 
  5423.     $gstyles = ''.$this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor.' '.$this->FillColor."\n"; 
  5424.     $rs = $gstyles.$rs; 
  5425.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  5426.     $this->cell_margin = $prev_cell_margin; 
  5427.     return $rs; 
  5428. } 
  5429.  
  5430. /** 
  5431.  * Replace a char if is defined on the current font. 
  5432.  * @param $oldchar (int) Integer code (unicode) of the character to replace. 
  5433.  * @param $newchar (int) Integer code (unicode) of the new character. 
  5434.  * @return int the replaced char or the old char in case the new char i not defined 
  5435.  * @protected 
  5436.  * @since 5.9.167 (2012-06-22) 
  5437.  */ 
  5438. protected function replaceChar($oldchar, $newchar) { 
  5439.     if ($this->isCharDefined($newchar)) { 
  5440.         // add the new char on the subset list 
  5441.         $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'][$newchar] = true; 
  5442.         // return the new character 
  5443.         return $newchar; 
  5444.     } 
  5445.     // return the old char 
  5446.     return $oldchar; 
  5447. } 
  5448.  
  5449. /** 
  5450.  * Returns the code to draw the cell border 
  5451.  * @param $x (float) X coordinate. 
  5452.  * @param $y (float) Y coordinate. 
  5453.  * @param $w (float) Cell width. 
  5454.  * @param $h (float) Cell height. 
  5455.  * @param $brd (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  5456.  * @return string containing cell border code 
  5457.  * @protected 
  5458.  * @see SetLineStyle() 
  5459.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-02) 
  5460.  */ 
  5461. protected function getCellBorder($x, $y, $w, $h, $brd) { 
  5462.     $s = ''; // string to be returned 
  5463.     if (empty($brd)) { 
  5464.         return $s; 
  5465.     } 
  5466.     if ($brd == 1) { 
  5467.         $brd = array('LRTB' => true); 
  5468.     } 
  5469.     // calculate coordinates for border 
  5470.     $k = $this->k; 
  5471.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  5472.         $xeL = ($x - $w) * $k; 
  5473.         $xeR = $x * $k; 
  5474.     } else { 
  5475.         $xeL = $x * $k; 
  5476.         $xeR = ($x + $w) * $k; 
  5477.     } 
  5478.     $yeL = (($this->h - ($y + $h)) * $k); 
  5479.     $yeT = (($this->h - $y) * $k); 
  5480.     $xeT = $xeL; 
  5481.     $xeB = $xeR; 
  5482.     $yeR = $yeT; 
  5483.     $yeB = $yeL; 
  5484.     if (is_string($brd)) { 
  5485.         // convert string to array 
  5486.         $slen = strlen($brd); 
  5487.         $newbrd = array(); 
  5488.         for ($i = 0; $i < $slen; ++$i) { 
  5489.             $newbrd[$brd[$i]] = array('cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter'); 
  5490.         } 
  5491.         $brd = $newbrd; 
  5492.     } 
  5493.     if (isset($brd['mode'])) { 
  5494.         $mode = $brd['mode']; 
  5495.         unset($brd['mode']); 
  5496.     } else { 
  5497.         $mode = 'normal'; 
  5498.     } 
  5499.     foreach ($brd as $border => $style) { 
  5500.         if (is_array($style) AND !empty($style)) { 
  5501.             // apply border style 
  5502.             $prev_style = $this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor.' '; 
  5503.             $s .= $this->SetLineStyle($style, true)."\n"; 
  5504.         } 
  5505.         switch ($mode) { 
  5506.             case 'ext': { 
  5507.                 $off = (($this->LineWidth / 2) * $k); 
  5508.                 $xL = $xeL - $off; 
  5509.                 $xR = $xeR + $off; 
  5510.                 $yT = $yeT + $off; 
  5511.                 $yL = $yeL - $off; 
  5512.                 $xT = $xL; 
  5513.                 $xB = $xR; 
  5514.                 $yR = $yT; 
  5515.                 $yB = $yL; 
  5516.                 $w += $this->LineWidth; 
  5517.                 $h += $this->LineWidth; 
  5518.                 break; 
  5519.             } 
  5520.             case 'int': { 
  5521.                 $off = ($this->LineWidth / 2) * $k; 
  5522.                 $xL = $xeL + $off; 
  5523.                 $xR = $xeR - $off; 
  5524.                 $yT = $yeT - $off; 
  5525.                 $yL = $yeL + $off; 
  5526.                 $xT = $xL; 
  5527.                 $xB = $xR; 
  5528.                 $yR = $yT; 
  5529.                 $yB = $yL; 
  5530.                 $w -= $this->LineWidth; 
  5531.                 $h -= $this->LineWidth; 
  5532.                 break; 
  5533.             } 
  5534.             case 'normal': 
  5535.             default: { 
  5536.                 $xL = $xeL; 
  5537.                 $xT = $xeT; 
  5538.                 $xB = $xeB; 
  5539.                 $xR = $xeR; 
  5540.                 $yL = $yeL; 
  5541.                 $yT = $yeT; 
  5542.                 $yB = $yeB; 
  5543.                 $yR = $yeR; 
  5544.                 break; 
  5545.             } 
  5546.         } 
  5547.         // draw borders by case 
  5548.         if (strlen($border) == 4) { 
  5549.             $s .= sprintf('%F %F %F %F re S ', $xT, $yT, ($w * $k), (-$h * $k)); 
  5550.         } elseif (strlen($border) == 3) { 
  5551.             if (strpos($border, 'B') === false) { // LTR 
  5552.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5553.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5554.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5555.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5556.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5557.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'L') === false) { // TRB 
  5558.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5559.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5560.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5561.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5562.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5563.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'T') === false) { // RBL 
  5564.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5565.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5566.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5567.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5568.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5569.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'R') === false) { // BLT 
  5570.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5571.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5572.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5573.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5574.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5575.             } 
  5576.         } elseif (strlen($border) == 2) { 
  5577.             if ((strpos($border, 'L') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'T') !== false)) { // LT 
  5578.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5579.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5580.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5581.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5582.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'T') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'R') !== false)) { // TR 
  5583.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5584.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5585.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5586.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5587.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'R') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'B') !== false)) { // RB 
  5588.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5589.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5590.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5591.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5592.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'B') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'L') !== false)) { // BL 
  5593.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5594.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5595.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5596.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5597.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'L') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'R') !== false)) { // LR 
  5598.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5599.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5600.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5601.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5602.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5603.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5604.             } elseif ((strpos($border, 'T') !== false) AND (strpos($border, 'B') !== false)) { // TB 
  5605.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5606.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5607.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5608.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5609.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5610.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5611.             } 
  5612.         } else { // strlen($border) == 1 
  5613.             if (strpos($border, 'L') !== false) { // L 
  5614.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xL, $yL); 
  5615.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xT, $yT); 
  5616.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5617.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'T') !== false) { // T 
  5618.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xT, $yT); 
  5619.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xR, $yR); 
  5620.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5621.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'R') !== false) { // R 
  5622.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xR, $yR); 
  5623.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xB, $yB); 
  5624.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5625.             } elseif (strpos($border, 'B') !== false) { // B 
  5626.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F m ', $xB, $yB); 
  5627.                 $s .= sprintf('%F %F l ', $xL, $yL); 
  5628.                 $s .= 'S '; 
  5629.             } 
  5630.         } 
  5631.         if (is_array($style) AND !empty($style)) { 
  5632.             // reset border style to previous value 
  5633.             $s .= "\n".$this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor."\n"; 
  5634.         } 
  5635.     } 
  5636.     return $s; 
  5637. } 
  5638.  
  5639. /** 
  5640.  * This method allows printing text with line breaks. 
  5641.  * They can be automatic (as soon as the text reaches the right border of the cell) or explicit (via the \n character). As many cells as necessary are output, one below the other.<br /> 
  5642.  * Text can be aligned, centered or justified. The cell block can be framed and the background painted. 
  5643.  * @param $w (float) Width of cells. If 0, they extend up to the right margin of the page. 
  5644.  * @param $h (float) Cell minimum height. The cell extends automatically if needed. 
  5645.  * @param $txt (string) String to print 
  5646.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  5647.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justification (default value when $ishtml=false)</li></ul> 
  5648.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  5649.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line [DEFAULT]</li><li>2: below</li></ul> 
  5650.  * @param $x (float) x position in user units 
  5651.  * @param $y (float) y position in user units 
  5652.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default true). 
  5653.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  5654.  * @param $ishtml (boolean) INTERNAL USE ONLY -- set to true if $txt is HTML content (default = false). Never set this parameter to true, use instead writeHTMLCell() or writeHTML() methods. 
  5655.  * @param $autopadding (boolean) if true, uses internal padding and automatically adjust it to account for line width. 
  5656.  * @param $maxh (float) maximum height. It should be >= $h and less then remaining space to the bottom of the page, or 0 for disable this feature. This feature works only when $ishtml=false. 
  5657.  * @param $valign (string) Vertical alignment of text (requires $maxh = $h > 0). Possible values are:<ul><li>T: TOP</li><li>M: middle</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul>. This feature works only when $ishtml=false and the cell must fit in a single page. 
  5658.  * @param $fitcell (boolean) if true attempt to fit all the text within the cell by reducing the font size (do not work in HTML mode). $maxh must be greater than 0 and wqual to $h. 
  5659.  * @return int Return the number of cells or 1 for html mode. 
  5660.  * @public 
  5661.  * @since 1.3 
  5662.  * @see SetFont(), SetDrawColor(), SetFillColor(), SetTextColor(), SetLineWidth(), Cell(), Write(), SetAutoPageBreak() 
  5663.  */ 
  5664. public function MultiCell($w, $h, $txt, $border=0, $align='J', $fill=false, $ln=1, $x='', $y='', $reseth=true, $stretch=0, $ishtml=false, $autopadding=true, $maxh=0, $valign='T', $fitcell=false) { 
  5665.     $prev_cell_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  5666.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  5667.     // adjust internal padding 
  5668.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  5669.     $mc_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  5670.     $mc_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  5671.     $this->cell_padding['T'] = 0; 
  5672.     $this->cell_padding['B'] = 0; 
  5673.     $this->setCellMargins(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  5674.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lasth) OR $reseth) { 
  5675.         // reset row height 
  5676.         $this->resetLastH(); 
  5677.     } 
  5678.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($y)) { 
  5679.         $this->SetY($y); 
  5680.     } else { 
  5681.         $y = $this->GetY(); 
  5682.     } 
  5683.     $resth = 0; 
  5684.     if (($h > 0) AND $this->inPageBody() AND (($y + $h + $mc_margin['T'] + $mc_margin['B']) > $this->PageBreakTrigger)) { 
  5685.         // spit cell in more pages/columns 
  5686.         $newh = ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $y); 
  5687.         $resth = ($h - $newh); // cell to be printed on the next page/column 
  5688.         $h = $newh; 
  5689.     } 
  5690.     // get current page number 
  5691.     $startpage = $this->page; 
  5692.     // get current column 
  5693.     $startcolumn = $this->current_column; 
  5694.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($x)) { 
  5695.         $this->SetX($x); 
  5696.     } else { 
  5697.         $x = $this->GetX(); 
  5698.     } 
  5699.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  5700.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions(0, $x, $y); 
  5701.     // apply margins 
  5702.     $oy = $y + $mc_margin['T']; 
  5703.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  5704.         $ox = ($this->w - $x - $mc_margin['R']); 
  5705.     } else { 
  5706.         $ox = ($x + $mc_margin['L']); 
  5707.     } 
  5708.     $this->x = $ox; 
  5709.     $this->y = $oy; 
  5710.     // set width 
  5711.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($w) OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  5712.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  5713.             $w = ($this->x - $this->lMargin - $mc_margin['L']); 
  5714.         } else { 
  5715.             $w = ($this->w - $this->x - $this->rMargin - $mc_margin['R']); 
  5716.         } 
  5717.     } 
  5718.     // store original margin values 
  5719.     $lMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  5720.     $rMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  5721.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  5722.         $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $this->x); 
  5723.         $this->lMargin = ($this->x - $w); 
  5724.     } else { 
  5725.         $this->lMargin = ($this->x); 
  5726.         $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $this->x - $w); 
  5727.     } 
  5728.     $this->clMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  5729.     $this->crMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  5730.     if ($autopadding) { 
  5731.         // add top padding 
  5732.         $this->y += $mc_padding['T']; 
  5733.     } 
  5734.     if ($ishtml) { // ******* Write HTML text 
  5735.         $this->writeHTML($txt, true, false, $reseth, true, $align); 
  5736.         $nl = 1; 
  5737.     } else { // ******* Write simple text 
  5738.         $prev_FontSizePt = $this->FontSizePt; 
  5739.         if ($fitcell) { 
  5740.             // ajust height values 
  5741.             $tobottom = ($this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin - $this->cell_padding['T'] - $this->cell_padding['B']); 
  5742.             $h = $maxh = max(min($h, $tobottom), min($maxh, $tobottom)); 
  5743.         } 
  5744.         // vertical alignment 
  5745.         if ($maxh > 0) { 
  5746.             // get text height 
  5747.             $text_height = $this->getStringHeight($w, $txt, $reseth, $autopadding, $mc_padding, $border); 
  5748.             if ($fitcell) { 
  5749.                 // try to reduce font size to fit text on cell (use a quick search algorithm) 
  5750.                 $fmin = 1; 
  5751.                 $fmax = $this->FontSizePt; 
  5752.                 $diff_epsilon = (1 / $this->k); // one point (min resolution) 
  5753.                 $maxit = (2 * intval($fmax)); // max number of iterations 
  5754.                 while ($maxit > 0) { 
  5755.                     $fmid = (($fmax + $fmin) / 2); 
  5756.                     $this->SetFontSize($fmid, false); 
  5757.                     $this->resetLastH(); 
  5758.                     $text_height = $this->getStringHeight($w, $txt, $reseth, $autopadding, $mc_padding, $border); 
  5759.                     $diff = ($maxh - $text_height); 
  5760.                     if ($diff >= 0) { 
  5761.                         if ($diff < $diff_epsilon) { 
  5762.                             break; 
  5763.                         } 
  5764.                         $fmin = $fmid; 
  5765.                     } else { 
  5766.                         $fmax = $fmid; 
  5767.                     } 
  5768.                     --$maxit; 
  5769.                 } 
  5770.                 if ($maxit <= 0) { 
  5771.                     $fmid = $fmin; 
  5772.                 } 
  5773.                 $this->SetFontSize($fmid); 
  5774.             } 
  5775.             if ($text_height < $maxh) { 
  5776.                 if ($valign == 'M') { 
  5777.                     // text vertically centered 
  5778.                     $this->y += (($maxh - $text_height) / 2); 
  5779.                 } elseif ($valign == 'B') { 
  5780.                     // text vertically aligned on bottom 
  5781.                     $this->y += ($maxh - $text_height); 
  5782.                 } 
  5783.             } 
  5784.         } 
  5785.         $nl = $this->Write($this->lasth, $txt, '', 0, $align, true, $stretch, false, true, $maxh, 0, $mc_margin); 
  5786.         if ($fitcell) { 
  5787.             // restore font size 
  5788.             $this->SetFontSize($prev_FontSizePt); 
  5789.         } 
  5790.     } 
  5791.     if ($autopadding) { 
  5792.         // add bottom padding 
  5793.         $this->y += $mc_padding['B']; 
  5794.     } 
  5795.     // Get end-of-text Y position 
  5796.     $currentY = $this->y; 
  5797.     // get latest page number 
  5798.     $endpage = $this->page; 
  5799.     if ($resth > 0) { 
  5800.         $skip = ($endpage - $startpage); 
  5801.         $tmpresth = $resth; 
  5802.         while ($tmpresth > 0) { 
  5803.             if ($skip <= 0) { 
  5804.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  5805.                 $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  5806.             } 
  5807.             if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  5808.                 $tmpresth -= ($this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin); 
  5809.             } else { 
  5810.                 $tmpresth -= ($this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin); 
  5811.             } 
  5812.             --$skip; 
  5813.         } 
  5814.         $currentY = $this->y; 
  5815.         $endpage = $this->page; 
  5816.     } 
  5817.     // get latest column 
  5818.     $endcolumn = $this->current_column; 
  5819.     if ($this->num_columns == 0) { 
  5820.         $this->num_columns = 1; 
  5821.     } 
  5822.     // disable page regions check 
  5823.     $check_page_regions = $this->check_page_regions; 
  5824.     $this->check_page_regions = false; 
  5825.     // get border modes 
  5826.     $border_start = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='start', $this->opencell); 
  5827.     $border_end = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='end', $this->opencell); 
  5828.     $border_middle = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  5829.     // design borders around HTML cells. 
  5830.     for ($page = $startpage; $page <= $endpage; ++$page) { // for each page 
  5831.         $ccode = ''; 
  5832.         $this->setPage($page); 
  5833.         if ($this->num_columns < 2) { 
  5834.             // single-column mode 
  5835.             $this->SetX($x); 
  5836.             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  5837.         } 
  5838.         // account for margin changes 
  5839.         if ($page > $startpage) { 
  5840.             if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  5841.                 $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  5842.             } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  5843.                 $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  5844.             } 
  5845.         } 
  5846.         if ($startpage == $endpage) { 
  5847.             // single page 
  5848.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5849.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5850.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5851.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5852.                 } else { 
  5853.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5854.                 } 
  5855.                 if ($startcolumn == $endcolumn) { // single column 
  5856.                     $cborder = $border; 
  5857.                     $h = max($h, ($currentY - $oy)); 
  5858.                     $this->y = $oy; 
  5859.                 } elseif ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  5860.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  5861.                     $this->y = $oy; 
  5862.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5863.                 } elseif ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  5864.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  5865.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  5866.                     if ($resth > $h) { 
  5867.                         $h = $resth; 
  5868.                     } 
  5869.                 } else { // middle column 
  5870.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5871.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5872.                     $resth -= $h; 
  5873.                 } 
  5874.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5875.             } // end for each column 
  5876.         } elseif ($page == $startpage) { // first page 
  5877.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5878.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5879.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5880.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5881.                 } else { 
  5882.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5883.                 } 
  5884.                 if ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  5885.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  5886.                     $this->y = $oy; 
  5887.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5888.                 } else { // middle column 
  5889.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5890.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5891.                     $resth -= $h; 
  5892.                 } 
  5893.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5894.             } // end for each column 
  5895.         } elseif ($page == $endpage) { // last page 
  5896.             for ($column = 0; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5897.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5898.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5899.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5900.                 } else { 
  5901.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5902.                 } 
  5903.                 if ($column == $endcolumn) { 
  5904.                     // end column 
  5905.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  5906.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  5907.                     if ($resth > $h) { 
  5908.                         $h = $resth; 
  5909.                     } 
  5910.                 } else { 
  5911.                     // middle column 
  5912.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5913.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5914.                     $resth -= $h; 
  5915.                 } 
  5916.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5917.             } // end for each column 
  5918.         } else { // middle page 
  5919.             for ($column = 0; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  5920.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  5921.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  5922.                     $this->x -= $mc_margin['R']; 
  5923.                 } else { 
  5924.                     $this->x += $mc_margin['L']; 
  5925.                 } 
  5926.                 $cborder = $border_middle; 
  5927.                 $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  5928.                 $resth -= $h; 
  5929.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  5930.             } // end for each column 
  5931.         } 
  5932.         if ($cborder OR $fill) { 
  5933.             $offsetlen = strlen($ccode); 
  5934.             // draw border and fill 
  5935.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  5936.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  5937.                 if (end($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']) !== false) { 
  5938.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  5939.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey]; 
  5940.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  5941.                 } else { 
  5942.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk']; 
  5943.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] += $offsetlen; 
  5944.                 } 
  5945.                 $pagebuff = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']; 
  5946.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  5947.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  5948.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$ccode.$pend; 
  5949.             } else { 
  5950.                 if (end($this->transfmrk[$this->page]) !== false) { 
  5951.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  5952.                     $pagemark = $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey]; 
  5953.                     $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  5954.                 } elseif ($this->InFooter) { 
  5955.                     $pagemark = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  5956.                     $this->footerpos[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  5957.                 } else { 
  5958.                     $pagemark = $this->intmrk[$this->page]; 
  5959.                     $this->intmrk[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  5960.                 } 
  5961.                 $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  5962.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  5963.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  5964.                 $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $pstart.$ccode.$pend); 
  5965.             } 
  5966.         } 
  5967.     } // end for each page 
  5968.     // restore page regions check 
  5969.     $this->check_page_regions = $check_page_regions; 
  5970.     // Get end-of-cell Y position 
  5971.     $currentY = $this->GetY(); 
  5972.     // restore previous values 
  5973.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  5974.         $this->selectColumn(); 
  5975.     } else { 
  5976.         // restore original margins 
  5977.         $this->lMargin = $lMargin; 
  5978.         $this->rMargin = $rMargin; 
  5979.         if ($this->page > $startpage) { 
  5980.             // check for margin variations between pages (i.e. booklet mode) 
  5981.             $dl = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  5982.             $dr = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  5983.             if (($dl != 0) OR ($dr != 0)) { 
  5984.                 $this->lMargin += $dl; 
  5985.                 $this->rMargin += $dr; 
  5986.             } 
  5987.         } 
  5988.     } 
  5989.     if ($ln > 0) { 
  5990.         //Go to the beginning of the next line 
  5991.         $this->SetY($currentY + $mc_margin['B']); 
  5992.         if ($ln == 2) { 
  5993.             $this->SetX($x + $w + $mc_margin['L'] + $mc_margin['R']); 
  5994.         } 
  5995.     } else { 
  5996.         // go left or right by case 
  5997.         $this->setPage($startpage); 
  5998.         $this->y = $y; 
  5999.         $this->SetX($x + $w + $mc_margin['L'] + $mc_margin['R']); 
  6000.     } 
  6001.     $this->setContentMark(); 
  6002.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  6003.     $this->cell_margin = $prev_cell_margin; 
  6004.     $this->clMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  6005.     $this->crMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  6006.     return $nl; 
  6007. } 
  6008.  
  6009. /** 
  6010.  * This method return the estimated number of lines for print a simple text string using Multicell() method. 
  6011.  * @param $txt (string) String for calculating his height 
  6012.  * @param $w (float) Width of cells. If 0, they extend up to the right margin of the page. 
  6013.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default false). 
  6014.  * @param $autopadding (boolean) if true, uses internal padding and automatically adjust it to account for line width (default true). 
  6015.  * @param $cellpadding (float) Internal cell padding, if empty uses default cell padding. 
  6016.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  6017.  * @return float Return the minimal height needed for multicell method for printing the $txt param. 
  6018.  * @author Alexander Escalona Fern\E1ndez, Nicola Asuni 
  6019.  * @public 
  6020.  * @since 4.5.011 
  6021.  */ 
  6022. public function getNumLines($txt, $w=0, $reseth=false, $autopadding=true, $cellpadding='', $border=0) { 
  6023.     if ($txt === NULL) { 
  6024.         return 0; 
  6025.     } 
  6026.     if ($txt === '') { 
  6027.         // empty string 
  6028.         return 1; 
  6029.     } 
  6030.     // adjust internal padding 
  6031.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6032.     $prev_lasth = $this->lasth; 
  6033.     if (is_array($cellpadding)) { 
  6034.         $this->cell_padding = $cellpadding; 
  6035.     } 
  6036.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  6037.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($w) OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  6038.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  6039.             $w = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  6040.         } else { 
  6041.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  6042.         } 
  6043.     } 
  6044.     $wmax = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  6045.     if ($reseth) { 
  6046.         // reset row height 
  6047.         $this->resetLastH(); 
  6048.     } 
  6049.     $lines = 1; 
  6050.     $sum = 0; 
  6051.     $chars = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($txt, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont), $txt, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6052.     $charsWidth = $this->GetArrStringWidth($chars, '', '', 0, true); 
  6053.     $length = count($chars); 
  6054.     $lastSeparator = -1; 
  6055.     for ($i = 0; $i < $length; ++$i) { 
  6056.         $c = $chars[$i]; 
  6057.         $charWidth = $charsWidth[$i]; 
  6058.         if (($c != 160) 
  6059.                 AND (($c == 173) 
  6060.                     OR preg_match($this->re_spaces, TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($c, $this->isunicode)) 
  6061.                     OR (($c == 45) 
  6062.                         AND ($i > 0) AND ($i < ($length - 1)) 
  6063.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($chars[($i - 1)], $this->isunicode)) 
  6064.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($chars[($i + 1)], $this->isunicode)) 
  6065.  ) 
  6066.  ) 
  6067.  ) { 
  6068.             $lastSeparator = $i; 
  6069.         } 
  6070.         if ((($sum + $charWidth) > $wmax) OR ($c == 10)) { 
  6071.             ++$lines; 
  6072.             if ($c == 10) { 
  6073.                 $lastSeparator = -1; 
  6074.                 $sum = 0; 
  6075.             } elseif ($lastSeparator != -1) { 
  6076.                 $i = $lastSeparator; 
  6077.                 $lastSeparator = -1; 
  6078.                 $sum = 0; 
  6079.             } else { 
  6080.                 $sum = $charWidth; 
  6081.             } 
  6082.         } else { 
  6083.             $sum += $charWidth; 
  6084.         } 
  6085.     } 
  6086.     if ($chars[($length - 1)] == 10) { 
  6087.         --$lines; 
  6088.     } 
  6089.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  6090.     $this->lasth = $prev_lasth; 
  6091.     return $lines; 
  6092. } 
  6093.  
  6094. /** 
  6095.  * This method return the estimated height needed for printing a simple text string using the Multicell() method. 
  6096.  * Generally, if you want to know the exact height for a block of content you can use the following alternative technique: 
  6097.  * @pre 
  6098.  *  // store current object 
  6099.  *  $pdf->startTransaction(); 
  6100.  *  // store starting values 
  6101.  *  $start_y = $pdf->GetY(); 
  6102.  *  $start_page = $pdf->getPage(); 
  6103.  *  // call your printing functions with your parameters 
  6104.  *  // - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
  6105.  *  $pdf->MultiCell($w=0, $h=0, $txt, $border=1, $align='L', $fill=false, $ln=1, $x='', $y='', $reseth=true, $stretch=0, $ishtml=false, $autopadding=true, $maxh=0); 
  6106.  *  // - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
  6107.  *  // get the new Y 
  6108.  *  $end_y = $pdf->GetY(); 
  6109.  *  $end_page = $pdf->getPage(); 
  6110.  *  // calculate height 
  6111.  *  $height = 0; 
  6112.  *  if ($end_page == $start_page) { 
  6113.  *      $height = $end_y - $start_y; 
  6114.  *  } else { 
  6115.  *      for ($page=$start_page; $page <= $end_page; ++$page) { 
  6116.  *          $this->setPage($page); 
  6117.  *          if ($page == $start_page) { 
  6118.  *              // first page 
  6119.  *              $height = $this->h - $start_y - $this->bMargin; 
  6120.  *          } elseif ($page == $end_page) { 
  6121.  *              // last page 
  6122.  *              $height = $end_y - $this->tMargin; 
  6123.  *          } else { 
  6124.  *              $height = $this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin; 
  6125.  *          } 
  6126.  *      } 
  6127.  *  } 
  6128.  *  // restore previous object 
  6129.  *  $pdf = $pdf->rollbackTransaction(); 
  6130.  * 
  6131.  * @param $w (float) Width of cells. If 0, they extend up to the right margin of the page. 
  6132.  * @param $txt (string) String for calculating his height 
  6133.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default false). 
  6134.  * @param $autopadding (boolean) if true, uses internal padding and automatically adjust it to account for line width (default true). 
  6135.  * @param $cellpadding (float) Internal cell padding, if empty uses default cell padding. 
  6136.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  6137.  * @return float Return the minimal height needed for multicell method for printing the $txt param. 
  6138.  * @author Nicola Asuni, Alexander Escalona Fern\E1ndez 
  6139.  * @public 
  6140.  */ 
  6141. public function getStringHeight($w, $txt, $reseth=false, $autopadding=true, $cellpadding='', $border=0) { 
  6142.     // adjust internal padding 
  6143.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6144.     $prev_lasth = $this->lasth; 
  6145.     if (is_array($cellpadding)) { 
  6146.         $this->cell_padding = $cellpadding; 
  6147.     } 
  6148.     $this->adjustCellPadding($border); 
  6149.     $lines = $this->getNumLines($txt, $w, $reseth, $autopadding, $cellpadding, $border); 
  6150.     $height = $this->getCellHeight(($lines * $this->FontSize), $autopadding); 
  6151.     $this->cell_padding = $prev_cell_padding; 
  6152.     $this->lasth = $prev_lasth; 
  6153.     return $height; 
  6154. } 
  6155.  
  6156. /** 
  6157.  * This method prints text from the current position.<br /> 
  6158.  * @param $h (float) Line height 
  6159.  * @param $txt (string) String to print 
  6160.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink() 
  6161.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  6162.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L or empty string: left align (default value)</li><li>C: center</li><li>R: right align</li><li>J: justify</li></ul> 
  6163.  * @param $ln (boolean) if true set cursor at the bottom of the line, otherwise set cursor at the top of the line. 
  6164.  * @param $stretch (int) font stretch mode: <ul><li>0 = disabled</li><li>1 = horizontal scaling only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>2 = forced horizontal scaling to fit cell width</li><li>3 = character spacing only if text is larger than cell width</li><li>4 = forced character spacing to fit cell width</li></ul> General font stretching and scaling values will be preserved when possible. 
  6165.  * @param $firstline (boolean) if true prints only the first line and return the remaining string. 
  6166.  * @param $firstblock (boolean) if true the string is the starting of a line. 
  6167.  * @param $maxh (float) maximum height. It should be >= $h and less then remaining space to the bottom of the page, or 0 for disable this feature. 
  6168.  * @param $wadj (float) first line width will be reduced by this amount (used in HTML mode). 
  6169.  * @param $margin (array) margin array of the parent container 
  6170.  * @return mixed Return the number of cells or the remaining string if $firstline = true. 
  6171.  * @public 
  6172.  * @since 1.5 
  6173.  */ 
  6174. public function Write($h, $txt, $link='', $fill=false, $align='', $ln=false, $stretch=0, $firstline=false, $firstblock=false, $maxh=0, $wadj=0, $margin='') { 
  6175.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  6176.     list($this->x, $this->y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $this->x, $this->y); 
  6177.     if (strlen($txt) == 0) { 
  6178.         // fix empty text 
  6179.         $txt = ' '; 
  6180.     } 
  6181.     if ($margin === '') { 
  6182.         // set default margins 
  6183.         $margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  6184.     } 
  6185.     // remove carriage returns 
  6186.     $s = str_replace("\r", '', $txt); 
  6187.     // check if string contains arabic text 
  6188.     if (preg_match(TCPDF_FONT_DATA::$uni_RE_PATTERN_ARABIC, $s)) { 
  6189.         $arabic = true; 
  6190.     } else { 
  6191.         $arabic = false; 
  6192.     } 
  6193.     // check if string contains RTL text 
  6194.     if ($arabic OR ($this->tmprtl == 'R') OR preg_match(TCPDF_FONT_DATA::$uni_RE_PATTERN_RTL, $s)) { 
  6195.         $rtlmode = true; 
  6196.     } else { 
  6197.         $rtlmode = false; 
  6198.     } 
  6199.     // get a char width 
  6200.     $chrwidth = $this->GetCharWidth(46); // dot character 
  6201.     // get array of unicode values 
  6202.     $chars = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($s, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6203.     // calculate maximum width for a single character on string 
  6204.     $chrw = $this->GetArrStringWidth($chars, '', '', 0, true); 
  6205.     array_walk($chrw, array($this, 'getRawCharWidth')); 
  6206.     $maxchwidth = max($chrw); 
  6207.     // get array of chars 
  6208.     $uchars = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrayToUniArray($chars, $this->isunicode); 
  6209.     // get the number of characters 
  6210.     $nb = count($chars); 
  6211.     // replacement for SHY character (minus symbol) 
  6212.     $shy_replacement = 45; 
  6213.     $shy_replacement_char = TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($shy_replacement, $this->isunicode); 
  6214.     // widht for SHY replacement 
  6215.     $shy_replacement_width = $this->GetCharWidth($shy_replacement); 
  6216.     // max Y 
  6217.     $maxy = $this->y + $maxh - $h - $this->cell_padding['T'] - $this->cell_padding['B']; 
  6218.     // page width 
  6219.     $pw = $w = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  6220.     // calculate remaining line width ($w) 
  6221.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6222.         $w = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  6223.     } else { 
  6224.         $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  6225.     } 
  6226.     // max column width 
  6227.     $wmax = ($w - $wadj); 
  6228.     if (!$firstline) { 
  6229.         $wmax -= ($this->cell_padding['L'] + $this->cell_padding['R']); 
  6230.     } 
  6231.     if ((!$firstline) AND (($chrwidth > $wmax) OR ($maxchwidth > $wmax))) { 
  6232.         // the maximum width character do not fit on column 
  6233.         return ''; 
  6234.     } 
  6235.     // minimum row height 
  6236.     $row_height = max($h, $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize)); 
  6237.     $start_page = $this->page; 
  6238.     $i = 0; // character position 
  6239.     $j = 0; // current starting position 
  6240.     $sep = -1; // position of the last blank space 
  6241.     $prevsep = $sep; // previous separator 
  6242.     $shy = false; // true if the last blank is a soft hypen (SHY) 
  6243.     $l = 0; // current string length 
  6244.     $nl = 0; //number of lines 
  6245.     $linebreak = false; 
  6246.     $pc = 0; // previous character 
  6247.     // for each character 
  6248.     while ($i < $nb) { 
  6249.         if (($maxh > 0) AND ($this->y >= $maxy) ) { 
  6250.             break; 
  6251.         } 
  6252.         //Get the current character 
  6253.         $c = $chars[$i]; 
  6254.         if ($c == 10) { // 10 = "\n" = new line 
  6255.             //Explicit line break 
  6256.             if ($align == 'J') { 
  6257.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6258.                     $talign = 'R'; 
  6259.                 } else { 
  6260.                     $talign = 'L'; 
  6261.                 } 
  6262.             } else { 
  6263.                 $talign = $align; 
  6264.             } 
  6265.             $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $i); 
  6266.             if ($firstline) { 
  6267.                 $startx = $this->x; 
  6268.                 $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)); 
  6269.                 if ($rtlmode) { 
  6270.                     $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6271.                 } 
  6272.                 $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6273.                 unset($tmparr); 
  6274.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6275.                     $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew; 
  6276.                 } else { 
  6277.                     $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew; 
  6278.                 } 
  6279.                 $w = $linew; 
  6280.                 $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6281.                 if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6282.                     $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6283.                 } 
  6284.             } 
  6285.             if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6286.                 $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6287.             } 
  6288.             // Skip newlines at the begining of a page or column 
  6289.             if (!empty($tmpstr) OR ($this->y < ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $row_height))) { 
  6290.                 $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, 1, $talign, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6291.             } 
  6292.             unset($tmpstr); 
  6293.             if ($firstline) { 
  6294.                 $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6295.                 return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $i)); 
  6296.             } 
  6297.             ++$nl; 
  6298.             $j = $i + 1; 
  6299.             $l = 0; 
  6300.             $sep = -1; 
  6301.             $prevsep = $sep; 
  6302.             $shy = false; 
  6303.             // account for margin changes 
  6304.             if ((($this->y + $this->lasth) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) AND ($this->inPageBody())) { 
  6305.                 $this->AcceptPageBreak(); 
  6306.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6307.                     $this->x -= $margin['R']; 
  6308.                 } else { 
  6309.                     $this->x += $margin['L']; 
  6310.                 } 
  6311.                 $this->lMargin += $margin['L']; 
  6312.                 $this->rMargin += $margin['R']; 
  6313.             } 
  6314.             $w = $this->getRemainingWidth(); 
  6315.             $wmax = ($w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']); 
  6316.         } else { 
  6317.             // 160 is the non-breaking space. 
  6318.             // 173 is SHY (Soft Hypen). 
  6319.             // \p{Z} or \p{Separator}: any kind of Unicode whitespace or invisible separator. 
  6320.             // \p{Lo} or \p{Other_Letter}: a Unicode letter or ideograph that does not have lowercase and uppercase variants. 
  6321.             // \p{Lo} is needed because Chinese characters are packed next to each other without spaces in between. 
  6322.             if (($c != 160) 
  6323.                 AND (($c == 173) 
  6324.                     OR preg_match($this->re_spaces, TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($c, $this->isunicode)) 
  6325.                     OR (($c == 45) 
  6326.                         AND ($i < ($nb - 1)) 
  6327.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($pc, $this->isunicode)) 
  6328.                         AND @preg_match('/[\p{L}]/'.$this->re_space['m'], TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($chars[($i + 1)], $this->isunicode)) 
  6329.  ) 
  6330.  ) 
  6331.  ) { 
  6332.                 // update last blank space position 
  6333.                 $prevsep = $sep; 
  6334.                 $sep = $i; 
  6335.                 // check if is a SHY 
  6336.                 if (($c == 173) OR ($c == 45)) { 
  6337.                     $shy = true; 
  6338.                     if ($pc == 45) { 
  6339.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_width = 0; 
  6340.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_char = ''; 
  6341.                     } else { 
  6342.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_width = $shy_replacement_width; 
  6343.                         $tmp_shy_replacement_char = $shy_replacement_char; 
  6344.                     } 
  6345.                 } else { 
  6346.                     $shy = false; 
  6347.                 } 
  6348.             } 
  6349.             // update string length 
  6350.             if ($this->isUnicodeFont() AND ($arabic)) { 
  6351.                 // with bidirectional algorithm some chars may be changed affecting the line length 
  6352.                 // *** very slow *** 
  6353.                 $l = $this->GetArrStringWidth(TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi(array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)), '', $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  6354.             } else { 
  6355.                 $l += $this->GetCharWidth($c); 
  6356.             } 
  6357.             if (($l > $wmax) OR (($c == 173) AND (($l + $tmp_shy_replacement_width) >= $wmax))) { 
  6358.                 if (($c == 173) AND (($l + $tmp_shy_replacement_width) > $wmax)) { 
  6359.                     $sep = $prevsep; 
  6360.                 } 
  6361.                 // we have reached the end of column 
  6362.                 if ($sep == -1) { 
  6363.                     // check if the line was already started 
  6364.                     if (($this->rtl AND ($this->x <= ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->cell_padding['R'] - $margin['R'] - $chrwidth))) 
  6365.                         OR ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->x >= ($this->lMargin + $this->cell_padding['L'] + $margin['L'] + $chrwidth)))) { 
  6366.                         // print a void cell and go to next line 
  6367.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, '', 0, 1); 
  6368.                         $linebreak = true; 
  6369.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6370.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j)); 
  6371.                         } 
  6372.                     } else { 
  6373.                         // truncate the word because do not fit on column 
  6374.                         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $i); 
  6375.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6376.                             $startx = $this->x; 
  6377.                             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)); 
  6378.                             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6379.                                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6380.                             } 
  6381.                             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6382.                             unset($tmparr); 
  6383.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6384.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew; 
  6385.                             } else { 
  6386.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew; 
  6387.                             } 
  6388.                             $w = $linew; 
  6389.                             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6390.                             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6391.                                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6392.                             } 
  6393.                         } 
  6394.                         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6395.                             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6396.                         } 
  6397.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, 1, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6398.                         unset($tmpstr); 
  6399.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6400.                             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6401.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $i)); 
  6402.                         } 
  6403.                         $j = $i; 
  6404.                         --$i; 
  6405.                     } 
  6406.                 } else { 
  6407.                     // word wrapping 
  6408.                     if ($this->rtl AND (!$firstblock) AND ($sep < $i)) { 
  6409.                         $endspace = 1; 
  6410.                     } else { 
  6411.                         $endspace = 0; 
  6412.                     } 
  6413.                     // check the length of the next string 
  6414.                     $strrest = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, ($sep + $endspace)); 
  6415.                     $nextstr = TCPDF_STATIC::pregSplit('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'/', $this->re_space['m'], $this->stringTrim($strrest)); 
  6416.                     if (isset($nextstr[0]) AND ($this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[0]) > $pw)) { 
  6417.                         // truncate the word because do not fit on a full page width 
  6418.                         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $i); 
  6419.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6420.                             $startx = $this->x; 
  6421.                             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($i - $j)); 
  6422.                             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6423.                                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6424.                             } 
  6425.                             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6426.                             unset($tmparr); 
  6427.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6428.                                 $this->endlinex = ($startx - $linew); 
  6429.                             } else { 
  6430.                                 $this->endlinex = ($startx + $linew); 
  6431.                             } 
  6432.                             $w = $linew; 
  6433.                             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6434.                             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6435.                                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6436.                             } 
  6437.                         } 
  6438.                         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6439.                             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6440.                         } 
  6441.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, 1, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6442.                         unset($tmpstr); 
  6443.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6444.                             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6445.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $i)); 
  6446.                         } 
  6447.                         $j = $i; 
  6448.                         --$i; 
  6449.                     } else { 
  6450.                         // word wrapping 
  6451.                         if ($shy) { 
  6452.                             // add hypen (minus symbol) at the end of the line 
  6453.                             $shy_width = $tmp_shy_replacement_width; 
  6454.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6455.                                 $shy_char_left = $tmp_shy_replacement_char; 
  6456.                                 $shy_char_right = ''; 
  6457.                             } else { 
  6458.                                 $shy_char_left = ''; 
  6459.                                 $shy_char_right = $tmp_shy_replacement_char; 
  6460.                             } 
  6461.                         } else { 
  6462.                             $shy_width = 0; 
  6463.                             $shy_char_left = ''; 
  6464.                             $shy_char_right = ''; 
  6465.                         } 
  6466.                         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, ($sep + $endspace)); 
  6467.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6468.                             $startx = $this->x; 
  6469.                             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, (($sep + $endspace) - $j)); 
  6470.                             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6471.                                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6472.                             } 
  6473.                             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6474.                             unset($tmparr); 
  6475.                             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6476.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew - $shy_width; 
  6477.                             } else { 
  6478.                                 $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew + $shy_width; 
  6479.                             } 
  6480.                             $w = $linew; 
  6481.                             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6482.                             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6483.                                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6484.                             } 
  6485.                         } 
  6486.                         // print the line 
  6487.                         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6488.                             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6489.                         } 
  6490.                         $this->Cell($w, $h, $shy_char_left.$tmpstr.$shy_char_right, 0, 1, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6491.                         unset($tmpstr); 
  6492.                         if ($firstline) { 
  6493.                             if ($chars[$sep] == 45) { 
  6494.                                 $endspace += 1; 
  6495.                             } 
  6496.                             // return the remaining text 
  6497.                             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6498.                             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, ($sep + $endspace))); 
  6499.                         } 
  6500.                         $i = $sep; 
  6501.                         $sep = -1; 
  6502.                         $shy = false; 
  6503.                         $j = ($i + 1); 
  6504.                     } 
  6505.                 } 
  6506.                 // account for margin changes 
  6507.                 if ((($this->y + $this->lasth) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) AND ($this->inPageBody())) { 
  6508.                     $this->AcceptPageBreak(); 
  6509.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6510.                         $this->x -= $margin['R']; 
  6511.                     } else { 
  6512.                         $this->x += $margin['L']; 
  6513.                     } 
  6514.                     $this->lMargin += $margin['L']; 
  6515.                     $this->rMargin += $margin['R']; 
  6516.                 } 
  6517.                 $w = $this->getRemainingWidth(); 
  6518.                 $wmax = $w - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  6519.                 if ($linebreak) { 
  6520.                     $linebreak = false; 
  6521.                 } else { 
  6522.                     ++$nl; 
  6523.                     $l = 0; 
  6524.                 } 
  6525.             } 
  6526.         } 
  6527.         // save last character 
  6528.         $pc = $c; 
  6529.         ++$i; 
  6530.     } // end while i < nb 
  6531.     // print last substring (if any) 
  6532.     if ($l > 0) { 
  6533.         switch ($align) { 
  6534.             case 'J': 
  6535.             case 'C': { 
  6536.                 $w = $w; 
  6537.                 break; 
  6538.             } 
  6539.             case 'L': { 
  6540.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6541.                     $w = $w; 
  6542.                 } else { 
  6543.                     $w = $l; 
  6544.                 } 
  6545.                 break; 
  6546.             } 
  6547.             case 'R': { 
  6548.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  6549.                     $w = $l; 
  6550.                 } else { 
  6551.                     $w = $w; 
  6552.                 } 
  6553.                 break; 
  6554.             } 
  6555.             default: { 
  6556.                 $w = $l; 
  6557.                 break; 
  6558.             } 
  6559.         } 
  6560.         $tmpstr = TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $j, $nb); 
  6561.         if ($firstline) { 
  6562.             $startx = $this->x; 
  6563.             $tmparr = array_slice($chars, $j, ($nb - $j)); 
  6564.             if ($rtlmode) { 
  6565.                 $tmparr = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi($tmparr, $tmpstr, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  6566.             } 
  6567.             $linew = $this->GetArrStringWidth($tmparr); 
  6568.             unset($tmparr); 
  6569.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  6570.                 $this->endlinex = $startx - $linew; 
  6571.             } else { 
  6572.                 $this->endlinex = $startx + $linew; 
  6573.             } 
  6574.             $w = $linew; 
  6575.             $tmpcellpadding = $this->cell_padding; 
  6576.             if ($maxh == 0) { 
  6577.                 $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  6578.             } 
  6579.         } 
  6580.         if ($firstblock AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  6581.             $tmpstr = $this->stringRightTrim($tmpstr); 
  6582.         } 
  6583.         $this->Cell($w, $h, $tmpstr, 0, $ln, $align, $fill, $link, $stretch); 
  6584.         unset($tmpstr); 
  6585.         if ($firstline) { 
  6586.             $this->cell_padding = $tmpcellpadding; 
  6587.             return (TCPDF_FONTS::UniArrSubString($uchars, $nb)); 
  6588.         } 
  6589.         ++$nl; 
  6590.     } 
  6591.     if ($firstline) { 
  6592.         return ''; 
  6593.     } 
  6594.     return $nl; 
  6595. } 
  6596.  
  6597. /** 
  6598.  * Returns the remaining width between the current position and margins. 
  6599.  * @return int Return the remaining width 
  6600.  * @protected 
  6601.  */ 
  6602. protected function getRemainingWidth() { 
  6603.     list($this->x, $this->y) = $this->checkPageRegions(0, $this->x, $this->y); 
  6604.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6605.         return ($this->x - $this->lMargin); 
  6606.     } else { 
  6607.         return ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x); 
  6608.     } 
  6609. } 
  6610.  
  6611. /** 
  6612.  * Set the block dimensions accounting for page breaks and page/column fitting 
  6613.  * @param $w (float) width 
  6614.  * @param $h (float) height 
  6615.  * @param $x (float) X coordinate 
  6616.  * @param $y (float) Y coodiante 
  6617.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) if true the block is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  6618.  * @return array($w, $h, $x, $y) 
  6619.  * @protected 
  6620.  * @since 5.5.009 (2010-07-05) 
  6621.  */ 
  6622. protected function fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage=false) { 
  6623.     if ($w <= 0) { 
  6624.         // set maximum width 
  6625.         $w = ($this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin); 
  6626.         if ($w <= 0) { 
  6627.             $w = 1; 
  6628.         } 
  6629.     } 
  6630.     if ($h <= 0) { 
  6631.         // set maximum height 
  6632.         $h = ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->tMargin); 
  6633.         if ($h <= 0) { 
  6634.             $h = 1; 
  6635.         } 
  6636.     } 
  6637.     // resize the block to be vertically contained on a single page or single column 
  6638.     if ($fitonpage OR $this->AutoPageBreak) { 
  6639.         $ratio_wh = ($w / $h); 
  6640.         if ($h > ($this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->tMargin)) { 
  6641.             $h = $this->PageBreakTrigger - $this->tMargin; 
  6642.             $w = ($h * $ratio_wh); 
  6643.         } 
  6644.         // resize the block to be horizontally contained on a single page or single column 
  6645.         if ($fitonpage) { 
  6646.             $maxw = ($this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin); 
  6647.             if ($w > $maxw) { 
  6648.                 $w = $maxw; 
  6649.                 $h = ($w / $ratio_wh); 
  6650.             } 
  6651.         } 
  6652.     } 
  6653.     // Check whether we need a new page or new column first as this does not fit 
  6654.     $prev_x = $this->x; 
  6655.     $prev_y = $this->y; 
  6656.     if ($this->checkPageBreak($h, $y) OR ($this->y < $prev_y)) { 
  6657.         $y = $this->y; 
  6658.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  6659.             $x += ($prev_x - $this->x); 
  6660.         } else { 
  6661.             $x += ($this->x - $prev_x); 
  6662.         } 
  6663.         $this->newline = true; 
  6664.     } 
  6665.     // resize the block to be contained on the remaining available page or column space 
  6666.     if ($fitonpage) { 
  6667.         $ratio_wh = ($w / $h); 
  6668.         if (($y + $h) > $this->PageBreakTrigger) { 
  6669.             $h = $this->PageBreakTrigger - $y; 
  6670.             $w = ($h * $ratio_wh); 
  6671.         } 
  6672.         if ((!$this->rtl) AND (($x + $w) > ($this->w - $this->rMargin))) { 
  6673.             $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $x; 
  6674.             $h = ($w / $ratio_wh); 
  6675.         } elseif (($this->rtl) AND (($x - $w) < ($this->lMargin))) { 
  6676.             $w = $x - $this->lMargin; 
  6677.             $h = ($w / $ratio_wh); 
  6678.         } 
  6679.     } 
  6680.     return array($w, $h, $x, $y); 
  6681. } 
  6682.  
  6683. /** 
  6684.  * Puts an image in the page. 
  6685.  * The upper-left corner must be given. 
  6686.  * The dimensions can be specified in different ways:<ul> 
  6687.  * <li>explicit width and height (expressed in user unit)</li> 
  6688.  * <li>one explicit dimension, the other being calculated automatically in order to keep the original proportions</li> 
  6689.  * <li>no explicit dimension, in which case the image is put at 72 dpi</li></ul> 
  6690.  * Supported formats are JPEG and PNG images whitout GD library and all images supported by GD: GD, GD2, GD2PART, GIF, JPEG, PNG, BMP, XBM, XPM; 
  6691.  * The format can be specified explicitly or inferred from the file extension.<br /> 
  6692.  * It is possible to put a link on the image.<br /> 
  6693.  * Remark: if an image is used several times, only one copy will be embedded in the file.<br /> 
  6694.  * @param $file (string) Name of the file containing the image or a '@' character followed by the image data string. To link an image without embedding it on the document, set an asterisk character before the URL (i.e.: '*http://www.example.com/image.jpg'). 
  6695.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner (LTR) or upper-right corner (RTL). 
  6696.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner (LTR) or upper-right corner (RTL). 
  6697.  * @param $w (float) Width of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  6698.  * @param $h (float) Height of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  6699.  * @param $type (string) Image format. Possible values are (case insensitive): JPEG and PNG (whitout GD library) and all images supported by GD: GD, GD2, GD2PART, GIF, JPEG, PNG, BMP, XBM, XPM;. If not specified, the type is inferred from the file extension. 
  6700.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  6701.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to image insertion relative to image height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> 
  6702.  * @param $resize (mixed) If true resize (reduce) the image to fit $w and $h (requires GD or ImageMagick library); if false do not resize; if 2 force resize in all cases (upscaling and downscaling). 
  6703.  * @param $dpi (int) dot-per-inch resolution used on resize 
  6704.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the image on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  6705.  * @param $ismask (boolean) true if this image is a mask, false otherwise 
  6706.  * @param $imgmask (mixed) image object returned by this function or false 
  6707.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  6708.  * @param $fitbox (mixed) If not false scale image dimensions proportionally to fit within the ($w, $h) box. $fitbox can be true or a 2 characters string indicating the image alignment inside the box. The first character indicate the horizontal alignment (L = left, C = center, R = right) the second character indicate the vertical algnment (T = top, M = middle, B = bottom). 
  6709.  * @param $hidden (boolean) If true do not display the image. 
  6710.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) If true the image is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  6711.  * @param $alt (boolean) If true the image will be added as alternative and not directly printed (the ID of the image will be returned). 
  6712.  * @param $altimgs (array) Array of alternate images IDs. Each alternative image must be an array with two values: an integer representing the image ID (the value returned by the Image method) and a boolean value to indicate if the image is the default for printing. 
  6713.  * @return image information 
  6714.  * @public 
  6715.  * @since 1.1 
  6716.  */ 
  6717. public function Image($file, $x='', $y='', $w=0, $h=0, $type='', $link='', $align='', $resize=false, $dpi=300, $palign='', $ismask=false, $imgmask=false, $border=0, $fitbox=false, $hidden=false, $fitonpage=false, $alt=false, $altimgs=array()) { 
  6718.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  6719.         return; 
  6720.     } 
  6721.     if ($x === '') { 
  6722.         $x = $this->x;
