  6723.     } 
  6724.     if ($y === '') { 
  6725.         $y = $this->y; 
  6726.     } 
  6727.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  6728.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  6729.     $exurl = ''; // external streams 
  6730.     $imsize = FALSE; 
  6731.     // check if we are passing an image as file or string 
  6732.     if ($file[0] === '@') { 
  6733.         // image from string 
  6734.         $imgdata = substr($file, 1); 
  6735.     } else { // image file 
  6736.         if ($file[0] === '*') { 
  6737.             // image as external stream 
  6738.             $file = substr($file, 1); 
  6739.             $exurl = $file; 
  6740.         } 
  6741.         // check if is a local file 
  6742.         if (!@file_exists($file)) { 
  6743.             // try to encode spaces on filename 
  6744.             $tfile = str_replace(' ', '%20', $file); 
  6745.             if (@file_exists($tfile)) { 
  6746.                 $file = $tfile; 
  6747.             } 
  6748.         } 
  6749.         if (($imsize = @getimagesize($file)) === FALSE) { 
  6750.             if (in_array($file, $this->imagekeys)) { 
  6751.                 // get existing image data 
  6752.                 $info = $this->getImageBuffer($file); 
  6753.                 $imsize = array($info['w'], $info['h']);                 
  6754.             } elseif (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_img') === FALSE) { 
  6755.                 $imgdata = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($file); 
  6756.             } 
  6757.         } 
  6758.     } 
  6759.     if (!empty($imgdata)) { 
  6760.         // copy image to cache 
  6761.         $original_file = $file; 
  6762.         $file = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('img'); 
  6763.         $fp = fopen($file, 'w'); 
  6764.         if (!$fp) { 
  6765.             $this->Error('Unable to write file: '.$file); 
  6766.         } 
  6767.         fwrite($fp, $imgdata); 
  6768.         fclose($fp); 
  6769.         unset($imgdata); 
  6770.         $imsize = @getimagesize($file); 
  6771.         if ($imsize === FALSE) { 
  6772.             unlink($file); 
  6773.             $file = $original_file; 
  6774.         } else { 
  6775.             $this->cached_files[] = $file; 
  6776.         } 
  6777.     } 
  6778.     if ($imsize === FALSE) { 
  6779.         if (($w > 0) AND ($h > 0)) { 
  6780.             // get measures from specified data 
  6781.             $pw = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($w, 0, $this->pdfunit, true) * $this->imgscale * $this->k; 
  6782.             $ph = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($h, 0, $this->pdfunit, true) * $this->imgscale * $this->k; 
  6783.             $imsize = array($pw, $ph); 
  6784.         } else { 
  6785.             $this->Error('[Image] Unable to get the size of the image: '.$file); 
  6786.         } 
  6787.     } 
  6788.     // file hash 
  6789.     $filehash = md5($this->file_id.$file); 
  6790.     // get original image width and height in pixels 
  6791.     list($pixw, $pixh) = $imsize; 
  6792.     // calculate image width and height on document 
  6793.     if (($w <= 0) AND ($h <= 0)) { 
  6794.         // convert image size to document unit 
  6795.         $w = $this->pixelsToUnits($pixw); 
  6796.         $h = $this->pixelsToUnits($pixh); 
  6797.     } elseif ($w <= 0) { 
  6798.         $w = $h * $pixw / $pixh; 
  6799.     } elseif ($h <= 0) { 
  6800.         $h = $w * $pixh / $pixw; 
  6801.     } elseif (($fitbox !== false) AND ($w > 0) AND ($h > 0)) { 
  6802.         if (strlen($fitbox) !== 2) { 
  6803.             // set default alignment 
  6804.             $fitbox = '--'; 
  6805.         } 
  6806.         // scale image dimensions proportionally to fit within the ($w, $h) box 
  6807.         if ((($w * $pixh) / ($h * $pixw)) < 1) { 
  6808.             // store current height 
  6809.             $oldh = $h; 
  6810.             // calculate new height 
  6811.             $h = $w * $pixh / $pixw; 
  6812.             // height difference 
  6813.             $hdiff = ($oldh - $h); 
  6814.             // vertical alignment 
  6815.             switch (strtoupper($fitbox[1])) { 
  6816.                 case 'T': { 
  6817.                     break; 
  6818.                 } 
  6819.                 case 'M': { 
  6820.                     $y += ($hdiff / 2); 
  6821.                     break; 
  6822.                 } 
  6823.                 case 'B': { 
  6824.                     $y += $hdiff; 
  6825.                     break; 
  6826.                 } 
  6827.             } 
  6828.         } else { 
  6829.             // store current width 
  6830.             $oldw = $w; 
  6831.             // calculate new width 
  6832.             $w = $h * $pixw / $pixh; 
  6833.             // width difference 
  6834.             $wdiff = ($oldw - $w); 
  6835.             // horizontal alignment 
  6836.             switch (strtoupper($fitbox[0])) { 
  6837.                 case 'L': { 
  6838.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6839.                         $x -= $wdiff; 
  6840.                     } 
  6841.                     break; 
  6842.                 } 
  6843.                 case 'C': { 
  6844.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  6845.                         $x -= ($wdiff / 2); 
  6846.                     } else { 
  6847.                         $x += ($wdiff / 2); 
  6848.                     } 
  6849.                     break; 
  6850.                 } 
  6851.                 case 'R': { 
  6852.                     if (!$this->rtl) { 
  6853.                         $x += $wdiff; 
  6854.                     } 
  6855.                     break; 
  6856.                 } 
  6857.             } 
  6858.         } 
  6859.     } 
  6860.     // fit the image on available space 
  6861.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage); 
  6862.     // calculate new minimum dimensions in pixels 
  6863.     $neww = round($w * $this->k * $dpi / $this->dpi); 
  6864.     $newh = round($h * $this->k * $dpi / $this->dpi); 
  6865.     // check if resize is necessary (resize is used only to reduce the image) 
  6866.     $newsize = ($neww * $newh); 
  6867.     $pixsize = ($pixw * $pixh); 
  6868.     if (intval($resize) == 2) { 
  6869.         $resize = true; 
  6870.     } elseif ($newsize >= $pixsize) { 
  6871.         $resize = false; 
  6872.     } 
  6873.     // check if image has been already added on document 
  6874.     $newimage = true; 
  6875.     if (in_array($file, $this->imagekeys)) { 
  6876.         $newimage = false; 
  6877.         // get existing image data 
  6878.         $info = $this->getImageBuffer($file); 
  6879.         if (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_imgmask_') === FALSE) { 
  6880.             // check if the newer image is larger 
  6881.             $oldsize = ($info['w'] * $info['h']); 
  6882.             if ((($oldsize < $newsize) AND ($resize)) OR (($oldsize < $pixsize) AND (!$resize))) { 
  6883.                 $newimage = true; 
  6884.             } 
  6885.         } 
  6886.     } elseif (($ismask === false) AND ($imgmask === false) AND (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_imgmask_') === FALSE)) { 
  6887.         // create temp image file (without alpha channel) 
  6888.         $tempfile_plain = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_plain_'.$filehash; 
  6889.         // create temp alpha file 
  6890.         $tempfile_alpha = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_alpha_'.$filehash; 
  6891.         // check for cached images 
  6892.         if (in_array($tempfile_plain, $this->imagekeys)) { 
  6893.             // get existing image data 
  6894.             $info = $this->getImageBuffer($tempfile_plain); 
  6895.             // check if the newer image is larger 
  6896.             $oldsize = ($info['w'] * $info['h']); 
  6897.             if ((($oldsize < $newsize) AND ($resize)) OR (($oldsize < $pixsize) AND (!$resize))) { 
  6898.                 $newimage = true; 
  6899.             } else { 
  6900.                 $newimage = false; 
  6901.                 // embed mask image 
  6902.                 $imgmask = $this->Image($tempfile_alpha, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'PNG', '', '', $resize, $dpi, '', true, false); 
  6903.                 // embed image, masked with previously embedded mask 
  6904.                 return $this->Image($tempfile_plain, $x, $y, $w, $h, $type, $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, false, $imgmask); 
  6905.             } 
  6906.         } 
  6907.     } 
  6908.     if ($newimage) { 
  6909.         //First use of image, get info 
  6910.         $type = strtolower($type); 
  6911.         if ($type == '') { 
  6912.             $type = TCPDF_IMAGES::getImageFileType($file, $imsize); 
  6913.         } elseif ($type == 'jpg') { 
  6914.             $type = 'jpeg'; 
  6915.         } 
  6916.         $mqr = TCPDF_STATIC::get_mqr(); 
  6917.         TCPDF_STATIC::set_mqr(false); 
  6918.         // Specific image handlers (defined on TCPDF_IMAGES CLASS) 
  6919.         $mtd = '_parse'.$type; 
  6920.         // GD image handler function 
  6921.         $gdfunction = 'imagecreatefrom'.$type; 
  6922.         $info = false; 
  6923.         if ((method_exists('TCPDF_IMAGES', $mtd)) AND (!($resize AND (function_exists($gdfunction) OR extension_loaded('imagick'))))) { 
  6924.             // TCPDF image functions 
  6925.             $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::$mtd($file); 
  6926.             if (($ismask === false) AND ($imgmask === false) AND (strpos($file, '__tcpdf_imgmask_') === FALSE) 
  6927.                 AND (($info === 'pngalpha') OR (isset($info['trns']) AND !empty($info['trns'])))) { 
  6928.                 return $this->ImagePngAlpha($file, $x, $y, $pixw, $pixh, $w, $h, 'PNG', $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, $filehash); 
  6929.             } 
  6930.         } 
  6931.         if (($info === false) AND function_exists($gdfunction)) { 
  6932.             try { 
  6933.                 // GD library 
  6934.                 $img = $gdfunction($file); 
  6935.                 if ($img !== false) { 
  6936.                     if ($resize) { 
  6937.                         $imgr = imagecreatetruecolor($neww, $newh); 
  6938.                         if (($type == 'gif') OR ($type == 'png')) { 
  6939.                             $imgr = TCPDF_IMAGES::setGDImageTransparency($imgr, $img); 
  6940.                         } 
  6941.                         imagecopyresampled($imgr, $img, 0, 0, 0, 0, $neww, $newh, $pixw, $pixh); 
  6942.                         $img = $imgr; 
  6943.                     } 
  6944.                     if (($type == 'gif') OR ($type == 'png')) { 
  6945.                         $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::_toPNG($img); 
  6946.                     } else { 
  6947.                         $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::_toJPEG($img, $this->jpeg_quality); 
  6948.                     } 
  6949.                 } 
  6950.             } catch(Exception $e) { 
  6951.                 $info = false; 
  6952.             } 
  6953.         } 
  6954.         if (($info === false) AND extension_loaded('imagick')) { 
  6955.             try { 
  6956.                 // ImageMagick library 
  6957.                 $img = new Imagick(); 
  6958.                 if ($type == 'SVG') { 
  6959.                     // get SVG file content 
  6960.                     $svgimg = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($file); 
  6961.                     if ($svgimg !== FALSE) { 
  6962.                         // get width and height 
  6963.                         $regs = array(); 
  6964.                         if (preg_match('/<svg([^\>]*)>/si', $svgimg, $regs)) { 
  6965.                             $svgtag = $regs[1]; 
  6966.                             $tmp = array(); 
  6967.                             if (preg_match('/[\s]+width[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $svgtag, $tmp)) { 
  6968.                                 $ow = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  6969.                                 $owu = sprintf('%F', ($ow * $dpi / 72)).$this->pdfunit; 
  6970.                                 $svgtag = preg_replace('/[\s]+width[\s]*=[\s]*"[^"]*"/si', ' width="'.$owu.'"', $svgtag, 1); 
  6971.                             } else { 
  6972.                                 $ow = $w; 
  6973.                             } 
  6974.                             $tmp = array(); 
  6975.                             if (preg_match('/[\s]+height[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $svgtag, $tmp)) { 
  6976.                                 $oh = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  6977.                                 $ohu = sprintf('%F', ($oh * $dpi / 72)).$this->pdfunit; 
  6978.                                 $svgtag = preg_replace('/[\s]+height[\s]*=[\s]*"[^"]*"/si', ' height="'.$ohu.'"', $svgtag, 1); 
  6979.                             } else { 
  6980.                                 $oh = $h; 
  6981.                             } 
  6982.                             $tmp = array(); 
  6983.                             if (!preg_match('/[\s]+viewBox[\s]*=[\s]*"[\s]*([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]*"/si', $svgtag, $tmp)) { 
  6984.                                 $vbw = ($ow * $this->imgscale * $this->k); 
  6985.                                 $vbh = ($oh * $this->imgscale * $this->k); 
  6986.                                 $vbox = sprintf(' viewBox="0 0 %F %F" ', $vbw, $vbh); 
  6987.                                 $svgtag = $vbox.$svgtag; 
  6988.                             } 
  6989.                             $svgimg = preg_replace('/<svg([^\>]*)>/si', '<svg'.$svgtag.'>', $svgimg, 1); 
  6990.                         } 
  6991.                         $img->readImageBlob($svgimg); 
  6992.                     } 
  6993.                 } else { 
  6994.                     $img->readImage($file); 
  6995.                 } 
  6996.                 if ($resize) { 
  6997.                     $img->resizeImage($neww, $newh, 10, 1, false); 
  6998.                 } 
  6999.                 $img->setCompressionQuality($this->jpeg_quality); 
  7000.                 $img->setImageFormat('jpeg'); 
  7001.                 $tempname = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('img'); 
  7002.                 $img->writeImage($tempname); 
  7003.                 $info = TCPDF_IMAGES::_parsejpeg($tempname); 
  7004.                 unlink($tempname); 
  7005.                 $img->destroy(); 
  7006.             } catch(Exception $e) { 
  7007.                 $info = false; 
  7008.             } 
  7009.         } 
  7010.         if ($info === false) { 
  7011.             // unable to process image 
  7012.             return; 
  7013.         } 
  7014.         TCPDF_STATIC::set_mqr($mqr); 
  7015.         if ($ismask) { 
  7016.             // force grayscale 
  7017.             $info['cs'] = 'DeviceGray'; 
  7018.         } 
  7019.         if ($imgmask !== false) { 
  7020.             $info['masked'] = $imgmask; 
  7021.         } 
  7022.         if (!empty($exurl)) { 
  7023.             $info['exurl'] = $exurl; 
  7024.         } 
  7025.         // array of alternative images 
  7026.         $info['altimgs'] = $altimgs; 
  7027.         // add image to document 
  7028.         $info['i'] = $this->setImageBuffer($file, $info); 
  7029.     } 
  7030.     // set alignment 
  7031.     $this->img_rb_y = $y + $h; 
  7032.     // set alignment 
  7033.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  7034.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  7035.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  7036.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  7037.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  7038.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  7039.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  7040.         } else { 
  7041.             $ximg = $x - $w; 
  7042.         } 
  7043.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg; 
  7044.     } else { 
  7045.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  7046.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  7047.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  7048.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  7049.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  7050.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  7051.         } else { 
  7052.             $ximg = $x; 
  7053.         } 
  7054.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg + $w; 
  7055.     } 
  7056.     if ($ismask OR $hidden) { 
  7057.         // image is not displayed 
  7058.         return $info['i']; 
  7059.     } 
  7060.     $xkimg = $ximg * $this->k; 
  7061.     if (!$alt) { 
  7062.         // only non-alternative immages will be set 
  7063.         $this->_out(sprintf('q %F 0 0 %F %F %F cm /I%u Do Q', ($w * $this->k), ($h * $this->k), $xkimg, (($this->h - ($y + $h)) * $this->k), $info['i'])); 
  7064.     } 
  7065.     if (!empty($border)) { 
  7066.         $bx = $this->x; 
  7067.         $by = $this->y; 
  7068.         $this->x = $ximg; 
  7069.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  7070.             $this->x += $w; 
  7071.         } 
  7072.         $this->y = $y; 
  7073.         $this->Cell($w, $h, '', $border, 0, '', 0, '', 0, true); 
  7074.         $this->x = $bx; 
  7075.         $this->y = $by; 
  7076.     } 
  7077.     if ($link) { 
  7078.         $this->Link($ximg, $y, $w, $h, $link, 0); 
  7079.     } 
  7080.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  7081.     switch($align) { 
  7082.         case 'T': { 
  7083.             $this->y = $y; 
  7084.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7085.             break; 
  7086.         } 
  7087.         case 'M': { 
  7088.             $this->y = $y + round($h/2); 
  7089.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7090.             break; 
  7091.         } 
  7092.         case 'B': { 
  7093.             $this->y = $this->img_rb_y; 
  7094.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7095.             break; 
  7096.         } 
  7097.         case 'N': { 
  7098.             $this->SetY($this->img_rb_y); 
  7099.             break; 
  7100.         } 
  7101.         default:{ 
  7102.             break; 
  7103.         } 
  7104.     } 
  7105.     $this->endlinex = $this->img_rb_x; 
  7106.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  7107.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  7108.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['images'][] = $info['i']; 
  7109.     } 
  7110.     return $info['i']; 
  7111. } 
  7112.  
  7113. /** 
  7114.  * Extract info from a PNG image with alpha channel using the Imagick or GD library. 
  7115.  * @param $file (string) Name of the file containing the image. 
  7116.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  7117.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  7118.  * @param $wpx (float) Original width of the image in pixels. 
  7119.  * @param $hpx (float) original height of the image in pixels. 
  7120.  * @param $w (float) Width of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  7121.  * @param $h (float) Height of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  7122.  * @param $type (string) Image format. Possible values are (case insensitive): JPEG and PNG (whitout GD library) and all images supported by GD: GD, GD2, GD2PART, GIF, JPEG, PNG, BMP, XBM, XPM;. If not specified, the type is inferred from the file extension. 
  7123.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  7124.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to image insertion relative to image height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> 
  7125.  * @param $resize (boolean) If true resize (reduce) the image to fit $w and $h (requires GD library). 
  7126.  * @param $dpi (int) dot-per-inch resolution used on resize 
  7127.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the image on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  7128.  * @param $filehash (string) File hash used to build unique file names. 
  7129.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  7130.  * @protected 
  7131.  * @since 4.3.007 (2008-12-04) 
  7132.  * @see Image() 
  7133.  */ 
  7134. protected function ImagePngAlpha($file, $x, $y, $wpx, $hpx, $w, $h, $type, $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, $filehash='') { 
  7135.     // create temp images 
  7136.     if (empty($filehash)) { 
  7137.         $filehash = md5($this->file_id.$file); 
  7138.     } 
  7139.     // create temp image file (without alpha channel) 
  7140.     $tempfile_plain = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_plain_'.$filehash; 
  7141.     // create temp alpha file 
  7142.     $tempfile_alpha = K_PATH_CACHE.'__tcpdf_imgmask_alpha_'.$filehash; 
  7143.     $parsed = false; 
  7144.     $parse_error = ''; 
  7145.     // ImageMagick extension 
  7146.     if (($parsed === false) AND extension_loaded('imagick')) { 
  7147.         try { 
  7148.             // ImageMagick library 
  7149.             $img = new Imagick(); 
  7150.             $img->readImage($file); 
  7151.             // clone image object 
  7152.             $imga = TCPDF_STATIC::objclone($img); 
  7153.             // extract alpha channel 
  7154.             if (method_exists($img, 'setImageAlphaChannel') AND defined('Imagick::ALPHACHANNEL_EXTRACT')) { 
  7155.                 $img->setImageAlphaChannel(Imagick::ALPHACHANNEL_EXTRACT); 
  7156.             } else { 
  7157.                 $img->separateImageChannel(8); // 8 = (imagick::CHANNEL_ALPHA | imagick::CHANNEL_OPACITY | imagick::CHANNEL_MATTE); 
  7158.                 $img->negateImage(true); 
  7159.             } 
  7160.             $img->setImageFormat('png'); 
  7161.             $img->writeImage($tempfile_alpha); 
  7162.             // remove alpha channel 
  7163.             if (method_exists($imga, 'setImageMatte')) { 
  7164.                 $imga->setImageMatte(false); 
  7165.             } else { 
  7166.                 $imga->separateImageChannel(39); // 39 = (imagick::CHANNEL_ALL & ~(imagick::CHANNEL_ALPHA | imagick::CHANNEL_OPACITY | imagick::CHANNEL_MATTE)); 
  7167.             } 
  7168.             $imga->setImageFormat('png'); 
  7169.             $imga->writeImage($tempfile_plain); 
  7170.             $parsed = true; 
  7171.         } catch (Exception $e) { 
  7172.             // Imagemagick fails, try with GD 
  7173.             $parse_error = 'Imagick library error: '.$e->getMessage(); 
  7174.         } 
  7175.     } 
  7176.     // GD extension 
  7177.     if (($parsed === false) AND function_exists('imagecreatefrompng')) { 
  7178.         try { 
  7179.             // generate images 
  7180.             $img = imagecreatefrompng($file); 
  7181.             $imgalpha = imagecreate($wpx, $hpx); 
  7182.             // generate gray scale palette (0 -> 255) 
  7183.             for ($c = 0; $c < 256; ++$c) { 
  7184.                 ImageColorAllocate($imgalpha, $c, $c, $c); 
  7185.             } 
  7186.             // extract alpha channel 
  7187.             for ($xpx = 0; $xpx < $wpx; ++$xpx) { 
  7188.                 for ($ypx = 0; $ypx < $hpx; ++$ypx) { 
  7189.                     $color = imagecolorat($img, $xpx, $ypx); 
  7190.                     // get and correct gamma color 
  7191.                     $alpha = $this->getGDgamma($img, $color); 
  7192.                     imagesetpixel($imgalpha, $xpx, $ypx, $alpha); 
  7193.                 } 
  7194.             } 
  7195.             imagepng($imgalpha, $tempfile_alpha); 
  7196.             imagedestroy($imgalpha); 
  7197.             // extract image without alpha channel 
  7198.             $imgplain = imagecreatetruecolor($wpx, $hpx); 
  7199.             imagecopy($imgplain, $img, 0, 0, 0, 0, $wpx, $hpx); 
  7200.             imagepng($imgplain, $tempfile_plain); 
  7201.             imagedestroy($imgplain); 
  7202.             $parsed = true; 
  7203.         } catch (Exception $e) { 
  7204.             // GD fails 
  7205.             $parse_error = 'GD library error: '.$e->getMessage(); 
  7206.         } 
  7207.     } 
  7208.     if ($parsed === false) { 
  7209.         if (empty($parse_error)) { 
  7210.             $this->Error('TCPDF requires the Imagick or GD extension to handle PNG images with alpha channel.'); 
  7211.         } else { 
  7212.             $this->Error($parse_error); 
  7213.         } 
  7214.     } 
  7215.     // embed mask image 
  7216.     $imgmask = $this->Image($tempfile_alpha, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'PNG', '', '', $resize, $dpi, '', true, false); 
  7217.     // embed image, masked with previously embedded mask 
  7218.     $this->Image($tempfile_plain, $x, $y, $w, $h, $type, $link, $align, $resize, $dpi, $palign, false, $imgmask); 
  7219.     // remove temp files 
  7220.     unlink($tempfile_alpha); 
  7221.     unlink($tempfile_plain); 
  7222. } 
  7223.  
  7224. /** 
  7225.  * Get the GD-corrected PNG gamma value from alpha color 
  7226.  * @param $img (int) GD image Resource ID. 
  7227.  * @param $c (int) alpha color 
  7228.  * @protected 
  7229.  * @since 4.3.007 (2008-12-04) 
  7230.  */ 
  7231. protected function getGDgamma($img, $c) { 
  7232.     if (!isset($this->gdgammacache['#'.$c])) { 
  7233.         $colors = imagecolorsforindex($img, $c); 
  7234.         // GD alpha is only 7 bit (0 -> 127) 
  7235.         $this->gdgammacache['#'.$c] = (((127 - $colors['alpha']) / 127) * 255); 
  7236.         // correct gamma 
  7237.         $this->gdgammacache['#'.$c] = (pow(($this->gdgammacache['#'.$c] / 255), 2.2) * 255); 
  7238.         // store the latest values on cache to improve performances 
  7239.         if (count($this->gdgammacache) > 8) { 
  7240.             // remove one element from the cache array 
  7241.             array_shift($this->gdgammacache); 
  7242.         } 
  7243.     } 
  7244.     return $this->gdgammacache['#'.$c]; 
  7245. } 
  7246.  
  7247. /** 
  7248.  * Performs a line break. 
  7249.  * The current abscissa goes back to the left margin and the ordinate increases by the amount passed in parameter. 
  7250.  * @param $h (float) The height of the break. By default, the value equals the height of the last printed cell. 
  7251.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the current left (or right o for RTL) padding to the X coordinate 
  7252.  * @public 
  7253.  * @since 1.0 
  7254.  * @see Cell() 
  7255.  */ 
  7256. public function Ln($h='', $cell=false) { 
  7257.     if (($this->num_columns > 1) AND ($this->y == $this->columns[$this->current_column]['y']) AND isset($this->columns[$this->current_column]['x']) AND ($this->x == $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x'])) { 
  7258.         // revove vertical space from the top of the column 
  7259.         return; 
  7260.     } 
  7261.     if ($cell) { 
  7262.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  7263.             $cellpadding = $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  7264.         } else { 
  7265.             $cellpadding = $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  7266.         } 
  7267.     } else { 
  7268.         $cellpadding = 0; 
  7269.     } 
  7270.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  7271.         $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $cellpadding; 
  7272.     } else { 
  7273.         $this->x = $this->lMargin + $cellpadding; 
  7274.     } 
  7275.     if (is_string($h)) { 
  7276.         $this->y += $this->lasth; 
  7277.     } else { 
  7278.         $this->y += $h; 
  7279.     } 
  7280.     $this->newline = true; 
  7281. } 
  7282.  
  7283. /** 
  7284.  * Returns the relative X value of current position. 
  7285.  * The value is relative to the left border for LTR languages and to the right border for RTL languages. 
  7286.  * @return float 
  7287.  * @public 
  7288.  * @since 1.2 
  7289.  * @see SetX(), GetY(), SetY() 
  7290.  */ 
  7291. public function GetX() { 
  7292.     //Get x position 
  7293.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  7294.         return ($this->w - $this->x); 
  7295.     } else { 
  7296.         return $this->x; 
  7297.     } 
  7298. } 
  7299.  
  7300. /** 
  7301.  * Returns the absolute X value of current position. 
  7302.  * @return float 
  7303.  * @public 
  7304.  * @since 1.2 
  7305.  * @see SetX(), GetY(), SetY() 
  7306.  */ 
  7307. public function GetAbsX() { 
  7308.     return $this->x; 
  7309. } 
  7310.  
  7311. /** 
  7312.  * Returns the ordinate of the current position. 
  7313.  * @return float 
  7314.  * @public 
  7315.  * @since 1.0 
  7316.  * @see SetY(), GetX(), SetX() 
  7317.  */ 
  7318. public function GetY() { 
  7319.     return $this->y; 
  7320. } 
  7321.  
  7322. /** 
  7323.  * Defines the abscissa of the current position. 
  7324.  * If the passed value is negative, it is relative to the right of the page (or left if language is RTL). 
  7325.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa in user units. 
  7326.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true always uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis. 
  7327.  * @public 
  7328.  * @since 1.2 
  7329.  * @see GetX(), GetY(), SetY(), SetXY() 
  7330.  */ 
  7331. public function SetX($x, $rtloff=false) { 
  7332.     $x = floatval($x); 
  7333.     if (!$rtloff AND $this->rtl) { 
  7334.         if ($x >= 0) { 
  7335.             $this->x = $this->w - $x; 
  7336.         } else { 
  7337.             $this->x = abs($x); 
  7338.         } 
  7339.     } else { 
  7340.         if ($x >= 0) { 
  7341.             $this->x = $x; 
  7342.         } else { 
  7343.             $this->x = $this->w + $x; 
  7344.         } 
  7345.     } 
  7346.     if ($this->x < 0) { 
  7347.         $this->x = 0; 
  7348.     } 
  7349.     if ($this->x > $this->w) { 
  7350.         $this->x = $this->w; 
  7351.     } 
  7352. } 
  7353.  
  7354. /** 
  7355.  * Moves the current abscissa back to the left margin and sets the ordinate. 
  7356.  * If the passed value is negative, it is relative to the bottom of the page. 
  7357.  * @param $y (float) The value of the ordinate in user units. 
  7358.  * @param $resetx (bool) if true (default) reset the X position. 
  7359.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true always uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis. 
  7360.  * @public 
  7361.  * @since 1.0 
  7362.  * @see GetX(), GetY(), SetY(), SetXY() 
  7363.  */ 
  7364. public function SetY($y, $resetx=true, $rtloff=false) { 
  7365.     $y = floatval($y); 
  7366.     if ($resetx) { 
  7367.         //reset x 
  7368.         if (!$rtloff AND $this->rtl) { 
  7369.             $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  7370.         } else { 
  7371.             $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  7372.         } 
  7373.     } 
  7374.     if ($y >= 0) { 
  7375.         $this->y = $y; 
  7376.     } else { 
  7377.         $this->y = $this->h + $y; 
  7378.     } 
  7379.     if ($this->y < 0) { 
  7380.         $this->y = 0; 
  7381.     } 
  7382.     if ($this->y > $this->h) { 
  7383.         $this->y = $this->h; 
  7384.     } 
  7385. } 
  7386.  
  7387. /** 
  7388.  * Defines the abscissa and ordinate of the current position. 
  7389.  * If the passed values are negative, they are relative respectively to the right and bottom of the page. 
  7390.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa. 
  7391.  * @param $y (float) The value of the ordinate. 
  7392.  * @param $rtloff (boolean) if true always uses the page top-left corner as origin of axis. 
  7393.  * @public 
  7394.  * @since 1.2 
  7395.  * @see SetX(), SetY() 
  7396.  */ 
  7397. public function SetXY($x, $y, $rtloff=false) { 
  7398.     $this->SetY($y, false, $rtloff); 
  7399.     $this->SetX($x, $rtloff); 
  7400. } 
  7401.  
  7402. /** 
  7403.  * Set the absolute X coordinate of the current pointer. 
  7404.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa in user units. 
  7405.  * @public 
  7406.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  7407.  * @see setAbsX(), setAbsY(), SetAbsXY() 
  7408.  */ 
  7409. public function SetAbsX($x) { 
  7410.     $this->x = floatval($x); 
  7411. } 
  7412.  
  7413. /** 
  7414.  * Set the absolute Y coordinate of the current pointer. 
  7415.  * @param $y (float) (float) The value of the ordinate in user units. 
  7416.  * @public 
  7417.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  7418.  * @see setAbsX(), setAbsY(), SetAbsXY() 
  7419.  */ 
  7420. public function SetAbsY($y) { 
  7421.     $this->y = floatval($y); 
  7422. } 
  7423.  
  7424. /** 
  7425.  * Set the absolute X and Y coordinates of the current pointer. 
  7426.  * @param $x (float) The value of the abscissa in user units. 
  7427.  * @param $y (float) (float) The value of the ordinate in user units. 
  7428.  * @public 
  7429.  * @since 5.9.186 (2012-09-13) 
  7430.  * @see setAbsX(), setAbsY(), SetAbsXY() 
  7431.  */ 
  7432. public function SetAbsXY($x, $y) { 
  7433.     $this->SetAbsX($x); 
  7434.     $this->SetAbsY($y); 
  7435. } 
  7436.  
  7437. /** 
  7438.  * Send the document to a given destination: string, local file or browser. 
  7439.  * In the last case, the plug-in may be used (if present) or a download ("Save as" dialog box) may be forced.<br /> 
  7440.  * The method first calls Close() if necessary to terminate the document. 
  7441.  * @param $name (string) The name of the file when saved. Note that special characters are removed and blanks characters are replaced with the underscore character. 
  7442.  * @param $dest (string) Destination where to send the document. It can take one of the following values:<ul><li>I: send the file inline to the browser (default). The plug-in is used if available. The name given by name is used when one selects the "Save as" option on the link generating the PDF.</li><li>D: send to the browser and force a file download with the name given by name.</li><li>F: save to a local server file with the name given by name.</li><li>S: return the document as a string (name is ignored).</li><li>FI: equivalent to F + I option</li><li>FD: equivalent to F + D option</li><li>E: return the document as base64 mime multi-part email attachment (RFC 2045)</li></ul> 
  7443.  * @public 
  7444.  * @since 1.0 
  7445.  * @see Close() 
  7446.  */ 
  7447. public function Output($name='doc.pdf', $dest='I') { 
  7448.     //Output PDF to some destination 
  7449.     //Finish document if necessary 
  7450.     if ($this->state < 3) { 
  7451.         $this->Close(); 
  7452.     } 
  7453.     //Normalize parameters 
  7454.     if (is_bool($dest)) { 
  7455.         $dest = $dest ? 'D' : 'F'; 
  7456.     } 
  7457.     $dest = strtoupper($dest); 
  7458.     if ($dest[0] != 'F') { 
  7459.         $name = preg_replace('/[\s]+/', '_', $name); 
  7460.         $name = preg_replace('/[^a-zA-Z0-9_\.-]/', '', $name); 
  7461.     } 
  7462.     if ($this->sign) { 
  7463.         // *** apply digital signature to the document *** 
  7464.         // get the document content 
  7465.         $pdfdoc = $this->getBuffer(); 
  7466.         // remove last newline 
  7467.         $pdfdoc = substr($pdfdoc, 0, -1); 
  7468.         // Remove the original buffer 
  7469.         if (isset($this->diskcache) AND $this->diskcache) { 
  7470.             // remove buffer file from cache 
  7471.             unlink($this->buffer); 
  7472.         } 
  7473.         unset($this->buffer); 
  7474.         // remove filler space 
  7475.         $byterange_string_len = strlen(TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string); 
  7476.         // define the ByteRange 
  7477.         $byte_range = array(); 
  7478.         $byte_range[0] = 0; 
  7479.         $byte_range[1] = strpos($pdfdoc, TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string) + $byterange_string_len + 10; 
  7480.         $byte_range[2] = $byte_range[1] + $this->signature_max_length + 2; 
  7481.         $byte_range[3] = strlen($pdfdoc) - $byte_range[2]; 
  7482.         $pdfdoc = substr($pdfdoc, 0, $byte_range[1]).substr($pdfdoc, $byte_range[2]); 
  7483.         // replace the ByteRange 
  7484.         $byterange = sprintf('/ByteRange[0 %u %u %u]', $byte_range[1], $byte_range[2], $byte_range[3]); 
  7485.         $byterange .= str_repeat(' ', ($byterange_string_len - strlen($byterange))); 
  7486.         $pdfdoc = str_replace(TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string, $byterange, $pdfdoc); 
  7487.         // write the document to a temporary folder 
  7488.         $tempdoc = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('doc'); 
  7489.         $f = fopen($tempdoc, 'wb'); 
  7490.         if (!$f) { 
  7491.             $this->Error('Unable to create temporary file: '.$tempdoc); 
  7492.         } 
  7493.         $pdfdoc_length = strlen($pdfdoc); 
  7494.         fwrite($f, $pdfdoc, $pdfdoc_length); 
  7495.         fclose($f); 
  7496.         // get digital signature via openssl library 
  7497.         $tempsign = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('sig'); 
  7498.         if (empty($this->signature_data['extracerts'])) { 
  7499.             openssl_pkcs7_sign($tempdoc, $tempsign, $this->signature_data['signcert'], array($this->signature_data['privkey'], $this->signature_data['password']), array(), PKCS7_BINARY | PKCS7_DETACHED); 
  7500.         } else { 
  7501.             openssl_pkcs7_sign($tempdoc, $tempsign, $this->signature_data['signcert'], array($this->signature_data['privkey'], $this->signature_data['password']), array(), PKCS7_BINARY | PKCS7_DETACHED, $this->signature_data['extracerts']); 
  7502.         } 
  7503.         unlink($tempdoc); 
  7504.         // read signature 
  7505.         $signature = file_get_contents($tempsign); 
  7506.         unlink($tempsign); 
  7507.         // extract signature 
  7508.         $signature = substr($signature, $pdfdoc_length); 
  7509.         $signature = substr($signature, (strpos($signature, "%%EOF\n\n------") + 13)); 
  7510.         $tmparr = explode("\n\n", $signature); 
  7511.         $signature = $tmparr[1]; 
  7512.         unset($tmparr); 
  7513.         // decode signature 
  7514.         $signature = base64_decode(trim($signature)); 
  7515.         // add TSA timestamp to signature 
  7516.         $signature = $this->applyTSA($signature); 
  7517.         // convert signature to hex 
  7518.         $signature = current(unpack('H*', $signature)); 
  7519.         $signature = str_pad($signature, $this->signature_max_length, '0'); 
  7520.         // disable disk caching 
  7521.         $this->diskcache = false; 
  7522.         // Add signature to the document 
  7523.         $this->buffer = substr($pdfdoc, 0, $byte_range[1]).'<'.$signature.'>'.substr($pdfdoc, $byte_range[1]); 
  7524.         $this->bufferlen = strlen($this->buffer); 
  7525.     } 
  7526.     switch($dest) { 
  7527.         case 'I': { 
  7528.             // Send PDF to the standard output 
  7529.             if (ob_get_contents()) { 
  7530.                 $this->Error('Some data has already been output, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7531.             } 
  7532.             if (php_sapi_name() != 'cli') { 
  7533.                 // send output to a browser 
  7534.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7535.                 if (headers_sent()) { 
  7536.                     $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7537.                 } 
  7538.                 header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7539.                 //header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); // HTTP/1.1 
  7540.                 header('Pragma: public'); 
  7541.                 header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7542.                 header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7543.                 header('Content-Disposition: inline; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7544.                 TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData($this->getBuffer(), $this->bufferlen); 
  7545.             } else { 
  7546.                 echo $this->getBuffer(); 
  7547.             } 
  7548.             break; 
  7549.         } 
  7550.         case 'D': { 
  7551.             // download PDF as file 
  7552.             if (ob_get_contents()) { 
  7553.                 $this->Error('Some data has already been output, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7554.             } 
  7555.             header('Content-Description: File Transfer'); 
  7556.             if (headers_sent()) { 
  7557.                 $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7558.             } 
  7559.             header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7560.             //header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); // HTTP/1.1 
  7561.             header('Pragma: public'); 
  7562.             header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7563.             header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7564.             // force download dialog 
  7565.             if (strpos(php_sapi_name(), 'cgi') === false) { 
  7566.                 header('Content-Type: application/force-download'); 
  7567.                 header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream', false); 
  7568.                 header('Content-Type: application/download', false); 
  7569.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf', false); 
  7570.             } else { 
  7571.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7572.             } 
  7573.             // use the Content-Disposition header to supply a recommended filename 
  7574.             header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7575.             header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary'); 
  7576.             TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData($this->getBuffer(), $this->bufferlen); 
  7577.             break; 
  7578.         } 
  7579.         case 'F': 
  7580.         case 'FI': 
  7581.         case 'FD': { 
  7582.             // save PDF to a local file 
  7583.             if ($this->diskcache) { 
  7584.                 copy($this->buffer, $name); 
  7585.             } else { 
  7586.                 $f = fopen($name, 'wb'); 
  7587.                 if (!$f) { 
  7588.                     $this->Error('Unable to create output file: '.$name); 
  7589.                 } 
  7590.                 fwrite($f, $this->getBuffer(), $this->bufferlen); 
  7591.                 fclose($f); 
  7592.             } 
  7593.             if ($dest == 'FI') { 
  7594.                 // send headers to browser 
  7595.                 header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7596.                 header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7597.                 //header('Cache-Control: public, must-revalidate, max-age=0'); // HTTP/1.1 
  7598.                 header('Pragma: public'); 
  7599.                 header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7600.                 header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7601.                 header('Content-Disposition: inline; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7602.                 TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData(file_get_contents($name), filesize($name)); 
  7603.             } elseif ($dest == 'FD') { 
  7604.                 // send headers to browser 
  7605.                 if (ob_get_contents()) { 
  7606.                     $this->Error('Some data has already been output, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7607.                 } 
  7608.                 header('Content-Description: File Transfer'); 
  7609.                 if (headers_sent()) { 
  7610.                     $this->Error('Some data has already been output to browser, can\'t send PDF file'); 
  7611.                 } 
  7612.                 header('Cache-Control: private, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, max-age=1'); 
  7613.                 header('Pragma: public'); 
  7614.                 header('Expires: Sat, 26 Jul 1997 05:00:00 GMT'); // Date in the past 
  7615.                 header('Last-Modified: '.gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s').' GMT'); 
  7616.                 // force download dialog 
  7617.                 if (strpos(php_sapi_name(), 'cgi') === false) { 
  7618.                     header('Content-Type: application/force-download'); 
  7619.                     header('Content-Type: application/octet-stream', false); 
  7620.                     header('Content-Type: application/download', false); 
  7621.                     header('Content-Type: application/pdf', false); 
  7622.                 } else { 
  7623.                     header('Content-Type: application/pdf'); 
  7624.                 } 
  7625.                 // use the Content-Disposition header to supply a recommended filename 
  7626.                 header('Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.basename($name).'"'); 
  7627.                 header('Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary'); 
  7628.                 TCPDF_STATIC::sendOutputData(file_get_contents($name), filesize($name)); 
  7629.             } 
  7630.             break; 
  7631.         } 
  7632.         case 'E': { 
  7633.             // return PDF as base64 mime multi-part email attachment (RFC 2045) 
  7634.             $retval = 'Content-Type: application/pdf;'."\r\n"; 
  7635.             $retval .= ' name="'.$name.'"'."\r\n"; 
  7636.             $retval .= 'Content-Transfer-Encoding: base64'."\r\n"; 
  7637.             $retval .= 'Content-Disposition: attachment;'."\r\n"; 
  7638.             $retval .= ' filename="'.$name.'"'."\r\n\r\n"; 
  7639.             $retval .= chunk_split(base64_encode($this->getBuffer()), 76, "\r\n"); 
  7640.             return $retval; 
  7641.         } 
  7642.         case 'S': { 
  7643.             // returns PDF as a string 
  7644.             return $this->getBuffer(); 
  7645.         } 
  7646.         default: { 
  7647.             $this->Error('Incorrect output destination: '.$dest); 
  7648.         } 
  7649.     } 
  7650.     return ''; 
  7651. } 
  7652.  
  7653. /** 
  7654.  * Unset all class variables except the following critical variables. 
  7655.  * @param $destroyall (boolean) if true destroys all class variables, otherwise preserves critical variables. 
  7656.  * @param $preserve_objcopy (boolean) if true preserves the objcopy variable 
  7657.  * @public 
  7658.  * @since 4.5.016 (2009-02-24) 
  7659.  */ 
  7660. public function _destroy($destroyall=false, $preserve_objcopy=false) { 
  7661.     if ($destroyall AND isset($this->diskcache) AND $this->diskcache AND (!$preserve_objcopy) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->buffer))) { 
  7662.         // remove buffer file from cache 
  7663.         unlink($this->buffer); 
  7664.     } 
  7665.     if ($destroyall AND !empty($this->cached_files)) { 
  7666.         // remove cached files 
  7667.         foreach ($this->cached_files as $cachefile) { 
  7668.             if (is_file($cachefile)) { 
  7669.                 unlink($cachefile); 
  7670.             } 
  7671.         } 
  7672.         unset($this->cached_files); 
  7673.     } 
  7674.     $preserve = array( 
  7675.         'internal_encoding',  
  7676.         'state',  
  7677.         'bufferlen',  
  7678.         'buffer',  
  7679.         'diskcache',  
  7680.         'cached_files',  
  7681.         'sign',  
  7682.         'signature_data',  
  7683.         'signature_max_length',  
  7684.         'byterange_string',  
  7685.         'tsa_timestamp',  
  7686.         'tsa_data' 
  7687.  ); 
  7688.     foreach (array_keys(get_object_vars($this)) as $val) { 
  7689.         if ($destroyall OR !in_array($val, $preserve)) { 
  7690.             if ((!$preserve_objcopy OR ($val != 'objcopy')) AND isset($this->$val)) { 
  7691.                 unset($this->$val); 
  7692.             } 
  7693.         } 
  7694.     } 
  7695. } 
  7696.  
  7697. /** 
  7698.  * Check for locale-related bug 
  7699.  * @protected 
  7700.  */ 
  7701. protected function _dochecks() { 
  7702.     //Check for locale-related bug 
  7703.     if (1.1 == 1) { 
  7704.         $this->Error('Don\'t alter the locale before including class file'); 
  7705.     } 
  7706.     //Check for decimal separator 
  7707.     if (sprintf('%.1F', 1.0) != '1.0') { 
  7708.         setlocale(LC_NUMERIC, 'C'); 
  7709.     } 
  7710. } 
  7711.  
  7712. /** 
  7713.  * Return an array containing variations for the basic page number alias. 
  7714.  * @param $a (string) Base alias. 
  7715.  * @return array of page number aliases 
  7716.  * @protected 
  7717.  */ 
  7718. protected function getInternalPageNumberAliases($a= '') { 
  7719.     $alias = array(); 
  7720.     // build array of Unicode + ASCII variants (the order is important) 
  7721.     $alias = array('u' => array(), 'a' => array()); 
  7722.     $u = '{'.$a.'}'; 
  7723.     $alias['u'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($u); 
  7724.     if ($this->isunicode) { 
  7725.         $alias['u'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($u, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7726.         $alias['u'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::utf8StrRev($u, false, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7727.         $alias['a'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($a, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7728.         $alias['a'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape(TCPDF_FONTS::utf8StrRev($a, false, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont)); 
  7729.     } 
  7730.     $alias['a'][] = TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($a); 
  7731.     return $alias; 
  7732. } 
  7733.  
  7734. /** 
  7735.  * Return an array containing all internal page aliases. 
  7736.  * @return array of page number aliases 
  7737.  * @protected 
  7738.  */ 
  7739. protected function getAllInternalPageNumberAliases() { 
  7740.     $basic_alias = array(TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_tot_pages, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_num_page, TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_right_shift); 
  7741.     $pnalias = array(); 
  7742.     foreach($basic_alias as $k => $a) { 
  7743.         $pnalias[$k] = $this->getInternalPageNumberAliases($a); 
  7744.     } 
  7745.     return $pnalias; 
  7746. } 
  7747.  
  7748. /** 
  7749.  * Replace right shift page number aliases with spaces to correct right alignment. 
  7750.  * This works perfectly only when using monospaced fonts. 
  7751.  * @param $page (string) Page content. 
  7752.  * @param $aliases (array) Array of page aliases. 
  7753.  * @param $diff (int) initial difference to add. 
  7754.  * @return replaced page content. 
  7755.  * @protected 
  7756.  */ 
  7757. protected function replaceRightShiftPageNumAliases($page, $aliases, $diff) { 
  7758.     foreach ($aliases as $type => $alias) { 
  7759.         foreach ($alias as $a) { 
  7760.             // find position of compensation factor 
  7761.             $startnum = (strpos($a, ':') + 1); 
  7762.             $a = substr($a, 0, $startnum); 
  7763.             if (($pos = strpos($page, $a)) !== false) { 
  7764.                 // end of alias 
  7765.                 $endnum = strpos($page, '}', $pos); 
  7766.                 // string to be replaced 
  7767.                 $aa = substr($page, $pos, ($endnum - $pos + 1)); 
  7768.                 // get compensation factor 
  7769.                 $ratio = substr($page, ($pos + $startnum), ($endnum - $pos - $startnum)); 
  7770.                 $ratio = preg_replace('/[^0-9\.]/', '', $ratio); 
  7771.                 $ratio = floatval($ratio); 
  7772.                 if ($type == 'u') { 
  7773.                     $chrdiff = floor(($diff + 12) * $ratio); 
  7774.                     $shift = str_repeat(' ', $chrdiff); 
  7775.                     $shift = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($shift, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7776.                 } else { 
  7777.                     $chrdiff = floor(($diff + 11) * $ratio); 
  7778.                     $shift = str_repeat(' ', $chrdiff); 
  7779.                 } 
  7780.                 $page = str_replace($aa, $shift, $page); 
  7781.             } 
  7782.         } 
  7783.     } 
  7784.     return $page; 
  7785. } 
  7786.  
  7787. /** 
  7788.  * Set page boxes to be included on page descriptions. 
  7789.  * @param $boxes (array) Array of page boxes to set on document: ('MediaBox', 'CropBox', 'BleedBox', 'TrimBox', 'ArtBox'). 
  7790.  * @protected 
  7791.  */ 
  7792. protected function setPageBoxTypes($boxes) { 
  7793.     $this->page_boxes = array(); 
  7794.     foreach ($boxes as $box) { 
  7795.         if (in_array($box, TCPDF_STATIC::$pageboxes)) { 
  7796.             $this->page_boxes[] = $box; 
  7797.         } 
  7798.     } 
  7799. } 
  7800.  
  7801. /** 
  7802.  * Output pages (and replace page number aliases). 
  7803.  * @protected 
  7804.  */ 
  7805. protected function _putpages() { 
  7806.     $filter = ($this->compress) ? '/Filter /FlateDecode ' : ''; 
  7807.     // get internal aliases for page numbers 
  7808.     $pnalias = $this->getAllInternalPageNumberAliases(); 
  7809.     $num_pages = $this->numpages; 
  7810.     $ptpa = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $num_pages - 1)); 
  7811.     $ptpu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($ptpa, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7812.     $ptp_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($ptpa); 
  7813.     $pagegroupnum = 0; 
  7814.     $groupnum = 0; 
  7815.     $ptgu = 1; 
  7816.     $ptga = 1; 
  7817.     $ptg_num_chars = 1; 
  7818.     for ($n = 1; $n <= $num_pages; ++$n) { 
  7819.         // get current page 
  7820.         $temppage = $this->getPageBuffer($n); 
  7821.         $pagelen = strlen($temppage); 
  7822.         // set replacements for total pages number 
  7823.         $pnpa = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $n - 1)); 
  7824.         $pnpu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($pnpa, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7825.         $pnp_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($pnpa); 
  7826.         $pdiff = 0; // difference used for right shift alignment of page numbers 
  7827.         $gdiff = 0; // difference used for right shift alignment of page group numbers 
  7828.         if (!empty($this->pagegroups)) { 
  7829.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$n])) { 
  7830.                 $pagegroupnum = 0; 
  7831.                 ++$groupnum; 
  7832.                 $ptga = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($this->pagegroups[$groupnum]); 
  7833.                 $ptgu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($ptga, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7834.                 $ptg_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($ptga); 
  7835.             } 
  7836.             ++$pagegroupnum; 
  7837.             $pnga = TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($pagegroupnum); 
  7838.             $pngu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($pnga, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  7839.             $png_num_chars = $this->GetNumChars($pnga); 
  7840.             // replace page numbers 
  7841.             $replace = array(); 
  7842.             $replace[] = array($ptgu, $ptg_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[2]['u']); 
  7843.             $replace[] = array($ptga, $ptg_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[2]['a']); 
  7844.             $replace[] = array($pngu, $png_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[3]['u']); 
  7845.             $replace[] = array($pnga, $png_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[3]['a']); 
  7846.             list($temppage, $gdiff) = TCPDF_STATIC::replacePageNumAliases($temppage, $replace, $gdiff); 
  7847.         } 
  7848.         // replace page numbers 
  7849.         $replace = array(); 
  7850.         $replace[] = array($ptpu, $ptp_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[0]['u']); 
  7851.         $replace[] = array($ptpa, $ptp_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[0]['a']); 
  7852.         $replace[] = array($pnpu, $pnp_num_chars, 9, $pnalias[1]['u']); 
  7853.         $replace[] = array($pnpa, $pnp_num_chars, 7, $pnalias[1]['a']); 
  7854.         list($temppage, $pdiff) = TCPDF_STATIC::replacePageNumAliases($temppage, $replace, $pdiff); 
  7855.         // replace right shift alias 
  7856.         $temppage = $this->replaceRightShiftPageNumAliases($temppage, $pnalias[4], max($pdiff, $gdiff)); 
  7857.         // replace EPS marker 
  7858.         $temppage = str_replace($this->epsmarker, '', $temppage); 
  7859.         //Page 
  7860.         $this->page_obj_id[$n] = $this->_newobj(); 
  7861.         $out = '<<'; 
  7862.         $out .= ' /Type /Page'; 
  7863.         $out .= ' /Parent 1 0 R'; 
  7864.         if (empty($this->signature_data['approval']) OR ($this->signature_data['approval'] != 'A')) { 
  7865.             $out .= ' /LastModified '.$this->_datestring(0, $this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  7866.         } 
  7867.         $out .= ' /Resources 2 0 R'; 
  7868.         foreach ($this->page_boxes as $box) { 
  7869.             $out .= ' /'.$box; 
  7870.             $out .= sprintf(' [%F %F %F %F]', $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['llx'], $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['lly'], $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['urx'], $this->pagedim[$n][$box]['ury']); 
  7871.         } 
  7872.         if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo']) AND !empty($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'])) { 
  7873.             $out .= ' /BoxColorInfo <<'; 
  7874.             foreach ($this->page_boxes as $box) { 
  7875.                 if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box])) { 
  7876.                     $out .= ' /'.$box.' <<'; 
  7877.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['C'])) { 
  7878.                         $color = $this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['C']; 
  7879.                         $out .= ' /C ['; 
  7880.                         $out .= sprintf(' %F %F %F', ($color[0] / 255), ($color[1] / 255), ($color[2] / 255)); 
  7881.                         $out .= ' ]'; 
  7882.                     } 
  7883.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['W'])) { 
  7884.                         $out .= ' /W '.($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['W'] * $this->k); 
  7885.                     } 
  7886.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['S'])) { 
  7887.                         $out .= ' /S /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['S']; 
  7888.                     } 
  7889.                     if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['D'])) { 
  7890.                         $dashes = $this->pagedim[$n]['BoxColorInfo'][$box]['D']; 
  7891.                         $out .= ' /D ['; 
  7892.                         foreach ($dashes as $dash) { 
  7893.                             $out .= sprintf(' %F', ($dash * $this->k)); 
  7894.                         } 
  7895.                         $out .= ' ]'; 
  7896.                     } 
  7897.                     $out .= ' >>'; 
  7898.                 } 
  7899.             } 
  7900.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  7901.         } 
  7902.         $out .= ' /Contents '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  7903.         $out .= ' /Rotate '.$this->pagedim[$n]['Rotate']; 
  7904.         if (!$this->pdfa_mode) { 
  7905.             $out .= ' /Group << /Type /Group /S /Transparency /CS /DeviceRGB >>'; 
  7906.         } 
  7907.         if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']) AND !empty($this->pagedim[$n]['trans'])) { 
  7908.             // page transitions 
  7909.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dur'])) { 
  7910.                 $out .= ' /Dur '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dur']; 
  7911.             } 
  7912.             $out .= ' /Trans <<'; 
  7913.             $out .= ' /Type /Trans'; 
  7914.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['S'])) { 
  7915.                 $out .= ' /S /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['S']; 
  7916.             } 
  7917.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['D'])) { 
  7918.                 $out .= ' /D '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['D']; 
  7919.             } 
  7920.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dm'])) { 
  7921.                 $out .= ' /Dm /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Dm']; 
  7922.             } 
  7923.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['M'])) { 
  7924.                 $out .= ' /M /'.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['M']; 
  7925.             } 
  7926.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Di'])) { 
  7927.                 $out .= ' /Di '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['Di']; 
  7928.             } 
  7929.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['SS'])) { 
  7930.                 $out .= ' /SS '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['SS']; 
  7931.             } 
  7932.             if (isset($this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['B'])) { 
  7933.                 $out .= ' /B '.$this->pagedim[$n]['trans']['B']; 
  7934.             } 
  7935.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  7936.         } 
  7937.         $out .= $this->_getannotsrefs($n); 
  7938.         $out .= ' /PZ '.$this->pagedim[$n]['PZ']; 
  7939.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  7940.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  7941.         $this->_out($out); 
  7942.         //Page content 
  7943.         $p = ($this->compress) ? gzcompress($temppage) : $temppage; 
  7944.         $this->_newobj(); 
  7945.         $p = $this->_getrawstream($p); 
  7946.         $this->_out('<<'.$filter.'/Length '.strlen($p).'>> stream'."\n".$p."\n".'endstream'."\n".'endobj'); 
  7947.         if ($this->diskcache) { 
  7948.             // remove temporary files 
  7949.             unlink($this->pages[$n]); 
  7950.         } 
  7951.     } 
  7952.     //Pages root 
  7953.     $out = $this->_getobj(1)."\n"; 
  7954.     $out .= '<< /Type /Pages /Kids ['; 
  7955.     foreach($this->page_obj_id as $page_obj) { 
  7956.         $out .= ' '.$page_obj.' 0 R'; 
  7957.     } 
  7958.     $out .= ' ] /Count '.$num_pages.' >>'; 
  7959.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  7960.     $this->_out($out); 
  7961. } 
  7962.  
  7963. /** 
  7964.  * Output references to page annotations 
  7965.  * @param $n (int) page number 
  7966.  * @protected 
  7967.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  7968.  * @since 4.7.000 (2008-08-29) 
  7969.  * @deprecated 
  7970.  */ 
  7971. protected function _putannotsrefs($n) { 
  7972.     $this->_out($this->_getannotsrefs($n)); 
  7973. } 
  7974.  
  7975. /** 
  7976.  * Get references to page annotations. 
  7977.  * @param $n (int) page number 
  7978.  * @return string 
  7979.  * @protected 
  7980.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  7981.  * @since 5.0.010 (2010-05-17) 
  7982.  */ 
  7983. protected function _getannotsrefs($n) { 
  7984.     if (!(isset($this->PageAnnots[$n]) OR ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])))) { 
  7985.         return ''; 
  7986.     } 
  7987.     $out = ' /Annots ['; 
  7988.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
  7989.         foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $key => $val) { 
  7990.             if (!in_array($val['n'], $this->radio_groups)) { 
  7991.                 $out .= ' '.$val['n'].' 0 R'; 
  7992.             } 
  7993.         } 
  7994.         // add radiobutton groups 
  7995.         if (isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$n])) { 
  7996.             foreach ($this->radiobutton_groups[$n] as $key => $data) { 
  7997.                 if (isset($data['n'])) { 
  7998.                     $out .= ' '.$data['n'].' 0 R'; 
  7999.                 } 
  8000.             } 
  8001.         } 
  8002.     } 
  8003.     if ($this->sign AND ($n == $this->signature_appearance['page']) AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])) { 
  8004.         // set reference for signature object 
  8005.         $out .= ' '.$this->sig_obj_id.' 0 R'; 
  8006.     } 
  8007.     if (!empty($this->empty_signature_appearance)) { 
  8008.         foreach ($this->empty_signature_appearance as $esa) { 
  8009.             if ($esa['page'] == $n) { 
  8010.                 // set reference for empty signature objects 
  8011.                 $out .= ' '.$esa['objid'].' 0 R'; 
  8012.             } 
  8013.         } 
  8014.     } 
  8015.     $out .= ' ]'; 
  8016.     return $out; 
  8017. } 
  8018.  
  8019. /** 
  8020.  * Output annotations objects for all pages. 
  8021.  * !!! THIS METHOD IS NOT YET COMPLETED !!! 
  8022.  * See section 12.5 of PDF 32000_2008 reference. 
  8023.  * @protected 
  8024.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  8025.  * @since 3.0.018 (2008-08-06) 
  8026.  */ 
  8027. protected function _putannotsobjs() { 
  8028.     // reset object counter 
  8029.     for ($n=1; $n <= $this->numpages; ++$n) { 
  8030.         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$n])) { 
  8031.             // set page annotations 
  8032.             foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$n] as $key => $pl) { 
  8033.                 $annot_obj_id = $this->PageAnnots[$n][$key]['n']; 
  8034.                 // create annotation object for grouping radiobuttons 
  8035.                 if (isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']]) AND is_array($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']])) { 
  8036.                     $radio_button_obj_id = $this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']]['n']; 
  8037.                     $annots = '<<'; 
  8038.                     $annots .= ' /Type /Annot'; 
  8039.                     $annots .= ' /Subtype /Widget'; 
  8040.                     $annots .= ' /Rect [0 0 0 0]'; 
  8041.                     if ($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']]['#readonly#']) { 
  8042.                         // read only 
  8043.                         $annots .= ' /F 68'; 
  8044.                         $annots .= ' /Ff 49153'; 
  8045.                     } else { 
  8046.                         $annots .= ' /F 4'; // default print for PDF/A 
  8047.                         $annots .= ' /Ff 49152'; 
  8048.                     } 
  8049.                     $annots .= ' /T '.$this->_datastring($pl['txt'], $radio_button_obj_id); 
  8050.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['tu']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['tu'])) { 
  8051.                         $annots .= ' /TU '.$this->_datastring($pl['opt']['tu'], $radio_button_obj_id); 
  8052.                     } 
  8053.                     $annots .= ' /FT /Btn'; 
  8054.                     $annots .= ' /Kids ['; 
  8055.                     $defval = ''; 
  8056.                     foreach ($this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']] as $key => $data) { 
  8057.                         if (isset($data['kid'])) { 
  8058.                             $annots .= ' '.$data['kid'].' 0 R'; 
  8059.                             if ($data['def'] !== 'Off') { 
  8060.                                 $defval = $data['def']; 
  8061.                             } 
  8062.                         } 
  8063.                     } 
  8064.                     $annots .= ' ]'; 
  8065.                     if (!empty($defval)) { 
  8066.                         $annots .= ' /V /'.$defval; 
  8067.                     } 
  8068.                     $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8069.                     $this->_out($this->_getobj($radio_button_obj_id)."\n".$annots."\n".'endobj'); 
  8070.                     $this->form_obj_id[] = $radio_button_obj_id; 
  8071.                     // store object id to be used on Parent entry of Kids 
  8072.                     $this->radiobutton_groups[$n][$pl['txt']] = $radio_button_obj_id; 
  8073.                 } 
  8074.                 $formfield = false; 
  8075.                 $pl['opt'] = array_change_key_case($pl['opt'], CASE_LOWER); 
  8076.                 $a = $pl['x'] * $this->k; 
  8077.                 $b = $this->pagedim[$n]['h'] - (($pl['y'] + $pl['h']) * $this->k); 
  8078.                 $c = $pl['w'] * $this->k; 
  8079.                 $d = $pl['h'] * $this->k; 
  8080.                 $rect = sprintf('%F %F %F %F', $a, $b, $a+$c, $b+$d); 
  8081.                 // create new annotation object 
  8082.                 $annots = '<</Type /Annot'; 
  8083.                 $annots .= ' /Subtype /'.$pl['opt']['subtype']; 
  8084.                 $annots .= ' /Rect ['.$rect.']'; 
  8085.                 $ft = array('Btn', 'Tx', 'Ch', 'Sig'); 
  8086.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['ft']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['ft'], $ft)) { 
  8087.                     $annots .= ' /FT /'.$pl['opt']['ft']; 
  8088.                     $formfield = true; 
  8089.                 } 
  8090.                 $annots .= ' /Contents '.$this->_textstring($pl['txt'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8091.                 $annots .= ' /P '.$this->page_obj_id[$n].' 0 R'; 
  8092.                 $annots .= ' /NM '.$this->_datastring(sprintf('%04u-%04u', $n, $key), $annot_obj_id); 
  8093.                 $annots .= ' /M '.$this->_datestring($annot_obj_id, $this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  8094.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['f'])) { 
  8095.                     $fval = 0; 
  8096.                     if (is_array($pl['opt']['f'])) { 
  8097.                         foreach ($pl['opt']['f'] as $f) { 
  8098.                             switch (strtolower($f)) { 
  8099.                                 case 'invisible': { 
  8100.                                     $fval += 1 << 0; 
  8101.                                     break; 
  8102.                                 } 
  8103.                                 case 'hidden': { 
  8104.                                     $fval += 1 << 1; 
  8105.                                     break; 
  8106.                                 } 
  8107.                                 case 'print': { 
  8108.                                     $fval += 1 << 2; 
  8109.                                     break; 
  8110.                                 } 
  8111.                                 case 'nozoom': { 
  8112.                                     $fval += 1 << 3; 
  8113.                                     break; 
  8114.                                 } 
  8115.                                 case 'norotate': { 
  8116.                                     $fval += 1 << 4; 
  8117.                                     break; 
  8118.                                 } 
  8119.                                 case 'noview': { 
  8120.                                     $fval += 1 << 5; 
  8121.                                     break; 
  8122.                                 } 
  8123.                                 case 'readonly': { 
  8124.                                     $fval += 1 << 6; 
  8125.                                     break; 
  8126.                                 } 
  8127.                                 case 'locked': { 
  8128.                                     $fval += 1 << 8; 
  8129.                                     break; 
  8130.                                 } 
  8131.                                 case 'togglenoview': { 
  8132.                                     $fval += 1 << 9; 
  8133.                                     break; 
  8134.                                 } 
  8135.                                 case 'lockedcontents': { 
  8136.                                     $fval += 1 << 10; 
  8137.                                     break; 
  8138.                                 } 
  8139.                                 default: { 
  8140.                                     break; 
  8141.                                 } 
  8142.                             } 
  8143.                         } 
  8144.                     } else { 
  8145.                         $fval = intval($pl['opt']['f']); 
  8146.                     } 
  8147.                 } else { 
  8148.                     $fval = 4; 
  8149.                 } 
  8150.                 if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  8151.                     // force print flag for PDF/A mode 
  8152.                     $fval |= 4; 
  8153.                 } 
  8154.                 $annots .= ' /F '.intval($fval); 
  8155.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['as']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['as'])) { 
  8156.                     $annots .= ' /AS /'.$pl['opt']['as']; 
  8157.                 } 
  8158.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['ap'])) { 
  8159.                     // appearance stream 
  8160.                     $annots .= ' /AP <<'; 
  8161.                     if (is_array($pl['opt']['ap'])) { 
  8162.                         foreach ($pl['opt']['ap'] as $apmode => $apdef) { 
  8163.                             // $apmode can be: n = normal; r = rollover; d = down; 
  8164.                             $annots .= ' /'.strtoupper($apmode); 
  8165.                             if (is_array($apdef)) { 
  8166.                                 $annots .= ' <<'; 
  8167.                                 foreach ($apdef as $apstate => $stream) { 
  8168.                                     // reference to XObject that define the appearance for this mode-state 
  8169.                                     $apsobjid = $this->_putAPXObject($c, $d, $stream); 
  8170.                                     $annots .= ' /'.$apstate.' '.$apsobjid.' 0 R'; 
  8171.                                 } 
  8172.                                 $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8173.                             } else { 
  8174.                                 // reference to XObject that define the appearance for this mode 
  8175.                                 $apsobjid = $this->_putAPXObject($c, $d, $apdef); 
  8176.                                 $annots .= ' '.$apsobjid.' 0 R'; 
  8177.                             } 
  8178.                         } 
  8179.                     } else { 
  8180.                         $annots .= $pl['opt']['ap']; 
  8181.                     } 
  8182.                     $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8183.                 } 
  8184.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['bs']))) { 
  8185.                     $annots .= ' /BS <<'; 
  8186.                     $annots .= ' /Type /Border'; 
  8187.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']['w'])) { 
  8188.                         $annots .= ' /W '.intval($pl['opt']['bs']['w']); 
  8189.                     } 
  8190.                     $bstyles = array('S', 'D', 'B', 'I', 'U'); 
  8191.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']['s']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['bs']['s'], $bstyles)) { 
  8192.                         $annots .= ' /S /'.$pl['opt']['bs']['s']; 
  8193.                     } 
  8194.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['bs']['d']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['bs']['d']))) { 
  8195.                         $annots .= ' /D ['; 
  8196.                         foreach ($pl['opt']['bs']['d'] as $cord) { 
  8197.                             $annots .= ' '.intval($cord); 
  8198.                         } 
  8199.                         $annots .= ']'; 
  8200.                     } 
  8201.                     $annots .= ' >>'; 
  8202.                 } else { 
  8203.                     $annots .= ' /Border ['; 
  8204.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['border']) AND (count($pl['opt']['border']) >= 3)) { 
  8205.                         $annots .= intval($pl['opt']['border'][0]).' '; 
  8206.                         $annots .= intval($pl['opt']['border'][1]).' '; 
  8207.                         $annots .= intval($pl['opt']['border'][2]); 
  8208.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['border'][3]) AND is_array($pl['opt']['border'][3])) { 
  8209.                             $annots .= ' ['; 
  8210.                             foreach ($pl['opt']['border'][3] as $dash) { 
  8211.                                 $annots .= intval($dash).' '; 
  8212.                             } 
  8213.                             $annots .= ']'; 
  8214.                         } 
  8215.                     } else { 
  8216.                         $annots .= '0 0 0'; 
  8217.                     } 
  8218.                     $annots .= ']'; 
  8219.                 } 
  8220.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['be']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['be']))) { 
  8221.                     $annots .= ' /BE <<'; 
  8222.                     $bstyles = array('S', 'C'); 
  8223.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['be']['s']) AND in_array($pl['opt']['be']['s'], $bstyles)) { 
  8224.                         $annots .= ' /S /'.$pl['opt']['bs']['s']; 
  8225.                     } else { 
  8226.                         $annots .= ' /S /S'; 
  8227.                     } 
  8228.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['be']['i']) AND ($pl['opt']['be']['i'] >= 0) AND ($pl['opt']['be']['i'] <= 2)) { 
  8229.                         $annots .= ' /I '.sprintf(' %F', $pl['opt']['be']['i']); 
  8230.                     } 
  8231.                     $annots .= '>>'; 
  8232.                 } 
  8233.                 if (isset($pl['opt']['c']) AND (is_array($pl['opt']['c'])) AND !empty($pl['opt']['c'])) { 
  8234.                     $annots .= ' /C '.TCPDF_COLORS::getColorStringFromArray($pl['opt']['c']); 
  8235.                 } 
  8236.                 //$annots .= ' /StructParent '; 
  8237.                 //$annots .= ' /OC '; 
  8238.                 $markups = array('text', 'freetext', 'line', 'square', 'circle', 'polygon', 'polyline', 'highlight', 'underline', 'squiggly', 'strikeout', 'stamp', 'caret', 'ink', 'fileattachment', 'sound'); 
  8239.                 if (in_array(strtolower($pl['opt']['subtype']), $markups)) { 
  8240.                     // this is a markup type 
  8241.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['t']) AND is_string($pl['opt']['t'])) { 
  8242.                         $annots .= ' /T '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['t'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8243.                     } 
  8244.                     //$annots .= ' /Popup '; 
  8245.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['ca'])) { 
  8246.                         $annots .= ' /CA '.sprintf('%F', floatval($pl['opt']['ca'])); 
  8247.                     } 
  8248.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['rc'])) { 
  8249.                         $annots .= ' /RC '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['rc'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8250.                     } 
  8251.                     $annots .= ' /CreationDate '.$this->_datestring($annot_obj_id, $this->doc_creation_timestamp); 
  8252.                     //$annots .= ' /IRT '; 
  8253.                     if (isset($pl['opt']['subj'])) { 
  8254.                         $annots .= ' /Subj '.$this->_textstring($pl['opt']['subj'], $annot_obj_id); 
  8255.                     } 
  8256.                     //$annots .= ' /RT '; 
  8257.                     //$annots .= ' /IT '; 
  8258.                     //$annots .= ' /ExData '; 
  8259.                 } 
  8260.                 $lineendings = array('Square', 'Circle', 'Diamond', 'OpenArrow', 'ClosedArrow', 'None', 'Butt', 'ROpenArrow', 'RClosedArrow', 'Slash'); 
  8261.                 // Annotation types 
  8262.                 switch (strtolower($pl['opt']['subtype'])) { 
  8263.                     case 'text': { 
  8264.                         if (isset($pl['opt']['open'])) { 
  8265.                             $annots .= ' /Open '. (strtolower($pl['opt']['open']) == 'true' ? 'true' : 'false'); 
  8266.                         }
