  9723.         if (isset($this->annotation_fonts) AND !empty($this->annotation_fonts)) { 
  9724.             $out .= ' /DR <<'; 
  9725.             $out .= ' /Font <<'; 
  9726.             foreach ($this->annotation_fonts as $fontkey => $fontid) { 
  9727.                 $out .= ' /F'.$fontid.' '.$this->font_obj_ids[$fontkey].' 0 R'; 
  9728.             } 
  9729.             $out .= ' >> >>'; 
  9730.         } 
  9731.         $font = $this->getFontBuffer('helvetica'); 
  9732.         $out .= ' /DA (/F'.$font['i'].' 0 Tf 0 g)'; 
  9733.         $out .= ' /Q '.(($this->rtl)?'2':'0'); 
  9734.         //$out .= ' /XFA '; 
  9735.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9736.         // signatures 
  9737.         if ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])  
  9738.             AND (empty($this->signature_data['approval']) OR ($this->signature_data['approval'] != 'A'))) { 
  9739.             if ($this->signature_data['cert_type'] > 0) { 
  9740.                 $out .= ' /Perms << /DocMDP '.($this->sig_obj_id + 1).' 0 R >>'; 
  9741.             } else { 
  9742.                 $out .= ' /Perms << /UR3 '.($this->sig_obj_id + 1).' 0 R >>'; 
  9743.             } 
  9744.         } 
  9745.     } 
  9746.     //$out .= ' /Legal <<>>'; 
  9747.     //$out .= ' /Requirements []'; 
  9748.     //$out .= ' /Collection <<>>'; 
  9749.     //$out .= ' /NeedsRendering true'; 
  9750.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9751.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9752.     $this->_out($out); 
  9753.     return $oid; 
  9754. } 
  9755.  
  9756. /** 
  9757.  * Output viewer preferences. 
  9758.  * @return string for viewer preferences 
  9759.  * @author Nicola asuni 
  9760.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  9761.  * @protected 
  9762.  */ 
  9763. protected function _putviewerpreferences() { 
  9764.     $vp = $this->viewer_preferences; 
  9765.     $out = ' /ViewerPreferences <<'; 
  9766.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  9767.         $out .= ' /Direction /R2L'; 
  9768.     } else { 
  9769.         $out .= ' /Direction /L2R'; 
  9770.     } 
  9771.     if (isset($vp['HideToolbar']) AND ($vp['HideToolbar'])) { 
  9772.         $out .= ' /HideToolbar true'; 
  9773.     } 
  9774.     if (isset($vp['HideMenubar']) AND ($vp['HideMenubar'])) { 
  9775.         $out .= ' /HideMenubar true'; 
  9776.     } 
  9777.     if (isset($vp['HideWindowUI']) AND ($vp['HideWindowUI'])) { 
  9778.         $out .= ' /HideWindowUI true'; 
  9779.     } 
  9780.     if (isset($vp['FitWindow']) AND ($vp['FitWindow'])) { 
  9781.         $out .= ' /FitWindow true'; 
  9782.     } 
  9783.     if (isset($vp['CenterWindow']) AND ($vp['CenterWindow'])) { 
  9784.         $out .= ' /CenterWindow true'; 
  9785.     } 
  9786.     if (isset($vp['DisplayDocTitle']) AND ($vp['DisplayDocTitle'])) { 
  9787.         $out .= ' /DisplayDocTitle true'; 
  9788.     } 
  9789.     if (isset($vp['NonFullScreenPageMode'])) { 
  9790.         $out .= ' /NonFullScreenPageMode /'.$vp['NonFullScreenPageMode']; 
  9791.     } 
  9792.     if (isset($vp['ViewArea'])) { 
  9793.         $out .= ' /ViewArea /'.$vp['ViewArea']; 
  9794.     } 
  9795.     if (isset($vp['ViewClip'])) { 
  9796.         $out .= ' /ViewClip /'.$vp['ViewClip']; 
  9797.     } 
  9798.     if (isset($vp['PrintArea'])) { 
  9799.         $out .= ' /PrintArea /'.$vp['PrintArea']; 
  9800.     } 
  9801.     if (isset($vp['PrintClip'])) { 
  9802.         $out .= ' /PrintClip /'.$vp['PrintClip']; 
  9803.     } 
  9804.     if (isset($vp['PrintScaling'])) { 
  9805.         $out .= ' /PrintScaling /'.$vp['PrintScaling']; 
  9806.     } 
  9807.     if (isset($vp['Duplex']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($vp['Duplex']))) { 
  9808.         $out .= ' /Duplex /'.$vp['Duplex']; 
  9809.     } 
  9810.     if (isset($vp['PickTrayByPDFSize'])) { 
  9811.         if ($vp['PickTrayByPDFSize']) { 
  9812.             $out .= ' /PickTrayByPDFSize true'; 
  9813.         } else { 
  9814.             $out .= ' /PickTrayByPDFSize false'; 
  9815.         } 
  9816.     } 
  9817.     if (isset($vp['PrintPageRange'])) { 
  9818.         $PrintPageRangeNum = ''; 
  9819.         foreach ($vp['PrintPageRange'] as $k => $v) { 
  9820.             $PrintPageRangeNum .= ' '.($v - 1).''; 
  9821.         } 
  9822.         $out .= ' /PrintPageRange ['.substr($PrintPageRangeNum, 1).']'; 
  9823.     } 
  9824.     if (isset($vp['NumCopies'])) { 
  9825.         $out .= ' /NumCopies '.intval($vp['NumCopies']); 
  9826.     } 
  9827.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9828.     return $out; 
  9829. } 
  9830.  
  9831. /** 
  9832.  * Output PDF File Header (7.5.2). 
  9833.  * @protected 
  9834.  */ 
  9835. protected function _putheader() { 
  9836.     $this->_out('%PDF-'.$this->PDFVersion); 
  9837.     $this->_out('%'.chr(0xe2).chr(0xe3).chr(0xcf).chr(0xd3)); 
  9838. } 
  9839.  
  9840. /** 
  9841.  * Output end of document (EOF). 
  9842.  * @protected 
  9843.  */ 
  9844. protected function _enddoc() { 
  9845.     if (isset($this->CurrentFont['fontkey']) AND isset($this->CurrentFont['subsetchars'])) { 
  9846.         // save subset chars of the previous font 
  9847.         $this->setFontSubBuffer($this->CurrentFont['fontkey'], 'subsetchars', $this->CurrentFont['subsetchars']); 
  9848.     } 
  9849.     $this->state = 1; 
  9850.     $this->_putheader(); 
  9851.     $this->_putpages(); 
  9852.     $this->_putresources(); 
  9853.     // empty signature fields 
  9854.     if (!empty($this->empty_signature_appearance)) { 
  9855.         foreach ($this->empty_signature_appearance as $key => $esa) { 
  9856.             // widget annotation for empty signature 
  9857.             $out = $this->_getobj($esa['objid'])."\n"; 
  9858.             $out .= '<< /Type /Annot'; 
  9859.             $out .= ' /Subtype /Widget'; 
  9860.             $out .= ' /Rect ['.$esa['rect'].']'; 
  9861.             $out .= ' /P '.$this->page_obj_id[($esa['page'])].' 0 R'; // link to signature appearance page 
  9862.             $out .= ' /F 4'; 
  9863.             $out .= ' /FT /Sig'; 
  9864.             $signame = $esa['name'].sprintf(' [%03d]', ($key + 1)); 
  9865.             $out .= ' /T '.$this->_textstring($signame, $esa['objid']); 
  9866.             $out .= ' /Ff 0'; 
  9867.             $out .= ' >>'; 
  9868.             $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9869.             $this->_out($out); 
  9870.         } 
  9871.     } 
  9872.     // Signature 
  9873.     if ($this->sign AND isset($this->signature_data['cert_type'])) { 
  9874.         // widget annotation for signature 
  9875.         $out = $this->_getobj($this->sig_obj_id)."\n"; 
  9876.         $out .= '<< /Type /Annot'; 
  9877.         $out .= ' /Subtype /Widget'; 
  9878.         $out .= ' /Rect ['.$this->signature_appearance['rect'].']'; 
  9879.         $out .= ' /P '.$this->page_obj_id[($this->signature_appearance['page'])].' 0 R'; // link to signature appearance page 
  9880.         $out .= ' /F 4'; 
  9881.         $out .= ' /FT /Sig'; 
  9882.         $out .= ' /T '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_appearance['name'], $this->sig_obj_id); 
  9883.         $out .= ' /Ff 0'; 
  9884.         $out .= ' /V '.($this->sig_obj_id + 1).' 0 R'; 
  9885.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  9886.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  9887.         $this->_out($out); 
  9888.         // signature 
  9889.         $this->_putsignature(); 
  9890.     } 
  9891.     // Info 
  9892.     $objid_info = $this->_putinfo(); 
  9893.     // Catalog 
  9894.     $objid_catalog = $this->_putcatalog(); 
  9895.     // Cross-ref 
  9896.     $o = $this->bufferlen; 
  9897.     // XREF section 
  9898.     $this->_out('xref'); 
  9899.     $this->_out('0 '.($this->n + 1)); 
  9900.     $this->_out('0000000000 65535 f '); 
  9901.     $freegen = ($this->n + 2); 
  9902.     for ($i=1; $i <= $this->n; ++$i) { 
  9903.         if (!isset($this->offsets[$i]) AND ($i > 1)) { 
  9904.             $this->_out(sprintf('0000000000 %05d f ', $freegen)); 
  9905.             ++$freegen; 
  9906.         } else { 
  9907.             $this->_out(sprintf('%010d 00000 n ', $this->offsets[$i])); 
  9908.         } 
  9909.     } 
  9910.     // TRAILER 
  9911.     $out = 'trailer'."\n"; 
  9912.     $out .= '<<'; 
  9913.     $out .= ' /Size '.($this->n + 1); 
  9914.     $out .= ' /Root '.$objid_catalog.' 0 R'; 
  9915.     $out .= ' /Info '.$objid_info.' 0 R'; 
  9916.     if ($this->encrypted) { 
  9917.         $out .= ' /Encrypt '.$this->encryptdata['objid'].' 0 R'; 
  9918.     } 
  9919.     $out .= ' /ID [ <'.$this->file_id.'> <'.$this->file_id.'> ]'; 
  9920.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  9921.     $this->_out($out); 
  9922.     $this->_out('startxref'); 
  9923.     $this->_out($o); 
  9924.     $this->_out('%%EOF'); 
  9925.     $this->state = 3; // end-of-doc 
  9926.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  9927.         // remove temporary files used for images 
  9928.         foreach ($this->imagekeys as $key) { 
  9929.             // remove temporary files 
  9930.             unlink($this->images[$key]); 
  9931.         } 
  9932.         foreach ($this->fontkeys as $key) { 
  9933.             // remove temporary files 
  9934.             unlink($this->fonts[$key]); 
  9935.         } 
  9936.     } 
  9937. } 
  9938.  
  9939. /** 
  9940.  * Initialize a new page. 
  9941.  * @param $orientation (string) page orientation. Possible values are (case insensitive):<ul><li>P or PORTRAIT (default)</li><li>L or LANDSCAPE</li></ul> 
  9942.  * @param $format (mixed) The format used for pages. It can be either: one of the string values specified at getPageSizeFromFormat() or an array of parameters specified at setPageFormat(). 
  9943.  * @protected 
  9944.  * @see getPageSizeFromFormat(), setPageFormat() 
  9945.  */ 
  9946. protected function _beginpage($orientation='', $format='') { 
  9947.     ++$this->page; 
  9948.     $this->pageobjects[$this->page] = array(); 
  9949.     $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, ''); 
  9950.     // initialize array for graphics tranformation positions inside a page buffer 
  9951.     $this->transfmrk[$this->page] = array(); 
  9952.     $this->state = 2; 
  9953.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($orientation)) { 
  9954.         if (isset($this->CurOrientation)) { 
  9955.             $orientation = $this->CurOrientation; 
  9956.         } elseif ($this->fwPt > $this->fhPt) { 
  9957.             // landscape 
  9958.             $orientation = 'L'; 
  9959.         } else { 
  9960.             // portrait 
  9961.             $orientation = 'P'; 
  9962.         } 
  9963.     } 
  9964.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($format)) { 
  9965.         $this->pagedim[$this->page] = $this->pagedim[($this->page - 1)]; 
  9966.         $this->setPageOrientation($orientation); 
  9967.     } else { 
  9968.         $this->setPageFormat($format, $orientation); 
  9969.     } 
  9970.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  9971.         $this->x = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  9972.     } else { 
  9973.         $this->x = $this->lMargin; 
  9974.     } 
  9975.     $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  9976.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$this->page])) { 
  9977.         // start a new group 
  9978.         $this->currpagegroup = $this->newpagegroup[$this->page]; 
  9979.         $this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup] = 1; 
  9980.     } elseif (isset($this->currpagegroup) AND ($this->currpagegroup > 0)) { 
  9981.         ++$this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup]; 
  9982.     } 
  9983. } 
  9984.  
  9985. /** 
  9986.  * Mark end of page. 
  9987.  * @protected 
  9988.  */ 
  9989. protected function _endpage() { 
  9990.     $this->setVisibility('all'); 
  9991.     $this->state = 1; 
  9992. } 
  9993.  
  9994. /** 
  9995.  * Begin a new object and return the object number. 
  9996.  * @return int object number 
  9997.  * @protected 
  9998.  */ 
  9999. protected function _newobj() { 
  10000.     $this->_out($this->_getobj()); 
  10001.     return $this->n; 
  10002. } 
  10003.  
  10004. /** 
  10005.  * Return the starting object string for the selected object ID. 
  10006.  * @param $objid (int) Object ID (leave empty to get a new ID). 
  10007.  * @return string the starting object string 
  10008.  * @protected 
  10009.  * @since 5.8.009 (2010-08-20) 
  10010.  */ 
  10011. protected function _getobj($objid='') { 
  10012.     if ($objid === '') { 
  10013.         ++$this->n; 
  10014.         $objid = $this->n; 
  10015.     } 
  10016.     $this->offsets[$objid] = $this->bufferlen; 
  10017.     $this->pageobjects[$this->page][] = $objid; 
  10018.     return $objid.' 0 obj'; 
  10019. } 
  10020.  
  10021. /** 
  10022.  * Underline text. 
  10023.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10024.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10025.  * @param $txt (string) text to underline 
  10026.  * @protected 
  10027.  */ 
  10028. protected function _dounderline($x, $y, $txt) { 
  10029.     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  10030.     return $this->_dounderlinew($x, $y, $w); 
  10031. } 
  10032.  
  10033. /** 
  10034.  * Underline for rectangular text area. 
  10035.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10036.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10037.  * @param $w (int) width to underline 
  10038.  * @protected 
  10039.  * @since 4.8.008 (2009-09-29) 
  10040.  */ 
  10041. protected function _dounderlinew($x, $y, $w) { 
  10042.     $linew = - $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSizePt; 
  10043.     return sprintf('%F %F %F %F re f', $x * $this->k, ((($this->h - $y) * $this->k) + $linew), $w * $this->k, $linew); 
  10044. } 
  10045.  
  10046. /** 
  10047.  * Line through text. 
  10048.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10049.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10050.  * @param $txt (string) text to linethrough 
  10051.  * @protected 
  10052.  */ 
  10053. protected function _dolinethrough($x, $y, $txt) { 
  10054.     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  10055.     return $this->_dolinethroughw($x, $y, $w); 
  10056. } 
  10057.  
  10058. /** 
  10059.  * Line through for rectangular text area. 
  10060.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10061.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10062.  * @param $w (int) line length (width) 
  10063.  * @protected 
  10064.  * @since 4.9.008 (2009-09-29) 
  10065.  */ 
  10066. protected function _dolinethroughw($x, $y, $w) { 
  10067.     $linew = - $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSizePt; 
  10068.     return sprintf('%F %F %F %F re f', $x * $this->k, ((($this->h - $y) * $this->k) + $linew + ($this->FontSizePt / 3)), $w * $this->k, $linew); 
  10069. } 
  10070.  
  10071. /** 
  10072.  * Overline text. 
  10073.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10074.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10075.  * @param $txt (string) text to overline 
  10076.  * @protected 
  10077.  * @since 4.9.015 (2010-04-19) 
  10078.  */ 
  10079. protected function _dooverline($x, $y, $txt) { 
  10080.     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($txt); 
  10081.     return $this->_dooverlinew($x, $y, $w); 
  10082. } 
  10083.  
  10084. /** 
  10085.  * Overline for rectangular text area. 
  10086.  * @param $x (int) X coordinate 
  10087.  * @param $y (int) Y coordinate 
  10088.  * @param $w (int) width to overline 
  10089.  * @protected 
  10090.  * @since 4.9.015 (2010-04-19) 
  10091.  */ 
  10092. protected function _dooverlinew($x, $y, $w) { 
  10093.     $linew = - $this->CurrentFont['ut'] / 1000 * $this->FontSizePt; 
  10094.     return sprintf('%F %F %F %F re f', $x * $this->k, (($this->h - $y + $this->FontAscent) * $this->k) - $linew, $w * $this->k, $linew); 
  10095.  
  10096. } 
  10097.  
  10098. /** 
  10099.  * Format a data string for meta information 
  10100.  * @param $s (string) data string to escape. 
  10101.  * @param $n (int) object ID 
  10102.  * @return string escaped string. 
  10103.  * @protected 
  10104.  */ 
  10105. protected function _datastring($s, $n=0) { 
  10106.     if ($n == 0) { 
  10107.         $n = $this->n; 
  10108.     } 
  10109.     $s = $this->_encrypt_data($n, $s); 
  10110.     return '('. TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($s).')'; 
  10111. } 
  10112.  
  10113. /** 
  10114.  * Set the document creation timestamp 
  10115.  * @param $time (mixed) Document creation timestamp in seconds or date-time string. 
  10116.  * @public 
  10117.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10118.  */ 
  10119. public function setDocCreationTimestamp($time) { 
  10120.     if (is_string($time)) { 
  10121.         $time = TCPDF_STATIC::getTimestamp($time); 
  10122.     } 
  10123.     $this->doc_creation_timestamp = intval($time); 
  10124. } 
  10125.  
  10126. /** 
  10127.  * Set the document modification timestamp 
  10128.  * @param $time (mixed) Document modification timestamp in seconds or date-time string. 
  10129.  * @public 
  10130.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10131.  */ 
  10132. public function setDocModificationTimestamp($time) { 
  10133.     if (is_string($time)) { 
  10134.         $time = TCPDF_STATIC::getTimestamp($time); 
  10135.     } 
  10136.     $this->doc_modification_timestamp = intval($time); 
  10137. } 
  10138.  
  10139. /** 
  10140.  * Returns document creation timestamp in seconds. 
  10141.  * @return (int) Creation timestamp in seconds. 
  10142.  * @public 
  10143.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10144.  */ 
  10145. public function getDocCreationTimestamp() { 
  10146.     return $this->doc_creation_timestamp; 
  10147. } 
  10148.  
  10149. /** 
  10150.  * Returns document modification timestamp in seconds. 
  10151.  * @return (int) Modfication timestamp in seconds. 
  10152.  * @public 
  10153.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  10154.  */ 
  10155. public function getDocModificationTimestamp() { 
  10156.     return $this->doc_modification_timestamp; 
  10157. } 
  10158.  
  10159. /** 
  10160.  * Returns a formatted date for meta information 
  10161.  * @param $n (int) Object ID. 
  10162.  * @param $timestamp (int) Timestamp to convert. 
  10163.  * @return string escaped date string. 
  10164.  * @protected 
  10165.  * @since 4.6.028 (2009-08-25) 
  10166.  */ 
  10167. protected function _datestring($n=0, $timestamp=0) { 
  10168.     if ((empty($timestamp)) OR ($timestamp < 0)) { 
  10169.         $timestamp = $this->doc_creation_timestamp; 
  10170.     } 
  10171.     return $this->_datastring('D:'.TCPDF_STATIC::getFormattedDate($timestamp), $n); 
  10172. } 
  10173.  
  10174. /** 
  10175.  * Format a text string for meta information 
  10176.  * @param $s (string) string to escape. 
  10177.  * @param $n (int) object ID 
  10178.  * @return string escaped string. 
  10179.  * @protected 
  10180.  */ 
  10181. protected function _textstring($s, $n=0) { 
  10182.     if ($this->isunicode) { 
  10183.         //Convert string to UTF-16BE 
  10184.         $s = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($s, true, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  10185.     } 
  10186.     return $this->_datastring($s, $n); 
  10187. } 
  10188.  
  10189. /** 
  10190.  * THIS METHOD IS DEPRECATED 
  10191.  * Format a text string 
  10192.  * @param $s (string) string to escape. 
  10193.  * @return string escaped string. 
  10194.  * @protected 
  10195.  * @deprecated 
  10196.  */ 
  10197. protected function _escapetext($s) { 
  10198.     if ($this->isunicode) { 
  10199.         if (($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'core') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'TrueType') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'Type1')) { 
  10200.             $s = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToLatin1($s, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  10201.         } else { 
  10202.             //Convert string to UTF-16BE and reverse RTL language 
  10203.             $s = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8StrRev($s, false, $this->tmprtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  10204.         } 
  10205.     } 
  10206.     return TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($s); 
  10207. } 
  10208.  
  10209. /** 
  10210.  * get raw output stream. 
  10211.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10212.  * @param $n (int) object reference for encryption mode 
  10213.  * @protected 
  10214.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10215.  * @since 5.5.000 (2010-06-22) 
  10216.  */ 
  10217. protected function _getrawstream($s, $n=0) { 
  10218.     if ($n <= 0) { 
  10219.         // default to current object 
  10220.         $n = $this->n; 
  10221.     } 
  10222.     return $this->_encrypt_data($n, $s); 
  10223. } 
  10224.  
  10225. /** 
  10226.  * Format output stream (DEPRECATED). 
  10227.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10228.  * @param $n (int) object reference for encryption mode 
  10229.  * @protected 
  10230.  * @deprecated 
  10231.  */ 
  10232. protected function _getstream($s, $n=0) { 
  10233.     return 'stream'."\n".$this->_getrawstream($s, $n)."\n".'endstream'; 
  10234. } 
  10235.  
  10236. /** 
  10237.  * Output a stream (DEPRECATED). 
  10238.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10239.  * @param $n (int) object reference for encryption mode 
  10240.  * @protected 
  10241.  * @deprecated 
  10242.  */ 
  10243. protected function _putstream($s, $n=0) { 
  10244.     $this->_out($this->_getstream($s, $n)); 
  10245. } 
  10246.  
  10247. /** 
  10248.  * Output a string to the document. 
  10249.  * @param $s (string) string to output. 
  10250.  * @protected 
  10251.  */ 
  10252. protected function _out($s) { 
  10253.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  10254.         if ($this->inxobj) { 
  10255.             // we are inside an XObject template 
  10256.             $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] .= $s."\n"; 
  10257.         } elseif ((!$this->InFooter) AND isset($this->footerlen[$this->page]) AND ($this->footerlen[$this->page] > 0)) { 
  10258.             // puts data before page footer 
  10259.             $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  10260.             $page = substr($pagebuff, 0, -$this->footerlen[$this->page]); 
  10261.             $footer = substr($pagebuff, -$this->footerlen[$this->page]); 
  10262.             $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $page.$s."\n".$footer); 
  10263.             // update footer position 
  10264.             $this->footerpos[$this->page] += strlen($s."\n"); 
  10265.         } else { 
  10266.             // set page data 
  10267.             $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $s."\n", true); 
  10268.         } 
  10269.     } elseif ($this->state > 0) { 
  10270.         // set general data 
  10271.         $this->setBuffer($s."\n"); 
  10272.     } 
  10273. } 
  10274.  
  10275. /** 
  10276.  * Set header font. 
  10277.  * @param $font (array) Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10278.  * @public 
  10279.  * @since 1.1 
  10280.  */ 
  10281. public function setHeaderFont($font) { 
  10282.     $this->header_font = $font; 
  10283. } 
  10284.  
  10285. /** 
  10286.  * Get header font. 
  10287.  * @return array() Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10288.  * @public 
  10289.  * @since 3.0.012 (2008-07-24) 
  10290.  */ 
  10291. public function getHeaderFont() { 
  10292.     return $this->header_font; 
  10293. } 
  10294.  
  10295. /** 
  10296.  * Set footer font. 
  10297.  * @param $font (array) Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10298.  * @public 
  10299.  * @since 1.1 
  10300.  */ 
  10301. public function setFooterFont($font) { 
  10302.     $this->footer_font = $font; 
  10303. } 
  10304.  
  10305. /** 
  10306.  * Get Footer font. 
  10307.  * @return array() Array describing the basic font parameters: (family, style, size). 
  10308.  * @public 
  10309.  * @since 3.0.012 (2008-07-24) 
  10310.  */ 
  10311. public function getFooterFont() { 
  10312.     return $this->footer_font; 
  10313. } 
  10314.  
  10315. /** 
  10316.  * Set language array. 
  10317.  * @param $language (array) 
  10318.  * @public 
  10319.  * @since 1.1 
  10320.  */ 
  10321. public function setLanguageArray($language) { 
  10322.     $this->l = $language; 
  10323.     if (isset($this->l['a_meta_dir'])) { 
  10324.         $this->rtl = $this->l['a_meta_dir']=='rtl' ? true : false; 
  10325.     } else { 
  10326.         $this->rtl = false; 
  10327.     } 
  10328. } 
  10329.  
  10330. /** 
  10331.  * Returns the PDF data. 
  10332.  * @public 
  10333.  */ 
  10334. public function getPDFData() { 
  10335.     if ($this->state < 3) { 
  10336.         $this->Close(); 
  10337.     } 
  10338.     return $this->buffer; 
  10339. } 
  10340.  
  10341. /** 
  10342.  * Output anchor link. 
  10343.  * @param $url (string) link URL or internal link (i.e.: <a href="#23, 4.5">link to page 23 at 4.5 Y position</a>) 
  10344.  * @param $name (string) link name 
  10345.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  10346.  * @param $firstline (boolean) if true prints only the first line and return the remaining string. 
  10347.  * @param $color (array) array of RGB text color 
  10348.  * @param $style (string) font style (U, D, B, I) 
  10349.  * @param $firstblock (boolean) if true the string is the starting of a line. 
  10350.  * @return the number of cells used or the remaining text if $firstline = true; 
  10351.  * @public 
  10352.  */ 
  10353. public function addHtmlLink($url, $name, $fill=false, $firstline=false, $color='', $style=-1, $firstblock=false) { 
  10354.     if (isset($url[1]) AND ($url[0] == '#')) { 
  10355.         // convert url to internal link 
  10356.         $lnkdata = explode(', ', $url); 
  10357.         if (isset($lnkdata[0]) ) { 
  10358.             $page = substr($lnkdata[0], 1); 
  10359.             if (isset($lnkdata[1]) AND (strlen($lnkdata[1]) > 0)) { 
  10360.                 $lnky = floatval($lnkdata[1]); 
  10361.             } else { 
  10362.                 $lnky = 0; 
  10363.             } 
  10364.             $url = $this->AddLink(); 
  10365.             $this->SetLink($url, $lnky, $page); 
  10366.         } 
  10367.     } 
  10368.     // store current settings 
  10369.     $prevcolor = $this->fgcolor; 
  10370.     $prevstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  10371.     if (empty($color)) { 
  10372.         $this->SetTextColorArray($this->htmlLinkColorArray); 
  10373.     } else { 
  10374.         $this->SetTextColorArray($color); 
  10375.     } 
  10376.     if ($style == -1) { 
  10377.         $this->SetFont('', $this->FontStyle.$this->htmlLinkFontStyle); 
  10378.     } else { 
  10379.         $this->SetFont('', $this->FontStyle.$style); 
  10380.     } 
  10381.     $ret = $this->Write($this->lasth, $name, $url, $fill, '', false, 0, $firstline, $firstblock, 0); 
  10382.     // restore settings 
  10383.     $this->SetFont('', $prevstyle); 
  10384.     $this->SetTextColorArray($prevcolor); 
  10385.     return $ret; 
  10386. } 
  10387.  
  10388. /** 
  10389.  * Converts pixels to User's Units. 
  10390.  * @param $px (int) pixels 
  10391.  * @return float value in user's unit 
  10392.  * @public 
  10393.  * @see setImageScale(), getImageScale() 
  10394.  */ 
  10395. public function pixelsToUnits($px) { 
  10396.     return ($px / ($this->imgscale * $this->k)); 
  10397. } 
  10398.  
  10399. /** 
  10400.  * Reverse function for htmlentities. 
  10401.  * Convert entities in UTF-8. 
  10402.  * @param $text_to_convert (string) Text to convert. 
  10403.  * @return string converted text string 
  10404.  * @public 
  10405.  */ 
  10406. public function unhtmlentities($text_to_convert) { 
  10407.     return @html_entity_decode($text_to_convert, ENT_QUOTES, $this->encoding); 
  10408. } 
  10409.  
  10410. // ENCRYPTION METHODS ---------------------------------- 
  10411.  
  10412. /** 
  10413.  * Compute encryption key depending on object number where the encrypted data is stored. 
  10414.  * This is used for all strings and streams without crypt filter specifier. 
  10415.  * @param $n (int) object number 
  10416.  * @return int object key 
  10417.  * @protected 
  10418.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10419.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10420.  */ 
  10421. protected function _objectkey($n) { 
  10422.     $objkey = $this->encryptdata['key'].pack('VXxx', $n); 
  10423.     if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 2) { // AES-128 
  10424.         // AES padding 
  10425.         $objkey .= "\x73\x41\x6C\x54"; // sAlT 
  10426.     } 
  10427.     $objkey = substr(TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16($objkey), 0, (($this->encryptdata['Length'] / 8) + 5)); 
  10428.     $objkey = substr($objkey, 0, 16); 
  10429.     return $objkey; 
  10430. } 
  10431.  
  10432. /** 
  10433.  * Encrypt the input string. 
  10434.  * @param $n (int) object number 
  10435.  * @param $s (string) data string to encrypt 
  10436.  * @return encrypted string 
  10437.  * @protected 
  10438.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10439.  * @since 5.0.005 (2010-05-11) 
  10440.  */ 
  10441. protected function _encrypt_data($n, $s) { 
  10442.     if (!$this->encrypted) { 
  10443.         return $s; 
  10444.     } 
  10445.     switch ($this->encryptdata['mode']) { 
  10446.         case 0:   // RC4-40 
  10447.         case 1: { // RC4-128 
  10448.             $s = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($this->_objectkey($n), $s, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10449.             break; 
  10450.         } 
  10451.         case 2: { // AES-128 
  10452.             $s = TCPDF_STATIC::_AES($this->_objectkey($n), $s); 
  10453.             break; 
  10454.         } 
  10455.         case 3: { // AES-256 
  10456.             $s = TCPDF_STATIC::_AES($this->encryptdata['key'], $s); 
  10457.             break; 
  10458.         } 
  10459.     } 
  10460.     return $s; 
  10461. } 
  10462.  
  10463. /** 
  10464.  * Put encryption on PDF document. 
  10465.  * @protected 
  10466.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10467.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10468.  */ 
  10469. protected function _putencryption() { 
  10470.     if (!$this->encrypted) { 
  10471.         return; 
  10472.     } 
  10473.     $this->encryptdata['objid'] = $this->_newobj(); 
  10474.     $out = '<<'; 
  10475.     if (!isset($this->encryptdata['Filter']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['Filter'])) { 
  10476.         $this->encryptdata['Filter'] = 'Standard'; 
  10477.     } 
  10478.     $out .= ' /Filter /'.$this->encryptdata['Filter']; 
  10479.     if (isset($this->encryptdata['SubFilter']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['SubFilter'])) { 
  10480.         $out .= ' /SubFilter /'.$this->encryptdata['SubFilter']; 
  10481.     } 
  10482.     if (!isset($this->encryptdata['V']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['V'])) { 
  10483.         $this->encryptdata['V'] = 1; 
  10484.     } 
  10485.     // V is a code specifying the algorithm to be used in encrypting and decrypting the document 
  10486.     $out .= ' /V '.$this->encryptdata['V']; 
  10487.     if (isset($this->encryptdata['Length']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['Length'])) { 
  10488.         // The length of the encryption key, in bits. The value shall be a multiple of 8, in the range 40 to 256 
  10489.         $out .= ' /Length '.$this->encryptdata['Length']; 
  10490.     } else { 
  10491.         $out .= ' /Length 40'; 
  10492.     } 
  10493.     if ($this->encryptdata['V'] >= 4) { 
  10494.         if (!isset($this->encryptdata['StmF']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['StmF'])) { 
  10495.             $this->encryptdata['StmF'] = 'Identity'; 
  10496.         } 
  10497.         if (!isset($this->encryptdata['StrF']) OR empty($this->encryptdata['StrF'])) { 
  10498.             // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used when decrypting all strings in the document. 
  10499.             $this->encryptdata['StrF'] = 'Identity'; 
  10500.         } 
  10501.         // A dictionary whose keys shall be crypt filter names and whose values shall be the corresponding crypt filter dictionaries. 
  10502.         if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF'])) { 
  10503.             $out .= ' /CF <<'; 
  10504.             $out .= ' /'.$this->encryptdata['StmF'].' <<'; 
  10505.             $out .= ' /Type /CryptFilter'; 
  10506.             if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM'])) { 
  10507.                 // The method used 
  10508.                 $out .= ' /CFM /'.$this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM']; 
  10509.                 if ($this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { 
  10510.                     $out .= ' /Recipients ['; 
  10511.                     foreach ($this->encryptdata['Recipients'] as $rec) { 
  10512.                         $out .= ' <'.$rec.'>'; 
  10513.                     } 
  10514.                     $out .= ' ]'; 
  10515.                     if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['EncryptMetadata']) AND (!$this->encryptdata['CF']['EncryptMetadata'])) { 
  10516.                         $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata false'; 
  10517.                     } else { 
  10518.                         $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata true'; 
  10519.                     } 
  10520.                 } 
  10521.             } else { 
  10522.                 $out .= ' /CFM /None'; 
  10523.             } 
  10524.             if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['AuthEvent']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF']['AuthEvent'])) { 
  10525.                 // The event to be used to trigger the authorization that is required to access encryption keys used by this filter. 
  10526.                 $out .= ' /AuthEvent /'.$this->encryptdata['CF']['AuthEvent']; 
  10527.             } else { 
  10528.                 $out .= ' /AuthEvent /DocOpen'; 
  10529.             } 
  10530.             if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['Length']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['CF']['Length'])) { 
  10531.                 // The bit length of the encryption key. 
  10532.                 $out .= ' /Length '.$this->encryptdata['CF']['Length']; 
  10533.             } 
  10534.             $out .= ' >> >>'; 
  10535.         } 
  10536.         // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used by default when decrypting streams. 
  10537.         $out .= ' /StmF /'.$this->encryptdata['StmF']; 
  10538.         // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used when decrypting all strings in the document. 
  10539.         $out .= ' /StrF /'.$this->encryptdata['StrF']; 
  10540.         if (isset($this->encryptdata['EFF']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['EFF'])) { 
  10541.             // The name of the crypt filter that shall be used when encrypting embedded file streams that do not have their own crypt filter specifier. 
  10542.             $out .= ' /EFF /'.$this->encryptdata['']; 
  10543.         } 
  10544.     } 
  10545.     // Additional encryption dictionary entries for the standard security handler 
  10546.     if ($this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { 
  10547.         if (($this->encryptdata['V'] < 4) AND isset($this->encryptdata['Recipients']) AND !empty($this->encryptdata['Recipients'])) { 
  10548.             $out .= ' /Recipients ['; 
  10549.             foreach ($this->encryptdata['Recipients'] as $rec) { 
  10550.                 $out .= ' <'.$rec.'>'; 
  10551.             } 
  10552.             $out .= ' ]'; 
  10553.         } 
  10554.     } else { 
  10555.         $out .= ' /R'; 
  10556.         if ($this->encryptdata['V'] == 5) { // AES-256 
  10557.             $out .= ' 5'; 
  10558.             $out .= ' /OE ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['OE']).')'; 
  10559.             $out .= ' /UE ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['UE']).')'; 
  10560.             $out .= ' /Perms ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['perms']).')'; 
  10561.         } elseif ($this->encryptdata['V'] == 4) { // AES-128 
  10562.             $out .= ' 4'; 
  10563.         } elseif ($this->encryptdata['V'] < 2) { // RC-40 
  10564.             $out .= ' 2'; 
  10565.         } else { // RC-128 
  10566.             $out .= ' 3'; 
  10567.         } 
  10568.         $out .= ' /O ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['O']).')'; 
  10569.         $out .= ' /U ('.TCPDF_STATIC::_escape($this->encryptdata['U']).')'; 
  10570.         $out .= ' /P '.$this->encryptdata['P']; 
  10571.         if (isset($this->encryptdata['EncryptMetadata']) AND (!$this->encryptdata['EncryptMetadata'])) { 
  10572.             $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata false'; 
  10573.         } else { 
  10574.             $out .= ' /EncryptMetadata true'; 
  10575.         } 
  10576.     } 
  10577.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  10578.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  10579.     $this->_out($out); 
  10580. } 
  10581.  
  10582. /** 
  10583.  * Compute U value (used for encryption) 
  10584.  * @return string U value 
  10585.  * @protected 
  10586.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10587.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10588.  */ 
  10589. protected function _Uvalue() { 
  10590.     if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 0) { // RC4-40 
  10591.         return TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($this->encryptdata['key'], TCPDF_STATIC::$enc_padding, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10592.     } elseif ($this->encryptdata['mode'] < 3) { // RC4-128, AES-128 
  10593.         $tmp = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16(TCPDF_STATIC::$enc_padding.$this->encryptdata['fileid']); 
  10594.         $enc = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($this->encryptdata['key'], $tmp, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10595.         $len = strlen($tmp); 
  10596.         for ($i = 1; $i <= 19; ++$i) { 
  10597.             $ek = ''; 
  10598.             for ($j = 0; $j < $len; ++$j) { 
  10599.                 $ek .= chr(ord($this->encryptdata['key'][$j]) ^ $i); 
  10600.             } 
  10601.             $enc = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($ek, $enc, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10602.         } 
  10603.         $enc .= str_repeat("\x00", 16); 
  10604.         return substr($enc, 0, 32); 
  10605.     } elseif ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 3) { // AES-256 
  10606.         $seed = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16(TCPDF_STATIC::getRandomSeed()); 
  10607.         // User Validation Salt 
  10608.         $this->encryptdata['UVS'] = substr($seed, 0, 8); 
  10609.         // User Key Salt 
  10610.         $this->encryptdata['UKS'] = substr($seed, 8, 16); 
  10611.         return hash('sha256', $this->encryptdata['user_password'].$this->encryptdata['UVS'], true).$this->encryptdata['UVS'].$this->encryptdata['UKS']; 
  10612.     } 
  10613. } 
  10614.  
  10615. /** 
  10616.  * Compute UE value (used for encryption) 
  10617.  * @return string UE value 
  10618.  * @protected 
  10619.  * @since 5.9.006 (2010-10-19) 
  10620.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10621.  */ 
  10622. protected function _UEvalue() { 
  10623.     $hashkey = hash('sha256', $this->encryptdata['user_password'].$this->encryptdata['UKS'], true); 
  10624.     $iv = str_repeat("\x00", mcrypt_get_iv_size(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, MCRYPT_MODE_CBC)); 
  10625.     return mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $hashkey, $this->encryptdata['key'], MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $iv); 
  10626. } 
  10627.  
  10628. /** 
  10629.  * Compute O value (used for encryption) 
  10630.  * @return string O value 
  10631.  * @protected 
  10632.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10633.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10634.  */ 
  10635. protected function _Ovalue() { 
  10636.     if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] < 3) { // RC4-40, RC4-128, AES-128 
  10637.         $tmp = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16($this->encryptdata['owner_password']); 
  10638.         if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] > 0) { 
  10639.             for ($i = 0; $i < 50; ++$i) { 
  10640.                 $tmp = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16($tmp); 
  10641.             } 
  10642.         } 
  10643.         $owner_key = substr($tmp, 0, ($this->encryptdata['Length'] / 8)); 
  10644.         $enc = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($owner_key, $this->encryptdata['user_password'], $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10645.         if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] > 0) { 
  10646.             $len = strlen($owner_key); 
  10647.             for ($i = 1; $i <= 19; ++$i) { 
  10648.                 $ek = ''; 
  10649.                 for ($j = 0; $j < $len; ++$j) { 
  10650.                     $ek .= chr(ord($owner_key[$j]) ^ $i); 
  10651.                 } 
  10652.                 $enc = TCPDF_STATIC::_RC4($ek, $enc, $this->last_enc_key, $this->last_enc_key_c); 
  10653.             } 
  10654.         } 
  10655.         return $enc; 
  10656.     } elseif ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 3) { // AES-256 
  10657.         $seed = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16(TCPDF_STATIC::getRandomSeed()); 
  10658.         // Owner Validation Salt 
  10659.         $this->encryptdata['OVS'] = substr($seed, 0, 8); 
  10660.         // Owner Key Salt 
  10661.         $this->encryptdata['OKS'] = substr($seed, 8, 16); 
  10662.         return hash('sha256', $this->encryptdata['owner_password'].$this->encryptdata['OVS'].$this->encryptdata['U'], true).$this->encryptdata['OVS'].$this->encryptdata['OKS']; 
  10663.     } 
  10664. } 
  10665.  
  10666. /** 
  10667.  * Compute OE value (used for encryption) 
  10668.  * @return string OE value 
  10669.  * @protected 
  10670.  * @since 5.9.006 (2010-10-19) 
  10671.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10672.  */ 
  10673. protected function _OEvalue() { 
  10674.     $hashkey = hash('sha256', $this->encryptdata['owner_password'].$this->encryptdata['OKS'].$this->encryptdata['U'], true); 
  10675.     $iv = str_repeat("\x00", mcrypt_get_iv_size(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, MCRYPT_MODE_CBC)); 
  10676.     return mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $hashkey, $this->encryptdata['key'], MCRYPT_MODE_CBC, $iv); 
  10677. } 
  10678.  
  10679. /** 
  10680.  * Convert password for AES-256 encryption mode 
  10681.  * @param $password (string) password 
  10682.  * @return string password 
  10683.  * @protected 
  10684.  * @since 5.9.006 (2010-10-19) 
  10685.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10686.  */ 
  10687. protected function _fixAES256Password($password) { 
  10688.     $psw = ''; // password to be returned 
  10689.     $psw_array = TCPDF_FONTS::utf8Bidi(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($password, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont), $password, $this->rtl, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  10690.     foreach ($psw_array as $c) { 
  10691.         $psw .= TCPDF_FONTS::unichr($c, $this->isunicode); 
  10692.     } 
  10693.     return substr($psw, 0, 127); 
  10694. } 
  10695.  
  10696. /** 
  10697.  * Compute encryption key 
  10698.  * @protected 
  10699.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10700.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10701.  */ 
  10702. protected function _generateencryptionkey() { 
  10703.     $keybytelen = ($this->encryptdata['Length'] / 8); 
  10704.     if (!$this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { // standard mode 
  10705.         if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 3) { // AES-256 
  10706.             // generate 256 bit random key 
  10707.             $this->encryptdata['key'] = substr(hash('sha256', TCPDF_STATIC::getRandomSeed(), true), 0, $keybytelen); 
  10708.             // truncate passwords 
  10709.             $this->encryptdata['user_password'] = $this->_fixAES256Password($this->encryptdata['user_password']); 
  10710.             $this->encryptdata['owner_password'] = $this->_fixAES256Password($this->encryptdata['owner_password']); 
  10711.             // Compute U value 
  10712.             $this->encryptdata['U'] = $this->_Uvalue(); 
  10713.             // Compute UE value 
  10714.             $this->encryptdata['UE'] = $this->_UEvalue(); 
  10715.             // Compute O value 
  10716.             $this->encryptdata['O'] = $this->_Ovalue(); 
  10717.             // Compute OE value 
  10718.             $this->encryptdata['OE'] = $this->_OEvalue(); 
  10719.             // Compute P value 
  10720.             $this->encryptdata['P'] = $this->encryptdata['protection']; 
  10721.             // Computing the encryption dictionary's Perms (permissions) value 
  10722.             $perms = TCPDF_STATIC::getEncPermissionsString($this->encryptdata['protection']); // bytes 0-3 
  10723.             $perms .= chr(255).chr(255).chr(255).chr(255); // bytes 4-7 
  10724.             if (isset($this->encryptdata['CF']['EncryptMetadata']) AND (!$this->encryptdata['CF']['EncryptMetadata'])) { // byte 8 
  10725.                 $perms .= 'F'; 
  10726.             } else { 
  10727.                 $perms .= 'T'; 
  10728.             } 
  10729.             $perms .= 'adb'; // bytes 9-11 
  10730.             $perms .= 'nick'; // bytes 12-15 
  10731.             $iv = str_repeat("\x00", mcrypt_get_iv_size(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, MCRYPT_MODE_ECB)); 
  10732.             $this->encryptdata['perms'] = mcrypt_encrypt(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128, $this->encryptdata['key'], $perms, MCRYPT_MODE_ECB, $iv); 
  10733.         } else { // RC4-40, RC4-128, AES-128 
  10734.             // Pad passwords 
  10735.             $this->encryptdata['user_password'] = substr($this->encryptdata['user_password'].TCPDF_STATIC::$enc_padding, 0, 32); 
  10736.             $this->encryptdata['owner_password'] = substr($this->encryptdata['owner_password'].TCPDF_STATIC::$enc_padding, 0, 32); 
  10737.             // Compute O value 
  10738.             $this->encryptdata['O'] = $this->_Ovalue(); 
  10739.             // get default permissions (reverse byte order) 
  10740.             $permissions = TCPDF_STATIC::getEncPermissionsString($this->encryptdata['protection']); 
  10741.             // Compute encryption key 
  10742.             $tmp = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16($this->encryptdata['user_password'].$this->encryptdata['O'].$permissions.$this->encryptdata['fileid']); 
  10743.             if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] > 0) { 
  10744.                 for ($i = 0; $i < 50; ++$i) { 
  10745.                     $tmp = TCPDF_STATIC::_md5_16(substr($tmp, 0, $keybytelen)); 
  10746.                 } 
  10747.             } 
  10748.             $this->encryptdata['key'] = substr($tmp, 0, $keybytelen); 
  10749.             // Compute U value 
  10750.             $this->encryptdata['U'] = $this->_Uvalue(); 
  10751.             // Compute P value 
  10752.             $this->encryptdata['P'] = $this->encryptdata['protection']; 
  10753.         } 
  10754.     } else { // Public-Key mode 
  10755.         // random 20-byte seed 
  10756.         $seed = sha1(TCPDF_STATIC::getRandomSeed(), true); 
  10757.         $recipient_bytes = ''; 
  10758.         foreach ($this->encryptdata['pubkeys'] as $pubkey) { 
  10759.             // for each public certificate 
  10760.             if (isset($pubkey['p'])) { 
  10761.                 $pkprotection = TCPDF_STATIC::getUserPermissionCode($pubkey['p'], $this->encryptdata['mode']); 
  10762.             } else { 
  10763.                 $pkprotection = $this->encryptdata['protection']; 
  10764.             } 
  10765.             // get default permissions (reverse byte order) 
  10766.             $pkpermissions = TCPDF_STATIC::getEncPermissionsString($pkprotection); 
  10767.             // envelope data 
  10768.             $envelope = $seed.$pkpermissions; 
  10769.             // write the envelope data to a temporary file 
  10770.             $tempkeyfile = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('key'); 
  10771.             $f = fopen($tempkeyfile, 'wb'); 
  10772.             if (!$f) { 
  10773.                 $this->Error('Unable to create temporary key file: '.$tempkeyfile); 
  10774.             } 
  10775.             $envelope_length = strlen($envelope); 
  10776.             fwrite($f, $envelope, $envelope_length); 
  10777.             fclose($f); 
  10778.             $tempencfile = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('enc'); 
  10779.             if (!openssl_pkcs7_encrypt($tempkeyfile, $tempencfile, $pubkey['c'], array(), PKCS7_BINARY | PKCS7_DETACHED)) { 
  10780.                 $this->Error('Unable to encrypt the file: '.$tempkeyfile); 
  10781.             } 
  10782.             unlink($tempkeyfile); 
  10783.             // read encryption signature 
  10784.             $signature = file_get_contents($tempencfile, false, null, $envelope_length); 
  10785.             unlink($tempencfile); 
  10786.             // extract signature 
  10787.             $signature = substr($signature, strpos($signature, 'Content-Disposition')); 
  10788.             $tmparr = explode("\n\n", $signature); 
  10789.             $signature = trim($tmparr[1]); 
  10790.             unset($tmparr); 
  10791.             // decode signature 
  10792.             $signature = base64_decode($signature); 
  10793.             // convert signature to hex 
  10794.             $hexsignature = current(unpack('H*', $signature)); 
  10795.             // store signature on recipients array 
  10796.             $this->encryptdata['Recipients'][] = $hexsignature; 
  10797.             // The bytes of each item in the Recipients array of PKCS#7 objects in the order in which they appear in the array 
  10798.             $recipient_bytes .= $signature; 
  10799.         } 
  10800.         // calculate encryption key 
  10801.         if ($this->encryptdata['mode'] == 3) { // AES-256 
  10802.             $this->encryptdata['key'] = substr(hash('sha256', $seed.$recipient_bytes, true), 0, $keybytelen); 
  10803.         } else { // RC4-40, RC4-128, AES-128 
  10804.             $this->encryptdata['key'] = substr(sha1($seed.$recipient_bytes, true), 0, $keybytelen); 
  10805.         } 
  10806.     } 
  10807. } 
  10808.  
  10809. /** 
  10810.  * Set document protection 
  10811.  * Remark: the protection against modification is for people who have the full Acrobat product. 
  10812.  * If you don't set any password, the document will open as usual. If you set a user password, the PDF viewer will ask for it before displaying the document. The master password, if different from the user one, can be used to get full access. 
  10813.  * Note: protecting a document requires to encrypt it, which increases the processing time a lot. This can cause a PHP time-out in some cases, especially if the document contains images or fonts. 
  10814.  * @param $permissions (Array) the set of permissions (specify the ones you want to block):<ul><li>print : Print the document;</li><li>modify : Modify the contents of the document by operations other than those controlled by 'fill-forms', 'extract' and 'assemble';</li><li>copy : Copy or otherwise extract text and graphics from the document;</li><li>annot-forms : Add or modify text annotations, fill in interactive form fields, and, if 'modify' is also set, create or modify interactive form fields (including signature fields);</li><li>fill-forms : Fill in existing interactive form fields (including signature fields), even if 'annot-forms' is not specified;</li><li>extract : Extract text and graphics (in support of accessibility to users with disabilities or for other purposes);</li><li>assemble : Assemble the document (insert, rotate, or delete pages and create bookmarks or thumbnail images), even if 'modify' is not set;</li><li>print-high : Print the document to a representation from which a faithful digital copy of the PDF content could be generated. When this is not set, printing is limited to a low-level representation of the appearance, possibly of degraded quality.</li><li>owner : (inverted logic - only for public-key) when set permits change of encryption and enables all other permissions.</li></ul> 
  10815.  * @param $user_pass (String) user password. Empty by default. 
  10816.  * @param $owner_pass (String) owner password. If not specified, a random value is used. 
  10817.  * @param $mode (int) encryption strength: 0 = RC4 40 bit; 1 = RC4 128 bit; 2 = AES 128 bit; 3 = AES 256 bit. 
  10818.  * @param $pubkeys (String) array of recipients containing public-key certificates ('c') and permissions ('p'). For example: array(array('c' => 'file://../examples/data/cert/tcpdf.crt', 'p' => array('print'))) 
  10819.  * @public 
  10820.  * @since 2.0.000 (2008-01-02) 
  10821.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  10822.  */ 
  10823. public function SetProtection($permissions=array('print', 'modify', 'copy', 'annot-forms', 'fill-forms', 'extract', 'assemble', 'print-high'), $user_pass='', $owner_pass=null, $mode=0, $pubkeys=null) { 
  10824.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  10825.         // encryption is not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  10826.         return; 
  10827.     } 
  10828.     $this->encryptdata['protection'] = TCPDF_STATIC::getUserPermissionCode($permissions, $mode); 
  10829.     if (($pubkeys !== null) AND (is_array($pubkeys))) { 
  10830.         // public-key mode 
  10831.         $this->encryptdata['pubkeys'] = $pubkeys; 
  10832.         if ($mode == 0) { 
  10833.             // public-Key Security requires at least 128 bit 
  10834.             $mode = 1; 
  10835.         } 
  10836.         if (!function_exists('openssl_pkcs7_encrypt')) { 
  10837.             $this->Error('Public-Key Security requires openssl library.'); 
  10838.         } 
  10839.         // Set Public-Key filter (availabe are: Entrust.PPKEF, Adobe.PPKLite, Adobe.PubSec) 
  10840.         $this->encryptdata['pubkey'] = true; 
  10841.         $this->encryptdata['Filter'] = 'Adobe.PubSec'; 
  10842.         $this->encryptdata['StmF'] = 'DefaultCryptFilter'; 
  10843.         $this->encryptdata['StrF'] = 'DefaultCryptFilter'; 
  10844.     } else { 
  10845.         // standard mode (password mode) 
  10846.         $this->encryptdata['pubkey'] = false; 
  10847.         $this->encryptdata['Filter'] = 'Standard'; 
  10848.         $this->encryptdata['StmF'] = 'StdCF'; 
  10849.         $this->encryptdata['StrF'] = 'StdCF'; 
  10850.     } 
  10851.     if ($mode > 1) { // AES 
  10852.         if (!extension_loaded('mcrypt')) { 
  10853.             $this->Error('AES encryption requires mcrypt library (http://www.php.net/manual/en/mcrypt.requirements.php).'); 
  10854.         } 
  10855.         if (mcrypt_get_cipher_name(MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128) === false) { 
  10856.             $this->Error('AES encryption requires MCRYPT_RIJNDAEL_128 cypher.'); 
  10857.         } 
  10858.         if (($mode == 3) AND !function_exists('hash')) { 
  10859.             // the Hash extension requires no external libraries and is enabled by default as of PHP 5.1.2. 
  10860.             $this->Error('AES 256 encryption requires HASH Message Digest Framework (http://www.php.net/manual/en/book.hash.php).'); 
  10861.         } 
  10862.     } 
  10863.     if ($owner_pass === null) { 
  10864.         $owner_pass = md5(TCPDF_STATIC::getRandomSeed()); 
  10865.     } 
  10866.     $this->encryptdata['user_password'] = $user_pass; 
  10867.     $this->encryptdata['owner_password'] = $owner_pass; 
  10868.     $this->encryptdata['mode'] = $mode; 
  10869.     switch ($mode) { 
  10870.         case 0: { // RC4 40 bit 
  10871.             $this->encryptdata['V'] = 1; 
  10872.             $this->encryptdata['Length'] = 40; 
  10873.             $this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM'] = 'V2'; 
  10874.             break; 
  10875.         } 
  10876.         case 1: { // RC4 128 bit 
  10877.             $this->encryptdata['V'] = 2; 
  10878.             $this->encryptdata['Length'] = 128; 
  10879.             $this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM'] = 'V2'; 
  10880.             if ($this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { 
  10881.                 $this->encryptdata['SubFilter'] = 'adbe.pkcs7.s4'; 
  10882.                 $this->encryptdata['Recipients'] = array(); 
  10883.             } 
  10884.             break; 
  10885.         } 
  10886.         case 2: { // AES 128 bit 
  10887.             $this->encryptdata['V'] = 4; 
  10888.             $this->encryptdata['Length'] = 128; 
  10889.             $this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM'] = 'AESV2'; 
  10890.             $this->encryptdata['CF']['Length'] = 128; 
  10891.             if ($this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { 
  10892.                 $this->encryptdata['SubFilter'] = 'adbe.pkcs7.s5'; 
  10893.                 $this->encryptdata['Recipients'] = array(); 
  10894.             } 
  10895.             break; 
  10896.         } 
  10897.         case 3: { // AES 256 bit 
  10898.             $this->encryptdata['V'] = 5; 
  10899.             $this->encryptdata['Length'] = 256; 
  10900.             $this->encryptdata['CF']['CFM'] = 'AESV3'; 
  10901.             $this->encryptdata['CF']['Length'] = 256; 
  10902.             if ($this->encryptdata['pubkey']) { 
  10903.                 $this->encryptdata['SubFilter'] = 'adbe.pkcs7.s5'; 
  10904.                 $this->encryptdata['Recipients'] = array(); 
  10905.             } 
  10906.             break; 
  10907.         } 
  10908.     } 
  10909.     $this->encrypted = true; 
  10910.     $this->encryptdata['fileid'] = TCPDF_STATIC::convertHexStringToString($this->file_id); 
  10911.     $this->_generateencryptionkey(); 
  10912. } 
  10913.  
  10914. // END OF ENCRYPTION FUNCTIONS ------------------------- 
  10915.  
  10916. // START TRANSFORMATIONS SECTION ----------------------- 
  10917.  
  10918. /** 
  10919.  * Starts a 2D tranformation saving current graphic state. 
  10920.  * This function must be called before scaling, mirroring, translation, rotation and skewing. 
  10921.  * Use StartTransform() before, and StopTransform() after the transformations to restore the normal behavior. 
  10922.  * @public 
  10923.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  10924.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  10925.  */ 
  10926. public function StartTransform() { 
  10927.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  10928.         return; 
  10929.     } 
  10930.     $this->_outSaveGraphicsState(); 
  10931.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  10932.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  10933.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][] = strlen($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']); 
  10934.     } else { 
  10935.         $this->transfmrk[$this->page][] = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  10936.     } 
  10937.     ++$this->transfmatrix_key; 
  10938.     $this->transfmatrix[$this->transfmatrix_key] = array(); 
  10939. } 
  10940.  
  10941. /** 
  10942.  * Stops a 2D tranformation restoring previous graphic state. 
  10943.  * This function must be called after scaling, mirroring, translation, rotation and skewing. 
  10944.  * Use StartTransform() before, and StopTransform() after the transformations to restore the normal behavior. 
  10945.  * @public 
  10946.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  10947.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  10948.  */ 
  10949. public function StopTransform() { 
  10950.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  10951.         return; 
  10952.     } 
  10953.     $this->_outRestoreGraphicsState(); 
  10954.     if (isset($this->transfmatrix[$this->transfmatrix_key])) { 
  10955.         array_pop($this->transfmatrix[$this->transfmatrix_key]); 
  10956.         --$this->transfmatrix_key; 
  10957.     } 
  10958.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  10959.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  10960.         array_pop($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  10961.     } else { 
  10962.         array_pop($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  10963.     } 
  10964. } 
  10965. /** 
  10966.  * Horizontal Scaling. 
  10967.  * @param $s_x (float) scaling factor for width as percent. 0 is not allowed. 
  10968.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the scaling center. Default is current x position 
  10969.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the scaling center. Default is current y position 
  10970.  * @public 
  10971.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  10972.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  10973.  */ 
  10974. public function ScaleX($s_x, $x='', $y='') { 
  10975.     $this->Scale($s_x, 100, $x, $y); 
  10976. } 
  10977.  
  10978. /** 
  10979.  * Vertical Scaling. 
  10980.  * @param $s_y (float) scaling factor for height as percent. 0 is not allowed. 
  10981.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the scaling center. Default is current x position 
  10982.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the scaling center. Default is current y position 
  10983.  * @public 
  10984.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  10985.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  10986.  */ 
  10987. public function ScaleY($s_y, $x='', $y='') { 
  10988.     $this->Scale(100, $s_y, $x, $y); 
  10989. } 
  10990.  
  10991. /** 
  10992.  * Vertical and horizontal proportional Scaling. 
  10993.  * @param $s (float) scaling factor for width and height as percent. 0 is not allowed. 
  10994.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the scaling center. Default is current x position 
  10995.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the scaling center. Default is current y position 
  10996.  * @public 
  10997.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  10998.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  10999.  */ 
  11000. public function ScaleXY($s, $x='', $y='') { 
  11001.     $this->Scale($s, $s, $x, $y); 
  11002. } 
  11003.  
  11004. /** 
  11005.  * Vertical and horizontal non-proportional Scaling. 
  11006.  * @param $s_x (float) scaling factor for width as percent. 0 is not allowed. 
  11007.  * @param $s_y (float) scaling factor for height as percent. 0 is not allowed. 
  11008.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the scaling center. Default is current x position 
  11009.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the scaling center. Default is current y position 
  11010.  * @public 
  11011.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11012.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11013.  */ 
  11014. public function Scale($s_x, $s_y, $x='', $y='') { 
  11015.     if ($x === '') { 
  11016.         $x = $this->x; 
  11017.     } 
  11018.     if ($y === '') { 
  11019.         $y = $this->y; 
  11020.     } 
  11021.     if (($s_x == 0) OR ($s_y == 0)) { 
  11022.         $this->Error('Please do not use values equal to zero for scaling'); 
  11023.     } 
  11024.     $y = ($this->h - $y) * $this->k; 
  11025.     $x *= $this->k; 
  11026.     //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  11027.     $s_x /= 100; 
  11028.     $s_y /= 100; 
  11029.     $tm = array(); 
  11030.     $tm[0] = $s_x; 
  11031.     $tm[1] = 0; 
  11032.     $tm[2] = 0; 
  11033.     $tm[3] = $s_y; 
  11034.     $tm[4] = $x * (1 - $s_x); 
  11035.     $tm[5] = $y * (1 - $s_y); 
  11036.     //scale the coordinate system 
  11037.     $this->Transform($tm); 
  11038. } 
  11039.  
  11040. /** 
  11041.  * Horizontal Mirroring. 
  11042.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the point. Default is current x position 
  11043.  * @public 
  11044.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11045.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11046.  */ 
  11047. public function MirrorH($x='') { 
  11048.     $this->Scale(-100, 100, $x); 
  11049. } 
  11050.  
  11051. /** 
  11052.  * Verical Mirroring. 
  11053.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the point. Default is current y position 
  11054.  * @public 
  11055.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11056.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11057.  */ 
  11058. public function MirrorV($y='') { 
  11059.     $this->Scale(100, -100, '', $y); 
  11060. } 
  11061.  
  11062. /** 
  11063.  * Point reflection mirroring. 
  11064.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the point. Default is current x position 
  11065.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the point. Default is current y position 
  11066.  * @public 
  11067.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11068.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11069.  */ 
  11070. public function MirrorP($x='', $y='') { 
  11071.     $this->Scale(-100, -100, $x, $y); 
  11072. } 
  11073.  
  11074. /** 
  11075.  * Reflection against a straight line through point (x, y) with the gradient angle (angle). 
  11076.  * @param $angle (float) gradient angle of the straight line. Default is 0 (horizontal line). 
  11077.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the point. Default is current x position 
  11078.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the point. Default is current y position 
  11079.  * @public 
  11080.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11081.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11082.  */ 
  11083. public function MirrorL($angle=0, $x='', $y='') { 
  11084.     $this->Scale(-100, 100, $x, $y); 
  11085.     $this->Rotate(-2*($angle-90), $x, $y); 
  11086. } 
  11087.  
  11088. /** 
  11089.  * Translate graphic object horizontally. 
  11090.  * @param $t_x (int) movement to the right (or left for RTL) 
  11091.  * @public 
  11092.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11093.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11094.  */ 
  11095. public function TranslateX($t_x) { 
  11096.     $this->Translate($t_x, 0); 
  11097. } 
  11098.  
  11099. /** 
  11100.  * Translate graphic object vertically. 
  11101.  * @param $t_y (int) movement to the bottom 
  11102.  * @public 
  11103.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11104.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11105.  */ 
  11106. public function TranslateY($t_y) { 
  11107.     $this->Translate(0, $t_y); 
  11108. } 
  11109.  
  11110. /** 
  11111.  * Translate graphic object horizontally and vertically. 
  11112.  * @param $t_x (int) movement to the right 
  11113.  * @param $t_y (int) movement to the bottom 
  11114.  * @public 
  11115.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11116.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11117.  */ 
  11118. public function Translate($t_x, $t_y) { 
  11119.     //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  11120.     $tm = array(); 
  11121.     $tm[0] = 1; 
  11122.     $tm[1] = 0; 
  11123.     $tm[2] = 0; 
  11124.     $tm[3] = 1; 
  11125.     $tm[4] = $t_x * $this->k; 
  11126.     $tm[5] = -$t_y * $this->k; 
  11127.     //translate the coordinate system 
  11128.     $this->Transform($tm); 
  11129. } 
  11130.  
  11131. /** 
  11132.  * Rotate object. 
  11133.  * @param $angle (float) angle in degrees for counter-clockwise rotation 
  11134.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the rotation center. Default is current x position 
  11135.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the rotation center. Default is current y position 
  11136.  * @public 
  11137.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11138.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11139.  */ 
  11140. public function Rotate($angle, $x='', $y='') { 
  11141.     if ($x === '') { 
  11142.         $x = $this->x; 
  11143.     } 
  11144.     if ($y === '') { 
  11145.         $y = $this->y; 
  11146.     } 
  11147.     $y = ($this->h - $y) * $this->k; 
  11148.     $x *= $this->k; 
  11149.     //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  11150.     $tm = array(); 
  11151.     $tm[0] = cos(deg2rad($angle)); 
  11152.     $tm[1] = sin(deg2rad($angle)); 
  11153.     $tm[2] = -$tm[1]; 
  11154.     $tm[3] = $tm[0]; 
  11155.     $tm[4] = $x + ($tm[1] * $y) - ($tm[0] * $x); 
  11156.     $tm[5] = $y - ($tm[0] * $y) - ($tm[1] * $x); 
  11157.     //rotate the coordinate system around ($x, $y) 
  11158.     $this->Transform($tm); 
  11159. } 
  11160.  
  11161. /** 
  11162.  * Skew horizontally. 
  11163.  * @param $angle_x (float) angle in degrees between -90 (skew to the left) and 90 (skew to the right) 
  11164.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the skewing center. default is current x position 
  11165.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the skewing center. default is current y position 
  11166.  * @public 
  11167.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11168.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11169.  */ 
  11170. public function SkewX($angle_x, $x='', $y='') { 
  11171.     $this->Skew($angle_x, 0, $x, $y); 
  11172. } 
  11173.  
  11174. /** 
  11175.  * Skew vertically. 
  11176.  * @param $angle_y (float) angle in degrees between -90 (skew to the bottom) and 90 (skew to the top) 
  11177.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the skewing center. default is current x position 
  11178.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the skewing center. default is current y position 
  11179.  * @public 
  11180.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11181.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11182.  */ 
  11183. public function SkewY($angle_y, $x='', $y='') { 
  11184.     $this->Skew(0, $angle_y, $x, $y); 
  11185. } 
  11186.  
  11187. /** 
  11188.  * Skew. 
  11189.  * @param $angle_x (float) angle in degrees between -90 (skew to the left) and 90 (skew to the right) 
  11190.  * @param $angle_y (float) angle in degrees between -90 (skew to the bottom) and 90 (skew to the top) 
  11191.  * @param $x (int) abscissa of the skewing center. default is current x position 
  11192.  * @param $y (int) ordinate of the skewing center. default is current y position 
  11193.  * @public 
  11194.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11195.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11196.  */ 
  11197. public function Skew($angle_x, $angle_y, $x='', $y='') { 
  11198.     if ($x === '') { 
  11199.         $x = $this->x; 
  11200.     } 
  11201.     if ($y === '') { 
  11202.         $y = $this->y; 
  11203.     } 
  11204.     if (($angle_x <= -90) OR ($angle_x >= 90) OR ($angle_y <= -90) OR ($angle_y >= 90)) { 
  11205.         $this->Error('Please use values between -90 and +90 degrees for Skewing.'); 
  11206.     } 
  11207.     $x *= $this->k; 
  11208.     $y = ($this->h - $y) * $this->k; 
  11209.     //calculate elements of transformation matrix 
  11210.     $tm = array(); 
  11211.     $tm[0] = 1; 
  11212.     $tm[1] = tan(deg2rad($angle_y)); 
  11213.     $tm[2] = tan(deg2rad($angle_x)); 
  11214.     $tm[3] = 1; 
  11215.     $tm[4] = -$tm[2] * $y; 
  11216.     $tm[5] = -$tm[1] * $x; 
  11217.     //skew the coordinate system 
  11218.     $this->Transform($tm); 
  11219. } 
  11220.  
  11221. /** 
  11222.  * Apply graphic transformations. 
  11223.  * @param $tm (array) transformation matrix 
  11224.  * @protected 
  11225.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11226.  * @see StartTransform(), StopTransform() 
  11227.  */ 
  11228. protected function Transform($tm) { 
  11229.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  11230.         return; 
  11231.     } 
  11232.     $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F %F %F %F %F cm', $tm[0], $tm[1], $tm[2], $tm[3], $tm[4], $tm[5])); 
  11233.     // add tranformation matrix 
  11234.     $this->transfmatrix[$this->transfmatrix_key][] = array('a' => $tm[0], 'b' => $tm[1], 'c' => $tm[2], 'd' => $tm[3], 'e' => $tm[4], 'f' => $tm[5]); 
  11235.     // update transformation mark 
  11236.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  11237.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  11238.         if (end($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']) !== false) { 
  11239.             $key = key($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  11240.             $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$key] = strlen($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']); 
  11241.         } 
  11242.     } elseif (end($this->transfmrk[$this->page]) !== false) { 
  11243.         $key = key($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  11244.         $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$key] = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  11245.     } 
  11246. } 
  11247.  
  11248. // END TRANSFORMATIONS SECTION ------------------------- 
  11249.  
  11250. // START GRAPHIC FUNCTIONS SECTION --------------------- 
  11251. // The following section is based on the code provided by David Hernandez Sanz 
  11252.  
  11253. /** 
  11254.  * Defines the line width. By default, the value equals 0.2 mm. The method can be called before the first page is created and the value is retained from page to page. 
  11255.  * @param $width (float) The width. 
  11256.  * @public 
  11257.  * @since 1.0 
  11258.  * @see Line(), Rect(), Cell(), MultiCell() 
  11259.  */ 
  11260. public function SetLineWidth($width) { 
  11261.     //Set line width 
  11262.     $this->LineWidth = $width; 
  11263.     $this->linestyleWidth = sprintf('%F w', ($width * $this->k)); 
  11264.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  11265.         $this->_out($this->linestyleWidth); 
  11266.     } 
  11267. } 
  11268.  
  11269. /** 
  11270.  * Returns the current the line width. 
  11271.  * @return int Line width 
  11272.  * @public 
  11273.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-07) 
  11274.  * @see Line(), SetLineWidth() 
  11275.  */ 
  11276. public function GetLineWidth() { 
  11277.     return $this->LineWidth; 
  11278. } 
  11279.  
  11280. /** 
  11281.  * Set line style. 
  11282.  * @param $style (array) Line style. Array with keys among the following: 
  11283.  * <ul> 
  11284.  *     <li>width (float): Width of the line in user units.</li> 
  11285.  *     <li>cap (string): Type of cap to put on the line. Possible values are: 
  11286.  * butt, round, square. The difference between "square" and "butt" is that 
  11287.  * "square" projects a flat end past the end of the line.</li> 
  11288.  *     <li>join (string): Type of join. Possible values are: miter, round,  
  11289.  * bevel.</li> 
  11290.  *     <li>dash (mixed): Dash pattern. Is 0 (without dash) or string with 
  11291.  * series of length values, which are the lengths of the on and off dashes. 
  11292.  * For example: "2" represents 2 on, 2 off, 2 on, 2 off, ...; "2, 1" is 2 on,  
  11293.  * 1 off, 2 on, 1 off, ...</li> 
  11294.  *     <li>phase (integer): Modifier on the dash pattern which is used to shift 
  11295.  * the point at which the pattern starts.</li> 
  11296.  *     <li>color (array): Draw color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName).</li> 
  11297.  * </ul> 
  11298.  * @param $ret (boolean) if true do not send the command. 
  11299.  * @return string the PDF command 
  11300.  * @public 
  11301.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11302.  */ 
  11303. public function SetLineStyle($style, $ret=false) { 
  11304.     $s = ''; // string to be returned 
  11305.     if (!is_array($style)) { 
  11306.         return; 
  11307.     } 
  11308.     if (isset($style['width'])) { 
  11309.         $this->LineWidth = $style['width']; 
  11310.         $this->linestyleWidth = sprintf('%F w', ($style['width'] * $this->k)); 
  11311.         $s .= $this->linestyleWidth.' '; 
  11312.     } 
  11313.     if (isset($style['cap'])) { 
  11314.         $ca = array('butt' => 0, 'round'=> 1, 'square' => 2); 
  11315.         if (isset($ca[$style['cap']])) { 
  11316.             $this->linestyleCap = $ca[$style['cap']].' J'; 
  11317.             $s .= $this->linestyleCap.' '; 
  11318.         } 
  11319.     } 
  11320.     if (isset($style['join'])) { 
  11321.         $ja = array('miter' => 0, 'round' => 1, 'bevel' => 2); 
  11322.         if (isset($ja[$style['join']])) { 
  11323.             $this->linestyleJoin = $ja[$style['join']].' j'; 
  11324.             $s .= $this->linestyleJoin.' '; 
  11325.         } 
  11326.     } 
  11327.     if (isset($style['dash'])) { 
  11328.         $dash_string = ''; 
  11329.         if ($style['dash']) { 
  11330.             if (preg_match('/^.+, /', $style['dash']) > 0) { 
  11331.                 $tab = explode(', ', $style['dash']); 
  11332.             } else { 
  11333.                 $tab = array($style['dash']); 
  11334.             } 
  11335.             $dash_string = ''; 
  11336.             foreach ($tab as $i => $v) { 
  11337.                 if ($i) { 
  11338.                     $dash_string .= ' '; 
  11339.                 } 
  11340.                 $dash_string .= sprintf('%F', $v); 
  11341.             } 
  11342.         } 
  11343.         if (!isset($style['phase']) OR !$style['dash']) { 
  11344.             $style['phase'] = 0; 
  11345.         } 
  11346.         $this->linestyleDash = sprintf('[%s] %F d', $dash_string, $style['phase']); 
  11347.         $s .= $this->linestyleDash.' '; 
  11348.     } 
  11349.     if (isset($style['color'])) { 
  11350.         $s .= $this->SetDrawColorArray($style['color'], true).' '; 
  11351.     } 
  11352.     if (!$ret AND ($this->state == 2)) { 
  11353.         $this->_out($s); 
  11354.     } 
  11355.     return $s; 
  11356. } 
  11357.  
  11358. /** 
  11359.  * Begin a new subpath by moving the current point to coordinates (x, y), omitting any connecting line segment. 
  11360.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of point. 
  11361.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of point. 
  11362.  * @protected 
  11363.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11364.  */ 
  11365. protected function _outPoint($x, $y) { 
  11366.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  11367.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F m', ($x * $this->k), (($this->h - $y) * $this->k))); 
  11368.     } 
  11369. } 
  11370.  
  11371. /** 
  11372.  * Append a straight line segment from the current point to the point (x, y). 
  11373.  * The new current point shall be (x, y). 
  11374.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of end point. 
  11375.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of end point. 
  11376.  * @protected 
  11377.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11378.  */ 
  11379. protected function _outLine($x, $y) { 
  11380.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  11381.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F l', ($x * $this->k), (($this->h - $y) * $this->k))); 
  11382.     } 
  11383. } 
  11384.  
  11385. /** 
  11386.  * Append a rectangle to the current path as a complete subpath, with lower-left corner (x, y) and dimensions widthand height in user space. 
  11387.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of upper-left corner. 
  11388.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of upper-left corner. 
  11389.  * @param $w (float) Width. 
  11390.  * @param $h (float) Height. 
  11391.  * @param $op (string) options 
  11392.  * @protected 
  11393.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11394.  */ 
  11395. protected function _outRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $op) { 
  11396.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  11397.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F %F %F re %s', ($x * $this->k), (($this->h - $y) * $this->k), ($w * $this->k), (-$h * $this->k), $op)); 
  11398.     } 
  11399. } 
  11400.  
  11401. /** 
  11402.  * Append a cubic Bezier curve to the current path. The curve shall extend from the current point to the point (x3, y3), using (x1, y1) and (x2, y2) as the Bezier control points. 
  11403.  * The new current point shall be (x3, y3). 
  11404.  * @param $x1 (float) Abscissa of control point 1. 
  11405.  * @param $y1 (float) Ordinate of control point 1. 
  11406.  * @param $x2 (float) Abscissa of control point 2. 
  11407.  * @param $y2 (float) Ordinate of control point 2. 
  11408.  * @param $x3 (float) Abscissa of end point. 
  11409.  * @param $y3 (float) Ordinate of end point. 
  11410.  * @protected 
  11411.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11412.  */ 
  11413. protected function _outCurve($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x3, $y3) { 
  11414.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  11415.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F %F %F %F %F c', ($x1 * $this->k), (($this->h - $y1) * $this->k), ($x2 * $this->k), (($this->h - $y2) * $this->k), ($x3 * $this->k), (($this->h - $y3) * $this->k))); 
  11416.     } 
  11417. } 
  11418.  
  11419. /** 
  11420.  * Append a cubic Bezier curve to the current path. The curve shall extend from the current point to the point (x3, y3), using the current point and (x2, y2) as the Bezier control points. 
  11421.  * The new current point shall be (x3, y3). 
  11422.  * @param $x2 (float) Abscissa of control point 2. 
  11423.  * @param $y2 (float) Ordinate of control point 2. 
  11424.  * @param $x3 (float) Abscissa of end point. 
  11425.  * @param $y3 (float) Ordinate of end point. 
  11426.  * @protected 
  11427.  * @since 4.9.019 (2010-04-26) 
  11428.  */ 
  11429. protected function _outCurveV($x2, $y2, $x3, $y3) { 
  11430.     if ($this->state == 2) {
