  11431.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F %F %F v', ($x2 * $this->k), (($this->h - $y2) * $this->k), ($x3 * $this->k), (($this->h - $y3) * $this->k))); 
  11432.     } 
  11433. } 
  11434.  
  11435. /** 
  11436.  * Append a cubic Bezier curve to the current path. The curve shall extend from the current point to the point (x3, y3), using (x1, y1) and (x3, y3) as the Bezier control points. 
  11437.  * The new current point shall be (x3, y3). 
  11438.  * @param $x1 (float) Abscissa of control point 1. 
  11439.  * @param $y1 (float) Ordinate of control point 1. 
  11440.  * @param $x3 (float) Abscissa of end point. 
  11441.  * @param $y3 (float) Ordinate of end point. 
  11442.  * @protected 
  11443.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11444.  */ 
  11445. protected function _outCurveY($x1, $y1, $x3, $y3) { 
  11446.     if ($this->state == 2) { 
  11447.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F %F %F y', ($x1 * $this->k), (($this->h - $y1) * $this->k), ($x3 * $this->k), (($this->h - $y3) * $this->k))); 
  11448.     } 
  11449. } 
  11450.  
  11451. /** 
  11452.  * Draws a line between two points. 
  11453.  * @param $x1 (float) Abscissa of first point. 
  11454.  * @param $y1 (float) Ordinate of first point. 
  11455.  * @param $x2 (float) Abscissa of second point. 
  11456.  * @param $y2 (float) Ordinate of second point. 
  11457.  * @param $style (array) Line style. Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11458.  * @public 
  11459.  * @since 1.0 
  11460.  * @see SetLineWidth(), SetDrawColor(), SetLineStyle() 
  11461.  */ 
  11462. public function Line($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $style=array()) { 
  11463.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  11464.         return; 
  11465.     } 
  11466.     if (is_array($style)) { 
  11467.         $this->SetLineStyle($style); 
  11468.     } 
  11469.     $this->_outPoint($x1, $y1); 
  11470.     $this->_outLine($x2, $y2); 
  11471.     $this->_out('S'); 
  11472. } 
  11473.  
  11474. /** 
  11475.  * Draws a rectangle. 
  11476.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of upper-left corner. 
  11477.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of upper-left corner. 
  11478.  * @param $w (float) Width. 
  11479.  * @param $h (float) Height. 
  11480.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11481.  * @param $border_style (array) Border style of rectangle. Array with keys among the following: 
  11482.  * <ul> 
  11483.  *     <li>all: Line style of all borders. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11484.  *     <li>L, T, R, B or combinations: Line style of left, top, right or bottom border. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11485.  * </ul> 
  11486.  * If a key is not present or is null, the correspondent border is not drawn. Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11487.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11488.  * @public 
  11489.  * @since 1.0 
  11490.  * @see SetLineStyle() 
  11491.  */ 
  11492. public function Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, $style='', $border_style=array(), $fill_color=array()) { 
  11493.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  11494.         return; 
  11495.     } 
  11496.     if (empty($style)) { 
  11497.         $style = 'S'; 
  11498.     } 
  11499.     if (!(strpos($style, 'F') === false) AND !empty($fill_color)) { 
  11500.         // set background color 
  11501.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  11502.     } 
  11503.     if (!empty($border_style)) { 
  11504.         if (isset($border_style['all']) AND !empty($border_style['all'])) { 
  11505.             //set global style for border 
  11506.             $this->SetLineStyle($border_style['all']); 
  11507.             $border_style = array(); 
  11508.         } else { 
  11509.             // remove stroke operator from style 
  11510.             $opnostroke = array('S' => '', 'D' => '', 's' => '', 'd' => '', 'B' => 'F', 'FD' => 'F', 'DF' => 'F', 'B*' => 'F*', 'F*D' => 'F*', 'DF*' => 'F*', 'b' => 'f', 'fd' => 'f', 'df' => 'f', 'b*' => 'f*', 'f*d' => 'f*', 'df*' => 'f*' ); 
  11511.             if (isset($opnostroke[$style])) { 
  11512.                 $style = $opnostroke[$style]; 
  11513.             } 
  11514.         } 
  11515.     } 
  11516.     if (!empty($style)) { 
  11517.         $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style); 
  11518.         $this->_outRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $op); 
  11519.     } 
  11520.     if (!empty($border_style)) { 
  11521.         $border_style2 = array(); 
  11522.         foreach ($border_style as $line => $value) { 
  11523.             $length = strlen($line); 
  11524.             for ($i = 0; $i < $length; ++$i) { 
  11525.                 $border_style2[$line[$i]] = $value; 
  11526.             } 
  11527.         } 
  11528.         $border_style = $border_style2; 
  11529.         if (isset($border_style['L']) AND $border_style['L']) { 
  11530.             $this->Line($x, $y, $x, $y + $h, $border_style['L']); 
  11531.         } 
  11532.         if (isset($border_style['T']) AND $border_style['T']) { 
  11533.             $this->Line($x, $y, $x + $w, $y, $border_style['T']); 
  11534.         } 
  11535.         if (isset($border_style['R']) AND $border_style['R']) { 
  11536.             $this->Line($x + $w, $y, $x + $w, $y + $h, $border_style['R']); 
  11537.         } 
  11538.         if (isset($border_style['B']) AND $border_style['B']) { 
  11539.             $this->Line($x, $y + $h, $x + $w, $y + $h, $border_style['B']); 
  11540.         } 
  11541.     } 
  11542. } 
  11543.  
  11544. /** 
  11545.  * Draws a Bezier curve. 
  11546.  * The Bezier curve is a tangent to the line between the control points at 
  11547.  * either end of the curve. 
  11548.  * @param $x0 (float) Abscissa of start point. 
  11549.  * @param $y0 (float) Ordinate of start point. 
  11550.  * @param $x1 (float) Abscissa of control point 1. 
  11551.  * @param $y1 (float) Ordinate of control point 1. 
  11552.  * @param $x2 (float) Abscissa of control point 2. 
  11553.  * @param $y2 (float) Ordinate of control point 2. 
  11554.  * @param $x3 (float) Abscissa of end point. 
  11555.  * @param $y3 (float) Ordinate of end point. 
  11556.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11557.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of curve. Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11558.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11559.  * @public 
  11560.  * @see SetLineStyle() 
  11561.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11562.  */ 
  11563. public function Curve($x0, $y0, $x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x3, $y3, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array()) { 
  11564.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  11565.         return; 
  11566.     } 
  11567.     if (!(false === strpos($style, 'F')) AND isset($fill_color)) { 
  11568.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  11569.     } 
  11570.     $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style); 
  11571.     if ($line_style) { 
  11572.         $this->SetLineStyle($line_style); 
  11573.     } 
  11574.     $this->_outPoint($x0, $y0); 
  11575.     $this->_outCurve($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x3, $y3); 
  11576.     $this->_out($op); 
  11577. } 
  11578.  
  11579. /** 
  11580.  * Draws a poly-Bezier curve. 
  11581.  * Each Bezier curve segment is a tangent to the line between the control points at 
  11582.  * either end of the curve. 
  11583.  * @param $x0 (float) Abscissa of start point. 
  11584.  * @param $y0 (float) Ordinate of start point. 
  11585.  * @param $segments (float) An array of bezier descriptions. Format: array(x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3). 
  11586.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11587.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of curve. Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11588.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11589.  * @public 
  11590.  * @see SetLineStyle() 
  11591.  * @since 3.0008 (2008-05-12) 
  11592.  */ 
  11593. public function Polycurve($x0, $y0, $segments, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array()) { 
  11594.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  11595.         return; 
  11596.     } 
  11597.     if (!(false === strpos($style, 'F')) AND isset($fill_color)) { 
  11598.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  11599.     } 
  11600.     $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style); 
  11601.     if ($op == 'f') { 
  11602.         $line_style = array(); 
  11603.     } 
  11604.     if ($line_style) { 
  11605.         $this->SetLineStyle($line_style); 
  11606.     } 
  11607.     $this->_outPoint($x0, $y0); 
  11608.     foreach ($segments as $segment) { 
  11609.         list($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x3, $y3) = $segment; 
  11610.         $this->_outCurve($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x3, $y3); 
  11611.     } 
  11612.     $this->_out($op); 
  11613. } 
  11614.  
  11615. /** 
  11616.  * Draws an ellipse. 
  11617.  * An ellipse is formed from n Bezier curves. 
  11618.  * @param $x0 (float) Abscissa of center point. 
  11619.  * @param $y0 (float) Ordinate of center point. 
  11620.  * @param $rx (float) Horizontal radius. 
  11621.  * @param $ry (float) Vertical radius (if ry = 0 then is a circle, see Circle()). Default value: 0. 
  11622.  * @param $angle: (float) Angle oriented (anti-clockwise). Default value: 0. 
  11623.  * @param $astart: (float) Angle start of draw line. Default value: 0. 
  11624.  * @param $afinish: (float) Angle finish of draw line. Default value: 360. 
  11625.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11626.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of ellipse. Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11627.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11628.  * @param $nc (integer) Number of curves used to draw a 90 degrees portion of ellipse. 
  11629.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  11630.  * @public 
  11631.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11632.  */ 
  11633. public function Ellipse($x0, $y0, $rx, $ry='', $angle=0, $astart=0, $afinish=360, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array(), $nc=2) { 
  11634.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  11635.         return; 
  11636.     } 
  11637.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($ry) OR ($ry == 0)) { 
  11638.         $ry = $rx; 
  11639.     } 
  11640.     if (!(false === strpos($style, 'F')) AND isset($fill_color)) { 
  11641.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  11642.     } 
  11643.     $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style); 
  11644.     if ($op == 'f') { 
  11645.         $line_style = array(); 
  11646.     } 
  11647.     if ($line_style) { 
  11648.         $this->SetLineStyle($line_style); 
  11649.     } 
  11650.     $this->_outellipticalarc($x0, $y0, $rx, $ry, $angle, $astart, $afinish, false, $nc, true, true, false); 
  11651.     $this->_out($op); 
  11652. } 
  11653.  
  11654. /** 
  11655.  * Append an elliptical arc to the current path. 
  11656.  * An ellipse is formed from n Bezier curves. 
  11657.  * @param $xc (float) Abscissa of center point. 
  11658.  * @param $yc (float) Ordinate of center point. 
  11659.  * @param $rx (float) Horizontal radius. 
  11660.  * @param $ry (float) Vertical radius (if ry = 0 then is a circle, see Circle()). Default value: 0. 
  11661.  * @param $xang: (float) Angle between the X-axis and the major axis of the ellipse. Default value: 0. 
  11662.  * @param $angs: (float) Angle start of draw line. Default value: 0. 
  11663.  * @param $angf: (float) Angle finish of draw line. Default value: 360. 
  11664.  * @param $pie (boolean) if true do not mark the border point (used to draw pie sectors). 
  11665.  * @param $nc (integer) Number of curves used to draw a 90 degrees portion of ellipse. 
  11666.  * @param $startpoint (boolean) if true output a starting point. 
  11667.  * @param $ccw (boolean) if true draws in counter-clockwise. 
  11668.  * @param $svg (boolean) if true the angles are in svg mode (already calculated). 
  11669.  * @return array bounding box coordinates (x min, y min, x max, y max) 
  11670.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  11671.  * @protected 
  11672.  * @since 4.9.019 (2010-04-26) 
  11673.  */ 
  11674. protected function _outellipticalarc($xc, $yc, $rx, $ry, $xang=0, $angs=0, $angf=360, $pie=false, $nc=2, $startpoint=true, $ccw=true, $svg=false) { 
  11675.     if (($rx <= 0) OR ($ry < 0)) { 
  11676.         return; 
  11677.     } 
  11678.     $k = $this->k; 
  11679.     if ($nc < 2) { 
  11680.         $nc = 2; 
  11681.     } 
  11682.     $xmin = 2147483647; 
  11683.     $ymin = 2147483647; 
  11684.     $xmax = 0; 
  11685.     $ymax = 0; 
  11686.     if ($pie) { 
  11687.         // center of the arc 
  11688.         $this->_outPoint($xc, $yc); 
  11689.     } 
  11690.     $xang = deg2rad((float) $xang); 
  11691.     $angs = deg2rad((float) $angs); 
  11692.     $angf = deg2rad((float) $angf); 
  11693.     if ($svg) { 
  11694.         $as = $angs; 
  11695.         $af = $angf; 
  11696.     } else { 
  11697.         $as = atan2((sin($angs) / $ry), (cos($angs) / $rx)); 
  11698.         $af = atan2((sin($angf) / $ry), (cos($angf) / $rx)); 
  11699.     } 
  11700.     if ($as < 0) { 
  11701.         $as += (2 * M_PI); 
  11702.     } 
  11703.     if ($af < 0) { 
  11704.         $af += (2 * M_PI); 
  11705.     } 
  11706.     if ($ccw AND ($as > $af)) { 
  11707.         // reverse rotation 
  11708.         $as -= (2 * M_PI); 
  11709.     } elseif (!$ccw AND ($as < $af)) { 
  11710.         // reverse rotation 
  11711.         $af -= (2 * M_PI); 
  11712.     } 
  11713.     $total_angle = ($af - $as); 
  11714.     if ($nc < 2) { 
  11715.         $nc = 2; 
  11716.     } 
  11717.     // total arcs to draw 
  11718.     $nc *= (2 * abs($total_angle) / M_PI); 
  11719.     $nc = round($nc) + 1; 
  11720.     // angle of each arc 
  11721.     $arcang = ($total_angle / $nc); 
  11722.     // center point in PDF coordinates 
  11723.     $x0 = $xc; 
  11724.     $y0 = ($this->h - $yc); 
  11725.     // starting angle 
  11726.     $ang = $as; 
  11727.     $alpha = sin($arcang) * ((sqrt(4 + (3 * pow(tan(($arcang) / 2), 2))) - 1) / 3); 
  11728.     $cos_xang = cos($xang); 
  11729.     $sin_xang = sin($xang); 
  11730.     $cos_ang = cos($ang); 
  11731.     $sin_ang = sin($ang); 
  11732.     // first arc point 
  11733.     $px1 = $x0 + ($rx * $cos_xang * $cos_ang) - ($ry * $sin_xang * $sin_ang); 
  11734.     $py1 = $y0 + ($rx * $sin_xang * $cos_ang) + ($ry * $cos_xang * $sin_ang); 
  11735.     // first Bezier control point 
  11736.     $qx1 = ($alpha * ((-$rx * $cos_xang * $sin_ang) - ($ry * $sin_xang * $cos_ang))); 
  11737.     $qy1 = ($alpha * ((-$rx * $sin_xang * $sin_ang) + ($ry * $cos_xang * $cos_ang))); 
  11738.     if ($pie) { 
  11739.         // line from center to arc starting point 
  11740.         $this->_outLine($px1, $this->h - $py1); 
  11741.     } elseif ($startpoint) { 
  11742.         // arc starting point 
  11743.         $this->_outPoint($px1, $this->h - $py1); 
  11744.     } 
  11745.     // draw arcs 
  11746.     for ($i = 1; $i <= $nc; ++$i) { 
  11747.         // starting angle 
  11748.         $ang = $as + ($i * $arcang); 
  11749.         if ($i == $nc) { 
  11750.             $ang = $af; 
  11751.         } 
  11752.         $cos_ang = cos($ang); 
  11753.         $sin_ang = sin($ang); 
  11754.         // second arc point 
  11755.         $px2 = $x0 + ($rx * $cos_xang * $cos_ang) - ($ry * $sin_xang * $sin_ang); 
  11756.         $py2 = $y0 + ($rx * $sin_xang * $cos_ang) + ($ry * $cos_xang * $sin_ang); 
  11757.         // second Bezier control point 
  11758.         $qx2 = ($alpha * ((-$rx * $cos_xang * $sin_ang) - ($ry * $sin_xang * $cos_ang))); 
  11759.         $qy2 = ($alpha * ((-$rx * $sin_xang * $sin_ang) + ($ry * $cos_xang * $cos_ang))); 
  11760.         // draw arc 
  11761.         $cx1 = ($px1 + $qx1); 
  11762.         $cy1 = ($this->h - ($py1 + $qy1)); 
  11763.         $cx2 = ($px2 - $qx2); 
  11764.         $cy2 = ($this->h - ($py2 - $qy2)); 
  11765.         $cx3 = $px2; 
  11766.         $cy3 = ($this->h - $py2); 
  11767.         $this->_outCurve($cx1, $cy1, $cx2, $cy2, $cx3, $cy3); 
  11768.         // get bounding box coordinates 
  11769.         $xmin = min($xmin, $cx1, $cx2, $cx3); 
  11770.         $ymin = min($ymin, $cy1, $cy2, $cy3); 
  11771.         $xmax = max($xmax, $cx1, $cx2, $cx3); 
  11772.         $ymax = max($ymax, $cy1, $cy2, $cy3); 
  11773.         // move to next point 
  11774.         $px1 = $px2; 
  11775.         $py1 = $py2; 
  11776.         $qx1 = $qx2; 
  11777.         $qy1 = $qy2; 
  11778.     } 
  11779.     if ($pie) { 
  11780.         $this->_outLine($xc, $yc); 
  11781.         // get bounding box coordinates 
  11782.         $xmin = min($xmin, $xc); 
  11783.         $ymin = min($ymin, $yc); 
  11784.         $xmax = max($xmax, $xc); 
  11785.         $ymax = max($ymax, $yc); 
  11786.     } 
  11787.     return array($xmin, $ymin, $xmax, $ymax); 
  11788. } 
  11789.  
  11790. /** 
  11791.  * Draws a circle. 
  11792.  * A circle is formed from n Bezier curves. 
  11793.  * @param $x0 (float) Abscissa of center point. 
  11794.  * @param $y0 (float) Ordinate of center point. 
  11795.  * @param $r (float) Radius. 
  11796.  * @param $angstr: (float) Angle start of draw line. Default value: 0. 
  11797.  * @param $angend: (float) Angle finish of draw line. Default value: 360. 
  11798.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11799.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of circle. Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11800.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(red, green, blue). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11801.  * @param $nc (integer) Number of curves used to draw a 90 degrees portion of circle. 
  11802.  * @public 
  11803.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11804.  */ 
  11805. public function Circle($x0, $y0, $r, $angstr=0, $angend=360, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array(), $nc=2) { 
  11806.     $this->Ellipse($x0, $y0, $r, $r, 0, $angstr, $angend, $style, $line_style, $fill_color, $nc); 
  11807. } 
  11808.  
  11809. /** 
  11810.  * Draws a polygonal line 
  11811.  * @param $p (array) Points 0 to ($np - 1). Array with values (x0, y0, x1, y1, ..., x(np-1), y(np - 1)) 
  11812.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11813.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of polygon. Array with keys among the following: 
  11814.  * <ul> 
  11815.  *     <li>all: Line style of all lines. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11816.  *     <li>0 to ($np - 1): Line style of each line. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11817.  * </ul> 
  11818.  * If a key is not present or is null, not draws the line. Default value is default line style (empty array). 
  11819.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11820.  * @since 4.8.003 (2009-09-15) 
  11821.  * @public 
  11822.  */ 
  11823. public function PolyLine($p, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array()) { 
  11824.     $this->Polygon($p, $style, $line_style, $fill_color, false); 
  11825. } 
  11826.  
  11827. /** 
  11828.  * Draws a polygon. 
  11829.  * @param $p (array) Points 0 to ($np - 1). Array with values (x0, y0, x1, y1, ..., x(np-1), y(np - 1)) 
  11830.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11831.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of polygon. Array with keys among the following: 
  11832.  * <ul> 
  11833.  *     <li>all: Line style of all lines. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11834.  *     <li>0 to ($np - 1): Line style of each line. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11835.  * </ul> 
  11836.  * If a key is not present or is null, not draws the line. Default value is default line style (empty array). 
  11837.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11838.  * @param $closed (boolean) if true the polygon is closes, otherwise will remain open 
  11839.  * @public 
  11840.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11841.  */ 
  11842. public function Polygon($p, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array(), $closed=true) { 
  11843.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  11844.         return; 
  11845.     } 
  11846.     $nc = count($p); // number of coordinates 
  11847.     $np = $nc / 2; // number of points 
  11848.     if ($closed) { 
  11849.         // close polygon by adding the first 2 points at the end (one line) 
  11850.         for ($i = 0; $i < 4; ++$i) { 
  11851.             $p[$nc + $i] = $p[$i]; 
  11852.         } 
  11853.         // copy style for the last added line 
  11854.         if (isset($line_style[0])) { 
  11855.             $line_style[$np] = $line_style[0]; 
  11856.         } 
  11857.         $nc += 4; 
  11858.     } 
  11859.     if (!(false === strpos($style, 'F')) AND isset($fill_color)) { 
  11860.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  11861.     } 
  11862.     $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style); 
  11863.     if ($op == 'f') { 
  11864.         $line_style = array(); 
  11865.     } 
  11866.     $draw = true; 
  11867.     if ($line_style) { 
  11868.         if (isset($line_style['all'])) { 
  11869.             $this->SetLineStyle($line_style['all']); 
  11870.         } else { 
  11871.             $draw = false; 
  11872.             if ($op == 'B') { 
  11873.                 // draw fill 
  11874.                 $op = 'f'; 
  11875.                 $this->_outPoint($p[0], $p[1]); 
  11876.                 for ($i = 2; $i < $nc; $i = $i + 2) { 
  11877.                     $this->_outLine($p[$i], $p[$i + 1]); 
  11878.                 } 
  11879.                 $this->_out($op); 
  11880.             } 
  11881.             // draw outline 
  11882.             $this->_outPoint($p[0], $p[1]); 
  11883.             for ($i = 2; $i < $nc; $i = $i + 2) { 
  11884.                 $line_num = ($i / 2) - 1; 
  11885.                 if (isset($line_style[$line_num])) { 
  11886.                     if ($line_style[$line_num] != 0) { 
  11887.                         if (is_array($line_style[$line_num])) { 
  11888.                             $this->_out('S'); 
  11889.                             $this->SetLineStyle($line_style[$line_num]); 
  11890.                             $this->_outPoint($p[$i - 2], $p[$i - 1]); 
  11891.                             $this->_outLine($p[$i], $p[$i + 1]); 
  11892.                             $this->_out('S'); 
  11893.                             $this->_outPoint($p[$i], $p[$i + 1]); 
  11894.                         } else { 
  11895.                             $this->_outLine($p[$i], $p[$i + 1]); 
  11896.                         } 
  11897.                     } 
  11898.                 } else { 
  11899.                     $this->_outLine($p[$i], $p[$i + 1]); 
  11900.                 } 
  11901.             } 
  11902.             $this->_out($op); 
  11903.         } 
  11904.     } 
  11905.     if ($draw) { 
  11906.         $this->_outPoint($p[0], $p[1]); 
  11907.         for ($i = 2; $i < $nc; $i = $i + 2) { 
  11908.             $this->_outLine($p[$i], $p[$i + 1]); 
  11909.         } 
  11910.         $this->_out($op); 
  11911.     } 
  11912. } 
  11913.  
  11914. /** 
  11915.  * Draws a regular polygon. 
  11916.  * @param $x0 (float) Abscissa of center point. 
  11917.  * @param $y0 (float) Ordinate of center point. 
  11918.  * @param $r: (float) Radius of inscribed circle. 
  11919.  * @param $ns (integer) Number of sides. 
  11920.  * @param $angle (float) Angle oriented (anti-clockwise). Default value: 0. 
  11921.  * @param $draw_circle (boolean) Draw inscribed circle or not. Default value: false. 
  11922.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11923.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of polygon sides. Array with keys among the following: 
  11924.  * <ul> 
  11925.  *     <li>all: Line style of all sides. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11926.  *     <li>0 to ($ns - 1): Line style of each side. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11927.  * </ul> 
  11928.  * If a key is not present or is null, not draws the side. Default value is default line style (empty array). 
  11929.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(red, green, blue). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11930.  * @param $circle_style (string) Style of rendering of inscribed circle (if draws). Possible values are: 
  11931.  * <ul> 
  11932.  *     <li>D or empty string: Draw (default).</li> 
  11933.  *     <li>F: Fill.</li> 
  11934.  *     <li>DF or FD: Draw and fill.</li> 
  11935.  *     <li>CNZ: Clipping mode (using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  11936.  *     <li>CEO: Clipping mode (using the nonzero winding number rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  11937.  * </ul> 
  11938.  * @param $circle_outLine_style (array) Line style of inscribed circle (if draws). Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11939.  * @param $circle_fill_color (array) Fill color of inscribed circle (if draws). Format: array(red, green, blue). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11940.  * @public 
  11941.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11942.  */ 
  11943. public function RegularPolygon($x0, $y0, $r, $ns, $angle=0, $draw_circle=false, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array(), $circle_style='', $circle_outLine_style=array(), $circle_fill_color=array()) { 
  11944.     if (3 > $ns) { 
  11945.         $ns = 3; 
  11946.     } 
  11947.     if ($draw_circle) { 
  11948.         $this->Circle($x0, $y0, $r, 0, 360, $circle_style, $circle_outLine_style, $circle_fill_color); 
  11949.     } 
  11950.     $p = array(); 
  11951.     for ($i = 0; $i < $ns; ++$i) { 
  11952.         $a = $angle + ($i * 360 / $ns); 
  11953.         $a_rad = deg2rad((float) $a); 
  11954.         $p[] = $x0 + ($r * sin($a_rad)); 
  11955.         $p[] = $y0 + ($r * cos($a_rad)); 
  11956.     } 
  11957.     $this->Polygon($p, $style, $line_style, $fill_color); 
  11958. } 
  11959.  
  11960. /** 
  11961.  * Draws a star polygon 
  11962.  * @param $x0 (float) Abscissa of center point. 
  11963.  * @param $y0 (float) Ordinate of center point. 
  11964.  * @param $r (float) Radius of inscribed circle. 
  11965.  * @param $nv (integer) Number of vertices. 
  11966.  * @param $ng (integer) Number of gap (if ($ng % $nv = 1) then is a regular polygon). 
  11967.  * @param $angle: (float) Angle oriented (anti-clockwise). Default value: 0. 
  11968.  * @param $draw_circle: (boolean) Draw inscribed circle or not. Default value is false. 
  11969.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  11970.  * @param $line_style (array) Line style of polygon sides. Array with keys among the following: 
  11971.  * <ul> 
  11972.  *     <li>all: Line style of all sides. Array like for 
  11973.  * SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11974.  *     <li>0 to (n - 1): Line style of each side. Array like for SetLineStyle().</li> 
  11975.  * </ul> 
  11976.  * If a key is not present or is null, not draws the side. Default value is default line style (empty array). 
  11977.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(red, green, blue). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11978.  * @param $circle_style (string) Style of rendering of inscribed circle (if draws). Possible values are: 
  11979.  * <ul> 
  11980.  *     <li>D or empty string: Draw (default).</li> 
  11981.  *     <li>F: Fill.</li> 
  11982.  *     <li>DF or FD: Draw and fill.</li> 
  11983.  *     <li>CNZ: Clipping mode (using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  11984.  *     <li>CEO: Clipping mode (using the nonzero winding number rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  11985.  * </ul> 
  11986.  * @param $circle_outLine_style (array) Line style of inscribed circle (if draws). Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  11987.  * @param $circle_fill_color (array) Fill color of inscribed circle (if draws). Format: array(red, green, blue). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  11988.  * @public 
  11989.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  11990.  */ 
  11991. public function StarPolygon($x0, $y0, $r, $nv, $ng, $angle=0, $draw_circle=false, $style='', $line_style=array(), $fill_color=array(), $circle_style='', $circle_outLine_style=array(), $circle_fill_color=array()) { 
  11992.     if ($nv < 2) { 
  11993.         $nv = 2; 
  11994.     } 
  11995.     if ($draw_circle) { 
  11996.         $this->Circle($x0, $y0, $r, 0, 360, $circle_style, $circle_outLine_style, $circle_fill_color); 
  11997.     } 
  11998.     $p2 = array(); 
  11999.     $visited = array(); 
  12000.     for ($i = 0; $i < $nv; ++$i) { 
  12001.         $a = $angle + ($i * 360 / $nv); 
  12002.         $a_rad = deg2rad((float) $a); 
  12003.         $p2[] = $x0 + ($r * sin($a_rad)); 
  12004.         $p2[] = $y0 + ($r * cos($a_rad)); 
  12005.         $visited[] = false; 
  12006.     } 
  12007.     $p = array(); 
  12008.     $i = 0; 
  12009.     do { 
  12010.         $p[] = $p2[$i * 2]; 
  12011.         $p[] = $p2[($i * 2) + 1]; 
  12012.         $visited[$i] = true; 
  12013.         $i += $ng; 
  12014.         $i %= $nv; 
  12015.     } while (!$visited[$i]); 
  12016.     $this->Polygon($p, $style, $line_style, $fill_color); 
  12017. } 
  12018.  
  12019. /** 
  12020.  * Draws a rounded rectangle. 
  12021.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of upper-left corner. 
  12022.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of upper-left corner. 
  12023.  * @param $w (float) Width. 
  12024.  * @param $h (float) Height. 
  12025.  * @param $r (float) the radius of the circle used to round off the corners of the rectangle. 
  12026.  * @param $round_corner (string) Draws rounded corner or not. String with a 0 (not rounded i-corner) or 1 (rounded i-corner) in i-position. Positions are, in order and begin to 0: top right, bottom right, bottom left and top left. Default value: all rounded corner ("1111"). 
  12027.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  12028.  * @param $border_style (array) Border style of rectangle. Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  12029.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  12030.  * @public 
  12031.  * @since 2.1.000 (2008-01-08) 
  12032.  */ 
  12033. public function RoundedRect($x, $y, $w, $h, $r, $round_corner='1111', $style='', $border_style=array(), $fill_color=array()) { 
  12034.     $this->RoundedRectXY($x, $y, $w, $h, $r, $r, $round_corner, $style, $border_style, $fill_color); 
  12035. } 
  12036.  
  12037. /** 
  12038.  * Draws a rounded rectangle. 
  12039.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of upper-left corner. 
  12040.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of upper-left corner. 
  12041.  * @param $w (float) Width. 
  12042.  * @param $h (float) Height. 
  12043.  * @param $rx (float) the x-axis radius of the ellipse used to round off the corners of the rectangle. 
  12044.  * @param $ry (float) the y-axis radius of the ellipse used to round off the corners of the rectangle. 
  12045.  * @param $round_corner (string) Draws rounded corner or not. String with a 0 (not rounded i-corner) or 1 (rounded i-corner) in i-position. Positions are, in order and begin to 0: top right, bottom right, bottom left and top left. Default value: all rounded corner ("1111"). 
  12046.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. See the getPathPaintOperator() function for more information. 
  12047.  * @param $border_style (array) Border style of rectangle. Array like for SetLineStyle(). Default value: default line style (empty array). 
  12048.  * @param $fill_color (array) Fill color. Format: array(GREY) or array(R, G, B) or array(C, M, Y, K) or array(C, M, Y, K, SpotColorName). Default value: default color (empty array). 
  12049.  * @public 
  12050.  * @since 4.9.019 (2010-04-22) 
  12051.  */ 
  12052. public function RoundedRectXY($x, $y, $w, $h, $rx, $ry, $round_corner='1111', $style='', $border_style=array(), $fill_color=array()) { 
  12053.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  12054.         return; 
  12055.     } 
  12056.     if (($round_corner == '0000') OR (($rx == $ry) AND ($rx == 0))) { 
  12057.         // Not rounded 
  12058.         $this->Rect($x, $y, $w, $h, $style, $border_style, $fill_color); 
  12059.         return; 
  12060.     } 
  12061.     // Rounded 
  12062.     if (!(false === strpos($style, 'F')) AND isset($fill_color)) { 
  12063.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  12064.     } 
  12065.     $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style); 
  12066.     if ($op == 'f') { 
  12067.         $border_style = array(); 
  12068.     } 
  12069.     if ($border_style) { 
  12070.         $this->SetLineStyle($border_style); 
  12071.     } 
  12072.     $MyArc = 4 / 3 * (sqrt(2) - 1); 
  12073.     $this->_outPoint($x + $rx, $y); 
  12074.     $xc = $x + $w - $rx; 
  12075.     $yc = $y + $ry; 
  12076.     $this->_outLine($xc, $y); 
  12077.     if ($round_corner[0]) { 
  12078.         $this->_outCurve($xc + ($rx * $MyArc), $yc - $ry, $xc + $rx, $yc - ($ry * $MyArc), $xc + $rx, $yc); 
  12079.     } else { 
  12080.         $this->_outLine($x + $w, $y); 
  12081.     } 
  12082.     $xc = $x + $w - $rx; 
  12083.     $yc = $y + $h - $ry; 
  12084.     $this->_outLine($x + $w, $yc); 
  12085.     if ($round_corner[1]) { 
  12086.         $this->_outCurve($xc + $rx, $yc + ($ry * $MyArc), $xc + ($rx * $MyArc), $yc + $ry, $xc, $yc + $ry); 
  12087.     } else { 
  12088.         $this->_outLine($x + $w, $y + $h); 
  12089.     } 
  12090.     $xc = $x + $rx; 
  12091.     $yc = $y + $h - $ry; 
  12092.     $this->_outLine($xc, $y + $h); 
  12093.     if ($round_corner[2]) { 
  12094.         $this->_outCurve($xc - ($rx * $MyArc), $yc + $ry, $xc - $rx, $yc + ($ry * $MyArc), $xc - $rx, $yc); 
  12095.     } else { 
  12096.         $this->_outLine($x, $y + $h); 
  12097.     } 
  12098.     $xc = $x + $rx; 
  12099.     $yc = $y + $ry; 
  12100.     $this->_outLine($x, $yc); 
  12101.     if ($round_corner[3]) { 
  12102.         $this->_outCurve($xc - $rx, $yc - ($ry * $MyArc), $xc - ($rx * $MyArc), $yc - $ry, $xc, $yc - $ry); 
  12103.     } else { 
  12104.         $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  12105.         $this->_outLine($x + $rx, $y); 
  12106.     } 
  12107.     $this->_out($op); 
  12108. } 
  12109.  
  12110. /** 
  12111.  * Draws a grahic arrow. 
  12112.  * @param $x0 (float) Abscissa of first point. 
  12113.  * @param $y0 (float) Ordinate of first point. 
  12114.  * @param $x1 (float) Abscissa of second point. 
  12115.  * @param $y1 (float) Ordinate of second point. 
  12116.  * @param $head_style (int) (0 = draw only arrowhead arms, 1 = draw closed arrowhead, but no fill, 2 = closed and filled arrowhead, 3 = filled arrowhead) 
  12117.  * @param $arm_size (float) length of arrowhead arms 
  12118.  * @param $arm_angle (int) angle between an arm and the shaft 
  12119.  * @author Piotr Galecki, Nicola Asuni, Andy Meier 
  12120.  * @since 4.6.018 (2009-07-10) 
  12121.  */ 
  12122. public function Arrow($x0, $y0, $x1, $y1, $head_style=0, $arm_size=5, $arm_angle=15) { 
  12123.     // getting arrow direction angle 
  12124.     // 0 deg angle is when both arms go along X axis. angle grows clockwise. 
  12125.     $dir_angle = atan2(($y0 - $y1), ($x0 - $x1)); 
  12126.     if ($dir_angle < 0) { 
  12127.         $dir_angle += (2 * M_PI); 
  12128.     } 
  12129.     $arm_angle = deg2rad($arm_angle); 
  12130.     $sx1 = $x1; 
  12131.     $sy1 = $y1; 
  12132.     if ($head_style > 0) { 
  12133.         // calculate the stopping point for the arrow shaft 
  12134.         $sx1 = $x1 + (($arm_size - $this->LineWidth) * cos($dir_angle)); 
  12135.         $sy1 = $y1 + (($arm_size - $this->LineWidth) * sin($dir_angle)); 
  12136.     } 
  12137.     // main arrow line / shaft 
  12138.     $this->Line($x0, $y0, $sx1, $sy1); 
  12139.     // left arrowhead arm tip 
  12140.     $x2L = $x1 + ($arm_size * cos($dir_angle + $arm_angle)); 
  12141.     $y2L = $y1 + ($arm_size * sin($dir_angle + $arm_angle)); 
  12142.     // right arrowhead arm tip 
  12143.     $x2R = $x1 + ($arm_size * cos($dir_angle - $arm_angle)); 
  12144.     $y2R = $y1 + ($arm_size * sin($dir_angle - $arm_angle)); 
  12145.     $mode = 'D'; 
  12146.     $style = array(); 
  12147.     switch ($head_style) { 
  12148.         case 0: { 
  12149.             // draw only arrowhead arms 
  12150.             $mode = 'D'; 
  12151.             $style = array(1, 1, 0); 
  12152.             break; 
  12153.         } 
  12154.         case 1: { 
  12155.             // draw closed arrowhead, but no fill 
  12156.             $mode = 'D'; 
  12157.             break; 
  12158.         } 
  12159.         case 2: { 
  12160.             // closed and filled arrowhead 
  12161.             $mode = 'DF'; 
  12162.             break; 
  12163.         } 
  12164.         case 3: { 
  12165.             // filled arrowhead 
  12166.             $mode = 'F'; 
  12167.             break; 
  12168.         } 
  12169.     } 
  12170.     $this->Polygon(array($x2L, $y2L, $x1, $y1, $x2R, $y2R), $mode, $style, array()); 
  12171. } 
  12172.  
  12173. // END GRAPHIC FUNCTIONS SECTION ----------------------- 
  12174.  
  12175. /** 
  12176.  * Add a Named Destination. 
  12177.  * NOTE: destination names are unique, so only last entry will be saved. 
  12178.  * @param $name (string) Destination name. 
  12179.  * @param $y (float) Y position in user units of the destiantion on the selected page (default = -1 = current position; 0 = page start;). 
  12180.  * @param $page (int|string) Target page number (leave empty for current page). If you prefix a page number with the * character, then this page will not be changed when adding/deleting/moving pages. 
  12181.  * @param $x (float) X position in user units of the destiantion on the selected page (default = -1 = current position;). 
  12182.  * @return (string) Stripped named destination identifier or false in case of error. 
  12183.  * @public 
  12184.  * @author Christian Deligant, Nicola Asuni 
  12185.  * @since 5.9.097 (2011-06-23) 
  12186.  */ 
  12187. public function setDestination($name, $y=-1, $page='', $x=-1) { 
  12188.     // remove unsupported characters 
  12189.     $name = TCPDF_STATIC::encodeNameObject($name); 
  12190.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($name)) { 
  12191.         return false; 
  12192.     } 
  12193.     if ($y == -1) { 
  12194.         $y = $this->GetY(); 
  12195.     } elseif ($y < 0) { 
  12196.         $y = 0; 
  12197.     } elseif ($y > $this->h) { 
  12198.         $y = $this->h; 
  12199.     } 
  12200.     if ($x == -1) { 
  12201.         $x = $this->GetX(); 
  12202.     } elseif ($x < 0) { 
  12203.         $x = 0; 
  12204.     } elseif ($x > $this->w) { 
  12205.         $x = $this->w; 
  12206.     } 
  12207.     $fixed = false; 
  12208.     if (!empty($page) AND ($page[0] == '*')) { 
  12209.         $page = intval(substr($page, 1)); 
  12210.         // this page number will not be changed when moving/add/deleting pages 
  12211.         $fixed = true; 
  12212.     } 
  12213.     if (empty($page)) { 
  12214.         $page = $this->PageNo(); 
  12215.         if (empty($page)) { 
  12216.             return; 
  12217.         } 
  12218.     } 
  12219.     $this->dests[$name] = array('x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'p' => $page, 'f' => $fixed); 
  12220.     return $name; 
  12221. } 
  12222.  
  12223. /** 
  12224.  * Return the Named Destination array. 
  12225.  * @return (array) Named Destination array. 
  12226.  * @public 
  12227.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12228.  * @since 5.9.097 (2011-06-23) 
  12229.  */ 
  12230. public function getDestination() { 
  12231.     return $this->dests; 
  12232. } 
  12233.  
  12234. /** 
  12235.  * Insert Named Destinations. 
  12236.  * @protected 
  12237.  * @author Johannes G\FCntert, Nicola Asuni 
  12238.  * @since 5.9.098 (2011-06-23) 
  12239.  */ 
  12240. protected function _putdests() { 
  12241.     if (empty($this->dests)) { 
  12242.         return; 
  12243.     } 
  12244.     $this->n_dests = $this->_newobj(); 
  12245.     $out = ' <<'; 
  12246.     foreach($this->dests as $name => $o) { 
  12247.         $out .= ' /'.$name.' '.sprintf('[%u 0 R /XYZ %F %F null]', $this->page_obj_id[($o['p'])], ($o['x'] * $this->k), ($this->pagedim[$o['p']]['h'] - ($o['y'] * $this->k))); 
  12248.     } 
  12249.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  12250.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  12251.     $this->_out($out); 
  12252. } 
  12253.  
  12254. /** 
  12255.  * Adds a bookmark - alias for Bookmark(). 
  12256.  * @param $txt (string) Bookmark description. 
  12257.  * @param $level (int) Bookmark level (minimum value is 0). 
  12258.  * @param $y (float) Y position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position; 0 = page start;). 
  12259.  * @param $page (int|string) Target page number (leave empty for current page). If you prefix a page number with the * character, then this page will not be changed when adding/deleting/moving pages. 
  12260.  * @param $style (string) Font style: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  12261.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array (values from 0 to 255). 
  12262.  * @param $x (float) X position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position;). 
  12263.  * @param $link (mixed) URL, or numerical link ID, or named destination (# character followed by the destination name), or embedded file (* character followed by the file name). 
  12264.  * @public 
  12265.  */ 
  12266. public function setBookmark($txt, $level=0, $y=-1, $page='', $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0), $x=-1, $link='') { 
  12267.     $this->Bookmark($txt, $level, $y, $page, $style, $color, $x, $link); 
  12268. } 
  12269.  
  12270. /** 
  12271.  * Adds a bookmark. 
  12272.  * @param $txt (string) Bookmark description. 
  12273.  * @param $level (int) Bookmark level (minimum value is 0). 
  12274.  * @param $y (float) Y position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position; 0 = page start;). 
  12275.  * @param $page (int|string) Target page number (leave empty for current page). If you prefix a page number with the * character, then this page will not be changed when adding/deleting/moving pages. 
  12276.  * @param $style (string) Font style: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  12277.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array (values from 0 to 255). 
  12278.  * @param $x (float) X position in user units of the bookmark on the selected page (default = -1 = current position;). 
  12279.  * @param $link (mixed) URL, or numerical link ID, or named destination (# character followed by the destination name), or embedded file (* character followed by the file name). 
  12280.  * @public 
  12281.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12282.  */ 
  12283. public function Bookmark($txt, $level=0, $y=-1, $page='', $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0), $x=-1, $link='') { 
  12284.     if ($level < 0) { 
  12285.         $level = 0; 
  12286.     } 
  12287.     if (isset($this->outlines[0])) { 
  12288.         $lastoutline = end($this->outlines); 
  12289.         $maxlevel = $lastoutline['l'] + 1; 
  12290.     } else { 
  12291.         $maxlevel = 0; 
  12292.     } 
  12293.     if ($level > $maxlevel) { 
  12294.         $level = $maxlevel; 
  12295.     } 
  12296.     if ($y == -1) { 
  12297.         $y = $this->GetY(); 
  12298.     } elseif ($y < 0) { 
  12299.         $y = 0; 
  12300.     } elseif ($y > $this->h) { 
  12301.         $y = $this->h; 
  12302.     } 
  12303.     if ($x == -1) { 
  12304.         $x = $this->GetX(); 
  12305.     } elseif ($x < 0) { 
  12306.         $x = 0; 
  12307.     } elseif ($x > $this->w) { 
  12308.         $x = $this->w; 
  12309.     } 
  12310.     $fixed = false; 
  12311.     if (!empty($page) AND ($page[0] == '*')) { 
  12312.         $page = intval(substr($page, 1)); 
  12313.         // this page number will not be changed when moving/add/deleting pages 
  12314.         $fixed = true; 
  12315.     } 
  12316.     if (empty($page)) { 
  12317.         $page = $this->PageNo(); 
  12318.         if (empty($page)) { 
  12319.             return; 
  12320.         } 
  12321.     } 
  12322.     $this->outlines[] = array('t' => $txt, 'l' => $level, 'x' => $x, 'y' => $y, 'p' => $page, 'f' => $fixed, 's' => strtoupper($style), 'c' => $color, 'u' => $link); 
  12323. } 
  12324.  
  12325. /** 
  12326.  * Sort bookmarks for page and key. 
  12327.  * @protected 
  12328.  * @since 5.9.119 (2011-09-19) 
  12329.  */ 
  12330. protected function sortBookmarks() { 
  12331.     // get sorting columns 
  12332.     $outline_p = array(); 
  12333.     $outline_y = array(); 
  12334.     foreach ($this->outlines as $key => $row) { 
  12335.         $outline_p[$key] = $row['p']; 
  12336.         $outline_k[$key] = $key; 
  12337.     } 
  12338.     // sort outlines by page and original position 
  12339.     array_multisort($outline_p, SORT_NUMERIC, SORT_ASC, $outline_k, SORT_NUMERIC, SORT_ASC, $this->outlines); 
  12340. } 
  12341.  
  12342. /** 
  12343.  * Create a bookmark PDF string. 
  12344.  * @protected 
  12345.  * @author Olivier Plathey, Nicola Asuni 
  12346.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12347.  */ 
  12348. protected function _putbookmarks() { 
  12349.     $nb = count($this->outlines); 
  12350.     if ($nb == 0) { 
  12351.         return; 
  12352.     } 
  12353.     // sort bookmarks 
  12354.     $this->sortBookmarks(); 
  12355.     $lru = array(); 
  12356.     $level = 0; 
  12357.     foreach ($this->outlines as $i => $o) { 
  12358.         if ($o['l'] > 0) { 
  12359.             $parent = $lru[($o['l'] - 1)]; 
  12360.             //Set parent and last pointers 
  12361.             $this->outlines[$i]['parent'] = $parent; 
  12362.             $this->outlines[$parent]['last'] = $i; 
  12363.             if ($o['l'] > $level) { 
  12364.                 //Level increasing: set first pointer 
  12365.                 $this->outlines[$parent]['first'] = $i; 
  12366.             } 
  12367.         } else { 
  12368.             $this->outlines[$i]['parent'] = $nb; 
  12369.         } 
  12370.         if (($o['l'] <= $level) AND ($i > 0)) { 
  12371.             //Set prev and next pointers 
  12372.             $prev = $lru[$o['l']]; 
  12373.             $this->outlines[$prev]['next'] = $i; 
  12374.             $this->outlines[$i]['prev'] = $prev; 
  12375.         } 
  12376.         $lru[$o['l']] = $i; 
  12377.         $level = $o['l']; 
  12378.     } 
  12379.     //Outline items 
  12380.     $n = $this->n + 1; 
  12381.     $nltags = '/<br[\s]?\/>|<\/(blockquote|dd|dl|div|dt|h1|h2|h3|h4|h5|h6|hr|li|ol|p|pre|ul|tcpdf|table|tr|td)>/si'; 
  12382.     foreach ($this->outlines as $i => $o) { 
  12383.         $oid = $this->_newobj(); 
  12384.         // covert HTML title to string 
  12385.         $title = preg_replace($nltags, "\n", $o['t']); 
  12386.         $title = preg_replace("/[\r]+/si", '', $title); 
  12387.         $title = preg_replace("/[\n]+/si", "\n", $title); 
  12388.         $title = strip_tags($title); 
  12389.         $title = $this->stringTrim($title); 
  12390.         $out = '<</Title '.$this->_textstring($title, $oid); 
  12391.         $out .= ' /Parent '.($n + $o['parent']).' 0 R'; 
  12392.         if (isset($o['prev'])) { 
  12393.             $out .= ' /Prev '.($n + $o['prev']).' 0 R'; 
  12394.         } 
  12395.         if (isset($o['next'])) { 
  12396.             $out .= ' /Next '.($n + $o['next']).' 0 R'; 
  12397.         } 
  12398.         if (isset($o['first'])) { 
  12399.             $out .= ' /First '.($n + $o['first']).' 0 R'; 
  12400.         } 
  12401.         if (isset($o['last'])) { 
  12402.             $out .= ' /Last '.($n + $o['last']).' 0 R'; 
  12403.         } 
  12404.         if (isset($o['u']) AND !empty($o['u'])) { 
  12405.             // link 
  12406.             if (is_string($o['u'])) { 
  12407.                 if ($o['u'][0] == '#') { 
  12408.                     // internal destination 
  12409.                     $out .= ' /Dest /'.TCPDF_STATIC::encodeNameObject(substr($o['u'], 1)); 
  12410.                 } elseif ($o['u'][0] == '%') { 
  12411.                     // embedded PDF file 
  12412.                     $filename = basename(substr($o['u'], 1)); 
  12413.                     $out .= ' /A <</S /GoToE /D [0 /Fit] /NewWindow true /T << /R /C /P '.($o['p'] - 1).' /A '.$this->embeddedfiles[$filename]['a'].' >> >>'; 
  12414.                 } elseif ($o['u'][0] == '*') { 
  12415.                     // embedded generic file 
  12416.                     $filename = basename(substr($o['u'], 1)); 
  12417.                     $jsa = 'var D=event.target.doc;var MyData=D.dataObjects;for (var i in MyData) if (MyData[i].path=="'.$filename.'") D.exportDataObject( { cName : MyData[i].name, nLaunch : 2});'; 
  12418.                     $out .= ' /A <</S /JavaScript /JS '.$this->_textstring($jsa, $oid).'>>'; 
  12419.                 } else { 
  12420.                     // external URI link 
  12421.                     $out .= ' /A <</S /URI /URI '.$this->_datastring($this->unhtmlentities($o['u']), $oid).'>>'; 
  12422.                 } 
  12423.             } elseif (isset($this->links[$o['u']])) { 
  12424.                 // internal link ID 
  12425.                 $l = $this->links[$o['u']]; 
  12426.                 if (isset($this->page_obj_id[($l['p'])])) { 
  12427.                     $out .= sprintf(' /Dest [%u 0 R /XYZ 0 %F null]', $this->page_obj_id[($l['p'])], ($this->pagedim[$l['p']]['h'] - ($l['y'] * $this->k))); 
  12428.                 } 
  12429.             } 
  12430.         } elseif (isset($this->page_obj_id[($o['p'])])) { 
  12431.             // link to a page 
  12432.             $out .= ' '.sprintf('/Dest [%u 0 R /XYZ %F %F null]', $this->page_obj_id[($o['p'])], ($o['x'] * $this->k), ($this->pagedim[$o['p']]['h'] - ($o['y'] * $this->k))); 
  12433.         } 
  12434.         // set font style 
  12435.         $style = 0; 
  12436.         if (!empty($o['s'])) { 
  12437.             // bold 
  12438.             if (strpos($o['s'], 'B') !== false) { 
  12439.                 $style |= 2; 
  12440.             } 
  12441.             // oblique 
  12442.             if (strpos($o['s'], 'I') !== false) { 
  12443.                 $style |= 1; 
  12444.             } 
  12445.         } 
  12446.         $out .= sprintf(' /F %d', $style); 
  12447.         // set bookmark color 
  12448.         if (isset($o['c']) AND is_array($o['c']) AND (count($o['c']) == 3)) { 
  12449.             $color = array_values($o['c']); 
  12450.             $out .= sprintf(' /C [%F %F %F]', ($color[0] / 255), ($color[1] / 255), ($color[2] / 255)); 
  12451.         } else { 
  12452.             // black 
  12453.             $out .= ' /C [0.0 0.0 0.0]'; 
  12454.         } 
  12455.         $out .= ' /Count 0'; // normally closed item 
  12456.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  12457.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  12458.         $this->_out($out); 
  12459.     } 
  12460.     //Outline root 
  12461.     $this->OutlineRoot = $this->_newobj(); 
  12462.     $this->_out('<< /Type /Outlines /First '.$n.' 0 R /Last '.($n + $lru[0]).' 0 R >>'."\n".'endobj'); 
  12463. } 
  12464.  
  12465. // --- JAVASCRIPT ------------------------------------------------------ 
  12466.  
  12467. /** 
  12468.  * Adds a javascript 
  12469.  * @param $script (string) Javascript code 
  12470.  * @public 
  12471.  * @author Johannes G\FCntert, Nicola Asuni 
  12472.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12473.  */ 
  12474. public function IncludeJS($script) { 
  12475.     $this->javascript .= $script; 
  12476. } 
  12477.  
  12478. /** 
  12479.  * Adds a javascript object and return object ID 
  12480.  * @param $script (string) Javascript code 
  12481.  * @param $onload (boolean) if true executes this object when opening the document 
  12482.  * @return int internal object ID 
  12483.  * @public 
  12484.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12485.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12486.  */ 
  12487. public function addJavascriptObject($script, $onload=false) { 
  12488.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  12489.         // javascript is not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  12490.         return false; 
  12491.     } 
  12492.     ++$this->n; 
  12493.     $this->js_objects[$this->n] = array('n' => $this->n, 'js' => $script, 'onload' => $onload); 
  12494.     return $this->n; 
  12495. } 
  12496.  
  12497. /** 
  12498.  * Create a javascript PDF string. 
  12499.  * @protected 
  12500.  * @author Johannes G\FCntert, Nicola Asuni 
  12501.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12502.  */ 
  12503. protected function _putjavascript() { 
  12504.     if ($this->pdfa_mode OR (empty($this->javascript) AND empty($this->js_objects))) { 
  12505.         return; 
  12506.     } 
  12507.     if (strpos($this->javascript, 'this.addField') > 0) { 
  12508.         if (!$this->ur['enabled']) { 
  12509.             //$this->setUserRights(); 
  12510.         } 
  12511.         // the following two lines are used to avoid form fields duplication after saving 
  12512.         // The addField method only works when releasing user rights (UR3) 
  12513.         $jsa = sprintf("ftcpdfdocsaved=this.addField('%s', '%s', %d, [%F, %F, %F, %F]);", 'tcpdfdocsaved', 'text', 0, 0, 1, 0, 1); 
  12514.         $jsb = "getField('tcpdfdocsaved').value='saved';"; 
  12515.         $this->javascript = $jsa."\n".$this->javascript."\n".$jsb; 
  12516.     } 
  12517.     // name tree for javascript 
  12518.     $this->n_js = '<< /Names ['; 
  12519.     if (!empty($this->javascript)) { 
  12520.         $this->n_js .= ' (EmbeddedJS) '.($this->n + 1).' 0 R'; 
  12521.     } 
  12522.     if (!empty($this->js_objects)) { 
  12523.         foreach ($this->js_objects as $key => $val) { 
  12524.             if ($val['onload']) { 
  12525.                 $this->n_js .= ' (JS'.$key.') '.$key.' 0 R'; 
  12526.             } 
  12527.         } 
  12528.     } 
  12529.     $this->n_js .= ' ] >>'; 
  12530.     // default Javascript object 
  12531.     if (!empty($this->javascript)) { 
  12532.         $obj_id = $this->_newobj(); 
  12533.         $out = '<< /S /JavaScript'; 
  12534.         $out .= ' /JS '.$this->_textstring($this->javascript, $obj_id); 
  12535.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  12536.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  12537.         $this->_out($out); 
  12538.     } 
  12539.     // additional Javascript objects 
  12540.     if (!empty($this->js_objects)) { 
  12541.         foreach ($this->js_objects as $key => $val) { 
  12542.             $out = $this->_getobj($key)."\n".' << /S /JavaScript /JS '.$this->_textstring($val['js'], $key).' >>'."\n".'endobj'; 
  12543.             $this->_out($out); 
  12544.         } 
  12545.     } 
  12546. } 
  12547.  
  12548. /** 
  12549.  * Adds a javascript form field. 
  12550.  * @param $type (string) field type 
  12551.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12552.  * @param $x (int) horizontal position 
  12553.  * @param $y (int) vertical position 
  12554.  * @param $w (int) width 
  12555.  * @param $h (int) height 
  12556.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12557.  * @protected 
  12558.  * @author Denis Van Nuffelen, Nicola Asuni 
  12559.  * @since 2.1.002 (2008-02-12) 
  12560.  */ 
  12561. protected function _addfield($type, $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop) { 
  12562.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12563.         $x = $x - $w; 
  12564.     } 
  12565.     // the followind avoid fields duplication after saving the document 
  12566.     $this->javascript .= "if (getField('tcpdfdocsaved').value != 'saved') {"; 
  12567.     $k = $this->k; 
  12568.     $this->javascript .= sprintf("f".$name."=this.addField('%s', '%s', %u, [%F, %F, %F, %F]);", $name, $type, $this->PageNo()-1, $x*$k, ($this->h-$y)*$k+1, ($x+$w)*$k, ($this->h-$y-$h)*$k+1)."\n"; 
  12569.     $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.textSize='.$this->FontSizePt.";\n"; 
  12570.     while (list($key, $val) = each($prop)) { 
  12571.         if (strcmp(substr($key, -5), 'Color') == 0) { 
  12572.             $val = TCPDF_COLORS::_JScolor($val); 
  12573.         } else { 
  12574.             $val = "'".$val."'"; 
  12575.         } 
  12576.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.'.$key.'='.$val.";\n"; 
  12577.     } 
  12578.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12579.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12580.     } else { 
  12581.         $this->x += $w; 
  12582.     } 
  12583.     $this->javascript .= '}'; 
  12584. } 
  12585.  
  12586. // --- FORM FIELDS ----------------------------------------------------- 
  12587.  
  12588.  
  12589.  
  12590. /** 
  12591.  * Set default properties for form fields. 
  12592.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12593.  * @public 
  12594.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12595.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-06) 
  12596.  */ 
  12597. public function setFormDefaultProp($prop=array()) { 
  12598.     $this->default_form_prop = $prop; 
  12599. } 
  12600.  
  12601. /** 
  12602.  * Return the default properties for form fields. 
  12603.  * @return array $prop javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12604.  * @public 
  12605.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12606.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-06) 
  12607.  */ 
  12608. public function getFormDefaultProp() { 
  12609.     return $this->default_form_prop; 
  12610. } 
  12611.  
  12612. /** 
  12613.  * Creates a text field 
  12614.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12615.  * @param $w (float) Width of the rectangle 
  12616.  * @param $h (float) Height of the rectangle 
  12617.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12618.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12619.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12620.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12621.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12622.  * @public 
  12623.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12624.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12625.  */ 
  12626. public function TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12627.     if ($x === '') { 
  12628.         $x = $this->x; 
  12629.     } 
  12630.     if ($y === '') { 
  12631.         $y = $this->y; 
  12632.     } 
  12633.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12634.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  12635.     if ($js) { 
  12636.         $this->_addfield('text', $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  12637.         return; 
  12638.     } 
  12639.     // get default style 
  12640.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12641.     // get annotation data 
  12642.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12643.     // set default appearance stream 
  12644.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  12645.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12646.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12647.     // build appearance stream 
  12648.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12649.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  12650.     $text = ''; 
  12651.     if (isset($prop['value']) AND !empty($prop['value'])) { 
  12652.         $text = $prop['value']; 
  12653.     } elseif (isset($opt['v']) AND !empty($opt['v'])) { 
  12654.         $text = $opt['v']; 
  12655.     } 
  12656.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  12657.     $align = ''; 
  12658.     if (isset($popt['q'])) { 
  12659.         switch ($popt['q']) { 
  12660.             case 0: { 
  12661.                 $align = 'L'; 
  12662.                 break; 
  12663.             } 
  12664.             case 1: { 
  12665.                 $align = 'C'; 
  12666.                 break; 
  12667.             } 
  12668.             case 2: { 
  12669.                 $align = 'R'; 
  12670.                 break; 
  12671.             } 
  12672.             default: { 
  12673.                 $align = ''; 
  12674.                 break; 
  12675.             } 
  12676.         } 
  12677.     } 
  12678.     $this->MultiCell($w, $h, $text, 0, $align, false, 0, 0, 0, true, 0, false, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  12679.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  12680.     --$this->n; 
  12681.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  12682.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  12683.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  12684.     // merge options 
  12685.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12686.     // remove some conflicting options 
  12687.     unset($opt['bs']); 
  12688.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12689.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12690.     $opt['ft'] = 'Tx'; 
  12691.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  12692.     // Additional annotation's parameters (check _putannotsobj() method): 
  12693.     //$opt['f'] 
  12694.     //$opt['as'] 
  12695.     //$opt['bs'] 
  12696.     //$opt['be'] 
  12697.     //$opt['c'] 
  12698.     //$opt['border'] 
  12699.     //$opt['h'] 
  12700.     //$opt['mk']; 
  12701.     //$opt['mk']['r'] 
  12702.     //$opt['mk']['bc']; 
  12703.     //$opt['mk']['bg']; 
  12704.     unset($opt['mk']['ca']); 
  12705.     unset($opt['mk']['rc']); 
  12706.     unset($opt['mk']['ac']); 
  12707.     unset($opt['mk']['i']); 
  12708.     unset($opt['mk']['ri']); 
  12709.     unset($opt['mk']['ix']); 
  12710.     unset($opt['mk']['if']); 
  12711.     //$opt['mk']['if']['sw']; 
  12712.     //$opt['mk']['if']['s']; 
  12713.     //$opt['mk']['if']['a']; 
  12714.     //$opt['mk']['if']['fb']; 
  12715.     unset($opt['mk']['tp']); 
  12716.     //$opt['tu'] 
  12717.     //$opt['tm'] 
  12718.     //$opt['ff'] 
  12719.     //$opt['v'] 
  12720.     //$opt['dv'] 
  12721.     //$opt['a'] 
  12722.     //$opt['aa'] 
  12723.     //$opt['q'] 
  12724.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  12725.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12726.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12727.     } else { 
  12728.         $this->x += $w; 
  12729.     } 
  12730. } 
  12731.  
  12732. /** 
  12733.  * Creates a RadioButton field. 
  12734.  * @param $name (string) Field name. 
  12735.  * @param $w (int) Width of the radio button. 
  12736.  * @param $prop (array) Javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12737.  * @param $opt (array) Annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12738.  * @param $onvalue (string) Value to be returned if selected. 
  12739.  * @param $checked (boolean) Define the initial state. 
  12740.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12741.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12742.  * @param $js (boolean) If true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12743.  * @public 
  12744.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12745.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12746.  */ 
  12747. public function RadioButton($name, $w, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $onvalue='On', $checked=false, $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12748.     if ($x === '') { 
  12749.         $x = $this->x; 
  12750.     } 
  12751.     if ($y === '') { 
  12752.         $y = $this->y; 
  12753.     } 
  12754.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12755.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($w, $x, $y); 
  12756.     if ($js) { 
  12757.         $this->_addfield('radiobutton', $name, $x, $y, $w, $w, $prop); 
  12758.         return; 
  12759.     } 
  12760.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($onvalue)) { 
  12761.         $onvalue = 'On'; 
  12762.     } 
  12763.     if ($checked) { 
  12764.         $defval = $onvalue; 
  12765.     } else { 
  12766.         $defval = 'Off'; 
  12767.     } 
  12768.     // set font 
  12769.     $font = 'zapfdingbats'; 
  12770.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  12771.         // all fonts must be embedded 
  12772.         $font = 'pdfa'.$font; 
  12773.     } 
  12774.     $this->AddFont($font); 
  12775.     $tmpfont = $this->getFontBuffer($font); 
  12776.     // set data for parent group 
  12777.     if (!isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page])) { 
  12778.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page] = array(); 
  12779.     } 
  12780.     if (!isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name])) { 
  12781.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name] = array(); 
  12782.         ++$this->n; 
  12783.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['n'] = $this->n; 
  12784.         $this->radio_groups[] = $this->n; 
  12785.     } 
  12786.     $kid = ($this->n + 1); 
  12787.     // save object ID to be added on Kids entry on parent object 
  12788.     $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name][] = array('kid' => $kid, 'def' => $defval); 
  12789.     // get default style 
  12790.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12791.     $prop['NoToggleToOff'] = 'true'; 
  12792.     $prop['Radio'] = 'true'; 
  12793.     $prop['borderStyle'] = 'inset'; 
  12794.     // get annotation data 
  12795.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12796.     // set additional default options 
  12797.     $this->annotation_fonts[$tmpfont['fontkey']] = $tmpfont['i']; 
  12798.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12799.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12800.     // build appearance stream 
  12801.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12802.     $popt['ap']['n'] = array(); 
  12803.     $fx = ((($w - $this->getAbsFontMeasure($tmpfont['cw'][108])) / 2) * $this->k); 
  12804.     $fy = (($w - ((($tmpfont['desc']['Ascent'] - $tmpfont['desc']['Descent']) * $this->FontSizePt / 1000) / $this->k)) * $this->k); 
  12805.     $popt['ap']['n'][$onvalue] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(108).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  12806.     $popt['ap']['n']['Off'] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(109).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  12807.     if (!isset($popt['mk'])) { 
  12808.         $popt['mk'] = array(); 
  12809.     } 
  12810.     $popt['mk']['ca'] = '(l)'; 
  12811.     // merge options 
  12812.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12813.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12814.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12815.     $opt['ft'] = 'Btn'; 
  12816.     if ($checked) { 
  12817.         $opt['v'] = array('/'.$onvalue); 
  12818.         $opt['as'] = $onvalue; 
  12819.     } else { 
  12820.         $opt['as'] = 'Off'; 
  12821.     } 
  12822.     // store readonly flag 
  12823.     if (!isset($this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['#readonly#'])) { 
  12824.         $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['#readonly#'] = false; 
  12825.     } 
  12826.     $this->radiobutton_groups[$this->page][$name]['#readonly#'] |= ($opt['f'] & 64); 
  12827.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $w, $name, $opt, 0); 
  12828.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12829.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12830.     } else { 
  12831.         $this->x += $w; 
  12832.     } 
  12833. } 
  12834.  
  12835. /** 
  12836.  * Creates a List-box field 
  12837.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12838.  * @param $w (int) width 
  12839.  * @param $h (int) height 
  12840.  * @param $values (array) array containing the list of values. 
  12841.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12842.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12843.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12844.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12845.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12846.  * @public 
  12847.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12848.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12849.  */ 
  12850. public function ListBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12851.     if ($x === '') { 
  12852.         $x = $this->x; 
  12853.     } 
  12854.     if ($y === '') { 
  12855.         $y = $this->y; 
  12856.     } 
  12857.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12858.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  12859.     if ($js) { 
  12860.         $this->_addfield('listbox', $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  12861.         $s = ''; 
  12862.         foreach ($values as $value) { 
  12863.             if (is_array($value)) { 
  12864.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value[1]).'\', \''.addslashes($value[0]).'\']'; 
  12865.             } else { 
  12866.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value).'\', \''.addslashes($value).'\']'; 
  12867.             } 
  12868.         } 
  12869.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.setItems('.substr($s, 1).');'."\n"; 
  12870.         return; 
  12871.     } 
  12872.     // get default style 
  12873.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12874.     // get annotation data 
  12875.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12876.     // set additional default values 
  12877.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  12878.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12879.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12880.     // build appearance stream 
  12881.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12882.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  12883.     $text = ''; 
  12884.     foreach($values as $item) { 
  12885.         if (is_array($item)) { 
  12886.             $text .= $item[1]."\n"; 
  12887.         } else { 
  12888.             $text .= $item."\n"; 
  12889.         } 
  12890.     } 
  12891.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  12892.     $this->MultiCell($w, $h, $text, 0, '', false, 0, 0, 0, true, 0, false, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  12893.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  12894.     --$this->n; 
  12895.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  12896.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  12897.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  12898.     // merge options 
  12899.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12900.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12901.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12902.     $opt['ft'] = 'Ch'; 
  12903.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  12904.     $opt['opt'] = $values; 
  12905.     unset($opt['mk']['ca']); 
  12906.     unset($opt['mk']['rc']); 
  12907.     unset($opt['mk']['ac']); 
  12908.     unset($opt['mk']['i']); 
  12909.     unset($opt['mk']['ri']); 
  12910.     unset($opt['mk']['ix']); 
  12911.     unset($opt['mk']['if']); 
  12912.     unset($opt['mk']['tp']); 
  12913.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  12914.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  12915.         $this->x -= $w; 
  12916.     } else { 
  12917.         $this->x += $w; 
  12918.     } 
  12919. } 
  12920.  
  12921. /** 
  12922.  * Creates a Combo-box field 
  12923.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  12924.  * @param $w (int) width 
  12925.  * @param $h (int) height 
  12926.  * @param $values (array) array containing the list of values. 
  12927.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  12928.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  12929.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12930.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  12931.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  12932.  * @public 
  12933.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  12934.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  12935.  */ 
  12936. public function ComboBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  12937.     if ($x === '') { 
  12938.         $x = $this->x; 
  12939.     } 
  12940.     if ($y === '') { 
  12941.         $y = $this->y; 
  12942.     } 
  12943.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  12944.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  12945.     if ($js) { 
  12946.         $this->_addfield('combobox', $name, $x, $y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  12947.         $s = ''; 
  12948.         foreach ($values as $value) { 
  12949.             if (is_array($value)) { 
  12950.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value[1]).'\', \''.addslashes($value[0]).'\']'; 
  12951.             } else { 
  12952.                 $s .= ', [\''.addslashes($value).'\', \''.addslashes($value).'\']'; 
  12953.             } 
  12954.         } 
  12955.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.'.setItems('.substr($s, 1).');'."\n"; 
  12956.         return; 
  12957.     } 
  12958.     // get default style 
  12959.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  12960.     $prop['Combo'] = true; 
  12961.     // get annotation data 
  12962.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  12963.     // set additional default options 
  12964.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  12965.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  12966.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  12967.     // build appearance stream 
  12968.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  12969.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  12970.     $text = ''; 
  12971.     foreach($values as $item) { 
  12972.         if (is_array($item)) { 
  12973.             $text .= $item[1]."\n"; 
  12974.         } else { 
  12975.             $text .= $item."\n"; 
  12976.         } 
  12977.     } 
  12978.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  12979.     $this->MultiCell($w, $h, $text, 0, '', false, 0, 0, 0, true, 0, false, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  12980.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  12981.     --$this->n; 
  12982.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  12983.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  12984.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  12985.     // merge options 
  12986.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  12987.     // set remaining annotation data 
  12988.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  12989.     $opt['ft'] = 'Ch'; 
  12990.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  12991.     $opt['opt'] = $values; 
  12992.     unset($opt['mk']['ca']); 
  12993.     unset($opt['mk']['rc']); 
  12994.     unset($opt['mk']['ac']); 
  12995.     unset($opt['mk']['i']); 
  12996.     unset($opt['mk']['ri']); 
  12997.     unset($opt['mk']['ix']); 
  12998.     unset($opt['mk']['if']); 
  12999.     unset($opt['mk']['tp']); 
  13000.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  13001.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  13002.         $this->x -= $w; 
  13003.     } else { 
  13004.         $this->x += $w; 
  13005.     } 
  13006. } 
  13007.  
  13008. /** 
  13009.  * Creates a CheckBox field 
  13010.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  13011.  * @param $w (int) width 
  13012.  * @param $checked (boolean) define the initial state. 
  13013.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  13014.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  13015.  * @param $onvalue (string) value to be returned if selected. 
  13016.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13017.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13018.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  13019.  * @public 
  13020.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13021.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  13022.  */ 
  13023. public function CheckBox($name, $w, $checked=false, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $onvalue='Yes', $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  13024.     if ($x === '') { 
  13025.         $x = $this->x; 
  13026.     } 
  13027.     if ($y === '') { 
  13028.         $y = $this->y; 
  13029.     } 
  13030.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  13031.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($w, $x, $y); 
  13032.     if ($js) { 
  13033.         $this->_addfield('checkbox', $name, $x, $y, $w, $w, $prop); 
  13034.         return; 
  13035.     } 
  13036.     if (!isset($prop['value'])) { 
  13037.         $prop['value'] = array('Yes');
