  13038.     } 
  13039.     // get default style 
  13040.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  13041.     $prop['borderStyle'] = 'inset'; 
  13042.     // get annotation data 
  13043.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  13044.     // set additional default options 
  13045.     $font = 'zapfdingbats'; 
  13046.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  13047.         // all fonts must be embedded 
  13048.         $font = 'pdfa'.$font; 
  13049.     } 
  13050.     $this->AddFont($font); 
  13051.     $tmpfont = $this->getFontBuffer($font); 
  13052.     $this->annotation_fonts[$tmpfont['fontkey']] = $tmpfont['i']; 
  13053.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  13054.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  13055.     // build appearance stream 
  13056.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  13057.     $popt['ap']['n'] = array(); 
  13058.     $fx = ((($w - $this->getAbsFontMeasure($tmpfont['cw'][110])) / 2) * $this->k); 
  13059.     $fy = (($w - ((($tmpfont['desc']['Ascent'] - $tmpfont['desc']['Descent']) * $this->FontSizePt / 1000) / $this->k)) * $this->k); 
  13060.     $popt['ap']['n']['Yes'] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(110).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  13061.     $popt['ap']['n']['Off'] = sprintf('q %s BT /F%d %F Tf %F %F Td ('.chr(111).') Tj ET Q', $this->TextColor, $tmpfont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $fx, $fy); 
  13062.     // merge options 
  13063.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  13064.     // set remaining annotation data 
  13065.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  13066.     $opt['ft'] = 'Btn'; 
  13067.     $opt['t'] = $name; 
  13068.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($onvalue)) { 
  13069.         $onvalue = 'Yes'; 
  13070.     } 
  13071.     $opt['opt'] = array($onvalue); 
  13072.     if ($checked) { 
  13073.         $opt['v'] = array('/Yes'); 
  13074.         $opt['as'] = 'Yes'; 
  13075.     } else { 
  13076.         $opt['v'] = array('/Off'); 
  13077.         $opt['as'] = 'Off'; 
  13078.     } 
  13079.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $w, $name, $opt, 0); 
  13080.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  13081.         $this->x -= $w; 
  13082.     } else { 
  13083.         $this->x += $w; 
  13084.     } 
  13085. } 
  13086.  
  13087. /** 
  13088.  * Creates a button field 
  13089.  * @param $name (string) field name 
  13090.  * @param $w (int) width 
  13091.  * @param $h (int) height 
  13092.  * @param $caption (string) caption. 
  13093.  * @param $action (mixed) action triggered by pressing the button. Use a string to specify a javascript action. Use an array to specify a form action options as on section 12.7.5 of PDF32000_2008. 
  13094.  * @param $prop (array) javascript field properties. Possible values are described on official Javascript for Acrobat API reference. 
  13095.  * @param $opt (array) annotation parameters. Possible values are described on official PDF32000_2008 reference. 
  13096.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13097.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle 
  13098.  * @param $js (boolean) if true put the field using JavaScript (requires Acrobat Writer to be rendered). 
  13099.  * @public 
  13100.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13101.  * @since 4.8.000 (2009-09-07) 
  13102.  */ 
  13103. public function Button($name, $w, $h, $caption, $action, $prop=array(), $opt=array(), $x='', $y='', $js=false) { 
  13104.     if ($x === '') { 
  13105.         $x = $this->x; 
  13106.     } 
  13107.     if ($y === '') { 
  13108.         $y = $this->y; 
  13109.     } 
  13110.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  13111.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  13112.     if ($js) { 
  13113.         $this->_addfield('button', $name, $this->x, $this->y, $w, $h, $prop); 
  13114.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".buttonSetCaption('".addslashes($caption)."');\n"; 
  13115.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".setAction('MouseUp', '".addslashes($action)."');\n"; 
  13116.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".highlight='push';\n"; 
  13117.         $this->javascript .= 'f'.$name.".print=false;\n"; 
  13118.         return; 
  13119.     } 
  13120.     // get default style 
  13121.     $prop = array_merge($this->getFormDefaultProp(), $prop); 
  13122.     $prop['Pushbutton'] = 'true'; 
  13123.     $prop['highlight'] = 'push'; 
  13124.     $prop['display'] = 'display.noPrint'; 
  13125.     // get annotation data 
  13126.     $popt = TCPDF_STATIC::getAnnotOptFromJSProp($prop, $this->spot_colors, $this->rtl); 
  13127.     $this->annotation_fonts[$this->CurrentFont['fontkey']] = $this->CurrentFont['i']; 
  13128.     $fontstyle = sprintf('/F%d %F Tf %s', $this->CurrentFont['i'], $this->FontSizePt, $this->TextColor); 
  13129.     $popt['da'] = $fontstyle; 
  13130.     // build appearance stream 
  13131.     $popt['ap'] = array(); 
  13132.     $popt['ap']['n'] = '/Tx BMC q '.$fontstyle.' '; 
  13133.     $tmpid = $this->startTemplate($w, $h, false); 
  13134.     $bw = (2 / $this->k); // border width 
  13135.     $border = array( 
  13136.         'L' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(231)),  
  13137.         'R' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(51)),  
  13138.         'T' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(231)),  
  13139.         'B' => array('width' => $bw, 'cap' => 'square', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(51))); 
  13140.     $this->SetFillColor(204); 
  13141.     $this->Cell($w, $h, $caption, $border, 0, 'C', true, '', 1, false, 'T', 'M'); 
  13142.     $this->endTemplate(); 
  13143.     --$this->n; 
  13144.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= $this->xobjects[$tmpid]['outdata']; 
  13145.     unset($this->xobjects[$tmpid]); 
  13146.     $popt['ap']['n'] .= 'Q EMC'; 
  13147.     // set additional default options 
  13148.     if (!isset($popt['mk'])) { 
  13149.         $popt['mk'] = array(); 
  13150.     } 
  13151.     $ann_obj_id = ($this->n + 1); 
  13152.     if (!empty($action) AND !is_array($action)) { 
  13153.         $ann_obj_id = ($this->n + 2); 
  13154.     } 
  13155.     $popt['mk']['ca'] = $this->_textstring($caption, $ann_obj_id); 
  13156.     $popt['mk']['rc'] = $this->_textstring($caption, $ann_obj_id); 
  13157.     $popt['mk']['ac'] = $this->_textstring($caption, $ann_obj_id); 
  13158.     // merge options 
  13159.     $opt = array_merge($popt, $opt); 
  13160.     // set remaining annotation data 
  13161.     $opt['Subtype'] = 'Widget'; 
  13162.     $opt['ft'] = 'Btn'; 
  13163.     $opt['t'] = $caption; 
  13164.     $opt['v'] = $name; 
  13165.     if (!empty($action)) { 
  13166.         if (is_array($action)) { 
  13167.             // form action options as on section 12.7.5 of PDF32000_2008. 
  13168.             $opt['aa'] = '/D <<'; 
  13169.             $bmode = array('SubmitForm', 'ResetForm', 'ImportData'); 
  13170.             foreach ($action AS $key => $val) { 
  13171.                 if (($key == 'S') AND in_array($val, $bmode)) { 
  13172.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /S /'.$val; 
  13173.                 } elseif (($key == 'F') AND (!empty($val))) { 
  13174.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /F '.$this->_datastring($val, $ann_obj_id); 
  13175.                 } elseif (($key == 'Fields') AND is_array($val) AND !empty($val)) { 
  13176.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /Fields ['; 
  13177.                     foreach ($val AS $field) { 
  13178.                         $opt['aa'] .= ' '.$this->_textstring($field, $ann_obj_id); 
  13179.                     } 
  13180.                     $opt['aa'] .= ']'; 
  13181.                 } elseif (($key == 'Flags')) { 
  13182.                     $ff = 0; 
  13183.                     if (is_array($val)) { 
  13184.                         foreach ($val AS $flag) { 
  13185.                             switch ($flag) { 
  13186.                                 case 'Include/Exclude': { 
  13187.                                     $ff += 1 << 0; 
  13188.                                     break; 
  13189.                                 } 
  13190.                                 case 'IncludeNoValueFields': { 
  13191.                                     $ff += 1 << 1; 
  13192.                                     break; 
  13193.                                 } 
  13194.                                 case 'ExportFormat': { 
  13195.                                     $ff += 1 << 2; 
  13196.                                     break; 
  13197.                                 } 
  13198.                                 case 'GetMethod': { 
  13199.                                     $ff += 1 << 3; 
  13200.                                     break; 
  13201.                                 } 
  13202.                                 case 'SubmitCoordinates': { 
  13203.                                     $ff += 1 << 4; 
  13204.                                     break; 
  13205.                                 } 
  13206.                                 case 'XFDF': { 
  13207.                                     $ff += 1 << 5; 
  13208.                                     break; 
  13209.                                 } 
  13210.                                 case 'IncludeAppendSaves': { 
  13211.                                     $ff += 1 << 6; 
  13212.                                     break; 
  13213.                                 } 
  13214.                                 case 'IncludeAnnotations': { 
  13215.                                     $ff += 1 << 7; 
  13216.                                     break; 
  13217.                                 } 
  13218.                                 case 'SubmitPDF': { 
  13219.                                     $ff += 1 << 8; 
  13220.                                     break; 
  13221.                                 } 
  13222.                                 case 'CanonicalFormat': { 
  13223.                                     $ff += 1 << 9; 
  13224.                                     break; 
  13225.                                 } 
  13226.                                 case 'ExclNonUserAnnots': { 
  13227.                                     $ff += 1 << 10; 
  13228.                                     break; 
  13229.                                 } 
  13230.                                 case 'ExclFKey': { 
  13231.                                     $ff += 1 << 11; 
  13232.                                     break; 
  13233.                                 } 
  13234.                                 case 'EmbedForm': { 
  13235.                                     $ff += 1 << 13; 
  13236.                                     break; 
  13237.                                 } 
  13238.                             } 
  13239.                         } 
  13240.                     } else { 
  13241.                         $ff = intval($val); 
  13242.                     } 
  13243.                     $opt['aa'] .= ' /Flags '.$ff; 
  13244.                 } 
  13245.             } 
  13246.             $opt['aa'] .= ' >>'; 
  13247.         } else { 
  13248.             // Javascript action or raw action command 
  13249.             $js_obj_id = $this->addJavascriptObject($action); 
  13250.             $opt['aa'] = '/D '.$js_obj_id.' 0 R'; 
  13251.         } 
  13252.     } 
  13253.     $this->Annotation($x, $y, $w, $h, $name, $opt, 0); 
  13254.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  13255.         $this->x -= $w; 
  13256.     } else { 
  13257.         $this->x += $w; 
  13258.     } 
  13259. } 
  13260.  
  13261. // --- END FORMS FIELDS ------------------------------------------------ 
  13262.  
  13263. /** 
  13264.  * Add certification signature (DocMDP or UR3) 
  13265.  * You can set only one signature type 
  13266.  * @protected 
  13267.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13268.  * @since 4.6.008 (2009-05-07) 
  13269.  */ 
  13270. protected function _putsignature() { 
  13271.     if ((!$this->sign) OR (!isset($this->signature_data['cert_type']))) { 
  13272.         return; 
  13273.     } 
  13274.     $sigobjid = ($this->sig_obj_id + 1); 
  13275.     $out = $this->_getobj($sigobjid)."\n"; 
  13276.     $out .= '<< /Type /Sig'; 
  13277.     $out .= ' /Filter /Adobe.PPKLite'; 
  13278.     $out .= ' /SubFilter /adbe.pkcs7.detached'; 
  13279.     $out .= ' '.TCPDF_STATIC::$byterange_string; 
  13280.     $out .= ' /Contents<'.str_repeat('0', $this->signature_max_length).'>'; 
  13281.     if (empty($this->signature_data['approval']) OR ($this->signature_data['approval'] != 'A')) { 
  13282.         $out .= ' /Reference ['; // array of signature reference dictionaries 
  13283.         $out .= ' << /Type /SigRef'; 
  13284.         if ($this->signature_data['cert_type'] > 0) { 
  13285.             $out .= ' /TransformMethod /DocMDP'; 
  13286.             $out .= ' /TransformParams <<'; 
  13287.             $out .= ' /Type /TransformParams'; 
  13288.             $out .= ' /P '.$this->signature_data['cert_type']; 
  13289.             $out .= ' /V /1.2'; 
  13290.         } else { 
  13291.             $out .= ' /TransformMethod /UR3'; 
  13292.             $out .= ' /TransformParams <<'; 
  13293.             $out .= ' /Type /TransformParams'; 
  13294.             $out .= ' /V /2.2'; 
  13295.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['document'])) { 
  13296.                 $out .= ' /Document['.$this->ur['document'].']'; 
  13297.             } 
  13298.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['form'])) { 
  13299.                 $out .= ' /Form['.$this->ur['form'].']'; 
  13300.             } 
  13301.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['signature'])) { 
  13302.                 $out .= ' /Signature['.$this->ur['signature'].']'; 
  13303.             } 
  13304.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['annots'])) { 
  13305.                 $out .= ' /Annots['.$this->ur['annots'].']'; 
  13306.             } 
  13307.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['ef'])) { 
  13308.                 $out .= ' /EF['.$this->ur['ef'].']'; 
  13309.             } 
  13310.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->ur['formex'])) { 
  13311.                 $out .= ' /FormEX['.$this->ur['formex'].']'; 
  13312.             } 
  13313.         } 
  13314.         $out .= ' >>'; // close TransformParams 
  13315.         // optional digest data (values must be calculated and replaced later) 
  13316.         //$out .= ' /Data ********** 0 R'; 
  13317.         //$out .= ' /DigestMethod/MD5'; 
  13318.         //$out .= ' /DigestLocation[********** 34]'; 
  13319.         //$out .= ' /DigestValue<********************************>'; 
  13320.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  13321.         $out .= ' ]'; // end of reference 
  13322.     } 
  13323.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['Name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['Name'])) { 
  13324.         $out .= ' /Name '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['Name'], $sigobjid); 
  13325.     } 
  13326.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['Location']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['Location'])) { 
  13327.         $out .= ' /Location '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['Location'], $sigobjid); 
  13328.     } 
  13329.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['Reason']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['Reason'])) { 
  13330.         $out .= ' /Reason '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['Reason'], $sigobjid); 
  13331.     } 
  13332.     if (isset($this->signature_data['info']['ContactInfo']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->signature_data['info']['ContactInfo'])) { 
  13333.         $out .= ' /ContactInfo '.$this->_textstring($this->signature_data['info']['ContactInfo'], $sigobjid); 
  13334.     } 
  13335.     $out .= ' /M '.$this->_datestring($sigobjid, $this->doc_modification_timestamp); 
  13336.     $out .= ' >>'; 
  13337.     $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  13338.     $this->_out($out); 
  13339. } 
  13340.  
  13341. /** 
  13342.  * Set User's Rights for PDF Reader 
  13343.  * WARNING: This is experimental and currently do not work. 
  13344.  * Check the PDF Reference 8.7.1 Transform Methods,  
  13345.  * Table 8.105 Entries in the UR transform parameters dictionary 
  13346.  * @param $enable (boolean) if true enable user's rights on PDF reader 
  13347.  * @param $document (string) Names specifying additional document-wide usage rights for the document. The only defined value is "/FullSave", which permits a user to save the document along with modified form and/or annotation data. 
  13348.  * @param $annots (string) Names specifying additional annotation-related usage rights for the document. Valid names in PDF 1.5 and later are /Create/Delete/Modify/Copy/Import/Export, which permit the user to perform the named operation on annotations. 
  13349.  * @param $form (string) Names specifying additional form-field-related usage rights for the document. Valid names are: /Add/Delete/FillIn/Import/Export/SubmitStandalone/SpawnTemplate 
  13350.  * @param $signature (string) Names specifying additional signature-related usage rights for the document. The only defined value is /Modify, which permits a user to apply a digital signature to an existing signature form field or clear a signed signature form field. 
  13351.  * @param $ef (string) Names specifying additional usage rights for named embedded files in the document. Valid names are /Create/Delete/Modify/Import, which permit the user to perform the named operation on named embedded files 
  13352.  Names specifying additional embedded-files-related usage rights for the document. 
  13353.  * @param $formex (string) Names specifying additional form-field-related usage rights. The only valid name is BarcodePlaintext, which permits text form field data to be encoded as a plaintext two-dimensional barcode. 
  13354.  * @public 
  13355.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13356.  * @since 2.9.000 (2008-03-26) 
  13357.  */ 
  13358. public function setUserRights( 
  13359.         $enable=true,  
  13360.         $document='/FullSave',  
  13361.         $annots='/Create/Delete/Modify/Copy/Import/Export',  
  13362.         $form='/Add/Delete/FillIn/Import/Export/SubmitStandalone/SpawnTemplate',  
  13363.         $signature='/Modify',  
  13364.         $ef='/Create/Delete/Modify/Import',  
  13365.         $formex='') { 
  13366.     $this->ur['enabled'] = $enable; 
  13367.     $this->ur['document'] = $document; 
  13368.     $this->ur['annots'] = $annots; 
  13369.     $this->ur['form'] = $form; 
  13370.     $this->ur['signature'] = $signature; 
  13371.     $this->ur['ef'] = $ef; 
  13372.     $this->ur['formex'] = $formex; 
  13373.     if (!$this->sign) { 
  13374.         $this->setSignature('', '', '', '', 0, array()); 
  13375.     } 
  13376. } 
  13377.  
  13378. /** 
  13379.  * Enable document signature (requires the OpenSSL Library). 
  13380.  * The digital signature improve document authenticity and integrity and allows o enable extra features on Acrobat Reader. 
  13381.  * To create self-signed signature: openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365000 -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.crt 
  13382.  * To export crt to p12: openssl pkcs12 -export -in tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.p12 
  13383.  * To convert pfx certificate to pem: openssl pkcs12 -in tcpdf.pfx -out tcpdf.crt -nodes 
  13384.  * @param $signing_cert (mixed) signing certificate (string or filename prefixed with 'file://') 
  13385.  * @param $private_key (mixed) private key (string or filename prefixed with 'file://') 
  13386.  * @param $private_key_password (string) password 
  13387.  * @param $extracerts (string) specifies the name of a file containing a bunch of extra certificates to include in the signature which can for example be used to help the recipient to verify the certificate that you used. 
  13388.  * @param $cert_type (int) The access permissions granted for this document. Valid values shall be: 1 = No changes to the document shall be permitted; any change to the document shall invalidate the signature; 2 = Permitted changes shall be filling in forms, instantiating page templates, and signing; other changes shall invalidate the signature; 3 = Permitted changes shall be the same as for 2, as well as annotation creation, deletion, and modification; other changes shall invalidate the signature. 
  13389.  * @param $info (array) array of option information: Name, Location, Reason, ContactInfo. 
  13390.  * @param $approval (string) Enable approval signature eg. for PDF incremental update 
  13391.  * @public 
  13392.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13393.  * @since 4.6.005 (2009-04-24) 
  13394.  */ 
  13395. public function setSignature($signing_cert='', $private_key='', $private_key_password='', $extracerts='', $cert_type=2, $info=array(), $approval='') { 
  13396.     // to create self-signed signature: openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365000 -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.crt 
  13397.     // to export crt to p12: openssl pkcs12 -export -in tcpdf.crt -out tcpdf.p12 
  13398.     // to convert pfx certificate to pem: openssl 
  13399.     //     OpenSSL> pkcs12 -in <cert.pfx> -out <cert.crt> -nodes 
  13400.     $this->sign = true; 
  13401.     ++$this->n; 
  13402.     $this->sig_obj_id = $this->n; // signature widget 
  13403.     ++$this->n; // signature object ($this->sig_obj_id + 1) 
  13404.     $this->signature_data = array(); 
  13405.     if (strlen($signing_cert) == 0) { 
  13406.         $this->Error('Please provide a certificate file and password!'); 
  13407.     } 
  13408.     if (strlen($private_key) == 0) { 
  13409.         $private_key = $signing_cert; 
  13410.     } 
  13411.     $this->signature_data['signcert'] = $signing_cert; 
  13412.     $this->signature_data['privkey'] = $private_key; 
  13413.     $this->signature_data['password'] = $private_key_password; 
  13414.     $this->signature_data['extracerts'] = $extracerts; 
  13415.     $this->signature_data['cert_type'] = $cert_type; 
  13416.     $this->signature_data['info'] = $info; 
  13417.     $this->signature_data['approval'] = $approval; 
  13418. } 
  13419.  
  13420. /** 
  13421.  * Set the digital signature appearance (a cliccable rectangle area to get signature properties) 
  13422.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  13423.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  13424.  * @param $w (float) Width of the signature area. 
  13425.  * @param $h (float) Height of the signature area. 
  13426.  * @param $page (int) option page number (if < 0 the current page is used). 
  13427.  * @param $name (string) Name of the signature. 
  13428.  * @public 
  13429.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13430.  * @since 5.3.011 (2010-06-17) 
  13431.  */ 
  13432. public function setSignatureAppearance($x=0, $y=0, $w=0, $h=0, $page=-1, $name='') { 
  13433.     $this->signature_appearance = $this->getSignatureAppearanceArray($x, $y, $w, $h, $page, $name); 
  13434. } 
  13435.  
  13436. /** 
  13437.  * Add an empty digital signature appearance (a cliccable rectangle area to get signature properties) 
  13438.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  13439.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  13440.  * @param $w (float) Width of the signature area. 
  13441.  * @param $h (float) Height of the signature area. 
  13442.  * @param $page (int) option page number (if < 0 the current page is used). 
  13443.  * @param $name (string) Name of the signature. 
  13444.  * @public 
  13445.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13446.  * @since 5.9.101 (2011-07-06) 
  13447.  */ 
  13448. public function addEmptySignatureAppearance($x=0, $y=0, $w=0, $h=0, $page=-1, $name='') { 
  13449.     ++$this->n; 
  13450.     $this->empty_signature_appearance[] = array('objid' => $this->n) + $this->getSignatureAppearanceArray($x, $y, $w, $h, $page, $name); 
  13451. } 
  13452.  
  13453. /** 
  13454.  * Get the array that defines the signature appearance (page and rectangle coordinates). 
  13455.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  13456.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  13457.  * @param $w (float) Width of the signature area. 
  13458.  * @param $h (float) Height of the signature area. 
  13459.  * @param $page (int) option page number (if < 0 the current page is used). 
  13460.  * @param $name (string) Name of the signature. 
  13461.  * @return (array) Array defining page and rectangle coordinates of signature appearance. 
  13462.  * @protected 
  13463.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13464.  * @since 5.9.101 (2011-07-06) 
  13465.  */ 
  13466. protected function getSignatureAppearanceArray($x=0, $y=0, $w=0, $h=0, $page=-1, $name='') { 
  13467.     $sigapp = array(); 
  13468.     if (($page < 1) OR ($page > $this->numpages)) { 
  13469.         $sigapp['page'] = $this->page; 
  13470.     } else { 
  13471.         $sigapp['page'] = intval($page); 
  13472.     } 
  13473.     if (empty($name)) { 
  13474.         $sigapp['name'] = 'Signature'; 
  13475.     } else { 
  13476.         $sigapp['name'] = $name; 
  13477.     } 
  13478.     $a = $x * $this->k; 
  13479.     $b = $this->pagedim[($sigapp['page'])]['h'] - (($y + $h) * $this->k); 
  13480.     $c = $w * $this->k; 
  13481.     $d = $h * $this->k; 
  13482.     $sigapp['rect'] = sprintf('%F %F %F %F', $a, $b, ($a + $c), ($b + $d)); 
  13483.     return $sigapp; 
  13484. } 
  13485.  
  13486. /** 
  13487.  * Enable document timestamping (requires the OpenSSL Library). 
  13488.  * The trusted timestamping improve document security that means that no one should be able to change the document once it has been recorded. 
  13489.  * Use with digital signature only! 
  13490.  * @param $tsa_host (string) Time Stamping Authority (TSA) server (prefixed with 'https://') 
  13491.  * @param $tsa_username (string) Specifies the username for TSA authorization (optional) OR specifies the TSA authorization PEM file (see: example_66.php, optional) 
  13492.  * @param $tsa_password (string) Specifies the password for TSA authorization (optional) 
  13493.  * @param $tsa_cert (string) Specifies the location of TSA certificate for authorization (optional for cURL) 
  13494.  * @public 
  13495.  * @author Richard Stockinger 
  13496.  * @since 6.0.085 (2014-06-16) 
  13497.  */ 
  13498. public function setTimeStamp($tsa_host='', $tsa_username='', $tsa_password='', $tsa_cert='') { 
  13499.     $this->tsa_data = array(); 
  13500.     if (!function_exists('curl_init')) { 
  13501.         $this->Error('Please enable cURL PHP extension!'); 
  13502.     } 
  13503.     if (strlen($tsa_host) == 0) { 
  13504.         $this->Error('Please specify the host of Time Stamping Authority (TSA)!'); 
  13505.     } 
  13506.     $this->tsa_data['tsa_host'] = $tsa_host; 
  13507.     if (is_file($tsa_username)) { 
  13508.         $this->tsa_data['tsa_auth'] = $tsa_username; 
  13509.     } else { 
  13510.         $this->tsa_data['tsa_username'] = $tsa_username; 
  13511.     } 
  13512.     $this->tsa_data['tsa_password'] = $tsa_password; 
  13513.     $this->tsa_data['tsa_cert'] = $tsa_cert; 
  13514.     $this->tsa_timestamp = true; 
  13515. } 
  13516.  
  13517. /** 
  13518.  * NOT YET IMPLEMENTED 
  13519.  * Request TSA for a timestamp 
  13520.  * @param $signature (string) Digital signature as binary string 
  13521.  * @return (string) Timestamped digital signature 
  13522.  * @protected 
  13523.  * @author Richard Stockinger 
  13524.  * @since 6.0.085 (2014-06-16) 
  13525.  */ 
  13526. protected function applyTSA($signature) { 
  13527.     if (!$this->tsa_timestamp) { 
  13528.         return $signature; 
  13529.     } 
  13530.     //@TODO: implement this feature 
  13531.     return $signature; 
  13532. } 
  13533.  
  13534. /** 
  13535.  * Create a new page group. 
  13536.  * NOTE: call this function before calling AddPage() 
  13537.  * @param $page (int) starting group page (leave empty for next page). 
  13538.  * @public 
  13539.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13540.  */ 
  13541. public function startPageGroup($page='') { 
  13542.     if (empty($page)) { 
  13543.         $page = $this->page + 1; 
  13544.     } 
  13545.     $this->newpagegroup[$page] = sizeof($this->newpagegroup) + 1; 
  13546. } 
  13547.  
  13548. /** 
  13549.  * Set the starting page number. 
  13550.  * @param $num (int) Starting page number. 
  13551.  * @since 5.9.093 (2011-06-16) 
  13552.  * @public 
  13553.  */ 
  13554. public function setStartingPageNumber($num=1) { 
  13555.     $this->starting_page_number = max(0, intval($num)); 
  13556. } 
  13557.  
  13558. /** 
  13559.  * Returns the string alias used right align page numbers. 
  13560.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string wil contain an additional open curly brace. 
  13561.  * @return string 
  13562.  * @since 5.9.099 (2011-06-27) 
  13563.  * @public 
  13564.  */ 
  13565. public function getAliasRightShift() { 
  13566.     // calculate aproximatively the ratio between widths of aliases and replacements. 
  13567.     $ref = '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_right_shift.'}{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages.'}{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page.'}'; 
  13568.     $rep = str_repeat(' ', $this->GetNumChars($ref)); 
  13569.     $wrep = $this->GetStringWidth($rep); 
  13570.     if ($wrep > 0) { 
  13571.         $wdiff = max(1, ($this->GetStringWidth($ref) / $wrep)); 
  13572.     } else { 
  13573.         $wdiff = 1; 
  13574.     } 
  13575.     $sdiff = sprintf('%F', $wdiff); 
  13576.     $alias = TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_right_shift.$sdiff.'}'; 
  13577.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13578.         $alias = '{'.$alias; 
  13579.     } 
  13580.     return $alias; 
  13581. } 
  13582.  
  13583. /** 
  13584.  * Returns the string alias used for the total number of pages. 
  13585.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13586.  * This alias will be replaced by the total number of pages in the document. 
  13587.  * @return string 
  13588.  * @since 3.0.018 (2008-08-08) 
  13589.  * @public 
  13590.  */ 
  13591. public function getAliasNbPages() { 
  13592.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13593.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages.'}'; 
  13594.     } 
  13595.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_tot_pages; 
  13596. } 
  13597.  
  13598. /** 
  13599.  * Returns the string alias used for the page number. 
  13600.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13601.  * This alias will be replaced by the page number. 
  13602.  * @return string 
  13603.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  13604.  * @public 
  13605.  */ 
  13606. public function getAliasNumPage() { 
  13607.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13608.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page.'}'; 
  13609.     } 
  13610.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_num_page; 
  13611. } 
  13612.  
  13613. /** 
  13614.  * Return the alias for the total number of pages in the current page group. 
  13615.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13616.  * This alias will be replaced by the total number of pages in this group. 
  13617.  * @return alias of the current page group 
  13618.  * @public 
  13619.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13620.  */ 
  13621. public function getPageGroupAlias() { 
  13622.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13623.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_tot_pages.'}'; 
  13624.     } 
  13625.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_tot_pages; 
  13626. } 
  13627.  
  13628. /** 
  13629.  * Return the alias for the page number on the current page group. 
  13630.  * If the current font is unicode type, the returned string is surrounded by additional curly braces. 
  13631.  * This alias will be replaced by the page number (relative to the belonging group). 
  13632.  * @return alias of the current page group 
  13633.  * @public 
  13634.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  13635.  */ 
  13636. public function getPageNumGroupAlias() { 
  13637.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  13638.         return '{'.TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_num_page.'}'; 
  13639.     } 
  13640.     return TCPDF_STATIC::$alias_group_num_page; 
  13641. } 
  13642.  
  13643. /** 
  13644.  * Return the current page in the group. 
  13645.  * @return current page in the group 
  13646.  * @public 
  13647.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13648.  */ 
  13649. public function getGroupPageNo() { 
  13650.     return $this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup]; 
  13651. } 
  13652.  
  13653. /** 
  13654.  * Returns the current group page number formatted as a string. 
  13655.  * @public 
  13656.  * @since 4.3.003 (2008-11-18) 
  13657.  * @see PaneNo(), formatPageNumber() 
  13658.  */ 
  13659. public function getGroupPageNoFormatted() { 
  13660.     return TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($this->getGroupPageNo()); 
  13661. } 
  13662.  
  13663. /** 
  13664.  * Returns the current page number formatted as a string. 
  13665.  * @public 
  13666.  * @since 4.2.005 (2008-11-06) 
  13667.  * @see PaneNo(), formatPageNumber() 
  13668.  */ 
  13669. public function PageNoFormatted() { 
  13670.     return TCPDF_STATIC::formatPageNumber($this->PageNo()); 
  13671. } 
  13672.  
  13673. /** 
  13674.  * Put pdf layers. 
  13675.  * @protected 
  13676.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13677.  */ 
  13678. protected function _putocg() { 
  13679.     if (empty($this->pdflayers)) { 
  13680.         return; 
  13681.     } 
  13682.     foreach ($this->pdflayers as $key => $layer) { 
  13683.          $this->pdflayers[$key]['objid'] = $this->_newobj(); 
  13684.          $out = '<< /Type /OCG'; 
  13685.          $out .= ' /Name '.$this->_textstring($layer['name'], $this->pdflayers[$key]['objid']); 
  13686.          $out .= ' /Usage <<'; 
  13687.          if (isset($layer['print']) AND ($layer['print'] !== NULL)) { 
  13688.             $out .= ' /Print <</PrintState /'.($layer['print']?'ON':'OFF').'>>'; 
  13689.          } 
  13690.          $out .= ' /View <</ViewState /'.($layer['view']?'ON':'OFF').'>>'; 
  13691.          $out .= ' >> >>'; 
  13692.          $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  13693.          $this->_out($out); 
  13694.     } 
  13695. } 
  13696.  
  13697. /** 
  13698.  * Start a new pdf layer. 
  13699.  * @param $name (string) Layer name (only a-z letters and numbers). Leave empty for automatic name. 
  13700.  * @param $print (boolean|null) Set to TRUE to print this layer, FALSE to not print and NULL to not set this option 
  13701.  * @param $view (boolean) Set to true to view this layer. 
  13702.  * @param $lock (boolean) If true lock the layer 
  13703.  * @public 
  13704.  * @since 5.9.102 (2011-07-13) 
  13705.  */ 
  13706. public function startLayer($name='', $print=true, $view=true, $lock=true) { 
  13707.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  13708.         return; 
  13709.     } 
  13710.     $layer = sprintf('LYR%03d', (count($this->pdflayers) + 1)); 
  13711.     if (empty($name)) { 
  13712.         $name = $layer; 
  13713.     } else { 
  13714.         $name = preg_replace('/[^a-zA-Z0-9_\-]/', '', $name); 
  13715.     } 
  13716.     $this->pdflayers[] = array('layer' => $layer, 'name' => $name, 'print' => $print, 'view' => $view, 'lock' => $lock); 
  13717.     $this->openMarkedContent = true; 
  13718.     $this->_out('/OC /'.$layer.' BDC'); 
  13719. } 
  13720.  
  13721. /** 
  13722.  * End the current PDF layer. 
  13723.  * @public 
  13724.  * @since 5.9.102 (2011-07-13) 
  13725.  */ 
  13726. public function endLayer() { 
  13727.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  13728.         return; 
  13729.     } 
  13730.     if ($this->openMarkedContent) { 
  13731.         // close existing open marked-content layer 
  13732.         $this->_out('EMC'); 
  13733.         $this->openMarkedContent = false; 
  13734.     } 
  13735. } 
  13736.  
  13737. /** 
  13738.  * Set the visibility of the successive elements. 
  13739.  * This can be useful, for instance, to put a background 
  13740.  * image or color that will show on screen but won't print. 
  13741.  * @param $v (string) visibility mode. Legal values are: all, print, screen or view. 
  13742.  * @public 
  13743.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13744.  */ 
  13745. public function setVisibility($v) { 
  13746.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  13747.         return; 
  13748.     } 
  13749.     $this->endLayer(); 
  13750.     switch($v) { 
  13751.         case 'print': { 
  13752.             $this->startLayer('Print', true, false); 
  13753.             break; 
  13754.         } 
  13755.         case 'view': 
  13756.         case 'screen': { 
  13757.             $this->startLayer('View', false, true); 
  13758.             break; 
  13759.         } 
  13760.         case 'all': { 
  13761.             $this->_out(''); 
  13762.             break; 
  13763.         } 
  13764.         default: { 
  13765.             $this->Error('Incorrect visibility: '.$v); 
  13766.             break; 
  13767.         } 
  13768.     } 
  13769. } 
  13770.  
  13771. /** 
  13772.  * Add transparency parameters to the current extgstate 
  13773.  * @param $parms (array) parameters 
  13774.  * @return the number of extgstates 
  13775.  * @protected 
  13776.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13777.  */ 
  13778. protected function addExtGState($parms) { 
  13779.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  13780.         // transparencies are not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  13781.         return; 
  13782.     } 
  13783.     // check if this ExtGState already exist 
  13784.     foreach ($this->extgstates as $i => $ext) { 
  13785.         if ($ext['parms'] == $parms) { 
  13786.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  13787.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  13788.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['extgstates'][$i] = $ext; 
  13789.             } 
  13790.             // return reference to existing ExtGState 
  13791.             return $i; 
  13792.         } 
  13793.     } 
  13794.     $n = (count($this->extgstates) + 1); 
  13795.     $this->extgstates[$n] = array('parms' => $parms); 
  13796.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  13797.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  13798.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['extgstates'][$n] = $this->extgstates[$n]; 
  13799.     } 
  13800.     return $n; 
  13801. } 
  13802.  
  13803. /** 
  13804.  * Add an extgstate 
  13805.  * @param $gs (array) extgstate 
  13806.  * @protected 
  13807.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13808.  */ 
  13809. protected function setExtGState($gs) { 
  13810.     if ($this->pdfa_mode OR ($this->state != 2)) { 
  13811.         // transparency is not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  13812.         return; 
  13813.     } 
  13814.     $this->_out(sprintf('/GS%d gs', $gs)); 
  13815. } 
  13816.  
  13817. /** 
  13818.  * Put extgstates for object transparency 
  13819.  * @protected 
  13820.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13821.  */ 
  13822. protected function _putextgstates() { 
  13823.     foreach ($this->extgstates as $i => $ext) { 
  13824.         $this->extgstates[$i]['n'] = $this->_newobj(); 
  13825.         $out = '<< /Type /ExtGState'; 
  13826.         foreach ($ext['parms'] as $k => $v) { 
  13827.             if (is_float($v)) { 
  13828.                 $v = sprintf('%F', $v); 
  13829.             } elseif ($v === true) { 
  13830.                 $v = 'true'; 
  13831.             } elseif ($v === false) { 
  13832.                 $v = 'false'; 
  13833.             } 
  13834.             $out .= ' /'.$k.' '.$v; 
  13835.         } 
  13836.         $out .= ' >>'; 
  13837.         $out .= "\n".'endobj'; 
  13838.         $this->_out($out); 
  13839.     } 
  13840. } 
  13841.  
  13842. /** 
  13843.  * Set overprint mode for stroking (OP) and non-stroking (op) painting operations. 
  13844.  * (Check the "Entries in a Graphics State Parameter Dictionary" on PDF 32000-1:2008). 
  13845.  * @param $stroking (boolean) If true apply overprint for stroking operations. 
  13846.  * @param $nonstroking (boolean) If true apply overprint for painting operations other than stroking. 
  13847.  * @param $mode (integer) Overprint mode: (0 = each source colour component value replaces the value previously painted for the corresponding device colorant; 1 = a tint value of 0.0 for a source colour component shall leave the corresponding component of the previously painted colour unchanged). 
  13848.  * @public 
  13849.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  13850.  */ 
  13851. public function setOverprint($stroking=true, $nonstroking='', $mode=0) { 
  13852.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  13853.         return; 
  13854.     } 
  13855.     $stroking = $stroking ? true : false; 
  13856.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($nonstroking)) { 
  13857.         // default value if not set 
  13858.         $nonstroking = $stroking; 
  13859.     } else { 
  13860.         $nonstroking = $nonstroking ? true : false; 
  13861.     } 
  13862.     if (($mode != 0) AND ($mode != 1)) { 
  13863.         $mode = 0; 
  13864.     } 
  13865.     $this->overprint = array('OP' => $stroking, 'op' => $nonstroking, 'OPM' => $mode); 
  13866.     $gs = $this->addExtGState($this->overprint); 
  13867.     $this->setExtGState($gs); 
  13868. } 
  13869.  
  13870. /** 
  13871.  * Get the overprint mode array (OP, op, OPM). 
  13872.  * (Check the "Entries in a Graphics State Parameter Dictionary" on PDF 32000-1:2008). 
  13873.  * @return array. 
  13874.  * @public 
  13875.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  13876.  */ 
  13877. public function getOverprint() { 
  13878.     return $this->overprint; 
  13879. } 
  13880.  
  13881. /** 
  13882.  * Set alpha for stroking (CA) and non-stroking (ca) operations. 
  13883.  * @param $stroking (float) Alpha value for stroking operations: real value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque). 
  13884.  * @param $bm (string) blend mode, one of the following: Normal, Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Darken, Lighten, ColorDodge, ColorBurn, HardLight, SoftLight, Difference, Exclusion, Hue, Saturation, Color, Luminosity 
  13885.  * @param $nonstroking (float) Alpha value for non-stroking operations: real value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque). 
  13886.  * @param $ais (boolean) 
  13887.  * @public 
  13888.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13889.  */ 
  13890. public function setAlpha($stroking=1, $bm='Normal', $nonstroking='', $ais=false) { 
  13891.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  13892.         // transparency is not allowed in PDF/A mode 
  13893.         return; 
  13894.     } 
  13895.     $stroking = floatval($stroking); 
  13896.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($nonstroking)) { 
  13897.         // default value if not set 
  13898.         $nonstroking = $stroking; 
  13899.     } else { 
  13900.         $nonstroking = floatval($nonstroking); 
  13901.     } 
  13902.     if ($bm[0] == '/') { 
  13903.         // remove trailing slash 
  13904.         $bm = substr($bm, 1); 
  13905.     } 
  13906.     if (!in_array($bm, array('Normal', 'Multiply', 'Screen', 'Overlay', 'Darken', 'Lighten', 'ColorDodge', 'ColorBurn', 'HardLight', 'SoftLight', 'Difference', 'Exclusion', 'Hue', 'Saturation', 'Color', 'Luminosity'))) { 
  13907.         $bm = 'Normal'; 
  13908.     } 
  13909.     $ais = $ais ? true : false; 
  13910.     $this->alpha = array('CA' => $stroking, 'ca' => $nonstroking, 'BM' => '/'.$bm, 'AIS' => $ais); 
  13911.     $gs = $this->addExtGState($this->alpha); 
  13912.     $this->setExtGState($gs); 
  13913. } 
  13914.  
  13915. /** 
  13916.  * Get the alpha mode array (CA, ca, BM, AIS). 
  13917.  * (Check the "Entries in a Graphics State Parameter Dictionary" on PDF 32000-1:2008). 
  13918.  * @return array. 
  13919.  * @public 
  13920.  * @since 5.9.152 (2012-03-23) 
  13921.  */ 
  13922. public function getAlpha() { 
  13923.     return $this->alpha; 
  13924. } 
  13925.  
  13926. /** 
  13927.  * Set the default JPEG compression quality (1-100) 
  13928.  * @param $quality (int) JPEG quality, integer between 1 and 100 
  13929.  * @public 
  13930.  * @since 3.0.000 (2008-03-27) 
  13931.  */ 
  13932. public function setJPEGQuality($quality) { 
  13933.     if (($quality < 1) OR ($quality > 100)) { 
  13934.         $quality = 75; 
  13935.     } 
  13936.     $this->jpeg_quality = intval($quality); 
  13937. } 
  13938.  
  13939. /** 
  13940.  * Set the default number of columns in a row for HTML tables. 
  13941.  * @param $cols (int) number of columns 
  13942.  * @public 
  13943.  * @since 3.0.014 (2008-06-04) 
  13944.  */ 
  13945. public function setDefaultTableColumns($cols=4) { 
  13946.     $this->default_table_columns = intval($cols); 
  13947. } 
  13948.  
  13949. /** 
  13950.  * Set the height of the cell (line height) respect the font height. 
  13951.  * @param $h (int) cell proportion respect font height (typical value = 1.25). 
  13952.  * @public 
  13953.  * @since 3.0.014 (2008-06-04) 
  13954.  */ 
  13955. public function setCellHeightRatio($h) { 
  13956.     $this->cell_height_ratio = $h; 
  13957. } 
  13958.  
  13959. /** 
  13960.  * return the height of cell repect font height. 
  13961.  * @public 
  13962.  * @since 3.0.012 (2008-07-24) 
  13963.  */ 
  13964. public function getCellHeightRatio() { 
  13965.     return $this->cell_height_ratio; 
  13966. } 
  13967.  
  13968. /** 
  13969.  * Set the PDF version (check PDF reference for valid values). 
  13970.  * @param $version (string) PDF document version. 
  13971.  * @public 
  13972.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  13973.  */ 
  13974. public function setPDFVersion($version='1.7') { 
  13975.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  13976.         // PDF/A mode 
  13977.         $this->PDFVersion = '1.4'; 
  13978.     } else { 
  13979.         $this->PDFVersion = $version; 
  13980.     } 
  13981. } 
  13982.  
  13983. /** 
  13984.  * Set the viewer preferences dictionary controlling the way the document is to be presented on the screen or in print. 
  13985.  * (see Section 8.1 of PDF reference, "Viewer Preferences"). 
  13986.  * <ul><li>HideToolbar boolean (Optional) A flag specifying whether to hide the viewer application's tool bars when the document is active. Default value: false.</li><li>HideMenubar boolean (Optional) A flag specifying whether to hide the viewer application's menu bar when the document is active. Default value: false.</li><li>HideWindowUI boolean (Optional) A flag specifying whether to hide user interface elements in the document's window (such as scroll bars and navigation controls), leaving only the document's contents displayed. Default value: false.</li><li>FitWindow boolean (Optional) A flag specifying whether to resize the document's window to fit the size of the first displayed page. Default value: false.</li><li>CenterWindow boolean (Optional) A flag specifying whether to position the document's window in the center of the screen. Default value: false.</li><li>DisplayDocTitle boolean (Optional; PDF 1.4) A flag specifying whether the window's title bar should display the document title taken from the Title entry of the document information dictionary (see Section 10.2.1, "Document Information Dictionary"). If false, the title bar should instead display the name of the PDF file containing the document. Default value: false.</li><li>NonFullScreenPageMode name (Optional) The document's page mode, specifying how to display the document on exiting full-screen mode:<ul><li>UseNone Neither document outline nor thumbnail images visible</li><li>UseOutlines Document outline visible</li><li>UseThumbs Thumbnail images visible</li><li>UseOC Optional content group panel visible</li></ul>This entry is meaningful only if the value of the PageMode entry in the catalog dictionary (see Section 3.6.1, "Document Catalog") is FullScreen; it is ignored otherwise. Default value: UseNone.</li><li>ViewArea name (Optional; PDF 1.4) The name of the page boundary representing the area of a page to be displayed when viewing the document on the screen. Valid values are (see Section 10.10.1, "Page Boundaries").:<ul><li>MediaBox</li><li>CropBox (default)</li><li>BleedBox</li><li>TrimBox</li><li>ArtBox</li></ul></li><li>ViewClip name (Optional; PDF 1.4) The name of the page boundary to which the contents of a page are to be clipped when viewing the document on the screen. Valid values are (see Section 10.10.1, "Page Boundaries").:<ul><li>MediaBox</li><li>CropBox (default)</li><li>BleedBox</li><li>TrimBox</li><li>ArtBox</li></ul></li><li>PrintArea name (Optional; PDF 1.4) The name of the page boundary representing the area of a page to be rendered when printing the document. Valid values are (see Section 10.10.1, "Page Boundaries").:<ul><li>MediaBox</li><li>CropBox (default)</li><li>BleedBox</li><li>TrimBox</li><li>ArtBox</li></ul></li><li>PrintClip name (Optional; PDF 1.4) The name of the page boundary to which the contents of a page are to be clipped when printing the document. Valid values are (see Section 10.10.1, "Page Boundaries").:<ul><li>MediaBox</li><li>CropBox (default)</li><li>BleedBox</li><li>TrimBox</li><li>ArtBox</li></ul></li><li>PrintScaling name (Optional; PDF 1.6) The page scaling option to be selected when a print dialog is displayed for this document. Valid values are: <ul><li>None, which indicates that the print dialog should reflect no page scaling</li><li>AppDefault (default), which indicates that applications should use the current print scaling</li></ul></li><li>Duplex name (Optional; PDF 1.7) The paper handling option to use when printing the file from the print dialog. The following values are valid:<ul><li>Simplex - Print single-sided</li><li>DuplexFlipShortEdge - Duplex and flip on the short edge of the sheet</li><li>DuplexFlipLongEdge - Duplex and flip on the long edge of the sheet</li></ul>Default value: none</li><li>PickTrayByPDFSize boolean (Optional; PDF 1.7) A flag specifying whether the PDF page size is used to select the input paper tray. This setting influences only the preset values used to populate the print dialog presented by a PDF viewer application. If PickTrayByPDFSize is true, the check box in the print dialog associated with input paper tray is checked. Note: This setting has no effect on Mac OS systems, which do not provide the ability to pick the input tray by size.</li><li>PrintPageRange array (Optional; PDF 1.7) The page numbers used to initialize the print dialog box when the file is printed. The first page of the PDF file is denoted by 1. Each pair consists of the first and last pages in the sub-range. An odd number of integers causes this entry to be ignored. Negative numbers cause the entire array to be ignored. Default value: as defined by PDF viewer application</li><li>NumCopies integer (Optional; PDF 1.7) The number of copies to be printed when the print dialog is opened for this file. Supported values are the integers 2 through 5. Values outside this range are ignored. Default value: as defined by PDF viewer application, but typically 1</li></ul> 
  13987.  * @param $preferences (array) array of options. 
  13988.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  13989.  * @public 
  13990.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  13991.  */ 
  13992. public function setViewerPreferences($preferences) { 
  13993.     $this->viewer_preferences = $preferences; 
  13994. } 
  13995.  
  13996. /** 
  13997.  * Paints color transition registration bars 
  13998.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  13999.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14000.  * @param $w (float) width of the rectangle. 
  14001.  * @param $h (float) height of the rectangle. 
  14002.  * @param $transition (boolean) if true prints tcolor transitions to white. 
  14003.  * @param $vertical (boolean) if true prints bar vertically. 
  14004.  * @param $colors (string) colors to print separated by comma. Valid values are: A, W, R, G, B, C, M, Y, K, RGB, CMYK, ALL, ALLSPOT, <SPOT_COLOR_NAME>. Where: A = grayscale black, W = grayscale white, R = RGB red, G RGB green, B RGB blue, C = CMYK cyan, M = CMYK magenta, Y = CMYK yellow, K = CMYK key/black, RGB = RGB registration color, CMYK = CMYK registration color, ALL = Spot registration color, ALLSPOT = print all defined spot colors, <SPOT_COLOR_NAME> = name of the spot color to print. 
  14005.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  14006.  * @since 4.9.000 (2010-03-26) 
  14007.  * @public 
  14008.  */ 
  14009. public function colorRegistrationBar($x, $y, $w, $h, $transition=true, $vertical=false, $colors='A, R, G, B, C, M, Y, K') { 
  14010.     if (strpos($colors, 'ALLSPOT') !== false) { 
  14011.         // expand spot colors 
  14012.         $spot_colors = ''; 
  14013.         foreach ($this->spot_colors as $spot_color_name => $v) { 
  14014.             $spot_colors .= ', '.$spot_color_name; 
  14015.         } 
  14016.         if (!empty($spot_colors)) { 
  14017.             $spot_colors = substr($spot_colors, 1); 
  14018.             $colors = str_replace('ALLSPOT', $spot_colors, $colors); 
  14019.         } else { 
  14020.             $colors = str_replace('ALLSPOT', 'NONE', $colors); 
  14021.         } 
  14022.     } 
  14023.     $bars = explode(', ', $colors); 
  14024.     $numbars = count($bars); // number of bars to print 
  14025.     if ($numbars <= 0) { 
  14026.         return; 
  14027.     } 
  14028.     // set bar measures 
  14029.     if ($vertical) { 
  14030.         $coords = array(0, 0, 0, 1); 
  14031.         $wb = $w / $numbars; // bar width 
  14032.         $hb = $h; // bar height 
  14033.         $xd = $wb; // delta x 
  14034.         $yd = 0; // delta y 
  14035.     } else { 
  14036.         $coords = array(1, 0, 0, 0); 
  14037.         $wb = $w; // bar width 
  14038.         $hb = $h / $numbars; // bar height 
  14039.         $xd = 0; // delta x 
  14040.         $yd = $hb; // delta y 
  14041.     } 
  14042.     $xb = $x; 
  14043.     $yb = $y; 
  14044.     foreach ($bars as $col) { 
  14045.         switch ($col) { 
  14046.             // set transition colors 
  14047.             case 'A': { // BLACK (GRAYSCALE) 
  14048.                 $col_a = array(255); 
  14049.                 $col_b = array(0); 
  14050.                 break; 
  14051.             } 
  14052.             case 'W': { // WHITE (GRAYSCALE) 
  14053.                 $col_a = array(0); 
  14054.                 $col_b = array(255); 
  14055.                 break; 
  14056.             } 
  14057.             case 'R': { // RED (RGB) 
  14058.                 $col_a = array(255, 255, 255); 
  14059.                 $col_b = array(255, 0, 0); 
  14060.                 break; 
  14061.             } 
  14062.             case 'G': { // GREEN (RGB) 
  14063.                 $col_a = array(255, 255, 255); 
  14064.                 $col_b = array(0, 255, 0); 
  14065.                 break; 
  14066.             } 
  14067.             case 'B': { // BLUE (RGB) 
  14068.                 $col_a = array(255, 255, 255); 
  14069.                 $col_b = array(0, 0, 255); 
  14070.                 break; 
  14071.             } 
  14072.             case 'C': { // CYAN (CMYK) 
  14073.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  14074.                 $col_b = array(100, 0, 0, 0); 
  14075.                 break; 
  14076.             } 
  14077.             case 'M': { // MAGENTA (CMYK) 
  14078.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  14079.                 $col_b = array(0, 100, 0, 0); 
  14080.                 break; 
  14081.             } 
  14082.             case 'Y': { // YELLOW (CMYK) 
  14083.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  14084.                 $col_b = array(0, 0, 100, 0); 
  14085.                 break; 
  14086.             } 
  14087.             case 'K': { // KEY - BLACK (CMYK) 
  14088.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  14089.                 $col_b = array(0, 0, 0, 100); 
  14090.                 break; 
  14091.             } 
  14092.             case 'RGB': { // BLACK REGISTRATION (RGB) 
  14093.                 $col_a = array(255, 255, 255); 
  14094.                 $col_b = array(0, 0, 0); 
  14095.                 break; 
  14096.             } 
  14097.             case 'CMYK': { // BLACK REGISTRATION (CMYK) 
  14098.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0); 
  14099.                 $col_b = array(100, 100, 100, 100); 
  14100.                 break; 
  14101.             } 
  14102.             case 'ALL': { // SPOT COLOR REGISTRATION 
  14103.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0, 'None'); 
  14104.                 $col_b = array(100, 100, 100, 100, 'All'); 
  14105.                 break; 
  14106.             } 
  14107.             case 'NONE': { // SKIP THIS COLOR 
  14108.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0, 'None'); 
  14109.                 $col_b = array(0, 0, 0, 0, 'None'); 
  14110.                 break; 
  14111.             } 
  14112.             default: { // SPECIFIC SPOT COLOR NAME 
  14113.                 $col_a = array(0, 0, 0, 0, 'None'); 
  14114.                 $col_b = TCPDF_COLORS::getSpotColor($col, $this->spot_colors); 
  14115.                 if ($col_b === false) { 
  14116.                     // in case of error defaults to the registration color 
  14117.                     $col_b = array(100, 100, 100, 100, 'All'); 
  14118.                 } 
  14119.                 break; 
  14120.             } 
  14121.         } 
  14122.         if ($col != 'NONE') { 
  14123.             if ($transition) { 
  14124.                 // color gradient 
  14125.                 $this->LinearGradient($xb, $yb, $wb, $hb, $col_a, $col_b, $coords); 
  14126.             } else { 
  14127.                 $this->SetFillColorArray($col_b); 
  14128.                 // colored rectangle 
  14129.                 $this->Rect($xb, $yb, $wb, $hb, 'F', array()); 
  14130.             } 
  14131.             $xb += $xd; 
  14132.             $yb += $yd; 
  14133.         } 
  14134.     } 
  14135. } 
  14136.  
  14137. /** 
  14138.  * Paints crop marks. 
  14139.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the crop mark center. 
  14140.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the crop mark center. 
  14141.  * @param $w (float) width of the crop mark. 
  14142.  * @param $h (float) height of the crop mark. 
  14143.  * @param $type (string) type of crop mark, one symbol per type separated by comma: T = TOP, F = BOTTOM, L = LEFT, R = RIGHT, TL = A = TOP-LEFT, TR = B = TOP-RIGHT, BL = C = BOTTOM-LEFT, BR = D = BOTTOM-RIGHT. 
  14144.  * @param $color (array) crop mark color (default spot registration color). 
  14145.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  14146.  * @since 4.9.000 (2010-03-26) 
  14147.  * @public 
  14148.  */ 
  14149. public function cropMark($x, $y, $w, $h, $type='T, R, B, L', $color=array(100, 100, 100, 100, 'All')) { 
  14150.     $this->SetLineStyle(array('width' => (0.5 / $this->k), 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => $color)); 
  14151.     $type = strtoupper($type); 
  14152.     $type = preg_replace('/[^A-Z\-\, ]*/', '', $type); 
  14153.     // split type in single components 
  14154.     $type = str_replace('-', ', ', $type); 
  14155.     $type = str_replace('TL', 'T, L', $type); 
  14156.     $type = str_replace('TR', 'T, R', $type); 
  14157.     $type = str_replace('BL', 'F, L', $type); 
  14158.     $type = str_replace('BR', 'F, R', $type); 
  14159.     $type = str_replace('A', 'T, L', $type); 
  14160.     $type = str_replace('B', 'T, R', $type); 
  14161.     $type = str_replace('T, RO', 'BO', $type); 
  14162.     $type = str_replace('C', 'F, L', $type); 
  14163.     $type = str_replace('D', 'F, R', $type); 
  14164.     $crops = explode(', ', strtoupper($type)); 
  14165.     // remove duplicates 
  14166.     $crops = array_unique($crops); 
  14167.     $dw = ($w / 4); // horizontal space to leave before the intersection point 
  14168.     $dh = ($h / 4); // vertical space to leave before the intersection point 
  14169.     foreach ($crops as $crop) { 
  14170.         switch ($crop) { 
  14171.             case 'T': 
  14172.             case 'TOP': { 
  14173.                 $x1 = $x; 
  14174.                 $y1 = ($y - $h); 
  14175.                 $x2 = $x; 
  14176.                 $y2 = ($y - $dh); 
  14177.                 break; 
  14178.             } 
  14179.             case 'F': 
  14180.             case 'BOTTOM': { 
  14181.                 $x1 = $x; 
  14182.                 $y1 = ($y + $dh); 
  14183.                 $x2 = $x; 
  14184.                 $y2 = ($y + $h); 
  14185.                 break; 
  14186.             } 
  14187.             case 'L': 
  14188.             case 'LEFT': { 
  14189.                 $x1 = ($x - $w); 
  14190.                 $y1 = $y; 
  14191.                 $x2 = ($x - $dw); 
  14192.                 $y2 = $y; 
  14193.                 break; 
  14194.             } 
  14195.             case 'R': 
  14196.             case 'RIGHT': { 
  14197.                 $x1 = ($x + $dw); 
  14198.                 $y1 = $y; 
  14199.                 $x2 = ($x + $w); 
  14200.                 $y2 = $y; 
  14201.                 break; 
  14202.             } 
  14203.         } 
  14204.         $this->Line($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2); 
  14205.     } 
  14206. } 
  14207.  
  14208. /** 
  14209.  * Paints a registration mark 
  14210.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the registration mark center. 
  14211.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the registration mark center. 
  14212.  * @param $r (float) radius of the crop mark. 
  14213.  * @param $double (boolean) if true print two concentric crop marks. 
  14214.  * @param $cola (array) crop mark color (default spot registration color 'All'). 
  14215.  * @param $colb (array) second crop mark color (default spot registration color 'None'). 
  14216.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  14217.  * @since 4.9.000 (2010-03-26) 
  14218.  * @public 
  14219.  */ 
  14220. public function registrationMark($x, $y, $r, $double=false, $cola=array(100, 100, 100, 100, 'All'), $colb=array(0, 0, 0, 0, 'None')) { 
  14221.     $line_style = array('width' => max((0.5 / $this->k), ($r / 30)), 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => $cola); 
  14222.     $this->SetFillColorArray($cola); 
  14223.     $this->PieSector($x, $y, $r, 90, 180, 'F'); 
  14224.     $this->PieSector($x, $y, $r, 270, 360, 'F'); 
  14225.     $this->Circle($x, $y, $r, 0, 360, 'C', $line_style, array(), 8); 
  14226.     if ($double) { 
  14227.         $ri = $r * 0.5; 
  14228.         $this->SetFillColorArray($colb); 
  14229.         $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 90, 180, 'F'); 
  14230.         $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 270, 360, 'F'); 
  14231.         $this->SetFillColorArray($cola); 
  14232.         $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 0, 90, 'F'); 
  14233.         $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 180, 270, 'F'); 
  14234.         $this->Circle($x, $y, $ri, 0, 360, 'C', $line_style, array(), 8); 
  14235.     } 
  14236. } 
  14237.  
  14238. /** 
  14239.  * Paints a CMYK registration mark 
  14240.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the registration mark center. 
  14241.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the registration mark center. 
  14242.  * @param $r (float) radius of the crop mark. 
  14243.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  14244.  * @since 6.0.038 (2013-09-30) 
  14245.  * @public 
  14246.  */ 
  14247. public function registrationMarkCMYK($x, $y, $r) { 
  14248.     // line width 
  14249.     $lw = max((0.5 / $this->k), ($r / 8)); 
  14250.     // internal radius 
  14251.     $ri = ($r * 0.6); 
  14252.     // external radius 
  14253.     $re = ($r * 1.3); 
  14254.     // Cyan 
  14255.     $this->SetFillColorArray(array(100, 0, 0, 0)); 
  14256.     $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 270, 360, 'F'); 
  14257.     // Magenta 
  14258.     $this->SetFillColorArray(array(0, 100, 0, 0)); 
  14259.     $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 0, 90, 'F'); 
  14260.     // Yellow 
  14261.     $this->SetFillColorArray(array(0, 0, 100, 0)); 
  14262.     $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 90, 180, 'F'); 
  14263.     // Key - black 
  14264.     $this->SetFillColorArray(array(0, 0, 0, 100)); 
  14265.     $this->PieSector($x, $y, $ri, 180, 270, 'F'); 
  14266.     // registration color 
  14267.     $line_style = array('width' => $lw, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(100, 100, 100, 100, 'All')); 
  14268.     $this->SetFillColorArray(array(100, 100, 100, 100, 'All')); 
  14269.     // external circle 
  14270.     $this->Circle($x, $y, $r, 0, 360, 'C', $line_style, array(), 8); 
  14271.     // cross lines 
  14272.     $this->Line($x, ($y - $re), $x, ($y - $ri)); 
  14273.     $this->Line($x, ($y + $ri), $x, ($y + $re)); 
  14274.     $this->Line(($x - $re), $y, ($x - $ri), $y); 
  14275.     $this->Line(($x + $ri), $y, ($x + $re), $y); 
  14276. } 
  14277.  
  14278. /** 
  14279.  * Paints a linear colour gradient. 
  14280.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14281.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14282.  * @param $w (float) width of the rectangle. 
  14283.  * @param $h (float) height of the rectangle. 
  14284.  * @param $col1 (array) first color (Grayscale, RGB or CMYK components). 
  14285.  * @param $col2 (array) second color (Grayscale, RGB or CMYK components). 
  14286.  * @param $coords (array) array of the form (x1, y1, x2, y2) which defines the gradient vector (see linear_gradient_coords.jpg). The default value is from left to right (x1=0, y1=0, x2=1, y2=0). 
  14287.  * @author Andreas W\FCrmser, Nicola Asuni 
  14288.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  14289.  * @public 
  14290.  */ 
  14291. public function LinearGradient($x, $y, $w, $h, $col1=array(), $col2=array(), $coords=array(0, 0, 1, 0)) { 
  14292.     $this->Clip($x, $y, $w, $h); 
  14293.     $this->Gradient(2, $coords, array(array('color' => $col1, 'offset' => 0, 'exponent' => 1), array('color' => $col2, 'offset' => 1, 'exponent' => 1)), array(), false); 
  14294. } 
  14295.  
  14296. /** 
  14297.  * Paints a radial colour gradient. 
  14298.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14299.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14300.  * @param $w (float) width of the rectangle. 
  14301.  * @param $h (float) height of the rectangle. 
  14302.  * @param $col1 (array) first color (Grayscale, RGB or CMYK components). 
  14303.  * @param $col2 (array) second color (Grayscale, RGB or CMYK components). 
  14304.  * @param $coords (array) array of the form (fx, fy, cx, cy, r) where (fx, fy) is the starting point of the gradient with color1, (cx, cy) is the center of the circle with color2, and r is the radius of the circle (see radial_gradient_coords.jpg). (fx, fy) should be inside the circle, otherwise some areas will not be defined. 
  14305.  * @author Andreas W\FCrmser, Nicola Asuni 
  14306.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  14307.  * @public 
  14308.  */ 
  14309. public function RadialGradient($x, $y, $w, $h, $col1=array(), $col2=array(), $coords=array(0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1)) { 
  14310.     $this->Clip($x, $y, $w, $h); 
  14311.     $this->Gradient(3, $coords, array(array('color' => $col1, 'offset' => 0, 'exponent' => 1), array('color' => $col2, 'offset' => 1, 'exponent' => 1)), array(), false); 
  14312. } 
  14313.  
  14314. /** 
  14315.  * Paints a coons patch mesh. 
  14316.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14317.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14318.  * @param $w (float) width of the rectangle. 
  14319.  * @param $h (float) height of the rectangle. 
  14320.  * @param $col1 (array) first color (lower left corner) (RGB components). 
  14321.  * @param $col2 (array) second color (lower right corner) (RGB components). 
  14322.  * @param $col3 (array) third color (upper right corner) (RGB components). 
  14323.  * @param $col4 (array) fourth color (upper left corner) (RGB components). 
  14324.  * @param $coords (array) <ul><li>for one patch mesh: array(float x1, float y1, .... float x12, float y12): 12 pairs of coordinates (normally from 0 to 1) which specify the Bezier control points that define the patch. First pair is the lower left edge point, next is its right control point (control point 2). Then the other points are defined in the order: control point 1, edge point, control point 2 going counter-clockwise around the patch. Last (x12, y12) is the first edge point's left control point (control point 1).</li><li>for two or more patch meshes: array[number of patches]: arrays with the following keys for each patch: f: where to put that patch (0 = first patch, 1, 2, 3 = right, top and left of precedent patch - I didn't figure this out completely - just try and error ;-) points: 12 pairs of coordinates of the Bezier control points as above for the first patch, 8 pairs of coordinates for the following patches, ignoring the coordinates already defined by the precedent patch (I also didn't figure out the order of these - also: try and see what's happening) colors: must be 4 colors for the first patch, 2 colors for the following patches</li></ul> 
  14325.  * @param $coords_min (array) minimum value used by the coordinates. If a coordinate's value is smaller than this it will be cut to coords_min. default: 0 
  14326.  * @param $coords_max (array) maximum value used by the coordinates. If a coordinate's value is greater than this it will be cut to coords_max. default: 1 
  14327.  * @param $antialias (boolean) A flag indicating whether to filter the shading function to prevent aliasing artifacts. 
  14328.  * @author Andreas W\FCrmser, Nicola Asuni 
  14329.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  14330.  * @public 
  14331.  */ 
  14332. public function CoonsPatchMesh($x, $y, $w, $h, $col1=array(), $col2=array(), $col3=array(), $col4=array(), $coords=array(0.00, 0.0, 0.33, 0.00, 0.67, 0.00, 1.00, 0.00, 1.00, 0.33, 1.00, 0.67, 1.00, 1.00, 0.67, 1.00, 0.33, 1.00, 0.00, 1.00, 0.00, 0.67, 0.00, 0.33), $coords_min=0, $coords_max=1, $antialias=false) { 
  14333.     if ($this->pdfa_mode OR ($this->state != 2)) { 
  14334.         return; 
  14335.     } 
  14336.     $this->Clip($x, $y, $w, $h); 
  14337.     $n = count($this->gradients) + 1; 
  14338.     $this->gradients[$n] = array(); 
  14339.     $this->gradients[$n]['type'] = 6; //coons patch mesh 
  14340.     $this->gradients[$n]['coords'] = array(); 
  14341.     $this->gradients[$n]['antialias'] = $antialias; 
  14342.     $this->gradients[$n]['colors'] = array(); 
  14343.     $this->gradients[$n]['transparency'] = false; 
  14344.     //check the coords array if it is the simple array or the multi patch array 
  14345.     if (!isset($coords[0]['f'])) { 
  14346.         //simple array -> convert to multi patch array 
  14347.         if (!isset($col1[1])) { 
  14348.             $col1[1] = $col1[2] = $col1[0]; 
  14349.         } 
  14350.         if (!isset($col2[1])) { 
  14351.             $col2[1] = $col2[2] = $col2[0]; 
  14352.         } 
  14353.         if (!isset($col3[1])) { 
  14354.             $col3[1] = $col3[2] = $col3[0]; 
  14355.         } 
  14356.         if (!isset($col4[1])) { 
  14357.             $col4[1] = $col4[2] = $col4[0]; 
  14358.         } 
  14359.         $patch_array[0]['f'] = 0; 
  14360.         $patch_array[0]['points'] = $coords; 
  14361.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][0]['r'] = $col1[0]; 
  14362.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][0]['g'] = $col1[1]; 
  14363.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][0]['b'] = $col1[2]; 
  14364.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][1]['r'] = $col2[0]; 
  14365.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][1]['g'] = $col2[1]; 
  14366.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][1]['b'] = $col2[2]; 
  14367.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][2]['r'] = $col3[0]; 
  14368.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][2]['g'] = $col3[1]; 
  14369.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][2]['b'] = $col3[2]; 
  14370.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][3]['r'] = $col4[0]; 
  14371.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][3]['g'] = $col4[1]; 
  14372.         $patch_array[0]['colors'][3]['b'] = $col4[2]; 
  14373.     } else { 
  14374.         //multi patch array 
  14375.         $patch_array = $coords; 
  14376.     } 
  14377.     $bpcd = 65535; //16 bits per coordinate 
  14378.     //build the data stream 
  14379.     $this->gradients[$n]['stream'] = ''; 
  14380.     $count_patch = count($patch_array); 
  14381.     for ($i=0; $i < $count_patch; ++$i) { 
  14382.         $this->gradients[$n]['stream'] .= chr($patch_array[$i]['f']); //start with the edge flag as 8 bit 
  14383.         $count_points = count($patch_array[$i]['points']); 
  14384.         for ($j=0; $j < $count_points; ++$j) { 
  14385.             //each point as 16 bit 
  14386.             $patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] = (($patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] - $coords_min) / ($coords_max - $coords_min)) * $bpcd; 
  14387.             if ($patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] < 0) { 
  14388.                 $patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] = 0; 
  14389.             } 
  14390.             if ($patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] > $bpcd) { 
  14391.                 $patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] = $bpcd; 
  14392.             } 
  14393.             $this->gradients[$n]['stream'] .= chr(floor($patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] / 256)); 
  14394.             $this->gradients[$n]['stream'] .= chr(floor($patch_array[$i]['points'][$j] % 256)); 
  14395.         } 
  14396.         $count_cols = count($patch_array[$i]['colors']); 
  14397.         for ($j=0; $j < $count_cols; ++$j) { 
  14398.             //each color component as 8 bit 
  14399.             $this->gradients[$n]['stream'] .= chr($patch_array[$i]['colors'][$j]['r']); 
  14400.             $this->gradients[$n]['stream'] .= chr($patch_array[$i]['colors'][$j]['g']); 
  14401.             $this->gradients[$n]['stream'] .= chr($patch_array[$i]['colors'][$j]['b']); 
  14402.         } 
  14403.     } 
  14404.     //paint the gradient 
  14405.     $this->_out('/Sh'.$n.' sh'); 
  14406.     //restore previous Graphic State 
  14407.     $this->_outRestoreGraphicsState(); 
  14408.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  14409.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  14410.         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['gradients'][$n] = $this->gradients[$n]; 
  14411.     } 
  14412. } 
  14413.  
  14414. /** 
  14415.  * Set a rectangular clipping area. 
  14416.  * @param $x (float) abscissa of the top left corner of the rectangle (or top right corner for RTL mode). 
  14417.  * @param $y (float) ordinate of the top left corner of the rectangle. 
  14418.  * @param $w (float) width of the rectangle. 
  14419.  * @param $h (float) height of the rectangle. 
  14420.  * @author Andreas W\FCrmser, Nicola Asuni 
  14421.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  14422.  * @protected 
  14423.  */ 
  14424. protected function Clip($x, $y, $w, $h) { 
  14425.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  14426.          return; 
  14427.     } 
  14428.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  14429.         $x = $this->w - $x - $w; 
  14430.     } 
  14431.     //save current Graphic State 
  14432.     $s = 'q'; 
  14433.     //set clipping area 
  14434.     $s .= sprintf(' %F %F %F %F re W n', $x*$this->k, ($this->h-$y)*$this->k, $w*$this->k, -$h*$this->k); 
  14435.     //set up transformation matrix for gradient 
  14436.     $s .= sprintf(' %F 0 0 %F %F %F cm', $w*$this->k, $h*$this->k, $x*$this->k, ($this->h-($y+$h))*$this->k); 
  14437.     $this->_out($s); 
  14438. } 
  14439.  
  14440. /** 
  14441.  * Output gradient. 
  14442.  * @param $type (int) type of gradient (1 Function-based shading; 2 Axial shading; 3 Radial shading; 4 Free-form Gouraud-shaded triangle mesh; 5 Lattice-form Gouraud-shaded triangle mesh; 6 Coons patch mesh; 7 Tensor-product patch mesh). (Not all types are currently supported) 
  14443.  * @param $coords (array) array of coordinates. 
  14444.  * @param $stops (array) array gradient color components: color = array of GRAY, RGB or CMYK color components; offset = (0 to 1) represents a location along the gradient vector; exponent = exponent of the exponential interpolation function (default = 1). 
  14445.  * @param $background (array) An array of colour components appropriate to the colour space, specifying a single background colour value. 
  14446.  * @param $antialias (boolean) A flag indicating whether to filter the shading function to prevent aliasing artifacts. 
  14447.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  14448.  * @since 3.1.000 (2008-06-09) 
  14449.  * @public 
  14450.  */ 
  14451. public function Gradient($type, $coords, $stops, $background=array(), $antialias=false) { 
  14452.     if ($this->pdfa_mode OR ($this->state != 2)) { 
  14453.         return; 
  14454.     } 
  14455.     $n = count($this->gradients) + 1; 
  14456.     $this->gradients[$n] = array(); 
  14457.     $this->gradients[$n]['type'] = $type; 
  14458.     $this->gradients[$n]['coords'] = $coords; 
  14459.     $this->gradients[$n]['antialias'] = $antialias; 
  14460.     $this->gradients[$n]['colors'] = array(); 
  14461.     $this->gradients[$n]['transparency'] = false; 
  14462.     // color space 
  14463.     $numcolspace = count($stops[0]['color']); 
  14464.     $bcolor = array_values($background); 
  14465.     switch($numcolspace) { 
  14466.         case 5:   // SPOT 
  14467.         case 4: { // CMYK 
  14468.             $this->gradients[$n]['colspace'] = 'DeviceCMYK'; 
  14469.             if (!empty($background)) { 
  14470.                 $this->gradients[$n]['background'] = sprintf('%F %F %F %F', $bcolor[0]/100, $bcolor[1]/100, $bcolor[2]/100, $bcolor[3]/100); 
  14471.             } 
  14472.             break; 
  14473.         } 
  14474.         case 3: { // RGB 
  14475.             $this->gradients[$n]['colspace'] = 'DeviceRGB'; 
  14476.             if (!empty($background)) { 
  14477.                 $this->gradients[$n]['background'] = sprintf('%F %F %F', $bcolor[0]/255, $bcolor[1]/255, $bcolor[2]/255); 
  14478.             } 
  14479.             break; 
  14480.         } 
  14481.         case 1: { // GRAY SCALE 
  14482.             $this->gradients[$n]['colspace'] = 'DeviceGray'; 
  14483.             if (!empty($background)) { 
  14484.                 $this->gradients[$n]['background'] = sprintf('%F', $bcolor[0]/255); 
  14485.             } 
  14486.             break; 
  14487.         } 
  14488.     } 
  14489.     $num_stops = count($stops); 
  14490.     $last_stop_id = $num_stops - 1; 
  14491.     foreach ($stops as $key => $stop) { 
  14492.         $this->gradients[$n]['colors'][$key] = array(); 
  14493.         // offset represents a location along the gradient vector
