  16235.     if (preg_match_all('/<cssarray>([^\<]*)<\/cssarray>/isU', $html, $matches) > 0) { 
  16236.         if (isset($matches[1][0])) { 
  16237.             $css = array_merge($css, unserialize($this->unhtmlentities($matches[1][0]))); 
  16238.         } 
  16239.         $html = preg_replace('/<cssarray>(.*?)<\/cssarray>/isU', '', $html); 
  16240.     } 
  16241.     // extract external CSS files 
  16242.     $matches = array(); 
  16243.     if (preg_match_all('/<link([^\>]*)>/isU', $html, $matches) > 0) { 
  16244.         foreach ($matches[1] as $key => $link) { 
  16245.             $type = array(); 
  16246.             if (preg_match('/type[\s]*=[\s]*"text\/css"/', $link, $type)) { 
  16247.                 $type = array(); 
  16248.                 preg_match('/media[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $link, $type); 
  16249.                 // get 'all' and 'print' media, other media types are discarded 
  16250.                 // (all, braille, embossed, handheld, print, projection, screen, speech, tty, tv) 
  16251.                 if (empty($type) OR (isset($type[1]) AND (($type[1] == 'all') OR ($type[1] == 'print')))) { 
  16252.                     $type = array(); 
  16253.                     if (preg_match('/href[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $link, $type) > 0) { 
  16254.                         // read CSS data file 
  16255.                         $cssdata = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents(trim($type[1])); 
  16256.                         if (($cssdata !== FALSE) AND (strlen($cssdata) > 0)) { 
  16257.                             $css = array_merge($css, TCPDF_STATIC::extractCSSproperties($cssdata)); 
  16258.                         } 
  16259.                     } 
  16260.                 } 
  16261.             } 
  16262.         } 
  16263.     } 
  16264.     // extract style tags 
  16265.     $matches = array(); 
  16266.     if (preg_match_all('/<style([^\>]*)>([^\<]*)<\/style>/isU', $html, $matches) > 0) { 
  16267.         foreach ($matches[1] as $key => $media) { 
  16268.             $type = array(); 
  16269.             preg_match('/media[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $media, $type); 
  16270.             // get 'all' and 'print' media, other media types are discarded 
  16271.             // (all, braille, embossed, handheld, print, projection, screen, speech, tty, tv) 
  16272.             if (empty($type) OR (isset($type[1]) AND (($type[1] == 'all') OR ($type[1] == 'print')))) { 
  16273.                 $cssdata = $matches[2][$key]; 
  16274.                 $css = array_merge($css, TCPDF_STATIC::extractCSSproperties($cssdata)); 
  16275.             } 
  16276.         } 
  16277.     } 
  16278.     // create a special tag to contain the CSS array (used for table content) 
  16279.     $csstagarray = '<cssarray>'.htmlentities(serialize($css)).'</cssarray>'; 
  16280.     // remove head and style blocks 
  16281.     $html = preg_replace('/<head([^\>]*)>(.*?)<\/head>/siU', '', $html); 
  16282.     $html = preg_replace('/<style([^\>]*)>([^\<]*)<\/style>/isU', '', $html); 
  16283.     // define block tags 
  16284.     $blocktags = array('blockquote', 'br', 'dd', 'dl', 'div', 'dt', 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6', 'hr', 'li', 'ol', 'p', 'pre', 'ul', 'tcpdf', 'table', 'tr', 'td'); 
  16285.     // define self-closing tags 
  16286.     $selfclosingtags = array('area', 'base', 'basefont', 'br', 'hr', 'input', 'img', 'link', 'meta'); 
  16287.     // remove all unsupported tags (the line below lists all supported tags) 
  16288.     $html = strip_tags($html, '<marker/><a><b><blockquote><body><br><br/><dd><del><div><dl><dt><em><font><form><h1><h2><h3><h4><h5><h6><hr><hr/><i><img><input><label><li><ol><option><p><pre><s><select><small><span><strike><strong><sub><sup><table><tablehead><tcpdf><td><textarea><th><thead><tr><tt><u><ul>'); 
  16289.     //replace some blank characters 
  16290.     $html = preg_replace('/<pre/', '<xre', $html); // preserve pre tag 
  16291.     $html = preg_replace('/<(table|tr|td|th|tcpdf|blockquote|dd|div|dl|dt|form|h1|h2|h3|h4|h5|h6|br|hr|li|ol|ul|p)([^\>]*)>[\n\r\t]+/', '<\\1\\2>', $html); 
  16292.     $html = preg_replace('@(\r\n|\r)@', "\n", $html); 
  16293.     $repTable = array("\t" => ' ', "\0" => ' ', "\x0B" => ' ', "\\" => "\\\\"); 
  16294.     $html = strtr($html, $repTable); 
  16295.     $offset = 0; 
  16296.     while (($offset < strlen($html)) AND ($pos = strpos($html, '</pre>', $offset)) !== false) { 
  16297.         $html_a = substr($html, 0, $offset); 
  16298.         $html_b = substr($html, $offset, ($pos - $offset + 6)); 
  16299.         while (preg_match("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</pre>'si", $html_b)) { 
  16300.             // preserve newlines on <pre> tag 
  16301.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</pre>'si", "<xre\\1>\\2<br />\\3</pre>", $html_b); 
  16302.         } 
  16303.         while (preg_match("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)".$this->re_space['p']."(.*?)</pre>'".$this->re_space['m'], $html_b)) { 
  16304.             // preserve spaces on <pre> tag 
  16305.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<xre([^\>]*)>(.*?)".$this->re_space['p']."(.*?)</pre>'".$this->re_space['m'], "<xre\\1>\\2 \\3</pre>", $html_b); 
  16306.         } 
  16307.         $html = $html_a.$html_b.substr($html, $pos + 6); 
  16308.         $offset = strlen($html_a.$html_b); 
  16309.     } 
  16310.     $offset = 0; 
  16311.     while (($offset < strlen($html)) AND ($pos = strpos($html, '</textarea>', $offset)) !== false) { 
  16312.         $html_a = substr($html, 0, $offset); 
  16313.         $html_b = substr($html, $offset, ($pos - $offset + 11)); 
  16314.         while (preg_match("'<textarea([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</textarea>'si", $html_b)) { 
  16315.             // preserve newlines on <textarea> tag 
  16316.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<textarea([^\>]*)>(.*?)\n(.*?)</textarea>'si", "<textarea\\1>\\2<TBR>\\3</textarea>", $html_b); 
  16317.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<textarea([^\>]*)>(.*?)[\"](.*?)</textarea>'si", "<textarea\\1>\\2''\\3</textarea>", $html_b); 
  16318.         } 
  16319.         $html = $html_a.$html_b.substr($html, $pos + 11); 
  16320.         $offset = strlen($html_a.$html_b); 
  16321.     } 
  16322.     $html = preg_replace('/([\s]*)<option/si', '<option', $html); 
  16323.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/option>([\s]*)/si', '</option>', $html); 
  16324.     $offset = 0; 
  16325.     while (($offset < strlen($html)) AND ($pos = strpos($html, '</option>', $offset)) !== false) { 
  16326.         $html_a = substr($html, 0, $offset); 
  16327.         $html_b = substr($html, $offset, ($pos - $offset + 9)); 
  16328.         while (preg_match("'<option([^\>]*)>(.*?)</option>'si", $html_b)) { 
  16329.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<option([\s]+)value=\"([^\"]*)\"([^\>]*)>(.*?)</option>'si", "\\2#!TaB!#\\4#!NwL!#", $html_b); 
  16330.             $html_b = preg_replace("'<option([^\>]*)>(.*?)</option>'si", "\\2#!NwL!#", $html_b); 
  16331.         } 
  16332.         $html = $html_a.$html_b.substr($html, $pos + 9); 
  16333.         $offset = strlen($html_a.$html_b); 
  16334.     } 
  16335.     if (preg_match("'</select'si", $html)) { 
  16336.         $html = preg_replace("'<select([^\>]*)>'si", "<select\\1 opt=\"", $html); 
  16337.         $html = preg_replace("'#!NwL!#</select>'si", "\" />", $html); 
  16338.     } 
  16339.     $html = str_replace("\n", ' ', $html); 
  16340.     // restore textarea newlines 
  16341.     $html = str_replace('<TBR>', "\n", $html); 
  16342.     // remove extra spaces from code 
  16343.     $html = preg_replace('/[\s]+<\/(table|tr|ul|ol|dl)>/', '</\\1>', $html); 
  16344.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+<\/(td|th|li|dt|dd)>/'.$this->re_space['m'], '</\\1>', $html); 
  16345.     $html = preg_replace('/[\s]+<(tr|td|th|li|dt|dd)/', '<\\1', $html); 
  16346.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+<(ul|ol|dl|br)/'.$this->re_space['m'], '<\\1', $html); 
  16347.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/(table|tr|td|th|blockquote|dd|dt|dl|div|dt|h1|h2|h3|h4|h5|h6|hr|li|ol|ul|p)>[\s]+</', '</\\1><', $html); 
  16348.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/(td|th)>/', '<marker style="font-size:0"/></\\1>', $html); 
  16349.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/table>([\s]*)<marker style="font-size:0"\/>/', '</table>', $html); 
  16350.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+<img/'.$this->re_space['m'], chr(32).'<img', $html); 
  16351.     $html = preg_replace('/<img([^\>]*)>[\s]+([^\<])/xi', '<img\\1> \\2', $html); 
  16352.     $html = preg_replace('/<img([^\>]*)>/xi', '<img\\1><span><marker style="font-size:0"/></span>', $html); 
  16353.     $html = preg_replace('/<xre/', '<pre', $html); // restore pre tag 
  16354.     $html = preg_replace('/<textarea([^\>]*)>([^\<]*)<\/textarea>/xi', '<textarea\\1 value="\\2" />', $html); 
  16355.     $html = preg_replace('/<li([^\>]*)><\/li>/', '<li\\1> </li>', $html); 
  16356.     $html = preg_replace('/<li([^\>]*)>'.$this->re_space['p'].'*<img/'.$this->re_space['m'], '<li\\1><font size="1"> </font><img', $html); 
  16357.     $html = preg_replace('/<([^\>\/]*)>[\s]/', '<\\1> ', $html); // preserve some spaces 
  16358.     $html = preg_replace('/[\s]<\/([^\>]*)>/', ' </\\1>', $html); // preserve some spaces 
  16359.     $html = preg_replace('/<su([bp])/', '<zws/><su\\1', $html); // fix sub/sup alignment 
  16360.     $html = preg_replace('/<\/su([bp])>/', '</su\\1><zws/>', $html); // fix sub/sup alignment 
  16361.     $html = preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+/'.$this->re_space['m'], chr(32), $html); // replace multiple spaces with a single space 
  16362.     // trim string 
  16363.     $html = $this->stringTrim($html); 
  16364.     // fix br tag after li 
  16365.     $html = preg_replace('/<li><br([^\>]*)>/', '<li> <br\\1>', $html); 
  16366.     // fix first image tag alignment 
  16367.     $html = preg_replace('/^<img/', '<span style="font-size:0"><br /></span> <img', $html, 1); 
  16368.     // pattern for generic tag 
  16369.     $tagpattern = '/(<[^>]+>)/'; 
  16370.     // explodes the string 
  16371.     $a = preg_split($tagpattern, $html, -1, PREG_SPLIT_DELIM_CAPTURE | PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY); 
  16372.     // count elements 
  16373.     $maxel = count($a); 
  16374.     $elkey = 0; 
  16375.     $key = 0; 
  16376.     // create an array of elements 
  16377.     $dom = array(); 
  16378.     $dom[$key] = array(); 
  16379.     // set inheritable properties fot the first void element 
  16380.     // possible inheritable properties are: azimuth, border-collapse, border-spacing, caption-side, color, cursor, direction, empty-cells, font, font-family, font-stretch, font-size, font-size-adjust, font-style, font-variant, font-weight, letter-spacing, line-height, list-style, list-style-image, list-style-position, list-style-type, orphans, page, page-break-inside, quotes, speak, speak-header, text-align, text-indent, text-transform, volume, white-space, widows, word-spacing 
  16381.     $dom[$key]['tag'] = false; 
  16382.     $dom[$key]['block'] = false; 
  16383.     $dom[$key]['value'] = ''; 
  16384.     $dom[$key]['parent'] = 0; 
  16385.     $dom[$key]['hide'] = false; 
  16386.     $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $this->FontFamily; 
  16387.     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $this->FontStyle; 
  16388.     $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $this->FontSizePt; 
  16389.     $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $this->font_stretching; 
  16390.     $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $this->font_spacing; 
  16391.     $dom[$key]['stroke'] = $this->textstrokewidth; 
  16392.     $dom[$key]['fill'] = (($this->textrendermode % 2) == 0); 
  16393.     $dom[$key]['clip'] = ($this->textrendermode > 3); 
  16394.     $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $this->cell_height_ratio; 
  16395.     $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = false; 
  16396.     $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $this->fgcolor; // color 
  16397.     $dom[$key]['strokecolor'] = $this->strokecolor; 
  16398.     $dom[$key]['align'] = ''; 
  16399.     $dom[$key]['listtype'] = ''; 
  16400.     $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = 0; 
  16401.     $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = ''; 
  16402.     $dom[$key]['border'] = array(); 
  16403.     $dom[$key]['dir'] = $this->rtl?'rtl':'ltr'; 
  16404.     $thead = false; // true when we are inside the THEAD tag 
  16405.     ++$key; 
  16406.     $level = array(); 
  16407.     array_push($level, 0); // root 
  16408.     while ($elkey < $maxel) { 
  16409.         $dom[$key] = array(); 
  16410.         $element = $a[$elkey]; 
  16411.         $dom[$key]['elkey'] = $elkey; 
  16412.         if (preg_match($tagpattern, $element)) { 
  16413.             // html tag 
  16414.             $element = substr($element, 1, -1); 
  16415.             // get tag name 
  16416.             preg_match('/[\/]?([a-zA-Z0-9]*)/', $element, $tag); 
  16417.             $tagname = strtolower($tag[1]); 
  16418.             // check if we are inside a table header 
  16419.             if ($tagname == 'thead') { 
  16420.                 if ($element[0] == '/') { 
  16421.                     $thead = false; 
  16422.                 } else { 
  16423.                     $thead = true; 
  16424.                 } 
  16425.                 ++$elkey; 
  16426.                 continue; 
  16427.             } 
  16428.             $dom[$key]['tag'] = true; 
  16429.             $dom[$key]['value'] = $tagname; 
  16430.             if (in_array($dom[$key]['value'], $blocktags)) { 
  16431.                 $dom[$key]['block'] = true; 
  16432.             } else { 
  16433.                 $dom[$key]['block'] = false; 
  16434.             } 
  16435.             if ($element[0] == '/') { 
  16436.                 // *** closing html tag 
  16437.                 $dom[$key]['opening'] = false; 
  16438.                 $dom[$key]['parent'] = end($level); 
  16439.                 array_pop($level); 
  16440.                 $dom[$key]['hide'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['hide']; 
  16441.                 $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fontname']; 
  16442.                 $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fontstyle']; 
  16443.                 $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fontsize']; 
  16444.                 $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['font-stretch']; 
  16445.                 $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['letter-spacing']; 
  16446.                 $dom[$key]['stroke'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['stroke']; 
  16447.                 $dom[$key]['fill'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fill']; 
  16448.                 $dom[$key]['clip'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['clip']; 
  16449.                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['line-height']; 
  16450.                 $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['bgcolor']; 
  16451.                 $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['fgcolor']; 
  16452.                 $dom[$key]['strokecolor'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['strokecolor']; 
  16453.                 $dom[$key]['align'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['align']; 
  16454.                 $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['text-transform']; 
  16455.                 $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['dir']; 
  16456.                 if (isset($dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['listtype'])) { 
  16457.                     $dom[$key]['listtype'] = $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['listtype']; 
  16458.                 } 
  16459.                 // set the number of columns in table tag 
  16460.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND (!isset($dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['cols']))) { 
  16461.                     $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['cols'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['cols']; 
  16462.                 } 
  16463.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'td') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'th')) { 
  16464.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = $csstagarray; 
  16465.                     for ($i = ($dom[$key]['parent'] + 1); $i < $key; ++$i) { 
  16466.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] .= $a[$dom[$i]['elkey']]; 
  16467.                     } 
  16468.                     $key = $i; 
  16469.                     // mark nested tables 
  16470.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = str_replace('<table', '<table nested="true"', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content']); 
  16471.                     // remove thead sections from nested tables 
  16472.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = str_replace('<thead>', '', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content']); 
  16473.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content'] = str_replace('</thead>', '', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['content']); 
  16474.                 } 
  16475.                 // store header rows on a new table 
  16476.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead'] === true)) { 
  16477.                     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['thead'])) { 
  16478.                         $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['thead'] = $csstagarray.$a[$dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['elkey']]; 
  16479.                     } 
  16480.                     for ($i = $dom[$key]['parent']; $i <= $key; ++$i) { 
  16481.                         $dom[($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent'])]['thead'] .= $a[$dom[$i]['elkey']]; 
  16482.                     } 
  16483.                     if (!isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute'])) { 
  16484.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute'] = array(); 
  16485.                     } 
  16486.                     // header elements must be always contained in a single page 
  16487.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr'] = 'true'; 
  16488.                 } 
  16489.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table') AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead']))) { 
  16490.                     // remove the nobr attributes from the table header 
  16491.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead'] = str_replace(' nobr="true"', '', $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead']); 
  16492.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['thead'] .= '</tablehead>'; 
  16493.                 } 
  16494.             } else { 
  16495.                 // *** opening or self-closing html tag 
  16496.                 $dom[$key]['opening'] = true; 
  16497.                 $dom[$key]['parent'] = end($level); 
  16498.                 if ((substr($element, -1, 1) == '/') OR (in_array($dom[$key]['value'], $selfclosingtags))) { 
  16499.                     // self-closing tag 
  16500.                     $dom[$key]['self'] = true; 
  16501.                 } else { 
  16502.                     // opening tag 
  16503.                     array_push($level, $key); 
  16504.                     $dom[$key]['self'] = false; 
  16505.                 } 
  16506.                 // copy some values from parent 
  16507.                 $parentkey = 0; 
  16508.                 if ($key > 0) { 
  16509.                     $parentkey = $dom[$key]['parent']; 
  16510.                     $dom[$key]['hide'] = $dom[$parentkey]['hide']; 
  16511.                     $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fontname']; 
  16512.                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fontstyle']; 
  16513.                     $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fontsize']; 
  16514.                     $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $dom[$parentkey]['font-stretch']; 
  16515.                     $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $dom[$parentkey]['letter-spacing']; 
  16516.                     $dom[$key]['stroke'] = $dom[$parentkey]['stroke']; 
  16517.                     $dom[$key]['fill'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fill']; 
  16518.                     $dom[$key]['clip'] = $dom[$parentkey]['clip']; 
  16519.                     $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[$parentkey]['line-height']; 
  16520.                     $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = $dom[$parentkey]['bgcolor']; 
  16521.                     $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $dom[$parentkey]['fgcolor']; 
  16522.                     $dom[$key]['strokecolor'] = $dom[$parentkey]['strokecolor']; 
  16523.                     $dom[$key]['align'] = $dom[$parentkey]['align']; 
  16524.                     $dom[$key]['listtype'] = $dom[$parentkey]['listtype']; 
  16525.                     $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = $dom[$parentkey]['text-indent']; 
  16526.                     $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = $dom[$parentkey]['text-transform']; 
  16527.                     $dom[$key]['border'] = array(); 
  16528.                     $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[$parentkey]['dir']; 
  16529.                 } 
  16530.                 // get attributes 
  16531.                 preg_match_all('/([^=\s]*)[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/', $element, $attr_array, PREG_PATTERN_ORDER); 
  16532.                 $dom[$key]['attribute'] = array(); // reset attribute array 
  16533.                 while (list($id, $name) = each($attr_array[1])) { 
  16534.                     $dom[$key]['attribute'][strtolower($name)] = $attr_array[2][$id]; 
  16535.                 } 
  16536.                 if (!empty($css)) { 
  16537.                     // merge CSS style to current style 
  16538.                     list($dom[$key]['csssel'], $dom[$key]['cssdata']) = TCPDF_STATIC::getCSSdataArray($dom, $key, $css); 
  16539.                     $dom[$key]['attribute']['style'] = TCPDF_STATIC::getTagStyleFromCSSarray($dom[$key]['cssdata']); 
  16540.                 } 
  16541.                 // split style attributes 
  16542.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['style']) AND !empty($dom[$key]['attribute']['style'])) { 
  16543.                     // get style attributes 
  16544.                     preg_match_all('/([^;:\s]*):([^;]*)/', $dom[$key]['attribute']['style'], $style_array, PREG_PATTERN_ORDER); 
  16545.                     $dom[$key]['style'] = array(); // reset style attribute array 
  16546.                     while (list($id, $name) = each($style_array[1])) { 
  16547.                         // in case of duplicate attribute the last replace the previous 
  16548.                         $dom[$key]['style'][strtolower($name)] = trim($style_array[2][$id]); 
  16549.                     } 
  16550.                     // --- get some style attributes --- 
  16551.                     // text direction 
  16552.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['direction'])) { 
  16553.                         $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[$key]['style']['direction']; 
  16554.                     } 
  16555.                     // display 
  16556.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['display'])) { 
  16557.                         $dom[$key]['hide'] = (trim(strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['display'])) == 'none'); 
  16558.                     } 
  16559.                     // font family 
  16560.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-family'])) { 
  16561.                         $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $this->getFontFamilyName($dom[$key]['style']['font-family']); 
  16562.                     } 
  16563.                     // list-style-type 
  16564.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['list-style-type'])) { 
  16565.                         $dom[$key]['listtype'] = trim(strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['list-style-type'])); 
  16566.                         if ($dom[$key]['listtype'] == 'inherit') { 
  16567.                             $dom[$key]['listtype'] = $dom[$parentkey]['listtype']; 
  16568.                         } 
  16569.                     } 
  16570.                     // text-indent 
  16571.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-indent'])) { 
  16572.                         $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['style']['text-indent']); 
  16573.                         if ($dom[$key]['text-indent'] == 'inherit') { 
  16574.                             $dom[$key]['text-indent'] = $dom[$parentkey]['text-indent']; 
  16575.                         } 
  16576.                     } 
  16577.                     // text-transform 
  16578.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-transform'])) { 
  16579.                         $dom[$key]['text-transform'] = $dom[$key]['style']['text-transform']; 
  16580.                     } 
  16581.                     // font size 
  16582.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-size'])) { 
  16583.                         $fsize = trim($dom[$key]['style']['font-size']); 
  16584.                         $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $this->getHTMLFontUnits($fsize, $dom[0]['fontsize'], $dom[$parentkey]['fontsize'], 'pt'); 
  16585.                     } 
  16586.                     // font-stretch 
  16587.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-stretch'])) { 
  16588.                         $dom[$key]['font-stretch'] = $this->getCSSFontStretching($dom[$key]['style']['font-stretch'], $dom[$parentkey]['font-stretch']); 
  16589.                     } 
  16590.                     // letter-spacing 
  16591.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['letter-spacing'])) { 
  16592.                         $dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] = $this->getCSSFontSpacing($dom[$key]['style']['letter-spacing'], $dom[$parentkey]['letter-spacing']); 
  16593.                     } 
  16594.                     // line-height (internally is the cell height ratio) 
  16595.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['line-height'])) { 
  16596.                         $lineheight = trim($dom[$key]['style']['line-height']); 
  16597.                         switch ($lineheight) { 
  16598.                             // A normal line height. This is default 
  16599.                             case 'normal': { 
  16600.                                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[0]['line-height']; 
  16601.                                 break; 
  16602.                             } 
  16603.                             case 'inherit': { 
  16604.                                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $dom[$parentkey]['line-height']; 
  16605.                             } 
  16606.                             default: { 
  16607.                                 if (is_numeric($lineheight)) { 
  16608.                                     // convert to percentage of font height 
  16609.                                     $lineheight = ($lineheight * 100).'%'; 
  16610.                                 } 
  16611.                                 $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($lineheight, 1, '%', true); 
  16612.                                 if (substr($lineheight, -1) !== '%') { 
  16613.                                     $dom[$key]['line-height'] = (($dom[$key]['line-height'] - $this->cell_padding['T'] - $this->cell_padding['B']) / $dom[$key]['fontsize']); 
  16614.                                 } 
  16615.                             } 
  16616.                         } 
  16617.                     } 
  16618.                     // font style 
  16619.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-weight'])) { 
  16620.                         if (strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['font-weight'][0]) == 'n') { 
  16621.                             if (strpos($dom[$key]['fontstyle'], 'B') !== false) { 
  16622.                                 $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = str_replace('B', '', $dom[$key]['fontstyle']); 
  16623.                             } 
  16624.                         } elseif (strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['font-weight'][0]) == 'b') { 
  16625.                             $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'B'; 
  16626.                         } 
  16627.                     } 
  16628.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-style']) AND (strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['font-style'][0]) == 'i')) { 
  16629.                         $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'I'; 
  16630.                     } 
  16631.                     // font color 
  16632.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['color']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['style']['color']))) { 
  16633.                         $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['style']['color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16634.                     } elseif ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'a') { 
  16635.                         $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $this->htmlLinkColorArray; 
  16636.                     } 
  16637.                     // background color 
  16638.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['background-color']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['style']['background-color']))) { 
  16639.                         $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['style']['background-color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16640.                     } 
  16641.                     // text-decoration 
  16642.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-decoration'])) { 
  16643.                         $decors = explode(' ', strtolower($dom[$key]['style']['text-decoration'])); 
  16644.                         foreach ($decors as $dec) { 
  16645.                             $dec = trim($dec); 
  16646.                             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dec)) { 
  16647.                                 if ($dec[0] == 'u') { 
  16648.                                     // underline 
  16649.                                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'U'; 
  16650.                                 } elseif ($dec[0] == 'l') { 
  16651.                                     // line-through 
  16652.                                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'D'; 
  16653.                                 } elseif ($dec[0] == 'o') { 
  16654.                                     // overline 
  16655.                                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'O'; 
  16656.                                 } 
  16657.                             } 
  16658.                         } 
  16659.                     } elseif ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'a') { 
  16660.                         $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $this->htmlLinkFontStyle; 
  16661.                     } 
  16662.                     // check for width attribute 
  16663.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['width'])) { 
  16664.                         $dom[$key]['width'] = $dom[$key]['style']['width']; 
  16665.                     } 
  16666.                     // check for height attribute 
  16667.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['height'])) { 
  16668.                         $dom[$key]['height'] = $dom[$key]['style']['height']; 
  16669.                     } 
  16670.                     // check for text alignment 
  16671.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-align'])) { 
  16672.                         $dom[$key]['align'] = strtoupper($dom[$key]['style']['text-align'][0]); 
  16673.                     } 
  16674.                     // check for CSS border properties 
  16675.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border'])) { 
  16676.                         $borderstyle = $this->getCSSBorderStyle($dom[$key]['style']['border']); 
  16677.                         if (!empty($borderstyle)) { 
  16678.                             $dom[$key]['border']['LTRB'] = $borderstyle; 
  16679.                         } 
  16680.                     } 
  16681.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-color'])) { 
  16682.                         $brd_colors = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($dom[$key]['style']['border-color'])); 
  16683.                         if (isset($brd_colors[3])) { 
  16684.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[3], $this->spot_colors); 
  16685.                         } 
  16686.                         if (isset($brd_colors[1])) { 
  16687.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[1], $this->spot_colors); 
  16688.                         } 
  16689.                         if (isset($brd_colors[0])) { 
  16690.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[0], $this->spot_colors); 
  16691.                         } 
  16692.                         if (isset($brd_colors[2])) { 
  16693.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($brd_colors[2], $this->spot_colors); 
  16694.                         } 
  16695.                     } 
  16696.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-width'])) { 
  16697.                         $brd_widths = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($dom[$key]['style']['border-width'])); 
  16698.                         if (isset($brd_widths[3])) { 
  16699.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[3]); 
  16700.                         } 
  16701.                         if (isset($brd_widths[1])) { 
  16702.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[1]); 
  16703.                         } 
  16704.                         if (isset($brd_widths[0])) { 
  16705.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[0]); 
  16706.                         } 
  16707.                         if (isset($brd_widths[2])) { 
  16708.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($brd_widths[2]); 
  16709.                         } 
  16710.                     } 
  16711.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-style'])) { 
  16712.                         $brd_styles = preg_split('/[\s]+/', trim($dom[$key]['style']['border-style'])); 
  16713.                         if (isset($brd_styles[3]) AND ($brd_styles[3]!='none')) { 
  16714.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16715.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16716.                             $dom[$key]['border']['L']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[3]); 
  16717.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['L']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16718.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['L'] = array(); 
  16719.                             } 
  16720.                         } 
  16721.                         if (isset($brd_styles[1])) { 
  16722.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16723.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16724.                             $dom[$key]['border']['R']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[1]); 
  16725.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['R']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16726.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['R'] = array(); 
  16727.                             } 
  16728.                         } 
  16729.                         if (isset($brd_styles[0])) { 
  16730.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16731.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16732.                             $dom[$key]['border']['T']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[0]); 
  16733.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['T']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16734.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['T'] = array(); 
  16735.                             } 
  16736.                         } 
  16737.                         if (isset($brd_styles[2])) { 
  16738.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['cap'] = 'square'; 
  16739.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['join'] = 'miter'; 
  16740.                             $dom[$key]['border']['B']['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($brd_styles[2]); 
  16741.                             if ($dom[$key]['border']['B']['dash'] < 0) { 
  16742.                                 $dom[$key]['border']['B'] = array(); 
  16743.                             } 
  16744.                         } 
  16745.                     } 
  16746.                     $cellside = array('L' => 'left', 'R' => 'right', 'T' => 'top', 'B' => 'bottom'); 
  16747.                     foreach ($cellside as $bsk => $bsv) { 
  16748.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv])) { 
  16749.                             $borderstyle = $this->getCSSBorderStyle($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv]); 
  16750.                             if (!empty($borderstyle)) { 
  16751.                                 $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk] = $borderstyle; 
  16752.                             } 
  16753.                         } 
  16754.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-color'])) { 
  16755.                             $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['color'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16756.                         } 
  16757.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-width'])) { 
  16758.                             $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['width'] = $this->getCSSBorderWidth($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-width']); 
  16759.                         } 
  16760.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-style'])) { 
  16761.                             $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['dash'] = $this->getCSSBorderDashStyle($dom[$key]['style']['border-'.$bsv.'-style']); 
  16762.                             if ($dom[$key]['border'][$bsk]['dash'] < 0) { 
  16763.                                 $dom[$key]['border'][$bsk] = array(); 
  16764.                             } 
  16765.                         } 
  16766.                     } 
  16767.                     // check for CSS padding properties 
  16768.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['padding'])) { 
  16769.                         $dom[$key]['padding'] = $this->getCSSPadding($dom[$key]['style']['padding']); 
  16770.                     } else { 
  16771.                         $dom[$key]['padding'] = $this->cell_padding; 
  16772.                     } 
  16773.                     foreach ($cellside as $psk => $psv) { 
  16774.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['padding-'.$psv])) { 
  16775.                             $dom[$key]['padding'][$psk] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['style']['padding-'.$psv], 0, 'px', false); 
  16776.                         } 
  16777.                     } 
  16778.                     // check for CSS margin properties 
  16779.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['margin'])) { 
  16780.                         $dom[$key]['margin'] = $this->getCSSMargin($dom[$key]['style']['margin']); 
  16781.                     } else { 
  16782.                         $dom[$key]['margin'] = $this->cell_margin; 
  16783.                     } 
  16784.                     foreach ($cellside as $psk => $psv) { 
  16785.                         if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['margin-'.$psv])) { 
  16786.                             $dom[$key]['margin'][$psk] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits(str_replace('auto', '0', $dom[$key]['style']['margin-'.$psv]), 0, 'px', false); 
  16787.                         } 
  16788.                     } 
  16789.                     // check for CSS border-spacing properties 
  16790.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['border-spacing'])) { 
  16791.                         $dom[$key]['border-spacing'] = $this->getCSSBorderMargin($dom[$key]['style']['border-spacing']); 
  16792.                     } 
  16793.                     // page-break-inside 
  16794.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-inside']) AND ($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-inside'] == 'avoid')) { 
  16795.                         $dom[$key]['attribute']['nobr'] = 'true'; 
  16796.                     } 
  16797.                     // page-break-before 
  16798.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-before'])) { 
  16799.                         if ($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-before'] == 'always') { 
  16800.                             $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] = 'true'; 
  16801.                         } elseif ($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-before'] == 'left') { 
  16802.                             $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] = 'left'; 
  16803.                         } elseif ($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-before'] == 'right') { 
  16804.                             $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] = 'right'; 
  16805.                         } 
  16806.                     } 
  16807.                     // page-break-after 
  16808.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-after'])) { 
  16809.                         if ($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-after'] == 'always') { 
  16810.                             $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreakafter'] = 'true'; 
  16811.                         } elseif ($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-after'] == 'left') { 
  16812.                             $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreakafter'] = 'left'; 
  16813.                         } elseif ($dom[$key]['style']['page-break-after'] == 'right') { 
  16814.                             $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreakafter'] = 'right'; 
  16815.                         } 
  16816.                     } 
  16817.                 } 
  16818.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['display'])) { 
  16819.                     $dom[$key]['hide'] = (trim(strtolower($dom[$key]['attribute']['display'])) == 'none'); 
  16820.                 } 
  16821.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['border']) AND ($dom[$key]['attribute']['border'] != 0)) { 
  16822.                     $borderstyle = $this->getCSSBorderStyle($dom[$key]['attribute']['border'].' solid black'); 
  16823.                     if (!empty($borderstyle)) { 
  16824.                         $dom[$key]['border']['LTRB'] = $borderstyle; 
  16825.                     } 
  16826.                 } 
  16827.                 // check for font tag 
  16828.                 if ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'font') { 
  16829.                     // font family 
  16830.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['face'])) { 
  16831.                         $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $this->getFontFamilyName($dom[$key]['attribute']['face']); 
  16832.                     } 
  16833.                     // font size 
  16834.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['size'])) { 
  16835.                         if ($key > 0) { 
  16836.                             if ($dom[$key]['attribute']['size'][0] == '+') { 
  16837.                                 $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontsize'] + intval(substr($dom[$key]['attribute']['size'], 1)); 
  16838.                             } elseif ($dom[$key]['attribute']['size'][0] == '-') { 
  16839.                                 $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontsize'] - intval(substr($dom[$key]['attribute']['size'], 1)); 
  16840.                             } else { 
  16841.                                 $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = intval($dom[$key]['attribute']['size']); 
  16842.                             } 
  16843.                         } else { 
  16844.                             $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = intval($dom[$key]['attribute']['size']); 
  16845.                         } 
  16846.                     } 
  16847.                 } 
  16848.                 // force natural alignment for lists 
  16849.                 if ((($dom[$key]['value'] == 'ul') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'ol') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'dl')) 
  16850.                     AND (!isset($dom[$key]['align']) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['align']) OR ($dom[$key]['align'] != 'J'))) { 
  16851.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  16852.                         $dom[$key]['align'] = 'R'; 
  16853.                     } else { 
  16854.                         $dom[$key]['align'] = 'L'; 
  16855.                     } 
  16856.                 } 
  16857.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'small') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'sup') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'sub')) { 
  16858.                     if (!isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['size']) AND !isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-size'])) { 
  16859.                         $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[$key]['fontsize'] * K_SMALL_RATIO; 
  16860.                     } 
  16861.                 } 
  16862.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'strong') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'b')) { 
  16863.                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'B'; 
  16864.                 } 
  16865.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'em') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'i')) { 
  16866.                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'I'; 
  16867.                 } 
  16868.                 if ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'u') { 
  16869.                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'U'; 
  16870.                 } 
  16871.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'del') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 's') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'strike')) { 
  16872.                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'D'; 
  16873.                 } 
  16874.                 if (!isset($dom[$key]['style']['text-decoration']) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'a')) { 
  16875.                     $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] = $this->htmlLinkFontStyle; 
  16876.                 } 
  16877.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'pre') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tt')) { 
  16878.                     $dom[$key]['fontname'] = $this->default_monospaced_font; 
  16879.                 } 
  16880.                 if (!empty($dom[$key]['value']) AND ($dom[$key]['value'][0] == 'h') AND (intval($dom[$key]['value']{1}) > 0) AND (intval($dom[$key]['value']{1}) < 7)) { 
  16881.                     // headings h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 
  16882.                     if (!isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['size']) AND !isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-size'])) { 
  16883.                         $headsize = (4 - intval($dom[$key]['value']{1})) * 2; 
  16884.                         $dom[$key]['fontsize'] = $dom[0]['fontsize'] + $headsize; 
  16885.                     } 
  16886.                     if (!isset($dom[$key]['style']['font-weight'])) { 
  16887.                         $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] .= 'B'; 
  16888.                     } 
  16889.                 } 
  16890.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table')) { 
  16891.                     $dom[$key]['rows'] = 0; // number of rows 
  16892.                     $dom[$key]['trids'] = array(); // IDs of TR elements 
  16893.                     $dom[$key]['thead'] = ''; // table header rows 
  16894.                 } 
  16895.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr')) { 
  16896.                     $dom[$key]['cols'] = 0; 
  16897.                     if ($thead) { 
  16898.                         $dom[$key]['thead'] = true; 
  16899.                         // rows on thead block are printed as a separate table 
  16900.                     } else { 
  16901.                         $dom[$key]['thead'] = false; 
  16902.                         // store the number of rows on table element 
  16903.                         ++$dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rows']; 
  16904.                         // store the TR elements IDs on table element 
  16905.                         array_push($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['trids'], $key); 
  16906.                     } 
  16907.                 } 
  16908.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'th') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'td')) { 
  16909.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['colspan'])) { 
  16910.                         $colspan = intval($dom[$key]['attribute']['colspan']); 
  16911.                     } else { 
  16912.                         $colspan = 1; 
  16913.                     } 
  16914.                     $dom[$key]['attribute']['colspan'] = $colspan; 
  16915.                     $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['cols'] += $colspan; 
  16916.                 } 
  16917.                 // text direction 
  16918.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['dir'])) { 
  16919.                     $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[$key]['attribute']['dir']; 
  16920.                 } 
  16921.                 // set foreground color attribute 
  16922.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['color']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['attribute']['color']))) { 
  16923.                     $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['attribute']['color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16924.                 } elseif (!isset($dom[$key]['style']['color']) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'a')) { 
  16925.                     $dom[$key]['fgcolor'] = $this->htmlLinkColorArray; 
  16926.                 } 
  16927.                 // set background color attribute 
  16928.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['bgcolor']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['attribute']['bgcolor']))) { 
  16929.                     $dom[$key]['bgcolor'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['attribute']['bgcolor'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16930.                 } 
  16931.                 // set stroke color attribute 
  16932.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['strokecolor']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['attribute']['strokecolor']))) { 
  16933.                     $dom[$key]['strokecolor'] = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($dom[$key]['attribute']['strokecolor'], $this->spot_colors); 
  16934.                 } 
  16935.                 // check for width attribute 
  16936.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['width'])) { 
  16937.                     $dom[$key]['width'] = $dom[$key]['attribute']['width']; 
  16938.                 } 
  16939.                 // check for height attribute 
  16940.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['height'])) { 
  16941.                     $dom[$key]['height'] = $dom[$key]['attribute']['height']; 
  16942.                 } 
  16943.                 // check for text alignment 
  16944.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['align']) AND (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['attribute']['align'])) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] !== 'img')) { 
  16945.                     $dom[$key]['align'] = strtoupper($dom[$key]['attribute']['align'][0]); 
  16946.                 } 
  16947.                 // check for text rendering mode (the following attributes do not exist in HTML) 
  16948.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['stroke'])) { 
  16949.                     // font stroke width 
  16950.                     $dom[$key]['stroke'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['attribute']['stroke'], $dom[$key]['fontsize'], 'pt', true); 
  16951.                 } 
  16952.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['fill'])) { 
  16953.                     // font fill 
  16954.                     if ($dom[$key]['attribute']['fill'] == 'true') { 
  16955.                         $dom[$key]['fill'] = true; 
  16956.                     } else { 
  16957.                         $dom[$key]['fill'] = false; 
  16958.                     } 
  16959.                 } 
  16960.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['clip'])) { 
  16961.                     // clipping mode 
  16962.                     if ($dom[$key]['attribute']['clip'] == 'true') { 
  16963.                         $dom[$key]['clip'] = true; 
  16964.                     } else { 
  16965.                         $dom[$key]['clip'] = false; 
  16966.                     } 
  16967.                 } 
  16968.             } // end opening tag 
  16969.         } else { 
  16970.             // text 
  16971.             $dom[$key]['tag'] = false; 
  16972.             $dom[$key]['block'] = false; 
  16973.             $dom[$key]['parent'] = end($level); 
  16974.             $dom[$key]['dir'] = $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['dir']; 
  16975.             if (!empty($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['text-transform'])) { 
  16976.                 // text-transform for unicode requires mb_convert_case (Multibyte String Functions) 
  16977.                 if (function_exists('mb_convert_case')) { 
  16978.                     $ttm = array('capitalize' => MB_CASE_TITLE, 'uppercase' => MB_CASE_UPPER, 'lowercase' => MB_CASE_LOWER); 
  16979.                     if (isset($ttm[$dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['text-transform']])) { 
  16980.                         $element = mb_convert_case($element, $ttm[$dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['text-transform']], $this->encoding); 
  16981.                     } 
  16982.                 } elseif (!$this->isunicode) { 
  16983.                     switch ($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['text-transform']) { 
  16984.                         case 'capitalize': { 
  16985.                             $element = ucwords(strtolower($element)); 
  16986.                             break; 
  16987.                         } 
  16988.                         case 'uppercase': { 
  16989.                             $element = strtoupper($element); 
  16990.                             break; 
  16991.                         } 
  16992.                         case 'lowercase': { 
  16993.                             $element = strtolower($element); 
  16994.                             break; 
  16995.                         } 
  16996.                     } 
  16997.                 } 
  16998.             } 
  16999.             $dom[$key]['value'] = stripslashes($this->unhtmlentities($element)); 
  17000.         } 
  17001.         ++$elkey; 
  17002.         ++$key; 
  17003.     } 
  17004.     return $dom; 
  17005. } 
  17006.  
  17007. /** 
  17008.  * Returns the string used to find spaces 
  17009.  * @return string 
  17010.  * @protected 
  17011.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  17012.  * @since 4.8.024 (2010-01-15) 
  17013.  */ 
  17014. protected function getSpaceString() { 
  17015.     $spacestr = chr(32); 
  17016.     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  17017.         $spacestr = chr(0).chr(32); 
  17018.     } 
  17019.     return $spacestr; 
  17020. } 
  17021.  
  17022. /** 
  17023.  * Serialize an array of parameters to be used with TCPDF tag in HTML code. 
  17024.  * @param $pararray (array) parameters array 
  17025.  * @return sting containing serialized data 
  17026.  * @since 4.9.006 (2010-04-02) 
  17027.  * @public 
  17028.  * @deprecated 
  17029.  */ 
  17030. public function serializeTCPDFtagParameters($pararray) { 
  17031.     return TCPDF_STATIC::serializeTCPDFtagParameters($pararray); 
  17032. } 
  17033.  
  17034. /** 
  17035.  * Prints a cell (rectangular area) with optional borders, background color and html text string. 
  17036.  * The upper-left corner of the cell corresponds to the current position. After the call, the current position moves to the right or to the next line.<br /> 
  17037.  * If automatic page breaking is enabled and the cell goes beyond the limit, a page break is done before outputting. 
  17038.  * IMPORTANT: The HTML must be well formatted - try to clean-up it using an application like HTML-Tidy before submitting. 
  17039.  * Supported tags are: a, b, blockquote, br, dd, del, div, dl, dt, em, font, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, hr, i, img, li, ol, p, pre, small, span, strong, sub, sup, table, tcpdf, td, th, thead, tr, tt, u, ul 
  17040.  * NOTE: all the HTML attributes must be enclosed in double-quote. 
  17041.  * @param $w (float) Cell width. If 0, the cell extends up to the right margin. 
  17042.  * @param $h (float) Cell minimum height. The cell extends automatically if needed. 
  17043.  * @param $x (float) upper-left corner X coordinate 
  17044.  * @param $y (float) upper-left corner Y coordinate 
  17045.  * @param $html (string) html text to print. Default value: empty string. 
  17046.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  17047.  * @param $ln (int) Indicates where the current position should go after the call. Possible values are:<ul><li>0: to the right (or left for RTL language)</li><li>1: to the beginning of the next line</li><li>2: below</li></ul> 
  17048. Putting 1 is equivalent to putting 0 and calling Ln() just after. Default value: 0. 
  17049.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the cell background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  17050.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default true). 
  17051.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  17052.  * @param $autopadding (boolean) if true, uses internal padding and automatically adjust it to account for line width. 
  17053.  * @see Multicell(), writeHTML() 
  17054.  * @public 
  17055.  */ 
  17056. public function writeHTMLCell($w, $h, $x, $y, $html='', $border=0, $ln=0, $fill=false, $reseth=true, $align='', $autopadding=true) { 
  17057.     return $this->MultiCell($w, $h, $html, $border, $align, $fill, $ln, $x, $y, $reseth, 0, true, $autopadding, 0, 'T', false); 
  17058. } 
  17059.  
  17060. /** 
  17061.  * Allows to preserve some HTML formatting (limited support).<br /> 
  17062.  * IMPORTANT: The HTML must be well formatted - try to clean-up it using an application like HTML-Tidy before submitting. 
  17063.  * Supported tags are: a, b, blockquote, br, dd, del, div, dl, dt, em, font, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, hr, i, img, li, ol, p, pre, small, span, strong, sub, sup, table, tcpdf, td, th, thead, tr, tt, u, ul 
  17064.  * NOTE: all the HTML attributes must be enclosed in double-quote. 
  17065.  * @param $html (string) text to display 
  17066.  * @param $ln (boolean) if true add a new line after text (default = true) 
  17067.  * @param $fill (boolean) Indicates if the background must be painted (true) or transparent (false). 
  17068.  * @param $reseth (boolean) if true reset the last cell height (default false). 
  17069.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the current left (or right for RTL) padding to each Write (default false). 
  17070.  * @param $align (string) Allows to center or align the text. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  17071.  * @public 
  17072.  */ 
  17073. public function writeHTML($html, $ln=true, $fill=false, $reseth=false, $cell=false, $align='') { 
  17074.     $gvars = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  17075.     // store current values 
  17076.     $prev_cell_margin = $this->cell_margin; 
  17077.     $prev_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  17078.     $prevPage = $this->page; 
  17079.     $prevlMargin = $this->lMargin; 
  17080.     $prevrMargin = $this->rMargin; 
  17081.     $curfontname = $this->FontFamily; 
  17082.     $curfontstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  17083.     $curfontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  17084.     $curfontascent = $this->getFontAscent($curfontname, $curfontstyle, $curfontsize); 
  17085.     $curfontdescent = $this->getFontDescent($curfontname, $curfontstyle, $curfontsize); 
  17086.     $curfontstretcing = $this->font_stretching; 
  17087.     $curfonttracking = $this->font_spacing; 
  17088.     $this->newline = true; 
  17089.     $newline = true; 
  17090.     $startlinepage = $this->page; 
  17091.     $minstartliney = $this->y; 
  17092.     $maxbottomliney = 0; 
  17093.     $startlinex = $this->x; 
  17094.     $startliney = $this->y; 
  17095.     $yshift = 0; 
  17096.     $loop = 0; 
  17097.     $curpos = 0; 
  17098.     $this_method_vars = array(); 
  17099.     $undo = false; 
  17100.     $fontaligned = false; 
  17101.     $reverse_dir = false; // true when the text direction is reversed 
  17102.     $this->premode = false; 
  17103.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17104.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  17105.         $pask = count($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations']); 
  17106.     } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17107.         $pask = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]); 
  17108.     } else { 
  17109.         $pask = 0; 
  17110.     } 
  17111.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17112.         // we are inside an XObject template 
  17113.         $startlinepos = strlen($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']); 
  17114.     } elseif (!$this->InFooter) { 
  17115.         if (isset($this->footerlen[$this->page])) { 
  17116.             $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page] - $this->footerlen[$this->page]; 
  17117.         } else { 
  17118.             $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  17119.         } 
  17120.         $startlinepos = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  17121.     } else { 
  17122.         // we are inside the footer 
  17123.         $startlinepos = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  17124.     } 
  17125.     $lalign = $align; 
  17126.     $plalign = $align; 
  17127.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  17128.         $w = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  17129.     } else { 
  17130.         $w = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  17131.     } 
  17132.     $w -= ($this->cell_padding['L'] + $this->cell_padding['R']); 
  17133.     if ($cell) { 
  17134.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  17135.             $this->x -= $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  17136.             $this->lMargin += $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  17137.         } else { 
  17138.             $this->x += $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  17139.             $this->rMargin += $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  17140.         } 
  17141.     } 
  17142.     if ($this->customlistindent >= 0) { 
  17143.         $this->listindent = $this->customlistindent; 
  17144.     } else { 
  17145.         $this->listindent = $this->GetStringWidth('000000'); 
  17146.     } 
  17147.     $this->listindentlevel = 0; 
  17148.     // save previous states 
  17149.     $prev_cell_height_ratio = $this->cell_height_ratio; 
  17150.     $prev_listnum = $this->listnum; 
  17151.     $prev_listordered = $this->listordered; 
  17152.     $prev_listcount = $this->listcount; 
  17153.     $prev_lispacer = $this->lispacer; 
  17154.     $this->listnum = 0; 
  17155.     $this->listordered = array(); 
  17156.     $this->listcount = array(); 
  17157.     $this->lispacer = ''; 
  17158.     if ((TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lasth)) OR ($reseth)) { 
  17159.         // reset row height 
  17160.         $this->resetLastH(); 
  17161.     } 
  17162.     $dom = $this->getHtmlDomArray($html); 
  17163.     $maxel = count($dom); 
  17164.     $key = 0; 
  17165.     while ($key < $maxel) { 
  17166.         if ($dom[$key]['tag'] AND $dom[$key]['opening'] AND $dom[$key]['hide']) { 
  17167.             // store the node key 
  17168.             $hidden_node_key = $key; 
  17169.             if ($dom[$key]['self']) { 
  17170.                 // skip just this self-closing tag 
  17171.                 ++$key; 
  17172.             } else { 
  17173.                 // skip this and all children tags 
  17174.                 while (($key < $maxel) AND (!$dom[$key]['tag'] OR $dom[$key]['opening'] OR ($dom[$key]['parent'] != $hidden_node_key))) { 
  17175.                     // skip hidden objects 
  17176.                     ++$key; 
  17177.                 } 
  17178.                 ++$key; 
  17179.             } 
  17180.         } 
  17181.         if ($dom[$key]['tag'] AND isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'])) { 
  17182.             // check for pagebreak 
  17183.             if (($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] == 'true') OR ($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] == 'left') OR ($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] == 'right')) { 
  17184.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  17185.                 $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  17186.                 $this->htmlvspace = ($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  17187.             } 
  17188.             if ((($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] == 'left') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)))) 
  17189.                 OR (($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreak'] == 'right') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0))))) { 
  17190.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  17191.                 $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  17192.                 $this->htmlvspace = ($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  17193.             } 
  17194.         } 
  17195.         if ($dom[$key]['tag'] AND $dom[$key]['opening'] AND isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['nobr']) AND ($dom[$key]['attribute']['nobr'] == 'true')) { 
  17196.             if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr']) AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr'] == 'true')) { 
  17197.                 $dom[$key]['attribute']['nobr'] = false; 
  17198.             } else { 
  17199.                 // store current object 
  17200.                 $this->startTransaction(); 
  17201.                 // save this method vars 
  17202.                 $this_method_vars['html'] = $html; 
  17203.                 $this_method_vars['ln'] = $ln; 
  17204.                 $this_method_vars['fill'] = $fill; 
  17205.                 $this_method_vars['reseth'] = $reseth; 
  17206.                 $this_method_vars['cell'] = $cell; 
  17207.                 $this_method_vars['align'] = $align; 
  17208.                 $this_method_vars['gvars'] = $gvars; 
  17209.                 $this_method_vars['prevPage'] = $prevPage; 
  17210.                 $this_method_vars['prev_cell_margin'] = $prev_cell_margin; 
  17211.                 $this_method_vars['prev_cell_padding'] = $prev_cell_padding; 
  17212.                 $this_method_vars['prevlMargin'] = $prevlMargin; 
  17213.                 $this_method_vars['prevrMargin'] = $prevrMargin; 
  17214.                 $this_method_vars['curfontname'] = $curfontname; 
  17215.                 $this_method_vars['curfontstyle'] = $curfontstyle; 
  17216.                 $this_method_vars['curfontsize'] = $curfontsize; 
  17217.                 $this_method_vars['curfontascent'] = $curfontascent; 
  17218.                 $this_method_vars['curfontdescent'] = $curfontdescent; 
  17219.                 $this_method_vars['curfontstretcing'] = $curfontstretcing; 
  17220.                 $this_method_vars['curfonttracking'] = $curfonttracking; 
  17221.                 $this_method_vars['minstartliney'] = $minstartliney; 
  17222.                 $this_method_vars['maxbottomliney'] = $maxbottomliney; 
  17223.                 $this_method_vars['yshift'] = $yshift; 
  17224.                 $this_method_vars['startlinepage'] = $startlinepage; 
  17225.                 $this_method_vars['startlinepos'] = $startlinepos; 
  17226.                 $this_method_vars['startlinex'] = $startlinex; 
  17227.                 $this_method_vars['startliney'] = $startliney; 
  17228.                 $this_method_vars['newline'] = $newline; 
  17229.                 $this_method_vars['loop'] = $loop; 
  17230.                 $this_method_vars['curpos'] = $curpos; 
  17231.                 $this_method_vars['pask'] = $pask; 
  17232.                 $this_method_vars['lalign'] = $lalign; 
  17233.                 $this_method_vars['plalign'] = $plalign; 
  17234.                 $this_method_vars['w'] = $w; 
  17235.                 $this_method_vars['prev_cell_height_ratio'] = $prev_cell_height_ratio; 
  17236.                 $this_method_vars['prev_listnum'] = $prev_listnum; 
  17237.                 $this_method_vars['prev_listordered'] = $prev_listordered; 
  17238.                 $this_method_vars['prev_listcount'] = $prev_listcount; 
  17239.                 $this_method_vars['prev_lispacer'] = $prev_lispacer; 
  17240.                 $this_method_vars['fontaligned'] = $fontaligned; 
  17241.                 $this_method_vars['key'] = $key; 
  17242.                 $this_method_vars['dom'] = $dom; 
  17243.             } 
  17244.         } 
  17245.         // print THEAD block 
  17246.         if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND isset($dom[$key]['thead']) AND $dom[$key]['thead']) { 
  17247.             if (isset($dom[$key]['parent']) AND isset($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['thead']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['thead'])) { 
  17248.                 $this->inthead = true; 
  17249.                 // print table header (thead) 
  17250.                 $this->writeHTML($this->thead, false, false, false, false, ''); 
  17251.                 // check if we are on a new page or on a new column 
  17252.                 if (($this->y < $this->start_transaction_y) OR ($this->checkPageBreak($this->lasth, '', false))) { 
  17253.                     // we are on a new page or on a new column and the total object height is less than the available vertical space. 
  17254.                     // restore previous object 
  17255.                     $this->rollbackTransaction(true); 
  17256.                     // restore previous values 
  17257.                     foreach ($this_method_vars as $vkey => $vval) { 
  17258.                         $$vkey = $vval; 
  17259.                     } 
  17260.                     // disable table header 
  17261.                     $tmp_thead = $this->thead; 
  17262.                     $this->thead = ''; 
  17263.                     // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  17264.                     $pre_y = $this->y; 
  17265.                     if ((!$this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1)) AND ($this->y < $pre_y)) { 
  17266.                         // fix for multicolumn mode 
  17267.                         $startliney = $this->y; 
  17268.                     } 
  17269.                     $this->start_transaction_page = $this->page; 
  17270.                     $this->start_transaction_y = $this->y; 
  17271.                     // restore table header 
  17272.                     $this->thead = $tmp_thead; 
  17273.                     // fix table border properties 
  17274.                     if (isset($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  17275.                         $tmp_cellspacing = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  17276.                     } elseif (isset($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['border-spacing'])) { 
  17277.                         $tmp_cellspacing = $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['border-spacing']['V']; 
  17278.                     } else { 
  17279.                         $tmp_cellspacing = 0; 
  17280.                     } 
  17281.                     $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['borderposition']['page'] = $this->page; 
  17282.                     $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['borderposition']['column'] = $this->current_column; 
  17283.                     $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['borderposition']['y'] = $this->y + $tmp_cellspacing; 
  17284.                     $xoffset = ($this->x - $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['borderposition']['x']); 
  17285.                     $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['borderposition']['x'] += $xoffset; 
  17286.                     $dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['borderposition']['xmax'] += $xoffset; 
  17287.                     // print table header (thead) 
  17288.                     $this->writeHTML($this->thead, false, false, false, false, ''); 
  17289.                 } 
  17290.             } 
  17291.             // move $key index forward to skip THEAD block 
  17292.             while ( ($key < $maxel) AND (!( 
  17293.                 ($dom[$key]['tag'] AND $dom[$key]['opening'] AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND (!isset($dom[$key]['thead']) OR !$dom[$key]['thead'])) 
  17294.                 OR ($dom[$key]['tag'] AND (!$dom[$key]['opening']) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table'))) )) { 
  17295.                 ++$key; 
  17296.             } 
  17297.         } 
  17298.         if ($dom[$key]['tag'] OR ($key == 0)) { 
  17299.             if ((($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr')) AND (isset($dom[$key]['align']))) { 
  17300.                 $dom[$key]['align'] = ($this->rtl) ? 'R' : 'L'; 
  17301.             } 
  17302.             // vertically align image in line 
  17303.             if ((!$this->newline) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'img') AND (isset($dom[$key]['height'])) AND ($dom[$key]['height'] > 0)) { 
  17304.                 // get image height 
  17305.                 $imgh = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['height'], ($dom[$key]['fontsize'] / $this->k), 'px'); 
  17306.                 $autolinebreak = false; 
  17307.                 if (!empty($dom[$key]['width'])) { 
  17308.                     $imgw = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['width'], ($dom[$key]['fontsize'] / $this->k), 'px', false); 
  17309.                     if (($imgw <= ($this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $this->cell_padding['L'] - $this->cell_padding['R'])) 
  17310.                         AND ((($this->rtl) AND (($this->x - $imgw) < ($this->lMargin + $this->cell_padding['L']))) 
  17311.                         OR ((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->x + $imgw) > ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->cell_padding['R']))))) { 
  17312.                         // add automatic line break 
  17313.                         $autolinebreak = true; 
  17314.                         $this->Ln('', $cell); 
  17315.                         if ((!$dom[($key-1)]['tag']) AND ($dom[($key-1)]['value'] == ' ')) { 
  17316.                             // go back to evaluate this line break 
  17317.                             --$key; 
  17318.                         } 
  17319.                     } 
  17320.                 } 
  17321.                 if (!$autolinebreak) { 
  17322.                     if ($this->inPageBody()) { 
  17323.                         $pre_y = $this->y; 
  17324.                         // check for page break 
  17325.                         if ((!$this->checkPageBreak($imgh)) AND ($this->y < $pre_y)) { 
  17326.                             // fix for multicolumn mode 
  17327.                             $startliney = $this->y; 
  17328.                         } 
  17329.                     } 
  17330.                     if ($this->page > $startlinepage) { 
  17331.                         // fix line splitted over two pages 
  17332.                         if (isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage])) { 
  17333.                             $curpos = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  17334.                         } 
  17335.                         // line to be moved one page forward 
  17336.                         $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage); 
  17337.                         $linebeg = substr($pagebuff, $startlinepos, ($curpos - $startlinepos)); 
  17338.                         $tstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $startlinepos); 
  17339.                         $tend = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $curpos); 
  17340.                         // remove line from previous page 
  17341.                         $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $tstart.''.$tend); 
  17342.                         $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  17343.                         $tstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $this->cntmrk[$this->page]); 
  17344.                         $tend = substr($pagebuff, $this->cntmrk[$this->page]); 
  17345.                         // add line start to current page 
  17346.                         $yshift = ($minstartliney - $this->y); 
  17347.                         if ($fontaligned) { 
  17348.                             $yshift += ($curfontsize / $this->k); 
  17349.                         } 
  17350.                         $try = sprintf('1 0 0 1 0 %F cm', ($yshift * $this->k)); 
  17351.                         $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $tstart."\nq\n".$try."\n".$linebeg."\nQ\n".$tend); 
  17352.                         // shift the annotations and links 
  17353.                         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17354.                             $next_pask = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]); 
  17355.                         } else { 
  17356.                             $next_pask = 0; 
  17357.                         } 
  17358.                         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$startlinepage])) { 
  17359.                             foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$startlinepage] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17360.                                 if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  17361.                                     $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][] = $pac; 
  17362.                                     unset($this->PageAnnots[$startlinepage][$pak]); 
  17363.                                     $npak = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]) - 1; 
  17364.                                     $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$npak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  17365.                                 } 
  17366.                             } 
  17367.                         } 
  17368.                         $pask = $next_pask; 
  17369.                         $startlinepos = $this->cntmrk[$this->page]; 
  17370.                         $startlinepage = $this->page; 
  17371.                         $startliney = $this->y; 
  17372.                         $this->newline = false; 
  17373.                     } 
  17374.                     $this->y += ($this->getCellHeight($curfontsize / $this->k) - ($curfontdescent * $this->cell_height_ratio) - $imgh);
