  17375.                     $minstartliney = min($this->y, $minstartliney); 
  17376.                     $maxbottomliney = ($startliney + $this->getCellHeight($curfontsize / $this->k)); 
  17377.                 } 
  17378.             } elseif (isset($dom[$key]['fontname']) OR isset($dom[$key]['fontstyle']) OR isset($dom[$key]['fontsize']) OR isset($dom[$key]['line-height'])) { 
  17379.                 // account for different font size 
  17380.                 $pfontname = $curfontname; 
  17381.                 $pfontstyle = $curfontstyle; 
  17382.                 $pfontsize = $curfontsize; 
  17383.                 $fontname = (isset($dom[$key]['fontname']) ? $dom[$key]['fontname'] : $curfontname); 
  17384.                 $fontstyle = (isset($dom[$key]['fontstyle']) ? $dom[$key]['fontstyle'] : $curfontstyle); 
  17385.                 $fontsize = (isset($dom[$key]['fontsize']) ? $dom[$key]['fontsize'] : $curfontsize); 
  17386.                 $fontascent = $this->getFontAscent($fontname, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  17387.                 $fontdescent = $this->getFontDescent($fontname, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  17388.                 if (($fontname != $curfontname) OR ($fontstyle != $curfontstyle) OR ($fontsize != $curfontsize) 
  17389.                     OR ($this->cell_height_ratio != $dom[$key]['line-height']) 
  17390.                     OR ($dom[$key]['tag'] AND $dom[$key]['opening'] AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'li')) ) { 
  17391.                     if (($key < ($maxel - 1)) AND ( 
  17392.                             ($dom[$key]['tag'] AND $dom[$key]['opening'] AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'li')) 
  17393.                             OR ($this->cell_height_ratio != $dom[$key]['line-height']) 
  17394.                             OR (!$this->newline AND is_numeric($fontsize) AND is_numeric($curfontsize) AND ($fontsize >= 0) AND ($curfontsize >= 0) AND ($fontsize != $curfontsize)) 
  17395.  )) { 
  17396.                         if ($this->page > $startlinepage) { 
  17397.                             // fix lines splitted over two pages 
  17398.                             if (isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage])) { 
  17399.                                 $curpos = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  17400.                             } 
  17401.                             // line to be moved one page forward 
  17402.                             $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage); 
  17403.                             $linebeg = substr($pagebuff, $startlinepos, ($curpos - $startlinepos)); 
  17404.                             $tstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $startlinepos); 
  17405.                             $tend = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $curpos); 
  17406.                             // remove line start from previous page 
  17407.                             $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $tstart.''.$tend); 
  17408.                             $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  17409.                             $tstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $this->cntmrk[$this->page]); 
  17410.                             $tend = substr($pagebuff, $this->cntmrk[$this->page]); 
  17411.                             // add line start to current page 
  17412.                             $yshift = ($minstartliney - $this->y); 
  17413.                             $try = sprintf('1 0 0 1 0 %F cm', ($yshift * $this->k)); 
  17414.                             $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $tstart."\nq\n".$try."\n".$linebeg."\nQ\n".$tend); 
  17415.                             // shift the annotations and links 
  17416.                             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17417.                                 $next_pask = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]); 
  17418.                             } else { 
  17419.                                 $next_pask = 0; 
  17420.                             } 
  17421.                             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$startlinepage])) { 
  17422.                                 foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$startlinepage] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17423.                                     if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  17424.                                         $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][] = $pac; 
  17425.                                         unset($this->PageAnnots[$startlinepage][$pak]); 
  17426.                                         $npak = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]) - 1; 
  17427.                                         $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$npak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  17428.                                     } 
  17429.                                 } 
  17430.                             } 
  17431.                             $pask = $next_pask; 
  17432.                             $startlinepos = $this->cntmrk[$this->page]; 
  17433.                             $startlinepage = $this->page; 
  17434.                             $startliney = $this->y; 
  17435.                         } 
  17436.                         if (!isset($dom[$key]['line-height'])) { 
  17437.                             $dom[$key]['line-height'] = $this->cell_height_ratio; 
  17438.                         } 
  17439.                         if (!$dom[$key]['block']) { 
  17440.                             if (!(isset($dom[($key + 1)]) AND $dom[($key + 1)]['tag'] AND (!$dom[($key + 1)]['opening']) AND ($dom[($key + 1)]['value'] != 'li') AND $dom[$key]['tag'] AND (!$dom[$key]['opening']))) { 
  17441.                                 $this->y += (((($curfontsize * $this->cell_height_ratio) - ($fontsize * $dom[$key]['line-height'])) / $this->k) + $curfontascent - $fontascent - $curfontdescent + $fontdescent) / 2; 
  17442.                             } 
  17443.                             if (($dom[$key]['value'] != 'sup') AND ($dom[$key]['value'] != 'sub')) { 
  17444.                                 $current_line_align_data = array($key, $minstartliney, $maxbottomliney); 
  17445.                                 if (isset($line_align_data) AND (($line_align_data[0] == ($key - 1)) OR (($line_align_data[0] == ($key - 2)) AND (isset($dom[($key - 1)])) AND (preg_match('/^([\s]+)$/', $dom[($key - 1)]['value']) > 0)))) { 
  17446.                                     $minstartliney = min($this->y, $line_align_data[1]); 
  17447.                                     $maxbottomliney = max(($this->y + $this->getCellHeight($fontsize / $this->k)), $line_align_data[2]); 
  17448.                                 } else { 
  17449.                                     $minstartliney = min($this->y, $minstartliney); 
  17450.                                     $maxbottomliney = max(($this->y + $this->getCellHeight($fontsize / $this->k)), $maxbottomliney); 
  17451.                                 } 
  17452.                                 $line_align_data = $current_line_align_data; 
  17453.                             } 
  17454.                         } 
  17455.                         $this->cell_height_ratio = $dom[$key]['line-height']; 
  17456.                         $fontaligned = true; 
  17457.                     } 
  17458.                     $this->SetFont($fontname, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  17459.                     // reset row height 
  17460.                     $this->resetLastH(); 
  17461.                     $curfontname = $fontname; 
  17462.                     $curfontstyle = $fontstyle; 
  17463.                     $curfontsize = $fontsize; 
  17464.                     $curfontascent = $fontascent; 
  17465.                     $curfontdescent = $fontdescent; 
  17466.                 } 
  17467.             } 
  17468.             // set text rendering mode 
  17469.             $textstroke = isset($dom[$key]['stroke']) ? $dom[$key]['stroke'] : $this->textstrokewidth; 
  17470.             $textfill = isset($dom[$key]['fill']) ? $dom[$key]['fill'] : (($this->textrendermode % 2) == 0); 
  17471.             $textclip = isset($dom[$key]['clip']) ? $dom[$key]['clip'] : ($this->textrendermode > 3); 
  17472.             $this->setTextRenderingMode($textstroke, $textfill, $textclip); 
  17473.             if (isset($dom[$key]['font-stretch']) AND ($dom[$key]['font-stretch'] !== false)) { 
  17474.                 $this->setFontStretching($dom[$key]['font-stretch']); 
  17475.             } 
  17476.             if (isset($dom[$key]['letter-spacing']) AND ($dom[$key]['letter-spacing'] !== false)) { 
  17477.                 $this->setFontSpacing($dom[$key]['letter-spacing']); 
  17478.             } 
  17479.             if (($plalign == 'J') AND $dom[$key]['block']) { 
  17480.                 $plalign = ''; 
  17481.             } 
  17482.             // get current position on page buffer 
  17483.             $curpos = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage]; 
  17484.             if (isset($dom[$key]['bgcolor']) AND ($dom[$key]['bgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  17485.                 $this->SetFillColorArray($dom[$key]['bgcolor']); 
  17486.                 $wfill = true; 
  17487.             } else { 
  17488.                 $wfill = $fill | false; 
  17489.             } 
  17490.             if (isset($dom[$key]['fgcolor']) AND ($dom[$key]['fgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  17491.                 $this->SetTextColorArray($dom[$key]['fgcolor']); 
  17492.             } 
  17493.             if (isset($dom[$key]['strokecolor']) AND ($dom[$key]['strokecolor'] !== false)) { 
  17494.                 $this->SetDrawColorArray($dom[$key]['strokecolor']); 
  17495.             } 
  17496.             if (isset($dom[$key]['align'])) { 
  17497.                 $lalign = $dom[$key]['align']; 
  17498.             } 
  17499.             if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($lalign)) { 
  17500.                 $lalign = $align; 
  17501.             } 
  17502.         } 
  17503.         // align lines 
  17504.         if ($this->newline AND (strlen($dom[$key]['value']) > 0) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] != 'td') AND ($dom[$key]['value'] != 'th')) { 
  17505.             $newline = true; 
  17506.             $fontaligned = false; 
  17507.             // we are at the beginning of a new line 
  17508.             if (isset($startlinex)) { 
  17509.                 $yshift = ($minstartliney - $startliney); 
  17510.                 if (($yshift > 0) OR ($this->page > $startlinepage)) { 
  17511.                     $yshift = 0; 
  17512.                 } 
  17513.                 $t_x = 0; 
  17514.                 // the last line must be shifted to be aligned as requested 
  17515.                 $linew = abs($this->endlinex - $startlinex); 
  17516.                 if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17517.                     // we are inside an XObject template 
  17518.                     $pstart = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], 0, $startlinepos); 
  17519.                     if (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  17520.                         $midpos = $opentagpos; 
  17521.                     } else { 
  17522.                         $midpos = 0; 
  17523.                     } 
  17524.                     if ($midpos > 0) { 
  17525.                         $pmid = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $startlinepos, ($midpos - $startlinepos)); 
  17526.                         $pend = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $midpos); 
  17527.                     } else { 
  17528.                         $pmid = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $startlinepos); 
  17529.                         $pend = ''; 
  17530.                     } 
  17531.                 } else { 
  17532.                     $pstart = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), 0, $startlinepos); 
  17533.                     if (isset($opentagpos) AND isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage]) AND (!$this->InFooter)) { 
  17534.                         $this->footerpos[$startlinepage] = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  17535.                         $midpos = min($opentagpos, $this->footerpos[$startlinepage]); 
  17536.                     } elseif (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  17537.                         $midpos = $opentagpos; 
  17538.                     } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage]) AND (!$this->InFooter)) { 
  17539.                         $this->footerpos[$startlinepage] = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  17540.                         $midpos = $this->footerpos[$startlinepage]; 
  17541.                     } else { 
  17542.                         $midpos = 0; 
  17543.                     } 
  17544.                     if ($midpos > 0) { 
  17545.                         $pmid = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $startlinepos, ($midpos - $startlinepos)); 
  17546.                         $pend = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $midpos); 
  17547.                     } else { 
  17548.                         $pmid = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $startlinepos); 
  17549.                         $pend = ''; 
  17550.                     } 
  17551.                 } 
  17552.                 if ((isset($plalign) AND ((($plalign == 'C') OR ($plalign == 'J') OR (($plalign == 'R') AND (!$this->rtl)) OR (($plalign == 'L') AND ($this->rtl)))))) { 
  17553.                     // calculate shifting amount 
  17554.                     $tw = $w; 
  17555.                     if (($plalign == 'J') AND $this->isRTLTextDir() AND ($this->num_columns > 1)) { 
  17556.                         $tw += $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  17557.                     } 
  17558.                     if ($this->lMargin != $prevlMargin) { 
  17559.                         $tw += ($prevlMargin - $this->lMargin); 
  17560.                     } 
  17561.                     if ($this->rMargin != $prevrMargin) { 
  17562.                         $tw += ($prevrMargin - $this->rMargin); 
  17563.                     } 
  17564.                     $one_space_width = $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)); 
  17565.                     $no = 0; // number of spaces on a line contained on a single block 
  17566.                     if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { // RTL 
  17567.                         // remove left space if exist 
  17568.                         $pos1 = TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('); 
  17569.                         if ($pos1 > 0) { 
  17570.                             $pos1 = intval($pos1); 
  17571.                             if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  17572.                                 $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('.chr(0).chr(32))); 
  17573.                                 $spacelen = 2; 
  17574.                             } else { 
  17575.                                 $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('.chr(32))); 
  17576.                                 $spacelen = 1; 
  17577.                             } 
  17578.                             if ($pos1 == $pos2) { 
  17579.                                 $pmid = substr($pmid, 0, ($pos1 + 2)).substr($pmid, ($pos1 + 2 + $spacelen)); 
  17580.                                 if (substr($pmid, $pos1, 4) == '[()]') { 
  17581.                                     $linew -= $one_space_width; 
  17582.                                 } elseif ($pos1 == strpos($pmid, '[(')) { 
  17583.                                     $no = 1; 
  17584.                                 } 
  17585.                             } 
  17586.                         } 
  17587.                     } else { // LTR 
  17588.                         // remove right space if exist 
  17589.                         $pos1 = TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, ')]'); 
  17590.                         if ($pos1 > 0) { 
  17591.                             $pos1 = intval($pos1); 
  17592.                             if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  17593.                                 $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, chr(0).chr(32).')]')) + 2; 
  17594.                                 $spacelen = 2; 
  17595.                             } else { 
  17596.                                 $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, chr(32).')]')) + 1; 
  17597.                                 $spacelen = 1; 
  17598.                             } 
  17599.                             if ($pos1 == $pos2) { 
  17600.                                 $pmid = substr($pmid, 0, ($pos1 - $spacelen)).substr($pmid, $pos1); 
  17601.                                 $linew -= $one_space_width; 
  17602.                             } 
  17603.                         } 
  17604.                     } 
  17605.                     $mdiff = ($tw - $linew); 
  17606.                     if ($plalign == 'C') { 
  17607.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  17608.                             $t_x = -($mdiff / 2); 
  17609.                         } else { 
  17610.                             $t_x = ($mdiff / 2); 
  17611.                         } 
  17612.                     } elseif ($plalign == 'R') { 
  17613.                         // right alignment on LTR document 
  17614.                         $t_x = $mdiff; 
  17615.                     } elseif ($plalign == 'L') { 
  17616.                         // left alignment on RTL document 
  17617.                         $t_x = -$mdiff; 
  17618.                     } elseif (($plalign == 'J') AND ($plalign == $lalign)) { 
  17619.                         // Justification 
  17620.                         if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  17621.                             // align text on the left 
  17622.                             $t_x = -$mdiff; 
  17623.                         } 
  17624.                         $ns = 0; // number of spaces 
  17625.                         $pmidtemp = $pmid; 
  17626.                         // escape special characters 
  17627.                         $pmidtemp = preg_replace('/[\\\][\(]/x', '\\#!#OP#!#', $pmidtemp); 
  17628.                         $pmidtemp = preg_replace('/[\\\][\)]/x', '\\#!#CP#!#', $pmidtemp); 
  17629.                         // search spaces 
  17630.                         if (preg_match_all('/\[\(([^\)]*)\)\]/x', $pmidtemp, $lnstring, PREG_PATTERN_ORDER)) { 
  17631.                             $spacestr = $this->getSpaceString(); 
  17632.                             $maxkk = count($lnstring[1]) - 1; 
  17633.                             for ($kk=0; $kk <= $maxkk; ++$kk) { 
  17634.                                 // restore special characters 
  17635.                                 $lnstring[1][$kk] = str_replace('#!#OP#!#', '(', $lnstring[1][$kk]); 
  17636.                                 $lnstring[1][$kk] = str_replace('#!#CP#!#', ')', $lnstring[1][$kk]); 
  17637.                                 // store number of spaces on the strings 
  17638.                                 $lnstring[2][$kk] = substr_count($lnstring[1][$kk], $spacestr); 
  17639.                                 // count total spaces on line 
  17640.                                 $ns += $lnstring[2][$kk]; 
  17641.                                 $lnstring[3][$kk] = $ns; 
  17642.                             } 
  17643.                             if ($ns == 0) { 
  17644.                                 $ns = 1; 
  17645.                             } 
  17646.                             // calculate additional space to add to each existing space 
  17647.                             $spacewidth = ($mdiff / ($ns - $no)) * $this->k; 
  17648.                             if ($this->FontSize <= 0) { 
  17649.                                 $this->FontSize = 1; 
  17650.                             } 
  17651.                             $spacewidthu = -1000 * ($mdiff + (($ns + $no) * $one_space_width)) / $ns / $this->FontSize; 
  17652.                             if ($this->font_spacing != 0) { 
  17653.                                 // fixed spacing mode 
  17654.                                 $osw = -1000 * $this->font_spacing / $this->FontSize; 
  17655.                                 $spacewidthu += $osw; 
  17656.                             } 
  17657.                             $nsmax = $ns; 
  17658.                             $ns = 0; 
  17659.                             reset($lnstring); 
  17660.                             $offset = 0; 
  17661.                             $strcount = 0; 
  17662.                             $prev_epsposbeg = 0; 
  17663.                             $textpos = 0; 
  17664.                             if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  17665.                                 $textpos = $this->wPt; 
  17666.                             } 
  17667.                             while (preg_match('/([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s](Td|cm|m|l|c|re)[\s]/x', $pmid, $strpiece, PREG_OFFSET_CAPTURE, $offset) == 1) { 
  17668.                                 // check if we are inside a string section '[( ... )]' 
  17669.                                 $stroffset = strpos($pmid, '[(', $offset); 
  17670.                                 if (($stroffset !== false) AND ($stroffset <= $strpiece[2][1])) { 
  17671.                                     // set offset to the end of string section 
  17672.                                     $offset = strpos($pmid, ')]', $stroffset); 
  17673.                                     while (($offset !== false) AND ($pmid[($offset - 1)] == '\\')) { 
  17674.                                         $offset = strpos($pmid, ')]', ($offset + 1)); 
  17675.                                     } 
  17676.                                     if ($offset === false) { 
  17677.                                         $this->Error('HTML Justification: malformed PDF code.'); 
  17678.                                     } 
  17679.                                     continue; 
  17680.                                 } 
  17681.                                 if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  17682.                                     $spacew = ($spacewidth * ($nsmax - $ns)); 
  17683.                                 } else { 
  17684.                                     $spacew = ($spacewidth * $ns); 
  17685.                                 } 
  17686.                                 $offset = $strpiece[2][1] + strlen($strpiece[2][0]); 
  17687.                                 $epsposend = strpos($pmid, $this->epsmarker.'Q', $offset);                 
  17688.                                 if ($epsposend !== null) { 
  17689.                                     $epsposend += strlen($this->epsmarker.'Q'); 
  17690.                                     $epsposbeg = strpos($pmid, 'q'.$this->epsmarker, $offset); 
  17691.                                     if ($epsposbeg === null) { 
  17692.                                         $epsposbeg = strpos($pmid, 'q'.$this->epsmarker, ($prev_epsposbeg - 6)); 
  17693.                                         $prev_epsposbeg = $epsposbeg; 
  17694.                                     } 
  17695.                                     if (($epsposbeg > 0) AND ($epsposend > 0) AND ($offset > $epsposbeg) AND ($offset < $epsposend)) { 
  17696.                                         // shift EPS images 
  17697.                                         $trx = sprintf('1 0 0 1 %F 0 cm', $spacew); 
  17698.                                         $pmid_b = substr($pmid, 0, $epsposbeg); 
  17699.                                         $pmid_m = substr($pmid, $epsposbeg, ($epsposend - $epsposbeg)); 
  17700.                                         $pmid_e = substr($pmid, $epsposend); 
  17701.                                         $pmid = $pmid_b."\nq\n".$trx."\n".$pmid_m."\nQ\n".$pmid_e; 
  17702.                                         $offset = $epsposend; 
  17703.                                         continue; 
  17704.                                     } 
  17705.                                 } 
  17706.                                 $currentxpos = 0; 
  17707.                                 // shift blocks of code 
  17708.                                 switch ($strpiece[2][0]) { 
  17709.                                     case 'Td': 
  17710.                                     case 'cm': 
  17711.                                     case 'm': 
  17712.                                     case 'l': { 
  17713.                                         // get current X position 
  17714.                                         preg_match('/([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]('.$strpiece[1][0].')[\s]('.$strpiece[2][0].')([\s]*)/x', $pmid, $xmatches); 
  17715.                                         if (!isset($xmatches[1])) { 
  17716.                                             break; 
  17717.                                         } 
  17718.                                         $currentxpos = $xmatches[1]; 
  17719.                                         $textpos = $currentxpos; 
  17720.                                         if (($strcount <= $maxkk) AND ($strpiece[2][0] == 'Td')) { 
  17721.                                             $ns = $lnstring[3][$strcount]; 
  17722.                                             if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  17723.                                                 $spacew = ($spacewidth * ($nsmax - $ns)); 
  17724.                                             } 
  17725.                                             ++$strcount; 
  17726.                                         } 
  17727.                                         // justify block 
  17728.                                         if (preg_match('/([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]('.$strpiece[1][0].')[\s]('.$strpiece[2][0].')([\s]*)/x', $pmid, $pmatch) == 1) { 
  17729.                                             $newpmid = sprintf('%F', (floatval($pmatch[1]) + $spacew)).' '.$pmatch[2].' x*#!#*x'.$pmatch[3].$pmatch[4]; 
  17730.                                             $pmid = str_replace($pmatch[0], $newpmid, $pmid); 
  17731.                                             unset($pmatch, $newpmid); 
  17732.                                         } 
  17733.                                         break; 
  17734.                                     } 
  17735.                                     case 're': { 
  17736.                                         // justify block 
  17737.                                         if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lispacer)) { 
  17738.                                             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  17739.                                             continue; 
  17740.                                         } 
  17741.                                         preg_match('/([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]('.$strpiece[1][0].')[\s](re)([\s]*)/x', $pmid, $xmatches); 
  17742.                                         if (!isset($xmatches[1])) { 
  17743.                                             break; 
  17744.                                         } 
  17745.                                         $currentxpos = $xmatches[1]; 
  17746.                                         $x_diff = 0; 
  17747.                                         $w_diff = 0; 
  17748.                                         if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { // RTL 
  17749.                                             if ($currentxpos < $textpos) { 
  17750.                                                 $x_diff = ($spacewidth * ($nsmax - $lnstring[3][$strcount])); 
  17751.                                                 $w_diff = ($spacewidth * $lnstring[2][$strcount]); 
  17752.                                             } else { 
  17753.                                                 if ($strcount > 0) { 
  17754.                                                     $x_diff = ($spacewidth * ($nsmax - $lnstring[3][($strcount - 1)])); 
  17755.                                                     $w_diff = ($spacewidth * $lnstring[2][($strcount - 1)]); 
  17756.                                                 } 
  17757.                                             } 
  17758.                                         } else { // LTR 
  17759.                                             if ($currentxpos > $textpos) { 
  17760.                                                 if ($strcount > 0) { 
  17761.                                                     $x_diff = ($spacewidth * $lnstring[3][($strcount - 1)]); 
  17762.                                                 } 
  17763.                                                 $w_diff = ($spacewidth * $lnstring[2][$strcount]); 
  17764.                                             } else { 
  17765.                                                 if ($strcount > 1) { 
  17766.                                                     $x_diff = ($spacewidth * $lnstring[3][($strcount - 2)]); 
  17767.                                                 } 
  17768.                                                 if ($strcount > 0) { 
  17769.                                                     $w_diff = ($spacewidth * $lnstring[2][($strcount - 1)]); 
  17770.                                                 } 
  17771.                                             } 
  17772.                                         } 
  17773.                                         if (preg_match('/('.$xmatches[1].')[\s]('.$xmatches[2].')[\s]('.$xmatches[3].')[\s]('.$strpiece[1][0].')[\s](re)([\s]*)/x', $pmid, $pmatch) == 1) { 
  17774.                                             $newx = sprintf('%F', (floatval($pmatch[1]) + $x_diff)); 
  17775.                                             $neww = sprintf('%F', (floatval($pmatch[3]) + $w_diff)); 
  17776.                                             $newpmid = $newx.' '.$pmatch[2].' '.$neww.' '.$pmatch[4].' x*#!#*x'.$pmatch[5].$pmatch[6]; 
  17777.                                             $pmid = str_replace($pmatch[0], $newpmid, $pmid); 
  17778.                                             unset($pmatch, $newpmid, $newx, $neww); 
  17779.                                         } 
  17780.                                         break; 
  17781.                                     } 
  17782.                                     case 'c': { 
  17783.                                         // get current X position 
  17784.                                         preg_match('/([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]([0-9\.\+\-]*)[\s]('.$strpiece[1][0].')[\s](c)([\s]*)/x', $pmid, $xmatches); 
  17785.                                         if (!isset($xmatches[1])) { 
  17786.                                             break; 
  17787.                                         } 
  17788.                                         $currentxpos = $xmatches[1]; 
  17789.                                         // justify block 
  17790.                                         if (preg_match('/('.$xmatches[1].')[\s]('.$xmatches[2].')[\s]('.$xmatches[3].')[\s]('.$xmatches[4].')[\s]('.$xmatches[5].')[\s]('.$strpiece[1][0].')[\s](c)([\s]*)/x', $pmid, $pmatch) == 1) { 
  17791.                                             $newx1 = sprintf('%F', (floatval($pmatch[1]) + $spacew)); 
  17792.                                             $newx2 = sprintf('%F', (floatval($pmatch[3]) + $spacew)); 
  17793.                                             $newx3 = sprintf('%F', (floatval($pmatch[5]) + $spacew)); 
  17794.                                             $newpmid = $newx1.' '.$pmatch[2].' '.$newx2.' '.$pmatch[4].' '.$newx3.' '.$pmatch[6].' x*#!#*x'.$pmatch[7].$pmatch[8]; 
  17795.                                             $pmid = str_replace($pmatch[0], $newpmid, $pmid); 
  17796.                                             unset($pmatch, $newpmid, $newx1, $newx2, $newx3); 
  17797.                                         } 
  17798.                                         break; 
  17799.                                     } 
  17800.                                 } 
  17801.                                 // shift the annotations and links 
  17802.                                 $cxpos = ($currentxpos / $this->k); 
  17803.                                 $lmpos = ($this->lMargin + $this->cell_padding['L'] + $this->feps); 
  17804.                                 if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17805.                                     // we are inside an XObject template 
  17806.                                     foreach ($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17807.                                         if (($pac['y'] >= $minstartliney) AND (($pac['x'] * $this->k) >= ($currentxpos - $this->feps)) AND (($pac['x'] * $this->k) <= ($currentxpos + $this->feps))) { 
  17808.                                             if ($cxpos > $lmpos) { 
  17809.                                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['x'] += ($spacew / $this->k); 
  17810.                                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['w'] += (($spacewidth * $pac['numspaces']) / $this->k); 
  17811.                                             } else { 
  17812.                                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['w'] += (($spacewidth * $pac['numspaces']) / $this->k); 
  17813.                                             } 
  17814.                                             break; 
  17815.                                         } 
  17816.                                     } 
  17817.                                 } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17818.                                     foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$this->page] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17819.                                         if (($pac['y'] >= $minstartliney) AND (($pac['x'] * $this->k) >= ($currentxpos - $this->feps)) AND (($pac['x'] * $this->k) <= ($currentxpos + $this->feps))) { 
  17820.                                             if ($cxpos > $lmpos) { 
  17821.                                                 $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['x'] += ($spacew / $this->k); 
  17822.                                                 $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['w'] += (($spacewidth * $pac['numspaces']) / $this->k); 
  17823.                                             } else { 
  17824.                                                 $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['w'] += (($spacewidth * $pac['numspaces']) / $this->k); 
  17825.                                             } 
  17826.                                             break; 
  17827.                                         } 
  17828.                                     } 
  17829.                                 } 
  17830.                             } // end of while 
  17831.                             // remove markers 
  17832.                             $pmid = str_replace('x*#!#*x', '', $pmid); 
  17833.                             if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  17834.                                 // multibyte characters 
  17835.                                 $spacew = $spacewidthu; 
  17836.                                 if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  17837.                                     // word spacing is affected by stretching 
  17838.                                     $spacew /= ($this->font_stretching / 100); 
  17839.                                 } 
  17840.                                 // escape special characters 
  17841.                                 $pos = 0; 
  17842.                                 $pmid = preg_replace('/[\\\][\(]/x', '\\#!#OP#!#', $pmid); 
  17843.                                 $pmid = preg_replace('/[\\\][\)]/x', '\\#!#CP#!#', $pmid); 
  17844.                                 if (preg_match_all('/\[\(([^\)]*)\)\]/x', $pmid, $pamatch) > 0) { 
  17845.                                     foreach($pamatch[0] as $pk => $pmatch) { 
  17846.                                         $replace = $pamatch[1][$pk]; 
  17847.                                         $replace = str_replace('#!#OP#!#', '(', $replace); 
  17848.                                         $replace = str_replace('#!#CP#!#', ')', $replace); 
  17849.                                         $newpmid = '[('.str_replace(chr(0).chr(32), ') '.sprintf('%F', $spacew).' (', $replace).')]'; 
  17850.                                         $pos = strpos($pmid, $pmatch, $pos); 
  17851.                                         if ($pos !== FALSE) { 
  17852.                                             $pmid = substr_replace($pmid, $newpmid, $pos, strlen($pmatch)); 
  17853.                                         } 
  17854.                                         ++$pos; 
  17855.                                     } 
  17856.                                     unset($pamatch); 
  17857.                                 } 
  17858.                                 if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17859.                                     // we are inside an XObject template 
  17860.                                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart."\n".$pmid."\n".$pend; 
  17861.                                 } else { 
  17862.                                     $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $pstart."\n".$pmid."\n".$pend); 
  17863.                                 } 
  17864.                                 $endlinepos = strlen($pstart."\n".$pmid."\n"); 
  17865.                             } else { 
  17866.                                 // non-unicode (single-byte characters) 
  17867.                                 if ($this->font_stretching != 100) { 
  17868.                                     // word spacing (Tw) is affected by stretching 
  17869.                                     $spacewidth /= ($this->font_stretching / 100); 
  17870.                                 } 
  17871.                                 $rs = sprintf('%F Tw', $spacewidth); 
  17872.                                 $pmid = preg_replace("/\[\(/x", $rs.' [(', $pmid); 
  17873.                                 if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17874.                                     // we are inside an XObject template 
  17875.                                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart."\n".$pmid."\nBT 0 Tw ET\n".$pend; 
  17876.                                 } else { 
  17877.                                     $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $pstart."\n".$pmid."\nBT 0 Tw ET\n".$pend); 
  17878.                                 } 
  17879.                                 $endlinepos = strlen($pstart."\n".$pmid."\nBT 0 Tw ET\n"); 
  17880.                             } 
  17881.                         } 
  17882.                     } // end of J 
  17883.                 } // end if $startlinex 
  17884.                 if (($t_x != 0) OR ($yshift < 0)) { 
  17885.                     // shift the line 
  17886.                     $trx = sprintf('1 0 0 1 %F %F cm', ($t_x * $this->k), ($yshift * $this->k)); 
  17887.                     $pstart .= "\nq\n".$trx."\n".$pmid."\nQ\n"; 
  17888.                     $endlinepos = strlen($pstart); 
  17889.                     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17890.                         // we are inside an XObject template 
  17891.                         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$pend; 
  17892.                         foreach ($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17893.                             if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  17894.                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  17895.                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  17896.                             } 
  17897.                         } 
  17898.                     } else { 
  17899.                         $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $pstart.$pend); 
  17900.                         // shift the annotations and links 
  17901.                         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17902.                             foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$this->page] as $pak => $pac) { 
  17903.                                 if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  17904.                                     $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  17905.                                     $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  17906.                                 } 
  17907.                             } 
  17908.                         } 
  17909.                     } 
  17910.                     $this->y -= $yshift; 
  17911.                 } 
  17912.             } 
  17913.             $pbrk = $this->checkPageBreak($this->lasth); 
  17914.             $this->newline = false; 
  17915.             $startlinex = $this->x; 
  17916.             $startliney = $this->y; 
  17917.             if ($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['value'] == 'sup') { 
  17918.                 $startliney -= ((0.3 * $this->FontSizePt) / $this->k); 
  17919.             } elseif ($dom[$dom[$key]['parent']]['value'] == 'sub') { 
  17920.                 $startliney -= (($this->FontSizePt / 0.7) / $this->k); 
  17921.             } else { 
  17922.                 $minstartliney = $startliney; 
  17923.                 $maxbottomliney = ($this->y + $this->getCellHeight($fontsize / $this->k)); 
  17924.             } 
  17925.             $startlinepage = $this->page; 
  17926.             if (isset($endlinepos) AND (!$pbrk)) { 
  17927.                 $startlinepos = $endlinepos; 
  17928.             } else { 
  17929.                 if ($this->inxobj) { 
  17930.                     // we are inside an XObject template 
  17931.                     $startlinepos = strlen($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']); 
  17932.                 } elseif (!$this->InFooter) { 
  17933.                     if (isset($this->footerlen[$this->page])) { 
  17934.                         $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page] - $this->footerlen[$this->page]; 
  17935.                     } else { 
  17936.                         $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  17937.                     } 
  17938.                     $startlinepos = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  17939.                 } else { 
  17940.                     $startlinepos = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  17941.                 } 
  17942.             } 
  17943.             unset($endlinepos); 
  17944.             $plalign = $lalign; 
  17945.             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  17946.                 $pask = count($this->PageAnnots[$this->page]); 
  17947.             } else { 
  17948.                 $pask = 0; 
  17949.             } 
  17950.             if (!($dom[$key]['tag'] AND !$dom[$key]['opening'] AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table') 
  17951.                 AND (isset($this->emptypagemrk[$this->page])) 
  17952.                 AND ($this->emptypagemrk[$this->page] == $this->pagelen[$this->page]))) { 
  17953.                 $this->SetFont($fontname, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  17954.                 if ($wfill) { 
  17955.                     $this->SetFillColorArray($this->bgcolor); 
  17956.                 } 
  17957.             } 
  17958.         } // end newline 
  17959.         if (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  17960.             unset($opentagpos); 
  17961.         } 
  17962.         if ($dom[$key]['tag']) { 
  17963.             if ($dom[$key]['opening']) { 
  17964.                 // get text indentation (if any) 
  17965.                 if (isset($dom[$key]['text-indent']) AND $dom[$key]['block']) { 
  17966.                     $this->textindent = $dom[$key]['text-indent']; 
  17967.                     $this->newline = true; 
  17968.                 } 
  17969.                 // table 
  17970.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'table') AND isset($dom[$key]['cols']) AND ($dom[$key]['cols'] > 0)) { 
  17971.                     // available page width 
  17972.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  17973.                         $wtmp = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  17974.                     } else { 
  17975.                         $wtmp = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  17976.                     } 
  17977.                     // get cell spacing 
  17978.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  17979.                         $clsp = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  17980.                         $cellspacing = array('H' => $clsp, 'V' => $clsp); 
  17981.                     } elseif (isset($dom[$key]['border-spacing'])) { 
  17982.                         $cellspacing = $dom[$key]['border-spacing']; 
  17983.                     } else { 
  17984.                         $cellspacing = array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0); 
  17985.                     } 
  17986.                     // table width 
  17987.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['width'])) { 
  17988.                         $table_width = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['width'], $wtmp, 'px'); 
  17989.                     } else { 
  17990.                         $table_width = $wtmp; 
  17991.                     } 
  17992.                     $table_width -= (2 * $cellspacing['H']); 
  17993.                     if (!$this->inthead) { 
  17994.                         $this->y += $cellspacing['V']; 
  17995.                     } 
  17996.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  17997.                         $cellspacingx = -$cellspacing['H']; 
  17998.                     } else { 
  17999.                         $cellspacingx = $cellspacing['H']; 
  18000.                     } 
  18001.                     // total table width without cellspaces 
  18002.                     $table_columns_width = ($table_width - ($cellspacing['H'] * ($dom[$key]['cols'] - 1))); 
  18003.                     // minimum column width 
  18004.                     $table_min_column_width = ($table_columns_width / $dom[$key]['cols']); 
  18005.                     // array of custom column widths 
  18006.                     $table_colwidths = array_fill(0, $dom[$key]['cols'], $table_min_column_width); 
  18007.                 } 
  18008.                 // table row 
  18009.                 if ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') { 
  18010.                     // reset column counter 
  18011.                     $colid = 0; 
  18012.                 } 
  18013.                 // table cell 
  18014.                 if (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'td') OR ($dom[$key]['value'] == 'th')) { 
  18015.                     $trid = $dom[$key]['parent']; 
  18016.                     $table_el = $dom[$trid]['parent']; 
  18017.                     if (!isset($dom[$table_el]['cols'])) { 
  18018.                         $dom[$table_el]['cols'] = $dom[$trid]['cols']; 
  18019.                     } 
  18020.                     // store border info 
  18021.                     $tdborder = 0; 
  18022.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['border']) AND !empty($dom[$key]['border'])) { 
  18023.                         $tdborder = $dom[$key]['border']; 
  18024.                     } 
  18025.                     $colspan = intval($dom[$key]['attribute']['colspan']); 
  18026.                     if ($colspan <= 0) { 
  18027.                         $colspan = 1; 
  18028.                     } 
  18029.                     $old_cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  18030.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['attribute']['cellpadding'])) { 
  18031.                         $crclpd = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['attribute']['cellpadding'], 1, 'px'); 
  18032.                         $current_cell_padding = array('L' => $crclpd, 'T' => $crclpd, 'R' => $crclpd, 'B' => $crclpd); 
  18033.                     } elseif (isset($dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['padding'])) { 
  18034.                         $current_cell_padding = $dom[($dom[$trid]['parent'])]['padding']; 
  18035.                     } else { 
  18036.                         $current_cell_padding = array('L' => 0, 'T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0); 
  18037.                     } 
  18038.                     $this->cell_padding = $current_cell_padding; 
  18039.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['height'])) { 
  18040.                         // minimum cell height 
  18041.                         $cellh = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$key]['height'], 0, 'px'); 
  18042.                     } else { 
  18043.                         $cellh = 0; 
  18044.                     } 
  18045.                     if (isset($dom[$key]['content'])) { 
  18046.                         $cell_content = stripslashes($dom[$key]['content']); 
  18047.                     } else { 
  18048.                         $cell_content = ' '; 
  18049.                     } 
  18050.                     $tagtype = $dom[$key]['value']; 
  18051.                     $parentid = $key; 
  18052.                     while (($key < $maxel) AND (!(($dom[$key]['tag']) AND (!$dom[$key]['opening']) AND ($dom[$key]['value'] == $tagtype) AND ($dom[$key]['parent'] == $parentid)))) { 
  18053.                         // move $key index forward 
  18054.                         ++$key; 
  18055.                     } 
  18056.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['startpage'])) { 
  18057.                         $dom[$trid]['startpage'] = $this->page; 
  18058.                     } else { 
  18059.                         $this->setPage($dom[$trid]['startpage']); 
  18060.                     } 
  18061.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['startcolumn'])) { 
  18062.                         $dom[$trid]['startcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  18063.                     } elseif ($this->current_column != $dom[$trid]['startcolumn']) { 
  18064.                         $tmpx = $this->x; 
  18065.                         $this->selectColumn($dom[$trid]['startcolumn']); 
  18066.                         $this->x = $tmpx; 
  18067.                     } 
  18068.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['starty'])) { 
  18069.                         $dom[$trid]['starty'] = $this->y; 
  18070.                     } else { 
  18071.                         $this->y = $dom[$trid]['starty']; 
  18072.                     } 
  18073.                     if (!isset($dom[$trid]['startx'])) { 
  18074.                         $dom[$trid]['startx'] = $this->x; 
  18075.                         $this->x += $cellspacingx; 
  18076.                     } else { 
  18077.                         $this->x += ($cellspacingx / 2); 
  18078.                     } 
  18079.                     if (isset($dom[$parentid]['attribute']['rowspan'])) { 
  18080.                         $rowspan = intval($dom[$parentid]['attribute']['rowspan']); 
  18081.                     } else { 
  18082.                         $rowspan = 1; 
  18083.                     } 
  18084.                     // skip row-spanned cells started on the previous rows 
  18085.                     if (isset($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'])) { 
  18086.                         $rsk = 0; 
  18087.                         $rskmax = count($dom[$table_el]['rowspans']); 
  18088.                         while ($rsk < $rskmax) { 
  18089.                             $trwsp = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$rsk]; 
  18090.                             $rsstartx = $trwsp['startx']; 
  18091.                             $rsendx = $trwsp['endx']; 
  18092.                             // account for margin changes 
  18093.                             if ($trwsp['startpage'] < $this->page) { 
  18094.                                 if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['orm'])) { 
  18095.                                     $dl = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['orm']); 
  18096.                                     $rsstartx -= $dl; 
  18097.                                     $rsendx -= $dl; 
  18098.                                 } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['olm'])) { 
  18099.                                     $dl = ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$trwsp['startpage']]['olm']); 
  18100.                                     $rsstartx += $dl; 
  18101.                                     $rsendx += $dl; 
  18102.                                 } 
  18103.                             } 
  18104.                             if (($trwsp['rowspan'] > 0) 
  18105.                                 AND ($rsstartx > ($this->x - $cellspacing['H'] - $current_cell_padding['L'] - $this->feps)) 
  18106.                                 AND ($rsstartx < ($this->x + $cellspacing['H'] + $current_cell_padding['R'] + $this->feps)) 
  18107.                                 AND (($trwsp['starty'] < ($this->y - $this->feps)) OR ($trwsp['startpage'] < $this->page) OR ($trwsp['startcolumn'] < $this->current_column))) { 
  18108.                                 // set the starting X position of the current cell 
  18109.                                 $this->x = $rsendx + $cellspacingx; 
  18110.                                 // increment column indicator 
  18111.                                 $colid += $trwsp['colspan']; 
  18112.                                 if (($trwsp['rowspan'] == 1) 
  18113.                                     AND (isset($dom[$trid]['endy'])) 
  18114.                                     AND (isset($dom[$trid]['endpage'])) 
  18115.                                     AND (isset($dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) 
  18116.                                     AND ($trwsp['endpage'] == $dom[$trid]['endpage']) 
  18117.                                     AND ($trwsp['endcolumn'] == $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18118.                                     // set ending Y position for row 
  18119.                                     $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$rsk]['endy'] = max($dom[$trid]['endy'], $trwsp['endy']); 
  18120.                                     $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$rsk]['endy']; 
  18121.                                 } 
  18122.                                 $rsk = 0; 
  18123.                             } else { 
  18124.                                 ++$rsk; 
  18125.                             } 
  18126.                         } 
  18127.                     } 
  18128.                     if (isset($dom[$parentid]['width'])) { 
  18129.                         // user specified width 
  18130.                         $cellw = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$parentid]['width'], $table_columns_width, 'px'); 
  18131.                         $tmpcw = ($cellw / $colspan); 
  18132.                         for ($i = 0; $i < $colspan; ++$i) { 
  18133.                             $table_colwidths[($colid + $i)] = $tmpcw; 
  18134.                         } 
  18135.                     } else { 
  18136.                         // inherit column width 
  18137.                         $cellw = 0; 
  18138.                         for ($i = 0; $i < $colspan; ++$i) { 
  18139.                             $cellw += $table_colwidths[($colid + $i)]; 
  18140.                         } 
  18141.                     } 
  18142.                     $cellw += (($colspan - 1) * $cellspacing['H']); 
  18143.                     // increment column indicator 
  18144.                     $colid += $colspan; 
  18145.                     // add rowspan information to table element 
  18146.                     if ($rowspan > 1) { 
  18147.                         $trsid = array_push($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'], array('trid' => $trid, 'rowspan' => $rowspan, 'mrowspan' => $rowspan, 'colspan' => $colspan, 'startpage' => $this->page, 'startcolumn' => $this->current_column, 'startx' => $this->x, 'starty' => $this->y)); 
  18148.                     } 
  18149.                     $cellid = array_push($dom[$trid]['cellpos'], array('startx' => $this->x)); 
  18150.                     if ($rowspan > 1) { 
  18151.                         $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['rowspanid'] = ($trsid - 1); 
  18152.                     } 
  18153.                     // push background colors 
  18154.                     if (isset($dom[$parentid]['bgcolor']) AND ($dom[$parentid]['bgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  18155.                         $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['bgcolor'] = $dom[$parentid]['bgcolor']; 
  18156.                     } 
  18157.                     // store border info 
  18158.                     if (isset($tdborder) AND !empty($tdborder)) { 
  18159.                         $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['border'] = $tdborder; 
  18160.                     } 
  18161.                     $prevLastH = $this->lasth; 
  18162.                     // store some info for multicolumn mode 
  18163.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  18164.                         $this->colxshift['x'] = $this->w - $this->x - $this->rMargin; 
  18165.                     } else { 
  18166.                         $this->colxshift['x'] = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  18167.                     } 
  18168.                     $this->colxshift['s'] = $cellspacing; 
  18169.                     $this->colxshift['p'] = $current_cell_padding; 
  18170.                     // ****** write the cell content ****** 
  18171.                     $this->MultiCell($cellw, $cellh, $cell_content, false, $lalign, false, 2, '', '', true, 0, true, true, 0, 'T', false); 
  18172.                     // restore some values 
  18173.                     $this->colxshift = array('x' => 0, 's' => array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0), 'p' => array('L' => 0, 'T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0)); 
  18174.                     $this->lasth = $prevLastH; 
  18175.                     $this->cell_padding = $old_cell_padding; 
  18176.                     $dom[$trid]['cellpos'][($cellid - 1)]['endx'] = $this->x; 
  18177.                     // update the end of row position 
  18178.                     if ($rowspan <= 1) { 
  18179.                         if (isset($dom[$trid]['endy'])) { 
  18180.                             if (($this->page == $dom[$trid]['endpage']) AND ($this->current_column == $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18181.                                 $dom[$trid]['endy'] = max($this->y, $dom[$trid]['endy']); 
  18182.                             } elseif (($this->page > $dom[$trid]['endpage']) OR ($this->current_column > $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18183.                                 $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  18184.                             } 
  18185.                         } else { 
  18186.                             $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  18187.                         } 
  18188.                         if (isset($dom[$trid]['endpage'])) { 
  18189.                             $dom[$trid]['endpage'] = max($this->page, $dom[$trid]['endpage']); 
  18190.                         } else { 
  18191.                             $dom[$trid]['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  18192.                         } 
  18193.                         if (isset($dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18194.                             $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'] = max($this->current_column, $dom[$trid]['endcolumn']); 
  18195.                         } else { 
  18196.                             $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  18197.                         } 
  18198.                     } else { 
  18199.                         // account for row-spanned cells 
  18200.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endx'] = $this->x; 
  18201.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  18202.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  18203.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][($trsid - 1)]['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  18204.                     } 
  18205.                     if (isset($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'])) { 
  18206.                         // update endy and endpage on rowspanned cells 
  18207.                         foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  18208.                             if ($trwsp['rowspan'] > 0) { 
  18209.                                 if (isset($dom[$trid]['endpage'])) { 
  18210.                                     if (($trwsp['endpage'] == $dom[$trid]['endpage']) AND ($trwsp['endcolumn'] == $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18211.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = max($dom[$trid]['endy'], $trwsp['endy']); 
  18212.                                     } elseif (($trwsp['endpage'] < $dom[$trid]['endpage']) OR ($trwsp['endcolumn'] < $dom[$trid]['endcolumn'])) { 
  18213.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = $dom[$trid]['endy']; 
  18214.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] = $dom[$trid]['endpage']; 
  18215.                                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] = $dom[$trid]['endcolumn']; 
  18216.                                     } else { 
  18217.                                         $dom[$trid]['endy'] = $this->pagedim[$dom[$trid]['endpage']]['hk'] - $this->pagedim[$dom[$trid]['endpage']]['bm']; 
  18218.                                     } 
  18219.                                 } 
  18220.                             } 
  18221.                         } 
  18222.                     } 
  18223.                     $this->x += ($cellspacingx / 2); 
  18224.                 } else { 
  18225.                     // opening tag (or self-closing tag) 
  18226.                     if (!isset($opentagpos)) { 
  18227.                         if ($this->inxobj) { 
  18228.                             // we are inside an XObject template 
  18229.                             $opentagpos = strlen($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']); 
  18230.                         } elseif (!$this->InFooter) { 
  18231.                             if (isset($this->footerlen[$this->page])) { 
  18232.                                 $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page] - $this->footerlen[$this->page]; 
  18233.                             } else { 
  18234.                                 $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$this->page]; 
  18235.                             } 
  18236.                             $opentagpos = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  18237.                         } 
  18238.                     } 
  18239.                     $dom = $this->openHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell); 
  18240.                 } 
  18241.             } else { // closing tag 
  18242.                 $prev_numpages = $this->numpages; 
  18243.                 $old_bordermrk = $this->bordermrk[$this->page]; 
  18244.                 $dom = $this->closeHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell, $maxbottomliney); 
  18245.                 if ($this->bordermrk[$this->page] > $old_bordermrk) { 
  18246.                     $startlinepos += ($this->bordermrk[$this->page] - $old_bordermrk); 
  18247.                 } 
  18248.                 if ($prev_numpages > $this->numpages) { 
  18249.                     $startlinepage = $this->page; 
  18250.                 } 
  18251.             } 
  18252.         } elseif (strlen($dom[$key]['value']) > 0) { 
  18253.             // print list-item 
  18254.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lispacer) AND ($this->lispacer != '^')) { 
  18255.                 $this->SetFont($pfontname, $pfontstyle, $pfontsize); 
  18256.                 $this->resetLastH(); 
  18257.                 $minstartliney = $this->y; 
  18258.                 $maxbottomliney = ($startliney + $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize)); 
  18259.                 if (is_numeric($pfontsize) AND ($pfontsize > 0)) { 
  18260.                     $this->putHtmlListBullet($this->listnum, $this->lispacer, $pfontsize); 
  18261.                 } 
  18262.                 $this->SetFont($curfontname, $curfontstyle, $curfontsize); 
  18263.                 $this->resetLastH(); 
  18264.                 if (is_numeric($pfontsize) AND ($pfontsize > 0) AND is_numeric($curfontsize) AND ($curfontsize > 0) AND ($pfontsize != $curfontsize)) { 
  18265.                     $pfontascent = $this->getFontAscent($pfontname, $pfontstyle, $pfontsize); 
  18266.                     $pfontdescent = $this->getFontDescent($pfontname, $pfontstyle, $pfontsize); 
  18267.                     $this->y += ($this->getCellHeight(($pfontsize - $curfontsize) / $this->k) + $pfontascent - $curfontascent - $pfontdescent + $curfontdescent) / 2; 
  18268.                     $minstartliney = min($this->y, $minstartliney); 
  18269.                     $maxbottomliney = max(($this->y + $this->getCellHeight($pfontsize / $this->k)), $maxbottomliney); 
  18270.                 } 
  18271.             } 
  18272.             // text 
  18273.             $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  18274.             if ((!$this->premode) AND $this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  18275.                 // reverse spaces order 
  18276.                 $lsp = ''; // left spaces 
  18277.                 $rsp = ''; // right spaces 
  18278.                 if (preg_match('/^('.$this->re_space['p'].'+)/'.$this->re_space['m'], $dom[$key]['value'], $matches)) { 
  18279.                     $lsp = $matches[1]; 
  18280.                 } 
  18281.                 if (preg_match('/('.$this->re_space['p'].'+)$/'.$this->re_space['m'], $dom[$key]['value'], $matches)) { 
  18282.                     $rsp = $matches[1]; 
  18283.                 } 
  18284.                 $dom[$key]['value'] = $rsp.$this->stringTrim($dom[$key]['value']).$lsp; 
  18285.             } 
  18286.             if ($newline) { 
  18287.                 if (!$this->premode) { 
  18288.                     $prelen = strlen($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18289.                     if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { 
  18290.                         // right trim except non-breaking space 
  18291.                         $dom[$key]['value'] = $this->stringRightTrim($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18292.                     } else { 
  18293.                         // left trim except non-breaking space 
  18294.                         $dom[$key]['value'] = $this->stringLeftTrim($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18295.                     } 
  18296.                     $postlen = strlen($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18297.                     if (($postlen == 0) AND ($prelen > 0)) { 
  18298.                         $dom[$key]['trimmed_space'] = true; 
  18299.                     } 
  18300.                 } 
  18301.                 $newline = false; 
  18302.                 $firstblock = true; 
  18303.             } else { 
  18304.                 $firstblock = false; 
  18305.                 // replace empty multiple spaces string with a single space 
  18306.                 $dom[$key]['value'] = preg_replace('/^'.$this->re_space['p'].'+$/'.$this->re_space['m'], chr(32), $dom[$key]['value']); 
  18307.             } 
  18308.             $strrest = ''; 
  18309.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18310.                 $this->x -= $this->textindent; 
  18311.             } else { 
  18312.                 $this->x += $this->textindent; 
  18313.             } 
  18314.             if (!isset($dom[$key]['trimmed_space']) OR !$dom[$key]['trimmed_space']) { 
  18315.                 $strlinelen = $this->GetStringWidth($dom[$key]['value']); 
  18316.                 if (!empty($this->HREF) AND (isset($this->HREF['url']))) { 
  18317.                     // HTML <a> Link 
  18318.                     $hrefcolor = ''; 
  18319.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fgcolor']) AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  18320.                         $hrefcolor = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fgcolor']; 
  18321.                     } 
  18322.                     $hrefstyle = -1; 
  18323.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontstyle']) AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontstyle'] !== false)) { 
  18324.                         $hrefstyle = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['fontstyle']; 
  18325.                     } 
  18326.                     $strrest = $this->addHtmlLink($this->HREF['url'], $dom[$key]['value'], $wfill, true, $hrefcolor, $hrefstyle, true); 
  18327.                 } else { 
  18328.                     $wadj = 0; // space to leave for block continuity 
  18329.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  18330.                         $cwa = ($this->x - $this->lMargin); 
  18331.                     } else { 
  18332.                         $cwa = ($this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x); 
  18333.                     } 
  18334.                     if (($strlinelen < $cwa) AND (isset($dom[($key + 1)])) AND ($dom[($key + 1)]['tag']) AND (!$dom[($key + 1)]['block'])) { 
  18335.                         // check the next text blocks for continuity 
  18336.                         $nkey = ($key + 1); 
  18337.                         $write_block = true; 
  18338.                         $same_textdir = true; 
  18339.                         $tmp_fontname = $this->FontFamily; 
  18340.                         $tmp_fontstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  18341.                         $tmp_fontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  18342.                         while ($write_block AND isset($dom[$nkey])) { 
  18343.                             if ($dom[$nkey]['tag']) { 
  18344.                                 if ($dom[$nkey]['block']) { 
  18345.                                     // end of block 
  18346.                                     $write_block = false; 
  18347.                                 } 
  18348.                                 $tmp_fontname = isset($dom[$nkey]['fontname']) ? $dom[$nkey]['fontname'] : $this->FontFamily; 
  18349.                                 $tmp_fontstyle = isset($dom[$nkey]['fontstyle']) ? $dom[$nkey]['fontstyle'] : $this->FontStyle; 
  18350.                                 $tmp_fontsize = isset($dom[$nkey]['fontsize']) ? $dom[$nkey]['fontsize'] : $this->FontSizePt; 
  18351.                                 $same_textdir = ($dom[$nkey]['dir'] == $dom[$key]['dir']); 
  18352.                             } else { 
  18353.                                 $nextstr = TCPDF_STATIC::pregSplit('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+/', $this->re_space['m'], $dom[$nkey]['value']); 
  18354.                                 if (isset($nextstr[0]) AND $same_textdir) { 
  18355.                                     $wadj += $this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[0], $tmp_fontname, $tmp_fontstyle, $tmp_fontsize); 
  18356.                                     if (isset($nextstr[1])) { 
  18357.                                         $write_block = false; 
  18358.                                     } 
  18359.                                 } 
  18360.                             } 
  18361.                             ++$nkey; 
  18362.                         } 
  18363.                     } 
  18364.                     if (($wadj > 0) AND (($strlinelen + $wadj) >= $cwa)) { 
  18365.                         $wadj = 0; 
  18366.                         $nextstr = TCPDF_STATIC::pregSplit('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'/', $this->re_space['m'], $dom[$key]['value']); 
  18367.                         $numblks = count($nextstr); 
  18368.                         if ($numblks > 1) { 
  18369.                             // try to split on blank spaces 
  18370.                             $wadj = ($cwa - $strlinelen + $this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[($numblks - 1)])); 
  18371.                         } else { 
  18372.                             // set the entire block on new line 
  18373.                             $wadj = $this->GetStringWidth($nextstr[0]); 
  18374.                         } 
  18375.                     } 
  18376.                     // check for reversed text direction 
  18377.                     if (($wadj > 0) AND (($this->rtl AND ($this->tmprtl === 'L')) OR (!$this->rtl AND ($this->tmprtl === 'R')))) { 
  18378.                         // LTR text on RTL direction or RTL text on LTR direction 
  18379.                         $reverse_dir = true; 
  18380.                         $this->rtl = !$this->rtl; 
  18381.                         $revshift = ($strlinelen + $wadj + 0.000001); // add little quantity for rounding problems 
  18382.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  18383.                             $this->x += $revshift; 
  18384.                         } else { 
  18385.                             $this->x -= $revshift; 
  18386.                         } 
  18387.                         $xws = $this->x; 
  18388.                     } 
  18389.                     // ****** write only until the end of the line and get the rest ****** 
  18390.                     $strrest = $this->Write($this->lasth, $dom[$key]['value'], '', $wfill, '', false, 0, true, $firstblock, 0, $wadj); 
  18391.                     // restore default direction 
  18392.                     if ($reverse_dir AND ($wadj == 0)) { 
  18393.                         $this->x = $xws; 
  18394.                         $this->rtl = !$this->rtl; 
  18395.                         $reverse_dir = false; 
  18396.                     } 
  18397.                 } 
  18398.             } 
  18399.             $this->textindent = 0; 
  18400.             if (strlen($strrest) > 0) { 
  18401.                 // store the remaining string on the previous $key position 
  18402.                 $this->newline = true; 
  18403.                 if ($strrest == $dom[$key]['value']) { 
  18404.                     // used to avoid infinite loop 
  18405.                     ++$loop; 
  18406.                 } else { 
  18407.                     $loop = 0; 
  18408.                 } 
  18409.                 $dom[$key]['value'] = $strrest; 
  18410.                 if ($cell) { 
  18411.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  18412.                         $this->x -= $this->cell_padding['R']; 
  18413.                     } else { 
  18414.                         $this->x += $this->cell_padding['L']; 
  18415.                     } 
  18416.                 } 
  18417.                 if ($loop < 3) { 
  18418.                     --$key; 
  18419.                 } 
  18420.             } else { 
  18421.                 $loop = 0; 
  18422.                 // add the positive font spacing of the last character (if any) 
  18423.                  if ($this->font_spacing > 0) { 
  18424.                      if ($this->rtl) { 
  18425.                         $this->x -= $this->font_spacing; 
  18426.                     } else { 
  18427.                         $this->x += $this->font_spacing; 
  18428.                     } 
  18429.                 } 
  18430.             } 
  18431.         } 
  18432.         ++$key; 
  18433.         if (isset($dom[$key]['tag']) AND $dom[$key]['tag'] AND (!isset($dom[$key]['opening']) OR !$dom[$key]['opening']) AND isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr']) AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['nobr'] == 'true')) { 
  18434.             // check if we are on a new page or on a new column 
  18435.             if ((!$undo) AND (($this->y < $this->start_transaction_y) OR (($dom[$key]['value'] == 'tr') AND ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] < $this->start_transaction_y)))) { 
  18436.                 // we are on a new page or on a new column and the total object height is less than the available vertical space. 
  18437.                 // restore previous object 
  18438.                 $this->rollbackTransaction(true); 
  18439.                 // restore previous values 
  18440.                 foreach ($this_method_vars as $vkey => $vval) { 
  18441.                     $$vkey = $vval; 
  18442.                 } 
  18443.                 if (!empty($dom[$key]['thead'])) { 
  18444.                     $this->inthead = true; 
  18445.                 } 
  18446.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  18447.                 $pre_y = $this->y; 
  18448.                 if ((!$this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1)) AND ($this->y < $pre_y)) { 
  18449.                     $startliney = $this->y; 
  18450.                 } 
  18451.                 $undo = true; // avoid infinite loop 
  18452.             } else { 
  18453.                 $undo = false; 
  18454.             } 
  18455.         } 
  18456.     } // end for each $key 
  18457.     // align the last line 
  18458.     if (isset($startlinex)) { 
  18459.         $yshift = ($minstartliney - $startliney); 
  18460.         if (($yshift > 0) OR ($this->page > $startlinepage)) { 
  18461.             $yshift = 0; 
  18462.         } 
  18463.         $t_x = 0; 
  18464.         // the last line must be shifted to be aligned as requested 
  18465.         $linew = abs($this->endlinex - $startlinex); 
  18466.         if ($this->inxobj) { 
  18467.             // we are inside an XObject template 
  18468.             $pstart = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], 0, $startlinepos); 
  18469.             if (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  18470.                 $midpos = $opentagpos; 
  18471.             } else { 
  18472.                 $midpos = 0; 
  18473.             } 
  18474.             if ($midpos > 0) { 
  18475.                 $pmid = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $startlinepos, ($midpos - $startlinepos)); 
  18476.                 $pend = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $midpos); 
  18477.             } else { 
  18478.                 $pmid = substr($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'], $startlinepos); 
  18479.                 $pend = ''; 
  18480.             } 
  18481.         } else { 
  18482.             $pstart = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), 0, $startlinepos); 
  18483.             if (isset($opentagpos) AND isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage]) AND (!$this->InFooter)) { 
  18484.                 $this->footerpos[$startlinepage] = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  18485.                 $midpos = min($opentagpos, $this->footerpos[$startlinepage]); 
  18486.             } elseif (isset($opentagpos)) { 
  18487.                 $midpos = $opentagpos; 
  18488.             } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$startlinepage]) AND (!$this->InFooter)) { 
  18489.                 $this->footerpos[$startlinepage] = $this->pagelen[$startlinepage] - $this->footerlen[$startlinepage]; 
  18490.                 $midpos = $this->footerpos[$startlinepage]; 
  18491.             } else { 
  18492.                 $midpos = 0; 
  18493.             } 
  18494.             if ($midpos > 0) {
