  18495.                 $pmid = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $startlinepos, ($midpos - $startlinepos)); 
  18496.                 $pend = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $midpos); 
  18497.             } else { 
  18498.                 $pmid = substr($this->getPageBuffer($startlinepage), $startlinepos); 
  18499.                 $pend = ''; 
  18500.             } 
  18501.         } 
  18502.         if ((isset($plalign) AND ((($plalign == 'C') OR (($plalign == 'R') AND (!$this->rtl)) OR (($plalign == 'L') AND ($this->rtl)))))) { 
  18503.             // calculate shifting amount 
  18504.             $tw = $w; 
  18505.             if ($this->lMargin != $prevlMargin) { 
  18506.                 $tw += ($prevlMargin - $this->lMargin); 
  18507.             } 
  18508.             if ($this->rMargin != $prevrMargin) { 
  18509.                 $tw += ($prevrMargin - $this->rMargin); 
  18510.             } 
  18511.             $one_space_width = $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)); 
  18512.             $no = 0; // number of spaces on a line contained on a single block 
  18513.             if ($this->isRTLTextDir()) { // RTL 
  18514.                 // remove left space if exist 
  18515.                 $pos1 = TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('); 
  18516.                 if ($pos1 > 0) { 
  18517.                     $pos1 = intval($pos1); 
  18518.                     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  18519.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('.chr(0).chr(32))); 
  18520.                         $spacelen = 2; 
  18521.                     } else { 
  18522.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, '[('.chr(32))); 
  18523.                         $spacelen = 1; 
  18524.                     } 
  18525.                     if ($pos1 == $pos2) { 
  18526.                         $pmid = substr($pmid, 0, ($pos1 + 2)).substr($pmid, ($pos1 + 2 + $spacelen)); 
  18527.                         if (substr($pmid, $pos1, 4) == '[()]') { 
  18528.                             $linew -= $one_space_width; 
  18529.                         } elseif ($pos1 == strpos($pmid, '[(')) { 
  18530.                             $no = 1; 
  18531.                         } 
  18532.                     } 
  18533.                 } 
  18534.             } else { // LTR 
  18535.                 // remove right space if exist 
  18536.                 $pos1 = TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, ')]'); 
  18537.                 if ($pos1 > 0) { 
  18538.                     $pos1 = intval($pos1); 
  18539.                     if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  18540.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, chr(0).chr(32).')]')) + 2; 
  18541.                         $spacelen = 2; 
  18542.                     } else { 
  18543.                         $pos2 = intval(TCPDF_STATIC::revstrpos($pmid, chr(32).')]')) + 1; 
  18544.                         $spacelen = 1; 
  18545.                     } 
  18546.                     if ($pos1 == $pos2) { 
  18547.                         $pmid = substr($pmid, 0, ($pos1 - $spacelen)).substr($pmid, $pos1); 
  18548.                         $linew -= $one_space_width; 
  18549.                     } 
  18550.                 } 
  18551.             } 
  18552.             $mdiff = ($tw - $linew); 
  18553.             if ($plalign == 'C') { 
  18554.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  18555.                     $t_x = -($mdiff / 2); 
  18556.                 } else { 
  18557.                     $t_x = ($mdiff / 2); 
  18558.                 } 
  18559.             } elseif ($plalign == 'R') { 
  18560.                 // right alignment on LTR document 
  18561.                 $t_x = $mdiff; 
  18562.             } elseif ($plalign == 'L') { 
  18563.                 // left alignment on RTL document 
  18564.                 $t_x = -$mdiff; 
  18565.             } 
  18566.         } // end if startlinex 
  18567.         if (($t_x != 0) OR ($yshift < 0)) { 
  18568.             // shift the line 
  18569.             $trx = sprintf('1 0 0 1 %F %F cm', ($t_x * $this->k), ($yshift * $this->k)); 
  18570.             $pstart .= "\nq\n".$trx."\n".$pmid."\nQ\n"; 
  18571.             $endlinepos = strlen($pstart); 
  18572.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  18573.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  18574.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$pend; 
  18575.                 foreach ($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'] as $pak => $pac) { 
  18576.                     if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  18577.                         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  18578.                         $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  18579.                     } 
  18580.                 } 
  18581.             } else { 
  18582.                 $this->setPageBuffer($startlinepage, $pstart.$pend); 
  18583.                 // shift the annotations and links 
  18584.                 if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->page])) { 
  18585.                     foreach ($this->PageAnnots[$this->page] as $pak => $pac) { 
  18586.                         if ($pak >= $pask) { 
  18587.                             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['x'] += $t_x; 
  18588.                             $this->PageAnnots[$this->page][$pak]['y'] -= $yshift; 
  18589.                         } 
  18590.                     } 
  18591.                 } 
  18592.             } 
  18593.             $this->y -= $yshift; 
  18594.             $yshift = 0; 
  18595.         } 
  18596.     } 
  18597.     // restore previous values 
  18598.     $this->setGraphicVars($gvars); 
  18599.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  18600.         $this->selectColumn(); 
  18601.     } elseif ($this->page > $prevPage) { 
  18602.         $this->lMargin = $this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm']; 
  18603.         $this->rMargin = $this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm']; 
  18604.     } 
  18605.     // restore previous list state 
  18606.     $this->cell_height_ratio = $prev_cell_height_ratio; 
  18607.     $this->listnum = $prev_listnum; 
  18608.     $this->listordered = $prev_listordered; 
  18609.     $this->listcount = $prev_listcount; 
  18610.     $this->lispacer = $prev_lispacer; 
  18611.     if ($ln AND (!($cell AND ($dom[$key-1]['value'] == 'table')))) { 
  18612.         $this->Ln($this->lasth); 
  18613.         if ($this->y < $maxbottomliney) { 
  18614.             $this->y = $maxbottomliney; 
  18615.         } 
  18616.     } 
  18617.     unset($dom); 
  18618. } 
  18619.  
  18620. /** 
  18621.  * Process opening tags. 
  18622.  * @param $dom (array) html dom array 
  18623.  * @param $key (int) current element id 
  18624.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the default left (or right if RTL) padding to each new line (default false). 
  18625.  * @return $dom array 
  18626.  * @protected 
  18627.  */ 
  18628. protected function openHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell) { 
  18629.     $tag = $dom[$key]; 
  18630.     $parent = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]; 
  18631.     $firsttag = ($key == 1); 
  18632.     // check for text direction attribute 
  18633.     if (isset($tag['dir'])) { 
  18634.         $this->setTempRTL($tag['dir']); 
  18635.     } else { 
  18636.         $this->tmprtl = false; 
  18637.     } 
  18638.     if ($tag['block']) { 
  18639.         $hbz = 0; // distance from y to line bottom 
  18640.         $hb = 0; // vertical space between block tags 
  18641.         // calculate vertical space for block tags 
  18642.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['h']) AND ($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['h'] >= 0)) { 
  18643.             $cur_h = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['h']; 
  18644.         } elseif (isset($tag['fontsize'])) { 
  18645.             $cur_h = $this->getCellHeight($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k); 
  18646.         } else { 
  18647.             $cur_h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  18648.         } 
  18649.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['n'])) { 
  18650.             $on = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][0]['n']; 
  18651.         } elseif (preg_match('/[h][0-9]/', $tag['value']) > 0) { 
  18652.             $on = 0.6; 
  18653.         } else { 
  18654.             $on = 1; 
  18655.         } 
  18656.         if ((!isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']])) AND (in_array($tag['value'], array('div', 'dt', 'dd', 'li', 'br', 'hr')))) { 
  18657.             $hb = 0; 
  18658.         } else { 
  18659.             $hb = ($on * $cur_h); 
  18660.         } 
  18661.         if (($this->htmlvspace <= 0) AND ($on > 0)) { 
  18662.             if (isset($parent['fontsize'])) { 
  18663.                 $hbz = (($parent['fontsize'] / $this->k) * $this->cell_height_ratio); 
  18664.             } else { 
  18665.                 $hbz = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  18666.             } 
  18667.         } 
  18668.         if (isset($dom[($key - 1)]) AND ($dom[($key - 1)]['value'] == 'table')) { 
  18669.             // fix vertical space after table 
  18670.             $hbz = 0; 
  18671.         } 
  18672.         // closing vertical space 
  18673.         $hbc = 0; 
  18674.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']) AND ($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h'] >= 0)) { 
  18675.             $pre_h = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']; 
  18676.         } elseif (isset($parent['fontsize'])) { 
  18677.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($parent['fontsize'] / $this->k); 
  18678.         } else { 
  18679.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  18680.         } 
  18681.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n'])) { 
  18682.             $cn = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n']; 
  18683.         } elseif (preg_match('/[h][0-9]/', $tag['value']) > 0) { 
  18684.             $cn = 0.6; 
  18685.         } else { 
  18686.             $cn = 1; 
  18687.         } 
  18688.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1])) { 
  18689.             $hbc = ($cn * $pre_h); 
  18690.         } 
  18691.     } 
  18692.     // Opening tag 
  18693.     switch($tag['value']) { 
  18694.         case 'table': { 
  18695.             $cp = 0; 
  18696.             $cs = 0; 
  18697.             $dom[$key]['rowspans'] = array(); 
  18698.             if (!isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['nested']) OR ($dom[$key]['attribute']['nested'] != 'true')) { 
  18699.                 $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  18700.                 // set table header 
  18701.                 if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($dom[$key]['thead'])) { 
  18702.                     // set table header 
  18703.                     $this->thead = $dom[$key]['thead']; 
  18704.                     if (!isset($this->theadMargins) OR (empty($this->theadMargins))) { 
  18705.                         $this->theadMargins = array(); 
  18706.                         $this->theadMargins['cell_padding'] = $this->cell_padding; 
  18707.                         $this->theadMargins['lmargin'] = $this->lMargin; 
  18708.                         $this->theadMargins['rmargin'] = $this->rMargin; 
  18709.                         $this->theadMargins['page'] = $this->page; 
  18710.                         $this->theadMargins['cell'] = $cell; 
  18711.                         $this->theadMargins['gvars'] = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  18712.                     } 
  18713.                 } 
  18714.             } 
  18715.             // store current margins and page 
  18716.             $dom[$key]['old_cell_padding'] = $this->cell_padding; 
  18717.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['cellpadding'])) { 
  18718.                 $pad = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['attribute']['cellpadding'], 1, 'px'); 
  18719.                 $this->SetCellPadding($pad); 
  18720.             } elseif (isset($tag['padding'])) { 
  18721.                 $this->cell_padding = $tag['padding']; 
  18722.             } 
  18723.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  18724.                 $cs = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  18725.             } elseif (isset($tag['border-spacing'])) { 
  18726.                 $cs = $tag['border-spacing']['V']; 
  18727.             } 
  18728.             $prev_y = $this->y; 
  18729.             if ($this->checkPageBreak(((2 * $cp) + (2 * $cs) + $this->lasth), '', false) OR ($this->y < $prev_y)) { 
  18730.                 $this->inthead = true; 
  18731.                 // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  18732.                 $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  18733.             } 
  18734.             break; 
  18735.         } 
  18736.         case 'tr': { 
  18737.             // array of columns positions 
  18738.             $dom[$key]['cellpos'] = array(); 
  18739.             break; 
  18740.         } 
  18741.         case 'hr': { 
  18742.             if ((isset($tag['height'])) AND ($tag['height'] != '')) { 
  18743.                 $hrHeight = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['height'], 1, 'px'); 
  18744.             } else { 
  18745.                 $hrHeight = $this->GetLineWidth(); 
  18746.             } 
  18747.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, max($hb, ($hrHeight / 2)), $cell, $firsttag); 
  18748.             $x = $this->GetX(); 
  18749.             $y = $this->GetY(); 
  18750.             $wtmp = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  18751.             if ($cell) { 
  18752.                 $wtmp -= ($this->cell_padding['L'] + $this->cell_padding['R']); 
  18753.             } 
  18754.             if ((isset($tag['width'])) AND ($tag['width'] != '')) { 
  18755.                 $hrWidth = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['width'], $wtmp, 'px'); 
  18756.             } else { 
  18757.                 $hrWidth = $wtmp; 
  18758.             } 
  18759.             $prevlinewidth = $this->GetLineWidth(); 
  18760.             $this->SetLineWidth($hrHeight); 
  18761.             $this->Line($x, $y, $x + $hrWidth, $y); 
  18762.             $this->SetLineWidth($prevlinewidth); 
  18763.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(max($hbc, ($hrHeight / 2)), 0, $cell, !isset($dom[($key + 1)])); 
  18764.             break; 
  18765.         } 
  18766.         case 'a': { 
  18767.             if (array_key_exists('href', $tag['attribute'])) { 
  18768.                 $this->HREF['url'] = $tag['attribute']['href']; 
  18769.             } 
  18770.             break; 
  18771.         } 
  18772.         case 'img': { 
  18773.             if (!empty($tag['attribute']['src'])) { 
  18774.                 if ($tag['attribute']['src'][0] === '@') { 
  18775.                     // data stream 
  18776.                     $tag['attribute']['src'] = '@'.base64_decode(substr($tag['attribute']['src'], 1)); 
  18777.                     $type = ''; 
  18778.                 } else { 
  18779.                     // get image type 
  18780.                     $type = TCPDF_IMAGES::getImageFileType($tag['attribute']['src']); 
  18781.                 } 
  18782.                 if (!isset($tag['width'])) { 
  18783.                     $tag['width'] = 0; 
  18784.                 } 
  18785.                 if (!isset($tag['height'])) { 
  18786.                     $tag['height'] = 0; 
  18787.                 } 
  18788.                 //if (!isset($tag['attribute']['align'])) { 
  18789.                     // the only alignment supported is "bottom" 
  18790.                     // further development is required for other modes. 
  18791.                     $tag['attribute']['align'] = 'bottom'; 
  18792.                 //} 
  18793.                 switch($tag['attribute']['align']) { 
  18794.                     case 'top': { 
  18795.                         $align = 'T'; 
  18796.                         break; 
  18797.                     } 
  18798.                     case 'middle': { 
  18799.                         $align = 'M'; 
  18800.                         break; 
  18801.                     } 
  18802.                     case 'bottom': { 
  18803.                         $align = 'B'; 
  18804.                         break; 
  18805.                     } 
  18806.                     default: { 
  18807.                         $align = 'B'; 
  18808.                         break; 
  18809.                     } 
  18810.                 } 
  18811.                 $prevy = $this->y; 
  18812.                 $xpos = $this->x; 
  18813.                 $imglink = ''; 
  18814.                 if (isset($this->HREF['url']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->HREF['url'])) { 
  18815.                     $imglink = $this->HREF['url']; 
  18816.                     if ($imglink[0] == '#') { 
  18817.                         // convert url to internal link 
  18818.                         $lnkdata = explode(', ', $imglink); 
  18819.                         if (isset($lnkdata[0])) { 
  18820.                             $page = intval(substr($lnkdata[0], 1)); 
  18821.                             if (empty($page) OR ($page <= 0)) { 
  18822.                                 $page = $this->page; 
  18823.                             } 
  18824.                             if (isset($lnkdata[1]) AND (strlen($lnkdata[1]) > 0)) { 
  18825.                                 $lnky = floatval($lnkdata[1]); 
  18826.                             } else { 
  18827.                                 $lnky = 0; 
  18828.                             } 
  18829.                             $imglink = $this->AddLink(); 
  18830.                             $this->SetLink($imglink, $lnky, $page); 
  18831.                         } 
  18832.                     } 
  18833.                 } 
  18834.                 $border = 0; 
  18835.                 if (isset($tag['border']) AND !empty($tag['border'])) { 
  18836.                     // currently only support 1 (frame) or a combination of 'LTRB' 
  18837.                     $border = $tag['border']; 
  18838.                 } 
  18839.                 $iw = ''; 
  18840.                 if (isset($tag['width'])) { 
  18841.                     $iw = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['width'], ($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k), 'px', false); 
  18842.                 } 
  18843.                 $ih = ''; 
  18844.                 if (isset($tag['height'])) { 
  18845.                     $ih = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['height'], ($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k), 'px', false); 
  18846.                 } 
  18847.                 if (($type == 'eps') OR ($type == 'ai')) { 
  18848.                     $this->ImageEps($tag['attribute']['src'], $xpos, $this->y, $iw, $ih, $imglink, true, $align, '', $border, true); 
  18849.                 } elseif ($type == 'svg') { 
  18850.                     $this->ImageSVG($tag['attribute']['src'], $xpos, $this->y, $iw, $ih, $imglink, $align, '', $border, true); 
  18851.                 } else { 
  18852.                     $this->Image($tag['attribute']['src'], $xpos, $this->y, $iw, $ih, '', $imglink, $align, false, 300, '', false, false, $border, false, false, true); 
  18853.                 } 
  18854.                 switch($align) { 
  18855.                     case 'T': { 
  18856.                         $this->y = $prevy; 
  18857.                         break; 
  18858.                     } 
  18859.                     case 'M': { 
  18860.                         $this->y = (($this->img_rb_y + $prevy - ($this->getCellHeight($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k))) / 2); 
  18861.                         break; 
  18862.                     } 
  18863.                     case 'B': { 
  18864.                         $this->y = $this->img_rb_y - ($this->getCellHeight($tag['fontsize'] / $this->k) - ($this->getFontDescent($tag['fontname'], $tag['fontstyle'], $tag['fontsize']) * $this->cell_height_ratio)); 
  18865.                         break; 
  18866.                     } 
  18867.                 } 
  18868.             } 
  18869.             break; 
  18870.         } 
  18871.         case 'dl': { 
  18872.             ++$this->listnum; 
  18873.             if ($this->listnum == 1) { 
  18874.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18875.             } else { 
  18876.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18877.             } 
  18878.             break; 
  18879.         } 
  18880.         case 'dt': { 
  18881.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18882.             break; 
  18883.         } 
  18884.         case 'dd': { 
  18885.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18886.                 $this->rMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18887.             } else { 
  18888.                 $this->lMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18889.             } 
  18890.             ++$this->listindentlevel; 
  18891.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18892.             break; 
  18893.         } 
  18894.         case 'ul': 
  18895.         case 'ol': { 
  18896.             ++$this->listnum; 
  18897.             if ($tag['value'] == 'ol') { 
  18898.                 $this->listordered[$this->listnum] = true; 
  18899.             } else { 
  18900.                 $this->listordered[$this->listnum] = false; 
  18901.             } 
  18902.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['start'])) { 
  18903.                 $this->listcount[$this->listnum] = intval($tag['attribute']['start']) - 1; 
  18904.             } else { 
  18905.                 $this->listcount[$this->listnum] = 0; 
  18906.             } 
  18907.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18908.                 $this->rMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18909.                 $this->x -= $this->listindent; 
  18910.             } else { 
  18911.                 $this->lMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18912.                 $this->x += $this->listindent; 
  18913.             } 
  18914.             ++$this->listindentlevel; 
  18915.             if ($this->listnum == 1) { 
  18916.                 if ($key > 1) { 
  18917.                     $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18918.                 } 
  18919.             } else { 
  18920.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18921.             } 
  18922.             break; 
  18923.         } 
  18924.         case 'li': { 
  18925.             if ($key > 2) { 
  18926.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18927.             } 
  18928.             if ($this->listordered[$this->listnum]) { 
  18929.                 // ordered item 
  18930.                 if (isset($parent['attribute']['type']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['attribute']['type'])) { 
  18931.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['attribute']['type']; 
  18932.                 } elseif (isset($parent['listtype']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['listtype'])) { 
  18933.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['listtype']; 
  18934.                 } elseif (isset($this->lisymbol) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lisymbol)) { 
  18935.                     $this->lispacer = $this->lisymbol; 
  18936.                 } else { 
  18937.                     $this->lispacer = '#'; 
  18938.                 } 
  18939.                 ++$this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  18940.                 if (isset($tag['attribute']['value'])) { 
  18941.                     $this->listcount[$this->listnum] = intval($tag['attribute']['value']); 
  18942.                 } 
  18943.             } else { 
  18944.                 // unordered item 
  18945.                 if (isset($parent['attribute']['type']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['attribute']['type'])) { 
  18946.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['attribute']['type']; 
  18947.                 } elseif (isset($parent['listtype']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($parent['listtype'])) { 
  18948.                     $this->lispacer = $parent['listtype']; 
  18949.                 } elseif (isset($this->lisymbol) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->lisymbol)) { 
  18950.                     $this->lispacer = $this->lisymbol; 
  18951.                 } else { 
  18952.                     $this->lispacer = '!'; 
  18953.                 } 
  18954.             } 
  18955.             break; 
  18956.         } 
  18957.         case 'blockquote': { 
  18958.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  18959.                 $this->rMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18960.             } else { 
  18961.                 $this->lMargin += $this->listindent; 
  18962.             } 
  18963.             ++$this->listindentlevel; 
  18964.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18965.             break; 
  18966.         } 
  18967.         case 'br': { 
  18968.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18969.             break; 
  18970.         } 
  18971.         case 'div': { 
  18972.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18973.             break; 
  18974.         } 
  18975.         case 'p': { 
  18976.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18977.             break; 
  18978.         } 
  18979.         case 'pre': { 
  18980.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18981.             $this->premode = true; 
  18982.             break; 
  18983.         } 
  18984.         case 'sup': { 
  18985.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() - ((0.7 * $this->FontSizePt) / $this->k)); 
  18986.             break; 
  18987.         } 
  18988.         case 'sub': { 
  18989.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() + ((0.3 * $this->FontSizePt) / $this->k)); 
  18990.             break; 
  18991.         } 
  18992.         case 'h1': 
  18993.         case 'h2': 
  18994.         case 'h3': 
  18995.         case 'h4': 
  18996.         case 'h5': 
  18997.         case 'h6': { 
  18998.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, $firsttag); 
  18999.             break; 
  19000.         } 
  19001.         // Form fields (since 4.8.000 - 2009-09-07) 
  19002.         case 'form': { 
  19003.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['action'])) { 
  19004.                 $this->form_action = $tag['attribute']['action']; 
  19005.             } else { 
  19006.                 $this->Error('Please explicitly set action attribute path!'); 
  19007.             } 
  19008.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['enctype'])) { 
  19009.                 $this->form_enctype = $tag['attribute']['enctype']; 
  19010.             } else { 
  19011.                 $this->form_enctype = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'; 
  19012.             } 
  19013.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['method'])) { 
  19014.                 $this->form_mode = $tag['attribute']['method']; 
  19015.             } else { 
  19016.                 $this->form_mode = 'post'; 
  19017.             } 
  19018.             break; 
  19019.         } 
  19020.         case 'input': { 
  19021.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['name'])) { 
  19022.                 $name = $tag['attribute']['name']; 
  19023.             } else { 
  19024.                 break; 
  19025.             } 
  19026.             $prop = array(); 
  19027.             $opt = array(); 
  19028.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['readonly']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['readonly'])) { 
  19029.                 $prop['readonly'] = true; 
  19030.             } 
  19031.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['value']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['value'])) { 
  19032.                 $value = $tag['attribute']['value']; 
  19033.             } 
  19034.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['maxlength']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['maxlength'])) { 
  19035.                 $opt['maxlen'] = intval($tag['attribute']['maxlength']); 
  19036.             } 
  19037.             $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19038.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['size']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['size'])) { 
  19039.                 $w = intval($tag['attribute']['size']) * $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)) * 2; 
  19040.             } else { 
  19041.                 $w = $h; 
  19042.             } 
  19043.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['checked']) AND (($tag['attribute']['checked'] == 'checked') OR ($tag['attribute']['checked'] == 'true'))) { 
  19044.                 $checked = true; 
  19045.             } else { 
  19046.                 $checked = false; 
  19047.             } 
  19048.             if (isset($tag['align'])) { 
  19049.                 switch ($tag['align']) { 
  19050.                     case 'C': { 
  19051.                         $opt['q'] = 1; 
  19052.                         break; 
  19053.                     } 
  19054.                     case 'R': { 
  19055.                         $opt['q'] = 2; 
  19056.                         break; 
  19057.                     } 
  19058.                     case 'L': 
  19059.                     default: { 
  19060.                         break; 
  19061.                     } 
  19062.                 } 
  19063.             } 
  19064.             switch ($tag['attribute']['type']) { 
  19065.                 case 'text': { 
  19066.                     if (isset($value)) { 
  19067.                         $opt['v'] = $value; 
  19068.                     } 
  19069.                     $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19070.                     break; 
  19071.                 } 
  19072.                 case 'password': { 
  19073.                     if (isset($value)) { 
  19074.                         $opt['v'] = $value; 
  19075.                     } 
  19076.                     $prop['password'] = 'true'; 
  19077.                     $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19078.                     break; 
  19079.                 } 
  19080.                 case 'checkbox': { 
  19081.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19082.                         break; 
  19083.                     } 
  19084.                     $this->CheckBox($name, $w, $checked, $prop, $opt, $value, '', '', false); 
  19085.                     break; 
  19086.                 } 
  19087.                 case 'radio': { 
  19088.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19089.                         break; 
  19090.                     } 
  19091.                     $this->RadioButton($name, $w, $prop, $opt, $value, $checked, '', '', false); 
  19092.                     break; 
  19093.                 } 
  19094.                 case 'submit': { 
  19095.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19096.                         $value = 'submit'; 
  19097.                     } 
  19098.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 1.5; 
  19099.                     $h *= 1.6; 
  19100.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19101.                     $action = array(); 
  19102.                     $action['S'] = 'SubmitForm'; 
  19103.                     $action['F'] = $this->form_action; 
  19104.                     if ($this->form_enctype != 'FDF') { 
  19105.                         $action['Flags'] = array('ExportFormat'); 
  19106.                     } 
  19107.                     if ($this->form_mode == 'get') { 
  19108.                         $action['Flags'] = array('GetMethod'); 
  19109.                     } 
  19110.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, $action, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19111.                     break; 
  19112.                 } 
  19113.                 case 'reset': { 
  19114.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19115.                         $value = 'reset'; 
  19116.                     } 
  19117.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 1.5; 
  19118.                     $h *= 1.6; 
  19119.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19120.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, array('S'=>'ResetForm'), $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19121.                     break; 
  19122.                 } 
  19123.                 case 'file': { 
  19124.                     $prop['fileSelect'] = 'true'; 
  19125.                     $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19126.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19127.                         $value = '*'; 
  19128.                     } 
  19129.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 2; 
  19130.                     $h *= 1.2; 
  19131.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19132.                     $jsaction = 'var f=this.getField(\''.$name.'\'); f.browseForFileToSubmit();'; 
  19133.                     $this->Button('FB_'.$name, $w, $h, $value, $jsaction, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19134.                     break; 
  19135.                 } 
  19136.                 case 'hidden': { 
  19137.                     if (isset($value)) { 
  19138.                         $opt['v'] = $value; 
  19139.                     } 
  19140.                     $opt['f'] = array('invisible', 'hidden'); 
  19141.                     $this->TextField($name, 0, 0, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19142.                     break; 
  19143.                 } 
  19144.                 case 'image': { 
  19145.                     // THIS TYPE MUST BE FIXED 
  19146.                     if (isset($tag['attribute']['src']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['src'])) { 
  19147.                         $img = $tag['attribute']['src']; 
  19148.                     } else { 
  19149.                         break; 
  19150.                     } 
  19151.                     $value = 'img'; 
  19152.                     //$opt['mk'] = array('i'=>$img, 'tp'=>1, 'if'=>array('sw'=>'A', 's'=>'A', 'fb'=>false)); 
  19153.                     if (isset($tag['attribute']['onclick']) AND !empty($tag['attribute']['onclick'])) { 
  19154.                         $jsaction = $tag['attribute']['onclick']; 
  19155.                     } else { 
  19156.                         $jsaction = ''; 
  19157.                     } 
  19158.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, $jsaction, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19159.                     break; 
  19160.                 } 
  19161.                 case 'button': { 
  19162.                     if (!isset($value)) { 
  19163.                         $value = ' '; 
  19164.                     } 
  19165.                     $w = $this->GetStringWidth($value) * 1.5; 
  19166.                     $h *= 1.6; 
  19167.                     $prop = array('lineWidth'=>1, 'borderStyle'=>'beveled', 'fillColor'=>array(196, 196, 196), 'strokeColor'=>array(255, 255, 255)); 
  19168.                     if (isset($tag['attribute']['onclick']) AND !empty($tag['attribute']['onclick'])) { 
  19169.                         $jsaction = $tag['attribute']['onclick']; 
  19170.                     } else { 
  19171.                         $jsaction = ''; 
  19172.                     } 
  19173.                     $this->Button($name, $w, $h, $value, $jsaction, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19174.                     break; 
  19175.                 } 
  19176.             } 
  19177.             break; 
  19178.         } 
  19179.         case 'textarea': { 
  19180.             $prop = array(); 
  19181.             $opt = array(); 
  19182.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['readonly']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['readonly'])) { 
  19183.                 $prop['readonly'] = true; 
  19184.             } 
  19185.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['name'])) { 
  19186.                 $name = $tag['attribute']['name']; 
  19187.             } else { 
  19188.                 break; 
  19189.             } 
  19190.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['value']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['value'])) { 
  19191.                 $opt['v'] = $tag['attribute']['value']; 
  19192.             } 
  19193.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['cols']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['cols'])) { 
  19194.                 $w = intval($tag['attribute']['cols']) * $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)) * 2; 
  19195.             } else { 
  19196.                 $w = 40; 
  19197.             } 
  19198.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['rows']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['rows'])) { 
  19199.                 $h = intval($tag['attribute']['rows']) * $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19200.             } else { 
  19201.                 $h = 10; 
  19202.             } 
  19203.             $prop['multiline'] = 'true'; 
  19204.             $this->TextField($name, $w, $h, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19205.             break; 
  19206.         } 
  19207.         case 'select': { 
  19208.             $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19209.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['size']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['size'])) { 
  19210.                 $h *= ($tag['attribute']['size'] + 1); 
  19211.             } 
  19212.             $prop = array(); 
  19213.             $opt = array(); 
  19214.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['name']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['name'])) { 
  19215.                 $name = $tag['attribute']['name']; 
  19216.             } else { 
  19217.                 break; 
  19218.             } 
  19219.             $w = 0; 
  19220.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['opt']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($tag['attribute']['opt'])) { 
  19221.                 $options = explode('#!NwL!#', $tag['attribute']['opt']); 
  19222.                 $values = array(); 
  19223.                 foreach ($options as $val) { 
  19224.                     if (strpos($val, '#!TaB!#') !== false) { 
  19225.                         $opts = explode('#!TaB!#', $val); 
  19226.                         $values[] = $opts; 
  19227.                         $w = max($w, $this->GetStringWidth($opts[1])); 
  19228.                     } else { 
  19229.                         $values[] = $val; 
  19230.                         $w = max($w, $this->GetStringWidth($val)); 
  19231.                     } 
  19232.                 } 
  19233.             } else { 
  19234.                 break; 
  19235.             } 
  19236.             $w *= 2; 
  19237.             if (isset($tag['attribute']['multiple']) AND ($tag['attribute']['multiple']='multiple')) { 
  19238.                 $prop['multipleSelection'] = 'true'; 
  19239.                 $this->ListBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19240.             } else { 
  19241.                 $this->ComboBox($name, $w, $h, $values, $prop, $opt, '', '', false); 
  19242.             } 
  19243.             break; 
  19244.         } 
  19245.         case 'tcpdf': { 
  19246.             if (defined('K_TCPDF_CALLS_IN_HTML') AND (K_TCPDF_CALLS_IN_HTML === true)) { 
  19247.                 // Special tag used to call TCPDF methods 
  19248.                 if (isset($tag['attribute']['method'])) { 
  19249.                     $tcpdf_method = $tag['attribute']['method']; 
  19250.                     if (method_exists($this, $tcpdf_method)) { 
  19251.                         if (isset($tag['attribute']['params']) AND (!empty($tag['attribute']['params']))) { 
  19252.                             $params = unserialize(urldecode($tag['attribute']['params'])); 
  19253.                             call_user_func_array(array($this, $tcpdf_method), $params); 
  19254.                         } else { 
  19255.                             $this->$tcpdf_method(); 
  19256.                         } 
  19257.                         $this->newline = true; 
  19258.                     } 
  19259.                 } 
  19260.             } 
  19261.             break; 
  19262.         } 
  19263.         default: { 
  19264.             break; 
  19265.         } 
  19266.     } 
  19267.     // define tags that support borders and background colors 
  19268.     $bordertags = array('blockquote', 'br', 'dd', 'dl', 'div', 'dt', 'h1', 'h2', 'h3', 'h4', 'h5', 'h6', 'hr', 'li', 'ol', 'p', 'pre', 'ul', 'tcpdf', 'table'); 
  19269.     if (in_array($tag['value'], $bordertags)) { 
  19270.         // set border 
  19271.         $dom[$key]['borderposition'] = $this->getBorderStartPosition(); 
  19272.     } 
  19273.     if ($dom[$key]['self'] AND isset($dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreakafter'])) { 
  19274.         $pba = $dom[$key]['attribute']['pagebreakafter']; 
  19275.         // check for pagebreak 
  19276.         if (($pba == 'true') OR ($pba == 'left') OR ($pba == 'right')) { 
  19277.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19278.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19279.         } 
  19280.         if ((($pba == 'left') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)))) 
  19281.             OR (($pba == 'right') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0))))) { 
  19282.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19283.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19284.         } 
  19285.     } 
  19286.     return $dom; 
  19287. } 
  19288.  
  19289. /** 
  19290.  * Process closing tags. 
  19291.  * @param $dom (array) html dom array 
  19292.  * @param $key (int) current element id 
  19293.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the default left (or right if RTL) padding to each new line (default false). 
  19294.  * @param $maxbottomliney (int) maximum y value of current line 
  19295.  * @return $dom array 
  19296.  * @protected 
  19297.  */ 
  19298. protected function closeHTMLTagHandler($dom, $key, $cell, $maxbottomliney=0) { 
  19299.     $tag = $dom[$key]; 
  19300.     $parent = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]; 
  19301.     $lasttag = ((!isset($dom[($key + 1)])) OR ((!isset($dom[($key + 2)])) AND ($dom[($key + 1)]['value'] == 'marker'))); 
  19302.     $in_table_head = false; 
  19303.     // maximum x position (used to draw borders) 
  19304.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19305.         $xmax = $this->w; 
  19306.     } else { 
  19307.         $xmax = 0; 
  19308.     } 
  19309.     if ($tag['block']) { 
  19310.         $hbz = 0; // distance from y to line bottom 
  19311.         $hb = 0; // vertical space between block tags 
  19312.         // calculate vertical space for block tags 
  19313.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']) AND ($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h'] >= 0)) { 
  19314.             $pre_h = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['h']; 
  19315.         } elseif (isset($parent['fontsize'])) { 
  19316.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($parent['fontsize'] / $this->k); 
  19317.         } else { 
  19318.             $pre_h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19319.         } 
  19320.         if (isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n'])) { 
  19321.             $cn = $this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']][1]['n']; 
  19322.         } elseif (preg_match('/[h][0-9]/', $tag['value']) > 0) { 
  19323.             $cn = 0.6; 
  19324.         } else { 
  19325.             $cn = 1; 
  19326.         } 
  19327.         if ((!isset($this->tagvspaces[$tag['value']])) AND ($tag['value'] == 'div')) { 
  19328.             $hb = 0; 
  19329.         } else { 
  19330.             $hb = ($cn * $pre_h); 
  19331.         } 
  19332.         if ($maxbottomliney > $this->PageBreakTrigger) { 
  19333.             $hbz = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  19334.         } elseif ($this->y < $maxbottomliney) { 
  19335.             $hbz = ($maxbottomliney - $this->y); 
  19336.         } 
  19337.     } 
  19338.     // Closing tag 
  19339.     switch($tag['value']) { 
  19340.         case 'tr': { 
  19341.             $table_el = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['parent']; 
  19342.             if (!isset($parent['endy'])) { 
  19343.                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = $this->y; 
  19344.                 $parent['endy'] = $this->y; 
  19345.             } 
  19346.             if (!isset($parent['endpage'])) { 
  19347.                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  19348.                 $parent['endpage'] = $this->page; 
  19349.             } 
  19350.             if (!isset($parent['endcolumn'])) { 
  19351.                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  19352.                 $parent['endcolumn'] = $this->current_column; 
  19353.             } 
  19354.             // update row-spanned cells 
  19355.             if (isset($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'])) { 
  19356.                 foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19357.                     $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] -= 1; 
  19358.                     if ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] == 0) { 
  19359.                         if (($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] == $parent['endpage']) AND ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] == $parent['endcolumn'])) { 
  19360.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'], $parent['endy']); 
  19361.                         } elseif (($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] > $parent['endpage']) OR ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] > $parent['endcolumn'])) { 
  19362.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy']; 
  19363.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage']; 
  19364.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn']; 
  19365.                         } 
  19366.                     } 
  19367.                 } 
  19368.                 // report new endy and endpage to the rowspanned cells 
  19369.                 foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19370.                     if ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] == 0) { 
  19371.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'], $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage']); 
  19372.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage']; 
  19373.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'], $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn']); 
  19374.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn']; 
  19375.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = max($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'], $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy']); 
  19376.                         $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy'] = $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy']; 
  19377.                     } 
  19378.                 } 
  19379.                 // update remaining rowspanned cells 
  19380.                 foreach ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19381.                     if ($dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['rowspan'] == 0) { 
  19382.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endpage'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage']; 
  19383.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endcolumn'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn']; 
  19384.                         $dom[$table_el]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy']; 
  19385.                     } 
  19386.                 } 
  19387.             } 
  19388.             $this->setPage($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endpage']); 
  19389.             if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  19390.                 $this->selectColumn($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endcolumn']); 
  19391.             } 
  19392.             $this->y = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['endy']; 
  19393.             if (isset($dom[$table_el]['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  19394.                 $this->y += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($dom[$table_el]['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  19395.             } elseif (isset($dom[$table_el]['border-spacing'])) { 
  19396.                 $this->y += $dom[$table_el]['border-spacing']['V']; 
  19397.             } 
  19398.             $this->Ln(0, $cell); 
  19399.             if ($this->current_column == $parent['startcolumn']) { 
  19400.                 $this->x = $parent['startx']; 
  19401.             } 
  19402.             // account for booklet mode 
  19403.             if ($this->page > $parent['startpage']) { 
  19404.                 if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['orm'])) { 
  19405.                     $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['orm']); 
  19406.                 } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['olm'])) { 
  19407.                     $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$this->page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$parent['startpage']]['olm']); 
  19408.                 } 
  19409.             } 
  19410.             break; 
  19411.         } 
  19412.         case 'tablehead': 
  19413.             // closing tag used for the thead part 
  19414.             $in_table_head = true; 
  19415.             $this->inthead = false; 
  19416.         case 'table': { 
  19417.             $table_el = $parent; 
  19418.             // set default border 
  19419.             if (isset($table_el['attribute']['border']) AND ($table_el['attribute']['border'] > 0)) { 
  19420.                 // set default border 
  19421.                 $border = array('LTRB' => array('width' => $this->getCSSBorderWidth($table_el['attribute']['border']), 'cap'=>'square', 'join'=>'miter', 'dash'=> 0, 'color'=>array(0, 0, 0))); 
  19422.             } else { 
  19423.                 $border = 0; 
  19424.             } 
  19425.             $default_border = $border; 
  19426.             // fix bottom line alignment of last line before page break 
  19427.             foreach ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['trids'] as $j => $trkey) { 
  19428.                 // update row-spanned cells 
  19429.                 if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'])) { 
  19430.                     foreach ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19431.                         if (isset($prevtrkey) AND ($trwsp['trid'] == $prevtrkey) AND ($trwsp['mrowspan'] > 0)) { 
  19432.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['trid'] = $trkey; 
  19433.                         } 
  19434.                         if ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['trid'] == $trkey) { 
  19435.                             $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['mrowspan'] -= 1; 
  19436.                         } 
  19437.                     } 
  19438.                 } 
  19439.                 if (isset($prevtrkey) AND ($dom[$trkey]['startpage'] > $dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage'])) { 
  19440.                     $pgendy = $this->pagedim[$dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage']]['hk'] - $this->pagedim[$dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage']]['bm']; 
  19441.                     $dom[$prevtrkey]['endy'] = $pgendy; 
  19442.                     // update row-spanned cells 
  19443.                     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'])) { 
  19444.                         foreach ($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'] as $k => $trwsp) { 
  19445.                             if (($trwsp['trid'] == $trkey) AND ($trwsp['mrowspan'] > 1) AND ($trwsp['endpage'] == $dom[$prevtrkey]['endpage'])) { 
  19446.                                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['endy'] = $pgendy; 
  19447.                                 $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['rowspans'][$k]['mrowspan'] = -1; 
  19448.                             } 
  19449.                         } 
  19450.                     } 
  19451.                 } 
  19452.                 $prevtrkey = $trkey; 
  19453.                 $table_el = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]; 
  19454.             } 
  19455.             // for each row 
  19456.             if (count($table_el['trids']) > 0) { 
  19457.                 unset($xmax); 
  19458.             } 
  19459.             foreach ($table_el['trids'] as $j => $trkey) { 
  19460.                 $parent = $dom[$trkey]; 
  19461.                 if (!isset($xmax)) { 
  19462.                     $xmax = $parent['cellpos'][(count($parent['cellpos']) - 1)]['endx']; 
  19463.                 } 
  19464.                 // for each cell on the row 
  19465.                 foreach ($parent['cellpos'] as $k => $cellpos) { 
  19466.                     if (isset($cellpos['rowspanid']) AND ($cellpos['rowspanid'] >= 0)) { 
  19467.                         $cellpos['startx'] = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['startx']; 
  19468.                         $cellpos['endx'] = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endx']; 
  19469.                         $endy = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endy']; 
  19470.                         $startpage = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['startpage']; 
  19471.                         $endpage = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endpage']; 
  19472.                         $startcolumn = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['startcolumn']; 
  19473.                         $endcolumn = $table_el['rowspans'][($cellpos['rowspanid'])]['endcolumn']; 
  19474.                     } else { 
  19475.                         $endy = $parent['endy']; 
  19476.                         $startpage = $parent['startpage']; 
  19477.                         $endpage = $parent['endpage']; 
  19478.                         $startcolumn = $parent['startcolumn']; 
  19479.                         $endcolumn = $parent['endcolumn']; 
  19480.                     } 
  19481.                     if ($this->num_columns == 0) { 
  19482.                         $this->num_columns = 1; 
  19483.                     } 
  19484.                     if (isset($cellpos['border'])) { 
  19485.                         $border = $cellpos['border']; 
  19486.                     } 
  19487.                     if (isset($cellpos['bgcolor']) AND ($cellpos['bgcolor']) !== false) { 
  19488.                         $this->SetFillColorArray($cellpos['bgcolor']); 
  19489.                         $fill = true; 
  19490.                     } else { 
  19491.                         $fill = false; 
  19492.                     } 
  19493.                     $x = $cellpos['startx']; 
  19494.                     $y = $parent['starty']; 
  19495.                     $starty = $y; 
  19496.                     $w = abs($cellpos['endx'] - $cellpos['startx']); 
  19497.                     // get border modes 
  19498.                     $border_start = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='start', $this->opencell); 
  19499.                     $border_end = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='end', $this->opencell); 
  19500.                     $border_middle = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  19501.                     // design borders around HTML cells. 
  19502.                     for ($page = $startpage; $page <= $endpage; ++$page) { // for each page 
  19503.                         $ccode = ''; 
  19504.                         $this->setPage($page); 
  19505.                         if ($this->num_columns < 2) { 
  19506.                             // single-column mode 
  19507.                             $this->x = $x; 
  19508.                             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  19509.                         } 
  19510.                         // account for margin changes 
  19511.                         if ($page > $startpage) { 
  19512.                             if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  19513.                                 $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  19514.                             } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  19515.                                 $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  19516.                             } 
  19517.                         } 
  19518.                         if ($startpage == $endpage) { // single page 
  19519.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19520.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19521.                             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19522.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19523.                                 if ($startcolumn == $endcolumn) { // single column 
  19524.                                     $cborder = $border; 
  19525.                                     $h = $endy - $parent['starty']; 
  19526.                                     $this->y = $y; 
  19527.                                     $this->x = $x; 
  19528.                                 } elseif ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19529.                                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19530.                                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19531.                                     $this->x = $x; 
  19532.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19533.                                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19534.                                         $deltacol = $this->x + $this->rMargin - $this->w; 
  19535.                                     } else { 
  19536.                                         $deltacol = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  19537.                                     } 
  19538.                                 } elseif ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  19539.                                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  19540.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19541.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19542.                                     } 
  19543.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19544.                                     $h = $endy - $this->y; 
  19545.                                 } else { // middle column 
  19546.                                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19547.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19548.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19549.                                     } 
  19550.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19551.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19552.                                 } 
  19553.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19554.                             } // end for each column 
  19555.                         } elseif ($page == $startpage) { // first page 
  19556.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19557.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19558.                             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19559.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19560.                                 if ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19561.                                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19562.                                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19563.                                     $this->x = $x; 
  19564.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19565.                                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19566.                                         $deltacol = $this->x + $this->rMargin - $this->w; 
  19567.                                     } else { 
  19568.                                         $deltacol = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  19569.                                     } 
  19570.                                 } else { // middle column 
  19571.                                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19572.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19573.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19574.                                     } 
  19575.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19576.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19577.                                 } 
  19578.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19579.                             } // end for each column 
  19580.                         } elseif ($page == $endpage) { // last page 
  19581.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19582.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19583.                             for ($column = 0; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19584.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19585.                                 if ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  19586.                                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  19587.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19588.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19589.                                     } 
  19590.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19591.                                     $h = $endy - $this->y; 
  19592.                                 } else { // middle column 
  19593.                                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19594.                                     if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19595.                                         $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19596.                                     } 
  19597.                                     $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19598.                                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19599.                                 } 
  19600.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19601.                             } // end for each column 
  19602.                         } else { // middle page 
  19603.                             $deltacol = 0; 
  19604.                             $deltath = 0; 
  19605.                             for ($column = 0; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19606.                                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19607.                                 $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19608.                                 if (isset($this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\''])) { 
  19609.                                     $this->y = $this->columns[$column]['th']['\''.$page.'\'']; 
  19610.                                 } 
  19611.                                 $this->x += $deltacol; 
  19612.                                 $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19613.                                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19614.                             } // end for each column 
  19615.                         } 
  19616.                         if ($cborder OR $fill) { 
  19617.                             $offsetlen = strlen($ccode); 
  19618.                             // draw border and fill 
  19619.                             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  19620.                                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  19621.                                 if (end($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']) !== false) { 
  19622.                                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  19623.                                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey]; 
  19624.                                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  19625.                                 } else { 
  19626.                                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk']; 
  19627.                                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] += $offsetlen; 
  19628.                                 } 
  19629.                                 $pagebuff = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']; 
  19630.                                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  19631.                                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  19632.                                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$ccode.$pend; 
  19633.                             } else { 
  19634.                                 // draw border and fill 
  19635.                                 if (end($this->transfmrk[$this->page]) !== false) { 
  19636.                                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  19637.                                     $pagemark = $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey]; 
  19638.                                 } elseif ($this->InFooter) { 
  19639.                                     $pagemark = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  19640.                                 } else { 
  19641.                                     $pagemark = $this->intmrk[$this->page]; 
  19642.                                 } 
  19643.                                 $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  19644.                                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  19645.                                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  19646.                                 $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $pstart.$ccode.$pend); 
  19647.                             } 
  19648.                         } 
  19649.                     } // end for each page 
  19650.                     // restore default border 
  19651.                     $border = $default_border; 
  19652.                 } // end for each cell on the row 
  19653.                 if (isset($table_el['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  19654.                     $this->y += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($table_el['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  19655.                 } elseif (isset($table_el['border-spacing'])) { 
  19656.                     $this->y += $table_el['border-spacing']['V']; 
  19657.                 } 
  19658.                 $this->Ln(0, $cell); 
  19659.                 $this->x = $parent['startx']; 
  19660.                 if ($endpage > $startpage) { 
  19661.                     if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  19662.                         $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  19663.                     } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  19664.                         $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$endpage]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  19665.                     } 
  19666.                 } 
  19667.             } 
  19668.             if (!$in_table_head) { // we are not inside a thead section 
  19669.                 $this->cell_padding = $table_el['old_cell_padding']; 
  19670.                 // reset row height 
  19671.                 $this->resetLastH(); 
  19672.                 if (($this->page == ($this->numpages - 1)) AND ($this->pageopen[$this->numpages])) { 
  19673.                     $plendiff = ($this->pagelen[$this->numpages] - $this->emptypagemrk[$this->numpages]); 
  19674.                     if (($plendiff > 0) AND ($plendiff < 60)) { 
  19675.                         $pagediff = substr($this->getPageBuffer($this->numpages), $this->emptypagemrk[$this->numpages], $plendiff); 
  19676.                         if (substr($pagediff, 0, 5) == 'BT /F') { 
  19677.                             // the difference is only a font setting 
  19678.                             $plendiff = 0; 
  19679.                         } 
  19680.                     } 
  19681.                     if ($plendiff == 0) { 
  19682.                         // remove last blank page 
  19683.                         $this->deletePage($this->numpages); 
  19684.                     } 
  19685.                 } 
  19686.                 if (isset($this->theadMargins['top'])) { 
  19687.                     // restore top margin 
  19688.                     $this->tMargin = $this->theadMargins['top']; 
  19689.                 } 
  19690.                 if (!isset($table_el['attribute']['nested']) OR ($table_el['attribute']['nested'] != 'true')) { 
  19691.                     // reset main table header 
  19692.                     $this->thead = ''; 
  19693.                     $this->theadMargins = array(); 
  19694.                     $this->pagedim[$this->page]['tm'] = $this->tMargin; 
  19695.                 } 
  19696.             } 
  19697.             $parent = $table_el; 
  19698.             break; 
  19699.         } 
  19700.         case 'a': { 
  19701.             $this->HREF = ''; 
  19702.             break; 
  19703.         } 
  19704.         case 'sup': { 
  19705.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() + ((0.7 * $parent['fontsize']) / $this->k)); 
  19706.             break; 
  19707.         } 
  19708.         case 'sub': { 
  19709.             $this->SetXY($this->GetX(), $this->GetY() - ((0.3 * $parent['fontsize']) / $this->k)); 
  19710.             break; 
  19711.         } 
  19712.         case 'div': { 
  19713.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19714.             break; 
  19715.         } 
  19716.         case 'blockquote': { 
  19717.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  19718.                 $this->rMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19719.             } else { 
  19720.                 $this->lMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19721.             } 
  19722.             --$this->listindentlevel; 
  19723.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19724.             break; 
  19725.         } 
  19726.         case 'p': { 
  19727.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19728.             break; 
  19729.         } 
  19730.         case 'pre': { 
  19731.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19732.             $this->premode = false; 
  19733.             break; 
  19734.         } 
  19735.         case 'dl': { 
  19736.             --$this->listnum; 
  19737.             if ($this->listnum <= 0) { 
  19738.                 $this->listnum = 0; 
  19739.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19740.             } else { 
  19741.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19742.             } 
  19743.             $this->resetLastH(); 
  19744.             break; 
  19745.         } 
  19746.         case 'dt': { 
  19747.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19748.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19749.             break; 
  19750.         } 
  19751.         case 'dd': { 
  19752.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19753.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  19754.                 $this->rMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19755.             } else { 
  19756.                 $this->lMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19757.             } 
  19758.             --$this->listindentlevel; 
  19759.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19760.             break; 
  19761.         } 
  19762.         case 'ul': 
  19763.         case 'ol': { 
  19764.             --$this->listnum; 
  19765.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19766.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  19767.                 $this->rMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19768.             } else { 
  19769.                 $this->lMargin -= $this->listindent; 
  19770.             } 
  19771.             --$this->listindentlevel; 
  19772.             if ($this->listnum <= 0) { 
  19773.                 $this->listnum = 0; 
  19774.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19775.             } else { 
  19776.                 $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19777.             } 
  19778.             $this->resetLastH(); 
  19779.             break; 
  19780.         } 
  19781.         case 'li': { 
  19782.             $this->lispacer = ''; 
  19783.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace(0, 0, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19784.             break; 
  19785.         } 
  19786.         case 'h1': 
  19787.         case 'h2': 
  19788.         case 'h3': 
  19789.         case 'h4': 
  19790.         case 'h5': 
  19791.         case 'h6': { 
  19792.             $this->addHTMLVertSpace($hbz, $hb, $cell, false, $lasttag); 
  19793.             break; 
  19794.         } 
  19795.         // Form fields (since 4.8.000 - 2009-09-07) 
  19796.         case 'form': { 
  19797.             $this->form_action = ''; 
  19798.             $this->form_enctype = 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'; 
  19799.             break; 
  19800.         } 
  19801.         default : { 
  19802.             break; 
  19803.         } 
  19804.     } 
  19805.     // draw border and background (if any) 
  19806.     $this->drawHTMLTagBorder($parent, $xmax); 
  19807.     if (isset($dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['pagebreakafter'])) { 
  19808.         $pba = $dom[($dom[$key]['parent'])]['attribute']['pagebreakafter']; 
  19809.         // check for pagebreak 
  19810.         if (($pba == 'true') OR ($pba == 'left') OR ($pba == 'right')) { 
  19811.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19812.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19813.         } 
  19814.         if ((($pba == 'left') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)))) 
  19815.             OR (($pba == 'right') AND (((!$this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) != 0)) OR (($this->rtl) AND (($this->page % 2) == 0))))) { 
  19816.             // add a page (or trig AcceptPageBreak() for multicolumn mode) 
  19817.             $this->checkPageBreak($this->PageBreakTrigger + 1); 
  19818.         } 
  19819.     } 
  19820.     $this->tmprtl = false; 
  19821.     return $dom; 
  19822. } 
  19823.  
  19824. /** 
  19825.  * Add vertical spaces if needed. 
  19826.  * @param $hbz (string) Distance between current y and line bottom. 
  19827.  * @param $hb (string) The height of the break. 
  19828.  * @param $cell (boolean) if true add the default left (or right if RTL) padding to each new line (default false). 
  19829.  * @param $firsttag (boolean) set to true when the tag is the first. 
  19830.  * @param $lasttag (boolean) set to true when the tag is the last. 
  19831.  * @protected 
  19832.  */ 
  19833. protected function addHTMLVertSpace($hbz=0, $hb=0, $cell=false, $firsttag=false, $lasttag=false) { 
  19834.     if ($firsttag) { 
  19835.         $this->Ln(0, $cell); 
  19836.         $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  19837.         return; 
  19838.     } 
  19839.     if ($lasttag) { 
  19840.         $this->Ln($hbz, $cell); 
  19841.         $this->htmlvspace = 0; 
  19842.         return; 
  19843.     } 
  19844.     if ($hb < $this->htmlvspace) { 
  19845.         $hd = 0; 
  19846.     } else { 
  19847.         $hd = $hb - $this->htmlvspace; 
  19848.         $this->htmlvspace = $hb; 
  19849.     } 
  19850.     $this->Ln(($hbz + $hd), $cell); 
  19851. } 
  19852.  
  19853. /** 
  19854.  * Return the starting coordinates to draw an html border 
  19855.  * @return array containing top-left border coordinates 
  19856.  * @protected 
  19857.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-03) 
  19858.  */ 
  19859. protected function getBorderStartPosition() { 
  19860.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19861.         $xmax = $this->lMargin; 
  19862.     } else { 
  19863.         $xmax = $this->w - $this->rMargin; 
  19864.     } 
  19865.     return array('page' => $this->page, 'column' => $this->current_column, 'x' => $this->x, 'y' => $this->y, 'xmax' => $xmax); 
  19866. } 
  19867.  
  19868. /** 
  19869.  * Draw an HTML block border and fill 
  19870.  * @param $tag (array) array of tag properties. 
  19871.  * @param $xmax (int) end X coordinate for border. 
  19872.  * @protected 
  19873.  * @since 5.7.000 (2010-08-03) 
  19874.  */ 
  19875. protected function drawHTMLTagBorder($tag, $xmax) { 
  19876.     if (!isset($tag['borderposition'])) { 
  19877.         // nothing to draw 
  19878.         return; 
  19879.     } 
  19880.     $prev_x = $this->x; 
  19881.     $prev_y = $this->y; 
  19882.     $prev_lasth = $this->lasth; 
  19883.     $border = 0; 
  19884.     $fill = false; 
  19885.     $this->lasth = 0; 
  19886.     if (isset($tag['border']) AND !empty($tag['border'])) { 
  19887.         // get border style 
  19888.         $border = $tag['border']; 
  19889.         if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->thead) AND (!$this->inthead)) { 
  19890.             // border for table header
