  19891.             $border = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  19892.         } 
  19893.     } 
  19894.     if (isset($tag['bgcolor']) AND ($tag['bgcolor'] !== false)) { 
  19895.         // get background color 
  19896.         $old_bgcolor = $this->bgcolor; 
  19897.         $this->SetFillColorArray($tag['bgcolor']); 
  19898.         $fill = true; 
  19899.     } 
  19900.     if (!$border AND !$fill) { 
  19901.         // nothing to draw 
  19902.         return; 
  19903.     } 
  19904.     if (isset($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'])) { 
  19905.         $clsp = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tag['attribute']['cellspacing'], 1, 'px'); 
  19906.         $cellspacing = array('H' => $clsp, 'V' => $clsp); 
  19907.     } elseif (isset($tag['border-spacing'])) { 
  19908.         $cellspacing = $tag['border-spacing']; 
  19909.     } else { 
  19910.         $cellspacing = array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0); 
  19911.     } 
  19912.     if (($tag['value'] != 'table') AND (is_array($border)) AND (!empty($border))) { 
  19913.         // draw the border externally respect the sqare edge. 
  19914.         $border['mode'] = 'ext'; 
  19915.     } 
  19916.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  19917.         if ($xmax >= $tag['borderposition']['x']) { 
  19918.             $xmax = $tag['borderposition']['xmax']; 
  19919.         } 
  19920.         $w = ($tag['borderposition']['x'] - $xmax); 
  19921.     } else { 
  19922.         if ($xmax <= $tag['borderposition']['x']) { 
  19923.             $xmax = $tag['borderposition']['xmax']; 
  19924.         } 
  19925.         $w = ($xmax - $tag['borderposition']['x']); 
  19926.     } 
  19927.     if ($w <= 0) { 
  19928.         return; 
  19929.     } 
  19930.     $w += $cellspacing['H']; 
  19931.     $startpage = $tag['borderposition']['page']; 
  19932.     $startcolumn = $tag['borderposition']['column']; 
  19933.     $x = $tag['borderposition']['x']; 
  19934.     $y = $tag['borderposition']['y']; 
  19935.     $endpage = $this->page; 
  19936.     $starty = $tag['borderposition']['y'] - $cellspacing['V']; 
  19937.     $currentY = $this->y; 
  19938.     $this->x = $x; 
  19939.     // get latest column 
  19940.     $endcolumn = $this->current_column; 
  19941.     if ($this->num_columns == 0) { 
  19942.         $this->num_columns = 1; 
  19943.     } 
  19944.     // get border modes 
  19945.     $border_start = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='start', $this->opencell); 
  19946.     $border_end = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='end', $this->opencell); 
  19947.     $border_middle = TCPDF_STATIC::getBorderMode($border, $position='middle', $this->opencell); 
  19948.     // temporary disable page regions 
  19949.     $temp_page_regions = $this->page_regions; 
  19950.     $this->page_regions = array(); 
  19951.     // design borders around HTML cells. 
  19952.     for ($page = $startpage; $page <= $endpage; ++$page) { // for each page 
  19953.         $ccode = ''; 
  19954.         $this->setPage($page); 
  19955.         if ($this->num_columns < 2) { 
  19956.             // single-column mode 
  19957.             $this->x = $x; 
  19958.             $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  19959.         } 
  19960.         // account for margin changes 
  19961.         if ($page > $startpage) { 
  19962.             if (($this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm'])) { 
  19963.                 $this->x -= ($this->pagedim[$page]['orm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['orm']); 
  19964.             } elseif ((!$this->rtl) AND ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] != $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm'])) { 
  19965.                 $this->x += ($this->pagedim[$page]['olm'] - $this->pagedim[$startpage]['olm']); 
  19966.             } 
  19967.         } 
  19968.         if ($startpage == $endpage) { 
  19969.             // single page 
  19970.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19971.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19972.                 if ($startcolumn == $endcolumn) { // single column 
  19973.                     $cborder = $border; 
  19974.                     $h = ($currentY - $y) + $cellspacing['V']; 
  19975.                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19976.                 } elseif ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19977.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19978.                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19979.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19980.                 } elseif ($column == $endcolumn) { // end column 
  19981.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  19982.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  19983.                 } else { // middle column 
  19984.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19985.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19986.                 } 
  19987.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  19988.             } // end for each column 
  19989.         } elseif ($page == $startpage) { // first page 
  19990.             for ($column = $startcolumn; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  19991.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  19992.                 if ($column == $startcolumn) { // first column 
  19993.                     $cborder = $border_start; 
  19994.                     $this->y = $starty; 
  19995.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19996.                 } else { // middle column 
  19997.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  19998.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  19999.                 } 
  20000.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  20001.             } // end for each column 
  20002.         } elseif ($page == $endpage) { // last page 
  20003.             for ($column = 0; $column <= $endcolumn; ++$column) { // for each column 
  20004.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  20005.                 if ($column == $endcolumn) { 
  20006.                     // end column 
  20007.                     $cborder = $border_end; 
  20008.                     $h = $currentY - $this->y; 
  20009.                 } else { 
  20010.                     // middle column 
  20011.                     $cborder = $border_middle; 
  20012.                     $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  20013.                 } 
  20014.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  20015.             } // end for each column 
  20016.         } else { // middle page 
  20017.             for ($column = 0; $column < $this->num_columns; ++$column) { // for each column 
  20018.                 $this->selectColumn($column); 
  20019.                 $cborder = $border_middle; 
  20020.                 $h = $this->h - $this->y - $this->bMargin; 
  20021.                 $ccode .= $this->getCellCode($w, $h, '', $cborder, 1, '', $fill, '', 0, true)."\n"; 
  20022.             } // end for each column 
  20023.         } 
  20024.         if ($cborder OR $fill) { 
  20025.             $offsetlen = strlen($ccode); 
  20026.             // draw border and fill 
  20027.             if ($this->inxobj) { 
  20028.                 // we are inside an XObject template 
  20029.                 if (end($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']) !== false) { 
  20030.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk']); 
  20031.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey]; 
  20032.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'][$pagemarkkey] += $offsetlen; 
  20033.                 } else { 
  20034.                     $pagemark = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk']; 
  20035.                     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] += $offsetlen; 
  20036.                 } 
  20037.                 $pagebuff = $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata']; 
  20038.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  20039.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  20040.                 $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = $pstart.$ccode.$pend; 
  20041.             } else { 
  20042.                 if (end($this->transfmrk[$this->page]) !== false) { 
  20043.                     $pagemarkkey = key($this->transfmrk[$this->page]); 
  20044.                     $pagemark = $this->transfmrk[$this->page][$pagemarkkey]; 
  20045.                 } elseif ($this->InFooter) { 
  20046.                     $pagemark = $this->footerpos[$this->page]; 
  20047.                 } else { 
  20048.                     $pagemark = $this->intmrk[$this->page]; 
  20049.                 } 
  20050.                 $pagebuff = $this->getPageBuffer($this->page); 
  20051.                 $pstart = substr($pagebuff, 0, $pagemark); 
  20052.                 $pend = substr($pagebuff, $pagemark); 
  20053.                 $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $pstart.$ccode.$pend); 
  20054.                 $this->bordermrk[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  20055.                 $this->cntmrk[$this->page] += $offsetlen; 
  20056.             } 
  20057.         } 
  20058.     } // end for each page 
  20059.     // restore page regions 
  20060.     $this->page_regions = $temp_page_regions; 
  20061.     if (isset($old_bgcolor)) { 
  20062.         // restore background color 
  20063.         $this->SetFillColorArray($old_bgcolor); 
  20064.     } 
  20065.     // restore pointer position 
  20066.     $this->x = $prev_x; 
  20067.     $this->y = $prev_y; 
  20068.     $this->lasth = $prev_lasth; 
  20069. } 
  20070.  
  20071. /** 
  20072.  * Set the default bullet to be used as LI bullet symbol 
  20073.  * @param $symbol (string) character or string to be used (legal values are: '' = automatic, '!' = auto bullet, '#' = auto numbering, 'disc', 'disc', 'circle', 'square', '1', 'decimal', 'decimal-leading-zero', 'i', 'lower-roman', 'I', 'upper-roman', 'a', 'lower-alpha', 'lower-latin', 'A', 'upper-alpha', 'upper-latin', 'lower-greek', 'img|type|width|height|image.ext') 
  20074.  * @public 
  20075.  * @since 3.0.028 (2008-09-26) 
  20076.  */ 
  20077. public function setLIsymbol($symbol='!') { 
  20078.     // check for custom image symbol 
  20079.     if (substr($symbol, 0, 4) == 'img|') { 
  20080.         $this->lisymbol = $symbol; 
  20081.         return; 
  20082.     } 
  20083.     $symbol = strtolower($symbol); 
  20084.     $valid_symbols = array('!', '#', 'disc', 'circle', 'square', '1', 'decimal', 'decimal-leading-zero', 'i', 'lower-roman', 'I', 'upper-roman', 'a', 'lower-alpha', 'lower-latin', 'A', 'upper-alpha', 'upper-latin', 'lower-greek'); 
  20085.     if (in_array($symbol, $valid_symbols)) { 
  20086.         $this->lisymbol = $symbol; 
  20087.     } else { 
  20088.         $this->lisymbol = ''; 
  20089.     } 
  20090. } 
  20091.  
  20092. /** 
  20093.  * Set the booklet mode for double-sided pages. 
  20094.  * @param $booklet (boolean) true set the booklet mode on, false otherwise. 
  20095.  * @param $inner (float) Inner page margin. 
  20096.  * @param $outer (float) Outer page margin. 
  20097.  * @public 
  20098.  * @since 4.2.000 (2008-10-29) 
  20099.  */ 
  20100. public function SetBooklet($booklet=true, $inner=-1, $outer=-1) { 
  20101.     $this->booklet = $booklet; 
  20102.     if ($inner >= 0) { 
  20103.         $this->lMargin = $inner; 
  20104.     } 
  20105.     if ($outer >= 0) { 
  20106.         $this->rMargin = $outer; 
  20107.     } 
  20108. } 
  20109.  
  20110. /** 
  20111.  * Swap the left and right margins. 
  20112.  * @param $reverse (boolean) if true swap left and right margins. 
  20113.  * @protected 
  20114.  * @since 4.2.000 (2008-10-29) 
  20115.  */ 
  20116. protected function swapMargins($reverse=true) { 
  20117.     if ($reverse) { 
  20118.         // swap left and right margins 
  20119.         $mtemp = $this->original_lMargin; 
  20120.         $this->original_lMargin = $this->original_rMargin; 
  20121.         $this->original_rMargin = $mtemp; 
  20122.         $deltam = $this->original_lMargin - $this->original_rMargin; 
  20123.         $this->lMargin += $deltam; 
  20124.         $this->rMargin -= $deltam; 
  20125.     } 
  20126. } 
  20127.  
  20128. /** 
  20129.  * Set the vertical spaces for HTML tags. 
  20130.  * The array must have the following structure (example): 
  20131.  * $tagvs = array('h1' => array(0 => array('h' => '', 'n' => 2), 1 => array('h' => 1.3, 'n' => 1))); 
  20132.  * The first array level contains the tag names,  
  20133.  * the second level contains 0 for opening tags or 1 for closing tags,  
  20134.  * the third level contains the vertical space unit (h) and the number spaces to add (n). 
  20135.  * If the h parameter is not specified, default values are used. 
  20136.  * @param $tagvs (array) array of tags and relative vertical spaces. 
  20137.  * @public 
  20138.  * @since 4.2.001 (2008-10-30) 
  20139.  */ 
  20140. public function setHtmlVSpace($tagvs) { 
  20141.     $this->tagvspaces = $tagvs; 
  20142. } 
  20143.  
  20144. /** 
  20145.  * Set custom width for list indentation. 
  20146.  * @param $width (float) width of the indentation. Use negative value to disable it. 
  20147.  * @public 
  20148.  * @since 4.2.007 (2008-11-12) 
  20149.  */ 
  20150. public function setListIndentWidth($width) { 
  20151.     return $this->customlistindent = floatval($width); 
  20152. } 
  20153.  
  20154. /** 
  20155.  * Set the top/bottom cell sides to be open or closed when the cell cross the page. 
  20156.  * @param $isopen (boolean) if true keeps the top/bottom border open for the cell sides that cross the page. 
  20157.  * @public 
  20158.  * @since 4.2.010 (2008-11-14) 
  20159.  */ 
  20160. public function setOpenCell($isopen) { 
  20161.     $this->opencell = $isopen; 
  20162. } 
  20163.  
  20164. /** 
  20165.  * Set the color and font style for HTML links. 
  20166.  * @param $color (array) RGB array of colors 
  20167.  * @param $fontstyle (string) additional font styles to add 
  20168.  * @public 
  20169.  * @since 4.3.003 (2008-12-09) 
  20170.  */ 
  20171. public function setHtmlLinksStyle($color=array(0, 0, 255), $fontstyle='U') { 
  20172.     $this->htmlLinkColorArray = $color; 
  20173.     $this->htmlLinkFontStyle = $fontstyle; 
  20174. } 
  20175.  
  20176. /** 
  20177.  * Convert HTML string containing value and unit of measure to user's units or points. 
  20178.  * @param $htmlval (string) String containing values and unit. 
  20179.  * @param $refsize (string) Reference value in points. 
  20180.  * @param $defaultunit (string) Default unit (can be one of the following: %, em, ex, px, in, mm, pc, pt). 
  20181.  * @param $points (boolean) If true returns points, otherwise returns value in user's units. 
  20182.  * @return float value in user's unit or point if $points=true 
  20183.  * @public 
  20184.  * @since 4.3.004 (2008-12-10) 
  20185.  */ 
  20186. public function getHTMLUnitToUnits($htmlval, $refsize=1, $defaultunit='px', $points=false) { 
  20187.     $supportedunits = array('%', 'em', 'ex', 'px', 'in', 'cm', 'mm', 'pc', 'pt'); 
  20188.     $retval = 0; 
  20189.     $value = 0; 
  20190.     $unit = 'px'; 
  20191.     if ($points) { 
  20192.         $k = 1; 
  20193.     } else { 
  20194.         $k = $this->k; 
  20195.     } 
  20196.     if (in_array($defaultunit, $supportedunits)) { 
  20197.         $unit = $defaultunit; 
  20198.     } 
  20199.     if (is_numeric($htmlval)) { 
  20200.         $value = floatval($htmlval); 
  20201.     } elseif (preg_match('/([0-9\.\-\+]+)/', $htmlval, $mnum)) { 
  20202.         $value = floatval($mnum[1]); 
  20203.         if (preg_match('/([a-z%]+)/', $htmlval, $munit)) { 
  20204.             if (in_array($munit[1], $supportedunits)) { 
  20205.                 $unit = $munit[1]; 
  20206.             } 
  20207.         } 
  20208.     } 
  20209.     switch ($unit) { 
  20210.         // percentage 
  20211.         case '%': { 
  20212.             $retval = (($value * $refsize) / 100); 
  20213.             break; 
  20214.         } 
  20215.         // relative-size 
  20216.         case 'em': { 
  20217.             $retval = ($value * $refsize); 
  20218.             break; 
  20219.         } 
  20220.         // height of lower case 'x' (about half the font-size) 
  20221.         case 'ex': { 
  20222.             $retval = ($value * ($refsize / 2)); 
  20223.             break; 
  20224.         } 
  20225.         // absolute-size 
  20226.         case 'in': { 
  20227.             $retval = (($value * $this->dpi) / $k); 
  20228.             break; 
  20229.         } 
  20230.         // centimeters 
  20231.         case 'cm': { 
  20232.             $retval = (($value / 2.54 * $this->dpi) / $k); 
  20233.             break; 
  20234.         } 
  20235.         // millimeters 
  20236.         case 'mm': { 
  20237.             $retval = (($value / 25.4 * $this->dpi) / $k); 
  20238.             break; 
  20239.         } 
  20240.         // one pica is 12 points 
  20241.         case 'pc': { 
  20242.             $retval = (($value * 12) / $k); 
  20243.             break; 
  20244.         } 
  20245.         // points 
  20246.         case 'pt': { 
  20247.             $retval = ($value / $k); 
  20248.             break; 
  20249.         } 
  20250.         // pixels 
  20251.         case 'px': { 
  20252.             $retval = $this->pixelsToUnits($value); 
  20253.             if ($points) { 
  20254.                 $retval *= $this->k; 
  20255.             } 
  20256.             break; 
  20257.         } 
  20258.     } 
  20259.     return $retval; 
  20260. } 
  20261.  
  20262. /** 
  20263.  * Output an HTML list bullet or ordered item symbol 
  20264.  * @param $listdepth (int) list nesting level 
  20265.  * @param $listtype (string) type of list 
  20266.  * @param $size (float) current font size 
  20267.  * @protected 
  20268.  * @since 4.3.004 (2008-12-10) 
  20269.  */ 
  20270. protected function putHtmlListBullet($listdepth, $listtype='', $size=10) { 
  20271.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  20272.         return; 
  20273.     } 
  20274.     $size /= $this->k; 
  20275.     $fill = ''; 
  20276.     $bgcolor = $this->bgcolor; 
  20277.     $color = $this->fgcolor; 
  20278.     $strokecolor = $this->strokecolor; 
  20279.     $width = 0; 
  20280.     $textitem = ''; 
  20281.     $tmpx = $this->x; 
  20282.     $lspace = $this->GetStringWidth('  '); 
  20283.     if ($listtype == '^') { 
  20284.         // special symbol used for avoid justification of rect bullet 
  20285.         $this->lispacer = ''; 
  20286.         return; 
  20287.     } elseif ($listtype == '!') { 
  20288.         // set default list type for unordered list 
  20289.         $deftypes = array('disc', 'circle', 'square'); 
  20290.         $listtype = $deftypes[($listdepth - 1) % 3]; 
  20291.     } elseif ($listtype == '#') { 
  20292.         // set default list type for ordered list 
  20293.         $listtype = 'decimal'; 
  20294.     } elseif (substr($listtype, 0, 4) == 'img|') { 
  20295.         // custom image type ('img|type|width|height|image.ext') 
  20296.         $img = explode('|', $listtype); 
  20297.         $listtype = 'img'; 
  20298.     } 
  20299.     switch ($listtype) { 
  20300.         // unordered types 
  20301.         case 'none': { 
  20302.             break; 
  20303.         } 
  20304.         case 'disc': { 
  20305.             $r = $size / 6; 
  20306.             $lspace += (2 * $r); 
  20307.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  20308.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20309.             } else { 
  20310.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20311.             } 
  20312.             $this->Circle(($this->x + $r), ($this->y + ($this->lasth / 2)), $r, 0, 360, 'F', array(), $color, 8); 
  20313.             break; 
  20314.         } 
  20315.         case 'circle': { 
  20316.             $r = $size / 6; 
  20317.             $lspace += (2 * $r); 
  20318.             if ($this->rtl) { 
  20319.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20320.             } else { 
  20321.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20322.             } 
  20323.             $prev_line_style = $this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor; 
  20324.             $new_line_style = array('width' => ($r / 3), 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'phase' => 0, 'color'=>$color); 
  20325.             $this->Circle(($this->x + $r), ($this->y + ($this->lasth / 2)), ($r * (1 - (1/6))), 0, 360, 'D', $new_line_style, array(), 8); 
  20326.             $this->_out($prev_line_style); // restore line settings 
  20327.             break; 
  20328.         } 
  20329.         case 'square': { 
  20330.             $l = $size / 3; 
  20331.             $lspace += $l; 
  20332.             if ($this->rtl) {; 
  20333.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20334.             } else { 
  20335.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20336.             } 
  20337.             $this->Rect($this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $l) / 2)), $l, $l, 'F', array(), $color); 
  20338.             break; 
  20339.         } 
  20340.         case 'img': { 
  20341.             // 1=>type, 2=>width, 3=>height, 4=>image.ext 
  20342.             $lspace += $img[2]; 
  20343.             if ($this->rtl) {; 
  20344.                 $this->x += $lspace; 
  20345.             } else { 
  20346.                 $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20347.             } 
  20348.             $imgtype = strtolower($img[1]); 
  20349.             $prev_y = $this->y; 
  20350.             switch ($imgtype) { 
  20351.                 case 'svg': { 
  20352.                     $this->ImageSVG($img[4], $this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $img[3]) / 2)), $img[2], $img[3], '', 'T', '', 0, false); 
  20353.                     break; 
  20354.                 } 
  20355.                 case 'ai': 
  20356.                 case 'eps': { 
  20357.                     $this->ImageEps($img[4], $this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $img[3]) / 2)), $img[2], $img[3], '', true, 'T', '', 0, false); 
  20358.                     break; 
  20359.                 } 
  20360.                 default: { 
  20361.                     $this->Image($img[4], $this->x, ($this->y + (($this->lasth - $img[3]) / 2)), $img[2], $img[3], $img[1], '', 'T', false, 300, '', false, false, 0, false, false, false); 
  20362.                     break; 
  20363.                 } 
  20364.             } 
  20365.             $this->y = $prev_y; 
  20366.             break; 
  20367.         } 
  20368.         // ordered types 
  20369.         // $this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  20370.         // $textitem 
  20371.         case '1': 
  20372.         case 'decimal': { 
  20373.             $textitem = $this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  20374.             break; 
  20375.         } 
  20376.         case 'decimal-leading-zero': { 
  20377.             $textitem = sprintf('%02d', $this->listcount[$this->listnum]); 
  20378.             break; 
  20379.         } 
  20380.         case 'i': 
  20381.         case 'lower-roman': { 
  20382.             $textitem = strtolower(TCPDF_STATIC::intToRoman($this->listcount[$this->listnum])); 
  20383.             break; 
  20384.         } 
  20385.         case 'I': 
  20386.         case 'upper-roman': { 
  20387.             $textitem = TCPDF_STATIC::intToRoman($this->listcount[$this->listnum]); 
  20388.             break; 
  20389.         } 
  20390.         case 'a': 
  20391.         case 'lower-alpha': 
  20392.         case 'lower-latin': { 
  20393.             $textitem = chr(97 + $this->listcount[$this->listnum] - 1); 
  20394.             break; 
  20395.         } 
  20396.         case 'A': 
  20397.         case 'upper-alpha': 
  20398.         case 'upper-latin': { 
  20399.             $textitem = chr(65 + $this->listcount[$this->listnum] - 1); 
  20400.             break; 
  20401.         } 
  20402.         case 'lower-greek': { 
  20403.             $textitem = TCPDF_FONTS::unichr((945 + $this->listcount[$this->listnum] - 1), $this->isunicode); 
  20404.             break; 
  20405.         } 
  20406.         /** 
  20407.         // Types to be implemented (special handling) 
  20408.         case 'hebrew': { 
  20409.             break; 
  20410.         } 
  20411.         case 'armenian': { 
  20412.             break; 
  20413.         } 
  20414.         case 'georgian': { 
  20415.             break; 
  20416.         } 
  20417.         case 'cjk-ideographic': { 
  20418.             break; 
  20419.         } 
  20420.         case 'hiragana': { 
  20421.             break; 
  20422.         } 
  20423.         case 'katakana': { 
  20424.             break; 
  20425.         } 
  20426.         case 'hiragana-iroha': { 
  20427.             break; 
  20428.         } 
  20429.         case 'katakana-iroha': { 
  20430.             break; 
  20431.         } 
  20432.         */ 
  20433.         default: { 
  20434.             $textitem = $this->listcount[$this->listnum]; 
  20435.         } 
  20436.     } 
  20437.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($textitem)) { 
  20438.         // Check whether we need a new page or new column 
  20439.         $prev_y = $this->y; 
  20440.         $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  20441.         if ($this->checkPageBreak($h) OR ($this->y < $prev_y)) { 
  20442.             $tmpx = $this->x; 
  20443.         } 
  20444.         // print ordered item 
  20445.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  20446.             $textitem = '.'.$textitem; 
  20447.         } else { 
  20448.             $textitem = $textitem.'.'; 
  20449.         } 
  20450.         $lspace += $this->GetStringWidth($textitem); 
  20451.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  20452.             $this->x += $lspace; 
  20453.         } else { 
  20454.             $this->x -= $lspace; 
  20455.         } 
  20456.         $this->Write($this->lasth, $textitem, '', false, '', false, 0, false); 
  20457.     } 
  20458.     $this->x = $tmpx; 
  20459.     $this->lispacer = '^'; 
  20460.     // restore colors 
  20461.     $this->SetFillColorArray($bgcolor); 
  20462.     $this->SetDrawColorArray($strokecolor); 
  20463.     $this->SettextColorArray($color); 
  20464. } 
  20465.  
  20466. /** 
  20467.  * Returns current graphic variables as array. 
  20468.  * @return array of graphic variables 
  20469.  * @protected 
  20470.  * @since 4.2.010 (2008-11-14) 
  20471.  */ 
  20472. protected function getGraphicVars() { 
  20473.     $grapvars = array( 
  20474.         'FontFamily' => $this->FontFamily,  
  20475.         'FontStyle' => $this->FontStyle,  
  20476.         'FontSizePt' => $this->FontSizePt,  
  20477.         'rMargin' => $this->rMargin,  
  20478.         'lMargin' => $this->lMargin,  
  20479.         'cell_padding' => $this->cell_padding,  
  20480.         'cell_margin' => $this->cell_margin,  
  20481.         'LineWidth' => $this->LineWidth,  
  20482.         'linestyleWidth' => $this->linestyleWidth,  
  20483.         'linestyleCap' => $this->linestyleCap,  
  20484.         'linestyleJoin' => $this->linestyleJoin,  
  20485.         'linestyleDash' => $this->linestyleDash,  
  20486.         'textrendermode' => $this->textrendermode,  
  20487.         'textstrokewidth' => $this->textstrokewidth,  
  20488.         'DrawColor' => $this->DrawColor,  
  20489.         'FillColor' => $this->FillColor,  
  20490.         'TextColor' => $this->TextColor,  
  20491.         'ColorFlag' => $this->ColorFlag,  
  20492.         'bgcolor' => $this->bgcolor,  
  20493.         'fgcolor' => $this->fgcolor,  
  20494.         'htmlvspace' => $this->htmlvspace,  
  20495.         'listindent' => $this->listindent,  
  20496.         'listindentlevel' => $this->listindentlevel,  
  20497.         'listnum' => $this->listnum,  
  20498.         'listordered' => $this->listordered,  
  20499.         'listcount' => $this->listcount,  
  20500.         'lispacer' => $this->lispacer,  
  20501.         'cell_height_ratio' => $this->cell_height_ratio,  
  20502.         'font_stretching' => $this->font_stretching,  
  20503.         'font_spacing' => $this->font_spacing,  
  20504.         'alpha' => $this->alpha,  
  20505.         // extended 
  20506.         'lasth' => $this->lasth,  
  20507.         'tMargin' => $this->tMargin,  
  20508.         'bMargin' => $this->bMargin,  
  20509.         'AutoPageBreak' => $this->AutoPageBreak,  
  20510.         'PageBreakTrigger' => $this->PageBreakTrigger,  
  20511.         'x' => $this->x,  
  20512.         'y' => $this->y,  
  20513.         'w' => $this->w,  
  20514.         'h' => $this->h,  
  20515.         'wPt' => $this->wPt,  
  20516.         'hPt' => $this->hPt,  
  20517.         'fwPt' => $this->fwPt,  
  20518.         'fhPt' => $this->fhPt,  
  20519.         'page' => $this->page,  
  20520.         'current_column' => $this->current_column,  
  20521.         'num_columns' => $this->num_columns 
  20522.  ); 
  20523.     return $grapvars; 
  20524. } 
  20525.  
  20526. /** 
  20527.  * Set graphic variables. 
  20528.  * @param $gvars (array) array of graphic variablesto restore 
  20529.  * @param $extended (boolean) if true restore extended graphic variables 
  20530.  * @protected 
  20531.  * @since 4.2.010 (2008-11-14) 
  20532.  */ 
  20533. protected function setGraphicVars($gvars, $extended=false) { 
  20534.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  20535.          return; 
  20536.     } 
  20537.     $this->FontFamily = $gvars['FontFamily']; 
  20538.     $this->FontStyle = $gvars['FontStyle']; 
  20539.     $this->FontSizePt = $gvars['FontSizePt']; 
  20540.     $this->rMargin = $gvars['rMargin']; 
  20541.     $this->lMargin = $gvars['lMargin']; 
  20542.     $this->cell_padding = $gvars['cell_padding']; 
  20543.     $this->cell_margin = $gvars['cell_margin']; 
  20544.     $this->LineWidth = $gvars['LineWidth']; 
  20545.     $this->linestyleWidth = $gvars['linestyleWidth']; 
  20546.     $this->linestyleCap = $gvars['linestyleCap']; 
  20547.     $this->linestyleJoin = $gvars['linestyleJoin']; 
  20548.     $this->linestyleDash = $gvars['linestyleDash']; 
  20549.     $this->textrendermode = $gvars['textrendermode']; 
  20550.     $this->textstrokewidth = $gvars['textstrokewidth']; 
  20551.     $this->DrawColor = $gvars['DrawColor']; 
  20552.     $this->FillColor = $gvars['FillColor']; 
  20553.     $this->TextColor = $gvars['TextColor']; 
  20554.     $this->ColorFlag = $gvars['ColorFlag']; 
  20555.     $this->bgcolor = $gvars['bgcolor']; 
  20556.     $this->fgcolor = $gvars['fgcolor']; 
  20557.     $this->htmlvspace = $gvars['htmlvspace']; 
  20558.     $this->listindent = $gvars['listindent']; 
  20559.     $this->listindentlevel = $gvars['listindentlevel']; 
  20560.     $this->listnum = $gvars['listnum']; 
  20561.     $this->listordered = $gvars['listordered']; 
  20562.     $this->listcount = $gvars['listcount']; 
  20563.     $this->lispacer = $gvars['lispacer']; 
  20564.     $this->cell_height_ratio = $gvars['cell_height_ratio']; 
  20565.     $this->font_stretching = $gvars['font_stretching']; 
  20566.     $this->font_spacing = $gvars['font_spacing']; 
  20567.     $this->alpha = $gvars['alpha']; 
  20568.     if ($extended) { 
  20569.         // restore extended values 
  20570.         $this->lasth = $gvars['lasth']; 
  20571.         $this->tMargin = $gvars['tMargin']; 
  20572.         $this->bMargin = $gvars['bMargin']; 
  20573.         $this->AutoPageBreak = $gvars['AutoPageBreak']; 
  20574.         $this->PageBreakTrigger = $gvars['PageBreakTrigger']; 
  20575.         $this->x = $gvars['x']; 
  20576.         $this->y = $gvars['y']; 
  20577.         $this->w = $gvars['w']; 
  20578.         $this->h = $gvars['h']; 
  20579.         $this->wPt = $gvars['wPt']; 
  20580.         $this->hPt = $gvars['hPt']; 
  20581.         $this->fwPt = $gvars['fwPt']; 
  20582.         $this->fhPt = $gvars['fhPt']; 
  20583.         $this->page = $gvars['page']; 
  20584.         $this->current_column = $gvars['current_column']; 
  20585.         $this->num_columns = $gvars['num_columns']; 
  20586.     } 
  20587.     $this->_out(''.$this->linestyleWidth.' '.$this->linestyleCap.' '.$this->linestyleJoin.' '.$this->linestyleDash.' '.$this->DrawColor.' '.$this->FillColor.''); 
  20588.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->FontFamily)) { 
  20589.         $this->SetFont($this->FontFamily, $this->FontStyle, $this->FontSizePt); 
  20590.     } 
  20591. } 
  20592.  
  20593. /** 
  20594.  * Outputs the "save graphics state" operator 'q' 
  20595.  * @protected 
  20596.  */ 
  20597. protected function _outSaveGraphicsState() { 
  20598.     $this->_out('q'); 
  20599. } 
  20600.  
  20601. /** 
  20602.  * Outputs the "restore graphics state" operator 'Q' 
  20603.  * @protected 
  20604.  */ 
  20605. protected function _outRestoreGraphicsState() { 
  20606.     $this->_out('Q'); 
  20607. } 
  20608.  
  20609. /** 
  20610.  * Writes data to a temporary file on filesystem. 
  20611.  * @param $filename (string) file name 
  20612.  * @param $data (mixed) data to write on file 
  20613.  * @param $append (boolean) if true append data, false replace. 
  20614.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20615.  * @protected 
  20616.  */ 
  20617. protected function writeDiskCache($filename, $data, $append=false) { 
  20618.     if ($append) { 
  20619.         $fmode = 'ab+'; 
  20620.     } else { 
  20621.         $fmode = 'wb+'; 
  20622.     } 
  20623.     $f = @fopen($filename, $fmode); 
  20624.     if (!$f) { 
  20625.         $this->Error('Unable to write cache file: '.$filename); 
  20626.     } else { 
  20627.         fwrite($f, $data); 
  20628.         fclose($f); 
  20629.     } 
  20630.     // update file length (needed for transactions) 
  20631.     if (!isset($this->cache_file_length['_'.$filename])) { 
  20632.         $this->cache_file_length['_'.$filename] = strlen($data); 
  20633.     } else { 
  20634.         $this->cache_file_length['_'.$filename] += strlen($data); 
  20635.     } 
  20636. } 
  20637.  
  20638. /** 
  20639.  * Read data from a temporary file on filesystem. 
  20640.  * @param $filename (string) file name 
  20641.  * @return mixed retrieved data 
  20642.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20643.  * @protected 
  20644.  */ 
  20645. protected function readDiskCache($filename) { 
  20646.     return file_get_contents($filename); 
  20647. } 
  20648.  
  20649. /** 
  20650.  * Set buffer content (always append data). 
  20651.  * @param $data (string) data 
  20652.  * @protected 
  20653.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20654.  */ 
  20655. protected function setBuffer($data) { 
  20656.     $this->bufferlen += strlen($data); 
  20657.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20658.         if (!isset($this->buffer) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->buffer)) { 
  20659.             $this->buffer = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('buf'); 
  20660.         } 
  20661.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->buffer, $data, true); 
  20662.     } else { 
  20663.         $this->buffer .= $data; 
  20664.     } 
  20665. } 
  20666.  
  20667. /** 
  20668.  * Replace the buffer content 
  20669.  * @param $data (string) data 
  20670.  * @protected 
  20671.  * @since 5.5.000 (2010-06-22) 
  20672.  */ 
  20673. protected function replaceBuffer($data) { 
  20674.     $this->bufferlen = strlen($data); 
  20675.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20676.         if (!isset($this->buffer) OR TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->buffer)) { 
  20677.             $this->buffer = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('buf'); 
  20678.         } 
  20679.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->buffer, $data, false); 
  20680.     } else { 
  20681.         $this->buffer = $data; 
  20682.     } 
  20683. } 
  20684.  
  20685. /** 
  20686.  * Get buffer content. 
  20687.  * @return string buffer content 
  20688.  * @protected 
  20689.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20690.  */ 
  20691. protected function getBuffer() { 
  20692.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20693.         return $this->readDiskCache($this->buffer); 
  20694.     } else { 
  20695.         return $this->buffer; 
  20696.     } 
  20697. } 
  20698.  
  20699. /** 
  20700.  * Set page buffer content. 
  20701.  * @param $page (int) page number 
  20702.  * @param $data (string) page data 
  20703.  * @param $append (boolean) if true append data, false replace. 
  20704.  * @protected 
  20705.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20706.  */ 
  20707. protected function setPageBuffer($page, $data, $append=false) { 
  20708.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20709.         if (!isset($this->pages[$page])) { 
  20710.             $this->pages[$page] = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('page'); 
  20711.         } 
  20712.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->pages[$page], $data, $append); 
  20713.     } else { 
  20714.         if ($append) { 
  20715.             $this->pages[$page] .= $data; 
  20716.         } else { 
  20717.             $this->pages[$page] = $data; 
  20718.         } 
  20719.     } 
  20720.     if ($append AND isset($this->pagelen[$page])) { 
  20721.         $this->pagelen[$page] += strlen($data); 
  20722.     } else { 
  20723.         $this->pagelen[$page] = strlen($data); 
  20724.     } 
  20725. } 
  20726.  
  20727. /** 
  20728.  * Get page buffer content. 
  20729.  * @param $page (int) page number 
  20730.  * @return string page buffer content or false in case of error 
  20731.  * @protected 
  20732.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20733.  */ 
  20734. protected function getPageBuffer($page) { 
  20735.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20736.         return $this->readDiskCache($this->pages[$page]); 
  20737.     } elseif (isset($this->pages[$page])) { 
  20738.         return $this->pages[$page]; 
  20739.     } 
  20740.     return false; 
  20741. } 
  20742.  
  20743. /** 
  20744.  * Set image buffer content. 
  20745.  * @param $image (string) image key 
  20746.  * @param $data (array) image data 
  20747.  * @return int image index number 
  20748.  * @protected 
  20749.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20750.  */ 
  20751. protected function setImageBuffer($image, $data) { 
  20752.     if (($data['i'] = array_search($image, $this->imagekeys)) === FALSE) { 
  20753.         $this->imagekeys[$this->numimages] = $image; 
  20754.         $data['i'] = $this->numimages; 
  20755.         ++$this->numimages; 
  20756.     } 
  20757.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20758.         if (!isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20759.             $this->images[$image] = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('img'); 
  20760.         } 
  20761.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->images[$image], serialize($data)); 
  20762.     } else { 
  20763.         $this->images[$image] = $data; 
  20764.     } 
  20765.     return $data['i']; 
  20766. } 
  20767.  
  20768. /** 
  20769.  * Set image buffer content for a specified sub-key. 
  20770.  * @param $image (string) image key 
  20771.  * @param $key (string) image sub-key 
  20772.  * @param $data (array) image data 
  20773.  * @protected 
  20774.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20775.  */ 
  20776. protected function setImageSubBuffer($image, $key, $data) { 
  20777.     if (!isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20778.         $this->setImageBuffer($image, array()); 
  20779.     } 
  20780.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20781.         $tmpimg = $this->getImageBuffer($image); 
  20782.         $tmpimg[$key] = $data; 
  20783.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->images[$image], serialize($tmpimg)); 
  20784.     } else { 
  20785.         $this->images[$image][$key] = $data; 
  20786.     } 
  20787. } 
  20788.  
  20789. /** 
  20790.  * Get image buffer content. 
  20791.  * @param $image (string) image key 
  20792.  * @return string image buffer content or false in case of error 
  20793.  * @protected 
  20794.  * @since 4.5.000 (2008-12-31) 
  20795.  */ 
  20796. protected function getImageBuffer($image) { 
  20797.     if ($this->diskcache AND isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20798.         return unserialize($this->readDiskCache($this->images[$image])); 
  20799.     } elseif (isset($this->images[$image])) { 
  20800.         return $this->images[$image]; 
  20801.     } 
  20802.     return false; 
  20803. } 
  20804.  
  20805. /** 
  20806.  * Set font buffer content. 
  20807.  * @param $font (string) font key 
  20808.  * @param $data (array) font data 
  20809.  * @protected 
  20810.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20811.  */ 
  20812. protected function setFontBuffer($font, $data) { 
  20813.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20814.         if (!isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20815.             $this->fonts[$font] = TCPDF_STATIC::getObjFilename('font'); 
  20816.         } 
  20817.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->fonts[$font], serialize($data)); 
  20818.     } else { 
  20819.         $this->fonts[$font] = $data; 
  20820.     } 
  20821.     if (!in_array($font, $this->fontkeys)) { 
  20822.         $this->fontkeys[] = $font; 
  20823.         // store object ID for current font 
  20824.         ++$this->n; 
  20825.         $this->font_obj_ids[$font] = $this->n; 
  20826.         $this->setFontSubBuffer($font, 'n', $this->n); 
  20827.     } 
  20828. } 
  20829.  
  20830. /** 
  20831.  * Set font buffer content. 
  20832.  * @param $font (string) font key 
  20833.  * @param $key (string) font sub-key 
  20834.  * @param $data (array) font data 
  20835.  * @protected 
  20836.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20837.  */ 
  20838. protected function setFontSubBuffer($font, $key, $data) { 
  20839.     if (!isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20840.         $this->setFontBuffer($font, array()); 
  20841.     } 
  20842.     if ($this->diskcache) { 
  20843.         $tmpfont = $this->getFontBuffer($font); 
  20844.         $tmpfont[$key] = $data; 
  20845.         $this->writeDiskCache($this->fonts[$font], serialize($tmpfont)); 
  20846.     } else { 
  20847.         $this->fonts[$font][$key] = $data; 
  20848.     } 
  20849. } 
  20850.  
  20851. /** 
  20852.  * Get font buffer content. 
  20853.  * @param $font (string) font key 
  20854.  * @return string font buffer content or false in case of error 
  20855.  * @protected 
  20856.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20857.  */ 
  20858. protected function getFontBuffer($font) { 
  20859.     if ($this->diskcache AND isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20860.         return unserialize($this->readDiskCache($this->fonts[$font])); 
  20861.     } elseif (isset($this->fonts[$font])) { 
  20862.         return $this->fonts[$font]; 
  20863.     } 
  20864.     return false; 
  20865. } 
  20866.  
  20867. /** 
  20868.  * Move a page to a previous position. 
  20869.  * @param $frompage (int) number of the source page 
  20870.  * @param $topage (int) number of the destination page (must be less than $frompage) 
  20871.  * @return true in case of success, false in case of error. 
  20872.  * @public 
  20873.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  20874.  */ 
  20875. public function movePage($frompage, $topage) { 
  20876.     if (($frompage > $this->numpages) OR ($frompage <= $topage)) { 
  20877.         return false; 
  20878.     } 
  20879.     if ($frompage == $this->page) { 
  20880.         // close the page before moving it 
  20881.         $this->endPage(); 
  20882.     } 
  20883.     // move all page-related states 
  20884.     $tmppage = $this->getPageBuffer($frompage); 
  20885.     $tmppagedim = $this->pagedim[$frompage]; 
  20886.     $tmppagelen = $this->pagelen[$frompage]; 
  20887.     $tmpintmrk = $this->intmrk[$frompage]; 
  20888.     $tmpbordermrk = $this->bordermrk[$frompage]; 
  20889.     $tmpcntmrk = $this->cntmrk[$frompage]; 
  20890.     $tmppageobjects = $this->pageobjects[$frompage]; 
  20891.     if (isset($this->footerpos[$frompage])) { 
  20892.         $tmpfooterpos = $this->footerpos[$frompage]; 
  20893.     } 
  20894.     if (isset($this->footerlen[$frompage])) { 
  20895.         $tmpfooterlen = $this->footerlen[$frompage]; 
  20896.     } 
  20897.     if (isset($this->transfmrk[$frompage])) { 
  20898.         $tmptransfmrk = $this->transfmrk[$frompage]; 
  20899.     } 
  20900.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$frompage])) { 
  20901.         $tmpannots = $this->PageAnnots[$frompage]; 
  20902.     } 
  20903.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup) AND !empty($this->newpagegroup)) { 
  20904.         for ($i = $frompage; $i > $topage; --$i) { 
  20905.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$i]) AND (($i + $this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]) > $frompage)) { 
  20906.                 --$this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]; 
  20907.                 break; 
  20908.             } 
  20909.         } 
  20910.         for ($i = $topage; $i > 0; --$i) { 
  20911.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$i]) AND (($i + $this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]) > $topage)) { 
  20912.                 ++$this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]; 
  20913.                 break; 
  20914.             } 
  20915.         } 
  20916.     } 
  20917.     for ($i = $frompage; $i > $topage; --$i) { 
  20918.         $j = $i - 1; 
  20919.         // shift pages down 
  20920.         $this->setPageBuffer($i, $this->getPageBuffer($j)); 
  20921.         $this->pagedim[$i] = $this->pagedim[$j]; 
  20922.         $this->pagelen[$i] = $this->pagelen[$j]; 
  20923.         $this->intmrk[$i] = $this->intmrk[$j]; 
  20924.         $this->bordermrk[$i] = $this->bordermrk[$j]; 
  20925.         $this->cntmrk[$i] = $this->cntmrk[$j]; 
  20926.         $this->pageobjects[$i] = $this->pageobjects[$j]; 
  20927.         if (isset($this->footerpos[$j])) { 
  20928.             $this->footerpos[$i] = $this->footerpos[$j]; 
  20929.         } elseif (isset($this->footerpos[$i])) { 
  20930.             unset($this->footerpos[$i]); 
  20931.         } 
  20932.         if (isset($this->footerlen[$j])) { 
  20933.             $this->footerlen[$i] = $this->footerlen[$j]; 
  20934.         } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$i])) { 
  20935.             unset($this->footerlen[$i]); 
  20936.         } 
  20937.         if (isset($this->transfmrk[$j])) { 
  20938.             $this->transfmrk[$i] = $this->transfmrk[$j]; 
  20939.         } elseif (isset($this->transfmrk[$i])) { 
  20940.             unset($this->transfmrk[$i]); 
  20941.         } 
  20942.         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$j])) { 
  20943.             $this->PageAnnots[$i] = $this->PageAnnots[$j]; 
  20944.         } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$i])) { 
  20945.             unset($this->PageAnnots[$i]); 
  20946.         } 
  20947.         if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$j])) { 
  20948.             $this->newpagegroup[$i] = $this->newpagegroup[$j]; 
  20949.             unset($this->newpagegroup[$j]); 
  20950.         } 
  20951.         if ($this->currpagegroup == $j) { 
  20952.             $this->currpagegroup = $i; 
  20953.         } 
  20954.     } 
  20955.     $this->setPageBuffer($topage, $tmppage); 
  20956.     $this->pagedim[$topage] = $tmppagedim; 
  20957.     $this->pagelen[$topage] = $tmppagelen; 
  20958.     $this->intmrk[$topage] = $tmpintmrk; 
  20959.     $this->bordermrk[$topage] = $tmpbordermrk; 
  20960.     $this->cntmrk[$topage] = $tmpcntmrk; 
  20961.     $this->pageobjects[$topage] = $tmppageobjects; 
  20962.     if (isset($tmpfooterpos)) { 
  20963.         $this->footerpos[$topage] = $tmpfooterpos; 
  20964.     } elseif (isset($this->footerpos[$topage])) { 
  20965.         unset($this->footerpos[$topage]); 
  20966.     } 
  20967.     if (isset($tmpfooterlen)) { 
  20968.         $this->footerlen[$topage] = $tmpfooterlen; 
  20969.     } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$topage])) { 
  20970.         unset($this->footerlen[$topage]); 
  20971.     } 
  20972.     if (isset($tmptransfmrk)) { 
  20973.         $this->transfmrk[$topage] = $tmptransfmrk; 
  20974.     } elseif (isset($this->transfmrk[$topage])) { 
  20975.         unset($this->transfmrk[$topage]); 
  20976.     } 
  20977.     if (isset($tmpannots)) { 
  20978.         $this->PageAnnots[$topage] = $tmpannots; 
  20979.     } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$topage])) { 
  20980.         unset($this->PageAnnots[$topage]); 
  20981.     } 
  20982.     // adjust outlines 
  20983.     $tmpoutlines = $this->outlines; 
  20984.     foreach ($tmpoutlines as $key => $outline) { 
  20985.         if (!$outline['f']) { 
  20986.             if (($outline['p'] >= $topage) AND ($outline['p'] < $frompage)) { 
  20987.                 $this->outlines[$key]['p'] = ($outline['p'] + 1); 
  20988.             } elseif ($outline['p'] == $frompage) { 
  20989.                 $this->outlines[$key]['p'] = $topage; 
  20990.             } 
  20991.         } 
  20992.     } 
  20993.     // adjust dests 
  20994.     $tmpdests = $this->dests; 
  20995.     foreach ($tmpdests as $key => $dest) { 
  20996.         if (!$dest['f']) { 
  20997.             if (($dest['p'] >= $topage) AND ($dest['p'] < $frompage)) { 
  20998.                 $this->dests[$key]['p'] = ($dest['p'] + 1); 
  20999.             } elseif ($dest['p'] == $frompage) { 
  21000.                 $this->dests[$key]['p'] = $topage; 
  21001.             } 
  21002.         } 
  21003.     } 
  21004.     // adjust links 
  21005.     $tmplinks = $this->links; 
  21006.     foreach ($tmplinks as $key => $link) { 
  21007.         if (!$link['f']) { 
  21008.             if (($link['p'] >= $topage) AND ($link['p'] < $frompage)) { 
  21009.                 $this->links[$key]['p'] = ($link['p'] + 1); 
  21010.             } elseif ($link['p'] == $frompage) { 
  21011.                 $this->links[$key]['p'] = $topage; 
  21012.             } 
  21013.         } 
  21014.     } 
  21015.     // adjust javascript 
  21016.     $jfrompage = $frompage; 
  21017.     $jtopage = $topage; 
  21018.     if (preg_match_all('/this\.addField\(\'([^\']*)\', \'([^\']*)\', ([0-9]+)/', $this->javascript, $pamatch) > 0) { 
  21019.         foreach($pamatch[0] as $pk => $pmatch) { 
  21020.             $pagenum = intval($pamatch[3][$pk]) + 1; 
  21021.             if (($pagenum >= $jtopage) AND ($pagenum < $jfrompage)) { 
  21022.                 $newpage = ($pagenum + 1); 
  21023.             } elseif ($pagenum == $jfrompage) { 
  21024.                 $newpage = $jtopage; 
  21025.             } else { 
  21026.                 $newpage = $pagenum; 
  21027.             } 
  21028.             --$newpage; 
  21029.             $newjs = "this.addField(\'".$pamatch[1][$pk]."\', \'".$pamatch[2][$pk]."\', ".$newpage; 
  21030.             $this->javascript = str_replace($pmatch, $newjs, $this->javascript); 
  21031.         } 
  21032.         unset($pamatch); 
  21033.     } 
  21034.     // return to last page 
  21035.     $this->lastPage(true); 
  21036.     return true; 
  21037. } 
  21038.  
  21039. /** 
  21040.  * Remove the specified page. 
  21041.  * @param $page (int) page to remove 
  21042.  * @return true in case of success, false in case of error. 
  21043.  * @public 
  21044.  * @since 4.6.004 (2009-04-23) 
  21045.  */ 
  21046. public function deletePage($page) { 
  21047.     if (($page < 1) OR ($page > $this->numpages)) { 
  21048.         return false; 
  21049.     } 
  21050.     // delete current page 
  21051.     unset($this->pages[$page]); 
  21052.     unset($this->pagedim[$page]); 
  21053.     unset($this->pagelen[$page]); 
  21054.     unset($this->intmrk[$page]); 
  21055.     unset($this->bordermrk[$page]); 
  21056.     unset($this->cntmrk[$page]); 
  21057.     foreach ($this->pageobjects[$page] as $oid) { 
  21058.         if (isset($this->offsets[$oid])) { 
  21059.             unset($this->offsets[$oid]); 
  21060.         } 
  21061.     } 
  21062.     unset($this->pageobjects[$page]); 
  21063.     if (isset($this->footerpos[$page])) { 
  21064.         unset($this->footerpos[$page]); 
  21065.     } 
  21066.     if (isset($this->footerlen[$page])) { 
  21067.         unset($this->footerlen[$page]); 
  21068.     } 
  21069.     if (isset($this->transfmrk[$page])) { 
  21070.         unset($this->transfmrk[$page]); 
  21071.     } 
  21072.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$page])) { 
  21073.         unset($this->PageAnnots[$page]); 
  21074.     } 
  21075.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup) AND !empty($this->newpagegroup)) { 
  21076.         for ($i = $page; $i > 0; --$i) { 
  21077.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$i]) AND (($i + $this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]) > $page)) { 
  21078.                 --$this->pagegroups[$this->newpagegroup[$i]]; 
  21079.                 break; 
  21080.             } 
  21081.         } 
  21082.     } 
  21083.     if (isset($this->pageopen[$page])) { 
  21084.         unset($this->pageopen[$page]); 
  21085.     } 
  21086.     if ($page < $this->numpages) { 
  21087.         // update remaining pages 
  21088.         for ($i = $page; $i < $this->numpages; ++$i) { 
  21089.             $j = $i + 1; 
  21090.             // shift pages 
  21091.             $this->setPageBuffer($i, $this->getPageBuffer($j)); 
  21092.             $this->pagedim[$i] = $this->pagedim[$j]; 
  21093.             $this->pagelen[$i] = $this->pagelen[$j]; 
  21094.             $this->intmrk[$i] = $this->intmrk[$j]; 
  21095.             $this->bordermrk[$i] = $this->bordermrk[$j]; 
  21096.             $this->cntmrk[$i] = $this->cntmrk[$j]; 
  21097.             $this->pageobjects[$i] = $this->pageobjects[$j]; 
  21098.             if (isset($this->footerpos[$j])) { 
  21099.                 $this->footerpos[$i] = $this->footerpos[$j]; 
  21100.             } elseif (isset($this->footerpos[$i])) { 
  21101.                 unset($this->footerpos[$i]); 
  21102.             } 
  21103.             if (isset($this->footerlen[$j])) { 
  21104.                 $this->footerlen[$i] = $this->footerlen[$j]; 
  21105.             } elseif (isset($this->footerlen[$i])) { 
  21106.                 unset($this->footerlen[$i]); 
  21107.             } 
  21108.             if (isset($this->transfmrk[$j])) { 
  21109.                 $this->transfmrk[$i] = $this->transfmrk[$j]; 
  21110.             } elseif (isset($this->transfmrk[$i])) { 
  21111.                 unset($this->transfmrk[$i]); 
  21112.             } 
  21113.             if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$j])) { 
  21114.                 $this->PageAnnots[$i] = $this->PageAnnots[$j]; 
  21115.             } elseif (isset($this->PageAnnots[$i])) { 
  21116.                 unset($this->PageAnnots[$i]); 
  21117.             } 
  21118.             if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$j])) { 
  21119.                 $this->newpagegroup[$i] = $this->newpagegroup[$j]; 
  21120.                 unset($this->newpagegroup[$j]); 
  21121.             } 
  21122.             if ($this->currpagegroup == $j) { 
  21123.                 $this->currpagegroup = $i; 
  21124.             } 
  21125.             if (isset($this->pageopen[$j])) { 
  21126.                 $this->pageopen[$i] = $this->pageopen[$j]; 
  21127.             } elseif (isset($this->pageopen[$i])) { 
  21128.                 unset($this->pageopen[$i]); 
  21129.             } 
  21130.         } 
  21131.         // remove last page 
  21132.         unset($this->pages[$this->numpages]); 
  21133.         unset($this->pagedim[$this->numpages]); 
  21134.         unset($this->pagelen[$this->numpages]); 
  21135.         unset($this->intmrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21136.         unset($this->bordermrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21137.         unset($this->cntmrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21138.         foreach ($this->pageobjects[$this->numpages] as $oid) { 
  21139.             if (isset($this->offsets[$oid])) { 
  21140.                 unset($this->offsets[$oid]); 
  21141.             } 
  21142.         } 
  21143.         unset($this->pageobjects[$this->numpages]); 
  21144.         if (isset($this->footerpos[$this->numpages])) { 
  21145.             unset($this->footerpos[$this->numpages]); 
  21146.         } 
  21147.         if (isset($this->footerlen[$this->numpages])) { 
  21148.             unset($this->footerlen[$this->numpages]); 
  21149.         } 
  21150.         if (isset($this->transfmrk[$this->numpages])) { 
  21151.             unset($this->transfmrk[$this->numpages]); 
  21152.         } 
  21153.         if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$this->numpages])) { 
  21154.             unset($this->PageAnnots[$this->numpages]); 
  21155.         } 
  21156.         if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$this->numpages])) { 
  21157.             unset($this->newpagegroup[$this->numpages]); 
  21158.         } 
  21159.         if ($this->currpagegroup == $this->numpages) { 
  21160.             $this->currpagegroup = ($this->numpages - 1); 
  21161.         } 
  21162.         if (isset($this->pagegroups[$this->numpages])) { 
  21163.             unset($this->pagegroups[$this->numpages]); 
  21164.         } 
  21165.         if (isset($this->pageopen[$this->numpages])) { 
  21166.             unset($this->pageopen[$this->numpages]); 
  21167.         } 
  21168.     } 
  21169.     --$this->numpages; 
  21170.     $this->page = $this->numpages; 
  21171.     // adjust outlines 
  21172.     $tmpoutlines = $this->outlines; 
  21173.     foreach ($tmpoutlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21174.         if (!$outline['f']) { 
  21175.             if ($outline['p'] > $page) { 
  21176.                 $this->outlines[$key]['p'] = $outline['p'] - 1; 
  21177.             } elseif ($outline['p'] == $page) { 
  21178.                 unset($this->outlines[$key]); 
  21179.             } 
  21180.         } 
  21181.     } 
  21182.     // adjust dests 
  21183.     $tmpdests = $this->dests; 
  21184.     foreach ($tmpdests as $key => $dest) { 
  21185.         if (!$dest['f']) { 
  21186.             if ($dest['p'] > $page) { 
  21187.                 $this->dests[$key]['p'] = $dest['p'] - 1; 
  21188.             } elseif ($dest['p'] == $page) { 
  21189.                 unset($this->dests[$key]); 
  21190.             } 
  21191.         } 
  21192.     } 
  21193.     // adjust links 
  21194.     $tmplinks = $this->links; 
  21195.     foreach ($tmplinks as $key => $link) { 
  21196.         if (!$link['f']) { 
  21197.             if ($link['p'] > $page) { 
  21198.                 $this->links[$key]['p'] = $link['p'] - 1; 
  21199.             } elseif ($link['p'] == $page) { 
  21200.                 unset($this->links[$key]); 
  21201.             } 
  21202.         } 
  21203.     } 
  21204.     // adjust javascript 
  21205.     $jpage = $page; 
  21206.     if (preg_match_all('/this\.addField\(\'([^\']*)\', \'([^\']*)\', ([0-9]+)/', $this->javascript, $pamatch) > 0) { 
  21207.         foreach($pamatch[0] as $pk => $pmatch) { 
  21208.             $pagenum = intval($pamatch[3][$pk]) + 1; 
  21209.             if ($pagenum >= $jpage) { 
  21210.                 $newpage = ($pagenum - 1); 
  21211.             } elseif ($pagenum == $jpage) { 
  21212.                 $newpage = 1; 
  21213.             } else { 
  21214.                 $newpage = $pagenum; 
  21215.             } 
  21216.             --$newpage; 
  21217.             $newjs = "this.addField(\'".$pamatch[1][$pk]."\', \'".$pamatch[2][$pk]."\', ".$newpage; 
  21218.             $this->javascript = str_replace($pmatch, $newjs, $this->javascript); 
  21219.         } 
  21220.         unset($pamatch); 
  21221.     } 
  21222.     // return to last page 
  21223.     if ($this->numpages > 0) { 
  21224.         $this->lastPage(true); 
  21225.     } 
  21226.     return true; 
  21227. } 
  21228.  
  21229. /** 
  21230.  * Clone the specified page to a new page. 
  21231.  * @param $page (int) number of page to copy (0 = current page) 
  21232.  * @return true in case of success, false in case of error. 
  21233.  * @public 
  21234.  * @since 4.9.015 (2010-04-20) 
  21235.  */ 
  21236. public function copyPage($page=0) { 
  21237.     if ($page == 0) { 
  21238.         // default value 
  21239.         $page = $this->page; 
  21240.     } 
  21241.     if (($page < 1) OR ($page > $this->numpages)) { 
  21242.         return false; 
  21243.     } 
  21244.     // close the last page 
  21245.     $this->endPage(); 
  21246.     // copy all page-related states 
  21247.     ++$this->numpages; 
  21248.     $this->page = $this->numpages; 
  21249.     $this->setPageBuffer($this->page, $this->getPageBuffer($page)); 
  21250.     $this->pagedim[$this->page] = $this->pagedim[$page]; 
  21251.     $this->pagelen[$this->page] = $this->pagelen[$page]; 
  21252.     $this->intmrk[$this->page] = $this->intmrk[$page]; 
  21253.     $this->bordermrk[$this->page] = $this->bordermrk[$page]; 
  21254.     $this->cntmrk[$this->page] = $this->cntmrk[$page]; 
  21255.     $this->pageobjects[$this->page] = $this->pageobjects[$page]; 
  21256.     $this->pageopen[$this->page] = false; 
  21257.     if (isset($this->footerpos[$page])) { 
  21258.         $this->footerpos[$this->page] = $this->footerpos[$page]; 
  21259.     } 
  21260.     if (isset($this->footerlen[$page])) { 
  21261.         $this->footerlen[$this->page] = $this->footerlen[$page]; 
  21262.     } 
  21263.     if (isset($this->transfmrk[$page])) { 
  21264.         $this->transfmrk[$this->page] = $this->transfmrk[$page]; 
  21265.     } 
  21266.     if (isset($this->PageAnnots[$page])) { 
  21267.         $this->PageAnnots[$this->page] = $this->PageAnnots[$page]; 
  21268.     } 
  21269.     if (isset($this->newpagegroup[$page])) { 
  21270.         // start a new group 
  21271.         $this->newpagegroup[$this->page] = sizeof($this->newpagegroup) + 1; 
  21272.         $this->currpagegroup = $this->newpagegroup[$this->page]; 
  21273.         $this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup] = 1; 
  21274.     } elseif (isset($this->currpagegroup) AND ($this->currpagegroup > 0)) { 
  21275.         ++$this->pagegroups[$this->currpagegroup]; 
  21276.     } 
  21277.     // copy outlines 
  21278.     $tmpoutlines = $this->outlines; 
  21279.     foreach ($tmpoutlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21280.         if ($outline['p'] == $page) { 
  21281.             $this->outlines[] = array('t' => $outline['t'], 'l' => $outline['l'], 'x' => $outline['x'], 'y' => $outline['y'], 'p' => $this->page, 'f' => $outline['f'], 's' => $outline['s'], 'c' => $outline['c']); 
  21282.         } 
  21283.     } 
  21284.     // copy links 
  21285.     $tmplinks = $this->links; 
  21286.     foreach ($tmplinks as $key => $link) { 
  21287.         if ($link['p'] == $page) { 
  21288.             $this->links[] = array('p' => $this->page, 'y' => $link['y'], 'f' => $link['f']); 
  21289.         } 
  21290.     } 
  21291.     // return to last page 
  21292.     $this->lastPage(true); 
  21293.     return true; 
  21294. } 
  21295.  
  21296. /** 
  21297.  * Output a Table of Content Index (TOC). 
  21298.  * This method must be called after all Bookmarks were set. 
  21299.  * Before calling this method you have to open the page using the addTOCPage() method. 
  21300.  * After calling this method you have to call endTOCPage() to close the TOC page. 
  21301.  * You can override this method to achieve different styles. 
  21302.  * @param $page (int) page number where this TOC should be inserted (leave empty for current page). 
  21303.  * @param $numbersfont (string) set the font for page numbers (please use monospaced font for better alignment). 
  21304.  * @param $filler (string) string used to fill the space between text and page number. 
  21305.  * @param $toc_name (string) name to use for TOC bookmark. 
  21306.  * @param $style (string) Font style for title: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  21307.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array for bookmark title (values from 0 to 255). 
  21308.  * @public 
  21309.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  21310.  * @since 4.5.000 (2009-01-02) 
  21311.  * @see addTOCPage(), endTOCPage(), addHTMLTOC() 
  21312.  */ 
  21313. public function addTOC($page='', $numbersfont='', $filler='.', $toc_name='TOC', $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0)) { 
  21314.     $fontsize = $this->FontSizePt; 
  21315.     $fontfamily = $this->FontFamily; 
  21316.     $fontstyle = $this->FontStyle; 
  21317.     $w = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  21318.     $spacer = $this->GetStringWidth(chr(32)) * 4; 
  21319.     $lmargin = $this->lMargin; 
  21320.     $rmargin = $this->rMargin; 
  21321.     $x_start = $this->GetX(); 
  21322.     $page_first = $this->page; 
  21323.     $current_page = $this->page; 
  21324.     $page_fill_start = false; 
  21325.     $page_fill_end = false; 
  21326.     $current_column = $this->current_column; 
  21327.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($numbersfont)) { 
  21328.         $numbersfont = $this->default_monospaced_font; 
  21329.     } 
  21330.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($filler)) { 
  21331.         $filler = ' '; 
  21332.     } 
  21333.     if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21334.         $gap = ' '; 
  21335.     } else { 
  21336.         $gap = ''; 
  21337.         if ($page < 1) { 
  21338.             $page = 1; 
  21339.         } 
  21340.     } 
  21341.     $this->SetFont($numbersfont, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  21342.     $numwidth = $this->GetStringWidth('00000'); 
  21343.     $maxpage = 0; //used for pages on attached documents 
  21344.     foreach ($this->outlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21345.         // check for extra pages (used for attachments) 
  21346.         if (($this->page > $page_first) AND ($outline['p'] >= $this->numpages)) { 
  21347.             $outline['p'] += ($this->page - $page_first); 
  21348.         } 
  21349.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21350.             $aligntext = 'R'; 
  21351.             $alignnum = 'L'; 
  21352.         } else { 
  21353.             $aligntext = 'L'; 
  21354.             $alignnum = 'R'; 
  21355.         } 
  21356.         if ($outline['l'] == 0) { 
  21357.             $this->SetFont($fontfamily, $outline['s'].'B', $fontsize); 
  21358.         } else { 
  21359.             $this->SetFont($fontfamily, $outline['s'], $fontsize - $outline['l']); 
  21360.         } 
  21361.         $this->SetTextColorArray($outline['c']); 
  21362.         // check for page break 
  21363.         $this->checkPageBreak(2 * $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize)); 
  21364.         // set margins and X position 
  21365.         if (($this->page == $current_page) AND ($this->current_column == $current_column)) { 
  21366.             $this->lMargin = $lmargin; 
  21367.             $this->rMargin = $rmargin; 
  21368.         } else { 
  21369.             if ($this->current_column != $current_column) { 
  21370.                 if ($this->rtl) { 
  21371.                     $x_start = $this->w - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x']; 
  21372.                 } else { 
  21373.                     $x_start = $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x']; 
  21374.                 } 
  21375.             } 
  21376.             $lmargin = $this->lMargin; 
  21377.             $rmargin = $this->rMargin; 
  21378.             $current_page = $this->page; 
  21379.             $current_column = $this->current_column; 
  21380.         } 
  21381.         $this->SetX($x_start); 
  21382.         $indent = ($spacer * $outline['l']); 
  21383.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21384.             $this->x -= $indent; 
  21385.             $this->rMargin = $this->w - $this->x; 
  21386.         } else { 
  21387.             $this->x += $indent; 
  21388.             $this->lMargin = $this->x; 
  21389.         } 
  21390.         $link = $this->AddLink(); 
  21391.         $this->SetLink($link, $outline['y'], $outline['p']); 
  21392.         // write the text 
  21393.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21394.             $txt = ' '.$outline['t']; 
  21395.         } else { 
  21396.             $txt = $outline['t'].' '; 
  21397.         } 
  21398.         $this->Write(0, $txt, $link, false, $aligntext, false, 0, false, false, 0, $numwidth, ''); 
  21399.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21400.             $tw = $this->x - $this->lMargin; 
  21401.         } else { 
  21402.             $tw = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $this->x; 
  21403.         } 
  21404.         $this->SetFont($numbersfont, $fontstyle, $fontsize); 
  21405.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21406.             $pagenum = $outline['p']; 
  21407.         } else { 
  21408.             // placemark to be replaced with the correct number 
  21409.             $pagenum = '{#'.($outline['p']).'}'; 
  21410.             if ($this->isUnicodeFont()) { 
  21411.                 $pagenum = '{'.$pagenum.'}'; 
  21412.             } 
  21413.             $maxpage = max($maxpage, $outline['p']); 
  21414.         } 
  21415.         $fw = ($tw - $this->GetStringWidth($pagenum.$filler)); 
  21416.         $wfiller = $this->GetStringWidth($filler); 
  21417.         if ($wfiller > 0) { 
  21418.             $numfills = floor($fw / $wfiller); 
  21419.         } else { 
  21420.             $numfills = 0; 
  21421.         } 
  21422.         if ($numfills > 0) { 
  21423.             $rowfill = str_repeat($filler, $numfills); 
  21424.         } else { 
  21425.             $rowfill = ''; 
  21426.         } 
  21427.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21428.             $pagenum = $pagenum.$gap.$rowfill; 
  21429.         } else { 
  21430.             $pagenum = $rowfill.$gap.$pagenum; 
  21431.         } 
  21432.         // write the number 
  21433.         $this->Cell($tw, 0, $pagenum, 0, 1, $alignnum, 0, $link, 0); 
  21434.     } 
  21435.     $page_last = $this->getPage(); 
  21436.     $numpages = ($page_last - $page_first + 1); 
  21437.     // account for booklet mode 
  21438.     if ($this->booklet) { 
  21439.         // check if a blank page is required before TOC 
  21440.         $page_fill_start = ((($page_first % 2) == 0) XOR (($page % 2) == 0)); 
  21441.         $page_fill_end = (!((($numpages % 2) == 0) XOR ($page_fill_start))); 
  21442.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21443.             // add a page at the end (to be moved before TOC) 
  21444.             $this->addPage(); 
  21445.             ++$page_last; 
  21446.             ++$numpages; 
  21447.         } 
  21448.         if ($page_fill_end) { 
  21449.             // add a page at the end 
  21450.             $this->addPage(); 
  21451.             ++$page_last; 
  21452.             ++$numpages; 
  21453.         } 
  21454.     } 
  21455.     $maxpage = max($maxpage, $page_last); 
  21456.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21457.         for ($p = $page_first; $p <= $page_last; ++$p) { 
  21458.             // get page data 
  21459.             $temppage = $this->getPageBuffer($p); 
  21460.             for ($n = 1; $n <= $maxpage; ++$n) { 
  21461.                 // update page numbers 
  21462.                 $a = '{#'.$n.'}'; 
  21463.                 // get page number aliases 
  21464.                 $pnalias = $this->getInternalPageNumberAliases($a); 
  21465.                 // calculate replacement number 
  21466.                 if (($n >= $page) AND ($n <= $this->numpages)) { 
  21467.                     $np = $n + $numpages; 
  21468.                 } else { 
  21469.                     $np = $n; 
  21470.                 } 
  21471.                 $na = TCPDF_STATIC::formatTOCPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $np - 1)); 
  21472.                 $nu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($na, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21473.                 // replace aliases with numbers 
  21474.                 foreach ($pnalias['u'] as $u) { 
  21475.                     $sfill = str_repeat($filler, max(0, (strlen($u) - strlen($nu.' ')))); 
  21476.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  21477.                         $nr = $nu.TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE(' '.$sfill, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21478.                     } else { 
  21479.                         $nr = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($sfill.' ', false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont).$nu; 
  21480.                     } 
  21481.                     $temppage = str_replace($u, $nr, $temppage); 
  21482.                 } 
  21483.                 foreach ($pnalias['a'] as $a) { 
  21484.                     $sfill = str_repeat($filler, max(0, (strlen($a) - strlen($na.' ')))); 
  21485.                     if ($this->rtl) { 
  21486.                         $nr = $na.' '.$sfill; 
  21487.                     } else { 
  21488.                         $nr = $sfill.' '.$na; 
  21489.                     } 
  21490.                     $temppage = str_replace($a, $nr, $temppage); 
  21491.                 } 
  21492.             } 
  21493.             // save changes 
  21494.             $this->setPageBuffer($p, $temppage); 
  21495.         } 
  21496.         // move pages 
  21497.         $this->Bookmark($toc_name, 0, 0, $page_first, $style, $color); 
  21498.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21499.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page_first); 
  21500.         } 
  21501.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numpages; ++$i) { 
  21502.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page); 
  21503.         } 
  21504.     } 
  21505. } 
  21506.  
  21507. /** 
  21508.  * Output a Table Of Content Index (TOC) using HTML templates. 
  21509.  * This method must be called after all Bookmarks were set. 
  21510.  * Before calling this method you have to open the page using the addTOCPage() method. 
  21511.  * After calling this method you have to call endTOCPage() to close the TOC page. 
  21512.  * @param $page (int) page number where this TOC should be inserted (leave empty for current page). 
  21513.  * @param $toc_name (string) name to use for TOC bookmark. 
  21514.  * @param $templates (array) array of html templates. Use: "#TOC_DESCRIPTION#" for bookmark title, "#TOC_PAGE_NUMBER#" for page number. 
  21515.  * @param $correct_align (boolean) if true correct the number alignment (numbers must be in monospaced font like courier and right aligned on LTR, or left aligned on RTL) 
  21516.  * @param $style (string) Font style for title: B = Bold, I = Italic, BI = Bold + Italic. 
  21517.  * @param $color (array) RGB color array for title (values from 0 to 255). 
  21518.  * @public 
  21519.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  21520.  * @since 5.0.001 (2010-05-06) 
  21521.  * @see addTOCPage(), endTOCPage(), addTOC() 
  21522.  */ 
  21523. public function addHTMLTOC($page='', $toc_name='TOC', $templates=array(), $correct_align=true, $style='', $color=array(0, 0, 0)) { 
  21524.     $filler = ' '; 
  21525.     $prev_htmlLinkColorArray = $this->htmlLinkColorArray; 
  21526.     $prev_htmlLinkFontStyle = $this->htmlLinkFontStyle; 
  21527.     // set new style for link 
  21528.     $this->htmlLinkColorArray = array(); 
  21529.     $this->htmlLinkFontStyle = ''; 
  21530.     $page_first = $this->getPage(); 
  21531.     $page_fill_start = false; 
  21532.     $page_fill_end = false; 
  21533.     // get the font type used for numbers in each template 
  21534.     $current_font = $this->FontFamily; 
  21535.     foreach ($templates as $level => $html) { 
  21536.         $dom = $this->getHtmlDomArray($html); 
  21537.         foreach ($dom as $key => $value) { 
  21538.             if ($value['value'] == '#TOC_PAGE_NUMBER#') { 
  21539.                 $this->SetFont($dom[($key - 1)]['fontname']); 
  21540.                 $templates['F'.$level] = $this->isUnicodeFont(); 
  21541.             } 
  21542.         } 
  21543.     } 
  21544.     $this->SetFont($current_font); 
  21545.     $maxpage = 0; //used for pages on attached documents 
  21546.     foreach ($this->outlines as $key => $outline) { 
  21547.         // get HTML template 
  21548.         $row = $templates[$outline['l']]; 
  21549.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21550.             $pagenum = $outline['p']; 
  21551.         } else { 
  21552.             // placemark to be replaced with the correct number 
  21553.             $pagenum = '{#'.($outline['p']).'}'; 
  21554.             if ($templates['F'.$outline['l']]) { 
  21555.                 $pagenum = '{'.$pagenum.'}'; 
  21556.             } 
  21557.             $maxpage = max($maxpage, $outline['p']); 
  21558.         } 
  21559.         // replace templates with current values 
  21560.         $row = str_replace('#TOC_DESCRIPTION#', $outline['t'], $row); 
  21561.         $row = str_replace('#TOC_PAGE_NUMBER#', $pagenum, $row); 
  21562.         // add link to page 
  21563.         $row = '<a href="#'.$outline['p'].', '.$outline['y'].'">'.$row.'</a>'; 
  21564.         // write bookmark entry 
  21565.         $this->writeHTML($row, false, false, true, false, ''); 
  21566.     } 
  21567.     // restore link styles 
  21568.     $this->htmlLinkColorArray = $prev_htmlLinkColorArray; 
  21569.     $this->htmlLinkFontStyle = $prev_htmlLinkFontStyle; 
  21570.     // move TOC page and replace numbers 
  21571.     $page_last = $this->getPage(); 
  21572.     $numpages = ($page_last - $page_first + 1); 
  21573.     // account for booklet mode 
  21574.     if ($this->booklet) { 
  21575.         // check if a blank page is required before TOC 
  21576.         $page_fill_start = ((($page_first % 2) == 0) XOR (($page % 2) == 0)); 
  21577.         $page_fill_end = (!((($numpages % 2) == 0) XOR ($page_fill_start))); 
  21578.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21579.             // add a page at the end (to be moved before TOC) 
  21580.             $this->addPage(); 
  21581.             ++$page_last; 
  21582.             ++$numpages; 
  21583.         } 
  21584.         if ($page_fill_end) { 
  21585.             // add a page at the end 
  21586.             $this->addPage(); 
  21587.             ++$page_last; 
  21588.             ++$numpages; 
  21589.         } 
  21590.     } 
  21591.     $maxpage = max($maxpage, $page_last); 
  21592.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($page)) { 
  21593.         for ($p = $page_first; $p <= $page_last; ++$p) { 
  21594.             // get page data 
  21595.             $temppage = $this->getPageBuffer($p); 
  21596.             for ($n = 1; $n <= $maxpage; ++$n) { 
  21597.                 // update page numbers 
  21598.                 $a = '{#'.$n.'}'; 
  21599.                 // get page number aliases 
  21600.                 $pnalias = $this->getInternalPageNumberAliases($a); 
  21601.                 // calculate replacement number 
  21602.                 if ($n >= $page) { 
  21603.                     $np = $n + $numpages; 
  21604.                 } else { 
  21605.                     $np = $n; 
  21606.                 } 
  21607.                 $na = TCPDF_STATIC::formatTOCPageNumber(($this->starting_page_number + $np - 1));
