  21608.                 $nu = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($na, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21609.                 // replace aliases with numbers 
  21610.                 foreach ($pnalias['u'] as $u) { 
  21611.                     if ($correct_align) { 
  21612.                         $sfill = str_repeat($filler, (strlen($u) - strlen($nu.' '))); 
  21613.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21614.                             $nr = $nu.TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE(' '.$sfill, false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  21615.                         } else { 
  21616.                             $nr = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ToUTF16BE($sfill.' ', false, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont).$nu; 
  21617.                         } 
  21618.                     } else { 
  21619.                         $nr = $nu; 
  21620.                     } 
  21621.                     $temppage = str_replace($u, $nr, $temppage); 
  21622.                 } 
  21623.                 foreach ($pnalias['a'] as $a) { 
  21624.                     if ($correct_align) { 
  21625.                         $sfill = str_repeat($filler, (strlen($a) - strlen($na.' '))); 
  21626.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21627.                             $nr = $na.' '.$sfill; 
  21628.                         } else { 
  21629.                             $nr = $sfill.' '.$na; 
  21630.                         } 
  21631.                     } else { 
  21632.                         $nr = $na; 
  21633.                     } 
  21634.                     $temppage = str_replace($a, $nr, $temppage); 
  21635.                 } 
  21636.             } 
  21637.             // save changes 
  21638.             $this->setPageBuffer($p, $temppage); 
  21639.         } 
  21640.         // move pages 
  21641.         $this->Bookmark($toc_name, 0, 0, $page_first, $style, $color); 
  21642.         if ($page_fill_start) { 
  21643.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page_first); 
  21644.         } 
  21645.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numpages; ++$i) { 
  21646.             $this->movePage($page_last, $page); 
  21647.         } 
  21648.     } 
  21649. } 
  21650.  
  21651. /** 
  21652.  * Stores a copy of the current TCPDF object used for undo operation. 
  21653.  * @public 
  21654.  * @since 4.5.029 (2009-03-19) 
  21655.  */ 
  21656. public function startTransaction() { 
  21657.     if (isset($this->objcopy)) { 
  21658.         // remove previous copy 
  21659.         $this->commitTransaction(); 
  21660.     } 
  21661.     // record current page number and Y position 
  21662.     $this->start_transaction_page = $this->page; 
  21663.     $this->start_transaction_y = $this->y; 
  21664.     // clone current object 
  21665.     $this->objcopy = TCPDF_STATIC::objclone($this); 
  21666. } 
  21667.  
  21668. /** 
  21669.  * Delete the copy of the current TCPDF object used for undo operation. 
  21670.  * @public 
  21671.  * @since 4.5.029 (2009-03-19) 
  21672.  */ 
  21673. public function commitTransaction() { 
  21674.     if (isset($this->objcopy)) { 
  21675.         $this->objcopy->_destroy(true, true); 
  21676.         unset($this->objcopy); 
  21677.     } 
  21678. } 
  21679.  
  21680. /** 
  21681.  * This method allows to undo the latest transaction by returning the latest saved TCPDF object with startTransaction(). 
  21682.  * @param $self (boolean) if true restores current class object to previous state without the need of reassignment via the returned value. 
  21683.  * @return TCPDF object. 
  21684.  * @public 
  21685.  * @since 4.5.029 (2009-03-19) 
  21686.  */ 
  21687. public function rollbackTransaction($self=false) { 
  21688.     if (isset($this->objcopy)) { 
  21689.         if (isset($this->objcopy->diskcache) AND $this->objcopy->diskcache) { 
  21690.             // truncate files to previous values 
  21691.             foreach ($this->objcopy->cache_file_length as $file => $length) { 
  21692.                 $file = substr($file, 1); 
  21693.                 $handle = fopen($file, 'r+'); 
  21694.                 ftruncate($handle, $length); 
  21695.             } 
  21696.         } 
  21697.         $this->_destroy(true, true); 
  21698.         if ($self) { 
  21699.             $objvars = get_object_vars($this->objcopy); 
  21700.             foreach ($objvars as $key => $value) { 
  21701.                 $this->$key = $value; 
  21702.             } 
  21703.         } 
  21704.         return $this->objcopy; 
  21705.     } 
  21706.     return $this; 
  21707. } 
  21708.  
  21709. // --- MULTI COLUMNS METHODS ----------------------- 
  21710.  
  21711. /** 
  21712.  * Set multiple columns of the same size 
  21713.  * @param $numcols (int) number of columns (set to zero to disable columns mode) 
  21714.  * @param $width (int) column width 
  21715.  * @param $y (int) column starting Y position (leave empty for current Y position) 
  21716.  * @public 
  21717.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  21718.  */ 
  21719. public function setEqualColumns($numcols=0, $width=0, $y='') { 
  21720.     $this->columns = array(); 
  21721.     if ($numcols < 2) { 
  21722.         $numcols = 0; 
  21723.         $this->columns = array(); 
  21724.     } else { 
  21725.         // maximum column width 
  21726.         $maxwidth = ($this->w - $this->original_lMargin - $this->original_rMargin) / $numcols; 
  21727.         if (($width == 0) OR ($width > $maxwidth)) { 
  21728.             $width = $maxwidth; 
  21729.         } 
  21730.         if (TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($y)) { 
  21731.             $y = $this->y; 
  21732.         } 
  21733.         // space between columns 
  21734.         $space = (($this->w - $this->original_lMargin - $this->original_rMargin - ($numcols * $width)) / ($numcols - 1)); 
  21735.         // fill the columns array (with, space, starting Y position) 
  21736.         for ($i = 0; $i < $numcols; ++$i) { 
  21737.             $this->columns[$i] = array('w' => $width, 's' => $space, 'y' => $y); 
  21738.         } 
  21739.     } 
  21740.     $this->num_columns = $numcols; 
  21741.     $this->current_column = 0; 
  21742.     $this->column_start_page = $this->page; 
  21743.     $this->selectColumn(0); 
  21744. } 
  21745.  
  21746. /** 
  21747.  * Remove columns and reset page margins. 
  21748.  * @public 
  21749.  * @since 5.9.072 (2011-04-26) 
  21750.  */ 
  21751. public function resetColumns() { 
  21752.     $this->lMargin = $this->original_lMargin; 
  21753.     $this->rMargin = $this->original_rMargin; 
  21754.     $this->setEqualColumns(); 
  21755. } 
  21756.  
  21757. /** 
  21758.  * Set columns array. 
  21759.  * Each column is represented by an array of arrays with the following keys: (w = width, s = space between columns, y = column top position). 
  21760.  * @param $columns (array) 
  21761.  * @public 
  21762.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  21763.  */ 
  21764. public function setColumnsArray($columns) { 
  21765.     $this->columns = $columns; 
  21766.     $this->num_columns = count($columns); 
  21767.     $this->current_column = 0; 
  21768.     $this->column_start_page = $this->page; 
  21769.     $this->selectColumn(0); 
  21770. } 
  21771.  
  21772. /** 
  21773.  * Set position at a given column 
  21774.  * @param $col (int) column number (from 0 to getNumberOfColumns()-1); empty string = current column. 
  21775.  * @public 
  21776.  * @since 4.9.001 (2010-03-28) 
  21777.  */ 
  21778. public function selectColumn($col='') { 
  21779.     if (is_string($col)) { 
  21780.         $col = $this->current_column; 
  21781.     } elseif ($col >= $this->num_columns) { 
  21782.         $col = 0; 
  21783.     } 
  21784.     $xshift = array('x' => 0, 's' => array('H' => 0, 'V' => 0), 'p' => array('L' => 0, 'T' => 0, 'R' => 0, 'B' => 0)); 
  21785.     $enable_thead = false; 
  21786.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  21787.         if ($col != $this->current_column) { 
  21788.             // move Y pointer at the top of the column 
  21789.             if ($this->column_start_page == $this->page) { 
  21790.                 $this->y = $this->columns[$col]['y']; 
  21791.             } else { 
  21792.                 $this->y = $this->tMargin; 
  21793.             } 
  21794.             // Avoid to write table headers more than once 
  21795.             if (($this->page > $this->maxselcol['page']) OR (($this->page == $this->maxselcol['page']) AND ($col > $this->maxselcol['column']))) { 
  21796.                 $enable_thead = true; 
  21797.                 $this->maxselcol['page'] = $this->page; 
  21798.                 $this->maxselcol['column'] = $col; 
  21799.             } 
  21800.         } 
  21801.         $xshift = $this->colxshift; 
  21802.         // set X position of the current column by case 
  21803.         $listindent = ($this->listindentlevel * $this->listindent); 
  21804.         // calculate column X position 
  21805.         $colpos = 0; 
  21806.         for ($i = 0; $i < $col; ++$i) { 
  21807.             $colpos += ($this->columns[$i]['w'] + $this->columns[$i]['s']); 
  21808.         } 
  21809.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  21810.             $x = $this->w - $this->original_rMargin - $colpos; 
  21811.             $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $x + $listindent); 
  21812.             $this->lMargin = ($x - $this->columns[$col]['w']); 
  21813.             $this->x = $x - $listindent; 
  21814.         } else { 
  21815.             $x = $this->original_lMargin + $colpos; 
  21816.             $this->lMargin = ($x + $listindent); 
  21817.             $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $x - $this->columns[$col]['w']); 
  21818.             $this->x = $x + $listindent; 
  21819.         } 
  21820.         $this->columns[$col]['x'] = $x; 
  21821.     } 
  21822.     $this->current_column = $col; 
  21823.     // fix for HTML mode 
  21824.     $this->newline = true; 
  21825.     // print HTML table header (if any) 
  21826.     if ((!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->thead)) AND (!$this->inthead)) { 
  21827.         if ($enable_thead) { 
  21828.             // print table header 
  21829.             $this->writeHTML($this->thead, false, false, false, false, ''); 
  21830.             $this->y += $xshift['s']['V']; 
  21831.             // store end of header position 
  21832.             if (!isset($this->columns[$col]['th'])) { 
  21833.                 $this->columns[$col]['th'] = array(); 
  21834.             } 
  21835.             $this->columns[$col]['th']['\''.$this->page.'\''] = $this->y; 
  21836.             $this->lasth = 0; 
  21837.         } elseif (isset($this->columns[$col]['th']['\''.$this->page.'\''])) { 
  21838.             $this->y = $this->columns[$col]['th']['\''.$this->page.'\'']; 
  21839.         } 
  21840.     } 
  21841.     // account for an html table cell over multiple columns 
  21842.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  21843.         $this->rMargin += $xshift['x']; 
  21844.         $this->x -= ($xshift['x'] + $xshift['p']['R']); 
  21845.     } else { 
  21846.         $this->lMargin += $xshift['x']; 
  21847.         $this->x += $xshift['x'] + $xshift['p']['L']; 
  21848.     } 
  21849. } 
  21850.  
  21851. /** 
  21852.  * Return the current column number 
  21853.  * @return int current column number 
  21854.  * @public 
  21855.  * @since 5.5.011 (2010-07-08) 
  21856.  */ 
  21857. public function getColumn() { 
  21858.     return $this->current_column; 
  21859. } 
  21860.  
  21861. /** 
  21862.  * Return the current number of columns. 
  21863.  * @return int number of columns 
  21864.  * @public 
  21865.  * @since 5.8.018 (2010-08-25) 
  21866.  */ 
  21867. public function getNumberOfColumns() { 
  21868.     return $this->num_columns; 
  21869. } 
  21870.  
  21871. /** 
  21872.  * Set Text rendering mode. 
  21873.  * @param $stroke (int) outline size in user units (0 = disable). 
  21874.  * @param $fill (boolean) if true fills the text (default). 
  21875.  * @param $clip (boolean) if true activate clipping mode 
  21876.  * @public 
  21877.  * @since 4.9.008 (2009-04-02) 
  21878.  */ 
  21879. public function setTextRenderingMode($stroke=0, $fill=true, $clip=false) { 
  21880.     // Ref.: PDF 32000-1:2008 - 9.3.6 Text Rendering Mode 
  21881.     // convert text rendering parameters 
  21882.     if ($stroke < 0) { 
  21883.         $stroke = 0; 
  21884.     } 
  21885.     if ($fill === true) { 
  21886.         if ($stroke > 0) { 
  21887.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21888.                 // Fill, then stroke text and add to path for clipping 
  21889.                 $textrendermode = 6; 
  21890.             } else { 
  21891.                 // Fill, then stroke text 
  21892.                 $textrendermode = 2; 
  21893.             } 
  21894.             $textstrokewidth = $stroke; 
  21895.         } else { 
  21896.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21897.                 // Fill text and add to path for clipping 
  21898.                 $textrendermode = 4; 
  21899.             } else { 
  21900.                 // Fill text 
  21901.                 $textrendermode = 0; 
  21902.             } 
  21903.         } 
  21904.     } else { 
  21905.         if ($stroke > 0) { 
  21906.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21907.                 // Stroke text and add to path for clipping 
  21908.                 $textrendermode = 5; 
  21909.             } else { 
  21910.                 // Stroke text 
  21911.                 $textrendermode = 1; 
  21912.             } 
  21913.             $textstrokewidth = $stroke; 
  21914.         } else { 
  21915.             if ($clip === true) { 
  21916.                 // Add text to path for clipping 
  21917.                 $textrendermode = 7; 
  21918.             } else { 
  21919.                 // Neither fill nor stroke text (invisible) 
  21920.                 $textrendermode = 3; 
  21921.             } 
  21922.         } 
  21923.     } 
  21924.     $this->textrendermode = $textrendermode; 
  21925.     $this->textstrokewidth = $stroke; 
  21926. } 
  21927.  
  21928. /** 
  21929.  * Set parameters for drop shadow effect for text. 
  21930.  * @param $params (array) Array of parameters: enabled (boolean) set to true to enable shadow; depth_w (float) shadow width in user units; depth_h (float) shadow height in user units; color (array) shadow color or false to use the stroke color; opacity (float) Alpha value: real value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque); blend_mode (string) blend mode, one of the following: Normal, Multiply, Screen, Overlay, Darken, Lighten, ColorDodge, ColorBurn, HardLight, SoftLight, Difference, Exclusion, Hue, Saturation, Color, Luminosity. 
  21931.  * @since 5.9.174 (2012-07-25) 
  21932.  * @public 
  21933. */ 
  21934. public function setTextShadow($params=array('enabled'=>false, 'depth_w'=>0, 'depth_h'=>0, 'color'=>false, 'opacity'=>1, 'blend_mode'=>'Normal')) { 
  21935.     if (isset($params['enabled'])) { 
  21936.         $this->txtshadow['enabled'] = $params['enabled']?true:false; 
  21937.     } else { 
  21938.         $this->txtshadow['enabled'] = false; 
  21939.     } 
  21940.     if (isset($params['depth_w'])) { 
  21941.         $this->txtshadow['depth_w'] = floatval($params['depth_w']); 
  21942.     } else { 
  21943.         $this->txtshadow['depth_w'] = 0; 
  21944.     } 
  21945.     if (isset($params['depth_h'])) { 
  21946.         $this->txtshadow['depth_h'] = floatval($params['depth_h']); 
  21947.     } else { 
  21948.         $this->txtshadow['depth_h'] = 0; 
  21949.     } 
  21950.     if (isset($params['color']) AND ($params['color'] !== false) AND is_array($params['color'])) { 
  21951.         $this->txtshadow['color'] = $params['color']; 
  21952.     } else { 
  21953.         $this->txtshadow['color'] = $this->strokecolor; 
  21954.     } 
  21955.     if (isset($params['opacity'])) { 
  21956.         $this->txtshadow['opacity'] = min(1, max(0, floatval($params['opacity']))); 
  21957.     } else { 
  21958.         $this->txtshadow['opacity'] = 1; 
  21959.     } 
  21960.     if (isset($params['blend_mode']) AND in_array($params['blend_mode'], array('Normal', 'Multiply', 'Screen', 'Overlay', 'Darken', 'Lighten', 'ColorDodge', 'ColorBurn', 'HardLight', 'SoftLight', 'Difference', 'Exclusion', 'Hue', 'Saturation', 'Color', 'Luminosity'))) { 
  21961.         $this->txtshadow['blend_mode'] = $params['blend_mode']; 
  21962.     } else { 
  21963.         $this->txtshadow['blend_mode'] = 'Normal'; 
  21964.     } 
  21965.     if ((($this->txtshadow['depth_w'] == 0) AND ($this->txtshadow['depth_h'] == 0)) OR ($this->txtshadow['opacity'] == 0)) { 
  21966.         $this->txtshadow['enabled'] = false; 
  21967.     } 
  21968. } 
  21969.  
  21970. /** 
  21971.  * Return the text shadow parameters array. 
  21972.  * @return Array of parameters. 
  21973.  * @since 5.9.174 (2012-07-25) 
  21974.  * @public 
  21975.  */ 
  21976. public function getTextShadow() { 
  21977.     return $this->txtshadow; 
  21978. } 
  21979.  
  21980. /** 
  21981.  * Returns an array of chars containing soft hyphens. 
  21982.  * @param $word (array) array of chars 
  21983.  * @param $patterns (array) Array of hypenation patterns. 
  21984.  * @param $dictionary (array) Array of words to be returned without applying the hyphenation algoritm. 
  21985.  * @param $leftmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the left of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  21986.  * @param $rightmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the right of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  21987.  * @param $charmin (int) Minimum word length to apply the hyphenation algoritm. 
  21988.  * @param $charmax (int) Maximum length of broken piece of word. 
  21989.  * @return array text with soft hyphens 
  21990.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  21991.  * @since 4.9.012 (2010-04-12) 
  21992.  * @protected 
  21993.  */ 
  21994. protected function hyphenateWord($word, $patterns, $dictionary=array(), $leftmin=1, $rightmin=2, $charmin=1, $charmax=8) { 
  21995.     $hyphenword = array(); // hyphens positions 
  21996.     $numchars = count($word); 
  21997.     if ($numchars <= $charmin) { 
  21998.         return $word; 
  21999.     } 
  22000.     $word_string = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrSubString($word, '', '', $this->isunicode); 
  22001.     // some words will be returned as-is 
  22002.     $pattern = '/^([a-zA-Z0-9_\.\-]+)@((\[[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2, 4}|[0-9]{1, 3})(\]?)$/'; 
  22003.     if (preg_match($pattern, $word_string) > 0) { 
  22004.         // email 
  22005.         return $word; 
  22006.     } 
  22007.     $pattern = '/(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)?)((\[[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.[0-9]{1, 3}\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\-]+\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2, 4}|[0-9]{1, 3})(\]?)$/'; 
  22008.     if (preg_match($pattern, $word_string) > 0) { 
  22009.         // URL 
  22010.         return $word; 
  22011.     } 
  22012.     if (isset($dictionary[$word_string])) { 
  22013.         return TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($dictionary[$word_string], $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  22014.     } 
  22015.     // surround word with '_' characters 
  22016.     $tmpword = array_merge(array(46), $word, array(46)); 
  22017.     $tmpnumchars = $numchars + 2; 
  22018.     $maxpos = $tmpnumchars - $charmin; 
  22019.     for ($pos = 0; $pos < $maxpos; ++$pos) { 
  22020.         $imax = min(($tmpnumchars - $pos), $charmax); 
  22021.         for ($i = $charmin; $i <= $imax; ++$i) { 
  22022.             $subword = strtolower(TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrSubString($tmpword, $pos, ($pos + $i), $this->isunicode)); 
  22023.             if (isset($patterns[$subword])) { 
  22024.                 $pattern = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($patterns[$subword], $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  22025.                 $pattern_length = count($pattern); 
  22026.                 $digits = 1; 
  22027.                 for ($j = 0; $j < $pattern_length; ++$j) { 
  22028.                     // check if $pattern[$j] is a number = hyphenation level (only numbers from 1 to 5 are valid) 
  22029.                     if (($pattern[$j] >= 48) AND ($pattern[$j] <= 57)) { 
  22030.                         if ($j == 0) { 
  22031.                             $zero = $pos - 1; 
  22032.                         } else { 
  22033.                             $zero = $pos + $j - $digits; 
  22034.                         } 
  22035.                         // get hyphenation level 
  22036.                         $level = ($pattern[$j] - 48); 
  22037.                         // if two levels from two different patterns match at the same point, the higher one is selected. 
  22038.                         if (!isset($hyphenword[$zero]) OR ($hyphenword[$zero] < $level)) { 
  22039.                             $hyphenword[$zero] = $level; 
  22040.                         } 
  22041.                         ++$digits; 
  22042.                     } 
  22043.                 } 
  22044.             } 
  22045.         } 
  22046.     } 
  22047.     $inserted = 0; 
  22048.     $maxpos = $numchars - $rightmin; 
  22049.     for ($i = $leftmin; $i <= $maxpos; ++$i) { 
  22050.         // only odd levels indicate allowed hyphenation points 
  22051.         if (isset($hyphenword[$i]) AND (($hyphenword[$i] % 2) != 0)) { 
  22052.             // 173 = soft hyphen character 
  22053.             array_splice($word, $i + $inserted, 0, 173); 
  22054.             ++$inserted; 
  22055.         } 
  22056.     } 
  22057.     return $word; 
  22058. } 
  22059.  
  22060. /** 
  22061.  * Returns text with soft hyphens. 
  22062.  * @param $text (string) text to process 
  22063.  * @param $patterns (mixed) Array of hypenation patterns or a TEX file containing hypenation patterns. TEX patterns can be downloaded from http://www.ctan.org/tex-archive/language/hyph-utf8/tex/generic/hyph-utf8/patterns/ 
  22064.  * @param $dictionary (array) Array of words to be returned without applying the hyphenation algoritm. 
  22065.  * @param $leftmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the left of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  22066.  * @param $rightmin (int) Minimum number of character to leave on the right of the word without applying the hyphens. 
  22067.  * @param $charmin (int) Minimum word length to apply the hyphenation algoritm. 
  22068.  * @param $charmax (int) Maximum length of broken piece of word. 
  22069.  * @return array text with soft hyphens 
  22070.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22071.  * @since 4.9.012 (2010-04-12) 
  22072.  * @public 
  22073.  */ 
  22074. public function hyphenateText($text, $patterns, $dictionary=array(), $leftmin=1, $rightmin=2, $charmin=1, $charmax=8) { 
  22075.     $text = $this->unhtmlentities($text); 
  22076.     $word = array(); // last word 
  22077.     $txtarr = array(); // text to be returned 
  22078.     $intag = false; // true if we are inside an HTML tag 
  22079.     $skip = false; // true to skip hyphenation 
  22080.     if (!is_array($patterns)) { 
  22081.         $patterns = TCPDF_STATIC::getHyphenPatternsFromTEX($patterns); 
  22082.     } 
  22083.     // get array of characters 
  22084.     $unichars = TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8StringToArray($text, $this->isunicode, $this->CurrentFont); 
  22085.     // for each char 
  22086.     foreach ($unichars as $char) { 
  22087.         if ((!$intag) AND (!$skip) AND TCPDF_FONT_DATA::$uni_type[$char] == 'L') { 
  22088.             // letter character 
  22089.             $word[] = $char; 
  22090.         } else { 
  22091.             // other type of character 
  22092.             if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($word)) { 
  22093.                 // hypenate the word 
  22094.                 $txtarr = array_merge($txtarr, $this->hyphenateWord($word, $patterns, $dictionary, $leftmin, $rightmin, $charmin, $charmax)); 
  22095.                 $word = array(); 
  22096.             } 
  22097.             $txtarr[] = $char; 
  22098.             if (chr($char) == '<') { 
  22099.                 // we are inside an HTML tag 
  22100.                 $intag = true; 
  22101.             } elseif ($intag AND (chr($char) == '>')) { 
  22102.                 // end of HTML tag 
  22103.                 $intag = false; 
  22104.                 // check for style tag 
  22105.                 $expected = array(115, 116, 121, 108, 101); // = 'style' 
  22106.                 $current = array_slice($txtarr, -6, 5); // last 5 chars 
  22107.                 $compare = array_diff($expected, $current); 
  22108.                 if (empty($compare)) { 
  22109.                     // check if it is a closing tag 
  22110.                     $expected = array(47); // = '/' 
  22111.                     $current = array_slice($txtarr, -7, 1); 
  22112.                     $compare = array_diff($expected, $current); 
  22113.                     if (empty($compare)) { 
  22114.                         // closing style tag 
  22115.                         $skip = false; 
  22116.                     } else { 
  22117.                         // opening style tag 
  22118.                         $skip = true; 
  22119.                     } 
  22120.                 } 
  22121.             } 
  22122.         } 
  22123.     } 
  22124.     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($word)) { 
  22125.         // hypenate the word 
  22126.         $txtarr = array_merge($txtarr, $this->hyphenateWord($word, $patterns, $dictionary, $leftmin, $rightmin, $charmin, $charmax)); 
  22127.     } 
  22128.     // convert char array to string and return 
  22129.     return TCPDF_FONTS::UTF8ArrSubString($txtarr, '', '', $this->isunicode); 
  22130. } 
  22131.  
  22132. /** 
  22133.  * Enable/disable rasterization of vector images using ImageMagick library. 
  22134.  * @param $mode (boolean) if true enable rasterization, false otherwise. 
  22135.  * @public 
  22136.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-04-27) 
  22137.  */ 
  22138. public function setRasterizeVectorImages($mode) { 
  22139.     $this->rasterize_vector_images = $mode; 
  22140. } 
  22141.  
  22142. /** 
  22143.  * Enable or disable default option for font subsetting. 
  22144.  * @param $enable (boolean) if true enable font subsetting by default. 
  22145.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22146.  * @public 
  22147.  * @since 5.3.002 (2010-06-07) 
  22148.  */ 
  22149. public function setFontSubsetting($enable=true) { 
  22150.     if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  22151.         $this->font_subsetting = false; 
  22152.     } else { 
  22153.         $this->font_subsetting = $enable ? true : false; 
  22154.     } 
  22155. } 
  22156.  
  22157. /** 
  22158.  * Return the default option for font subsetting. 
  22159.  * @return boolean default font subsetting state. 
  22160.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22161.  * @public 
  22162.  * @since 5.3.002 (2010-06-07) 
  22163.  */ 
  22164. public function getFontSubsetting() { 
  22165.     return $this->font_subsetting; 
  22166. } 
  22167.  
  22168. /** 
  22169.  * Left trim the input string 
  22170.  * @param $str (string) string to trim 
  22171.  * @param $replace (string) string that replace spaces. 
  22172.  * @return left trimmed string 
  22173.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22174.  * @public 
  22175.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  22176.  */ 
  22177. public function stringLeftTrim($str, $replace='') { 
  22178.     return preg_replace('/^'.$this->re_space['p'].'+/'.$this->re_space['m'], $replace, $str); 
  22179. } 
  22180.  
  22181. /** 
  22182.  * Right trim the input string 
  22183.  * @param $str (string) string to trim 
  22184.  * @param $replace (string) string that replace spaces. 
  22185.  * @return right trimmed string 
  22186.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22187.  * @public 
  22188.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  22189.  */ 
  22190. public function stringRightTrim($str, $replace='') { 
  22191.     return preg_replace('/'.$this->re_space['p'].'+$/'.$this->re_space['m'], $replace, $str); 
  22192. } 
  22193.  
  22194. /** 
  22195.  * Trim the input string 
  22196.  * @param $str (string) string to trim 
  22197.  * @param $replace (string) string that replace spaces. 
  22198.  * @return trimmed string 
  22199.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22200.  * @public 
  22201.  * @since 5.8.000 (2010-08-11) 
  22202.  */ 
  22203. public function stringTrim($str, $replace='') { 
  22204.     $str = $this->stringLeftTrim($str, $replace); 
  22205.     $str = $this->stringRightTrim($str, $replace); 
  22206.     return $str; 
  22207. } 
  22208.  
  22209. /** 
  22210.  * Return true if the current font is unicode type. 
  22211.  * @return true for unicode font, false otherwise. 
  22212.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22213.  * @public 
  22214.  * @since 5.8.002 (2010-08-14) 
  22215.  */ 
  22216. public function isUnicodeFont() { 
  22217.     return (($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'TrueTypeUnicode') OR ($this->CurrentFont['type'] == 'cidfont0')); 
  22218. } 
  22219.  
  22220. /** 
  22221.  * Return normalized font name 
  22222.  * @param $fontfamily (string) property string containing font family names 
  22223.  * @return string normalized font name 
  22224.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22225.  * @public 
  22226.  * @since 5.8.004 (2010-08-17) 
  22227.  */ 
  22228. public function getFontFamilyName($fontfamily) { 
  22229.     // remove spaces and symbols 
  22230.     $fontfamily = preg_replace('/[^a-z0-9_\, ]/', '', strtolower($fontfamily)); 
  22231.     // extract all font names 
  22232.     $fontslist = preg_split('/[, ]/', $fontfamily); 
  22233.     // find first valid font name 
  22234.     foreach ($fontslist as $font) { 
  22235.         // replace font variations 
  22236.         $font = preg_replace('/italic$/', 'I', $font); 
  22237.         $font = preg_replace('/oblique$/', 'I', $font); 
  22238.         $font = preg_replace('/bold([I]?)$/', 'B\\1', $font); 
  22239.         // replace common family names and core fonts 
  22240.         $pattern = array(); 
  22241.         $replacement = array(); 
  22242.         $pattern[] = '/^serif|^cursive|^fantasy|^timesnewroman/'; 
  22243.         $replacement[] = 'times'; 
  22244.         $pattern[] = '/^sansserif/'; 
  22245.         $replacement[] = 'helvetica'; 
  22246.         $pattern[] = '/^monospace/'; 
  22247.         $replacement[] = 'courier'; 
  22248.         $font = preg_replace($pattern, $replacement, $font); 
  22249.         if (in_array(strtolower($font), $this->fontlist) OR in_array($font, $this->fontkeys)) { 
  22250.             return $font; 
  22251.         } 
  22252.     } 
  22253.     // return current font as default 
  22254.     return $this->CurrentFont['fontkey']; 
  22255. } 
  22256.  
  22257. /** 
  22258.  * Start a new XObject Template. 
  22259.  * An XObject Template is a PDF block that is a self-contained description of any sequence of graphics objects (including path objects, text objects, and sampled images). 
  22260.  * An XObject Template may be painted multiple times, either on several pages or at several locations on the same page and produces the same results each time, subject only to the graphics state at the time it is invoked. 
  22261.  * Note: X, Y coordinates will be reset to 0, 0. 
  22262.  * @param $w (int) Template width in user units (empty string or zero = page width less margins). 
  22263.  * @param $h (int) Template height in user units (empty string or zero = page height less margins). 
  22264.  * @param $group (mixed) Set transparency group. Can be a boolean value or an array specifying optional parameters: 'CS' (solour space name), 'I' (boolean flag to indicate isolated group) and 'K' (boolean flag to indicate knockout group). 
  22265.  * @return int the XObject Template ID in case of success or false in case of error. 
  22266.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22267.  * @public 
  22268.  * @since 5.8.017 (2010-08-24) 
  22269.  * @see endTemplate(), printTemplate() 
  22270.  */ 
  22271. public function startTemplate($w=0, $h=0, $group=false) { 
  22272.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  22273.         // we are already inside an XObject template 
  22274.         return false; 
  22275.     } 
  22276.     $this->inxobj = true; 
  22277.     ++$this->n; 
  22278.     // XObject ID 
  22279.     $this->xobjid = 'XT'.$this->n; 
  22280.     // object ID 
  22281.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid] = array('n' => $this->n); 
  22282.     // store current graphic state 
  22283.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['gvars'] = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  22284.     // initialize data 
  22285.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['intmrk'] = 0; 
  22286.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['transfmrk'] = array(); 
  22287.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['outdata'] = ''; 
  22288.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['xobjects'] = array(); 
  22289.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['images'] = array(); 
  22290.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['fonts'] = array(); 
  22291.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['annotations'] = array(); 
  22292.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['extgstates'] = array(); 
  22293.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['gradients'] = array(); 
  22294.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['spot_colors'] = array(); 
  22295.     // set new environment 
  22296.     $this->num_columns = 1; 
  22297.     $this->current_column = 0; 
  22298.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak(false); 
  22299.     if (($w === '') OR ($w <= 0)) { 
  22300.         $w = $this->w - $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin; 
  22301.     } 
  22302.     if (($h === '') OR ($h <= 0)) { 
  22303.         $h = $this->h - $this->tMargin - $this->bMargin; 
  22304.     } 
  22305.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['x'] = 0; 
  22306.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['y'] = 0; 
  22307.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['w'] = $w; 
  22308.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['h'] = $h; 
  22309.     $this->w = $w; 
  22310.     $this->h = $h; 
  22311.     $this->wPt = $this->w * $this->k; 
  22312.     $this->hPt = $this->h * $this->k; 
  22313.     $this->fwPt = $this->wPt; 
  22314.     $this->fhPt = $this->hPt; 
  22315.     $this->x = 0; 
  22316.     $this->y = 0; 
  22317.     $this->lMargin = 0; 
  22318.     $this->rMargin = 0; 
  22319.     $this->tMargin = 0; 
  22320.     $this->bMargin = 0; 
  22321.     // set group mode 
  22322.     $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['group'] = $group; 
  22323.     return $this->xobjid; 
  22324. } 
  22325.  
  22326. /** 
  22327.  * End the current XObject Template started with startTemplate() and restore the previous graphic state. 
  22328.  * An XObject Template is a PDF block that is a self-contained description of any sequence of graphics objects (including path objects, text objects, and sampled images). 
  22329.  * An XObject Template may be painted multiple times, either on several pages or at several locations on the same page and produces the same results each time, subject only to the graphics state at the time it is invoked. 
  22330.  * @return int the XObject Template ID in case of success or false in case of error. 
  22331.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22332.  * @public 
  22333.  * @since 5.8.017 (2010-08-24) 
  22334.  * @see startTemplate(), printTemplate() 
  22335.  */ 
  22336. public function endTemplate() { 
  22337.     if (!$this->inxobj) { 
  22338.         // we are not inside a template 
  22339.         return false; 
  22340.     } 
  22341.     $this->inxobj = false; 
  22342.     // restore previous graphic state 
  22343.     $this->setGraphicVars($this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['gvars'], true); 
  22344.     return $this->xobjid; 
  22345. } 
  22346.  
  22347. /** 
  22348.  * Print an XObject Template. 
  22349.  * You can print an XObject Template inside the currently opened Template. 
  22350.  * An XObject Template is a PDF block that is a self-contained description of any sequence of graphics objects (including path objects, text objects, and sampled images). 
  22351.  * An XObject Template may be painted multiple times, either on several pages or at several locations on the same page and produces the same results each time, subject only to the graphics state at the time it is invoked. 
  22352.  * @param $id (string) The ID of XObject Template to print. 
  22353.  * @param $x (int) X position in user units (empty string = current x position) 
  22354.  * @param $y (int) Y position in user units (empty string = current y position) 
  22355.  * @param $w (int) Width in user units (zero = remaining page width) 
  22356.  * @param $h (int) Height in user units (zero = remaining page height) 
  22357.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to template insertion relative to template height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> 
  22358.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the template on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  22359.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) If true the template is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  22360.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22361.  * @public 
  22362.  * @since 5.8.017 (2010-08-24) 
  22363.  * @see startTemplate(), endTemplate() 
  22364.  */ 
  22365. public function printTemplate($id, $x='', $y='', $w=0, $h=0, $align='', $palign='', $fitonpage=false) { 
  22366.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  22367.          return; 
  22368.     } 
  22369.     if (!isset($this->xobjects[$id])) { 
  22370.         $this->Error('The XObject Template \''.$id.'\' doesn\'t exist!'); 
  22371.     } 
  22372.     if ($this->inxobj) { 
  22373.         if ($id == $this->xobjid) { 
  22374.             // close current template 
  22375.             $this->endTemplate(); 
  22376.         } else { 
  22377.             // use the template as resource for the template currently opened 
  22378.             $this->xobjects[$this->xobjid]['xobjects'][$id] = $this->xobjects[$id]; 
  22379.         } 
  22380.     } 
  22381.     // set default values 
  22382.     if ($x === '') { 
  22383.         $x = $this->x; 
  22384.     } 
  22385.     if ($y === '') { 
  22386.         $y = $this->y; 
  22387.     } 
  22388.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  22389.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  22390.     $ow = $this->xobjects[$id]['w']; 
  22391.     if ($ow <= 0) { 
  22392.         $ow = 1; 
  22393.     } 
  22394.     $oh = $this->xobjects[$id]['h']; 
  22395.     if ($oh <= 0) { 
  22396.         $oh = 1; 
  22397.     } 
  22398.     // calculate template width and height on document 
  22399.     if (($w <= 0) AND ($h <= 0)) { 
  22400.         $w = $ow; 
  22401.         $h = $oh; 
  22402.     } elseif ($w <= 0) { 
  22403.         $w = $h * $ow / $oh; 
  22404.     } elseif ($h <= 0) { 
  22405.         $h = $w * $oh / $ow; 
  22406.     } 
  22407.     // fit the template on available space 
  22408.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage); 
  22409.     // set page alignment 
  22410.     $rb_y = $y + $h; 
  22411.     // set alignment 
  22412.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  22413.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22414.             $xt = $this->lMargin; 
  22415.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22416.             $xt = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22417.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22418.             $xt = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22419.         } else { 
  22420.             $xt = $x - $w; 
  22421.         } 
  22422.         $rb_x = $xt; 
  22423.     } else { 
  22424.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22425.             $xt = $this->lMargin; 
  22426.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22427.             $xt = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22428.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22429.             $xt = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22430.         } else { 
  22431.             $xt = $x; 
  22432.         } 
  22433.         $rb_x = $xt + $w; 
  22434.     } 
  22435.     // print XObject Template + Transformation matrix 
  22436.     $this->StartTransform(); 
  22437.     // translate and scale 
  22438.     $sx = ($w / $ow); 
  22439.     $sy = ($h / $oh); 
  22440.     $tm = array(); 
  22441.     $tm[0] = $sx; 
  22442.     $tm[1] = 0; 
  22443.     $tm[2] = 0; 
  22444.     $tm[3] = $sy; 
  22445.     $tm[4] = $xt * $this->k; 
  22446.     $tm[5] = ($this->h - $h - $y) * $this->k; 
  22447.     $this->Transform($tm); 
  22448.     // set object 
  22449.     $this->_out('/'.$id.' Do'); 
  22450.     $this->StopTransform(); 
  22451.     // add annotations 
  22452.     if (!empty($this->xobjects[$id]['annotations'])) { 
  22453.         foreach ($this->xobjects[$id]['annotations'] as $annot) { 
  22454.             // transform original coordinates 
  22455.             $coordlt = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array(1, 0, 0, 1, ($annot['x'] * $this->k), (-$annot['y'] * $this->k))); 
  22456.             $ax = ($coordlt[4] / $this->k); 
  22457.             $ay = ($this->h - $h - ($coordlt[5] / $this->k)); 
  22458.             $coordrb = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array(1, 0, 0, 1, (($annot['x'] + $annot['w']) * $this->k), ((-$annot['y'] - $annot['h']) * $this->k))); 
  22459.             $aw = ($coordrb[4] / $this->k) - $ax; 
  22460.             $ah = ($this->h - $h - ($coordrb[5] / $this->k)) - $ay; 
  22461.             $this->Annotation($ax, $ay, $aw, $ah, $annot['text'], $annot['opt'], $annot['spaces']); 
  22462.         } 
  22463.     } 
  22464.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  22465.     switch($align) { 
  22466.         case 'T': { 
  22467.             $this->y = $y; 
  22468.             $this->x = $rb_x; 
  22469.             break; 
  22470.         } 
  22471.         case 'M': { 
  22472.             $this->y = $y + round($h/2); 
  22473.             $this->x = $rb_x; 
  22474.             break; 
  22475.         } 
  22476.         case 'B': { 
  22477.             $this->y = $rb_y; 
  22478.             $this->x = $rb_x; 
  22479.             break; 
  22480.         } 
  22481.         case 'N': { 
  22482.             $this->SetY($rb_y); 
  22483.             break; 
  22484.         } 
  22485.         default:{ 
  22486.             break; 
  22487.         } 
  22488.     } 
  22489. } 
  22490.  
  22491. /** 
  22492.  * Set the percentage of character stretching. 
  22493.  * @param $perc (int) percentage of stretching (100 = no stretching) 
  22494.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22495.  * @public 
  22496.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22497.  */ 
  22498. public function setFontStretching($perc=100) { 
  22499.     $this->font_stretching = $perc; 
  22500. } 
  22501.  
  22502. /** 
  22503.  * Get the percentage of character stretching. 
  22504.  * @return float stretching value 
  22505.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22506.  * @public 
  22507.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22508.  */ 
  22509. public function getFontStretching() { 
  22510.     return $this->font_stretching; 
  22511. } 
  22512.  
  22513. /** 
  22514.  * Set the amount to increase or decrease the space between characters in a text. 
  22515.  * @param $spacing (float) amount to increase or decrease the space between characters in a text (0 = default spacing) 
  22516.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22517.  * @public 
  22518.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22519.  */ 
  22520. public function setFontSpacing($spacing=0) { 
  22521.     $this->font_spacing = $spacing; 
  22522. } 
  22523.  
  22524. /** 
  22525.  * Get the amount to increase or decrease the space between characters in a text. 
  22526.  * @return int font spacing (tracking) value 
  22527.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22528.  * @public 
  22529.  * @since 5.9.000 (2010-09-29) 
  22530.  */ 
  22531. public function getFontSpacing() { 
  22532.     return $this->font_spacing; 
  22533. } 
  22534.  
  22535. /** 
  22536.  * Return an array of no-write page regions 
  22537.  * @return array of no-write page regions 
  22538.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22539.  * @public 
  22540.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22541.  * @see setPageRegions(), addPageRegion() 
  22542.  */ 
  22543. public function getPageRegions() { 
  22544.     return $this->page_regions; 
  22545. } 
  22546.  
  22547. /** 
  22548.  * Set no-write regions on page. 
  22549.  * A no-write region is a portion of the page with a rectangular or trapezium shape that will not be covered when writing text or html code. 
  22550.  * A region is always aligned on the left or right side of the page ad is defined using a vertical segment. 
  22551.  * You can set multiple regions for the same page. 
  22552.  * @param $regions (array) array of no-write regions. For each region you can define an array as follow: ('page' => page number or empy for current page, 'xt' => X top, 'yt' => Y top, 'xb' => X bottom, 'yb' => Y bottom, 'side' => page side 'L' = left or 'R' = right). Omit this parameter to remove all regions. 
  22553.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22554.  * @public 
  22555.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22556.  * @see addPageRegion(), getPageRegions() 
  22557.  */ 
  22558. public function setPageRegions($regions=array()) { 
  22559.     // empty current regions array 
  22560.     $this->page_regions = array(); 
  22561.     // add regions 
  22562.     foreach ($regions as $data) { 
  22563.         $this->addPageRegion($data); 
  22564.     } 
  22565. } 
  22566.  
  22567. /** 
  22568.  * Add a single no-write region on selected page. 
  22569.  * A no-write region is a portion of the page with a rectangular or trapezium shape that will not be covered when writing text or html code. 
  22570.  * A region is always aligned on the left or right side of the page ad is defined using a vertical segment. 
  22571.  * You can set multiple regions for the same page. 
  22572.  * @param $region (array) array of a single no-write region array: ('page' => page number or empy for current page, 'xt' => X top, 'yt' => Y top, 'xb' => X bottom, 'yb' => Y bottom, 'side' => page side 'L' = left or 'R' = right). 
  22573.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22574.  * @public 
  22575.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22576.  * @see setPageRegions(), getPageRegions() 
  22577.  */ 
  22578. public function addPageRegion($region) { 
  22579.     if (!isset($region['page']) OR empty($region['page'])) { 
  22580.         $region['page'] = $this->page; 
  22581.     } 
  22582.     if (isset($region['xt']) AND isset($region['xb']) AND ($region['xt'] > 0) AND ($region['xb'] > 0) 
  22583.         AND isset($region['yt'])  AND isset($region['yb']) AND ($region['yt'] >= 0) AND ($region['yt'] < $region['yb']) 
  22584.         AND isset($region['side']) AND (($region['side'] == 'L') OR ($region['side'] == 'R'))) { 
  22585.         $this->page_regions[] = $region; 
  22586.     } 
  22587. } 
  22588.  
  22589. /** 
  22590.  * Remove a single no-write region. 
  22591.  * @param $key (int) region key 
  22592.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22593.  * @public 
  22594.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22595.  * @see setPageRegions(), getPageRegions() 
  22596.  */ 
  22597. public function removePageRegion($key) { 
  22598.     if (isset($this->page_regions[$key])) { 
  22599.         unset($this->page_regions[$key]); 
  22600.     } 
  22601. } 
  22602.  
  22603. /** 
  22604.  * Check page for no-write regions and adapt current coordinates and page margins if necessary. 
  22605.  * A no-write region is a portion of the page with a rectangular or trapezium shape that will not be covered when writing text or html code. 
  22606.  * A region is always aligned on the left or right side of the page ad is defined using a vertical segment. 
  22607.  * @param $h (float) height of the text/image/object to print in user units 
  22608.  * @param $x (float) current X coordinate in user units 
  22609.  * @param $y (float) current Y coordinate in user units 
  22610.  * @return array($x, $y) 
  22611.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22612.  * @protected 
  22613.  * @since 5.9.003 (2010-10-13) 
  22614.  */ 
  22615. protected function checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y) { 
  22616.     // set default values 
  22617.     if ($x === '') { 
  22618.         $x = $this->x; 
  22619.     } 
  22620.     if ($y === '') { 
  22621.         $y = $this->y; 
  22622.     } 
  22623.     if (!$this->check_page_regions OR empty($this->page_regions)) { 
  22624.         // no page regions defined 
  22625.         return array($x, $y); 
  22626.     } 
  22627.     if (empty($h)) { 
  22628.         $h = $this->getCellHeight($this->FontSize); 
  22629.     } 
  22630.     // check for page break 
  22631.     if ($this->checkPageBreak($h, $y)) { 
  22632.         // the content will be printed on a new page 
  22633.         $x = $this->x; 
  22634.         $y = $this->y; 
  22635.     } 
  22636.     if ($this->num_columns > 1) { 
  22637.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22638.             $this->lMargin = ($this->columns[$this->current_column]['x'] - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['w']); 
  22639.         } else { 
  22640.             $this->rMargin = ($this->w - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['x'] - $this->columns[$this->current_column]['w']); 
  22641.         } 
  22642.     } else { 
  22643.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22644.             $this->lMargin = max($this->clMargin, $this->original_lMargin); 
  22645.         } else { 
  22646.             $this->rMargin = max($this->crMargin, $this->original_rMargin); 
  22647.         } 
  22648.     } 
  22649.     // adjust coordinates and page margins 
  22650.     foreach ($this->page_regions as $regid => $regdata) { 
  22651.         if ($regdata['page'] == $this->page) { 
  22652.             // check region boundaries 
  22653.             if (($y > ($regdata['yt'] - $h)) AND ($y <= $regdata['yb'])) { 
  22654.                 // Y is inside the region 
  22655.                 $minv = ($regdata['xb'] - $regdata['xt']) / ($regdata['yb'] - $regdata['yt']); // inverse of angular coefficient 
  22656.                 $yt = max($y, $regdata['yt']); 
  22657.                 $yb = min(($yt + $h), $regdata['yb']); 
  22658.                 $xt = (($yt - $regdata['yt']) * $minv) + $regdata['xt']; 
  22659.                 $xb = (($yb - $regdata['yt']) * $minv) + $regdata['xt']; 
  22660.                 if ($regdata['side'] == 'L') { // left side 
  22661.                     $new_margin = max($xt, $xb); 
  22662.                     if ($this->lMargin < $new_margin) { 
  22663.                         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22664.                             // adjust left page margin 
  22665.                             $this->lMargin = max(0, $new_margin); 
  22666.                         } 
  22667.                         if ($x < $new_margin) { 
  22668.                             // adjust x position 
  22669.                             $x = $new_margin; 
  22670.                             if ($new_margin > ($this->w - $this->rMargin)) { 
  22671.                                 // adjust y position 
  22672.                                 $y = $regdata['yb'] - $h; 
  22673.                             } 
  22674.                         } 
  22675.                     } 
  22676.                 } elseif ($regdata['side'] == 'R') { // right side 
  22677.                     $new_margin = min($xt, $xb); 
  22678.                     if (($this->w - $this->rMargin) > $new_margin) { 
  22679.                         if (!$this->rtl) { 
  22680.                             // adjust right page margin 
  22681.                             $this->rMargin = max(0, ($this->w - $new_margin)); 
  22682.                         } 
  22683.                         if ($x > $new_margin) { 
  22684.                             // adjust x position 
  22685.                             $x = $new_margin; 
  22686.                             if ($new_margin > $this->lMargin) { 
  22687.                                 // adjust y position 
  22688.                                 $y = $regdata['yb'] - $h; 
  22689.                             } 
  22690.                         } 
  22691.                     } 
  22692.                 } 
  22693.             } 
  22694.         } 
  22695.     } 
  22696.     return array($x, $y); 
  22697. } 
  22698.  
  22699. // --- SVG METHODS --------------------------------------------------------- 
  22700.  
  22701. /** 
  22702.  * Embedd a Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG) image. 
  22703.  * NOTE: SVG standard is not yet fully implemented, use the setRasterizeVectorImages() method to enable/disable rasterization of vector images using ImageMagick library. 
  22704.  * @param $file (string) Name of the SVG file or a '@' character followed by the SVG data string. 
  22705.  * @param $x (float) Abscissa of the upper-left corner. 
  22706.  * @param $y (float) Ordinate of the upper-left corner. 
  22707.  * @param $w (float) Width of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  22708.  * @param $h (float) Height of the image in the page. If not specified or equal to zero, it is automatically calculated. 
  22709.  * @param $link (mixed) URL or identifier returned by AddLink(). 
  22710.  * @param $align (string) Indicates the alignment of the pointer next to image insertion relative to image height. The value can be:<ul><li>T: top-right for LTR or top-left for RTL</li><li>M: middle-right for LTR or middle-left for RTL</li><li>B: bottom-right for LTR or bottom-left for RTL</li><li>N: next line</li></ul> If the alignment is an empty string, then the pointer will be restored on the starting SVG position. 
  22711.  * @param $palign (string) Allows to center or align the image on the current line. Possible values are:<ul><li>L : left align</li><li>C : center</li><li>R : right align</li><li>'' : empty string : left for LTR or right for RTL</li></ul> 
  22712.  * @param $border (mixed) Indicates if borders must be drawn around the cell. The value can be a number:<ul><li>0: no border (default)</li><li>1: frame</li></ul> or a string containing some or all of the following characters (in any order):<ul><li>L: left</li><li>T: top</li><li>R: right</li><li>B: bottom</li></ul> or an array of line styles for each border group - for example: array('LTRB' => array('width' => 2, 'cap' => 'butt', 'join' => 'miter', 'dash' => 0, 'color' => array(0, 0, 0))) 
  22713.  * @param $fitonpage (boolean) if true the image is resized to not exceed page dimensions. 
  22714.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  22715.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  22716.  * @public 
  22717.  */ 
  22718. public function ImageSVG($file, $x='', $y='', $w=0, $h=0, $link='', $align='', $palign='', $border=0, $fitonpage=false) { 
  22719.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  22720.          return; 
  22721.     } 
  22722.     // reseet SVG vars 
  22723.     $this->svggradients = array(); 
  22724.     $this->svggradientid = 0; 
  22725.     $this->svgdefsmode = false; 
  22726.     $this->svgdefs = array(); 
  22727.     $this->svgclipmode = false; 
  22728.     $this->svgclippaths = array(); 
  22729.     $this->svgcliptm = array(); 
  22730.     $this->svgclipid = 0; 
  22731.     $this->svgtext = ''; 
  22732.     $this->svgtextmode = array(); 
  22733.     if ($this->rasterize_vector_images AND ($w > 0) AND ($h > 0)) { 
  22734.         // convert SVG to raster image using GD or ImageMagick libraries 
  22735.         return $this->Image($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'SVG', $link, $align, true, 300, $palign, false, false, $border, false, false, false); 
  22736.     } 
  22737.     if ($file[0] === '@') { // image from string 
  22738.         $this->svgdir = ''; 
  22739.         $svgdata = substr($file, 1); 
  22740.     } else { // SVG file 
  22741.         $this->svgdir = dirname($file); 
  22742.         $svgdata = TCPDF_STATIC::fileGetContents($file); 
  22743.     } 
  22744.     if ($svgdata === FALSE) { 
  22745.         $this->Error('SVG file not found: '.$file); 
  22746.     } 
  22747.     if ($x === '') { 
  22748.         $x = $this->x; 
  22749.     } 
  22750.     if ($y === '') { 
  22751.         $y = $this->y; 
  22752.     } 
  22753.     // check page for no-write regions and adapt page margins if necessary 
  22754.     list($x, $y) = $this->checkPageRegions($h, $x, $y); 
  22755.     $k = $this->k; 
  22756.     $ox = 0; 
  22757.     $oy = 0; 
  22758.     $ow = $w; 
  22759.     $oh = $h; 
  22760.     $aspect_ratio_align = 'xMidYMid'; 
  22761.     $aspect_ratio_ms = 'meet'; 
  22762.     $regs = array(); 
  22763.     // get original image width and height 
  22764.     preg_match('/<svg([^\>]*)>/si', $svgdata, $regs); 
  22765.     if (isset($regs[1]) AND !empty($regs[1])) { 
  22766.         $tmp = array(); 
  22767.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+x[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22768.             $ox = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22769.         } 
  22770.         $tmp = array(); 
  22771.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+y[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22772.             $oy = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22773.         } 
  22774.         $tmp = array(); 
  22775.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+width[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22776.             $ow = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22777.         } 
  22778.         $tmp = array(); 
  22779.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+height[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22780.             $oh = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tmp[1], 1, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22781.         } 
  22782.         $tmp = array(); 
  22783.         $view_box = array(); 
  22784.         if (preg_match('/[\s]+viewBox[\s]*=[\s]*"[\s]*([0-9\.\-]+)[\s]+([0-9\.\-]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]+([0-9\.]+)[\s]*"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22785.             if (count($tmp) == 5) { 
  22786.                 array_shift($tmp); 
  22787.                 foreach ($tmp as $key => $val) { 
  22788.                     $view_box[$key] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($val, 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  22789.                 } 
  22790.                 $ox = $view_box[0]; 
  22791.                 $oy = $view_box[1]; 
  22792.             } 
  22793.             // get aspect ratio 
  22794.             $tmp = array(); 
  22795.             if (preg_match('/[\s]+preserveAspectRatio[\s]*=[\s]*"([^"]*)"/si', $regs[1], $tmp)) { 
  22796.                 $aspect_ratio = preg_split('/[\s]+/si', $tmp[1]); 
  22797.                 switch (count($aspect_ratio)) { 
  22798.                     case 3: { 
  22799.                         $aspect_ratio_align = $aspect_ratio[1]; 
  22800.                         $aspect_ratio_ms = $aspect_ratio[2]; 
  22801.                         break; 
  22802.                     } 
  22803.                     case 2: { 
  22804.                         $aspect_ratio_align = $aspect_ratio[0]; 
  22805.                         $aspect_ratio_ms = $aspect_ratio[1]; 
  22806.                         break; 
  22807.                     } 
  22808.                     case 1: { 
  22809.                         $aspect_ratio_align = $aspect_ratio[0]; 
  22810.                         $aspect_ratio_ms = 'meet'; 
  22811.                         break; 
  22812.                     } 
  22813.                 } 
  22814.             } 
  22815.         } 
  22816.     } 
  22817.     if ($ow <= 0) { 
  22818.         $ow = 1; 
  22819.     } 
  22820.     if ($oh <= 0) { 
  22821.         $oh = 1; 
  22822.     } 
  22823.     // calculate image width and height on document 
  22824.     if (($w <= 0) AND ($h <= 0)) { 
  22825.         // convert image size to document unit 
  22826.         $w = $ow; 
  22827.         $h = $oh; 
  22828.     } elseif ($w <= 0) { 
  22829.         $w = $h * $ow / $oh; 
  22830.     } elseif ($h <= 0) { 
  22831.         $h = $w * $oh / $ow; 
  22832.     } 
  22833.     // fit the image on available space 
  22834.     list($w, $h, $x, $y) = $this->fitBlock($w, $h, $x, $y, $fitonpage); 
  22835.     if ($this->rasterize_vector_images) { 
  22836.         // convert SVG to raster image using GD or ImageMagick libraries 
  22837.         return $this->Image($file, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'SVG', $link, $align, true, 300, $palign, false, false, $border, false, false, false); 
  22838.     } 
  22839.     // set alignment 
  22840.     $this->img_rb_y = $y + $h; 
  22841.     // set alignment 
  22842.     if ($this->rtl) { 
  22843.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22844.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  22845.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22846.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22847.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22848.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22849.         } else { 
  22850.             $ximg = $x - $w; 
  22851.         } 
  22852.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg; 
  22853.     } else { 
  22854.         if ($palign == 'L') { 
  22855.             $ximg = $this->lMargin; 
  22856.         } elseif ($palign == 'C') { 
  22857.             $ximg = ($this->w + $this->lMargin - $this->rMargin - $w) / 2; 
  22858.         } elseif ($palign == 'R') { 
  22859.             $ximg = $this->w - $this->rMargin - $w; 
  22860.         } else { 
  22861.             $ximg = $x; 
  22862.         } 
  22863.         $this->img_rb_x = $ximg + $w; 
  22864.     } 
  22865.     // store current graphic vars 
  22866.     $gvars = $this->getGraphicVars(); 
  22867.     // store SVG position and scale factors 
  22868.     $svgoffset_x = ($ximg - $ox) * $this->k; 
  22869.     $svgoffset_y = -($y - $oy) * $this->k; 
  22870.     if (isset($view_box[2]) AND ($view_box[2] > 0) AND ($view_box[3] > 0)) { 
  22871.         $ow = $view_box[2]; 
  22872.         $oh = $view_box[3]; 
  22873.     } else { 
  22874.         if ($ow <= 0) { 
  22875.             $ow = $w; 
  22876.         } 
  22877.         if ($oh <= 0) { 
  22878.             $oh = $h; 
  22879.         } 
  22880.     } 
  22881.     $svgscale_x = $w / $ow; 
  22882.     $svgscale_y = $h / $oh; 
  22883.     // scaling and alignment 
  22884.     if ($aspect_ratio_align != 'none') { 
  22885.         // store current scaling values 
  22886.         $svgscale_old_x = $svgscale_x; 
  22887.         $svgscale_old_y = $svgscale_y; 
  22888.         // force uniform scaling 
  22889.         if ($aspect_ratio_ms == 'slice') { 
  22890.             // the entire viewport is covered by the viewBox 
  22891.             if ($svgscale_x > $svgscale_y) { 
  22892.                 $svgscale_y = $svgscale_x; 
  22893.             } elseif ($svgscale_x < $svgscale_y) { 
  22894.                 $svgscale_x = $svgscale_y; 
  22895.             } 
  22896.         } else { // meet 
  22897.             // the entire viewBox is visible within the viewport 
  22898.             if ($svgscale_x < $svgscale_y) { 
  22899.                 $svgscale_y = $svgscale_x; 
  22900.             } elseif ($svgscale_x > $svgscale_y) { 
  22901.                 $svgscale_x = $svgscale_y; 
  22902.             } 
  22903.         } 
  22904.         // correct X alignment 
  22905.         switch (substr($aspect_ratio_align, 1, 3)) { 
  22906.             case 'Min': { 
  22907.                 // do nothing 
  22908.                 break; 
  22909.             } 
  22910.             case 'Max': { 
  22911.                 $svgoffset_x += (($w * $this->k) - ($ow * $this->k * $svgscale_x)); 
  22912.                 break; 
  22913.             } 
  22914.             default: 
  22915.             case 'Mid': { 
  22916.                 $svgoffset_x += ((($w * $this->k) - ($ow * $this->k * $svgscale_x)) / 2); 
  22917.                 break; 
  22918.             } 
  22919.         } 
  22920.         // correct Y alignment 
  22921.         switch (substr($aspect_ratio_align, 5)) { 
  22922.             case 'Min': { 
  22923.                 // do nothing 
  22924.                 break; 
  22925.             } 
  22926.             case 'Max': { 
  22927.                 $svgoffset_y -= (($h * $this->k) - ($oh * $this->k * $svgscale_y)); 
  22928.                 break; 
  22929.             } 
  22930.             default: 
  22931.             case 'Mid': { 
  22932.                 $svgoffset_y -= ((($h * $this->k) - ($oh * $this->k * $svgscale_y)) / 2); 
  22933.                 break; 
  22934.             } 
  22935.         } 
  22936.     } 
  22937.     // store current page break mode 
  22938.     $page_break_mode = $this->AutoPageBreak; 
  22939.     $page_break_margin = $this->getBreakMargin(); 
  22940.     $cell_padding = $this->cell_padding; 
  22941.     $this->SetCellPadding(0); 
  22942.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak(false); 
  22943.     // save the current graphic state 
  22944.     $this->_out('q'.$this->epsmarker); 
  22945.     // set initial clipping mask 
  22946.     $this->Rect($ximg, $y, $w, $h, 'CNZ', array(), array()); 
  22947.     // scale and translate 
  22948.     $e = $ox * $this->k * (1 - $svgscale_x); 
  22949.     $f = ($this->h - $oy) * $this->k * (1 - $svgscale_y); 
  22950.     $this->_out(sprintf('%F %F %F %F %F %F cm', $svgscale_x, 0, 0, $svgscale_y, ($e + $svgoffset_x), ($f + $svgoffset_y))); 
  22951.     // creates a new XML parser to be used by the other XML functions 
  22952.     $this->parser = xml_parser_create('UTF-8'); 
  22953.     // the following function allows to use parser inside object 
  22954.     xml_set_object($this->parser, $this); 
  22955.     // disable case-folding for this XML parser 
  22956.     xml_parser_set_option($this->parser, XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING, 0); 
  22957.     // sets the element handler functions for the XML parser 
  22958.     xml_set_element_handler($this->parser, 'startSVGElementHandler', 'endSVGElementHandler'); 
  22959.     // sets the character data handler function for the XML parser 
  22960.     xml_set_character_data_handler($this->parser, 'segSVGContentHandler'); 
  22961.     // start parsing an XML document 
  22962.     if (!xml_parse($this->parser, $svgdata)) { 
  22963.         $error_message = sprintf('SVG Error: %s at line %d', xml_error_string(xml_get_error_code($this->parser)), xml_get_current_line_number($this->parser)); 
  22964.         $this->Error($error_message); 
  22965.     } 
  22966.     // free this XML parser 
  22967.     xml_parser_free($this->parser); 
  22968.     // restore previous graphic state 
  22969.     $this->_out($this->epsmarker.'Q'); 
  22970.     // restore graphic vars 
  22971.     $this->setGraphicVars($gvars); 
  22972.     $this->lasth = $gvars['lasth']; 
  22973.     if (!empty($border)) { 
  22974.         $bx = $this->x; 
  22975.         $by = $this->y; 
  22976.         $this->x = $ximg; 
  22977.         if ($this->rtl) { 
  22978.             $this->x += $w; 
  22979.         } 
  22980.         $this->y = $y; 
  22981.         $this->Cell($w, $h, '', $border, 0, '', 0, '', 0, true); 
  22982.         $this->x = $bx; 
  22983.         $this->y = $by; 
  22984.     } 
  22985.     if ($link) { 
  22986.         $this->Link($ximg, $y, $w, $h, $link, 0); 
  22987.     } 
  22988.     // set pointer to align the next text/objects 
  22989.     switch($align) { 
  22990.         case 'T':{ 
  22991.             $this->y = $y; 
  22992.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  22993.             break; 
  22994.         } 
  22995.         case 'M':{ 
  22996.             $this->y = $y + round($h/2); 
  22997.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  22998.             break; 
  22999.         } 
  23000.         case 'B':{ 
  23001.             $this->y = $this->img_rb_y; 
  23002.             $this->x = $this->img_rb_x; 
  23003.             break; 
  23004.         } 
  23005.         case 'N':{ 
  23006.             $this->SetY($this->img_rb_y); 
  23007.             break; 
  23008.         } 
  23009.         default:{ 
  23010.             // restore pointer to starting position 
  23011.             $this->x = $gvars['x']; 
  23012.             $this->y = $gvars['y']; 
  23013.             $this->page = $gvars['page']; 
  23014.             $this->current_column = $gvars['current_column']; 
  23015.             $this->tMargin = $gvars['tMargin']; 
  23016.             $this->bMargin = $gvars['bMargin']; 
  23017.             $this->w = $gvars['w']; 
  23018.             $this->h = $gvars['h']; 
  23019.             $this->wPt = $gvars['wPt']; 
  23020.             $this->hPt = $gvars['hPt']; 
  23021.             $this->fwPt = $gvars['fwPt']; 
  23022.             $this->fhPt = $gvars['fhPt']; 
  23023.             break; 
  23024.         } 
  23025.     } 
  23026.     $this->endlinex = $this->img_rb_x; 
  23027.     // restore page break 
  23028.     $this->SetAutoPageBreak($page_break_mode, $page_break_margin); 
  23029.     $this->cell_padding = $cell_padding; 
  23030. } 
  23031.  
  23032. /** 
  23033.  * Convert SVG transformation matrix to PDF. 
  23034.  * @param $tm (array) original SVG transformation matrix 
  23035.  * @return array transformation matrix 
  23036.  * @protected 
  23037.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23038.  */ 
  23039. protected function convertSVGtMatrix($tm) { 
  23040.     $a = $tm[0]; 
  23041.     $b = -$tm[1]; 
  23042.     $c = -$tm[2]; 
  23043.     $d = $tm[3]; 
  23044.     $e = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tm[4], 1, $this->svgunit, false) * $this->k; 
  23045.     $f = -$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($tm[5], 1, $this->svgunit, false) * $this->k; 
  23046.     $x = 0; 
  23047.     $y = $this->h * $this->k; 
  23048.     $e = ($x * (1 - $a)) - ($y * $c) + $e; 
  23049.     $f = ($y * (1 - $d)) - ($x * $b) + $f; 
  23050.     return array($a, $b, $c, $d, $e, $f); 
  23051. } 
  23052.  
  23053. /** 
  23054.  * Apply SVG graphic transformation matrix. 
  23055.  * @param $tm (array) original SVG transformation matrix 
  23056.  * @protected 
  23057.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23058.  */ 
  23059. protected function SVGTransform($tm) { 
  23060.     $this->Transform($this->convertSVGtMatrix($tm)); 
  23061. } 
  23062.  
  23063. /** 
  23064.  * Apply the requested SVG styles (*** TO BE COMPLETED ***) 
  23065.  * @param $svgstyle (array) array of SVG styles to apply 
  23066.  * @param $prevsvgstyle (array) array of previous SVG style 
  23067.  * @param $x (int) X origin of the bounding box 
  23068.  * @param $y (int) Y origin of the bounding box 
  23069.  * @param $w (int) width of the bounding box 
  23070.  * @param $h (int) height of the bounding box 
  23071.  * @param $clip_function (string) clip function 
  23072.  * @param $clip_params (array) array of parameters for clipping function 
  23073.  * @return object style 
  23074.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  23075.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23076.  * @protected 
  23077.  */ 
  23078. protected function setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prevsvgstyle, $x=0, $y=0, $w=1, $h=1, $clip_function='', $clip_params=array()) { 
  23079.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  23080.          return; 
  23081.     } 
  23082.     $objstyle = ''; 
  23083.     $minlen = (0.01 / $this->k); // minimum acceptable length 
  23084.     if (!isset($svgstyle['opacity'])) { 
  23085.         return $objstyle; 
  23086.     } 
  23087.     // clip-path 
  23088.     $regs = array(); 
  23089.     if (preg_match('/url\([\s]*\#([^\)]*)\)/si', $svgstyle['clip-path'], $regs)) { 
  23090.         $clip_path = $this->svgclippaths[$regs[1]]; 
  23091.         foreach ($clip_path as $cp) { 
  23092.             $this->startSVGElementHandler('clip-path', $cp['name'], $cp['attribs'], $cp['tm']); 
  23093.         } 
  23094.     } 
  23095.     // opacity 
  23096.     if ($svgstyle['opacity'] != 1) { 
  23097.         $this->setAlpha($svgstyle['opacity'], 'Normal', $svgstyle['opacity'], false); 
  23098.     } 
  23099.     // color 
  23100.     $fill_color = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  23101.     $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  23102.     // text color 
  23103.     $text_color = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['text-color'], $this->spot_colors); 
  23104.     $this->SetTextColorArray($text_color); 
  23105.     // clip 
  23106.     if (preg_match('/rect\(([a-z0-9\-\.]*)[\s]*([a-z0-9\-\.]*)[\s]*([a-z0-9\-\.]*)[\s]*([a-z0-9\-\.]*)\)/si', $svgstyle['clip'], $regs)) { 
  23107.         $top = (isset($regs[1])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[1], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23108.         $right = (isset($regs[2])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[2], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23109.         $bottom = (isset($regs[3])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[3], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23110.         $left = (isset($regs[4])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($regs[4], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23111.         $cx = $x + $left; 
  23112.         $cy = $y + $top; 
  23113.         $cw = $w - $left - $right; 
  23114.         $ch = $h - $top - $bottom; 
  23115.         if ($svgstyle['clip-rule'] == 'evenodd') { 
  23116.             $clip_rule = 'CNZ'; 
  23117.         } else { 
  23118.             $clip_rule = 'CEO'; 
  23119.         } 
  23120.         $this->Rect($cx, $cy, $cw, $ch, $clip_rule, array(), array()); 
  23121.     } 
  23122.     // fill 
  23123.     $regs = array(); 
  23124.     if (preg_match('/url\([\s]*\#([^\)]*)\)/si', $svgstyle['fill'], $regs)) { 
  23125.         // gradient 
  23126.         $gradient = $this->svggradients[$regs[1]]; 
  23127.         if (isset($gradient['xref'])) { 
  23128.             // reference to another gradient definition 
  23129.             $newgradient = $this->svggradients[$gradient['xref']]; 
  23130.             $newgradient['coords'] = $gradient['coords']; 
  23131.             $newgradient['mode'] = $gradient['mode']; 
  23132.             $newgradient['type'] = $gradient['type']; 
  23133.             $newgradient['gradientUnits'] = $gradient['gradientUnits']; 
  23134.             if (isset($gradient['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23135.                 $newgradient['gradientTransform'] = $gradient['gradientTransform']; 
  23136.             } 
  23137.             $gradient = $newgradient; 
  23138.         } 
  23139.         //save current Graphic State 
  23140.         $this->_outSaveGraphicsState(); 
  23141.         //set clipping area 
  23142.         if (!empty($clip_function) AND method_exists($this, $clip_function)) { 
  23143.             $bbox = call_user_func_array(array($this, $clip_function), $clip_params); 
  23144.             if ((!isset($gradient['type']) OR ($gradient['type'] != 3)) AND is_array($bbox) AND (count($bbox) == 4)) { 
  23145.                 list($x, $y, $w, $h) = $bbox; 
  23146.             } 
  23147.         } 
  23148.         if ($gradient['mode'] == 'measure') { 
  23149.             if (!isset($gradient['coords'][4])) { 
  23150.                 $gradient['coords'][4] = 0.5; 
  23151.             } 
  23152.             if (isset($gradient['gradientTransform']) AND !empty($gradient['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23153.                 $gtm = $gradient['gradientTransform']; 
  23154.                 // apply transformation matrix 
  23155.                 $xa = ($gtm[0] * $gradient['coords'][0]) + ($gtm[2] * $gradient['coords'][1]) + $gtm[4]; 
  23156.                 $ya = ($gtm[1] * $gradient['coords'][0]) + ($gtm[3] * $gradient['coords'][1]) + $gtm[5]; 
  23157.                 $xb = ($gtm[0] * $gradient['coords'][2]) + ($gtm[2] * $gradient['coords'][3]) + $gtm[4]; 
  23158.                 $yb = ($gtm[1] * $gradient['coords'][2]) + ($gtm[3] * $gradient['coords'][3]) + $gtm[5]; 
  23159.                 $r = sqrt(pow(($gtm[0] * $gradient['coords'][4]), 2) + pow(($gtm[1] * $gradient['coords'][4]), 2)); 
  23160.                 $gradient['coords'][0] = $xa; 
  23161.                 $gradient['coords'][1] = $ya; 
  23162.                 $gradient['coords'][2] = $xb; 
  23163.                 $gradient['coords'][3] = $yb; 
  23164.                 $gradient['coords'][4] = $r; 
  23165.             } 
  23166.             // convert SVG coordinates to user units 
  23167.             $gradient['coords'][0] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][0], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23168.             $gradient['coords'][1] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][1], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23169.             $gradient['coords'][2] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][2], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23170.             $gradient['coords'][3] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][3], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23171.             $gradient['coords'][4] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($gradient['coords'][4], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23172.             if ($w <= $minlen) { 
  23173.                 $w = $minlen; 
  23174.             } 
  23175.             if ($h <= $minlen) { 
  23176.                 $h = $minlen; 
  23177.             } 
  23178.             // shift units 
  23179.             if ($gradient['gradientUnits'] == 'objectBoundingBox') { 
  23180.                 // convert to SVG coordinate system 
  23181.                 $gradient['coords'][0] += $x; 
  23182.                 $gradient['coords'][1] += $y; 
  23183.                 $gradient['coords'][2] += $x; 
  23184.                 $gradient['coords'][3] += $y; 
  23185.             } 
  23186.             // calculate percentages 
  23187.             $gradient['coords'][0] = (($gradient['coords'][0] - $x) / $w); 
  23188.             $gradient['coords'][1] = (($gradient['coords'][1] - $y) / $h); 
  23189.             $gradient['coords'][2] = (($gradient['coords'][2] - $x) / $w); 
  23190.             $gradient['coords'][3] = (($gradient['coords'][3] - $y) / $h); 
  23191.             $gradient['coords'][4] /= $w; 
  23192.         } elseif ($gradient['mode'] == 'percentage') { 
  23193.             foreach($gradient['coords'] as $key => $val) { 
  23194.                 $gradient['coords'][$key] = (intval($val) / 100); 
  23195.                 if ($val < 0) { 
  23196.                     $gradient['coords'][$key] = 0; 
  23197.                 } elseif ($val > 1) { 
  23198.                     $gradient['coords'][$key] = 1; 
  23199.                 } 
  23200.             } 
  23201.         } 
  23202.         if (($gradient['type'] == 2) AND ($gradient['coords'][0] == $gradient['coords'][2]) AND ($gradient['coords'][1] == $gradient['coords'][3])) { 
  23203.             // single color (no shading) 
  23204.             $gradient['coords'][0] = 1; 
  23205.             $gradient['coords'][1] = 0; 
  23206.             $gradient['coords'][2] = 0.999; 
  23207.             $gradient['coords'][3] = 0; 
  23208.         } 
  23209.         // swap Y coordinates 
  23210.         $tmp = $gradient['coords'][1]; 
  23211.         $gradient['coords'][1] = $gradient['coords'][3];
