  23212.         $gradient['coords'][3] = $tmp; 
  23213.         // set transformation map for gradient 
  23214.         $cy = ($this->h - $y); 
  23215.         if ($gradient['type'] == 3) { 
  23216.             // circular gradient 
  23217.             $cy -= ($gradient['coords'][1] * ($w + $h)); 
  23218.         } else { 
  23219.             $cy -= $h; 
  23220.         } 
  23221.         $this->_out(sprintf('%F 0 0 %F %F %F cm', ($w * $this->k), ($h * $this->k), ($x * $this->k), ($cy * $this->k))); 
  23222.         if (count($gradient['stops']) > 1) { 
  23223.             $this->Gradient($gradient['type'], $gradient['coords'], $gradient['stops'], array(), false); 
  23224.         } 
  23225.     } elseif ($svgstyle['fill'] != 'none') { 
  23226.         $fill_color = TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['fill'], $this->spot_colors); 
  23227.         if ($svgstyle['fill-opacity'] != 1) { 
  23228.             $this->setAlpha($this->alpha['CA'], 'Normal', $svgstyle['fill-opacity'], false); 
  23229.         } 
  23230.         $this->SetFillColorArray($fill_color); 
  23231.         if ($svgstyle['fill-rule'] == 'evenodd') { 
  23232.             $objstyle .= 'F*'; 
  23233.         } else { 
  23234.             $objstyle .= 'F'; 
  23235.         } 
  23236.     } 
  23237.     // stroke 
  23238.     if ($svgstyle['stroke'] != 'none') { 
  23239.         if ($svgstyle['stroke-opacity'] != 1) { 
  23240.             $this->setAlpha($svgstyle['stroke-opacity'], 'Normal', $this->alpha['ca'], false); 
  23241.         } 
  23242.         $stroke_style = array( 
  23243.             'color' => TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['stroke'], $this->spot_colors),  
  23244.             'width' => $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($svgstyle['stroke-width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false),  
  23245.             'cap' => $svgstyle['stroke-linecap'],  
  23246.             'join' => $svgstyle['stroke-linejoin'] 
  23247.  ); 
  23248.         if (isset($svgstyle['stroke-dasharray']) AND !empty($svgstyle['stroke-dasharray']) AND ($svgstyle['stroke-dasharray'] != 'none')) { 
  23249.             $stroke_style['dash'] = $svgstyle['stroke-dasharray']; 
  23250.         } 
  23251.         $this->SetLineStyle($stroke_style); 
  23252.         $objstyle .= 'D'; 
  23253.     } 
  23254.     // font 
  23255.     $regs = array(); 
  23256.     if (!empty($svgstyle['font'])) { 
  23257.         if (preg_match('/font-family[\s]*:[\s]*([^\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23258.             $font_family = $this->getFontFamilyName($regs[1]); 
  23259.         } else { 
  23260.             $font_family = $svgstyle['font-family']; 
  23261.         } 
  23262.         if (preg_match('/font-size[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23263.             $font_size = trim($regs[1]); 
  23264.         } else { 
  23265.             $font_size = $svgstyle['font-size']; 
  23266.         } 
  23267.         if (preg_match('/font-style[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23268.             $font_style = trim($regs[1]); 
  23269.         } else { 
  23270.             $font_style = $svgstyle['font-style']; 
  23271.         } 
  23272.         if (preg_match('/font-weight[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23273.             $font_weight = trim($regs[1]); 
  23274.         } else { 
  23275.             $font_weight = $svgstyle['font-weight']; 
  23276.         } 
  23277.         if (preg_match('/font-stretch[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23278.             $font_stretch = trim($regs[1]); 
  23279.         } else { 
  23280.             $font_stretch = $svgstyle['font-stretch']; 
  23281.         } 
  23282.         if (preg_match('/letter-spacing[\s]*:[\s]*([^\s\;\"]*)/si', $svgstyle['font'], $regs)) { 
  23283.             $font_spacing = trim($regs[1]); 
  23284.         } else { 
  23285.             $font_spacing = $svgstyle['letter-spacing']; 
  23286.         } 
  23287.     } else { 
  23288.         $font_family = $this->getFontFamilyName($svgstyle['font-family']); 
  23289.         $font_size = $svgstyle['font-size']; 
  23290.         $font_style = $svgstyle['font-style']; 
  23291.         $font_weight = $svgstyle['font-weight']; 
  23292.         $font_stretch = $svgstyle['font-stretch']; 
  23293.         $font_spacing = $svgstyle['letter-spacing']; 
  23294.     } 
  23295.     $font_size = $this->getHTMLFontUnits($font_size, $this->svgstyles[0]['font-size'], $prevsvgstyle['font-size'], $this->svgunit); 
  23296.     $font_stretch = $this->getCSSFontStretching($font_stretch, $svgstyle['font-stretch']); 
  23297.     $font_spacing = $this->getCSSFontSpacing($font_spacing, $svgstyle['letter-spacing']); 
  23298.     switch ($font_style) { 
  23299.         case 'italic': { 
  23300.             $font_style = 'I'; 
  23301.             break; 
  23302.         } 
  23303.         case 'oblique': { 
  23304.             $font_style = 'I'; 
  23305.             break; 
  23306.         } 
  23307.         default: 
  23308.         case 'normal': { 
  23309.             $font_style = ''; 
  23310.             break; 
  23311.         } 
  23312.     } 
  23313.     switch ($font_weight) { 
  23314.         case 'bold': 
  23315.         case 'bolder': { 
  23316.             $font_style .= 'B'; 
  23317.             break; 
  23318.         } 
  23319.     } 
  23320.     switch ($svgstyle['text-decoration']) { 
  23321.         case 'underline': { 
  23322.             $font_style .= 'U'; 
  23323.             break; 
  23324.         } 
  23325.         case 'overline': { 
  23326.             $font_style .= 'O'; 
  23327.             break; 
  23328.         } 
  23329.         case 'line-through': { 
  23330.             $font_style .= 'D'; 
  23331.             break; 
  23332.         } 
  23333.         default: 
  23334.         case 'none': { 
  23335.             break; 
  23336.         } 
  23337.     } 
  23338.     $this->SetFont($font_family, $font_style, $font_size); 
  23339.     $this->setFontStretching($font_stretch); 
  23340.     $this->setFontSpacing($font_spacing); 
  23341.     return $objstyle; 
  23342. } 
  23343.  
  23344. /** 
  23345.  * Draws an SVG path 
  23346.  * @param $d (string) attribute d of the path SVG element 
  23347.  * @param $style (string) Style of rendering. Possible values are: 
  23348.  * <ul> 
  23349.  *     <li>D or empty string: Draw (default).</li> 
  23350.  *     <li>F: Fill.</li> 
  23351.  *     <li>F*: Fill using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path.</li> 
  23352.  *     <li>DF or FD: Draw and fill.</li> 
  23353.  *     <li>DF* or FD*: Draw and fill using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path.</li> 
  23354.  *     <li>CNZ: Clipping mode (using the even-odd rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  23355.  *     <li>CEO: Clipping mode (using the nonzero winding number rule to determine which regions lie inside the clipping path).</li> 
  23356.  * </ul> 
  23357.  * @return array of container box measures (x, y, w, h) 
  23358.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  23359.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23360.  * @protected 
  23361.  */ 
  23362. protected function SVGPath($d, $style='') { 
  23363.     if ($this->state != 2) { 
  23364.          return; 
  23365.     } 
  23366.     // set fill/stroke style 
  23367.     $op = TCPDF_STATIC::getPathPaintOperator($style, ''); 
  23368.     if (empty($op)) { 
  23369.         return; 
  23370.     } 
  23371.     $paths = array(); 
  23372.     $d = preg_replace('/([0-9ACHLMQSTVZ])([\-\+])/si', '\\1 \\2', $d); 
  23373.     preg_match_all('/([ACHLMQSTVZ])[\s]*([^ACHLMQSTVZ\"]*)/si', $d, $paths, PREG_SET_ORDER); 
  23374.     $x = 0; 
  23375.     $y = 0; 
  23376.     $x1 = 0; 
  23377.     $y1 = 0; 
  23378.     $x2 = 0; 
  23379.     $y2 = 0; 
  23380.     $xmin = 2147483647; 
  23381.     $xmax = 0; 
  23382.     $ymin = 2147483647; 
  23383.     $ymax = 0; 
  23384.     $relcoord = false; 
  23385.     $minlen = (0.01 / $this->k); // minimum acceptable length (3 point) 
  23386.     $firstcmd = true; // used to print first point 
  23387.     // draw curve pieces 
  23388.     foreach ($paths as $key => $val) { 
  23389.         // get curve type 
  23390.         $cmd = trim($val[1]); 
  23391.         if (strtolower($cmd) == $cmd) { 
  23392.             // use relative coordinated instead of absolute 
  23393.             $relcoord = true; 
  23394.             $xoffset = $x; 
  23395.             $yoffset = $y; 
  23396.         } else { 
  23397.             $relcoord = false; 
  23398.             $xoffset = 0; 
  23399.             $yoffset = 0; 
  23400.         } 
  23401.         $params = array(); 
  23402.         if (isset($val[2])) { 
  23403.             // get curve parameters 
  23404.             $rawparams = preg_split('/([\, \s]+)/si', trim($val[2])); 
  23405.             $params = array(); 
  23406.             foreach ($rawparams as $ck => $cp) { 
  23407.                 $params[$ck] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($cp, 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  23408.                 if (abs($params[$ck]) < $minlen) { 
  23409.                     // aproximate little values to zero 
  23410.                     $params[$ck] = 0; 
  23411.                 } 
  23412.             } 
  23413.         } 
  23414.         // store current origin point 
  23415.         $x0 = $x; 
  23416.         $y0 = $y; 
  23417.         switch (strtoupper($cmd)) { 
  23418.             case 'M': { // moveto 
  23419.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23420.                     if (($ck % 2) == 0) { 
  23421.                         $x = $cp + $xoffset; 
  23422.                     } else { 
  23423.                         $y = $cp + $yoffset; 
  23424.                         if ($firstcmd OR (abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23425.                             if ($ck == 1) { 
  23426.                                 $this->_outPoint($x, $y); 
  23427.                                 $firstcmd = false; 
  23428.                             } else { 
  23429.                                 $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23430.                             } 
  23431.                             $x0 = $x; 
  23432.                             $y0 = $y; 
  23433.                         } 
  23434.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23435.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23436.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23437.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23438.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23439.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23440.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23441.                         } 
  23442.                     } 
  23443.                 } 
  23444.                 break; 
  23445.             } 
  23446.             case 'L': { // lineto 
  23447.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23448.                     if (($ck % 2) == 0) { 
  23449.                         $x = $cp + $xoffset; 
  23450.                     } else { 
  23451.                         $y = $cp + $yoffset; 
  23452.                         if ((abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23453.                             $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23454.                             $x0 = $x; 
  23455.                             $y0 = $y; 
  23456.                         } 
  23457.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23458.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23459.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23460.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23461.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23462.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23463.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23464.                         } 
  23465.                     } 
  23466.                 } 
  23467.                 break; 
  23468.             } 
  23469.             case 'H': { // horizontal lineto 
  23470.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23471.                     $x = $cp + $xoffset; 
  23472.                     if ((abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23473.                         $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23474.                         $x0 = $x; 
  23475.                         $y0 = $y; 
  23476.                     } 
  23477.                     $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23478.                     $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23479.                     if ($relcoord) { 
  23480.                         $xoffset = $x; 
  23481.                     } 
  23482.                 } 
  23483.                 break; 
  23484.             } 
  23485.             case 'V': { // vertical lineto 
  23486.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23487.                     $y = $cp + $yoffset; 
  23488.                     if ((abs($x0 - $x) >= $minlen) OR (abs($y0 - $y) >= $minlen)) { 
  23489.                         $this->_outLine($x, $y); 
  23490.                         $x0 = $x; 
  23491.                         $y0 = $y; 
  23492.                     } 
  23493.                     $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23494.                     $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23495.                     if ($relcoord) { 
  23496.                         $yoffset = $y; 
  23497.                     } 
  23498.                 } 
  23499.                 break; 
  23500.             } 
  23501.             case 'C': { // curveto 
  23502.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23503.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23504.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 6) == 0) { 
  23505.                         $x1 = $params[($ck - 5)] + $xoffset; 
  23506.                         $y1 = $params[($ck - 4)] + $yoffset; 
  23507.                         $x2 = $params[($ck - 3)] + $xoffset; 
  23508.                         $y2 = $params[($ck - 2)] + $yoffset; 
  23509.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23510.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23511.                         $this->_outCurve($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x, $y); 
  23512.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23513.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23514.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23515.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23516.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23517.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23518.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23519.                         } 
  23520.                     } 
  23521.                 } 
  23522.                 break; 
  23523.             } 
  23524.             case 'S': { // shorthand/smooth curveto 
  23525.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23526.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23527.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 4) == 0) { 
  23528.                         if (($key > 0) AND ((strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'C') OR (strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'S'))) { 
  23529.                             $x1 = (2 * $x) - $x2; 
  23530.                             $y1 = (2 * $y) - $y2; 
  23531.                         } else { 
  23532.                             $x1 = $x; 
  23533.                             $y1 = $y; 
  23534.                         } 
  23535.                         $x2 = $params[($ck - 3)] + $xoffset; 
  23536.                         $y2 = $params[($ck - 2)] + $yoffset; 
  23537.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23538.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23539.                         $this->_outCurve($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2, $x, $y); 
  23540.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23541.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23542.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $x1, $x2); 
  23543.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $y1, $y2); 
  23544.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23545.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23546.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23547.                         } 
  23548.                     } 
  23549.                 } 
  23550.                 break; 
  23551.             } 
  23552.             case 'Q': { // quadratic Bezier curveto 
  23553.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23554.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23555.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 4) == 0) { 
  23556.                         // convert quadratic points to cubic points 
  23557.                         $x1 = $params[($ck - 3)] + $xoffset; 
  23558.                         $y1 = $params[($ck - 2)] + $yoffset; 
  23559.                         $xa = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23560.                         $ya = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23561.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23562.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23563.                         $xb = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23564.                         $yb = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23565.                         $this->_outCurve($xa, $ya, $xb, $yb, $x, $y); 
  23566.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23567.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23568.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23569.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23570.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23571.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23572.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23573.                         } 
  23574.                     } 
  23575.                 } 
  23576.                 break; 
  23577.             } 
  23578.             case 'T': { // shorthand/smooth quadratic Bezier curveto 
  23579.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23580.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23581.                     if (($ck % 2) != 0) { 
  23582.                         if (($key > 0) AND ((strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'Q') OR (strtoupper($paths[($key - 1)][1]) == 'T'))) { 
  23583.                             $x1 = (2 * $x) - $x1; 
  23584.                             $y1 = (2 * $y) - $y1; 
  23585.                         } else { 
  23586.                             $x1 = $x; 
  23587.                             $y1 = $y; 
  23588.                         } 
  23589.                         // convert quadratic points to cubic points 
  23590.                         $xa = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23591.                         $ya = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23592.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23593.                         $y = $params[($ck)] + $yoffset; 
  23594.                         $xb = ($x + (2 * $x1)) / 3; 
  23595.                         $yb = ($y + (2 * $y1)) / 3; 
  23596.                         $this->_outCurve($xa, $ya, $xb, $yb, $x, $y); 
  23597.                         $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23598.                         $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23599.                         $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $xa, $xb); 
  23600.                         $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $ya, $yb); 
  23601.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23602.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23603.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23604.                         } 
  23605.                     } 
  23606.                 } 
  23607.                 break; 
  23608.             } 
  23609.             case 'A': { // elliptical arc 
  23610.                 foreach ($params as $ck => $cp) { 
  23611.                     $params[$ck] = $cp; 
  23612.                     if ((($ck + 1) % 7) == 0) { 
  23613.                         $x0 = $x; 
  23614.                         $y0 = $y; 
  23615.                         $rx = abs($params[($ck - 6)]); 
  23616.                         $ry = abs($params[($ck - 5)]); 
  23617.                         $ang = -$rawparams[($ck - 4)]; 
  23618.                         $angle = deg2rad($ang); 
  23619.                         $fa = $rawparams[($ck - 3)]; // large-arc-flag 
  23620.                         $fs = $rawparams[($ck - 2)]; // sweep-flag 
  23621.                         $x = $params[($ck - 1)] + $xoffset; 
  23622.                         $y = $params[$ck] + $yoffset; 
  23623.                         if ((abs($x0 - $x) < $minlen) AND (abs($y0 - $y) < $minlen)) { 
  23624.                             // endpoints are almost identical 
  23625.                             $xmin = min($xmin, $x); 
  23626.                             $ymin = min($ymin, $y); 
  23627.                             $xmax = max($xmax, $x); 
  23628.                             $ymax = max($ymax, $y); 
  23629.                         } else { 
  23630.                             $cos_ang = cos($angle); 
  23631.                             $sin_ang = sin($angle); 
  23632.                             $a = (($x0 - $x) / 2); 
  23633.                             $b = (($y0 - $y) / 2); 
  23634.                             $xa = ($a * $cos_ang) - ($b * $sin_ang); 
  23635.                             $ya = ($a * $sin_ang) + ($b * $cos_ang); 
  23636.                             $rx2 = $rx * $rx; 
  23637.                             $ry2 = $ry * $ry; 
  23638.                             $xa2 = $xa * $xa; 
  23639.                             $ya2 = $ya * $ya; 
  23640.                             $delta = ($xa2 / $rx2) + ($ya2 / $ry2); 
  23641.                             if ($delta > 1) { 
  23642.                                 $rx *= sqrt($delta); 
  23643.                                 $ry *= sqrt($delta); 
  23644.                                 $rx2 = $rx * $rx; 
  23645.                                 $ry2 = $ry * $ry; 
  23646.                             } 
  23647.                             $numerator = (($rx2 * $ry2) - ($rx2 * $ya2) - ($ry2 * $xa2)); 
  23648.                             if ($numerator < 0) { 
  23649.                                 $root = 0; 
  23650.                             } else { 
  23651.                                 $root = sqrt($numerator / (($rx2 * $ya2) + ($ry2 * $xa2))); 
  23652.                             } 
  23653.                             if ($fa == $fs) { 
  23654.                                 $root *= -1; 
  23655.                             } 
  23656.                             $cax = $root * (($rx * $ya) / $ry); 
  23657.                             $cay = -$root * (($ry * $xa) / $rx); 
  23658.                             // coordinates of ellipse center 
  23659.                             $cx = ($cax * $cos_ang) - ($cay * $sin_ang) + (($x0 + $x) / 2); 
  23660.                             $cy = ($cax * $sin_ang) + ($cay * $cos_ang) + (($y0 + $y) / 2); 
  23661.                             // get angles 
  23662.                             $angs = TCPDF_STATIC::getVectorsAngle(1, 0, (($xa - $cax) / $rx), (($cay - $ya) / $ry)); 
  23663.                             $dang = TCPDF_STATIC::getVectorsAngle((($xa - $cax) / $rx), (($ya - $cay) / $ry), ((-$xa - $cax) / $rx), ((-$ya - $cay) / $ry)); 
  23664.                             if (($fs == 0) AND ($dang > 0)) { 
  23665.                                 $dang -= (2 * M_PI); 
  23666.                             } elseif (($fs == 1) AND ($dang < 0)) { 
  23667.                                 $dang += (2 * M_PI); 
  23668.                             } 
  23669.                             $angf = $angs - $dang; 
  23670.                             if ((($fs == 0) AND ($angs > $angf)) OR (($fs == 1) AND ($angs < $angf))) { 
  23671.                                 // reverse angles 
  23672.                                 $tmp = $angs; 
  23673.                                 $angs = $angf; 
  23674.                                 $angf = $tmp; 
  23675.                             } 
  23676.                             $angs = round(rad2deg($angs), 6); 
  23677.                             $angf = round(rad2deg($angf), 6); 
  23678.                             // covent angles to positive values 
  23679.                             if (($angs < 0) AND ($angf < 0)) { 
  23680.                                 $angs += 360; 
  23681.                                 $angf += 360; 
  23682.                             } 
  23683.                             $pie = false; 
  23684.                             if (($key == 0) AND (isset($paths[($key + 1)][1])) AND (trim($paths[($key + 1)][1]) == 'z')) { 
  23685.                                 $pie = true; 
  23686.                             } 
  23687.                             list($axmin, $aymin, $axmax, $aymax) = $this->_outellipticalarc($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, $ang, $angs, $angf, $pie, 2, false, ($fs == 0), true); 
  23688.                             $xmin = min($xmin, $x, $axmin); 
  23689.                             $ymin = min($ymin, $y, $aymin); 
  23690.                             $xmax = max($xmax, $x, $axmax); 
  23691.                             $ymax = max($ymax, $y, $aymax); 
  23692.                         } 
  23693.                         if ($relcoord) { 
  23694.                             $xoffset = $x; 
  23695.                             $yoffset = $y; 
  23696.                         } 
  23697.                     } 
  23698.                 } 
  23699.                 break; 
  23700.             } 
  23701.             case 'Z': { 
  23702.                 $this->_out('h'); 
  23703.                 break; 
  23704.             } 
  23705.         } 
  23706.         $firstcmd = false; 
  23707.     } // end foreach 
  23708.     if (!empty($op)) { 
  23709.         $this->_out($op); 
  23710.     } 
  23711.     return array($xmin, $ymin, ($xmax - $xmin), ($ymax - $ymin)); 
  23712. } 
  23713.  
  23714. /** 
  23715.  * Sets the opening SVG element handler function for the XML parser. (*** TO BE COMPLETED ***) 
  23716.  * @param $parser (resource) The first parameter, parser, is a reference to the XML parser calling the handler. 
  23717.  * @param $name (string) The second parameter, name, contains the name of the element for which this handler is called. If case-folding is in effect for this parser, the element name will be in uppercase letters. 
  23718.  * @param $attribs (array) The third parameter, attribs, contains an associative array with the element's attributes (if any). The keys of this array are the attribute names, the values are the attribute values. Attribute names are case-folded on the same criteria as element names. Attribute values are not case-folded. The original order of the attributes can be retrieved by walking through attribs the normal way, using each(). The first key in the array was the first attribute, and so on. 
  23719.  * @param $ctm (array) tranformation matrix for clipping mode (starting transformation matrix). 
  23720.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  23721.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  23722.  * @protected 
  23723.  */ 
  23724. protected function startSVGElementHandler($parser, $name, $attribs, $ctm=array()) { 
  23725.     // check if we are in clip mode 
  23726.     if ($this->svgclipmode) { 
  23727.         $this->svgclippaths[$this->svgclipid][] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => $attribs, 'tm' => $this->svgcliptm[$this->svgclipid]); 
  23728.         return; 
  23729.     } 
  23730.     if ($this->svgdefsmode AND !in_array($name, array('clipPath', 'linearGradient', 'radialGradient', 'stop'))) { 
  23731.         if (isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23732.             $attribs['child_elements'] = array(); 
  23733.             $this->svgdefs[$attribs['id']] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => $attribs); 
  23734.             return; 
  23735.         } 
  23736.         if (end($this->svgdefs) !== FALSE) { 
  23737.             $last_svgdefs_id = key($this->svgdefs); 
  23738.             if (isset($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'])) { 
  23739.                 $attribs['id'] = 'DF_'.(count($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements']) + 1); 
  23740.                 $this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'][$attribs['id']] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => $attribs); 
  23741.                 return; 
  23742.             } 
  23743.         } 
  23744.         return; 
  23745.     } 
  23746.     $clipping = false; 
  23747.     if ($parser == 'clip-path') { 
  23748.         // set clipping mode 
  23749.         $clipping = true; 
  23750.     } 
  23751.     // get styling properties 
  23752.     $prev_svgstyle = $this->svgstyles[max(0, (count($this->svgstyles) - 1))]; // previous style 
  23753.     $svgstyle = $this->svgstyles[0]; // set default style 
  23754.     if ($clipping AND !isset($attribs['fill']) AND (!isset($attribs['style']) OR (!preg_match('/[;\"\s]{1}fill[\s]*:[\s]*([^;\"]*)/si', $attribs['style'], $attrval)))) { 
  23755.         // default fill attribute for clipping 
  23756.         $attribs['fill'] = 'none'; 
  23757.     } 
  23758.     if (isset($attribs['style']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($attribs['style']) AND ($attribs['style'][0] != ';')) { 
  23759.         // fix style for regular expression 
  23760.         $attribs['style'] = ';'.$attribs['style']; 
  23761.     } 
  23762.     foreach ($prev_svgstyle as $key => $val) { 
  23763.         if (in_array($key, TCPDF_IMAGES::$svginheritprop)) { 
  23764.             // inherit previous value 
  23765.             $svgstyle[$key] = $val; 
  23766.         } 
  23767.         if (isset($attribs[$key]) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($attribs[$key])) { 
  23768.             // specific attribute settings 
  23769.             if ($attribs[$key] == 'inherit') { 
  23770.                 $svgstyle[$key] = $val; 
  23771.             } else { 
  23772.                 $svgstyle[$key] = $attribs[$key]; 
  23773.             } 
  23774.         } elseif (isset($attribs['style']) AND !TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($attribs['style'])) { 
  23775.             // CSS style syntax 
  23776.             $attrval = array(); 
  23777.             if (preg_match('/[;\"\s]{1}'.$key.'[\s]*:[\s]*([^;\"]*)/si', $attribs['style'], $attrval) AND isset($attrval[1])) { 
  23778.                 if ($attrval[1] == 'inherit') { 
  23779.                     $svgstyle[$key] = $val; 
  23780.                 } else { 
  23781.                     $svgstyle[$key] = $attrval[1]; 
  23782.                 } 
  23783.             } 
  23784.         } 
  23785.     } 
  23786.     // transformation matrix 
  23787.     if (!empty($ctm)) { 
  23788.         $tm = $ctm; 
  23789.     } else { 
  23790.         $tm = array(1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0); 
  23791.     } 
  23792.     if (isset($attribs['transform']) AND !empty($attribs['transform'])) { 
  23793.         $tm = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, TCPDF_STATIC::getSVGTransformMatrix($attribs['transform'])); 
  23794.     } 
  23795.     $svgstyle['transfmatrix'] = $tm; 
  23796.     $invisible = false; 
  23797.     if (($svgstyle['visibility'] == 'hidden') OR ($svgstyle['visibility'] == 'collapse') OR ($svgstyle['display'] == 'none')) { 
  23798.         // the current graphics element is invisible (nothing is painted) 
  23799.         $invisible = true; 
  23800.     } 
  23801.     // process tag 
  23802.     switch($name) { 
  23803.         case 'defs': { 
  23804.             $this->svgdefsmode = true; 
  23805.             break; 
  23806.         } 
  23807.         // clipPath 
  23808.         case 'clipPath': { 
  23809.             if ($invisible) { 
  23810.                 break; 
  23811.             } 
  23812.             $this->svgclipmode = true; 
  23813.             if (!isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23814.                 $attribs['id'] = 'CP_'.(count($this->svgcliptm) + 1); 
  23815.             } 
  23816.             $this->svgclipid = $attribs['id']; 
  23817.             $this->svgclippaths[$this->svgclipid] = array(); 
  23818.             $this->svgcliptm[$this->svgclipid] = $tm; 
  23819.             break; 
  23820.         } 
  23821.         case 'svg': { 
  23822.             // start of SVG object 
  23823.             break; 
  23824.         } 
  23825.         case 'g': { 
  23826.             // group together related graphics elements 
  23827.             array_push($this->svgstyles, $svgstyle); 
  23828.             $this->StartTransform(); 
  23829.             $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$attribs['x']:0); 
  23830.             $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$attribs['y']:0); 
  23831.             $w = 1;//(isset($attribs['width'])?$attribs['width']:1); 
  23832.             $h = 1;//(isset($attribs['height'])?$attribs['height']:1); 
  23833.             $tm = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array($w, 0, 0, $h, $x, $y)); 
  23834.             $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23835.             $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle); 
  23836.             break; 
  23837.         } 
  23838.         case 'linearGradient': { 
  23839.             if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  23840.                 break; 
  23841.             } 
  23842.             if (!isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23843.                 $attribs['id'] = 'GR_'.(count($this->svggradients) + 1); 
  23844.             } 
  23845.             $this->svggradientid = $attribs['id']; 
  23846.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid] = array(); 
  23847.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['type'] = 2; 
  23848.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['stops'] = array(); 
  23849.             if (isset($attribs['gradientUnits'])) { 
  23850.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = $attribs['gradientUnits']; 
  23851.             } else { 
  23852.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = 'objectBoundingBox'; 
  23853.             } 
  23854.             //$attribs['spreadMethod'] 
  23855.             if (((!isset($attribs['x1'])) AND (!isset($attribs['y1'])) AND (!isset($attribs['x2'])) AND (!isset($attribs['y2']))) 
  23856.                 OR ((isset($attribs['x1']) AND (substr($attribs['x1'], -1) == '%')) 
  23857.                     OR (isset($attribs['y1']) AND (substr($attribs['y1'], -1) == '%')) 
  23858.                     OR (isset($attribs['x2']) AND (substr($attribs['x2'], -1) == '%')) 
  23859.                     OR (isset($attribs['y2']) AND (substr($attribs['y2'], -1) == '%')))) { 
  23860.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'percentage'; 
  23861.             } else { 
  23862.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'measure'; 
  23863.             } 
  23864.             $x1 = (isset($attribs['x1'])?$attribs['x1']:'0'); 
  23865.             $y1 = (isset($attribs['y1'])?$attribs['y1']:'0'); 
  23866.             $x2 = (isset($attribs['x2'])?$attribs['x2']:'100'); 
  23867.             $y2 = (isset($attribs['y2'])?$attribs['y2']:'0'); 
  23868.             if (isset($attribs['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23869.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientTransform'] = TCPDF_STATIC::getSVGTransformMatrix($attribs['gradientTransform']); 
  23870.             } 
  23871.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['coords'] = array($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2); 
  23872.             if (isset($attribs['xlink:href']) AND !empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  23873.                 // gradient is defined on another place 
  23874.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['xref'] = substr($attribs['xlink:href'], 1); 
  23875.             } 
  23876.             break; 
  23877.         } 
  23878.         case 'radialGradient': { 
  23879.             if ($this->pdfa_mode) { 
  23880.                 break; 
  23881.             } 
  23882.             if (!isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  23883.                 $attribs['id'] = 'GR_'.(count($this->svggradients) + 1); 
  23884.             } 
  23885.             $this->svggradientid = $attribs['id']; 
  23886.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid] = array(); 
  23887.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['type'] = 3; 
  23888.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['stops'] = array(); 
  23889.             if (isset($attribs['gradientUnits'])) { 
  23890.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = $attribs['gradientUnits']; 
  23891.             } else { 
  23892.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientUnits'] = 'objectBoundingBox'; 
  23893.             } 
  23894.             //$attribs['spreadMethod'] 
  23895.             if (((!isset($attribs['cx'])) AND (!isset($attribs['cy']))) 
  23896.                 OR ((isset($attribs['cx']) AND (substr($attribs['cx'], -1) == '%')) 
  23897.                     OR (isset($attribs['cy']) AND (substr($attribs['cy'], -1) == '%')) )) { 
  23898.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'percentage'; 
  23899.             } else { 
  23900.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['mode'] = 'measure'; 
  23901.             } 
  23902.             $cx = (isset($attribs['cx']) ? $attribs['cx'] : 0.5); 
  23903.             $cy = (isset($attribs['cy']) ? $attribs['cy'] : 0.5); 
  23904.             $fx = (isset($attribs['fx']) ? $attribs['fx'] : $cx); 
  23905.             $fy = (isset($attribs['fy']) ? $attribs['fy'] : $cy); 
  23906.             $r = (isset($attribs['r']) ? $attribs['r'] : 0.5); 
  23907.             if (isset($attribs['gradientTransform'])) { 
  23908.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['gradientTransform'] = TCPDF_STATIC::getSVGTransformMatrix($attribs['gradientTransform']); 
  23909.             } 
  23910.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['coords'] = array($cx, $cy, $fx, $fy, $r); 
  23911.             if (isset($attribs['xlink:href']) AND !empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  23912.                 // gradient is defined on another place 
  23913.                 $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['xref'] = substr($attribs['xlink:href'], 1); 
  23914.             } 
  23915.             break; 
  23916.         } 
  23917.         case 'stop': { 
  23918.             // gradient stops 
  23919.             if (substr($attribs['offset'], -1) == '%') { 
  23920.                 $offset = floatval(substr($attribs['offset'], -1)) / 100; 
  23921.             } else { 
  23922.                 $offset = floatval($attribs['offset']); 
  23923.                 if ($offset > 1) { 
  23924.                     $offset /= 100; 
  23925.                 } 
  23926.             } 
  23927.             $stop_color = isset($svgstyle['stop-color'])?TCPDF_COLORS::convertHTMLColorToDec($svgstyle['stop-color'], $this->spot_colors):'black'; 
  23928.             $opacity = isset($svgstyle['stop-opacity'])?$svgstyle['stop-opacity']:1; 
  23929.             $this->svggradients[$this->svggradientid]['stops'][] = array('offset' => $offset, 'color' => $stop_color, 'opacity' => $opacity); 
  23930.             break; 
  23931.         } 
  23932.         // paths 
  23933.         case 'path': { 
  23934.             if ($invisible) { 
  23935.                 break; 
  23936.             } 
  23937.             if (isset($attribs['d'])) { 
  23938.                 $d = trim($attribs['d']); 
  23939.                 if (!empty($d)) { 
  23940.                     $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$attribs['x']:0); 
  23941.                     $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$attribs['y']:0); 
  23942.                     $w = (isset($attribs['width'])?$attribs['width']:1); 
  23943.                     $h = (isset($attribs['height'])?$attribs['height']:1); 
  23944.                     $tm = TCPDF_STATIC::getTransformationMatrixProduct($tm, array($w, 0, 0, $h, $x, $y)); 
  23945.                     if ($clipping) { 
  23946.                         $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23947.                         $this->SVGPath($d, 'CNZ'); 
  23948.                     } else { 
  23949.                         $this->StartTransform(); 
  23950.                         $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23951.                         $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'SVGPath', array($d, 'CNZ')); 
  23952.                         if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  23953.                             $this->SVGPath($d, $obstyle); 
  23954.                         } 
  23955.                         $this->StopTransform(); 
  23956.                     } 
  23957.                 } 
  23958.             } 
  23959.             break; 
  23960.         } 
  23961.         // shapes 
  23962.         case 'rect': { 
  23963.             if ($invisible) { 
  23964.                 break; 
  23965.             } 
  23966.             $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23967.             $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23968.             $w = (isset($attribs['width'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23969.             $h = (isset($attribs['height'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['height'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23970.             $rx = (isset($attribs['rx'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['rx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  23971.             $ry = (isset($attribs['ry'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['ry'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):$rx); 
  23972.             if ($clipping) { 
  23973.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23974.                 $this->RoundedRectXY($x, $y, $w, $h, $rx, $ry, '1111', 'CNZ', array(), array()); 
  23975.             } else { 
  23976.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  23977.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23978.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'RoundedRectXY', array($x, $y, $w, $h, $rx, $ry, '1111', 'CNZ')); 
  23979.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  23980.                     $this->RoundedRectXY($x, $y, $w, $h, $rx, $ry, '1111', $obstyle, array(), array()); 
  23981.                 } 
  23982.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  23983.             } 
  23984.             break; 
  23985.         } 
  23986.         case 'circle': { 
  23987.             if ($invisible) { 
  23988.                 break; 
  23989.             } 
  23990.             $r = (isset($attribs['r']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['r'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0); 
  23991.             $cx = (isset($attribs['cx']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['x']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  23992.             $cy = (isset($attribs['cy']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cy'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['y']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  23993.             $x = ($cx - $r); 
  23994.             $y = ($cy - $r); 
  23995.             $w = (2 * $r); 
  23996.             $h = $w; 
  23997.             if ($clipping) { 
  23998.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  23999.                 $this->Circle($cx, $cy, $r, 0, 360, 'CNZ', array(), array(), 8); 
  24000.             } else { 
  24001.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24002.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24003.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Circle', array($cx, $cy, $r, 0, 360, 'CNZ')); 
  24004.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24005.                     $this->Circle($cx, $cy, $r, 0, 360, $obstyle, array(), array(), 8); 
  24006.                 } 
  24007.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24008.             } 
  24009.             break; 
  24010.         } 
  24011.         case 'ellipse': { 
  24012.             if ($invisible) { 
  24013.                 break; 
  24014.             } 
  24015.             $rx = (isset($attribs['rx']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['rx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0); 
  24016.             $ry = (isset($attribs['ry']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['ry'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0); 
  24017.             $cx = (isset($attribs['cx']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['x']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  24018.             $cy = (isset($attribs['cy']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['cy'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : (isset($attribs['y']) ? $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false) : 0)); 
  24019.             $x = ($cx - $rx); 
  24020.             $y = ($cy - $ry); 
  24021.             $w = (2 * $rx); 
  24022.             $h = (2 * $ry); 
  24023.             if ($clipping) { 
  24024.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24025.                 $this->Ellipse($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, 0, 0, 360, 'CNZ', array(), array(), 8); 
  24026.             } else { 
  24027.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24028.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24029.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Ellipse', array($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, 0, 0, 360, 'CNZ')); 
  24030.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24031.                     $this->Ellipse($cx, $cy, $rx, $ry, 0, 0, 360, $obstyle, array(), array(), 8); 
  24032.                 } 
  24033.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24034.             } 
  24035.             break; 
  24036.         } 
  24037.         case 'line': { 
  24038.             if ($invisible) { 
  24039.                 break; 
  24040.             } 
  24041.             $x1 = (isset($attribs['x1'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x1'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24042.             $y1 = (isset($attribs['y1'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y1'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24043.             $x2 = (isset($attribs['x2'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x2'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24044.             $y2 = (isset($attribs['y2'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y2'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24045.             $x = $x1; 
  24046.             $y = $y1; 
  24047.             $w = abs($x2 - $x1); 
  24048.             $h = abs($y2 - $y1); 
  24049.             if (!$clipping) { 
  24050.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24051.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24052.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Line', array($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2)); 
  24053.                 $this->Line($x1, $y1, $x2, $y2); 
  24054.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24055.             } 
  24056.             break; 
  24057.         } 
  24058.         case 'polyline': 
  24059.         case 'polygon': { 
  24060.             if ($invisible) { 
  24061.                 break; 
  24062.             } 
  24063.             $points = (isset($attribs['points'])?$attribs['points']:'0 0'); 
  24064.             $points = trim($points); 
  24065.             // note that point may use a complex syntax not covered here 
  24066.             $points = preg_split('/[\, \s]+/si', $points); 
  24067.             if (count($points) < 4) { 
  24068.                 break; 
  24069.             } 
  24070.             $p = array(); 
  24071.             $xmin = 2147483647; 
  24072.             $xmax = 0; 
  24073.             $ymin = 2147483647; 
  24074.             $ymax = 0; 
  24075.             foreach ($points as $key => $val) { 
  24076.                 $p[$key] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($val, 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24077.                 if (($key % 2) == 0) { 
  24078.                     // X coordinate 
  24079.                     $xmin = min($xmin, $p[$key]); 
  24080.                     $xmax = max($xmax, $p[$key]); 
  24081.                 } else { 
  24082.                     // Y coordinate 
  24083.                     $ymin = min($ymin, $p[$key]); 
  24084.                     $ymax = max($ymax, $p[$key]); 
  24085.                 } 
  24086.             } 
  24087.             $x = $xmin; 
  24088.             $y = $ymin; 
  24089.             $w = ($xmax - $xmin); 
  24090.             $h = ($ymax - $ymin); 
  24091.             if ($name == 'polyline') { 
  24092.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24093.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24094.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'PolyLine', array($p, 'CNZ')); 
  24095.                 if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24096.                     $this->PolyLine($p, $obstyle, array(), array()); 
  24097.                 } 
  24098.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24099.             } else { // polygon 
  24100.                 if ($clipping) { 
  24101.                     $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24102.                     $this->Polygon($p, 'CNZ', array(), array(), true); 
  24103.                 } else { 
  24104.                     $this->StartTransform(); 
  24105.                     $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24106.                     $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h, 'Polygon', array($p, 'CNZ')); 
  24107.                     if (!empty($obstyle)) { 
  24108.                         $this->Polygon($p, $obstyle, array(), array(), true); 
  24109.                     } 
  24110.                     $this->StopTransform(); 
  24111.                 } 
  24112.             } 
  24113.             break; 
  24114.         } 
  24115.         // image 
  24116.         case 'image': { 
  24117.             if ($invisible) { 
  24118.                 break; 
  24119.             } 
  24120.             if (!isset($attribs['xlink:href']) OR empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  24121.                 break; 
  24122.             } 
  24123.             $x = (isset($attribs['x'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24124.             $y = (isset($attribs['y'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24125.             $w = (isset($attribs['width'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24126.             $h = (isset($attribs['height'])?$this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['height'], 0, $this->svgunit, false):0); 
  24127.             $img = $attribs['xlink:href']; 
  24128.             if (!$clipping) { 
  24129.                 $this->StartTransform(); 
  24130.                 $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24131.                 $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24132.                 if (preg_match('/^data:image\/[^;]+;base64, /', $img, $m) > 0) { 
  24133.                     // embedded image encoded as base64 
  24134.                     $img = '@'.base64_decode(substr($img, strlen($m[0]))); 
  24135.                 } else { 
  24136.                     // fix image path 
  24137.                     if (!TCPDF_STATIC::empty_string($this->svgdir) AND (($img[0] == '.') OR (basename($img) == $img))) { 
  24138.                         // replace relative path with full server path 
  24139.                         $img = $this->svgdir.'/'.$img; 
  24140.                     } 
  24141.                     if (($img[0] == '/') AND !empty($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']) AND ($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'] != '/')) { 
  24142.                         $findroot = strpos($img, $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT']); 
  24143.                         if (($findroot === false) OR ($findroot > 1)) { 
  24144.                             if (substr($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'], -1) == '/') { 
  24145.                                 $img = substr($_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'], 0, -1).$img; 
  24146.                             } else { 
  24147.                                 $img = $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'].$img; 
  24148.                             } 
  24149.                         } 
  24150.                     } 
  24151.                     $img = urldecode($img); 
  24152.                     $testscrtype = @parse_url($img); 
  24153.                     if (!isset($testscrtype['query']) OR empty($testscrtype['query'])) { 
  24154.                         // convert URL to server path 
  24155.                         $img = str_replace(K_PATH_URL, K_PATH_MAIN, $img); 
  24156.                     } 
  24157.                 } 
  24158.                 // get image type 
  24159.                 $imgtype = TCPDF_IMAGES::getImageFileType($img); 
  24160.                 if (($imgtype == 'eps') OR ($imgtype == 'ai')) { 
  24161.                     $this->ImageEps($img, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24162.                 } elseif ($imgtype == 'svg') { 
  24163.                     $this->ImageSVG($img, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24164.                 } else { 
  24165.                     $this->Image($img, $x, $y, $w, $h); 
  24166.                 } 
  24167.                 $this->StopTransform(); 
  24168.             } 
  24169.             break; 
  24170.         } 
  24171.         // text 
  24172.         case 'text': 
  24173.         case 'tspan': { 
  24174.             // only basic support - advanced features must be implemented 
  24175.             $this->svgtextmode['invisible'] = $invisible; 
  24176.             if ($invisible) { 
  24177.                 break; 
  24178.             } 
  24179.             array_push($this->svgstyles, $svgstyle); 
  24180.             if (isset($attribs['x'])) { 
  24181.                 $x = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['x'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24182.             } elseif ($name == 'tspan') { 
  24183.                 $x = $this->x; 
  24184.             } else { 
  24185.                 $x = 0; 
  24186.             } 
  24187.             if (isset($attribs['dx'])) { 
  24188.                 $x += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['dx'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24189.             } 
  24190.             if (isset($attribs['y'])) { 
  24191.                 $y = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['y'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24192.             } elseif ($name == 'tspan') { 
  24193.                 $y = $this->y; 
  24194.             } else { 
  24195.                 $y = 0; 
  24196.             } 
  24197.             if (isset($attribs['dy'])) { 
  24198.                 $y += $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($attribs['dy'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24199.             } 
  24200.             $svgstyle['text-color'] = $svgstyle['fill']; 
  24201.             $this->svgtext = ''; 
  24202.             if (isset($svgstyle['text-anchor'])) { 
  24203.                 $this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] = $svgstyle['text-anchor']; 
  24204.             } else { 
  24205.                 $this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] = 'start'; 
  24206.             } 
  24207.             if (isset($svgstyle['direction'])) { 
  24208.                 if ($svgstyle['direction'] == 'rtl') { 
  24209.                     $this->svgtextmode['rtl'] = true; 
  24210.                 } else { 
  24211.                     $this->svgtextmode['rtl'] = false; 
  24212.                 } 
  24213.             } else { 
  24214.                 $this->svgtextmode['rtl'] = false; 
  24215.             } 
  24216.             if (isset($svgstyle['stroke']) AND ($svgstyle['stroke'] != 'none') AND isset($svgstyle['stroke-width']) AND ($svgstyle['stroke-width'] > 0)) { 
  24217.                 $this->svgtextmode['stroke'] = $this->getHTMLUnitToUnits($svgstyle['stroke-width'], 0, $this->svgunit, false); 
  24218.             } else { 
  24219.                 $this->svgtextmode['stroke'] = false; 
  24220.             } 
  24221.             $this->StartTransform(); 
  24222.             $this->SVGTransform($tm); 
  24223.             $obstyle = $this->setSVGStyles($svgstyle, $prev_svgstyle, $x, $y, 1, 1); 
  24224.             $this->x = $x; 
  24225.             $this->y = $y; 
  24226.             break; 
  24227.         } 
  24228.         // use 
  24229.         case 'use': { 
  24230.             if (isset($attribs['xlink:href']) AND !empty($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  24231.                 $svgdefid = substr($attribs['xlink:href'], 1); 
  24232.                 if (isset($this->svgdefs[$svgdefid])) { 
  24233.                     $use = $this->svgdefs[$svgdefid]; 
  24234.                     if (isset($attribs['xlink:href'])) { 
  24235.                         unset($attribs['xlink:href']); 
  24236.                     } 
  24237.                     if (isset($attribs['id'])) { 
  24238.                         unset($attribs['id']); 
  24239.                     } 
  24240.                     if (isset($use['attribs']['x']) AND isset($attribs['x'])) { 
  24241.                         $attribs['x'] += $use['attribs']['x']; 
  24242.                     } 
  24243.                     if (isset($use['attribs']['y']) AND isset($attribs['y'])) { 
  24244.                         $attribs['y'] += $use['attribs']['y']; 
  24245.                     } 
  24246.                     if (empty($attribs['style'])) { 
  24247.                         $attribs['style'] = ''; 
  24248.                     } 
  24249.                     if (!empty($use['attribs']['style'])) { 
  24250.                         // merge styles 
  24251.                         $attribs['style'] = str_replace(';;', ';', ';'.$use['attribs']['style'].$attribs['style']); 
  24252.                     } 
  24253.                     $attribs = array_merge($use['attribs'], $attribs); 
  24254.                     $this->startSVGElementHandler($parser, $use['name'], $attribs); 
  24255.                     return; 
  24256.                 } 
  24257.             } 
  24258.             break; 
  24259.         } 
  24260.         default: { 
  24261.             break; 
  24262.         } 
  24263.     } // end of switch 
  24264.     // process child elements 
  24265.     if (!empty($attribs['child_elements'])) { 
  24266.         $child_elements = $attribs['child_elements']; 
  24267.         unset($attribs['child_elements']); 
  24268.         foreach($child_elements as $child_element) { 
  24269.             if (empty($child_element['attribs']['closing_tag'])) { 
  24270.                 $this->startSVGElementHandler('child-tag', $child_element['name'], $child_element['attribs']); 
  24271.             } else { 
  24272.                 if (isset($child_element['attribs']['content'])) { 
  24273.                     $this->svgtext = $child_element['attribs']['content']; 
  24274.                 } 
  24275.                 $this->endSVGElementHandler('child-tag', $child_element['name']); 
  24276.             } 
  24277.         } 
  24278.     } 
  24279. } 
  24280.  
  24281. /** 
  24282.  * Sets the closing SVG element handler function for the XML parser. 
  24283.  * @param $parser (resource) The first parameter, parser, is a reference to the XML parser calling the handler. 
  24284.  * @param $name (string) The second parameter, name, contains the name of the element for which this handler is called. If case-folding is in effect for this parser, the element name will be in uppercase letters. 
  24285.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  24286.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  24287.  * @protected 
  24288.  */ 
  24289. protected function endSVGElementHandler($parser, $name) { 
  24290.     if ($this->svgdefsmode AND !in_array($name, array('defs', 'clipPath', 'linearGradient', 'radialGradient', 'stop'))) {; 
  24291.         if (end($this->svgdefs) !== FALSE) { 
  24292.             $last_svgdefs_id = key($this->svgdefs); 
  24293.             if (isset($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'])) { 
  24294.                 foreach($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'] as $child_element) { 
  24295.                     if (isset($child_element['attribs']['id']) AND ($child_element['name'] == $name)) { 
  24296.                         $this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'][$child_element['attribs']['id'].'_CLOSE'] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => array('closing_tag' => TRUE, 'content' => $this->svgtext)); 
  24297.                         return; 
  24298.                     } 
  24299.                 } 
  24300.                 if ($this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['name'] == $name) { 
  24301.                     $this->svgdefs[$last_svgdefs_id]['attribs']['child_elements'][$last_svgdefs_id.'_CLOSE'] = array('name' => $name, 'attribs' => array('closing_tag' => TRUE, 'content' => $this->svgtext)); 
  24302.                     return; 
  24303.                 } 
  24304.             } 
  24305.         } 
  24306.         return; 
  24307.     } 
  24308.     switch($name) { 
  24309.         case 'defs': { 
  24310.             $this->svgdefsmode = false; 
  24311.             break; 
  24312.         } 
  24313.         // clipPath 
  24314.         case 'clipPath': { 
  24315.             $this->svgclipmode = false; 
  24316.             break; 
  24317.         } 
  24318.         case 'g': { 
  24319.             // ungroup: remove last style from array 
  24320.             array_pop($this->svgstyles); 
  24321.             $this->StopTransform(); 
  24322.             break; 
  24323.         } 
  24324.         case 'text': 
  24325.         case 'tspan': { 
  24326.             if ($this->svgtextmode['invisible']) { 
  24327.                 // This implementation must be fixed to following the rule: 
  24328.                 // If the 'visibility' property is set to hidden on a 'tspan', 'tref' or 'altGlyph' element, then the text is invisible but still takes up space in text layout calculations. 
  24329.                 break; 
  24330.             } 
  24331.             // print text 
  24332.             $text = $this->svgtext; 
  24333.             //$text = $this->stringTrim($text); 
  24334.             $textlen = $this->GetStringWidth($text); 
  24335.             if ($this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] != 'start') { 
  24336.                 // check if string is RTL text 
  24337.                 if ($this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] == 'end') { 
  24338.                     if ($this->svgtextmode['rtl']) { 
  24339.                         $this->x += $textlen; 
  24340.                     } else { 
  24341.                         $this->x -= $textlen; 
  24342.                     } 
  24343.                 } elseif ($this->svgtextmode['text-anchor'] == 'middle') { 
  24344.                     if ($this->svgtextmode['rtl']) { 
  24345.                         $this->x += ($textlen / 2); 
  24346.                     } else { 
  24347.                         $this->x -= ($textlen / 2); 
  24348.                     } 
  24349.                 } 
  24350.             } 
  24351.             $textrendermode = $this->textrendermode; 
  24352.             $textstrokewidth = $this->textstrokewidth; 
  24353.             $this->setTextRenderingMode($this->svgtextmode['stroke'], true, false); 
  24354.             if ($name == 'text') { 
  24355.                 // store current coordinates 
  24356.                 $tmpx = $this->x; 
  24357.                 $tmpy = $this->y; 
  24358.             } 
  24359.             $this->Cell($textlen, 0, $text, 0, 0, '', false, '', 0, false, 'L', 'T'); 
  24360.             if ($name == 'text') { 
  24361.                 // restore coordinates 
  24362.                 $this->x = $tmpx; 
  24363.                 $this->y = $tmpy; 
  24364.             } 
  24365.             // restore previous rendering mode 
  24366.             $this->textrendermode = $textrendermode; 
  24367.             $this->textstrokewidth = $textstrokewidth; 
  24368.             $this->svgtext = ''; 
  24369.             $this->StopTransform(); 
  24370.             if (!$this->svgdefsmode) { 
  24371.                 array_pop($this->svgstyles); 
  24372.             } 
  24373.             break; 
  24374.         } 
  24375.         default: { 
  24376.             break; 
  24377.         } 
  24378.     } 
  24379. } 
  24380.  
  24381. /** 
  24382.  * Sets the character data handler function for the XML parser. 
  24383.  * @param $parser (resource) The first parameter, parser, is a reference to the XML parser calling the handler. 
  24384.  * @param $data (string) The second parameter, data, contains the character data as a string. 
  24385.  * @author Nicola Asuni 
  24386.  * @since 5.0.000 (2010-05-02) 
  24387.  * @protected 
  • Version(s)

    2.0
